1b1(rnying rgyud): drug smad d+ha/ badz+rak+Shal lag tsa ma hA tAr+tha/ bdastsu dang / da rba dgas pa rgyud rnanag/ brtsam ldan na
1b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi bdag pa/ dz+nyAn rnam pa'i sngag sung thugs gzhin du thams cad mtshan pa la phyag 'dzin mo// 'di ska da bstan cing tham pa'i dus gcig na/ @
1b3(rnying rgyud): na 'das gas na mchog gi bdag po/ dus gsum ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa' dzag/ rdo rje dang / 'khor mod d+ha/ rin po che dang / pad+ma dang las kyi rang
1b4(rnying rgyud): bad/ rigs dang ma shes glen gyi bdag nyid/ rol ba'i rdzu 'phrul la mnga' brnyes pa de/ non chos nyid skye ba med pa'i dang las/ hwags 'gags med
1b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe 'phrul gyi sgrar bzhugs so// 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor chen po dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis gshegs shing bzhugs te bcu
2a1(rnying rgyud): pa na gas/ smra pa smra pa na su 'dun la sa //
2a2(rnying rgyud): shes gsal bya / 'alapas 'ang / phan ba pa ba la bzhin ni/ rigs kyi skye dang / rigs kyi sem de/
2a3(rnying rgyud): 'du / sa kyi nga/ sa kyi nga / rgyu shA
2a4(rnying rgyud): sa nyid na bka dod pa'i thobs pa dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa nyid du brgyags so// don nga bgasang pa'i chen pa
2a5(rnying rgyud): rgya rgyan
2b1(rnying rgyud): ngan las 'das pa dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag bcas drang zag mang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas/ bstan du ma
2b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang bstan du med pa/ thog bcas dang thog med/ trog bcas dang rtog med/ don dam pa dang kun rdzob/ bsrub bya dang grub byed/ shes pa dang shes pa'i yul/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rgya 'bras bur bca
2b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ sdang zhing grags pa thams cad la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis kun tu yang khyab par gzigs rnam pa de yang gzigs so// de bzhin du gzigs pas/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi mtshan nyid stong pa chen po'i rang bzhin/ skyabs ma
2b4(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid/ de kho na'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rang gi lhan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs kyis
2b5(rnying rgyud): mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya phrag stong du brkyang phyag btsal nas/ dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings la mnal bzhin du 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// e ma ho gsang mchog dgyes pa che// e
2b6(rnying rgyud): maho rnam par dag pa'i lam// ngo mtshar 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi de nyid don// byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin
2b7(rnying rgyud): labaka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod nyon cig/ legs par yid la zung zhig/ 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba thams cad dang da ltar dang phyis 'byung ba'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs gsung bar dka' ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
3a1(rnying rgyud): ma khon nyid byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de ni brjod du yang med pa/ snod du gyur pa yang dkon pa'i phyid ro// rdo rje 'dzin pa de bas ma khyod nyid la dris shig ces bka' stsal tI ci yang myi gsung bar bzhug
3a2(rnying rgyud): nas 'khor lo 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa la bzho ba mdzod de/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa khung rdzobs pa yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das ga ngab mchog
3a3(rnying rgyud): bdag po the tshom thams cad gcod pa la the tshom yang dang yang du zhus shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni snod ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo dman rnams la yang byin gyis rlobs shig ces bka'i bsko ba mdzad nga
3a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos/ rigs bzha' sangs rgyas kyis bskul ba thugs su rud nas/ 'khor mang po dang bcas pa snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs par mdzad nas/ ston pa'i zhal du bltas te gnas so// de nas rdo rje 'dus pa'i
3a5(rnying rgyud): bsngob med pa'i mchod pa ma chags pa'i 'dod yo/ nam mkha' lta bur kun la khyab cing sems las sprul te/ smon pa la mchod nas 'di skad kyis gsol te// don dam sems nyid sde ba med pa la// spyod pa dang ni gnam da
3a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor// kye 'phrul 'byung ba// zhes sol// bka' skal ba/ chos can rtsab sems nyid de// zabar byed ston pa lang// glang nas bstan pa batshal ba med// bdag nyid chen po cing nab sems/
3a7(rnying rgyud): bas pa 'tsha// byang chub sems pa gnas pa mas// gud na gnas pa dzad do// don gzhas sam thang rgya // la ba'i bas su po 'o// 'byor ba gnas pa /
3b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems// 'thung ba gnas bskur yum dzab// ma sngam chags kyang chub sa pas// nam gas 'khor ba gnas bsgyur sams dpa' // dmigs pa stong pa'i byang chub sems// rgyal bcung 'khor ba gnas bskang sa
3b2(rnying rgyud): gas pa med byung bab sa/ 'byung ba sa pa / min tu/ ga sa // yo pa na rgya ma/ phrin pa med pa ma
3b3(rnying rgyud): drug gnas bskyed myal wa ste// zlos pa med pa'i byang chub sems// rgyag cing 'phong ba gnas pa sgyu kun bzang phyub rgyas ste// gzung 'dzin med pa'i byang chub sems// 'khrul ba bzlog phyir mamam lam rkang ba las// dang
3b4(rnying rgyud): pas yin kyi// ba su yang rgyal bas mi brnyas pa// thungam da ldarna pas su stsu// kha rna ma dzan tugs nas// ci ya ba bkag chos kyi dbyungs// bsgrub mya bkag sems nyid namam pa' yid// sdod pa pa
3b5(rnying rgyud): nas rgyasas 'dus// bad+hA bla zhini sbyi shi pa drug mas pa dag 'a kyis pams // / la ba da gag sa nyi gas// dam kyi sub sa rnaMms pam zung
3b6(rnying rgyud): med// mchod pa ma bkag sems las langs spyod pa// rnying ba kri bklags mas nyid brjod deng bral// phyag rgyam bkag sems nyid phyug rgya yin// ti 'dzin ma bkag sems nyid dngad pa shar// zhes bka'aphral bas/ 'chor
3b7(rnying rgyud): pos bgyid ba dpal ma can pa byung byung ba teg pa'i drimi myi rje pa'i mas dris kyi makyi sa pa sring pa'i byas pas / dang sa cha kyang kyang thod/
4a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pas/ don dam pa'i de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la cung zhig mnyam pAr bzhag nas/ 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
4a2(rnying rgyud): pa la sogs pa rnams nges par legs par nyon cig/ byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni// brjod dang sgra bsam yul las 'das// don dam kun rdzob tha mi dad// rang gi lus ngag rdo rje skye// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo las// lus ngag yid
4a3(rnying rgyud): gsum ma grub par// rig pa'i skyes bu de yis ni// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis/ rang gi byang chub sems de kho na nyid la sems nas 'khod do// 'bod pas sems
4a4(rnying rgyud): don rtogs par gyur te/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po des/ rang gi byang chub sems kyi rtogs tshad 'di phul lo// e ma ho bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin rnam spangs tshig dang yi
4a5(rnying rgyud): ge'i spyod yul min// gdod nas ma skyes rtog pa'i gnas med do// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo 'dzin pas kyang / rang po byang chub kyi sems rtogs tshad 'di gsungs so// e ma ho mos kun stong pa'i bdang //
4a6(rnying rgyud): gi ngo bo brjod du med// brjod med de ni sna tshogs pa'i// chos rnams kun la khyab par gnas// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'dzin pas kyang / rang gi byang chub sems kyi togs tshad phul ba 'di skad gsungs so//
4a7(rnying rgyud): ma nyi byeng chub sa ma// ming du btags pa'i chog rnams kyad// mnyam banyid la gnas bcas kying// mnyam pa nyid las gzhan med do// zhes gsungs sa// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa dzin pa / rang gi rtsa
4b1(rnying rgyud): tanas cad 'ad gsungs pa// mam ha nas su snang ba thams cad kun// ngang gang ba brjod du byed// da nyid byang chub semasas ni// mkhas pas bsgoms na rdzogs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya rdzu
4b2(rnying rgyud): pas kyang / rang gi byang chub sems kyi rtogs tshad 'di gsungs so// chos kun byang chub sems nyid de// nges pa med de dngos tog thal// de nyid dag pa'i rang bzhin te// mkhas pas ci dgar bsgoms na 'grub// ces gsungs // de
4b3(rnying rgyud): gzhan pa'i 'khong rnams ni/ thang chub sems de dzin nyid kyi don nyams su myong b+h+yo/ rang rang gis de bzhin nyid la 'khod nas gnas s+ho// thams cang zung rgyab kyi sems kyi choms pa de'i tshe na/ dus gsum la sogs te 'khyo da
4b4(rnying rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa/ chu dang 'bras bu bcas pa rnams sbyong badzin por thong ba / dben ma mkha'i mtshan nyid tsam du yang bsgrub tu yod pa la yin no// rdo rje phung pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byang chub kyi sems de khon nyid kyi do/
4b5(rnying rgyud): de nas skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid las/ 'gag pa med pa'i long sa spyod rdzogs pa'i mu 'byung ba'i phyir na/ rdor 'dzin pa'i rgyal po/
4b6(rnying rgyud): nges par gleng bsrung ba'i le'u skye gnyis pa'o// // de nas skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid las/ 'gag pa med pa'i 'ong po spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'byung ba'i b+hi na/ rdo 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sa/ stong ba nyid kyi dang las kyu 'ad
4b7(rnying rgyud): bapral to// me maho stong nyid rnam dag klong langs nas// snyoms pa'i thugs rje 'thung bar myi dmigs kyang // shes rab don dam chos skrags la ba lasa?// 'i 'grog thabs kyis snying rje nam mkhar stod// zhes bskul nges/ grasa?
4b8(rnying rgyud): chog gi bdag pos baphrul bar mkhyen te/ stong pa nyid kyi dngo la mnal bzhin du/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams ca la khyab pa'i tir rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs te/ da'i rtse chos thams cad
5a1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i nga ba com du gnas par gyu to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas/ snying rje chen po'i dang las klu 'dis bskyal to// e ma to mA g+har byams pa'i snying rje chen pa na// mkha' ltang go yang 'byed cing ba la rngu
5a2(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i snying rje nam mkha'i dbyings dum nas// longs khyod rdzogs pa'i sku mchog bstan du gsol// a la la ho zhes bskul to// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bskul bar mkhyen nas/ snying rje nam mkha'i ngang las ga pa'i tshe 'a
5a3(rnying rgyud): rnam par sprul te/ rdo rje'i gru mngon par 'du mdzad de/ dpe na dum mkha'i dbyings la nyi ma 'bum dus gcig tu shar ba'i gzi brji lta bu'o// de nas yang rdo rje badzin pas/ chang du byung ba'i bu 'dis bskul to// e ma ho yid bzhin
5a4(rnying rgyud): mchog nyi mo 'bar ba las// sprul pa'i tshe 'tshul rdo rje'i gar mdzad cing // brjid pa'i su mchog rdo rje 'bar ba yis// 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol// a la la ha zhes rnam par bskul bas bayul bar thugs su chud de/
5a5(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi mtshan ma/ ye shes kyi che mo rdo rje rtse dgu pa lci bu/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas yang rol pa'i su mngon par 'du mdzad pa de las/ rol pa'i sku zhal gsum pa lta bu mang
5a6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis gzigs so// de nas rmad du byung ba 'dis bstsal lo// e mdo ni rang byung ba'i// rigs rnams kun gyi rigs kyi gtso// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// rdo rje 'chang chen rtag pa rol pa'i spu'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas 'a
5a7(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rdo rje chen po las thung ba'i// dkyil lo bor dam pa bshad du gsol// e ma ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// de
5b1(rnying rgyud): gzugs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'bor dam pa bshad du gsol// a ma ho// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan med thams cad yang dag spongs// bcom ldan gsang ba mchog go bdag
5b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// e ma ho// zhi ba'i chos mchog las byung ba'i// ye shes lhod pa rnam spong ba'i// bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// e ma ho// sems can
5b3(rnying rgyud): sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// skyes bskul bar mkhyen te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis hU~M zhes brjod de/ gyon rlabs can dutha
5b4(rnying rgyud): sde tshul gyi gnas dang 'khor tshul la sogs pa de dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la brdzus te/ chos nyid byang chub sems su mi snang bar mdzad do// de las pro d+hi tsi d+ha maN+Da la a zhes cho 'phrul gyi sgo brjod pas/ phye ba med pa'i ngang las 'gag
5b5(rnying rgyud): po med pa'i rgyo 'phrul gyi byang chub sems kyi gzugs brtan ni/ chos thams cad kyi bo yi ge a rugs la bar mdzad do// de la cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di skad ces bsgrags so// li gI ya 'i sems kyi rang bzhin te// chags pa'i gyon pa la
5b6(rnying rgyud): mkha'i kha dog 'dra// sems rgya che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// mtsho'i rlabs ltar thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu// zhes bklags so// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin a re'i 'gro 'dulas/ thams cad yi ga ya de shin tu yang ga
5b7(rnying rgyud): de las 'di skad ces bklags so// byang chub sems kyi yig 'bru ya// 'phros pas thugs bskul rgyud phyur gyi// thabs dang shes rab dbyangs dang gla yig chod// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyi rgyu rugasal// ka kheg kyang /
6a1(rnying rgyud): NadzAdz+haH/ tA rbad d+ha na/ TAHDa D+ha Na/ pa pha ba nAma?/ yu wa dA la/ shaSh+Ta sa ha/ oM ok+Sha yA/ a A/ i I/ a mra/ e yai/ a au/ dzaH/ l-i wau/ e A// de nas yang gas ba mchog gi bdag
6a2(rnying rgyud): pos/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las ni// lha mo dbyings phyug mngon phyung ste// hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis// rin chen bsgra rgyas mdzad nas// sprin ring mdzes tshul g.yon du bzhugs/ de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag pas/
6a3(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas rnam par bsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ nyid kyi sgra dang gsung dang thugs las snying po 'di rnams ched du brjod de phyung ngo // e ye// baM/ muM/ raM/ b+h+rUM/ chos dbyings gsal ba'i nam mkha' la// ye shes gsal ba'i thang
6a4(rnying rgyud): gis bgyod// byang chub sems rgyan chu chun las// zhig nas gsal ba'i sa gzhi chags// lhag mthong 'bar ba'i drong dang ldan// ye shes wa ldan ri rab chen po la// hU~M las rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // e ma sangs
6a5(rnying rgyud): rdzas thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi gnas// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor cha dgu pa// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad pa// gru chad par khyams ldan pa dang // sgo yi 'gram logs ya phug khyang // phyi dang nang med kun tu dang /
6a6(rnying rgyud): rjem thar brgyad kyi ka ba la// ye shes chen po bzhi'i gdung bres// 'khor lo'i gdan dang rin chen rgyan// rtsu bapas rol mo'i tshogs su ldan// zhes brjod do// de nas yang bdag nyid dang 'khor rnams la rim gro ba myed de gdan bting ba'i
6a7(rnying rgyud): skyed/ 'di skad ces brjod do// d+ha ri ke tha ga te/ b+he shar ta/ d+ha sha ta thA gtas ta la/ ta thA ga ta sa dza ga ra/ dza ti ri ti rba ta/ ga ta bo sha ta ka/ ra d+da dang/ ma pa/ a s+sa d+ya tsany+dza pad+da maN+Da la/ seng ge thang chen dang byanas
6b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' lding // nAzla btu na nam tha chud mangs// bde gshegs rnams la rimatho bskyed pa'i phyir// gdan gyi chung pa rab tu rdzogs// nanas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshod du brjod pa 'di 'dza // ral kha/ dza ltar spang ba 'das
6b2(rnying rgyud): po rnams// skye med dang du ro gcig phyir// ye shes bskal pa gsum gyis dngos po gsum// spangs nas rang bzhin chos dbyings pa rung // rjes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ ta thA ga tas ma ya tik+Sha badz+ra zhes
6b3(rnying rgyud): brjod de/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma chags pa'i yu ma la/ 'khor gyi sra bskyed pa'i phyir na/ rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yum dbyung
6b4(rnying rgyud): smyug ma zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas nas/ chags pa'i klu 'das bskal to// e ma ho// rol pa'i cho 'phral 'bar ba'i wa mchog las// khyab pa'i byin chubs rdo rje'i gar mdzad cing // gsang ba thA ga yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// re
6b5(rnying rgyud): song bdud rdzi'i char rgyun dbab tu gsol// a la la ho zhes rnam par bskul bas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/ gnyis su med pa'i rol pa'i tshul gyis gar mdzad cing / rdo rje'i gru 'di blangs so// a ho bde mchog
6b6(rnying rgyud): 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings nyid du// 'dzum zhing 'khyil pas badz+ra'i b+ha ga ru// dga' mchog rdo rje gsang ba'i byang chub sems// dri med rin chen chang dpa' rgyun mi gcod// sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra oM hU~M phaT/ e ka tsat+ta A~M/ e ru dA ga
6b7(rnying rgyud): me/ zhes gsungs so// mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs nas/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i grwa dang gar gyis stegs pa dang / 'khyud pa dang rol pa mdzad do// de ltar ro pa'i thabs mchog yab kyi byang chub kyi sems so// thugs
7a1(rnying rgyud): byang na pa rnams kyis 'askal pa'i ma phrul dubag/ mnyachags partson po dbabla pa'i byang chub sems// du gas pa dag ga gsurnams kyi dus can ma das
7a2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin las// mu tig zi med 'asol ba'i 'od zer spro'o// yang thabs mchog yab kyi byang chub sems kyis/ chags pa'i yum gyi byang chub sems la baphral ba'i cho 'phrulaskad ces bsgrags / sa togs da pa
7a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor // skyon gyis mgos rnam dag byang chub sems// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid de// bsil ba'i 'od zer pad+ma'i gnas su sgo ho// na ma sarba tra thA ga ta sa sA dz+re d+ha Ni he badz+ra sa twA wa At+ma kos po// zhes spro zhing 'phrul lo//
7a4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/ byang chub kyi sems 'phro 'du'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho bde mchog bde ba ma// byang chub sems ni rab smos pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs bskul cing /
7a5(rnying rgyud): ba kun gyi chung spangs te// slar 'dus dbyings su rnam pa las// byang chub sems kyi thig ler gsal// thig le 'od kyi rang bzhin las// byang chub sems kyis kun la khyab// po d+ha sarba paN+Da la/ zhes gsungs te/ de'i tshe 'khor ba dang mya
7a6(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa'i chos thams cad yab yum sgeg pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig ler gnas so// de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos/ 'gro 'du dang 'du 'dul gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin su gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam par
7a7(rnying rgyud): spros pa ni gsungs so// de nas byang chub kyi sems pas yi ge nang par spros pa/ ta rbad d+han/ Tadza Da D+haN/ ka khag sang/ tsan+ya dzadz+ha ta/ 'bar d+ha ma/ ya na ra la/ sa Sha sa hA/ !/ i I/ u y+ra/ oM ma/ oM a/ e ma
7b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// yi ge gsung gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// spros pas gsung bsgral dag rgyung dag/ bsdus pas chos kyi phyag rgya thob// ces gsungs so// chos thams cad byang chub sems kyi yig 'brur mkhyen nas mngon par 'dra mdza /
7b2(rnying rgyud): nas yang yi ge las phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur par mdzad de/ badz+ra/ tsakra/ raH/ pad+ma/ ka ma/ badz+ra gan \u0f7f/ tsakra gnaH/ rathA gan ta/ par+b+ba gnad+ha/ karma ga naH/ ut+pa la pur+tha/ nA ga br-ik+ta/ rar+tha sa ma ti/ tiSh+Tha/ kharba/ pad+ma d+ha ra badz+ra rA pa/
7b3(rnying rgyud): tsab/ raN+Da \u0f89\u0fa4 ba t+ti/ dz+nyAn maH/ rad+has mthi/ d+hA rma ki ra/ nI tag pa/ du sa me b+ha pa/ pud+d+ha mA \u0f7f/ sa ka r+ye ba/ ga pa~M pag ta/ sa gu ts+tsha \u0f7f/ trA ma mA tA/ d+ham sa bi/ badz+ra kak+ShaH/ ra ga pa/ badz+rod/ khyam/ tab te/
7b4(rnying rgyud): 'adz+ra/ d+hamr-i gai nA d+had+hIH/ ka pA la ni rag ta/ badz+ra tiTha/ dzA go dag/ badz+rA ka ma/ ad+g+ha shA dzaH/ d+h+r-i p+tA sha d+b+h+yAM/ baM s+phoT baM/ hoHgan d+he b+h+yoH// rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dang // rin chen pad+ha n+ya gra ma ste// shes rab don ston dril bu lA/
7b5(rnying rgyud): ut+pal dang ni klu shing dang // rini chen myu gu ral gri dang // pad+ma dkar dang rdo rje dang // chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen ste// gzugs mdzes me long rin chen phreng // chos kyi pi wang gar mchog ste// bdug pa'i mchog dang me tog phreng /
7b6(rnying rgyud): mar me dang ni byug pa ste// gseg shang dang ni pi wang dang // go cha dang ni bo ti dang // rin chen sbom dang me chur bstan// thabs mchog rdo rje dang ni shes rab dril bur bstan// thod pa dri mgo gdengs pa dang // rdo rje dang ni sbal chen dang /
7b7(rnying rgyud): rdorje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lugs kyu dang ni zhags pa dang // lcags srog dang ni dril bu'o// es bder gshegs kun gyi thugs// rtogs par dka' ba 'i snying po'i don// bde gshegs thugs bsngal 'gro ba'i shes pa 'grol//
8a1(rnying rgyud): du mji gzugs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs te/ chos thams cad phrag Na'i nga ba dum khyen to// de nas yang gsang ba mchog ga bdag pos sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i tIng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
8a2(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsungs so// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'khor los sgyur// rin chen mang dang pad+ma 'chang // sna tshogs las la sogs pa rnams// spyan lnga nyid dang phyogs bzhir bzhugs// bzang mo snyan dang mA ma kI// na bza' dkar mo sgrol ma rnams
8a3(rnying rgyud): rang rang gtsol 'khril ba'i tshul// sa yi snying po nam mkha'i snying // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug na rdo rje dang // byams pa mi tri sgrib pa rnam par sel// kun tu bzang po 'jam dpal gzhon nu rnams// 'brar ba'i 'khor lo dag la 'khod//
8a4(rnying rgyud): la s+ye mA le gIrti nI rti dang // d+hu pe buSh+pe A lo ke// gan+d+he ma la sogs pa rnams// rang rang sems dpa' dag dang 'khril// mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstun// brgya byin dang ni thags bzang ris// shAkya thub
8a5(rnying rgyud): thub dang seng ge dang // gshin rje'i rgyal dang kha 'bar ma// 'bar ba'i bar khyams dag la 'khod// gshin rje gshed dang stobs po che// rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzhi// phyogs kyi sgo bzhi dag la'o// rta gdong phrag gdong ser gdong sbrul
8a6(rnying rgyud): gdong rnams// rang dang khro bo dag la 'khril// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs mdog/ mnyen lcug 'khrel ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lcen lhag gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs
8a7(rnying rgyud): chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// sku mdog phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// e ma ho bde gshegs kun gyi sku// sangs rgyas sku brnyes lus kyi nyes pa dag/ mtshan gyi me tog dpe byad 'bu chags te// sku
8b1(rnying rgyud): mchog phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsam mi khyab// rjes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sku gsung thugs phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zlos pa'i le'u ge gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
8b2(rnying rgyud): kye mya gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ de ltar bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i// tha grangs dngos gzhi las da'i yon tan gang // bde ba gshegs pas bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sbyar ba// tsun
8b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rgyal po// chos spyan ma mkha'i dang las ma g.yos kyang // me long ye shes dang las thugs mchog tshul 'dzin cing // bde ba'i ye shes la don thugs chud pa // rnam shes bag chags sbya mdzad rdo rje 'dzin pa khor nyid su/
8b4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i rang las ma g.yos kyang // stong nyid rang las sku mchog tshul 'dzin cing // bde chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad de// gzugs kyi mtshan ma spang mdzad 'khor los gyur rgyal po// chos su nam mkha'i ngang las mag yos kyang /
8b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid ye shes dang las yon tan tshul du bstan// rin chen dbyig ltar dgos 'dod de skong ba// tshor ba gnas bu dag mdzad rin chen mdzes pa'i sku// chos su nam mkha'i ngang las mag yos kyang // so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang las ba
8b6(rnying rgyud): 'chang ba'i sku// 'dam skyes pad ltar nyon mongs skyon mgos// 'du shes gnas smad g.yas pad+ma 'chang ba'i sku// chos sku nam mkha'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // bya ba nan tan ye shes dang las rgya gra ma 'dzin pa'i sku// bdag rang
8b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi phrin las don mdzod dpal// 'du byed gnas su dag pas sna tshogs 'chang ba'i sku// skye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // nam mkha'i spyan gyis sku mchog shes rang tshul// sangs rgyas che ba'i byin ba rlabs sdud mdzan
9a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ de// nam mkha'i rab ba'an gnas 'gyur nam mkha'i ldan// kye med chos kyi dbyings las ma gsos kyang // sangs rgyas spyan gyis sku mchog bsam gtan tshul// sangs rgyas che ba'i khyad par bskyed mdzun pa
9a2(rnying rgyud): sa mi 'byung ba gnas 'gyur sangs rgyas spyan// skye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // mA ma kI yi sku mchog sbyin pa'i tshul// nyon mongs zab rlan gyis spangs par byed// chu yi 'byung ba gnas 'gyur ma ma kI// blo med chos kyi
9a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // na bza' dkar mo'i sku mchog bzod pa'i tshul// nyon mongs bag chags thams cad bsreg mdzad ma// me yi 'byung ba gnas 'gyur na bza' dkar// phye med chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // dam tshig
9a4(rnying rgyud): sgrol ma'i sku mchog brtson 'grus tshul// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i bag chags 'thor mdzad ma// rlung gi 'byung ba gnas 'gyur dam tshig sgrol// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sra sa yi snying po sems dpa'i sgrol 'dzin
9a5(rnying rgyud): nga // bla med byang chub 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa'i// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur sa yi snying po'i sku// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs skranam mkha'i snying po tshul 'dzin cing // nyon mongs sgrib pa'i dra ba gcod mdzad de// yid
9a6(rnying rgyud): kyi rnam shes gnas 'gyur nam mkha'i snying po'i sku// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs su lhan ngas gzigs kyi sku mchog sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pas// 'dong ba'i bag chags sgron gyis ma gos te// nyon mongs yid kyi gnas
9a7(rnying rgyud): 'byer spyan ngas gzugs dbang gru// ye shes tsunas kyi chos nyid don nags te// gzugs su phyag na rdo rjes pas pa'i tshul 'dzin pas// mtha' gnyis son mongs 'khor ba 'joms pa dag// rdzas kyi rnam gas gnas 'thar phrag 'dro ba'i sku
9b1(rnying rgyud): ye shwas thugs kyi chos nyid thugs chud cing // gzugs sgra byams pa mi thi sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin cing // che ba'i yon tan ma lus sku la rdzogs// sgra yi nam shes gnas 'gyur byams pa mtha'i bu// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// ba
9b2(rnying rgyud): pra sgrib pa rnam sel sems dpa'i tshu la 'dzin pas// 'gro ba rnams la gsung gi chos kyang ston// rna ba'i rnam shes gnas 'gyur sgrib pa sel ba'i sgra// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs su kun tu bzang po sems dpa'i
9b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pas// bla med byang chub 'bras bu smin mdzad cing // mig gi rnam shes gnas 'gyur kun tu bzang po'i sku// ye shes thugs kyi chos nyid don rtogs te// gzugs sku 'jam dpal gzhon nu sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin cing // nyon mongs pag tshogs
9b4(rnying rgyud): zab 'joms par byed// lce yi rnam shes gnas 'gyur 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku// skye med chos dbyings don ma thugs chud kyang // gzugs sgra lha mo lha ste sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// skye med chos kyi dbyings las mnga' brnyes ma// kun gzhi yul du
9b5(rnying rgyud): sdang ba gnas 'gyur lnga s+ye ma// phye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang // gzugs sku lha mo mA lo ser mo'i tshul 'dzin ma// chos nyid rig pa nyid la gsal mdzad de// yid kyi yul du sdung ba gnas 'gyur mA le ma// skye med chos dbyings
9b6(rnying rgyud): don dam zhugs chung kyang // gzugs sku lha mo gI ti sems ma'i tshul du bstan// rnam dag 'gro la gsung gi sgra sgrogs ma// nyon mongs yul du sdur ba gnas 'gyur gi d+him// skye med chos dbyings don dam thugs chungad kyang // gzugs sku lha
9b7(rnying rgyud): sems ma'i tshul 'dzin cing // khrus kyi yul du sdang ba gnas 'gyur ni nim// skye mong gyis dbyings don ram thugs chud kyang // gzugs sku lha mo d+hU pi sems ma'i tshul 'dzin cing // gsal ba'i rig pas bder gshegs tshogs rnams tshims mdza
10a1(rnying rgyud): mig ga phral du snang ba gnas 'gyur sgrub ma// bla meng chos dang sa don dam thugs rgyu ga// brtags smrasnyam ba tho sems ma rgyal bang na ma// mthun pa'i dag bus dus gsumasangs rgyas mnyos// nang kyang /
10a2(rnying rgyud): du sdang ba gnas 'gyur buSh+Ta ma// bya med chos dbyings don dem thugs chud kyang // gzugs sku lha mo A kro ka s+t+waM sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// 'khor ba ma reg mun pa sel bar mdzad// s+thA ye yul du snang ba gnas dkar nga kA// rtse mi
10a3(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings don dam thugs chud kyang // gzugs sku lha mo gar+b+he sems ma'i tshul 'dzin ma// bag chags nyon mongs sgrib pa dag gyur te// lce yi yul du snang ba gnas 'gyur gan+d+hem// ye shes thugs kyi chos dbyings dor rtogs te// gzugs pa
10a4(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po phyag rgya'i tshul 'dzin cing // 'khor ba gnas 'drin bde gshegs kun bskyed yab// byed pa po ni gnas 'gyur kun bzang bdag nyid yab// chos kyi dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med kyang // gzugs sku 'gro ba'i don du yum gyi cha 'dzin
10a5(rnying rgyud): pa// 'das dang da ltar mabyon kun bskyed yum// bla ba mo ni gnas 'gyur kun bzang bdag nyid yum// spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang // sbrul sku brgya byin thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// brtson 'grus chos ston pham ltud med par mdzad//
10a6(rnying rgyud): le lo gnas 'gyur lha yi thub pa mchog/ smos pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang // sbrul sgra thags bzang ris te thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pas// yon tan tshul khrims chos ston 'thab cod rnam par sel// nga rgyal gnas 'gyur lha min thub pa
10a7(rnying rgyud): mchog/ spros pa med pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // sbrul lu shAkya thub pa'i tshul 'dzin pas// bsam gtan chos ston ze la phongs sdug bsngal sel// 'dod chags gnas 'gyur mi yi thub pa mchog/ spros pa med pa'i rang las ma g.yos
10b1(rnying rgyud): kang // drang srang shAkyas gathub par tshul 'dzin pas// shes rab chos ston gti mug sdug bsngal sal// gti mug gnas 'gyur byol sod thub pa'i mchog/ smos pa med pa 'don las mgu las kyang // khrul sbyar ga klang mag thub pa 'dral 'dza
10b2(rnying rgyud): pas// bzod pa'i chos ston tshe grang sdug bsngal sol// zhe sdang gnas 'gyur dmyal ba'i thub pa'i mchog/ spros pa med pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang // srul smra ded dpon kha 'bar tshul 'dzin pas// sbyin pa'i chos ston bkres skam sdug bsngal
10b3(rnying rgyud): sel// ser sna gnas 'gyur yi dgas thub pa'i mchog/ thugs rje zhi ba'i dang las ma g.yos kyang // 'jigs byed sku mchog gshin rje gshed du bstan// 'chi bdag gshin rje thabs kyis 'dul mdzad pa// reg pag nas 'gyur gshin rje gshed kyisku//
10b4(rnying rgyud): thugs nyid zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // 'jigs pa'i sku mchog stobs po che ru bstan// rdos bcas phung po'i bdud rnams 'joms mdzad pa// reg bya gnas 'gyur stobs po che ru bstan// thugs mchog zhi ba'i ngad las ma g.yos kyang // 'jig pa
10b5(rnying rgyud): sra mchog rta mchog dpal du bstan// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs bdud dpung rlag par byed// rag byed gnas 'gyur rta mchog rol pa'i sku// thugs dam zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // 'jigs pa'i spra mchog bdud rtsi 'khyil par bstan// lce bdung
10b6(rnying rgyud): chen po'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa// reg byag nas 'gyur bdud ni 'khyil pa'i sku// mtshan ma med pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // mtshan ma'i sku mchog snying rje'i tshul 'dzin ma// 'khor ba'i sems can bla med gnas su 'dren mdzad pa// rtag
10b7(rnying rgyud): pa gnas 'gyur lha mo rta gdong lcags kyu ma yi sku// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // mtshan ma'i sku mchog byams pa'i tshul 'dzin pas// 'khor ba'i bag chags pa lus 'ching bar mdzad// chad pa gnas 'gyur lha mo bag gsong ma
11a1(rnying rgyud): latha// mtshan ma med pa'adabying sa las ma g.yas kyang // margyan pa' sumachog dga' bar rgyab 'das// zag pa ma dga' las rnams 'dams ma da ba// bdag 'dun bsug nas 'thur na ma
11a2(rnying rgyud): kye tha// mtshan ma med pa'i dacing sa las ma g.yos kyang // mtshan ma'i sgra mchog btang snyoms tshul 'dzin cing // gsang snyan padi ga sheg sad dgyes pa bskyed mdzad de// mtshan mang 'dzin pa granas 'gyur nyam thal byed ma paH/
11a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs sa// rdo rje phrang pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ lha rnams kyi yon tan dang byung khungs dang ngom gzhi bstan pa ja la chu ste bzhi pa sa// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos 'dis ces gsol to// e mgasang ba mchags
11a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas yang skye dngam pa'i bdag// bdag shegs can gyi stegs dang cag turnams// dran ma rnyen khyod kyis ba nang drug seM // nas gsal bas rtags sun de/ sngags dang drug tu rnam par thos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga ngangan la snyams par
11a5(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di zhid ces gsungs so// skyeng na rnaM man rgyal gyi/ med kyis pa // rab tu badzad pa stong po'i mchog/ bskul ba pyod rnams cad phyag rgya ste// khyod yul kun tu dam
11a6(rnying rgyud): yin// zhes gsungs so// de ltar rtogs na 'di me dgos// matogs pa la 'di dag sa pas// b+hag d+ha bca' dang byung brje// drang ba don du 'di na gsungs// dzo lan rgyal khyod nyid rjes// bsngags pa'i sngags na 'di nan//
11a7(rnying rgyud): ga hUM/ sems dpa'i skyil mo thang 'dun naso// lag ga tshan yang bang mnyam gzhig ste// gams gardo rdzas gan na/ 'dzin pa'i yin pa ban// dgas dang thug tu 'ang masan// sangs rgyas zugs chen pa nga /
11b1(rnying rgyud): 'dar zhing skrag gyur na// bdud rnams tshar gcod smos ci dgos// gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyis// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// oM dzo na dzi ka oM/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba la//
11b2(rnying rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis// bzung ba'i rtse la 'khor lo 'bar// 'khor los skur rgyal phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// rab tu dgyes shing mnyes par 'gyur// byang chub mchog tu gdon mi
11b3(rnying rgyud): za// gzhan yang rin chen 'dzin nyid kyi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// sA rat+na d+h+r-i ka sA/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug nas// g.yon pa rin chen 'dzin pa'i sku// g.yas pa rin chen mchog sbyin mdzad// rin chen 'dzin pa'i phyag
11b4(rnying rgyud): rgya ste// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bde ba'i mchog rnams sbyin byed pas// 'gengs dka' ba yang 'gengs par byed// bkren las phyug por ji zhig spos// gzhan yang pad+ma 'chang ba yi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no//
11b5(rnying rgyud): A ro li ka AM/ phyag rgya gong ma de nyid las// lag gnyis rtse bsnol pharang du gzhag// ting 'dzin phyag rgya pad+ma'i rten// pad+ma 'chang ba'i phyag rgya ste// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang // dbang du 'jur te the tshom
11b6(rnying rgyud): med// khams gsum skye bo spos ci dgos// gzhan yang sna tshogs 'chang ba yi// gsang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin no// ha prak+Sho dzAM ka hA/ phyag rgya gong ma de nyid las// rgya gram gdengs pa'i tshul byas te// mi 'jigs sbyin par byed pa ni//
11b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'tshang ba'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// mr-id+tha tI shwa rI/ thal mo khang stong ldang ba las// mdzub gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te// mthe bor sen na mig na tshul/
12a1(rnying rgyud): mo'i rtsel dril bu 'bar// rdo rje dbyings phyag phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa dang // shi ba sos par gdon mi za//
12a2(rnying rgyud): lag pa thal mo khong stong sbyar// spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag bya ste// thal mo'i rtsel 'khor dril 'bar// nam mkha'i dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// drag po gtum po lhan ner 'gyur// zhi ba'i las la the tshom med/
12a3(rnying rgyud): mo ha ra tI/ lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa las// gung gnyis bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par// mdzub gnyis bkug pa rdo rje'i tshul// rtsel rin chen dril bu 'bar// rin chen dbyings phyag phyag rgya ste// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// srung ba'i las
12a4(rnying rgyud): byed pa ste// 'di yis bsrang bar byas na ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi tshugs so// b+hai rA ga ra tI/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las// pad+ma kha phye'i tshul byas te// dkyil nas pad+ma'i dril bus mdzes// pad+ma dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya
12a5(rnying rgyud): 'di yis ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// mos spyod chen po thob par 'gyur// tAM badz+ra rA tI/ thal mo khong stong sbyar ba las// mdzub mo bkug pa'i sen mo yis// sor mo gung mo'i rtse mo mnan// rtsel rgya gram dril bu 'bar// las
12a6(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings phyug phyag rgya ste// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kun// dbang du 'gyur bar the tshom med// k+ShiM hi rA dzA ya hU~M/ thal mo khong stong sbyar ba las// gung gnyis bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum pa/
12a7(rnying rgyud): mthe bong mdzub mo sen mo bsnol// srin lag mthe'u chung nang du bcug/ rin chen myu gu'i tshul byas te// sa yi snying po'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// zhi ba'i las la the tshom med// traM A gar+b+hA ya/ lag pa g.yon pa'i
12b1(rnying rgyud): su tu na rgyu tshu na tu sa du
12b2(rnying rgyud): su
12b3(rnying rgyud): sa
12b4(rnying rgyud): na
12b5(rnying rgyud): ma kyi na
13a1(rnying rgyud): klu shang yal gargyas pa'i tshal// 'jam dang lnga gzhon nu'i phyag rgya yin// thugs dang phyag rgya 'du yis ni// dag bar ma tog sman par mdzod// A badz+ra wA s+yA s+thA ma ya t+ma/ dang batshur gnyis bcangs te// mthang na
13a2(rnying rgyud): drang du gyen du bsgreng // sen mo me long tshul du bya// lA s+ya ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rig pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings lags la// oM rat+na mA le sa ma ya ho/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis brkyang nas// mdzub gnyis baspang
13a3(rnying rgyud): ba g.yas g.yon dgye// smin mtshams phreng ba 'dren pa'i tshul// mA le ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// mi brjed pa yi gzungs kyang 'thob// thA gai N+Di rA go&haM/ g.yon brkyang mthe bong srin lag mnan te pi wang 'jan//
13a4(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi srin mtheb gnyis kyis brdeb pa'i tshul// pad+ma gi ti'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// 'gro rnams kun la chos kyi sbyin pa 'gyed// AM ni rti rA ga yA mi/ g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// rdo rje rol pa chen po
13a5(rnying rgyud): yis// dgyes pa chen po gar gyi tshul// las kyi ni ti'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// bde gshegs kun dgyes spyan yang mnyes// oM badz+ra rU pe d+hu/ rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba las// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi srin mtheb
13a6(rnying rgyud): gyis// spos khang yu ba 'dzin pa'i tshul// badz+ra rU po'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// snying rje'i don mthun 'gro don byed par 'gyur// oM rat+na pu Sh+pe pu/ rdo rje thal mo phyir bkyed de// mtheb gnyis so sor 'khyud byas te// me
13a7(rnying rgyud): ga'athor ba'i tshul byas pa// badz+ra puSh+pe'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// byams pa'i mchod sbyin thob par 'gyur// oM pad+ma A lo kiSh+T+r-iH/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mtheb gnyis bsgreng ba mar me'i tshul/
13b1(rnying rgyud): A lo ke yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dga' ba'i mchog gi don spyod 'gyur// oM badz+ra gan+d+he gan/ lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo dgye// mtheb kyis mdzub mnan dung phor dbyibs// g.yas kyi sbom po dbang pos
13b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshul// dri chab ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// btang snyoms don gyi sgra snyan spogs par 'gyur// hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra tsit+ta sa ma ya b+h+rUM/ rdo rje thal mo nang du bsnol// phrin lag gnyis bsgreng rtse mo ho// mtho bod dam
13b3(rnying rgyud): chung gung mos 'khyud// rdo rje rtse lnga'i tshul du bshad// kun bzang bdag nyid yab kyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// dngos po kun gcod ye shes ngang du mkhyen par mdzod// a a a badz+rI b+ha dra sa man+ta A/ sor mo drang brkyang lag
13b4(rnying rgyud): dgye// gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo bsgreng // dril bu 'dzin pa'i tshul byas pa// kun bzang bdag nyid mo yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// mtshan ma kun gcod chos kyi mtshan nyid gsal bar byed// oM mu ne kr-i lA hA/ g.yas
13b5(rnying rgyud): g.yon sor mo drang brkyang ste// srin mtheb pi wang brdeb pa'i tshul// lha dbang brgya byin phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// le lo brtson 'grus sa la 'khod// oM mu ne hU~M druM swA hA/ rdo rje sor mo phan tshun bsnol// mtheb gnyis
13b6(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo'i tshig la sbrel// rdo rje go cha'i tshul byas pa// thags bzang ris kyi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// gang la bsrungs na mtshon mi tshugs// oM mu ne suM swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo rting bsnol nas// mthe ba gnyis dkyil ban
13b7(rnying rgyud): srog shing la// sor mo gseg shang bum pa'i tshul// shAkya thub pa'i phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sdig pa kun spyod dge tshogs 'phel bar mdzad// mA~M mu ne pr-i swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo dam bsnol nas// gung mo srin lag 'argya
14a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs ma padams s+ho// ga rgyug // sa smraso// / rtag sa mangs gyu// sa/ // mas na
14a2(rnying rgyud): ma sa sa / sa pa da / // thang ga /
14a3(rnying rgyud): dubs na// ga gamams pa/ smya pas/ rjen du rnags// na mags nag mas nag sa
14a4(rnying rgyud): 'di sa ni// dung tshogs blan du ltung na/ gas ni 'i pa'iso ga mazhin ca na kyi byis/ na chu'i du byas pa//
14a5(rnying rgyud): hrI/ sngags pa zag tu na/ nga ma pa'i ma 'o/ byung ngas// nang gA rlung nga// nan tha gas du rnas
14a6(rnying rgyud): rigasanasan/ dadu/ nasan mam da/ ma tha sa
14a7(rnying rgyud): nga du da// rtsig ma gyis par tshal// 'ang rtse 'dzi 'de'i phyog tu ni// dreg se de rtsog rje ridangaso // 'arje tsotshogs rams / chu ba druT/ la rgya chu ba tung/ ma tha
14b1(rnying rgyud): mdud// mdzub gnyis rtse bkug sngags kyu'i chu// rta gdong ma yi phyag rgya yin// ljags dang phrag rgya 'di yis ni// bde gshegs spyan 'dren snying rjes 'gro don mdzad// rat+na d+ha ra mahA kro tA dz+dza lani b+h+yo phaT/ gong gi phyag rgya de nyid las// mdzub
14b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis rtse spang zhags pa'i tshul// phag gdod ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas bzhugs snga gsol ba dang // byams pas sbyin pa chen po mdzod// badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwad+d+hi dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khu tshung gnyis bcings
14b3(rnying rgyud): mtheb mo mdzub mo lca gu rgyud// lcags srog tshul du byas pa ni// sbrul gdod ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rgyal ba brten mdzad kun kyang dga' bar mdzad// karma ta ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dzA la ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje thal mo phan tshud
14b4(rnying rgyud): bsnol// gung mo rtse sprad bsgreng byas te// rtse mo dril bu 'dzin pa'i tshul// seng gdong ma yi phyag rgya yin// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes mdzad 'gro don kun la snyoms// zhes rgyal ba rnams kyi sngags dang phyag
14b5(rnying rgyud): rgya'i ngo bo dang / yon tan rnam par bshad do// rdo rje phu ba gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sngags dang phyag rgya rnam par spros pa'i lde'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye mdzo bde
14b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas yab gyir dam pa'i bdag/ bdag la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la// dbang bskyar byin rlabs tshul bzhin mdzod// ces bskul ba mkhyen te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod de/ 'khor gyi
14b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor de dag dang gzhal yas khang nyid kyi thugs kar bsdub mdzad de/ rgyun lam dang gshegs shul nas yum gyi b+ha ga'i bstim gnas su 'khyil pa las/ thams cad lhag pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen por gnas par mdzad do// de nas hUM hUM ma
15a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa 'o// zhus pa'i sla brjod ci/ yub mas tad kyang rgyags pargyan tha cos nyid byang chub mas su gnas pa las/ 'phrul ba sla hU~M spyugs bsgrags nas/ smon pa snang ba'i gsang rtags kyis bti rdzag sa
15a2(rnying rgyud): srags la bar mdzad do// yang cho 'phrul gyi slar badz+ra ston g+ha N+Da zhes brjod pas/ mtshan ma med pa'i thugs rtags rdo rje dang dril phra gnyis sra gsal bar mdzad do// de nas yid tshe 'phrul swar hU~M hU~M d+ha badz+dza Sh+kaM/ a ya a d+yarba ta dra sa ma d+ha ya/
15a3(rnying rgyud): brjod de/ rang bzhin med pa'i yab yum gyi slar gsal ba mdzad do// de nas yang / rjes sgra chags pa bskyed pa'i phyi ni/ rdo rje dang bad+ha rgyas par mdzud pa'i tshe 'phrul gyi sgra 'di brjod de// nA~M dr-i dza~M a a~M hU~M Ta/ e a A sa ma ya / sa
15a4(rnying rgyud): a nu rA ga yA mi/ a nu rA gA ya ho// de nas yang gsang ba'i byang chub sems las/ 'khor dkyil 'khor yum gyi mkha' la gsal bar mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di brjod do// ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta maN+Da la hU~M hUM/ de nas yang b+ha ga gsang pa'i dkyil
15a5(rnying rgyud): 'khong / gyi'i dkyil 'khor d+ha rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di cho 'phrul gyi slar brjod pa// hU~M s+pha ra Na baTadzaHzhes brjod de/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de rgyas par mdzad do// de nas yang sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer byin gyis tshangs pa'i snying po 'dra
15a6(rnying rgyud): rdzong thul gyi tha brjo ga// sau mya u drug tA ma hAk+Sha pra bad+hA sa A nu / masas ta ga tu brjes t+pal 'a / yid mya stan ta ga tam na/ 'dza pa thAs 'o kyai/ de nas yid 'khor rnams la rigs la
15a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes sras dbang ba skur ba'i sbyong po 'a tse 'phrul gyi sgor brjod de/ A ma hA kun+da tA dz+nyAn badz+re swa twA dz+ra hrIn \u0f7f/ oM mahA A na tan sma / ma (Nadz+nyAn badz+ra pra drA wag DA haM// ma~M ma hA sa ma tA trAn ba
15b1(rnying rgyud): na rnadran rnan brdas b+hAl a trag NAn/ zhes gsungs te/ byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bsrung bas/ 'khod rnams 'dra ba 'don la thogs pa mang par byed rlabs dang yang ldan/ dbang yang thob nas/ thug du /
15b2(rnying rgyud): na pos 'gro ba'i don mdza'i ladag per gnas so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
15b3(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// e ma ho rnam par dag pa'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgra yi mchog/ sna tshogs las byung khyod la 'dung // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog/ rnam dag sgra chen khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po/
15b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes gtso mchog khyed la 'dud// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba'i// sangs rgyas 'khor lo khyod la 'dud// yid bzhin re ba kun skong ba'i// nor bu 'dzin pa khyod la 'dud// 'dam skyes pang ltar spu 'khrungs pa'i// pad+ma 'chang bakhod la
15b5(rnying rgyud): 'dud// 'gro ba tha dang 'dul ba'i bye brag can// sna tshogs 'chang ba khyod la 'dud// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul ba la// sku gsung thugs kyis skul pa yis// thugs dzas 'gro ba'i don mdzad rigs// zhes
15b6(rnying rgyud): gsol bas// bcom ldan 'das kyi bskul pa thugs sA rgyud de/ la lAr glu yis don mdzad pa// 'gro rnams kun la sdig spong gzugs// srul spus so sor 'dul ba ni// dmyal ba rnams la gshin rjes 'dul// sgrib pa rnams la kha 'bar
15b7(rnying rgyud): gzugs// dud 'gro rnams la seng ge'i gzugs// mi rnams kun la 'jig rten du// 'khor los sbyar rgyal lta bu'i gzugs// lha min rnams pa thags bzang ris// lha rnams la ni brgya byin gzugs// tshangs ris rnams la lha chen gzung//
16a1(rnying rgyud): chags bral rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i rgyal// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// su ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba las// mthun byas swa ni rtswa tshogs 'dus//
16a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs ni// la lar sde snod gsum dag tu// bsdus nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar gsung rab bcu gnyis su// la lar stong phrag brgyad cu bzhi// la lar brgyad khri bzhi stong du// gti mu
16a3(rnying rgyud): mdongs pa'i 'gro gang la// sangs rgyas 'khor los 'khor lo bskor// zhe sdang can la rdo rje 'dzin// nga rgyal can la rin po che// 'dod chags can la pad+ma 'chang // phrag dog spyod pa'i las goms par// sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo bskor// 'gro
16a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i skad rnams ji tsam par// de snyed sgra skad sna tshogs ston// la lar lhums na gnas pa'i tshul// la lar lhums nas gshegs par ston// la lar khyim pa lta bu'i tshul// la lar khab nas rab tu byung // la lar dka' thub dka' ba spyod//
16a5(rnying rgyud): la lar byang chub mchog sems bskyed// la lar bdud bzhi 'dul bar ston// la lar rdo rje gdan la gshegs// la lar byang chub shing dbang drung // la las bskul ba'i sA lus bzhengs// la lar rnam pa bcu gnyis su// lan gsum dag tu
16a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bskor// la lar cho 'phrul chen po ston// la lar mya ngan 'das tshul ston// la lar sku gdung ring bsrel ston// la lang chos kyi glegs bam ston// la las phyi rol 'byung ba'i las// chos dang mthun pa'i sgra skad 'byung // la lar
16a7(rnying rgyud): mu stegs lta bu'i tshul// la lar 'jig rten bsam gtan tshul// la pa sa bcu rim gyis 'byung // la lar spyan lnga rnam par dag/ la lar mngon shes pha rol phyin// la lar khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// la lar 'jig rten myong ba'i tshul/
16b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin// byin rlabs cho 'phrul ji ltar ston// zhes sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa las/ 'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mgrin gcig tu 'di skad
16b2(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// e ma hogs rab mchog gi bdag/ ngo mtshar 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// e ma ho gsang sngags ngo mtshar che// e ma ho ston pa'i cho 'phrul che// e ma ho ngo mtshar cho 'phrul che// e ma ho sngags kyis mi 'bul med// 'di ci ya
16b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan ngo mtshar ro// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu tshur gshegs shig/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di nyid la// su zhig mos pa'i skyes bu des// mi bya ba ni gcig kyang med// mi bsgrub pa ni gcig kyang med//
16b4(rnying rgyud): rtag tu gsod la brtson pa dang // ma byin blang dang mi chongs spod// rdzun dang phra ma dag rtsub dang // zas sru sha dang bshang gci dang // rnag khrag dron mo 'byung ba dang // ngan zos ngan spyad thams cad kyis// gsang ba 'di nyid 'grub par 'gyur// pha dang
16b5(rnying rgyud): mes po dang // bu dang spun dang mdza' bo rnams// zhe sdang sems kyis gsang byas na// rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du 'khrungs// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // gdol pa mo dang phyal ba mo// 'dod pa'i sems kyis sbyar na ni// pad+ma'i rigs sa skye bar nges
16b6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag skrag spangs te brgyal bar gyur to// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pa'i bdag nyid rtog pa dang bcas pa
16b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ slar gsos te rtogs pa spel du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar mkhyen te/ de nas byang chub sems de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer
17a1(rnying rgyud): zhing 'khyil ba de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstims te/ byin gyis brlab pa mdzad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag slar dran pa rtad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mig ma 'dzum par bltas
17a2(rnying rgyud): 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi tha rnams rang rang gi 'du shes ngan pa thong zhig/ byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid// nam mkha' pa yang mtshan
17a3(rnying rgyud): nyid med// de nyid 'jig rten sna tshogs te// phyag rgya'i tshogs chen de nyid do// chos rnams sgyu mar dbang bsgyur bas// de la dngos po ga la yod// ci spyad ci bsgoms ci bsgrubs kyang // de la dngos po yod mi 'gyur// byang chub nyid de ltung
17a4(rnying rgyud): gnas med// dmyal ba'i gnas nyid bla med gnas// sdug bsngal nyid na byang chub sems// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// sgrib pa nyid na mngon sangs rgyas// byang chub stod sgo ji snyed pa// de snyed 'bras bu ba de la 'khod// nges don de la 'dus
17a5(rnying rgyud): par byos// zhes gsungs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i de dag som nyi dang bral nas/ rang rang gi de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas 'khod do// de tshe 'gro drug sems can rnams// las kyi stobs kyis dbang bsgyur yang // log lha'i mthus bsnyems
17a6(rnying rgyud): ma dad pa// ji snyed gnas pa thams cad kun// sangs rgyas bstan la dad par gyur// rdo rje phur ba gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la ma dad pa'i chu 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul
17a7(rnying rgyud): pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e me ho gsang ba mchog gi bdag/ byang chub spyod pa'i lam mchog la// 'gro ba ji snyed dad pa las// las kyi log lha ma dad pa'i// rgyu dang rkyen ni ji ltar lags// ma dad pa ni rtse
17b1(rnying rgyud): phyir// rigs dang sngon gang du gtogs// 'bras bu blun pararda sngar lags// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dka thub can gyi sems cad // legs pa'i rna las mabyungs// ma pa gzung 'dzin tog na d+ha
17b2(rnying rgyud): ni chags sngab khyod la zhen// lta ba log pa nyon mongs lnga// de yi las kyi dbang btsun pas// 'bras bu ma dad rgyu ru srin// rigs ni 'khor ba'i rigs chen te// sde ni gdol pa'i 'byung por gtogs// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pa
17b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// log pa'i sems can chen po de// ci yi thabs kyis dad par 'gyur// ma dad des na ji ltar gdul// btul na yon tan ji ltar 'thob// ma btul ma dad skyon ni ci// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das
17b4(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ log lha'i mthus bsnyems sems can de// bden pa'i gzhung gis gdul bar bya// ma btul ba yi skyon bstan na// phyin ci log tu chos spyod nas// lha dang mi yi srid brlag ste// kha lo log par bsgyur nas kyang // sangs
17b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas dman rigs su lus la// sems can kha lo log par bsgyur nas kyang // don lam dang skyon yod do// btul na yon tan dpago med de// dus gsum rtsad gcod 'khor dngos spug/ 'khor ba chos nyid chen por 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing khams
17b6(rnying rgyud): rab tu rgyas// btul bas don la dad par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad ces bskul lo// e ma ho bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// ma dad pa yi sems can chen po de// las la bab pa'i thugs
17b7(rnying rgyud): yis// / bde ba chen po'i gzhung bkon nas// bde chen sa la dgod du gsol// zhes bskul pas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen nas/ sprul pa'i thugs kyi cho 'phrul mdzad de/ ye shes kyi sprin mgo ni dbyar gyi char sprin bzhin gti pas
18a1(rnying rgyud): chos nyid drod chen po na nam mkha'i rlan bzhin du g.yos te/ sprul pa'i sgra char gyi rgyun bzhin du babs pa ni/ dpe byad kyi su la mtshan gyi me tog chags par mdzad/ gsung chags pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis chos tu bya
18a2(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs bsgrags nas/ bden pa'i gzhung gis 'dul bar gzas na/ rU tra nag po ngas se gol lan gcig brdabs nas mi 'dul mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis te/ go'u ta ma khyod kyis bdag 'dul ba ma lags sam/ khyod rang rang gi gnas su dka'
18a3(rnying rgyud): kyi bde ba la gnos shing // ces zer te mnyan to// rdo rje phur pa'i gsang ba'i rkad chen po las/ bde ba chen po'i gzhung gis ma dad pa gdul bar gzas pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dzin pas 'di skad ces bskul ba mdzad de/
18a4(rnying rgyud): kye ma'o sangs rgyas mang po'i tshogs// sdud ngo kun tu rab tu 'dir// sred pa'i log pa gdug pa can// 'khor ba'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs// sdug bsngal chen po ye dwags te// las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir byung // drag po rang gi dka' thub kyis//
18a5(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum gyi bdag por smin// drag po dU tra'i gdug dpal gyis// 'gro rnams thal rlog 'jigs byed 'di// gdul bar bya ba'i 'os mchog ste// snying rje'i bdag po kun 'dus la// sdug bsngal lam gyi rgyun bcad de// bde chen sa la gzhag
18a6(rnying rgyud): par rigs// zhes gsol te// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis/ bsgral ba'i don de zhugs su chud de/ zhi ba dang bden pas me 'dul bar dgongs nas/ 'gro ba dang tshul bkun te gdan tshigs chen po bcas te/ 'di skad dag gi batho ba mdzad de/
18a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das zhe spung chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa/ kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen po ga/ 'das pa'i ngas nas sngon sbyang sbyar// dalta dus 'di thung bskye// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab mas// bdag nyid chen ba rtag pa yis/
18b1(rnying rgyud): bu'i rtsal bya ldan byung ba// da rdzasams can thams cad na// gnas 'a dag gsum pa yis// na dang 'bad bar ltung bar 'gyur// ma bzad can pas skrag pardalaH// drug gsums la mngon zhen pa'o// rngas pa ma thabs kyis gdus// zhes brdung
18b2(rnying rgyud): so// bcom ldan 'das gti mug chen po'i chags kyis bzos pa/ shin tu gtum pa'i sems can de// ji ltar de dag bzhag gyur na// bag chags ngan pa'i gya rlan gyis// bdud kyi tshogs su mngon 'phel nas// rig 'dzin pa yi rgyud gcod cing /
18b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig 'gyur bas// da tshe las kyi mun pa yis// 'grob ma rig mun par 'khyams// drug nad rims nad phra mAn sa// gnod sbyin gdon dang log 'dren nyid// srid pa gsum po 'jams byed cing // dam chog gtan po 'dral rtsed
18b4(rnying rgyud): pa// ji lta ba yi thabs kyis gdul// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das nga rgyal chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// las kyi gdug pa'i DU tra de// rgyal ba 'dus pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar khro bdag gtum pa
18b5(rnying rgyud): ltar// da ltar tshe 'dir byung ba ste// dug gsum brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di// 'bar khro 'khrugs pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du 'os// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas kyang // khros pa'i sprin nag gtibs pa yis// mngon spyod
18b6(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i zabs chen gyis// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i dus la bab// ces bgros so// bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po'i tshogs kyis bzos pa/ shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las//
18b7(rnying rgyud): por de bzhin gshegs kun bya// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus blos ci dgos// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das phrag dog chen po
19a1(rnying rgyud): chags kyis 'akrus pa ni// rang bzhin dag pa'i bo las// mag tog phyin ci lagags bcings// dadas par rang ga ldan pa las// gnal dka' ma sus 'dus pa dang // dam chog la snang dam stong byed// drar mo par rgya
19a2(rnying rgyud): rgyar mdzod// ces bgros so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i spyang chen po las/ zhi bas mi 'dul bar dgongs nas/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bka'i mal ba mdzad pa'i lertsa ste dgu pa'o// / de ltar bgros pas rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa
19a3(rnying rgyud): de dag dgongs pa gcig tu gyur te/ log pa'i spong pa can dngos po'i lam la mngon par 'chel ba/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi mthus bsnyems nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pas/ 'jig rten bung bar byed pa rnams/ zhi bas phan par byed
19a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i skal ba la ma bab ste/ rol pa'i mdzad spyod kyis gdul bar gzigs te/ thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis hU~M d+ha~M zhes brjod pas/ rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad gan
19a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad nyid kyi thugs kar bsdu ba mdzad de/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang du mi snang bar mdzad nas/ chos nyid de bzhin nyid la dmigs te gnas so// rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje chen po des/
19a6(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings de kho na nyid las zlos pas/ nyon mongs pa zhe sdang la sogs pa dang gis mi gnas pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / don de nyid kun la khyab cing gsal ba'i kun tu ldang gi ting nge 'dzin/ nyisnying rje chen po dang gsal ba nyid du gan la khyab pa 'i/
19a7(rnying rgyud): mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bral mngon par 'du mdzad de/ rnam mkha' mtshan ma med pa la sa/ mtshan ma'i rgyu'i snying po la gr-i ts+tsha ldan pa// ye shes can gyi dza du 'bar ba sharaH/ des rnam par michog pa'i ye shes dang du mtshon cing 'dzin rtog
19b1(rnying rgyud): nan pa'i dngangos // bgag ga togs pa 'dzud pas/ rjod kyi 'jig rten gzhal las khang drag bar mdad pa'i phyir/ rtog pa la gnas pa dzud la / ma 'phral gyi mar meng pa'ang dmas ca dzang// sa mtha da
19b2(rnying rgyud): yaM kArba ra naH/ rangakas man dz+wal baN+Dal/ sra badz+ras me tsa/ ked ni re ti ga / ra dz+wal baM zhes bsngags pas zhe sdang 'bar ba'i dam mkha' la// zag rig 'bar ba'i 'chubs mar ldan// chags pa rab 'ang srong 'chil// gti zug tsa
19b3(rnying rgyud): gzhil// dpral chen po'i me de 'bad// zhes pa ste/ dbang can yum lnga'i nam mkha' dbor shes par mdzad pa ni/ 'byung bsum gyi gzhal las/ khang mngon par shar bar mdzadag// de las yang b+hA ba~M shra bi thAn+te d+hi zhes pas/ ye shes lnga ldan
19b4(rnying rgyud): la yi brtsig pa la// kyai dang nang med bun tu snang bar mdzes pa la// rta babs la sags rin chen rgyan dang rgyan gyis brtsan pa yi// 'dod yon lnga dang ma jam 'chags sra bcas// zhes pas/ rin chen 'bang ba'i gzhal yas khang mngon par shar bang
19b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad do// hU~M b+har+d+hadz+nyA na brda rje/ zhes pas/ b+han+ta sa madron mang po'i brtsig pa la// gnam ljags drar mo 'bar ba'i gzer chen btAb// gzungs su 'dzin pa'i chu phreng chen po dang // kha nas me 'bar snga nas dung 'jal na// maM sa sa gzhar
19b6(rnying rgyud): na hU~M de na 'du rtsi'i baman chag cag dade// nis dung rgyaster rtsal bar 'khyil// m-i 'gyur bdab pa'i ga gdan la// zhing can gas stanan ka na ga/ mchag can gdung zas mtsha rdzun papapam nyid 'dral banod nas// 'a
19b7(rnying rgyud): na ma sa mdzan stod pag srid mang ma ma yi dag/ thags tshugs nga mang kyang can ngas// nga rjo kyarnams cas pa'i tha ga dang// yangs dang na rabangs la ba
20a1(rnying rgyud): nas 'char/ rnam thar man pal zham skra bzhan// bdud las rnam par rgyal bar rgyal mtshan 'jugs// gas pas ma dang pa da dang tshul bkun pa gyur na/ d+har wad 'bar ba gzhal pas khang du shar bar mdzang // nga nas yang a
20a2(rnying rgyud): yar dz+wa la raM zhes pas/ gru gsum mthing nag drag po ste// zlag mdamar po dbang gi tshul// mu khrud zlum po zhi ba'i ngang // gru bzhi ser po rgyas pa'o// sdug nag gru gsum 'bar ba lha yi bzhugs gnas te// ye shes 'bar ba'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'bru/
20a3(rnying rgyud): ni yid bzhin rin rgyan te// nang ni dur thod 'bar 'a'o// zhes pas gdan tshogs dang 'jigs kyad 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du shar bar mdzad do// de nas yang tshim pa sud+ya tsanA pad+mA maN+Da la gas pas/ rtag paTI la rtsis gnon pa'i ti mdang // chad pa zi la
20a4(rnying rgyud): mnan pa'i zla ba dang // rtag chad skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma ste// zil gnon gdan du mngon par shar bar mdzad do// de las D+haM sa ma ya tiSh+Tha badz+ra hU~M zhes pas/ cho 'phrul gyi sku bsgrags shing / gdan gyi ge sa ral b+hu yi hU~M nyid shar te/ bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad
20a5(rnying rgyud): ge hUM du shar bar mdzad do// hU~M de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi ga du rtogs par mdzad do/ badz+ra dz+nyA na badz+ra ai zhes pas/ ye shes kyi rje bu 'i stob la rdzogs mtshan pa gcig tu mngon par 'du mdzad do// de'i tshe 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'ang
20a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos thams cad/ thugs phyag mtshan rdo rjer gnas par gyur to// de las dz+nyA na satwa kA ya ya hU~M zhes pas/ rdo rje de nyid la sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i snying rjes bsgral ba'i sku mngon par 'du mdzad de/ lus yod na gring
20a7(rnying rgyud): mayod pa'i tshul du yum mchog ga phyag rgya yang mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdo rje rnams thams cad du phra mo'i dang du gsal ba las/ A~M badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bi t+pan po hU~M hU~M phaT/ hrI d+ha na tsarba ha na han hU~M phaT/ chos cho 'phrul gyi slab spags te/ phyag
20b1(rnying rgyud): mnas sa sumang par 'a sa/ sams ca gsas sus rdzu sangasu na sa mdzug dngas sa ngasu sa/ dunanan nus gan rgyam/ rna
20b2(rnying rgyud): hr-i ts+tshaH/ bad shA dralan nyam lAka tA r+paNakAn+ta/ de na 'jas rbA la yar+tha taH/ zhes pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'i da / dbul rdzogs pa'i rigs smras bsrung ba dang / dbang bsgreng bar mdzad// yab n+d+re pa
20b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra sa b+hA wa At+ma ko&hraM/ zhes pas/ dus gsum gyi chos ma lus pa'ong bo// sgra gsung thugs rdo rjes byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do// hU~M hU~M hUM a mr-i ta su ti pri du kI la ya hUM thung zhes pas/ srid pa gsum gyis bsdus pa'i sems can gyi nga ga// byang chu
20b4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i rang bzhin rnams/ bka' nan gyi tshul gyis sku la brgyan par mdzad do// de'i tshe na zug pa med pa'i sku rdo rjes gtam par mdzad do// de nas yang dz+nyA na satwa kI la ye hU~M zhes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sems dpa'i ngo bo dang /
20b5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kA li kI la ya sarba bi g+h+nAn bi hU~M hU~M phaT/ ces pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po daraM/ sngags kyi ngo bo dang / A~M hU~M hri phaT ces pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngag pa sgo srung dbang gi rgyal po dang / dz+nyA na badz+ra A~M hU~M phaT/
20b6(rnying rgyud): e a A~M zhes pas ye shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkha' dang / gsang ba'i ngo bo mngon par 'du mdzad de/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo dang de'i rtsen dang / de'i rtags 'byung khungs dang / de'i gnas bsrung ba ste/ thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du dgodase
20b7(rnying rgyud): mkhyen to// ma dad pa'i sems can chen po de dang tshul mthun pa'i phyir na/ zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing nag/ rol pa chen po'i phyag drug dang // brjod pa'i der thabs zhabs bzhi dang // spu yi bem ldir che ba dang // gsung gi tshem
21a1(rnying rgyud): rngams bsgrags pa dang // thugs kyi dgongs pa zan pa dang // dpa' zhing shin tu brjid pa'i cha byad do// nga nas drags pa chen po ngas/ srog bcad pa'i khrag rjes yod bde dag gis thugs cha chags pa'i rtags su sbal brgyan no// phal
21a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshe mtsho ma yod pa de dag gis mtshan ma spros pa med pa'i don gyis nyid la brgyan no// zhag dang bcud kyi khyal khyel ni/ don dam bcud kyi rang bzhin gyis khros pa'i sku la byugs so// dka' thub can gyi sems can de'i bgo ba'i bye brag la/ mun pa glang
21a3(rnying rgyud): gi ko shun ni stobs bcu rdzogs pa'i na bzar su la gsol/ chags pa'i zhing chen ni/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i chos gos su man pa/ zhe sdang rdzongs la zhen pa'i stag lpags ni/ dpa' gtum gyis 'gro ba'i don la thabs mkhas pa'i sham thabs su
21a4(rnying rgyud): brgyan no// yang nga rgyal gyi drad 'bar ba ni// ye shes me yi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba dang // 'phro ba 'du ba sreg pa dang // klong ba 'khyil pa mi bzang ste// nyid kyi sbal gnas par mdzad// gdug pa can rtag chad kyi mtha' la mngon par zhen pa de/
21a5(rnying rgyud): zil gyis gnon cing spa bkong ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams khengs pa yang khros pa nyid la rgyan mdzes par mdzad do// thod pa skam rlon gyi phreng thod de dag ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsum gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs
21a6(rnying rgyud): kyis khros pa nyid kyi rgyan du byas so// gdug cing zhe sdang ba'i skul bkris la sogs pa de dag ni/ mnyen lcegayum bzhi'i gzungs su byin gyis brlabs te/ phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i rtags kyis khros pa nyid la brgyan no//
21a7(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin la zhen pa'i sgra shin tu 'jigs pa de yang / zil gyis mtha' gnyis gnan pa'i phyir/ nyid la 'khyil bar mdzad de/ 'dod pa'i yon tan dang / kho'i longs spyod pa'i bye brag la/ 'dod pa'i rgya mtsho las mthar pa'i phyir na/ kho
21b1(rnying rgyud): gnas 'khor na khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil ba de dag ni/ khros pa'i rgyal pos pad+ma rak+ta las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te gsol to// nyon mongs pa la mngon par 'chel ba'i/ me gtsang ba'i 'dam rdzab de dag ni/ dri chen las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te
21b2(rnying rgyud): gsol lo// zhe sdang gi rdzo la zhen pa'i go ro tsa na dang rkang rus kyi bcud de dag/ byang chub sems las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su sprul te zhal du bzhes so// rnag dang chu ser gyi zham chu 'bab pa de dag ni/ rdo rje dri chu las bdud rtsi sna tshogs su yul te
21b3(rnying rgyud): zhal du bzhes so// bskal ba'i don 'chel ba'i sha dang 'bu shin tu che ba de dag ni/ mAM sa las bdud rtsir sprul te zhal du rol lo// khros pa'i rgyal pos/ dregs pa'i sems can de'i gnas khang dang tshul bstun pa'i gzhal yas ni gsal bar
21b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad/ lus ngag gi rgyan gdos pa dang bcas pa de dag ni/ sku gsung thugs kyi rgyan du don dang bsnun/ zag bcas kyi longs spyod de dag ni/ zag med kyi bdud rtsir mdzad de/ gdug pa de dag dang tshul bstan te/ kho'i gdos pa de dag dang bdu
21b5(rnying rgyud): par bzhed pas/ kho chags sdang la zhen pa'i dbang gis ma dad de/ nga rgyal gyi de'u ma tshogs/ gti mug gi mun pa ma sol/ chags pa'i 'dam las mthar/ zhe sdang gi mnar sems dang ma bral/ phrag dog gi gdug rtsub ma zhi nas/ phan zhing zhe
21b6(rnying rgyud): bar ma gyur to// de tshe stong gsum 'jig rten kun// thugs rje chos kyi char gyis brlan// sman dang 'bru rnams thams cad kun// 'gro ba'i gsos su byin brlabs te/ rtsa ba sdong po ngan pa dang // yal ga lo ma me tog dang // snying po 'bras bu bcas
21b7(rnying rgyud): par smin// 'gro drug sems can thams cad kun// ra sA ya na'i rdzas la spyod pa las// dka' thub can de de nyid bdud kyi lta ba la mngon par dad pas/ chags sdang gi rang bzhin longs spyod par dad pa las/ thams cad 'khor ba bdud dang 'dra ba'i
22a1(rnying rgyud): rnams thugs rje'i rtsi btang bas/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i zas la ral ta spyod pa las/ bregs pa de nyid nges ga/ nga nar dang par ma gyur to// de nas khros pa'i rgyal bangs ma dad pa de'i gzung 'dzin dang rtag chad kyi mtha' bas la
22a2(rnying rgyud): phyir/ brgyad 'i bzhi stong chos kyi khro mo dang / theg pa chos kyi bye brag dang / yan lag bcu gnyis rnam grangs te/ drang ba'i don phyi nges don gsungs pa las/ 'ogro kun dad cing grol ba las/ dka' thub can de nges par ma grol ma dad no// de na
22a3(rnying rgyud): khros pa'i rgyal po des/ nags pa pho mo rnams kyi chags par 'dod pa de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M e a ra li ru lu ru lu sa ma ya dz+ra zhes brjod pas/ dreg pa'i mdang sring mo dang bu mo dang sres mo dang bran mo dang chung ma rnams/ srog gi snying pos ma bzod nas/ rdo rje khros pa'i pha
22a4(rnying rgyud): yud tsam gyis phyin pa las/ gsung ma chags pa'i tshangs pa'i mgur ni bzhes/ zhal bzhad spyan gzigs smin rings 'gyur/ rol pa'i mdzad khyod rnam par stegs pa las/ dregs pa mo rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ma thar nas/ rdo rje chos
22a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku kun gyi thad thad du 'khril ba las/ rdo rje thos pa'i rgyal pos ma chags pa thabs kyi sbyor ba kun la mdzad de/ chags pa'i rgyu'i sa bon de chos nyid byang chub sems kyi 'od zer du spros pa las/ dregs pa mo rnams chags pa'i 'dod chags pa/ mchogatu
22a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag par gyes nas gnas so// de 'i dgyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ ha ha haH/ ha ha haHzhes brjod pa las/ dkar mo dang ni rkun mo dang / gtum ma dang na rmongs mo dang / ro langs ma dang / lham ma dang / zil byed kye sha mtshogs
22a7(rnying rgyud): rnams/ re re la yang tshogs bsam gyis me khya pa dang / rang rang gi cha lcags lag cha stan dang bcas te/ 'bar bar dkyil 'khor du 'khod do// yang dgyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ he he he he he he he he/ zhes brjod pas/ seng ga'ong
22b1(rnying rgyud): gdong stag gdong khyi gdong dang // bya rgod gdang dang dur bya'i gdong // bya rag gdang dang 'ug pa'i gdang // re re la yang tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / cha lugs dang lag cha stan dang bcas te 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'khad do// yang dgyes pa'i
22b2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ phaT phaT phan phaT ces brjod pas/ rta gdong phag gdong seng gdong lal gdong rnams// re re la tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / cha lugs dang lag cha stan dang chas nas 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'khod //
22b3(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa'i sprin las/ dzA dzA dzA dz+dza/ dzA dz+ra dzA dza/ zhes brjod pas/ rdo rje pho nya drug cu'i tshogs rnams gong bzhin no// yang dgyes pa'i sbyin las/ ha ha ru lu trA~M zhes pas/ pho ging dang mo ging rnams kyang gong ma bzhin no// de nas 'dod pa na
22b4(rnying rgyud): ba dang / ma hA rak+Sha kro hI phaTacas pas/ dregs pa mo rnams rang rang gi gnas khang ga la ba der yud tsam gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis phyin par bkye'o// de nas dregs pa chen po des shin tu yang mi dga' ba'i 'du shes skyes nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams na bdag las
22b5(rnying rgyud): khyad par can med na/ bdag gi gnas khang dang cha lcags dang byed spyod dang yo byad rnams byin nyams la// zos pa de ni gzi byin dang ldan/ ma la sogs pa rnams kyang kho'i tshig nyan par gyur to// sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can mang po yang gnas 'khor 'dir
22b6(rnying rgyud): nga / kho bo rang lugs kyi chos la yang khros pa'i rgyal po de bden pa'i gzhung med par ldan/ ji ltar srog snyam pa las/ dregs pa de zhe sdang gi me chen ni war/ chags pa'i rgya mtsho ni gtsang nas g.yos/ mun pa'i gar khung ni char phrin wAr
22b7(rnying rgyud): gtibs/ phrag dog gi zug rngu ni bslang / nga rgyal gyi de'u bskyed de/ nyon mongs pa'i sgra ru ru lu ru lun rdzogs/ gdug pa'i lag cha kha T+wAM ga 'jol zhing spogs par gzob las/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ rag+ha tri gu sa ma ya mu dra'i sba badz+ra
23a1(rnying rgyud): pas/ kha T+wAM ga'i lag cha de nyid phrogs nas/ rgyal byed rtags kyi phyag mtshan du phyag drug g.yon gyi bar par bsdums so// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ zo'i nyon mongs pa'i wA nu lu ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i snyi
23a2(rnying rgyud): hUM gi bar du bcug ste/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ zhes khros pas bzlas pas/ dregs pa de nyid skyes bu gang dag lce bcad pa bzhin du/ lan blan pa'i glags med par shes pa nyams par mdzad do// de nas yang cung zhig na log par rtogs
23a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems can des/ mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yid la byas te/ lus ngag yid gsum shin tu yang khro zhing gtum gdug par sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis mthu ston pa las/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos cho 'phrul sna tsho gla 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag te/
23a4(rnying rgyud): chos kyis ma 'dul ba'i sems can daM/ drag po mngon spyod kyis bsgral bar dgongs nas/ bskal ba'i don de yang sangs rgyas thams cad la dbang mi za ba'i phyir// dbang byin rlabla 'dod pa'i phyir/ oM ta thA ga ta kro d+ha sa mdza zhes pas/ bus
23a5(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams/ chos kyi sgra skye ba med pa las/ gzugs kyi sku 'gag pa med pa'i sku ru bzhengs te gnas so// de la rol pa'i tshig 'dis bskyal lo// blo srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang // dbang dang byin rlabla blang ba'i
23a6(rnying rgyud): phyir// 'gyur med su ru gnas pa de// ye shes khros par gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bskul bas/ bde bar gshegs pa de dag sngon gyi thugs dam gyi dbang gis/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la ti la gang ba bzhin du byon no// de nas ta thA
23a7(rnying rgyud): gtan mo badz+ra zhes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la/ rdo rje'i phyag mngon par mdzad do// de nas yang ta thA gta ma hA di pa d+hU pa puSh+pa su kha gar+b+ha e daM pA dza sa ma ye hUM zhes brjod pas// tshul khrims dri mchog ting 'dzin me tog dang // lhag mdzo
23b1(rnying rgyud): mangs ni gnas rgya rgun dang / bsal mngar ag+ha dag pa lnga'i zhal zas kyis mngon par mchod nga/ 'di skad ces bskal la// ya shes lha mchog gshegs nas kyang // phyag 'tshal mthong ba zhes thugs bskul bas// dbang dang bran rlabs stsal ba dang /
23b2(rnying rgyud): rtags dang mtshan ma bstan du gsol// zhes pas bsngal lo// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bskal ba'i don dbugs su chud nas/ thams cad rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs las snga tshul bzhin du zhugs pas/ shin tu yang byin rlab dang ldan par
23b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad/ de bzhin rigs lnga'i ngo bo thams cad rigs ma 'chol bar thim pas ni/ gru dang ye shes rigs kyi ngo bor dbang bsgyur/ dregs pa de dang tshul bstan pa'i phyir na/ gangs bcas kyi rgan mang pos khros pa'i lha la brgyan pa de dag las don dang ma
23b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan mar bstan te// rab brji dmangal mang bas ma lus snga bkod par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/ oM dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra ces pas/ theg pa dgu dang rab ldan pas// sa dgu'i rtog pa kun bcom ste// he ru dgu yi rang bzhin gyi/
23b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes dgu ldan rtags 'di byin// zhes gsungs te/ las kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa rdo rje khros pa'i phyag g.yas kyi dang por rtags kyi phyag rgya byin no// yang oM dz+nyA na pany+tsa badz+ra/ ye shes lnga dang rab ldan pas// mchod rten rtags kyi rdo rje 'dis// dug lnga
23b6(rnying rgyud): 'joms pas gnas lnga stongs// dam skong rigs snyems ye shes lnga yi rtags// zhes gsungs te/ mchod pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa ni/ rdo rje khros pa'i phyag g.yas kyi bar bar bskur te/ dregs pa de dag 'dul bar dbang bskur ro// de nas yang de bzhin
23b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa de dag la/ rdo rje khros pas 'di skad ces bskul lo// e ma ho log pa'i lam gyis mnar ba las// thabs kyis 'dul bar ma gyur te// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// ye shes khros pas 'dul bar 'gyur// de bas mngon par 'du
24a1(rnying rgyud): mdzad rigs// zhes bskul bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ bskyal bar mkhyen te/ nyid kyi ye shes rigs kyi khro bor sprul te/ khros pa'i sprin phung du bzugs so// de nas rngam dros pa dang khros pa'i phrin de dag gi
24a2(rnying rgyud): hU~M bru~M hU~M bi shwa badz+ra kro ta dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha la zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams thams cad/ khro bo 'tshal pas lhag gis gang bar gyur to// de'i tsha 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams thams cad g.yos rang tu g.yos kun
24a3(rnying rgyud): rab tu g.yos so// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun d+ha rab tu 'khrugs so// tshig rab tu tshig kun tu rab tu tshig go// 'thor 'thor kun tu rab tu 'dzer ro// ldeg ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg pa// 'grel 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// de'i tshe 'jig rten rtsang
24a4(rnying rgyud): bar byed pa'i dregs pa de'ini rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi che ba ston cing ma 'dul lo// de nas yang rdo rje/ khros pa'i rgyal pos/ A ba mA ya/ badz+ra tsawa raM zhes pas/ thogs pa de rdo rje 'khor lo 'bar ba'i drwa bar bcug/ phrin las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor na lus la bkor na
24a5(rnying rgyud): gnas so// de nas oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ ra tri d+ha dra rak+Sha/ ha sa ya ra na/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ces gsang ba'i sngags 'thon te/ rdo rje 'khob po bskor bas mthu dang rdzu 'phrul thams cad jo tshan la chu 'dus pa bzhin du skams te gnas so// dregs pa'i sems
24a6(rnying rgyud): can de nyid du dud sems kyi gya g+ha dang / lus kyi gzi byin che bar ston pa las/ A~M badz+ra kI li kI la ya raShI rbad rak+Sha A be sha ya A be sha ya hU~M phaT/ ces pa'i sngags 'don te/ chags byed dang snying po la lus sems rdal bar mdzad do// khros pa 'argyal
24a7(rnying rgyud): bo nyid kyi zhabs 'og tu brdzis te gnas so// de nas dregs pa de shin tu yang mi bzod pa'i tshig gis/ 'og thong dpa' bo sgeg pa rab tu thong / thugs rtse'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spong de'am/ zer zhing phyir 'bros par gzo ba las/ rdo
24b1(rnying rgyud): khros pa'i rgyal pos/ A badz+ra kI li kI la ya dra tri d+ha dza rak+Sha shrI b+h+rUM A na ya hU~M phaT/ ces pa'i sngags 'thon te/ yan lag mdzod lha'i bsti gnas la/ tsha tshe dang skar mda' bzhin du 'bros te 'khor bas/ lus kyi bsgral bskyod kun med par/ rus dz+wal
24b2(rnying rgyud): rgya mtshor zhugs pa bzhin du gnas so// de nas yang dregs pa de sgrib pa rkyong ba'i phyir na/ rdo rje dros pa'i zhabs kyis kyang shin tu gzir te/ A~M badz+ra kI li kI la ya ra tri ru tra ra sha dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hU~M phaT/ ces sngags 'dzin te/ bsam gzhi dang ngag
24b3(rnying rgyud): gnas su 'phros shing 'khor bas/ bregs pa de sngar spyad pa'i las ngan de dag gis 'di lta bu'i las ngan nyams su myong ba dran te/ mi bzang ba'i 'o dod 'bod cing lus zhum sems nyams te gnas so// de nas rdo rje zos pa'i rgyal pos/ rdo rje phur pa'i ting nge
24b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ A~M badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bi b+han baM hU~M hU~M phaT/ ces pas yum dang gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems las/ rdo rje phur pa khro bo las kyi phur pa ste/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog mthing // su sma man chad zur gsum
24b5(rnying rgyud): la// thod rlon stsal gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// dug gsum stong pa'i kha T+wAM ga dang // bag chags 'dral ba'i sA re dang // zil gnon ri rab 'debs pa'i phur bu 'dril// ral gri'i sbal phur bu'is// rigs kyis dbu ba rgyan zhugs la 'bar ba'i srog
24b6(rnying rgyud): sbrul khros pa'i me dpung 'bar ba gcig 'byon te/ bka' nod pa'i tshul gyis spyan snga nyid na gnas so// yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ A A hU~M swA hA/ zhes pas ye shes kyi ni yi ge lngas// gnas lngar byin brlab dang dang srang 'od kyi 'bru'o//
24b7(rnying rgyud): dzaM phaT ces pas ni/ lha gsung thugs hU~M byin brlang mdza/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ slob tu phrin las sa don no// 'das dang mabyon da lta sangs rgyas rnams// de yi su la 'jug pa'i phyir// I badz+ra kI li trai la ya A be sha a a// thos pa'i rtsa
25a1(rnying rgyud): ca / na na/ sa dun/ sa na/ sun ma // ku na
25a2(rnying rgyud): kI la ya dz+wa la dz+wA la hU~M phaT/ A~M badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+TAn tre dasho d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya tsit+ta tsit+ta hUM phaT/ sras kyi dam pa mchog de la// mchod de thugs dam rgyud bskul nas// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di brjod dad/
25a3(rnying rgyud): l-i b+h+rU~M laM/ ste b+ha ya nan/ mo ha g+ha ya/ 'di rnams sur chags/ b+ha ga wAn/ hrIHSh+T+r-iHwI kri/ badz+ra hU~M kA ra/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nAn kI la ya hU~M phaT/ badz+ra hUM kA rab+h+rU~M AHzhes pas dregs pa'i snying la ga dang /
25a4(rnying rgyud): a nyid byang chub sems kyis bzlas// bkrag dang gzi mdangs nyid la bstim// phur ba nyid kyi gzi skyon bskyed// 'od dang mthu dpung lhag par bskyod// de nas rgyal ba thams cad laM// rdo rje'i tshig tu 'dis baphrul te// byang chub mchog tu sems brjed
25a5(rnying rgyud): cing // dus gsum thul ba'i gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag dang gzhan rnam sal// gnod cing gdug sems ldan pa dang // dge ba'i bar du gcod pa rnams// khro ba chen po'i byin rlub kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkrag nas// lus
25a6(rnying rgyud): ngag rdul du bshog byas nas// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// I badz+ra kI li kI la ya ra tra~M drA tA ra ni po hoHt+ta hrI phaT/ ta thA ya tA tA ya hUM phaT/ rjes pa'i sngags 'dzin te/ nyon mongs pa'i gnas wa la 'khor zhing thim pas/ nyon mongs pa
