25a7(rnying rgyud): las byeb pa'i gangs bcos kyi phung po ba zhig per mdzang // nganas yang bzhin gshegs pa bams cad kyis/ rdo rdo rjes pa'i sra na byang tha~Md kyis brlab pa'i phyir/ badz+ra nadz+wal rinas gsungs sa// rdo rje la shes kyi med pa la dud pa'abar ba 'og
25b1(rnying rgyud): khros pa'i phyag g.yon dang por phul te nyon mongs pa gnas su dag cing / zhal du gsal bar dbang bskur ro// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal bas kyang rdzogs pa de'i bag chags kun/ rdo rje ye shas kyi ma dpal gyis bsreg nas/ A badz+ra zhi li kI la ya ra tri rud+ha rak+Sha
25b2(rnying rgyud): b+hin+ta ya b+hid+hA ya ha ha zhes pa'i sngags 'thon te/ phung po lhag rol la 'khor zhing zhal du rol lo// de'i tshe dregs pa'i rgyal po de yang / rdo rje khros pa'i lho khyim na bde ba'i gnas su phyin te/ las dge sdig gi don mthong ste gnas pa las/ rdo rje
25b3(rnying rgyud): pas phyag brang la bsnol nas/ kun rdzob dang tshul bsun ta btsir bas/ mi gtsang ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyil te slar dran pa brlag par gyur to// de nas yang rngon khros pas bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin las sngam nas khro ba snga sha 'thon te/ oM dz+ra
25b4(rnying rgyud): kI li kI la ya ra tri rU tra rak+Sha/ badz+ra ya k+Sha kro ta bi dza ya kha kha khA hi khA hi/ zhes bsul te/ des mi gtsang ba'i rgya mtsho de dag slar rngubs pas dran parnyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho rdo rje khros pa'i sku// shin tu bde ba'i gnas bshig nas//
25b5(rnying rgyud): snam du bton pa thugs rje chung // bdag kyang rgyal ba'i bka' la thogs// zhes gsol zhing / 'di skad ces sdig pa bshags so// bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chod nas// da lta tshe lus 'dir skyes phan chad du// lha mchog khyod dang smon lam
25b6(rnying rgyud): mthun sdebs pas// dus 'dir zhal mthong yi dam lhar gsol na// dus chag 'di nas bzung nas yi dam la// snying po byang chub mchog la mi gnas par// tshe rabs 'khor ba gar skyes gar byung yang // gsang ba'i lha mchog khyod dang mi 'bral
25b7(rnying rgyud): zhing // spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig la// mi 'da' gnas dang yun du bdag bsrung gi// lhag chad 'gal 'khrul mchis pa mthol lo bshags// las kyi dbang gis bar chad ci byung yang // dpal chen khyod kyis gong bzhin zil gyis
26a1(rnying rgyud): gnan// dngos grub mchog rtsol shes rab lha ma'i sra// zhes bshags sa// de nas yang drags pa de shin tu dga' ba dang dad pa'i sems skyes nas/ 'di skad ces gsal to// dpa' ba khyod lar mtho 'byung pa dang // 'ad
26a2(rnying rgyud): gi sgrib pa spong ba'i phyir// bdag gi lus 'di gdan du 'bul// e ma ho dpa' bos bzhes su gsol// ma srid zung ma bu mo sras kyi tshogs// dpa' bo khyod kyi 'bangs su 'bul// 'bangs su 'bral lo bka' la thogs// 'bangs la
26a3(rnying rgyud): ma chung zhig/ de nas de'i ma dang chung ma bu mo slas kyi tshogs rnams kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dbus su mtsho ba'i skal med kyis// dkyil 'khor mA ran mtha' la zhog/ bud la 'tshal ba'i zhal med kyi// lhag ma kha chas dran gsol/
26a4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol te/ dregs pa chen po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ lus gdan du phul bas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa byang/ na bas chos nyan pas shes bya'i sgrib pa byang / rgyal ba'i pha 'bab mngon pas rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs/ dkyil 'khor
26a5(rnying rgyud): zhal mthong bas 'bras bu ye shes kyi tsho gas rdzogs te/ grub pa mor khas blangs nas/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs bskar bar yang dam nos te gnas so// dregs pa chen po'i ma dang chung ma dang sras mo dang bu mo dang / bran mo rnams
26a6(rnying rgyud): ni/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mu ra na la ba dag ste/ bka' la btags te dam tshig byin nas/ mnas bsgrags nas gnas so// de'i tshe na dregs pa chen po'i nye 'khor/ 'dod chags dang gti mug dang phrag dag dang nga rgyal
26a7(rnying rgyud): la sogs pas so sor dregs pa'i/ tshangs pa brgya byin dang ma hA de ba dang // bya ba 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po rnams/ rang rang gi che ba ston cing khro zhing gtum mo// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos khro gtum pa de dag 'dul ba'i ched du/ sras ma
26b1(rnying rgyud): sa da ngas nga sa/ napa ba bad nan / na nu sgru sun sa na/
26b2(rnying rgyud): byed/
26b3(rnying rgyud): du / smra na pa shAm+b+ha/
26b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzi// deni skye pa du bye / da 'i ga na'i shing 'dan 'dugs/ rkye ba sang bsngar pasags ma par mdadag/ da pang grangs pa sa
26b5(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa
26b6(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa'adugs pa rdzu / masadas pa la /
26b7(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa chu gsas//
27a1(rnying rgyud): gas lda gas// ska mas/ nags sa/ na nas// AHb+h+ya / na na na dngas/ rnam
27a2(rnying rgyud): badz+ra T+Ti la ya dz+raM dzaT/ bud+ha kIl pa par nga rgya hU~M Ta/ pa mgre ThA na/ brdathi lang byi tu hU~M \u0f7f/ la badzi / ces pa'i 'dis 'dzi byer/ rdo rje 'dris pa'i cha ga des rigs da'i drang ba'i nang nas mi par ba
27a3(rnying rgyud): zhing rdegs pa bzhi sgrol bar mdzad da// de'i tshe dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / sras mchog dam pa de la 'di skad ces pa sgos shing sbal bar mdzad de/ 'di skad ces tsha 'phrul gyi spar mngan par dus gcab tu sngags so// bya ma sangs
27a4(rnying rgyud): rgyam mang pa'i sras// dge ba'i bar tshad byeng pa dang // gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig tshangs shig rnam par tshangs// gtogs shig grags dang bral bar gyis// dang pa khrug pa spang rgyang ga// zibacag rnam par gzing bar bya/
27a5(rnying rgyud): nga yi dbang du bsdu byas te// lus dang ngag sems rdul du bshig nas kyang // dug gsums/ khrag zhal du brdzas rngubs nas/ bsgo ba'i las rnams byed kyis grub par gyis// zhes par bskul ta/ brta bcing bskal bar mdzad na// nga na gyis
27a6(rnying rgyud): 'byings stongs mnyas skangs 'bras bu rdzogs par mdzad de// de nas yang drags pade lnga'i chung ma dngas 'dzin ma dang / rtag pa mo dang / mtshan macan dang / chad pa mo dang / sdug mo la sogs pa rnams/ rang rang gi cha ba ston cing shin tu yang chags
27a7(rnying rgyud): pa dang ldan pa las/ yang khrag 'thung de zla zas par sku gsung thugs gzhon nus/ gsil brda rje dang / phung po rdo rje dang / 'bang ba rdo rje dang / gal ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la khyams par zhugs te/ rdo rje 'khar brgyas 'dabs ma dang / 'khor lo 'khor
27b1(rnying rgyud): brgyas 'dabs ma dang / ran chan 'khar ba rgyas 'dabs ma dang / pad+ma 'khar ba rgyas 'dabs ma dang / las rab 'khar ba rgyas 'dabs ma rnams/ nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs ces/ yum chan ma 'khrang ma rgyas 'dabs ma khrug cung thugs pan/
27b2(rnying rgyud): tan phrin las las 'thon te/ rgyan dang cha lugs dang / sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams/ rigs kyi sras dang cha mthun te/ dregs pa po rnams gong bzhin bsgral te tshar bcad nas/ sras mchog la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas ya
27b3(rnying rgyud): rdeg po chen po de'i nye 'khor na// 'khor gyi gtso bo 'jig rten pa'i las la grub pa'i phyogs sbyor ba bcu ste/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / me lha dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / dbang ldan dang // sa
27b4(rnying rgyud): bdag rnams/ brnab sems dang / ma b+hin len pa dang / log par blta ba dang / srog gcod pa dang / phra ma dang / 'dod pas log par g.yems pa dang / ngag 'khyal ba dang / ngag rtsub pa dang / gnod sems dang / tshi ga brlang po dang / mi dgeng
27b5(rnying rgyud): bcus dregs nas/ nga rgyal gyis mthu ston cid shin tu yang bstan pa la ma dang pa'i tshul ston pa la/ de rnam sa 'dul ba'i phyir na/ yang rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus rol pa'i stobs dang / bzlog pa'i stobs dang / 'joms pa'i stobs dang /
27b6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed kyi stobs dang / gzhon tshul gyi stobs dang / brjod pa'i stabs dang / shugs 'chang ba'i stobs dang / gzing ba'i stobs dang / gnon pa'i stobs dang / 'degs pa'i stobs dang / stobs bcu'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ ma chags pa
27b7(rnying rgyud): tshu / zhes su / sa pa rna du da/ ba nga na bar gyi'i ba brdzun pa dang / gsung bgang ba da /
28a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan byas mthab pa dang / 'du 'thal ba dang / khang stsags pa rnam par cab dadang / tha pas rnams na// 'alags pa ga drug paskangs pan dang ldan dang / 'am ma ga dang phyag macan rnams
28a2(rnying rgyud): pa 'jigs kyad 'bar ba'i cha lugs zung ste/ phyogs pa ni marnams pazhi steng 'og tu 'arjes te gnas so// dalas bris pa'i rgyal ba la sogs pa'i da ba gnags pa rnams kyis 'di skad kyis babral lo// dzardzakhas pa'i chags rnams /
28a3(rnying rgyud): bdag sa dag las m+b+ha nga // dag pang ba byu pa di// ngan da mams dpa di ga sa kyang rjen las dus pa dag// ces zlas mthangs/ gas kyi pa thags pas nag tu dag zhu nga/ thugs
28a4(rnying rgyud): slo par mang 'gas la bas/ khe bzlas baphrul ba'i din thugs sa cad pa dum dang / gangag hU~M / na tan rje sa/ rgya R+R-i dzaH/ bcang hU~M phaT/ brlab N+Da dz+ra paT/ thus tu bi na saT/ ta tiSh+Tha badz+ra dzaT/ y-i rna brda ba/
28a5(rnying rgyud): r+b+ha badz+ra dang / ma na yangasas/ sa kyi da/ gag zu mas dgas pa ni mam rjes na mal// da mi das pa'i rgya ladzes/ nga rtagan 'dzi pas/ sa phyag gas na dngu
28a6(rnying rgyud): 'brir bye nga gyi 'jams can / gas bzlal bas/ thas pa mas kyis mi dge pa tu gapa pa rjod/ thangs gcam pa du 'jus te/ 'jugs labs/ thang rnams dargyas par swa ha ha nas bsgrag som
28a7(rnying rgyud): khar ba mi dag pa'aphrulas d+hal nas/ dbang bcung rjong danyis padi/ mas pa la dbang ba dang / byang chub 'a dbang ba nas pa dbang bdang / jas dbang ba dang / byab pa dbang ba dang / chas ladabang pa dang / ma byang la dbang ba dang /
28b1(rnying rgyud): las la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba la sogs brnyes so// de ltar mdzad pas skye ba'i rgyan bcad/ nyon mongs pa las rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan btsugs/ 'khor ba'i bag chags bcom/ 'chi bdag tsha rab cad/ rtag
28b2(rnying rgyud): tshad kyi mtha' bsal/ las dge sdig gi shan gyi/ log pa'i ngan la ye shes kyi mchu bstan/ 'khor ba'i bdud la thugs rje'i rtse btang / khams gsum sku gsung thugs su ba/ che ba'i yon tan gyi stobs kyis zil gyis mnan pa'i rtags su/
28b3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi sngam nas phyogs skyong bcu bton te/ rnam par shes pa ni rdo rje dang de bzhin du 'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang las kyi rigs rnams su shes bya gnas/ chos myong ba'i bsrung mar dbang bskur/ gres rnams ni rang rang gi khro ba rnams la/ nyon mong
28b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgrib pa dag par bya ba'i phyir gdan du dbul/ lag cha mda' gzhu dang / rdo rje gdengs pa dang / me dpung 'bar ba dang / dbyug to dang / spu gri dang / zhags pa dang / ba dan dang / be con dang / ba TI ga dang bum pa rnams ni/ rgyal byed rtags kyi phyag mtshan
28b5(rnying rgyud): du rang rang gi khro bo'i phyag bar bar phul te bsnams so// de nas yang phyogs skyong rnams kyi rigs ma ste/ tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / brgya byin gyi chung ma dang / me lha'i zung ma dang / gshin rje'i chung ma dang / srin po'i chung ma dang / chu lha'i chung ma dang /
28b6(rnying rgyud): rlung lha'i chung ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi chung ma dang / dbang ldan gyi chung ma dang // sa bdag gi chung ma rnams/ skyon bcul bag chags brtas pa ni/ ma rig pa'i lhornga dang / den pa'i ston dang / shes bzhin ma yin pa'i gyon dang / g.yeng ba'i skyon dang / 'chal
28b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i sbra dang / la wang spyan dang / mangs pa'i spyan dang / phur ba'i sgon dang / 'dagra pa'i sgon dang / rtsod pal dga' ba'i skyon dang / rgya tshogs ma ngasags pa'i sngon no// de lta bu'i rkyen gyis 'cheb pas/ bstan pa la mdad pa de 'jal ba'i d+hing
29a1(rnying rgyud): na/ rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus/ pha rol phyin pa bcu 'don la mnyam par bzhag ste/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
29a2(rnying rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i dang
29a3(rnying rgyud): las ma g.yos kyang / g.yos pa'i tshul gyis ma gos pa'i yum la rol te/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M b+he/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hUM/ zhes pas/ khro ma rdo rje sba 'byin ma dang / khro mo rdo rje mda' skems ma dang / khro mo rdo rje sder mo dang // ma rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang / khros
29a4(rnying rgyud): rdorje gtun khud ma dang / khro mo rdo rje gtum mo dang / khro mo rdo rje mda' snyems ma dang / khro mo rdo rje chung 'byin ma dang / khro mo rdo rje gsod ma dang / khro mo rdo rje bgyod ma rnams 'thon te/ stong pa nyid kyi dbyings las chos nyid kyi sba bsgrags/ phye ba med pa'i
29a5(rnying rgyud): las don brnyes/ rang bzhin med pa'i dbyings las khams gsum thugs rjes gzung / mi dmigs pa'i dbyings su mtshan ma'i dngos po bsdus/ mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'khor ba'i bag chags bcom/ chos nyid dag pa'i dbyings kyis 'gro ba'i
29a6(rnying rgyud): don la brtson/ yang dag pa'i dbyings kyis nyon mongs pa'i gnas su brdeg// gsal zhing g.yo ba'i dbyings las bag chags kyi dngos po sun phung / rtog med sgrol ba'i dbyings su sgrib pa'i bag chags bsad/ g.yos pa chen po'i dbyings kyis mi dge
29a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gyon bapyod de gnas so// de nas dregs pa'i bu mo ste sems can gyi lus la/ phag dang stag dang g.yag dang sha ba dang / gzig dang / byi la dang / sung ki dang / seng ge dang / dred dang / dom gyi mgo btag pa pa rnams/ rmugs pa dang / rnam
29b1(rnying rgyud): ljin med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa dang / don tu chags pa dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa dang / mngan sems kyi g.yo dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / mtshan mnyams pa dang / las log pa dang / mos pa pas gyung pa yis// pa du rgyas
29b2(rnying rgyud): pa la ma dad ste/ shes rab ma yin pa dang / gsal ba ma yin pa dang / bde ba ma bstar ba dang / don ma rtogs pa dang / brtson 'grus dang mi ldan pa dang / kha na ma tho ba la mi 'dzem pa dang / dge ba 'phel ba ma yin pa dang / rang bzhin med pa mi shes pa dang /
29b3(rnying rgyud): gnyid dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa la sogs par spyod pa'o// de rnams sbyong zhing gdul ba'i phyir na/ yang rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nus tog 'joms dang / dpa' rdul dang / rdzis tshor dang / dus 'jug dang / spyod rdzogs dang / thabs mkhas dang /
29b4(rnying rgyud): za byed dang / rigs btsun dang / gsod byed dang / myos byed la sogs pa'o// de rnams dang / tshul mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ ma chags pa'i yum la thabs kyis rol te/ dgyes pa'i sprin pas/ ha ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha ha/
29b5(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod pas ni/ sras 'phags pa'i lus la sems can gyi mgo dang tshul mthun pa'i mgo btags pa bcu b+hu da ste/ dregs pa'i bu bo rnams grong bzhin btul te bsgral nas dam la btags so// de nas yang degs pa'i bu mo ste/ sems can gyi lus la
29b6(rnying rgyud): smyig bu dang / bya rgod dang / bya rog dang / dug pa dang / khA dang / pu bud dang / khwa dang / pha wang dang / sre mod dang / byi ba'i mgo btags pa rnams ni/ chags pa dang / yid g.yo ba dang / phrag dog dang / rtsod pa ldang ba dang / le lo byas pa dang /
29b7(rnying rgyud): spyod pa 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / 'tsho ba zab pa dang / bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la sogs pa las byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa dang / sems nod pa dang / sems 'byed pa dang /
30a1(rnying rgyud): dge bal mi 'jug pa dang / cho ga brlang po dang / bag med pa dang / spyod pa brlang ba dang / khrel med pa dang / lag par 'tsha ba dang / dgongs pa ste sems ma zha ba dang / gso sgra dang / de rnams sdud par gyur te/ de rnams
30a2(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i phyir na ni/ yang rdo rnga khros pa'i sgra gsung thugs gzhon nus/ mi 'gyur ba dang / thog meng dang / gsal byed dang / mthong byed dang / thal byed dang / bkra byed dang / g.yo byed dang / btsal byang dang rtsol byad la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa
30a3(rnying rgyud): mnyam par bzhag nas/ gnyis su med pa'i dgyes pa'i sprin las/ he he he he he/ he he he he he/ zhes pas ni/ yang gong gi sems can dang tshul mthun pa'i sras/ 'phags pa'i lus la sems can gyi mgo btags pa bcu byung ste/ gang bzhin bajal
30a4(rnying rgyud): te bskal nas dmal btags so// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos/ 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don bya ba'i phyir na/ don mthun dang don spyad dang / sbyin pa dang snyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ mchags thabs kyis rol pa las/ dzaHN+ya maM hoH// zhes
30a5(rnying rgyud): skul pas/ lha mo pu shud kyi mgo dang skye ga dang / srin bya dang / wal sogs pa'i mgo can bzhi 'thon te/ gzhal yas kyi sgo bzhi la 'khod de/ zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po la sogs pas don mdzad de/ snying rje dang / thams
30a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi ngang du gsal bar mdzad do// de nas yang dam sri dmar po chen po zhes bya ba/ gsang sngags la skur pa btab cing smad pa las gyur pa zhig/ sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la bar chad byed cing /
30a7(rnying rgyud): 'tsho ba las/ sangs rgyas ma lus pas/ rdo rje thos pa la bka' stsal pa/ bka' bsgo ba mdzad pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i don rtogs par dka' ba las ni/ sdig chen dam sra'ang 'byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klang btsal pa bcu ru kho/
30b1(rnying rgyud): nyon cig las kyi dam sa 'di// dang kyi bka' las khyod ma 'ad// zhes bsgral bas/ rngo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhan nus/ dam sri de la ye shes kyi mtshon gyi phur pas mgol bsgrub sa/ mgo ya rdA ka dog pa bzhin du bkas te/ ngang can yang
30b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po 'di 'dzin te/ A~M badz+ra k+She pa~M kI la ya da ma sre ga~M pa ra T+Tad+d+hAtAt+ta hU~M phaT/ ces bskal bas nam shes rgyal ba'i sras su zas/ sha nas dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang / don snying dur khrod kyi rdzas kyi mdzod patsa rol/ de'i sras mo dang bu mo dang ma dang /
30b3(rnying rgyud): sring mo zung ma rnams ni/ rdo rje khros pa la bad+ma'i mdings phupa te/ rgyal ba'i dam mnos nas phyi rabs kyi tshogs bskang bar dam bcas so// de ltar dregs pa can thams cad bsngal zhing tshar btsad pa/ de'i tshan ne/ 'jigs byed spong ba'i rgyal po chen po bzhis kya
30b4(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces mnos te/ dam chos gzhung srod rnal 'byor la// dngos grub par chad byed pa rnams// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par bya'o// zhes gsungs te/ sring mo dang bcas pas dam mnas nas/ bstan pa myong bar
30b5(rnying rgyud): zhal gyis pazhes so// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos kyang lung phog ste/ dam las 'das na snying po 'dis khyed nyid kyi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul phrogs te bsgral bar dam bcas so// A~M badz+ra kI laM kI la ya sarba A na ya ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ ces gsungs so// de'i
30b6(rnying rgyud): tshe na dregs pa'i gtso mos kyang rang gi snying po 'di bstabs te bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas so// ma ma pa shaM ku ru hU~M/ bra chags ma ti trA kar i dan d+ha ti ma ma karma shI b+h+r-i kA ra ya zhes brtabs phul ti/ phyi rabs kyi tshogs bskong bar byas nas/ mthu'i bdag nyid du
30b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan gsol lo// de nas yang sa dag nag po bzag med kyi bu mo dang / gza' bi tri ba tra'i bu mo dang / btsan chu bo lag rings kyi bu ma dang / klu 'jog po'i bu mo rnams bsngal zhing sbar bar dgongs nas/ rang dam srog gi snying po bstabs shing phul nas/
31a1(rnying rgyud): nges rapa dmam nas/ a dza ta sa/ a ba ra dzA d+ha la/ rdum pa ma/ mA san pa mnganas/ zang la/ gsapas kyi rabs kyin pa 'thor ba thugs dam bkang bar byas te/ sa bdag can mo mtshan sa mas+ho// de nas yang 'dus
31a2(rnying rgyud): rten phung bar byed pa ste/ lcags kyi khyi mo la ba can dang / lcags kyi sbrang mo mgo dgu dang / zangs kyi la mo rkang gsum dang / gser gyi 'phar ba kye brgyad ma la sogs pas/ 'gro bkun grol zhing za ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phral gyi stan gyis
31a3(rnying rgyud): gzigs nas/ bskal bar dgongs pas srog snying phul te dam mnos so// dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/ su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra zhes pas/ pho nya shwanar mtshan gsol lo// de ltar 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa pha maM/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
31a4(rnying rgyud): rim pas btul bkral ster gnas bstabs dam la btags par mdzad do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje khro bo rol pas ma dad pa btul ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog dam pa deng / bcom
31a5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das khros pa'i sras mchog pu gsung thugs gzhon nu 'khor dang bcas pa las mchod pa bstabs te/ A~M kI laM kI la ya kro ta kro hI ha he phaT+Ta/ dI pa d+ha pa pu dz+ra su khaM gar+b+ha yi daM/ a mr-i ta ba lin+ta rany+tsa dza d+hi tsi T+Ta \u0f7f// zhes pas kyi dag pa'i mchod
31a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / nang khyad par gyi mchod pa dang / gsang ba dga' ba'i mchod pas chun du mngon par mchod pa'o// mdzad spyod kyi don bsdus pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bcod pa ni/ e maho// bdud bzhi bcom nas yon tan drug ldan la// yod med
31a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i dngos po kun las 'das// don dam thugs ni 'da' dkar shin tu gsang // gsang ba'i gsang sngags ma lus kun gyi gtso// thams cad ma lus mnga' brnyes bdag po'i sku// bcom ldan 'das gsang bdag rdo rje khros pa'i su gsung thugs
31b1(rnying rgyud): su ma 'an nga// dran pang bdag dang la zhug sa bad// blo zhing mgos da nga rnams// kyang ngas pas thal ba dang gta // thugs byanas sa byung rgyas// ma
31b2(rnying rgyud): rje mi pa la shes bam/ 'dris pa byed pa kyis bad pa yang thag 'chos ba/ ngas napa mi dang bsasangs nas pa pa// gas ga byings pas pa'i phre dag rten nongs/ da pa
31b3(rnying rgyud): dadags sa med pa'i 'i gas chen pa brtas// blam cig ngam pa de ma thag 'tsham banyid// gnas med nga mas de nan gyil pa// ba'i zungs pa sas mdang ngagatan stong / yid kyi pa ci
31b4(rnying rgyud): na la snyoms pa'i sa mdza la gas btas// yan tan dam pa nga phyag tshal babang // dmigs med dang pas pacwa sbrel la// 'di chags dbyangs pas ma skye 'angag rten spangs// gsung ga dpa ga sungs drung rigs pa nga nyi
31b5(rnying rgyud): drin ma byinas par rtog pa'i ye shes brtas// gsung mtsha ga dam pa la phyag 'tshal bad/ dgro ma dang ba med pas las rab kyil ma// phrag dag 'byong sapas mi dgas 'jig can mongs/ 'chal ba dadapa gings las cing ba
31b6(rnying rgyud): na// dan rtsib tha nan tan me gas brnyes// phrin pas dam pa de la phyag 'tsha' bzad/ emaH/ shes rab rang bzhin dag pa las// dbyings kyi rang bzhin gra gsumags la bar ma dang // dbus nas byang chub sems kyis mtsham
31b7(rnying rgyud): med ni rnams can byed pa// shes rab dbyings ma dal phyag 'tshal bstod// dngas ma dang byings las dngas po'i tshul 'dzin ma// rdor rigs kyi khromachog dpal gyi sam// nam mkhar 'byung ba med migs rang bzhin dang // ces kyang bung pa
32a1(rnying rgyud): mang banas marnapa// da rgyapa 'dangasas ma rgyag sa brtad// gtsud mas nag pa na nga// sa sa gas ma ga pa sa ma pa// s+ho zang ba med migs dang bka nga//
32a2(rnying rgyud): dbyings pa bdang btas pa mal// rdorda 'i mthas 'ad bsams zag pa la brjod/ tshan ma mams pa can pa na ba derang dag/ rin can rigs kyi mchog dul tsamam/ mim 'a'ang ba rjodagadung banan dang/
32a3(rnying rgyud): dbying sa las mnga' ba rjes samanas// de na can la ma cas 'dab sum la sagu tshas bad// tshad mi nga rgyangs pas cad pa rnas lan da/ 'an gas tshog dpal pa sam// rgyal 'byung ba med migs rang brten dang // badz+ra pa
32a4(rnying rgyud): 'dabs mal phyag 'tsham bstod// thugs byed dbyings pas rmugs par bram 'dzin pa// ris kyi dgas kyi zhing tshag dpas the gzungs// rdung po rdung ba me migs rang bzhin dang // zhes pa'i dbyings las mnga' ba rtas tho mthul// las rab thang
32a5(rnying rgyud): mo rgyas 'dabs mas cag 'tshal ba stod// ram pa'i thobasasas badz+ra ny-i // cings bcang ba shes rje bang // sre ga cid nga da sring shad migs thams nyams pa da da // Na N+Dam d+hi kAr la thag 'argal bstod// bzlag pa'i skabs las
32a6(rnying rgyud): banam parnya pa/ paras pa 'du zungs/ mnal ba dbang kyi pa dzirimi skye sa bad dris pa thabs laga'ab / na ci bad ba/
32a7(rnying rgyud): bang dru// 'bar ba bgachags ma rgya ma nas pa kyimags pa ya dang/ ya bye sa dun na byung bya sa ma sa gi drugag// gni ma bang tham sa dab
32b1(rnying rgyud): 'dra bdag bdung btsam mnyam tang mags brnyes// rmel dbang mdang o \u0f7fla gtsun rje gaphreng lab dang // gzhan rtsal sabs pas rma ba ma ga so mgon// srin pa char bcad phram dbang du spyad// nAg chad mthar ma g.yas pas mtha' bral sa shes brtag/
32b2(rnying rgyud): tshe la dbang mdang dza rgyal mig yo mgon la bstod// brjid pa'i stobs las kha mchog rte mchog dpal// rgya la char bcad 'dad game ma dbang du sdud// chu 'bras rim par gyi nye bran rtog/ ye shes brnyes/ chos la dbang ba'i khro rgyal nya mchog dpal la
32b3(rnying rgyud): 'thab brjod/ !/ thugs 'thang dubs las thab gzhan ma thag// rlung la ca ba cangad dag thal dbang du byung// gzhan gyi mthu tsam mi 'dres ma shes nyams cas cad dbang // ma nul gzhan gyis mthub pa'i phyag 'jal btid/ gzer ba
32b4(rnying rgyud): stobs las khro ba bdud rtse 'khyil// gnod sbyin tshar bcad dgacubs dbang du srung // bdud la ci btang nan tan ye shes skams// las la dbang mdzad khro rgyal bdud rtsi lathal la bstod// gnon pa'i stobs las khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal// 'ju
32b5(rnying rgyud): 'tshang ba cad gnod sems dbang du phud// khams gsum las rgyal don yod ye shes skems// smon lam dbang mdzad khro ba khams gsum rnam par rgyal la bskod// 'degs pa'i stobs las cho rgyal spobs po che// sa bdag tshar bcad chog bzang dbang
32b6(rnying rgyud): rnga lud // khams gsum sra gsung thugs su stobs te che ba ye shes brnyes// rdzu 'phrul la dbang rtsal stobs po tshal bstod// ye shes pha rol phrin pas kha ma sba bri nA ma// rdungs pa'i chung mtshar bcang mchig ston kyang sel// ho nyi dang cing pa
32b7(rnying rgyud): les chos ta su thogs // rlom sgra'i byen pa pa bstod// smi par parab phyin pas mashes rnam thams sa/ ban byin mon cher rab ba zhin par byung byung bapa// bamed pa'i dbyings pas ngon pa nyes te// blam rnam thams ma la bzod/
33a1(rnying rgyud): dusmra /
33a2(rnying rgyud): sa
33a3(rnying rgyud): sa su
33a4(rnying rgyud): sa ma
33b1(rnying rgyud): po'i ting 'dzin las/ phra men pho nya stag gi mgo// bded med brgya byed bu dang rnam sbyin ba de la btsud// blo rgyang stug gi mgo la bstod// rjes zer spong ba'i ting 'dzin las// mu men pho nyag pug gams// gsal byed me b+ha'i bu dang tshul gzhan pa
33b2(rnying rgyud): yin don dang bskrun// khro chung g.yag gi mgo la bskyod// dus 'jug chen po'i ting 'dzin las// za len ma ste sha ba'i mgo// chags pa las byung gshin rje'i bu bo dang // bden pa ma yin sel bar byed// jo chung sha ba'i 'go la 'gyod// snong rdzogs
33b3(rnying rgyud): chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men pho nya gzig gi mgo// gnyis ka ma yin las byung srin po'i bu pho dang // ma togs pa ni yid ches pas// khro chung gzig mgo de la bstod// thabs mkhas chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men po nya b+hi la'i mgo//
33b4(rnying rgyud): las gyur pa'i chu lha'i bu pho dang // brtson 'grus ma yin don dang ldan// khro chung rtsi la'i mgo la bstod// za byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men pho nya sbyang ki'i mgo// tshul nyams las byung rlung lha yi// 'u dang kha na ma tho med par byed//
33b5(rnying rgyud): chung spyang ki'i mgo la bstod// rigs btsun chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste seng ge'i mgo// mi dge las thur gnod byin bu pho dang // dge 'phel ma yin gyis par byed// khro chung seng ge'i mgo la bstod // za byed chen po'i ting
33b6(rnying rgyud): las// pha men pho nya drod kyi mgo// las log las byung 'byung po'i bu pho dang // rang bzhin med par mi shes 'bras zung che// khro chung rjed ci mgrol bsod// myos byed chen po'i ting 'dzin pas// phra men ma sbyingom ni mgo// myos kyang
33b7(rnying rgyud): las zungs bdag bu dang gnyid sel te// khro chung dos kyi mgol phyag 'tshal bstod// mi 'gyur chen po'i ting 'dzin las// za be nas he smrig bu'i mgo// zags pa las byung tshangs pa'i bu mo dang // sems rgod pa ni zhi bar byed// rdza
34a1(rnying rgyud): ga sa/ kyad du / man// / da// rgyad spyad / su// dang tu
34a2(rnying rgyud): po'i ting 'dzin las// phra med ma skye bya rog mgo// phrag dog las blang me lha'i bu mo dang // dge la 'dug sbal bar byed// khro mo bya rog mgo la bskyod// mthong byed chen po'i ting 'dzid las// pha men ma he zag pa'i 'gro// rtsod pa las snang
34a3(rnying rgyud): rje'i bu mo dang // tshig brlangs po ni dbang du srung // khro mo thag pa'i mgo la bstod// thal byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste khwa yi mgo// le lo las byung srin po'i bu mo dang // bag med pa ni rjes su bskul// rngo mo khA ya~M mgo lab stod/
34a4(rnying rgyud): byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// thA e nem ste b+h+rUM gyad mgo// spyod 'tshal las byung rgyaga'i bu mo dang // brdungs po spyod pa dge bar spyod// khyom zla bud mgol ba stod// zhi babyed chen po'i tang 'dzin las// the me nas te khwa yi b+hag// tshul khrims
34a5(rnying rgyud): pa las byung rlung lha'i bu mo dang // khrel med pa ni chos nyid dang du bcom// khro mo khwa yi mgo la bstod// gso byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste pha thang mgo// 'tsho ba las zung gnod rkyen bu mo dang // log pas 'tsho ba dang du len// khro
34a6(rnying rgyud): wadra mgo la bstod// bcol byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra men ma ste sre mo'i mgo// bdag 'dzin las byung dbang ldan bu mo dang // sems g.yeng rgod pa zhi bar mdzad// khro mo zer mong mgo la bstod// 'gugs byed chen po'i ting 'dzin las// phra me
34a7(rnying rgyud): ma ste byi ba'i mgo// nyon mongs mtshungs ldanas bdag bu mo dang // g.yo dang lha ni mi gnas te// khro mo byi ba'i mgo la bstod// don mthun las kyang lha mo sngags kyu me// zhibs don mdzad tshad med snying rje banyes// de bzhin rigs kyi mngag gzhug
34b1(rnying rgyud): lha mo pra shud mgo la bstod// don spyod las byung lha mo zhags pa ma// rgyas pas don mdzad zad med byams pas brnyes// rin chen rigs kyi mngag gzhug ma// khro mo g+he ka'i mgo la bstod// sbyin pa las thung sna tshogs lnga grogs ma// dbang du sdod pas
34b2(rnying rgyud): tshad med dga' ba brnyes// pad+ma rigs kyi pho nya las mkhan ma// lha mo srin rtsa'i mgo la bstod// nyan pa las byung lha mo dril lakhrol ma// drag shul spyod pas tshad med btang snyoms brnyes// las kyi rigs kyi yang ga gzhug ma// gsang ba'i pho ta kha 'i
34b3(rnying rgyud): mgo la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas yang gsang ba sngags kyi don gsol ba ni/ kye ma ho rdo rje khros pa'i sgra gsung thugs gzhon nu mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lo de'i/ gsang ba'i sngags rnams bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol pa'i don thugs su chud de/ ba
34b4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das nga ma thos pa'i zug sung thugs gnod dus/ dkyi' 'khor kyi nyanams ci gsung rdzogs 'di nasas 'arjod do// snyibadz+ra k+Shi la k+Sha lA las rba badz+rAn pa thAM rAng / e thAH 'i t+pal las rbab rtan pa gyis/ hU~M k+shi kI la mas pa pe sgyu
34b5(rnying rgyud): phaT/ traM ra tAM kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ hrIHpa d+hU kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ ha kA ma kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nA na baM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra dIp+ta tsa kr-i ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro tI dISh+Tha tsa kra ha na ha~M ne hU~M phaT/ oM bud+d+ha kro tI dIp+ta tsakra hA na ha na hU~M phaT/
34b6(rnying rgyud): tI ra d+ha kro d+hi ci ga ta na t+yan hU~M phaT/ d+hIHba~Mdr-i kro d+hi dId+hats+tshakr-i d+h+waM phaT/ ha kum kro b+dad+hits+tshaHkr-i hU~M phaT/ oM badza krota dz+hi kArad+d+haM/ gai dza g+har+Na b+h+ru~M phaT/ I badz+ra kro tA bi de la d+h+waM/ hAn tan d+hi laT/ badz+ra krota tI ladIHhU~M laT/ da tadAH hU~M Ta
34b7(rnying rgyud): mr-id+yA kaidz+dza/ pab pa tru~M phaT/ I ba dz+re \u0f89\u0fa4 ta sa s+ya a tsal trA~M/ bar+d+hab hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-ita ha la grI bab+h+rUM/ sra sa hU~MngaT/ oM ba~M dz+re kro ta ya ba dzotahU~M/ trAM ha~MHhU~M phaT/ na/ oM badz+ra kra ta sa mr-i ti kr-it+tA le d+hU/ hU~Mts+tsha hU~M phaT/
35a1(rnying rgyud): ts+tshab dang dz+ra/ pan+d+habi d+ha phaT/ baHk+Shutam b+ha d+ha/ na pa smon la phyongan/ Abadz+rag / tu sa// pha/ ma hU~M nga/
35a2(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+d+hi mu sa lI hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro Sh+Thi dza ya ti hrI phaT/ badz+ra g+h+r-i ShI sha b+ha ti hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra gr-ih+Na sa t+ya~M mi ta hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i ti mad NI hU~M phaT/ badz+ra kro ti tsu ny+dza ya te hU~M phaT/ ha badz+ra g+ha ka ra mu kha phreM phuH/ he badz+ra b+ha k+Sha lu la~M hU~M phaT/ haM badz+ra
35a3(rnying rgyud): ma ra m+b+ha kha hU~M phaT/ ha badz+ra ha ri Na mu kha hU~M phaT/ ha badz+ra di pI mu kha bru~M phaT/ ha badz+ra pi DA la mu kha hU~M phaT/ ha badz+ra shwan mA kha hU~M phaT/ hwe badz+ra se d+d+ha mu kha b+h+rU~M phaT/ he badz+ra tAk+Sha mu kha hU~M phaT/ ha badz+ra rik+Sha ma kha hU~M phaT/ he badz+ra u me ka mu ShA phre~M phaT/
35a4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kr-i d+yA pu khI hU~M phaT/ h+ye badz+ra dro Na mu khI hU~M phaT/ hi badz+ra u lpa ka mu Shi hU~M phaT/ he badz+ra kA ka mu khI hU~M phaT/ he badz+ra bak+Sha ti mu kha~M hU~M phaT/ he badz+ra paN+Di mu khI hUM phaT/ haM badz+re te ShA la mu khaM hU~M phaT/ he badz+ra ba ku la mu wI hU~M phaT/ he badz+ra ka sa~M ka muSh+Ti hU~M phaT/
35a5(rnying rgyud): dzaHbadz+ra b+hai ra be hU~M phaT/ hU~M badz+ra rat+na bag sha ta hU~M phaT/ paM badz+ra a mr-i ta hU~M phaT/ hoHbadz+ra ma ra Na hU~M phaT/ ce sa rtsa ba'i lha rnams kyi ma nor ba'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang / pa phyed pa rkyen gyi sngags dang / bskyal ba las kyi sngags rnams ched du brjod do//
35a6(rnying rgyud): rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dkyil 'khor rgyas par bstan pa las/ sdud pa pos mchod cing bstod nas/ gsang sngags kyi don zhus pa dang / de'i lan rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang
35a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon du la/ rmad du byung ba'i glu sna tshogs pas mngon par mchod nas/ ma dad pa'i sems can chen po de dag la/ de lta bu'i mdzad spyod bstan pa/
35b1(rnying rgyud): tang maHra ya ma tshan can na// de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i gang zag dang ni gnas// 'khong dang phung ba yo byad dumachod nams// dpa' ba khyod kyis bshad drug po la// zhes gsol bas/ dzAH khros pa'i thug sung thugs gzhon dus gso' 'a
35b2(rnying rgyud): dod+ha thugs su chud nas// thos pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// rnal 'byor don lus ya mtshan che'o// e rba na nyon la yi lazung // gang zag sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rigs bzang kun gyis bsang zhing kun la mdzo //
35b3(rnying rgyud): debyibs lags gas dang nyon mongs chung // longs spyod ldan dang hU~M phyung smod pa mdzes// gang gi las lam mongs pazo ba'i the brag byed// ci na rje rjod thams cad la// thos bas ma bzho bas la rab sbyangs pa'i// las su dge brgya ldan zhing
35b4(rnying rgyud): sa rjod med med dang la gnas// brtan pa'i rgya mtsho 'dril khrims sdom bya yi// rang la grangs te mchog brjod// tha med thug pa rna ma gas sa lA// the brag rngub pa'i nyams dzad ldan// dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid byin las bye zag cid/
35b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pas su rgyang ba'i rjod cing rtags mthong ba'i// dbang gi ris pa ma gru sa rdzogs pa yi// de pyir ldan pa rdo rdzag+sa pa yin// dI mi gyi bzhin bcwa ltar 'phreng // de dang mi sran myong du 'ang pa'i na// gsang thugs snang dka' 'bras bu rnal la sa
35b6(rnying rgyud): bste// rje tsa ras chod gcu lus ma bin par// thabs n+ti rim pas spang bar bya'o// gnas kyi rim pa bstan pa ni// gad sbyin mo yis phreng rjes sam// gnod sbyinas rtsen ces pa shas rjes sa ma// gru bdud dag gi rgya brang ngas// rgyun dang 'bral
35b7(rnying rgyud): 'i lag can// rnal 'byor bsam pas spang bar bya'o// spangs na dngos grub lhur bar bshad// ma spangs nam lugs dang la gnod// seng 'og par sdang brtag pa ni// 'khor lo gan ma la pang+ya sa// phyogs ma tshams kung tu rdo rje zag
36a1(rnying rgyud): gzung rdu bus sbyis dpa dang // dbya sa lamathang bar dab dang // na ma bas nga // gzhan na tu yar zad/ 'ad da // mdun pa da'ang thub// da nga nga
36a2(rnying rgyud): wang dang dang dubyung ba ni// bdag gi ting 'dzin nyams dang slar// ting 'dzin thapa na dad pa bdam// ting 'dzin ga yol na bzang po bdam// ti 'dzin dong dang ldan kyang ni// ngan pa'i mas rnams gong mdang // khyab pa la sogs rdzas na pang // dan
36a3(rnying rgyud): las kyi sa ran pa 'grub// las la phan 'dogs yod pa dang // grims phyin shugs kyis ting 'dzin gsal// bzang po'i las subasrub gyur na// yun du bsring na phung 'tshang med// de bas gzhung dang ldan par bya'o// 'khor gyi rim pa bstan pa 'i/
36a4(rnying rgyud): gcigag yo sgra med pa dang // de sa pa nyams shed ldan pa da // brjing ba gzhan gyis bkra bar kyi// kos ta mas dus la dub pani// gang cig sa med skyeb// sgrub pa rgya yi 'khor rje \u0f7f// rgya thabs kyi bse dang ldan pa dang // ngam ma da
36a5(rnying rgyud): dang // brtul zhugs 'chang ba'i ging chen dang // drod tshad zin pa'i spyan mthong dang // gtsang sde khyed pa'i g.yos pa ni// grub partsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rigs bzhi 'os bzhi tshul bzhi dang // yan tan bcu gcig ldan pa yi// mtshan ldan phrag shi
36a6(rnying rgyud): yum mchog ni// dgyes skong gsang ba'i 'khor du bya'o// phung pa yo byad mtshan nyid ni// phur pa'i lha ni 'di lta bu// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams ni// zhi ba'i phur pa'i chu ru bshad// gabong ram ser po'i shing rnams ni// rgyas pa'i phur pa
36a7(rnying rgyud): sbya bshad// zangs sa ma dmang po'i shing rnams ni// dbang gi phur ba'i chur bshad// grags sa ma nag po'i shing rnams ni// drag po'i phung ba'i rje ru bshad// thig tu pa nang la zhi baH// 'dab chags dang la rgyas partsa// gang le ba dang pa ba
36b1(rnying rgyud): yang bya// ster chags nang ladrag poH// lam ma tog ya lag med// shing shing nag pa'i lhagu la// drag po'i phung pa thubar bshad// po mo 'dod pa'i srid ma zin// blos po chul ba man+dan la ni// da la dbang gi phung pa bya// pho dang mo la mtshan/
36b2(rnying rgyud): ma dang // ma ning nag po'i mtshan ma la// de la rgyas pa'i phur ba bya// bu tsha rigs chung srid mgrin// dre'u ta nag po'i mtshan ma ni// de la zhi ba'i phur ba bya// 'di ni kun rdzob phur pa'i rgyu// rtogs pa'i don la mi dgos pas// ma rtogs don du bstan pa
36b3(rnying rgyud): zad// kun gyi rgyu ni byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na// gzhan nas rgyu nyid btsal mi dgos// btsal yang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// phur pa'i tshad ni 'di lta ste// rang phung chen po'i phur pa las// sems nyid gsal ba'i tshad btang
36b4(rnying rgyud): na// don dam du ni mi dgos te// dman pa'i don du tshang bstan to// sor bzhi pa dang sor drug pa// bcu gnyis su ni yang dag bshad// rtse mo'i phyogs ni ma nor bar// rtsa ba la ni rgya mdud bya// myu gu'i ngos su rtse mo bya// lci bor sor gcig rgya mdung \u0f7f/
36b5(rnying rgyud): sked par de bzhin bya ba ste// stod kyi dbyibs ni sor brgyad la// rtse mo zung gsum zer sor bya ba ni// zlum po gru bzhi zlag ma zung gsum ste// rtse mtshan so so'i dbyibs sgyu ni// dbang drag gnyis ni rgya srin kha nas byung // zhi la zur drug rgyas la brgyad// ri rab
36b6(rnying rgyud): lta bur brjid che ba// kun rdzob dbyibs su byas pa yin// khrag 'thung 'bar ba thugs kyi ye shes la// yon tan tshang ba'i tshul lam dbyibs// de nyid rtogs na 'di mi dgos// rgyu rkyen ma 'gags don shes na// cabaco mo dbyer med do// ma rtogs
36b7(rnying rgyud): pas na de bstan no// legs pa'i yon tan bsam las 'das// legs na yi rang dod na gdung // nyes pa'i gyon ni 'di yin te// gang dgar byas na bka' las 'gal// stod btsong byas na tshul las nyams// ngan dgur bshams na rtog par 'gyur//
37a1(rnying rgyud): rnams pas thogs sa bdags / cags dga' bas mdun brgyu to// mas papa spya smon pa zla// na dus pa'i bgags na// srasadas gsums pa bkags pa cam 'das dadung
37a2(rnying rgyud): gI da maciganyams pa bgags pa gsang ra 'jus/ thags kyi mchog nyams pa bshags pa thog 'di 'dzum/ khang par ma cig nyims pa bgags sogs cad lus// zhag pa'i des nyams gangs bshags pa 'thas/ 'jam pa'i bzhanas
37a3(rnying rgyud): sdig pa mtshams med 'byung bar 'gyur/ na cig dzin 'dus pa'i sras+ya/ 'bum phrag ca cha gdu brjing bshags shing bsang gso// mam dang ngan das su rdzob sems bskyed dgos pa ni/ dper nangs dkar chos su 'dzin pa bzhin/
37a4(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa yigs pa dag gyur na// bde gshegs phu 'i sra 'di la tham ma myed// mdag tu yis mi 'grub ste// dper nas po kyi nyams pas// 'bras bu 'byung bag la srid // denas rgyun tan zer bskyed nas// sngon du 'gro ba 'ad na la dang ma
37a5(rnying rgyud): brtson par bya// zhes gsungs so// de skad gsungs pas rdo rje 'dus pa la sogs pa 'khor rnams ni/ kyai rabs pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i don du sngon du 'gro ba la gus pas don thugs su chud par gyur to// rdo rje slar pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rnam
37a6(rnying rgyud): rdzog su 'gro ba'i don rgyas par lus lan du bstan pa'i leT ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das la yang rbad du zung ba'i mchod pas mngon par mchod de/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma bde gshegs pa
37a7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das// rigs dang le gas kun gyi 'byung gnas te// dam chos kyi zag gan la mnga' brtas pas// ji ltang thul kyang thugs kyi ni rdeng migs// phrag sung thugs kyi bdag la phyag 'tshal mo// zhib rjes su grub 'dod pas// bdag ci
37b1(rnying rgyud): dang ni gnas dang 'khor// sa chog sta gon dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim pa dang / 'jug dang dbang bskur phan pa'i yon tan skyon dang las kyi mtha' btul rnams/ bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis bshad nga gsol// zhes gsol pas/ gsol
37b2(rnying rgyud): pa srad de/ dkyil 'khor 'brang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ 'di da ces gsungs so// oM maho bdag shegs 'dus pa'i gtso// dkyil 'dor nyes pa'i'adon lus ya mtshan che// de les bshad kyi khyod kyis nyon// \u0f7f
37b3(rnying rgyud): ni// blo yangs chud la mkhas pa dang // sems kyi rnam rtog choms pa dang // ting 'dzin las su rung ba dang // phyi nang sde snod thams cad la// som nyi med de the tshom med// sran thub mi ldog dad pa che// gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs mchog rnams//
37b4(rnying rgyud): sno ngan phal la mI wAl ba// rdo rje rigs kyi bla ma rags sa// rkyen thub mi l-ig dam tshig gnas// yid kyai sgo nas shin te spangs// man gsung la rtag dga' zhing // lnga tshogs sde tshogs kyi sgo nas// bla ma'i thugs ni mnyes tha /
37b5(rnying rgyud): ngo rje rigs kyi bu yin te// gsum mam bcu phyed man chad do// ri bo 'dus pa'i rtse rnams dang // mdangs dag shar du gzhom pa yi// gangs ri rdo rje'i zug dkar ni// ri rigs kyi grub gnas yin// sa mi cho ga bstan pa ni// gnas dang
37b6(rnying rgyud): par snang rnams// rdo rje'i grwar btsal zag ri brtags// de nas bus gang tsam du no// sa yi ro lnga bsal byas nas// sa de nyid kyis dgang par bya// khengs nas lhag na dngos grub ra'i// kha ta chad na dngos grub 'bring // mkhengs sur na gzhan
37b7(rnying rgyud): duspro// mngon du lgang ba'i yi rnams la// rin chen rin nam bden pas bslang // bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pas// mchod dang gtor ma nges thogs nas// lag gnyis 'khor los sa yi lha mo ldan// mchod la dbang bcol bden tshig
38a1(rnying rgyud): de bas legs shing dang bar bya// yo byad dam pa byang chub sems// sems kyi stobs kyis rtsol nus na// thams cad ma lus yo byad yin// lha grangs tshang ba'i phur pa dang // bsrub pa rdzas kyi phud pa dang // nyung dkar bu phul
38a2(rnying rgyud): rak+ta rnams// bsgrub pa rtsa ba'i yo byad do// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas te// badrug pa mar me me tog bshos// gtor ma bdud rtsi rak+ta dang // gtsog zungs lhag pa'i byang chub sems// mchod pa gsang ba'i yo byad do// dur khrod sha wag la sogs
38a3(rnying rgyud): khyi sbyang wa 'phar shakhrug dang // mang zhag 'o ma khrag rnams sman// ma mo bsten pa'i yo b+ha dang // rabs chad nag po'i thod pa dang // lugs sA lnga yi phung ba ni// dades sri mnan pa'i yo byad do// mdzes pa'i gtor ma phung pa bcu// 'bang ba mtshams
38a4(rnying rgyud): zad do// yun chenako bkag lpags dang // dar gyi snying non phyag rgya'i phu rung dang // cod pan kod g.yogs srad dkris phul rgyan rnams// sngags pa rgyan gyi yo byad do// mAMs pany+dzadza gad tshe// tshim byed kun tu rgyug pa dang // gal gyi ka ta ri dang rnatshos rang
38a5(rnying rgyud): b+ha tho maT+Ta d+has as la// 'byor pa tshogs kyi so byung ngo // sman dang lba ba gtsags ma ni// dad 'joms can gyis byung ngo // glo dang thab dang mtshon cha rnams// bar chad das bzlog yo cad do// b+ha na ga wag nag bsngal ba'i zhing // nyams chag
38a6(rnying rgyud): dang rkyen bzlog yo byud // de ltar bstan pa'i yo byad rnams// sgrub po lo zhwa'i po byad wAb tuH// masmra ba dang ma sbe ga'i// tshogs par 'grub 'khor the tshom med// byang chub sems ni n+ya yin te// gyi ma'i rkyen gyi tshul d+ha gnas// rtswa rkye
38a7(rnying rgyud): pas 'bras bu chud mi za// 'dzag pa'i ngas rtsod bstan pa 'i// rnal 'thor bslab pa 'dini ldanan/ med sa 'angs// stong su kun tu sgrub pa'i du myo ris// sa togs don du 'di bstan no// dbyar dgun mod dpyad nam smib nga
38b1(rnying rgyud): dbyar gyi ngo la 'jug pa ni// dbyar dgun ston kyid kladus so// sdug grang ta bya'i nyi ma la// lurang bu mig dmar nyi ma pa wa sangs// rtsal stod rgyal spad sro dang la// nyi ma skar ma gza' dus su// yo byad ma lus tshogs 'gyur na// thub pa la 'jug
38b2(rnying rgyud): drimadzod yin// mtshugs par dungs rtsod me// ces pas ni/ phyis rjes su 'jug pa'i gang ngag rnams can su ma chogs pa drug gdon gyis rtsub pa'i gzhi bzung ba la mgo mi tshungs par 'gyur ro// derje sra pa gsang ba'i rgyud med pa las/ gnas
38b3(rnying rgyud): drug gis sgrub pa'i gzhi bzung ba/ zhus len du bstan pa'i le'u skya bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'das pa'i sras mchog kIl yas/ gyi rabs kyi rnal 'thor ba rnams/ sngon su bya ba'i cho ga la mgo ma mongs par za ba'i phying / bco
38b4(rnying rgyud): 'das de rje khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu ma la 'di skad ces gsolato// e mgos ngas rgyas rgyal ba'i mcho// rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'gyor pas// sngon du Na bya'i las ni gang // rdzal mchog khyod kyis banyan du gsol// zhes gsol te/
38b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni/ rnal 'byor sngon du bya ba'i las// don dam kun rdzob gsum yin te// don dam sngon du 'gro ba ni// 'bras bu ye shes tshogs 'dod kyir// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// bsam gtan gyi ni phyag
38b6(rnying rgyud): lngas// lus sems mnyam par bzhag byas te// stong pa chen po'i ting 'dzin ni// dom pa don ni byang chub sams// su rkyen gang las mthung zhing // mi 'gyur byang chub brtan par bzung // sun rdzob sngon du 'gro bani// bdag nyid
38b7(rnying rgyud): oM byang chub sems// bad gshegs pas bcas sun dzang gzhugs gsol dmigs// phyag 'tshal mthong ba ci 'byor 'a'ad// sdig bshags pa rang skabs gsol zhing // 'gro ba masus don mi phyir// snying rje mchog gis gan pa
39a1(rnying rgyud): ngasasu / ltag na sa/ na / mdum du /
39a2(rnying rgyud): med pa rnams la bcangs// dmangs padi te/ sa shing migs thapa la// gas pa 'ad 'ati na na'adad pa// dardzu' du na mad
39a3(rnying rgyud): zas dbus smra sa bzhin dmyigs pa'i nas// dus gsas 'a grags pan pan dang sa rtson// maud kyi dza gas pa/ nan sa la pag ma mas// sa ngang la gnas nas /
39a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po maud cig ces// sngo thung bzhin du gas la ba gdag// de nas kyi shi po nas ni// de rje'i skabs dang po pa gang// rdo rje mi stobs kun bltas te// bar cid bragags bsrad kyil 'khor bkrung // gzung 'as 'thung
39a5(rnying rgyud): byas na// de la bar chad yongs mi 'thung // gzhung dang mi ldan las byas cing // ngal 'a'i tshe chad don med 'thar// des nanan tan pa sring pa \u0f7f// skyeg ni dam pa 'astan pa ni// rin chen bum pa brgyad nang la// gtsang tha dag byas rje yis
39a6(rnying rgyud): phyag gzis nas gdun la bzhag/ bgegs bskyang bsang gAshor dis par bya// gong zhid dang las gzhal yas khang // gcig ni las te gnyis pa mchod pa yin// gsum pa khams gsum nas tshal te// wapa tsham bu'i dkyil 'khor bsrer
39a7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// mchod pa gsum gyis nges mchod la// lA man ni kran lnga zhing // sngags dang ting 'dzin gas la rtogs nas// brgyan btsugs te gzungs thag ga gas// rdo rje'i bzlas pa pa kya bcad// sarnams
39b1(rnying rgyud): kun la chang bar za// thos pa ma lags rgyal ba lags// rgyal po thags kyis btab nas ni// rgyal ba chen por mnga' gsol gyis// rgyal po'i tshul du 'azhugs su gsol// b+ha nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzogs nas// mda' dang phur nA ra ru rmA
39b2(rnying rgyud): dang // me long dar s+tha srang srud dang // dbu rgyan snying nan phyag rgya'i phu rung dang // stod g.yogs smad dkris dkar por tha// dbang du gsol ba'i lha mo nyid// mchod nas sa gzhi nyid la bstim// lo brang dbus nas sgo bzhi ru// dri yi thig le ba'i
39b3(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mdzes byas la// spyan dang bstim mchod gsal gdapal// rdo rje 'chang chen 'di zhes pas// nam langs gyur nas dkyil 'khor bri// khyed rnams la ni mchod byed dang // slob ma rjes su gzung ba'i phyir//
39b4(rnying rgyud): rab tu bsten te 'jug par bya// sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod// sngon tshe dbang mdzad lha mo khyod// bdag cag sgrib skyong tshogs skyed phyir// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du// sta gon la ni bzhugs su gsol// oM AHhUM swA hA dz+nyA na paH
39b5(rnying rgyud): hU~M phaT/ au d+hu pa sid+d+hi hU~M/ rat+na maN+Da la sed+d+hi hU~M/ bru hi ga d+ha sid+d+hi b+h+r-i/ a mr-i ta A be sha a a/ au AMHhU~M si d+hi gu ru a/ pany+tsa le ka A be shA A/ kal+la br-ik+Sha hU~M AH/ glo ldan khrus kyis dag byas nas// mdun bstar me tog lag thogs
39b6(rnying rgyud): nas// phye rgas na dang 'chi ba yi// chu srin por sogs 'jigs byed pas// 'dod par mdzad pa khyod 'ba' zhig/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas// mgon po chen po bdag la stsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pas// dam tshig chen
39b7(rnying rgyud): po bdag 'a stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la srol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gyol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po ched pos gzhug tu gsol// dbang ldan phyogs su dkyil
40a1(rnying rgyud): 'ang na/ choms pa dang ldan pa ga// bkyang du nyis grags rjod gapasas// / na tan+d+ra d+hIH/ bas ma/ badz+rasaHhU~M/ bar+d+has+'u Sh+Ta/ thugs gags sa ka thas nas// samya ngag ya dgas na nga
40a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // nas zar la ni dgod pa'i phyir// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzod cig/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// khyod ni tshul chen sdod yin pas// gsang sngags spyod tshul mog ne// khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// dam tshig dam pa bstan par
40a3(rnying rgyud): bya'o// byang chub sems kyang bgyed par bya// 'khor ba dag las bslab par bya'o// dkyil 'khor chen por gzhug par bya// gyi nang gsang ba'i dbang bskur bgyi// da ni dad par rab tu skyed// A~M Amr-i ta ba Na li hU~M / bsrung badzod
40a4(rnying rgyud): du bsrung phud la// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis gdab// slob ma'i dpung pa g.yas par bcings// lus kyi nyes padag pa dang // bsung dang sa gon gnas par mdzod// oM badz+ra a 'dzes sham pa drin phaT/ ngur khrod so seng dong ba nyid
40a5(rnying rgyud): ngag gi nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor gang du rab tu dor// dbang gis lhas rnams bstan du gsal// bi mu rjes bzhini hU~M phaT/ sa sha ma sho d+ha ya/ sarba na ya hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi chen po chu nyid las// gsang ba'i sngags kyis
40a6(rnying rgyud): btab nas ni// thung nas lus kyi nyes pa dag/ sta gon la ni gnas par mchod// theg pa gzhan nas ldog bya'i cing // theg pa chen po'i slob bskyed// bdag nyid chen po'i 'khor rnams kyis// de ring bdag nyid thob pa nyid// gang gi
40a7(rnying rgyud): khyed cag rgyal ba kun// sras dang bcas pas bstan 'di la// kye bzhin pa na bdag chen gyis// thams cad yongs su 'dzin la gnas// de la na khyed cag theg chen la// rigs bzang po rnga nges par 'gyur// de yi lam mchog dpal dang lda
40b1(rnying rgyud): theg pa chen po las byung ba'i// khyed rnams kyis ni bgrod gyur pa'i// ma 'ongs pa na bder gshegs 'gyur// yod med dag las rnas par 'das// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// chos rnams kun la zab gyur cing // rab tu spros te gnas med pas
40b2(rnying rgyud): spros pa thams cad spangs pa yin// rab spos rnams kyis rab tu spros// theg pa chen po'i tshul gnas na// 'di nyid du ni chos thos 'gyur// seng ge'i nyal thabs rab tu brtags// ku sha l+ya gu rtse ma nyams// de las byung ba spyi bor gzugs// danan//
40b3(rnying rgyud): dag stan du gding bar bya// 'di ru nyol la ji lta bar// rmi lam mthong ba ston cig ces// de skad brjod la slob ma bskul// de nas sa stegs gru bzhi la// dam rdzas bdud rtsis ga dar bya'o// srad bu dog pa kha dog lnga// ma nor phyogs bzhag mchod pa
40b4(rnying rgyud): bshams// bde gshegs rigs lnga'i rgyal ba la// mchod gsol ye shes thig blangs nas// srad bu nyid la thim gyur nas// blo ldan grogs mchog yid 'ong gzugs// gsal bar ldan nam byin gyis brlab// chags bskyed sbyor ba'i brdas bskul
40b5(rnying rgyud): te// byang chub sems ni bsnol mar ba nyims// srang bu nyed kyang byang chub sems// de las rdo rje'i skur gyur te// dag pa tshangs pa'i thig gis ni// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gsal bar bya// de nas thig cha rim par dbye// mtshan ma ye shes thig tu gsal//
40b6(rnying rgyud): rin chen lnga yi bye ma la// yang na 'bu swa na ma dza ste// yang nas dang rdo la \u0f7f// byin brlams bsam chud nges par bzhab// mkhas pas thogs la dkyil 'khor bri// srad bu'i tshad ni dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur te// sar pa legs bkal dgra bsgril pa/
40b7(rnying rgyud): mdzes shing gsher bar byas pa yis// dang la tshangs thig gdab bya ste// bla ma shing 'phro ldan nub// bdag nyid me lha'i mtshams 'dug ste// blo ldan rlung gi phyogs song ste// tshangs thig dang po gdab par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gom
41a1(rnying rgyud): stabs kyis// bdag nyid lho yi phyogs song ste// blo ldan gnod sbyin phyogs 'dod ste// tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab par bya// bdag nyid srin po'i phyogs song la// blo ldan byang shar nyid song ste// bu thig gnyis
41a2(rnying rgyud): gdab par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis// bskor nas me lha'i phyogs song ste// shar gyi thig cha rim par dbye'o// phyogs gzhan de bzhin bsgyur te gdab// gdab pa srad bu'i thig tu gsungs// kha dog don ni rigs dang wAr
41a3(rnying rgyud): re khA gri so bslang ba 'dra// mtshon rtsi kha ba bab pa bzhin// g.yas su bskor zhing rgyun mi gcad// ye shes thig la mi 'gong ste// ting nge 'dzin gyis 'og nas 'dzul bar bya// dbus su sngags kyi bdag po ni// rdo rje gzugs dang bcas par dri/
41a4(rnying rgyud): cho ga bzhin du mdzes par dgod// spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal te// 'khor los sgyur dang rin chen 'byung // pad+ma 'chang dang sna tshogs las// phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i gdan dag la// gzugs dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o// phyi rol 'khor lo
41a5(rnying rgyud): rtsibs brgyang la// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// rim pas spel te dgod par bya// bar khyams la ni thub drug ste// sgo bzhi sgo srung 'khor dang bcas// sru 'am phyag rgya 'am yi ge'am// ma nges pa ni rgyal bas gsungs//
41a6(rnying rgyud): za re 'phran gdug la sogs dang // rgyal mtshan brgyad nyid 'bar 'dra gzug/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // mchod dang rol mo ci 'byor 'bad// dkyil 'khor bca' ba'i rim pa'o// cho ga'i rim pa bstan pa ni// bskyed dang dbang
41a7(rnying rgyud): bslar rim pa dag/ sngon kyang bzhin du rjes 'jug pa// de nas nal 'byor can gyis ni// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// mchod dang bstod pa'i las kyang bya// mnyes nas nye bar 'grub pa'o// 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan pa
41b1(rnying rgyud): na// danas ma na ngag yodas te/ ga sa bathad pas sa tod bdug durtan/ dkyis namo na thanas pal 'byed// ma brda 'dug tugazang // sems d+ha da bdag tul bas// mya bang pa dad byangs sags na
41b2(rnying rgyud): sbrul dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu// las gang spyod pa ci la dga'// bdag ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dug par 'tshal te bag chags kyis// bsgribs pa rab tu sbyangs byas te// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang ni nod par 'tshal lags
41b3(rnying rgyud): so// khyod ni de ltar 'dod yin na// snod dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid dang // dang pa chen po'i snga ltas su// yon dang dad pa ci zhig yod// bdag gi lus dang srog la ma chags par// rta dang glang po nor gyi dbyig/ gser dngul b+ha ris zor lcogs
41b4(rnying rgyud): dang // g.yu dang b+ha ru man shIl dang // ga yi spang dang zab gos kyi mchog/ 'bangs dang rkang 'gros yul mkhar rnams// ma zhum pa yis dbul bar bya// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// byang chub
41b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i tshul bstan pa// zhi ba'i dam tshig bdag la stsol// dpa' bo chen po dbang gi lha// sdom pa bdag la bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas gar mkhan las byung ba'i// gsang ba chen por 'jug par 'tshal// phyir mi ldog pa'i dkyil 'khor
41b6(rnying rgyud): du// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang mchog sbyar// gsang ba kun gyis rigs tshogs su// bdag ni ma 'ongs slob dpon shog/ de ring khyod kyi snying la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gnas// gal te tshul 'di dral
41b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur na// skad cig gcig gis drab te gshegs// de bas dam las ma'ada' zhig/ I brjod ka N+yai// de reng phan cang bu khyod kyi// phyag na rdo rjeng yin gyi// nga yis ji skad bsgo ba bzhin// nges pa kho nar bya dgos so// bdag 'a smad par/
42a1(rnying rgyud): ma byad cig/ gal ta smad par byas nani// ma yi 'du byed bas nas kyang // dam rgya 'di yis rkyen byas nas// dmyal ba'i rdo rjer 'gyur tA // skal dang ldan pa rigs rjes// khyod kyis bsrung bar zab do// nga nga
42a2(rnying rgyud): sman mi spang // sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mig cad// gsang ba gzhan la shel miH// spagasang thugs kyi ma tshig ste// rtswa ga'i dam tshig des thub na// dam chu 'di yis glen byas nus// ye shes sems dpa' byed du 'gyur// me tog zu ba/
42a3(rnying rgyud): bzang po 'di// dkyil 'khor gtso bo rab drung dor// 'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis// sma nu bar dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// prad+hits+tsha ho// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rig pa'i me tog 'di bor bas// gang la bab pa rigs
42a4(rnying rgyud): kyi lha// gtso bor rigs te bsgrubs nas ni// dngos grub rigs ni the tshom med// skal ldan khyod la sbyin par bya// de ring phan chad bu khyod kyi// mtshan ni rdo rje che ge zhes// rdo rje kun grags yin par nges// rdo rje'i mtshan gyis kun grags shog
42a5(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis// gser gyi gtsigs bu thogs nas ni// mig gi lid tog bsal ba ltar// thugs rje ye shes thabs ldan pas// mi shes pa yi rab rib dang // ma rig mun pa bsal du gsol// deng khyod rdo rje sems dpa'
42a6(rnying rgyud): yis// mig kun nye bar zhi mdzad pa'i// mig dbye ba lnga brtson par bya'o// rdo rje'i mig ni bla med 'gyur// badz+ra tAn tsa t+ya pra be sha phaT/ chos rnams gzugs brtan 'dra ba yi// rang bzhin dag pas rtog pa med// gzugs brtan gsal ba'i
42a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ci// kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog/ dkyil 'khor 'di la dag nyid// dad pa'i thugs kyis blta bar gyis// khyod kyang sangs rgyas rigs las skyes// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs kyi// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la nyos//
42b1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra maN+Da la sgrub ga ho// mya ngan mi 'da' thugs rje dang // nyon mongs mi grong gos pa med// ma chags rang bzhin dag bas na// bad+ma' gdan la bzhugs sngags la// dbang bskub par bstan pa ni/ byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas kyis// brdan/
42b2(rnying rgyud): pa chen po ji ltar byin// bdag kyang bskal ba'i don slad du// nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag dbang sgyur// rin po che yi dbang 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gsungs te// mkhas pa kun gyis phyag byas pa'i// gnas las byung ba smin par bya'o/
42b3(rnying rgyud): thu gsang ba gsang mchog mya ngan 'das// de la sogs pa gsang ba kun// don du brtags shing mnyan pa las// kun la bsgrag par bya ba min// d+harma d+hA tu maN+Da la hU~M A be sha AH/ hrIHbye ba brgyad cu'i sgra dbyangs kyis// gang 'dod sdes pa
42b4(rnying rgyud): tshim par byos// shes rab don gyi dmigs dang sbar// che chung don gyis so sor bsgrags// yongs la bsgrag par bya ba min// A~M d+harma d+ha tu pra be sha phaT/ ha yi 'bar ba'i tshogs mchog la// ka rma'i tshogs mchog gsal spro thim// khyod ni
42b5(rnying rgyud): las rnams byed pa yin// rnam bzhi'i phrin las kun byos shig/ oM baM mA yA ma N+Da la sid+hi d+h+waM/ rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung // gnyis med rgyal bas mnyes mchod ba// bde gshegs rgyal ba can dang
42b6(rnying rgyud): spor// sa mi tad+d+hi badz+ra kA ya badz+ra trA~M/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten stong gsum du// rigs mchog rnams kyi phyag rgya tshul// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa por// thams cad ma lus dbang rnams byin// oM AHhU~M swa hA/ ma hA guru tra~M// glegs
42b7(rnying rgyud): ngamachag shing rdo rje dril bu dang // chog gsum ldan ma tshod phyag rgya rnams// rnab lce dang snying mgo lag pa g.yas pa ru// oM AHhU~M swAhA/ rin che ba d+ma rdo rje 'khor lo gzhal yas su// 'jo 'dus rigs gsol ldan dang mang
43a1(rnying rgyud): ga pas mas da pa na bas sa// sasu grags rab lags dang // gnas da byas pargya ba sa// da na byamasam tags// dngas
43a2(rnying rgyud): sa// rdo rigs kyi tham chog sa// bang dag sems kyi gta tshogs pazhin// zas gang bzhin rnams sabyungs// tham pa rten tsong d+hA dang / gang po ma dang drug na gi sum dang / zang gdun na rababang bad+ha da
43a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs sumaHsa gsol ba'i// ji gar ba skams pa tsam gyis ni// yi chu ni dag pa'i// dbang mchog dam pa bskur bar bya// sI na maHsarbata thA ga ta ya ka~M rashA ta sa ma ya trAM/ sangs rgyas bran gyi rin chen che// dpag tu med pa'i 'od
43a4(rnying rgyud): sa sum sa
43a5(rnying rgyud): zhing // 'khor ba'i nyes pas mi gos pa'i// mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang thob par zhog/ At+ya thA ga tu badz+ra l-i thA ya tsi Shi tra traM/ e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yi ge gsung gi phyag d+ha'i tshogs// gsung gi de nyid bsdus pa'i don// de
43a6(rnying rgyud): bas snying po sa yis dbang bskur ro// // de bsnyen gshegasu pa kun tu khrags/ / rdur 'brim tshan // thA byA r+b+ha nA me dbang bzung // badz+ra kA ra brda'i na ma gyi phyu/
43a7(rnying rgyud): gshes ca ces// mtshan dengad nga byed pa'i kyin// rje' thozhigs rgyan// debs gas ngas bang ba// sa / rangs / bkram ma nye gas/ ba
43b1(rnying rgyud): da ma gzung/ sa sargyas can mam bcugs pa// m+WA bar gyur// dbas rlu bas dpang ga// ya du sa gyu// / ma can mas
43b2(rnying rgyud): chen bsrung // debs go chas dbang bskur ro// badz+rak+Sha mA tse badz+rar tsA ts+tshits+tsha/ gzugs mdos gser kyi yu ba can// skyabs chen byams pa chen po ste// nyon mongs gdung bsil ba'i rtags// debs gadregs kyis dab ga ra/
43b3(rnying rgyud): Ad+ha ra dzA a ti ShiH T+Thi/ bzang dang bca' dang 'thung ba'i tshogs// kha mngar phy-ir ba rlag ro mchog ste// rnga byad tsho dang b+hU rgyas dang // tshe 'dzin mIs kun tuH// choms byed 'jam des zhal zas kyis// nyin mtshan rtag tu bde legs shog
43b4(rnying rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tA spang sa ma ya d+haM/ gsarab nang gi dbang bskur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// me tog phung po'i dkyil 'khor bya// rab bskyed sun drang mchod byas la// rigs kyi pra las khu ba dbul
43b5(rnying rgyud): gzung ma byin pa rlabs te// gsang babyang chub sems kyi dbyar// 'dod pa del sbyin par bya// rigs pa dang nyi bu lon pa'am// mtshan ldan sems thebs gang du babyung // regasung namatshan dun sems mi thabs// da ni spang bar bya ba na
43b6(rnying rgyud): phan pon bstan par bla ba ni// dbang mchog bya sbyar bas bu mchog de// 'jig rten mi lces mchod cing bkur// bdeg shegs rnams kyis sras su dgongs// lha mo rnams kyis grogs su mthong // chos spong sbyar mas rdzir grogs byed
43b7(rnying rgyud): byeng mi 'grib kyang / 'khor ba bcas shing bsam par dru// mi drabyung byas na thong // rig brjong sa 'a nges par 'a'// byang chus tshog drug du marje// ga'am chos pa ga/ las
44a1(rnying rgyud): sa nga bas kyang // zhag zangs ta thu \u0f7f ba rgyan chang nga// gos sam ma lags pakam nas// chag ngom pa 'dubyas// dgas bamams da// 'dag la nus ga// gzha
44a2(rnying rgyud): tan dpag las 'das// skyon gyi rim pa bstan pa ni// blam mnyes par ma byas sam// dam med dbang rnams ma mnos nas// nyan 'chad sgom zhing las byed dang // rdo rje bla ma byed pa dag/ tshe thung dmyal ba'i gnas suM lcang // 'jig ce
44a3(rnying rgyud): 'dir yang gnod pa dag/ 'khor du mi nang phyugs nad 'byung // yul du sa dang ser ba 'bebs// 'jig rten mi yi ya ga dang // de yi skyon du shes par bya'o// las kyi mtha' bsdus bstan pa ni// gtor mtsho gsum gnas su gtang /
44a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs dang bkrus dang gzugs brnyan zhal phyis la// lus bsrung gi bgo bka' nan spyong lam bya'o// zab pa'i dbang gsum dbang bskur na// gzungs ma de dang de dag la// yon yang bla ma'i phyed shas dbul// dam tshig bslangs de dra
44a5(rnying rgyud): da ldan par bya// ma byas pas na mnar med 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ zhi ba rjes su bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la yas/ phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi ngo
44a6(rnying rgyud): du drag po'i las bya ba'i dmigs gang la bya ba 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rdo rje khros pa'i yab/ dka' thub can gyi dregs pa chen po de// mngon sbyor rol pas bskal ba e me haM/ ngo mtshar che'o// e ma ho ya mtshan can no// de
44a7(rnying rgyud): spyong ba rnal 'byor pas// bskal ba'i dmigs ni ga la bya// de yi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol// zhes klas so// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pa'i yab chen pos bka' stsal pa ni/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus 'a' sra// kun la bya ba ba
44b1(rnying rgyud): las med// dam tshig nyams pa bskal ba'i zhing // dam tshig ma shes dam can bka' gcog pa// 'di ni bsgral ba'i zhing du gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa bskal zhing ni// srog don bka' dam las kyis nyams// mtshan ma 'dod pas nyam
44b2(rnying rgyud): dang bdun// pha ma mkhan po slob ma gsod// rdo rje nang dme byed pa dang // srog las nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing // slob dpon bka' bsgra mngan dang dbye yi sems// sngags dang phyag rgya chun gcod gsang ba gzhan la spel// don las nya
44b3(rnying rgyud): pas bsgral ba'i zhing // gsang sngags tshul khyod rnal 'byor la// chu mtshangs bru zhing yag 'dogs// bka' la skur 'debs 'khor rnams log par khrid// rtags kyi don bstan log par 'dzin// bka' las nyams pas bskal ba'i zhing /
44b4(rnying rgyud): spar ba'i gzhi byed lta ba rgyab tu bor// spyod pa log pa dang du len cing spyod// bka' yi gzhung por phyin ci log la mkhas// dam las nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing // sngon chad mkhon pa'i gzhi med par// rgod cing bzhin ldog nyes med gzhan laganang
44b5(rnying rgyud): du 'jug/ bdag gis nyes par ma dran par// bdag la mthu dang rtsal 'dod pas// las kyis nyams pas bskal ba'i zhing // gnyis med don la phyogs char 'dzin// lta ba sgo sbyar ras chod zhe gcod pa'i// skye med chos bshad mtshan ma'i chos su
44b6(rnying rgyud): gzung // lha srin bran du ngas 'khol gyi// mthu 'gran byed pa su zhig yod// nga nyid dpal yin nyams sum mo byung // zer zhing gzhan la khro zhing 'tsho// mtshan mas nyams pas bskal ba'i zhing // shes rab rnam gsum gsal med par// gzhan
44b7(rnying rgyud): pas mthu che btsan 'dod pas// las kyi gtso ru mtshan ma sbyod// rang gi 'o gdor khrag thugs te// mi thong zhing chen lag na thogs// dmar drod glo la btags nas 'jig rten ma mo bsten cing 'bod// spyod pa'i don por mi 'tsham las rnams
45a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ da// btso rang ba'i spyod pas bka' gzang kyang / nal 'byong ba la lag 'dang // dus gsums ngas nas zhabs nas drangs/ 'byur ba'i nul ba'i thugs dang 'gapa// gab ma mang gzhan rtogs pad
45a2(rnying rgyud): mchog sa mas mi bA na sems kyi nor byas nas// shi bar shes kyang 'dod pas bsngal// phung bar shes kyang sngags brgyad 'joms// gnyen zhing brgyan yang thabs kyis skrong// thob tu 'dod nas gsang sngags su// bza' rgya 'dod nas sgrub pazang /
45a3(rnying rgyud): pu da dang longs spyod bkrus nas zla// dug tu shes kyang lton za// 'dod pas nyams pa bskal ba'i zhing // 'di ning ma nyams bsngal bar bstan pa'o// dam tshig mi shes dam can bka' gcog gi// gsang sngags gzung sprod rnal 'byor ma// snga
45a4(rnying rgyud): bar byed na pha yang rung // gnod par byed nam yang rung // gnad du 'dzug na glan yang rung // dam las ldog na mched kyang rung // snying ring byed na grogs kyang rung // de ni bka' gcog bsgral ba'i zhing // de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos
45a5(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ de ltar bskal ba'i zhing de la// bskal ba'i yon tan ci ltar lags// ma bskal ba la skyon ni gang // zhes gsungs pas/ rdo rje khros pa'i yab kyis bka' stsal pa// bskal ba'i yon tan 'di lta ste// de dag bskal bas
45a6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor btsun// bdud rnams btul nas snyan pa gnyan// dam med basbal na bar chad nyung// med par gyur na bstan pargyas// nyams pa med na dkon mchog che// de bas yon tan bsam mi khyab// ma bskal ba yi skyon bstan pa//
45a7(rnying rgyud): de myal khams 'phel la mtho ma 'amig/ gzhung thod nal 'apyod srid phrag nas// gsang sngags theg pa'i chos sgo 'gag/ dam chos spa dang ji gzhir gyur nas// don la mi mthun skyon yod do// rdo rje thar ba gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las
45b1(rnying rgyud): bskal ba'i dmigs pa bstan pa'o ma thag bcol // / donasas mas pa'i stsal bar/ na 'das pa rgyug thos 'driskad nas gsoso// mam da pal min ba bad smra// 'phrul du nams bstan pang/
45b2(rnying rgyud): srame brna bu 'am thabs kyis bsgral// zhes gsos pas/ rdo rje dpal che na pos bku smras pa// mngon sum bskal ba ma yin gyi// thabs kyis rim pas bskal bar bya'o// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pasu gsos pa// thabs kyis bsgral pa
45b3(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa na// dmigs pa'i nyid ni bya// bka' bal ba/ dmigs pabyin ni yin no// ming+ge'i dam pa di ltang lags// bzlab stsal pa/ grog ma khar spya dang mi grangs// gangs kyi rnam thu du na thub// grub rgya pom khrid chen
45b4(rnying rgyud): ras// nga ni srong ngos dang // thal tshun dang ni raka dang // gshang ba' ma ni ga cib ste// bcag nyis thod pa nang du brjid// grI bad kI li tI la a m+b+ha n+dA ra a ke n+da ya hU~M phaT// zhug zug thug gcin gyis byas// A~M badz+ra kI pi k+Shi la
45b5(rnying rgyud): sa sham b+hi shwa d+ha ba~M khA hU~M phaT// dungur khrod mu ga'i rla dag la// dgra dang bragegs kyi gzugs brtan bya// A~M badz+ra k+She mi kI la ya nr-i tre mA ra ya phaT a/ de la gong gi dam rdzas byug/ k+Sho badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ oM rAk+sha hU~M phaT/ mkhar nag skud pas ske nas
45b6(rnying rgyud): gdags// hU~M ba rdo kI li kI la ya ya thA hU~M maM/ de nig bri 'di yin na// shing thun nan gang bag ci ga ni// del dab bgegs gzugs brtan bya// de ni gzing ba'i mthung bshad// rams mthoga'i mgog shos bya// dgra bgegs
45b7(rnying rgyud): gzugs partan rdzogs the te// 'am gas nig la gdags pa ni// 'di na bgab pa'i 'dzin// mning nag pa rjod pa la// khrag sum 'bang ba drug la// lan laganas dang gas gnas \u0f7f/ thugs sacos nakhor mjug/ mtha
46a1(rnying rgyud): krud dum thos pad// 'dur 'jug na s+ho// gas dang bya samathun bab pa/ das gags slong dag gas na/ sa sa// dpal ga sa pa gang dang // gsas
46a2(rnying rgyud): g.yon du ngan// 'dos su su mA ra ya yang dgong // 'di na gnan pa'i yin do// rdo rje myung ba gsang bzhi rgyud chen po las/ dam bgegs kyi gzugs byartan bza' ba'i 'adz+ra ste bathug pa do// / de nas yang rdo rje 'das pa'i sras ma
46a3(rnying rgyud): yas// 'di skad ces gsol to// gong du bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i// mi shes mongs la bstan pa'i phyir// gzugs brtan bca' ba'i dkyil 'khor chog gang // rjes 'jug don du bstan du gsol// rdo rje khros pas bka' stsal pa// sa dang
46a4(rnying rgyud): mtshams drang go ma yi// thig dang tshon dang phyag rgya dgod// rgyan dang mchod rdzas phyag btsal ba'o// sngon tshe dbang mdzad lha mo la// spyan drangs mchod don gsol pa ni// bar chad bgegs rnams zhi ba dang // sa yi dngos grub bdag la rdo la//
46a5(rnying rgyud): akra ma sid+d+hi b+h+rUM/ phyag na rdo rje dbang gi mthus// ri rab kyi bzhi'i phyogs bzhi nas// dpal ldan rgyal po chen po bzhis// phyogs srungs re bskong du gsol// bar du gcod pa mtshams chod cig/ bi shra ba Na ye/ dz+r-i b+ha rAShA le/ zang /
46a6(rnying rgyud): D+ha ka ye/ bai ru pAk+Sha ye/ sa ma ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas chen 'dir// las kyi dbang gis bar chad byed// bka' las 'da' byed dam sri 'di// gnun cing spa rA ba'i dus la bab// kI la ya mA ra ya/ rak+ka raka to tse gyang / d+hI
46a7(rnying rgyud): badz+ra swA hA/ dkar dmar ljang ser mthing sogs pa// rigs lnga'i byin rlab ye shes 'od// ma 'dres ra ri med pa'i mdog/ rigs rnams so sor kha dog gsal/ kI li kI la ya oM AHhUM swA hA/ maN+Da la sid+d+hi b+h+yo/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas
46b1(rnying rgyud): rnams// sngags dang phyag ma ting 'dzin gyis// ma sa'i gsung du byin brlabs nas// mchog tu mdzes pa dgam par byan// A mA hA thAnas mA ra zla// thugs pas 'byung ba lang+ge tul bzlas// ma dag bcwa rnams kyang bcad nas/
46b2(rnying rgyud): rnam thar la ni dgod pa'i phyir// cho ga bzhin du phur pas gdab// ma dag pa rnams tshang chod cig/ garda hA na da ha pa tsa tan+da/ hu wa tiHs+t+wa~Mn+da bin+d+ha s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ thabs dang shes rab ldan byas la// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thig btab pas
46b3(rnying rgyud): bder gshegs rgyal bya'i bzhugs gnas la// rdo rje thig cha rim+ba par dbye// e maN+Da la badz+ra sid+d+hin+tan/ gnod nas dag pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga// sku lnga ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas// bder gshegs rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas pa shams/
46b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang // drang ba'i don phyir gzhal yas chag chag gdab// A~M aHdz+dza swAH/ sarba bawA ya mri ti ma N+Da la sid+d+hi hU~M phaT/ sra 'am gsung ste phyag rgya thugs// dbus nis mtha' yi sgo bzhin// rdo rje srin pong lha rnams sman// bdag pa
46b5(rnying rgyud): rim par bzhugs su ga so// sa mA la tI/ badz+ra phan/ zhing chen shA ra zhin gzugs rgyal mtshan dang // wA wa~M ras ro sa ma dram gardzas zag// 'jigs byed chen po rjeng ky-im la ba la// gangs bcas don dngang sman zhing dgod bar bya'o//
46b6(rnying rgyud): ma hA rak+ta ko sgeg ta mata pyA hU~M// rdo rje srin po'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rna la 'byor spyan grogs rnams// mthu'i 'dra shes nyi du bzhag nas// rnal 'byor spyod mchog phyag bgyid do// shrI badz+ran mo// rtsi nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas rnams/
46b7(rnying rgyud): 'gres phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis// khrisong gzhung du byin 'azungs te// mchog tu mdzes pa dmam par bya// ma hA bla ngas ma hUM/ rje brang ba gsang ba'i skad can pa pas/ sgrib badza kyil 'khor gzugs brtan du 'aza' ba 'arje ste ba
47a1(rnying rgyud): bdun pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das khros pa'i rgyal po la/ 'di skad ces gsol te// drar khrod 'bar ba'i gnas chen dra// dregs byed rnams ni bskal ba bzhin// rjes su 'jug par
47a2(rnying rgyud): rnal dpyor pas// bskal ba'i gnas ni gang du bya// rdo rje khros pas bka' stsal pa// bskal ba'i gnas ni don bshad pa// de yang rtogs pa'i tshad dang sbyar// sems la chos nyid mi gas la zhed// nyams dang ting 'dzin g.yel ba yis/
47a3(rnying rgyud): ba pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po de// shar lho byang shar gang rung du// rdo rje drag po'i las bya'o// der ni nges 'grub phung 'tsheng med// dam tshig nges thub ting 'dzin brtan pa'i blo// don spyod rtags kyi blo can gyis// drag po'i gnas su bya ba la// gsang ba
47a4(rnying rgyud): tsi ma can gyi// ga tsug ga drug pa mtshogs so// ga ng+ge 'dri ma tha~Mng thag// sani dru gsus ma dang nga// tshogs padra zod tha~Mng maudan// tshe mtshan gyi gdung ga nga // tshig gang gdun pa med pa dang // thab pa rung ma
47a5(rnying rgyud): dang // dmas grogs po gting zab dang // stag gi so 'dra sbrul gyi lce// sdig pa'i rwa 'dra chu srin kha// ba glang sna mtha' brag dang chu yi bar// rkang gcig shing dang ma rungs pa// sngon chad lha mi'i g.yul sa dang // g.yul bgyi ba dang mtshon 'thab dang //
47a6(rnying rgyud): bsar bcang sa dang ma rungs pa// srin po bskal pa'i bcas gzhi dang // srog chags bsad pa'i khrag rjes dang // g.yul dor bskol ba'i sa mkhar rnams// mang po bsad pa'i phyung ba'i sa// zag ni srin po rus pa 'dra// raM ni thal phung snyil ba 'dra/
47a7(rnying rgyud): de'is bsreg pa 'dra// shing rtsi rkang thar bros pa 'dra// skasgang de'u mi ro phyang pa 'dra// dur khrod gnas dang shing gcig zung // rgya gram lam dang 'byung po'i srang // drag po'i las 'di bya bar shis// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje bur pa gsang ba'i
47b1(rnying rgyud): rgyud chen po las/ bskal ba'i gnas bstan pa'i lebru sta bco brgyad dpa // / de nas yang rdorje 'dus pas/ 'du skad ces gsalate// byam ho/ rdon khros pa'i sku gsung thugs gzhon nu// rdzas s+ya sgrub pa nam 'byung dang // bskam
47b2(rnying rgyud): dkyi ya 'khor gang lags pa// bder gshegs khyod kyis bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ sngags mkhan dag gi yon tan ni// rigs kyi rnal 'byor gral du smos// tshul bzang ngang tshul bzang la shis pa des// dang po shes rab rnam gsum
47b3(rnying rgyud): gyis// gtan tshig don la yid ches nas// de nas nges par dbang thob ste// theg pa mtha' dag sems la gsal// phyog med lta ba gdeng du 'jog/ sgrub pa rnam gnyis rgyal por bsrubs// phrin las thogs med snying rjer spyod// dam tshig
47b4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i mkhar bzhin bsrungs// rgyud dang sgrub thabs mtha' dag tshad// phyogs 'dzin slang la mkhas pa bsten// rdzas dang lag cha rtag tu 'chad// sbyor dang sgrol ba'i nyams drod ldan// phung po lha dang gnyis su med// sems ni chos nyid
47b5(rnying rgyud): la gnas// rnal 'byor rtags ldan dam pa yis// las su bya ba chud ma zos// dkyil 'khor rim pa 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'brab khung dang 'khor lo dbye ba'o// de la 'thub khur rim pa bstan pa ni// drag po'i gnas sam dkyil 'khor shar
47b6(rnying rgyud): ru// 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor khru gang tsam du bya// gru gsum sum brtsegs kha khyer la// za byed zhal dang mda' gzhu bangs// mtshon cha lnga dang rtsang gis bskor// mthing nag dar gyis zhal bkab pa'i// 'khod lo
47b7(rnying rgyud): pa dbye ba ni// sbar shi'i ro gos khrag can nam// bkra mi shis pa'i zhing ras la// zag po'i las la rab btson pas// dur khrod rkang gis smyug gu bya'o// khyo dgu shi ba'i mngal khrag gis// gyi rdo'i dus na bri bar bya// rgya ru chag khru gang yod la/
48a1(rnying rgyud): sa cad par tham sna dang // 'bang ba 'khong gcigs pa cad// nad nas 'ab bang drag pa// rnas pa lan migs pa'aM// shAn+ta lag nyi ga gsub na// 'azlar badzin ma ma bas brkyang la// ngag gas ca
48a2(rnying rgyud): bdagad// rtsibs mtshan brgyad kyi cha la ni// dang po sngags kyi phreng ba dgod// yan lag mgong drugs gnas la// gsum pa sngags kyi phreng ba dgod// snying po da ni rdo t+pa la// gnyis pa skyugs kyi phreng ba dgod// i ti l+le'i rtse mo d+ha/
48a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba dpyod// nyon mongs lnga yi gnas lnga ru// lnga yi sngags kyi phreng ba dgod// gzhan yang so so'i gnas rnams su// yab rnams bskul ba'i snying po brjod// 'di ni thabs kyi 'khor lo yin// gud skye nag po'i nod
48a4(rnying rgyud): la// phrin las rnam bzhi gong bzhin du// mtha' la gru gsum nyi shus bskyor// rgyas la dmigs pagong bzhin du// sngags kyi rim pa grong bzhin no// mig 'gro g.yon la yig gzhug g.yas// phyir dmigs pa la dgod gong ma bzhin//
48a5(rnying rgyud): dang po sngags dang tha ma gnyis// brug sum dag gi cha la dgod// gzhan yang so so'i gnas rnams su// yum rnams bskul ba'i sngags kyang bri// 'di ni shes rab 'khor lo yin// ras sam gro gang ma shog shog la// zin las bzhi rnams ga
48a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin de// sgo dang bar khyams de bzhin te// 'khor lo'i tshul rin chen dbyibs// gzhan rnams la yang gong bzhin de// dang po tha ma rin chen la'o// 'di ni nang gi 'khor lo ste// gzhan yang so so gnas rnams su// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mdzes
48a7(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// 'di ni 'khor lo'i dbye ba'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phrar ba gsang ba'i rgyud chen po pas/ sgrol byed slob dpon las dang gzugs brgyan 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgra pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dras pa'i rgyal pos/
48b1(rnying rgyud): rabs pas bsgrub pa'i drod dang / rtags dang rdzas bsag pa'i phyir/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho rdo rje 'das pa'i gtso// rjes su gzhung spyod rnal 'byor pas// bskal ba'i rdzas ni ji ltar bsag/ bsgrub par rtags dang nod rjod
48b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba dbang bas bshad du gsol// zhes gsol bas/ bka' stsal pa ni/ bskal ba'i rdzas su bstan pa ni// rgyu tshil 'gro sad mi drud sde rdzas dang // bdab pa'i zhabs ma mngag pa'i nyung dkar dang // mtshon gyi ded ba lnga spang pa dang /
48b3(rnying rgyud): dang ma rudra sbyar ba'i gtor ma dang // lcags phye zangs phye dug gtor dang // sri shing ho ma dang gnan pa'i thod pa dang // 'di ni drag po bskal pa'i rdzas// grub pa'i rtags ni 'di lta ste// 'phar dang 'chog dang chags pa dang // 'gul dang ldeg dang mchod
48b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// 'od dang du ba 'byung ba dang // rnal 'byor nam mkhar 'gro ba dang // sa la mi thogs chur mi 'bying // 'di ni rtags rab bstan pa yin// mtshan ma'i ling+ga dgul gyur ram// dmigs rdo nyams dang rtags blang na// bar gyi rtags su bstan pa
48b5(rnying rgyud): yin// tha mal rmi lam ston par 'gyur// rtags kyi mtshan nyid la yang ni// grolas dang ni ngo bo ste// de yi ngo bo brtags par gces// drod tshad mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// bdul ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos nyid mnyam la blo bzhag nas//
48b6(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs bsam las 'das// chos nyid lta ba'i drod tshad de// gaN 'ching grol med pa'i dang / dam rdzas blang dor med pa dang // ta na sde shi med spyod dang // 'di spyod pa yi dro tshad yin// dngos su snang ba skyar grub cing // sgra ru grag pa gsung du
48b7(rnying rgyud): dngos med snang ba thugs grub na// 'di ni bsgrub pa'i thod tshad yin// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // bcud kyi 'jig rten lhar shes te// thams cad kun tu dkyil 'khor de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i drong tshad yin// byar med nyid la spyod bya
49a1(rnying rgyud): na sa na / na du/ na // du bya / das sa
49a2(rnying rgyud): ma mad nga ma sa nyam
49a3(rnying rgyud): sa na sa sun sa
49a4(rnying rgyud): la da/ sa ni ga nga rgyu grug // na pa ga m+b+ha
49a5(rnying rgyud): sa du sa sa /
49a6(rnying rgyud): ma papa ma / / sa/ ra 'thu sa pa / /
