49a7(rnying rgyud): brtson pa sa nga ba / makyil tham kyang // rdzag thal kyang kyang pa 'grub ste// ba gzugs lab kyis gsu / kya pagasang 'i rgyung chen pa las/ bzlab badreg pa sa pa 'dug par stan pa'i na
49b1(rnying rgyud): denas yang rdzarnga 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsal// a ma hA bar da gshegs bcom ldan 'das// tingang 'dzin gyi danyid de// phyi rabs ngan du bas/ na dra gsol// al sa gzhes gsal bas// com ldan 'a
49b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// /
49b3(rnying rgyud): ting ma da nyid bzlas // legs par ban kyang mad gzhan gyi// ngas pa can cag yang la byud// dang thas pas nga gad// man chen ldan pa'abar bams// namal bstan par/ ba
49b4(rnying rgyud): bdang / bgag dubaskam par gyud// thAHtanan 'dzas rna yaH/ tha maHSh+Ta mam+b+ha maH/ byu li/ e a d+hi maN+Da la ya k+Sha ma rad+haSh+Ta/ reraH maN+Dal/ sa'adas mdunal/
49b5(rnying rgyud): brgya nar+thaM/ a baM maM swA raM/ rbaidrA trar thAmaN+Da la// ma A pa s+t+raid+hi pad+hA mAny+dza la / tharasa?/ sa ha ri na nI/ dz+nyAn badz+ra wA raN paH/ sa haH/ !/ dz+nyA \u0f7fsa twa kI la ya D+haM/ la pa \u0f7fraHpaH/ 8/
49b6(rnying rgyud): yis rjeb rnyed pa hU~M phaT// badz+ra d+h+r-iH tsa gratan tan d+hangs/ gleng rdom bsgyel ba'i da mchog ni// gsang cing gnan pa ma yang te/ phung brda rdzas btam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rje mam// zhes pas bdag nyi kyil 'a'ang
49b7(rnying rgyud): gsal bar mdza da// baTanas ser bskal ba las// chags pa'i ti 'dzin gsal gyur te// yab yum sbyor ba snang nga ba las// mchong pa gas pas sa thim/ byang chub sems ni nyes pa las// dang pas bdag da ra bdes/
49b8(rnying rgyud): bsams pa ga gsal byas pas// phyogs byung dbrag dang gdan pa nga// gsum pas hUM skur gsung rdzogs pa// de nas pa phral bas phrag tu rdzogs/ de las phyagal ba rgyang chub rnams// sngags kyi ba pas rdzogs gas pa thur/
50a1(rnying rgyud): nam palan// dga' pal rnam parnya/ nas kyang na sa na sa // nam ma sa dgas pag/ samams/ A bya ma/
50a2(rnying rgyud): hA \u0f7f tsat+tahU~M/ bta badz+ra ti/ kI la ya mu te dze ma a ba sAr+ya tsan+da padra ma nA la/ dzA hrI badz+ran na ta/ 'di na grogs bcwa khro po'i da la 'khor ro// phur ba rjes kyi ba las// byang chub sems ni spros pa las// rigs kyi sras mchog rnam lnga zhid // spyan
50a3(rnying rgyud): nyid dang phyogs bzhir bsam// byin brlabs la sogs sngon 'byung bzhin// gzi mdangs chags bskyed thugs bskul te/ A~M ma ku larta la pra ta la hUM phaT/ badz+ra bi ta lI ma N+Da la hU~M phaT/ badz+ra ma hA rak+ta maN+Da la hUM phaT/ phra rab rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor ro//
50a4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyad chen po las/ rjes 'jug tir 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog hri la yas/ thos pa'i rgal po la'ang skad ces
50a5(rnying rgyud): to// rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bdag gi sras su lha rnams bskyed pa dang // de'i sras su bdag bya ba'i rim pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa ni/ 'khor ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir// rang gi rang tshul de bzungs nas/
50a6(rnying rgyud): sngags dang bskul chog 'di yang brjod// byang chub sems kyi dbang spros pas// ye shes 'od kyis lus tog spangs// gser phun lta bu'i sems dag la// gsum gyis byin brlabs 'od kyi 'bru// thugs kar tham nas grwa yi dbyibs// rdo rje las rdza
50a7(rnying rgyud): sum gyi mkha'// chos kun byang chub sems gnas sa// lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgras// rab tu gsal bar brjod pa'i sra// byang chub sems ni gsal bar thim// de las hUM zhes rab brjod pas// gsung gi phyag tu nyid rdzogs nas// thugs
50b1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya rab tu 'bar// de las phra mo'i sgra sgo bsdus// phyag rgya chen po'i sku nyid rdzogs// de nyid sbyor ba'i gyen brlabs las// b+ha ga nyid du lha rnams bsam// dza dang paT kyi rtsa sngags kyis// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor bdag dang stan la dgod// @
50b2(rnying rgyud): bkal ya phaT dza// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin nams// srid pa'i rdo rje zlab mdzad cig/ srid pa'i rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro ba zab par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes waM// ngang nyid rdo rdo chos dbyings las// 'a'adra ba'i kho bo ma
50b3(rnying rgyud): bzang ba// pra yi dbyig tu bdag gyur cig/ mAM AHd+h+waM kA yu wA ka tsid+hatrA na A be sha A/ AM iHdruM maN+Da la saMd+d+hi tAM/ kI la la kro ta rbat+ta ha hi hUM phaT/ si ha ra Na nAM/ ma hA g+ha na sa ma ya ha~M/ hU~M \u0f89\u0fa4 badz+ra kan ta/ badz+ra bI li kI la ya/ sarba
50b4(rnying rgyud): baMg+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ hI p+ta tsakra ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ma hA bo ti tsit+ta maN+Da la hUM phaT/ lha rnams ca ba'i sngags gzhug tu// dza phaT ces ni kun la gdags par bya'i// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rjes 'jug de bzhin
50b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang 'dus pa'i sras mchog k+Shi la yas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bde gshegs rgyal bas 'khor rnams la// byin bai rlab dbang ba slar ji bzhin du// rjes su
50b6(rnying rgyud): 'jug pas ji ltar bya// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ yi ge 'bru gsum rim pas su// srog gi rta la bskon nas su// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i ting 'dzin las// byin brlab gsum ni nges pa ru// sngon byang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs//
50b7(rnying rgyud): srog gi hU~M las 'od 'phros pas// rigs wa rgyal ba'i thugs bsngal to// sngon thung bzhin du sngags brjod cing // ye shes lnga yis dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ras ma yadza tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ shrI badz+ran maHsa rbatathA ga ta pA dza badz+ra d+ha/ thabs kyi spad
51a1(rnying rgyud): pas 'amadan du// byams dang thang rnaMs gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas zin las rdzogs mdza nga nas// dab dang than rtswa' 'dir sngal ca// ces dab dang shin nub nod pa'i phyir na// dus gsam gsags bzhugs byas
51a2(rnying rgyud): rnams kun// rdo rje khro bo rabazhengs gsol drangs// phyag 'tshal dga' bas mchod pa bya// zhes gsol ba gang ba bo// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po pas/ byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
51a3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal bas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sgrub pa'i thabs ni ji ltar bgyi// bsnyen pa'i rim pa gang ltar lags// khros pa'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// don dam dang ni kun rjod kyis/
51a4(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // srung pa dang ni sgrub chen rnams// nges par 'di skad bka' stsal to// chos nyid kyi bden pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi mtho'o// gsang bsngags kyi byin brlabs so// a b+hi tsa rA'i dus la bab pa'i gnag pa de kho na lang/
51a5(rnying rgyud): do na ma pa dang kun rdzob brten spong pa rdzogs nas// rtags dang mtshan ma 'byung ba gdon mig// rtags dang mtshan mas bsgrub pa'i drang chad zin pa dang // bkra shis mtshan ldan tan+ta ka pA la// ce 'gro rab tung bskum pos bkang byas nas// dkyil
51a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor na tshogs tsha'i 'gasol ba gdab// thun mong dbang gi dngos grub thang // bab shes brjod de gsol byas na// rig 'dzin go 'phang thob par 'gyur// chog 'di yi byin brlabs kyis// gang zhig mos pa'i ngang ldan de// dbang bcu thob nas tshang
51a7(rnying rgyud): medangan dang ldan// phrin la ma rdzogs med dbyings dpal shesangon mthang 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phra pa gsang ba'i byang zad pa las/ bsgrub par bya ba thabs bstan pa'i le'u sa ti thAHswa pa na// / de nas yang rdorje 'dus
51b1(rnying rgyud): 'dan ces gas la// / em noms pa' bdag nyid can// rang bsnyen don dam kyil labar / smyan drangs mdzad parje ltar brtse// bka' stsal ba ni/ bdag nyid ting 'dzu tag ldan pas// sa ma nga yas gsas pa 'anas// phyag ca na
51b2(rnying rgyud): yis spyan yang drangs// tiSh+Tha badz+ras brtan zas nas// dgyes pa chen pos phyag btsal te// mchod pa'i rim pa sngon byang bzhin// des ni las rnams ma lus 'grub// sbeng pa'i phran bu srab pa dang // dbang dang dngos papa byung // 'gyur
51b3(rnying rgyud): med pa shes lha gnas pa// be shes zla ba gshegs su gsol// ye shes khra bo gshegs nas kyang // gyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pazhes te// rtags dang mtshad ma bstan pa dang // kI la yA yi dngos thab rgyal// zhes brjodapa// rje sa pa ba
51b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i bud chen mopas/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ldan drangs shing mchod pa'i le ru s+ye bAn drug par// de nas yang da ni 'das pas 'di skad ces gas pa te// me mnyer nams pa'i phrag kyang sngags gastanan// 'did chags zhes
51b5(rnying rgyud): sug nga rgyal phrag gi rang bzhin can// dregs bskal la khas rgyags rje'i dpal mgon to// thugs rje'i bdag nyid de la phyag 'tshal ba stod// zugs rje chen pos dregs pa bsgral ba'i zhing // rjes pa// brjod chad zin pa rangs pa nas// dgrang ba
51b6(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa bsgral ba'i rim pa gang // thugs rje'i bdag nyid khrod kyis bshang du gsol// zhes gsol bas/ gsol pa'i don thugs su chud nas/ drug pos bskal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// dang
51b7(rnying rgyud): ba gnad pa'i dgra bgegs de// lha dang kyapa brtan dpung dang dpral/ de nas nges par gzugs pa banyis// 'bru ldog med par byad du gzhug/ gzeng rjed thugs te sbyo rug zhug// phrar pas btab snyengs par baphral// rdul du zas tshogs
52a1(rnying rgyud): pa dpral// las rnams drug por de la yang // de la drug drug sum cu drug/ cho ga gzhung sngags dang ting 'dzin phyogs dang rdzas dang thabs// rdzong thung rjes 'jug 'khor bkra shis// de lta'i don dang ldan na na/ ga
52a2(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa gdon mi za// rdo rje'i zag kyang 'jig 'gyur na// sdig can gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa can bskal ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// /
52a3(rnying rgyud): nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes phur pa btab pa bzhin// dmigs pa'i dgra dang bgegs rnams la// rdzas kyi phur pa bstim pa'i las ni gang // bde gshegs rgyal bas bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ dbye 'drag po
52a4(rnying rgyud): las kyi rigs// bstim pa zhe ste de bzhin rigs// gzir ba chas te rin chen rigs// byad la dbang ste pad+ma'i rigs// gdab la drag ste rdo rje'i rigs// bstab pa lha phrar nyid la bya/ de ni spyi yi las su bshad// gdab pa'i gnas ni du zhig yod/
52a5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal ba/ gdab pa'i gnas ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// sngon byung dregs pa lnga ba sbal la/ lte ba nyid dang gsang ba dpung mgo da phyi la gdab// dregs pa chen po bsgral bu yin// sems nyid rtsad bcad snying la gdab// dregs pa'i phyogs myong/
52a6(rnying rgyud): bskal ba yin// bsngal ba'i rnam shes brgyad la gdab// dam sri chen po ba sbal ba bzhin/ dgra bgegs mgo la de bzhin gdab// mthu dang rdzu 'phral phrogs pa yin// yar dang mar gyi bdun chud bcad// de ni gdab pa'i las su
52a7(rnying rgyud): gsungs// de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas gsol ba// dregs pa'i sems can chen po la// dkyil 'khor lha yis gzir ba bzhin// rjes su gzir ba ji ltar bya/ bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje lu gu rgyad kyi las// gzir ba'i mtshan nyid 'di yis
52b1(rnying rgyud): ni// dgra' gags gzer zhing gnan can// ya shes sems dpa'i skur ba yas// ad la maN+Dal brta gzar thang// tsat+t+waswa bskang thor ba yis// mgol la ka' thos gzung // dam la gtogs pa 'am tshogs kyis// mo brdul
52b2(rnying rgyud): bcas skor ba yis/ sras kyi gnas bcur gzir cing sbyong // rigs kyi yum lnga'i sbyor ba yis// sgo lnga'i rnam shes gzir cing spong // sgom bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// yan lag bzhi yi mtshan ma myong // d+has la gtogs pa'i mtshogs kyis//
52b3(rnying rgyud): g.yang gnyis shun lpags spyod gzir bya// rol pa'i pho nya tshogs bcas kyis// dug gsum sha rus khrag rnams sbyar// ye shes rol pa'i bro gar gyis// ma lus kun kyang gzir bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// gsol ba/ ye shes 'bar ba'i
52b4(rnying rgyud): khro tshogs kyis// rdo rje thod pa'i tho gtun du// dregs pa bskal nas gsol te dge ba yin// rjes su 'jug na ji ltar bgyi// bka' stsal pa// mkha' yi gtun khung bder gshegs gnas// gting dpag med pa'i dbyings nyid du// srir
52b5(rnying rgyud): gsum ma lus phur pas thebs// kha tha ma dbyings su bsgral bar bya// kha tha ma dbyings su bsngal byas nas// hU~M hU~M bgyis pas dbang du bsdus// phaT kyi kun tu gtor bar byas// sha khag khams gsum gang bar bton// kha ka bkris pas
52b6(rnying rgyud): lhag ma bzhes// hi hi dgyes pa'i sba bslags pas// bzhes sheg rol te gsol bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// gsol pa/ bde gshegs rgyal ba'i mdzad spyod tshe// rdo rje ye shes me dpal zhes/ dregs pa'i sha rus bsregs nas rol/
52b7(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin// rjes su bsgrub na rje ltar bya// zhes gsol bas/ bka' stsal ba/ byug thang nyid du bya ba'am// yang na gzhung dang mthun pa ru// me thab zla gsam sum brtsegs la// dkyil du rdo rje nag pa bzhag/ dang po dkar la gnyis pa nag
53a1(rnying rgyud): gsum pa ser por bya ba ste// zlag ma yang ni dmar po bya// puN+ya dkar la bru chad sdang // bar khyams nag la sgo rigs sbyar// ngur khrod shing dmachar mtshan// khru gang bu gsum dbyabs su brtsegs// yam shang
53a2(rnying rgyud): nag po rtse mo ma nor bar// rtse mo gru gsum dag tu bzhag/ cho ze'u rtsa rtse ma nor bar// rtsab mo yi tshol gyis byug/ sngags pa'i chas gos nag po la// byang du kha bltas 'greng nas 'dug/ dur khrod gnas sam ma bdud khyam// yid dzo me to
53a3(rnying rgyud): shing brgyan pa'am// shin tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu// dgang gzar gru gsum khyud gang la// dkyil du yaM yis mtshan par bya// brag gzar zlum po rdo rje dkyil du mdzes// gyi nang bsreg rdzas gsang ba nag por bya// shan pa'i khyim nas blangs
53a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i mes// yam shing nag po sbar bar bya// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pas// raM las dam tshig me lha bsam// ye shes me lha snyan gsol snyan drang bsti ma phyag 'tshal// mchod pa'i rim dbul bstod pasad ces byas nas// 'dod don gsol nas/
53a5(rnying rgyud): me lha gzhal yas bsam// de nang dkyil 'khor sngan drang bzhugs gsol mchod// bstod pa'i rgyal pos don tugs gang rung bstod// 'dod don gsol te phrin las bcol// bsgral ba'o yin cha gcig dang // dgra 'gegs gzugs brtan
53a6(rnying rgyud): gsal byas nas// dgug bstim phur bas rab gdab cing // nyung dkar brdeg ceng gu bul bdug/ mtshon gyis 'de bla gtub phud pas dam bcings nas// gtor ma gnyis kyang legs byas nas// mtshon cha'i char dang gtun brdung las byas te/
53a7(rnying rgyud): lha yi tshogs la thim par dbul ba ni// klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// 'bar 'phro 'khrug pa'i me sbar nas/ gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra bgegs rnams// bsregs shing rdo rje 'bar ba yi// bka' las 'da' byed sdig chen rnams/
53b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje med pal snying bsregs nas// dngos por gyur pa'i gnas rnams kud// tshor dogs med par bsreg par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gsungs pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mdzad spyad ma// drags pa zhabs ngag mnan pa bzhin
53b2(rnying rgyud): rjes bsrub gnan na ji ltar bgyi// bka' stsal pa ni/ shing gcig drung dang ma rungs pa// rgya gra ma lam du bya ba dang // klu yi gnas dang 'byung po'i srang nyid du// dkyil 'khor gru gsum rtsa sol 'ad // ngo dang gnan pa'i rdzas bcug ste// dbang gi phur
53b3(rnying rgyud): pa drag btab nas// dur khrod g.yam pa sngon po la// zhing chen dag gi sur khrag gis// nam mkha' sngon po gru gsum la// rdo rje rgya gram bzhi yis mdzes// 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor ldan// yi ge dza dang mdzes pas ni// phung pa de yis lci
53b4(rnying rgyud): nas gnan// sems ma rdo rjes dam tshig bskul// sku gsung thugs kyi stabs kyis mnan// be tsan nyid kyang las kyis stongs// mche bas sha khrag zos par byad// nyung dkar brdeg cing dgu gul bdug/ ting 'dzin 'byung chen bzhi yi ri rab bsam/
53b5(rnying rgyud): de nyid las kyi lha nyid kyis// shin tu gnan pa'i mchog tu gsungs// las kyi mnan pa'i 'byung nang dus zad 'di// hUM las kyi rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud kyis gnan par shog/ rjes gsungs
53b6(rnying rgyud): so// yang gsol pa/ dregs pa bskal ba ni slar gsol sngar bzhin// dgra bgags bsgral na ji ltar bsgral// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa ni/ ta na ga Na sbyor ba mdzad// drag po las kyi bskal pa rnams// nam shes b+h+rUM gis bsdus
53b7(rnying rgyud): rngubs nas// mi ldog dbyings su phaT gyis 'phangs// zla dkyil rlung gi sbyor bas bskyod// dbyings su thi ma nas phyag kyang 'bar// hU~M du gyur pas rnam par dag/ srur gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjod// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar
54a1(rnying rgyud): ngan 'grar thur pa thabs// de ltar brgyur la mi gnas te// ma g.yas dngu ma ngan dang ldan/ mya ngan 'das pa dbyings smra ba zhang/ bar bldan par gnas nya dang // da bu ma dang ldanan// bya lab byas dang
54a2(rnying rgyud): med 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur ba gsang ba'i rlud chen po las// bstim gzing gad bar stab bsgeg mnan bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas gsol ba ni// mi mthong rmongs la stan
54a3(rnying rgyud): byed// gzungs banan dkyil 'khor je ler gri// thabs ni gang / zhes gsol ba dang / bka' stsal ni/ bu gsum zla gas mu khyung zlum// phra bzhi pa la 'khor lo brgyad // bar khyams dang ni khro bzhir bcas// thu gsuman pa b+ha me ma //
54a4(rnying rgyud): mu khyud dkar la gru bzhi sar// gong ras ldang la 'khor lo ser// rtsibs mtshan dmar la mtshams byed dkar// bu chang ldang la bar khyams dmar// sgron rigs bkun rta babs mdzes par bya// dung khrod rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// dbus su
54a5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan yab gram ste// zlag za gru gsum tso mo dang // mu khyad gru bzhi dag la dgod// nam rgyal gshing ba tam srin dang // bdud rtsi 'khyil ba nyid dang ba'i// rang rang gzungs dang sras bcas te// phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i gdan dag la// dri zag zhi
54a6(rnying rgyud): rje mas dang // gnod skar gangadan la mkhasangs dag // dkrug sngonam gso bkan mi r+d+ha'aM// khams gsum nam rgyal nyid dang ba'i// rang rang gzungs dang sras bcas rnams// mthams kying bor lnga'i gdan dgal// me ny+tsa srin pa rdu lta ra/
54a7(rnying rgyud): dbang ldan gdan dang bcas par ra// mdun du hU~M chen 'khor lo bcas// rgyab tu skabs chan de bzhin du// tshangs dngas bdag gdan la gnas// dbus kyi gnas las ba'i mthun te// phyi rim gru gsum nyi shuH// ba thams blo rnams de bzhin te//
54b1(rnying rgyud): blang na mas sug/ dag rdzu tu// nasu na du ma/ na da sa
54b2(rnying rgyud): bar bya// yab dmas nyi thun su // snying dgathogs mnams man 'dra// thams cad ba dod par gyi// rdzas kyi srung dang grang bdang// rlung rnams kya di da de// sa then ga dudu thags ma //
54b3(rnying rgyud): rin chen 'bar ba brgyad// de yi gyi ram sna ma dul// dkyil 'khor nyi shu las bzhi tshang bar bya// par khyams sgo dang rgyun rnams de bzhin te// blag me par 'gru gsum nA~M// rdo ni mi 'gyur brji dag te// rdo rgyams shin tu mdzes rgyas
54b4(rnying rgyud): mu khyud dkar la rin chen sngo// zlar mtshan dmar la mthang sdud dkar// gru chad nag la khyams bzhi ser// las bzhi'i dbyings ni gang dang mthun// rnams dang zla rgyan de bzhin te// dbus su bdud 'dul yang yum ste// rgyan rdzing rdo rje 'du
54b5(rnying rgyud): gzungs par bcas// phyogs bzhir na chen dag la ni// rigs bzhi'i sras mchog rim par dgod// mtshams la rigs kyi yum bzhi ste// chom bu'i dkyil 'khor nye shul// thabs dang shes rab gang bzhin no// gzhang rnams kya ji dzin
54b6(rnying rgyud): gzugs pa can dkyil 'khor de skad gsung// dang gyur ba bsang ba'i lhang chen po las/ gzugs brtan cing kyil 'ab ba ca' ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u tu rgya thuba'o// dengs par darje 'dus pas sol ni/ dzan du
54b7(rnying rgyud): bzang bas/ chags bcan pa ba sgras dang // mi gsum rgyal ba'i rlu baphrul zhing // dragra thalarjes su spong pa \u0f7f// stanams brjod bsgral du skyer labras// mi bzang khros pas bad drugs 'i// zhes gsal bas/ mi rjed kyis dang /
55a1(rnying rgyud): na ma na na tu na na su dunan du nu
55a2(rnying rgyud): dang // ma dpung brdar ra gyur ba 'dral// rdzu 'phrul can pa bzhi 'i labs dag gis// rdegs pa ran tu zla ba cwa'i gad nas bcugs// 'dag kyid sbrul du byud rgyan gyis bcan// thang can sdud ces shing bye dgra pang ga gis bzungs
55a3(rnying rgyud): skye las gas bral rkye kyis brgyan// thal dzA naM zhugs dang n+ta dzag las brjod// rnga rdzag rtog pas sri ga sum zim gyis gad// bskal pa'i ma ra 'bar ba glang na ba krugs// dpe' rnag 'jigs su drang bye sgra me 'ad//
55a4(rnying rgyud): dang ga she dang 'jigs byed gsung gi mchog/ sbrang rngu rams dang 'a byang thugs// su gzang thugs kyi bdag la phyag 'tshal bskyod// g.yan nas sus ldan meg pa// zhal gsum rgya gadrug cu da rjo// dzi sajal dring bre dang // hat+tar rje
55a5(rnying rgyud): dris zin par desal// darabazur ba drul nga 'das/ rgyun nams can gyis migs brgyad ci// gsung ba'i rnam can nyi sa tha ga'i kyis ba // ga sa sa ng+yas pa rlom mchog nyis so// gsung thugs pa byed lasu
55a6(rnying rgyud): dris ma na// rdo rje 'dus pa'i sas mchog kyil la/ mthing na gyi la gcig kyag bzhis phrad na gsum sa// dan mA ra t+na sa d+hA rgyal s+ho// rags kyi sum 'jal tshangs pa bcwa dgang da 'i bkrugs te las rnams pa las ma nga/
55a7(rnying rgyud): dri dang 'bra 'i / sa pas la// ga pa'i'ig tsa kyi gangs chu/ sa cu 'du/ gra gyi ba gadris sa btsun tan dri sa
55b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad// gti mug can pa'i phrin las dus la 'ad// ran can 'dus pa'i sras mchog kA la ya// sar na gzhal gcag phyag bzhin skad chung ban // ran can hA re Sha d-ir ra phung bu 'dril// rags kyi yus 'khrul ma da ba gdan pa
55b2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs nas rgyas pa'i phrin las mdzad// dargyal chen po'i phrin las dris la bab// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// dmar ngan bzhal gcig phyag gnyis su phreng ba pe ma re// dedz+ra kA re Sha nI ri ra 'gyur du 'dzing // rigs
55b3(rnying rgyud): 'phel rgyab 'jug gdan la bzhugs te dbang gi phrin las mdzad// 'dod chags chen po'i phan las dus la bab// karma 'dus pa'i sras mchog sI la ya// sdang nag zhal gcig phyag ni mu sde bur nyis pa ste// rta rnams mes da rab rngu rab
55b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus// rigs mi srem 'khril 'di khrag shin po'i gdan la bzhugs te drag pa'i sprin las mdad// zug dog chen pa'i phrin las dus la bar// steng rdzogs kyi gsum darnga 'brag spang na// bla ma nga dkar dbang ngon tan rnga rung // mad ga
55b5(rnying rgyud): 'gengs dang rer 'phur bu 'dril// tshangs pa po ma bkrol ba'i gdan snang na// skra 'byin sa 'dra 'khril sgor rol pa las// sprul pa'i phra men phag dang smig bu'i mdo// rol po chen po'i phrin las dus la bab// shar phyogs sde gsung rdo rje dag
55b6(rnying rgyud): steng na// rnam par rgyal ba dkar dmar bya ste rdo rje dang // 'khor lo lcags kyu tri shul re rab phur bu 'dril// brgya byin pha mo bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// mda' stem bu 'dra 'brel sbyor rol pa las// sprul pa phra men stag dang bya rgod pa //
55b7(rnying rgyud): rlog byed chen po'i phrin las dus la bab// shar rtsi gru gsum rdo rje'i brag steng na// dbyug pa sngon po dkar dmar sngo ste rdo rje dung // rin chen dbyug pa me dpung ri rab phur bu 'dril// me lha pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan steng na/ sder mo lce 'dra
56a1(rnying rgyud): 'khrul gyur rol ba las// su'angs ba ldan g.yag dang byarab 'am// 'arnams byu dpa' phran las dus 'bag// kye phyogs sgra gsums jug ngan// gzhan rdzag shang ba lnga nag nga tu byad/
56a2(rnying rgyud): ral gri'i rab phur bu 'dril// gshin rje pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// dur khrod su 'dral khril lhor rol pa las// sbal ba'i phra men sha ba 'ug pa'i mig/ 'jigs kyang chen po 'dzin las dus la bab// chu
56a3(rnying rgyud): mi g.yo mgon pa mthing dmar sdug te rdo rje dung // spu gri zhags pa ri rab phur bu 'dril// chen po pho mo snol ba'i gdan ster na// gtun khung spu 'dra 'khril spyod rol pa las// sprul pa'i phra man gzig dang khwa yem mo// mi 'ju
56a4(rnying rgyud): na las dus la bab// nub phyogs bu gsum rdo rje'i brag steng na// rta mgrin dkar sngon dmar te rdo rje dung // ral gri sbrul zhags ri rab phur bu 'jil// chu lha pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// gtum mo sku 'dra 'khril sbyor rol pa las//
56a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i phra men bye la pu shud mgo// brjid pa chen po'i phrin yas dus la bab// nub byang gru gsum rdo rje'i phrag steng na// gzhan gyi sa me thub dmar nag ldang ste rdo rje rung // ba dan rdul g.yab ri rab phur bu 'dril// rlung lha pho mo bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// mang
56a6(rnying rgyud): mas sku 'dra 'khril sgor rol pa las// sprul pa'i phra men sbyang ku khwa yi mgo// khyo shug chen po'i srin las dus la bab// byang phyogs thugs ma rdo rje'i brag ster na// bdud rtsi kyil bdud ser ljang ste rdo rje rung // rgya gram dril bu ri rab lu sa 'dra
56a7(rnying rgyud): garna sbyin thom bsngal ba'i gdan snang na// rdzong 'byin spu 'dra 'phrul sbyar rol pa las// sprul pa'i phra men sang gi pha wang man// gzir ba'i phrin las chen po mdzad du bsal// byang shar zhu gsum rdo rje'i brag stong na// khams gsum rje d+ha'i
56b1(rnying rgyud): sa du ste rngu drung // mda' gzhu ba nar rab zur zla 'dral// dbang ldan pam bskal ba'i gdan snang ga/ gsod ma su 'dra 'phrul srong rol pa las// sprul ba'i maman drang dang bla ma mag// grol ba'i phrin las chad pa mdza drugasapa// ngag phyogs pa
56b2(rnying rgyud): gsum rdo rje'i brag sted na// stobs chen ldang ser dre dka rdo rje dung // tho bgatun shing ri rab phra rab 'dril// sa bdag po mo bsnol ba'i gdan skyed na// bskyod ma su 'dre 'a khri la byor ral pa las// sprul pa'i thamin nga ma da d+hU pa'i mdo// 'dangs
56b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i dzin las chen po mdzad du gsol// dkar mo bu shud mgo can phur bu lcags kyu 'dzin// snying rje chen pos phrin las mdzad du gsol// sngon mo sgeg mgo nags 'dzin phur ba 'dril// byams pa chen po'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// dmar mo srin pa
56b4(rnying rgyud): mgo can phur bu lcags sgrog can// dga' ba'i phrin las chen po mdzad du gsol// ljang nag khra mgo dril bu phur bu 'dral// btang snyoms chen po'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur ba gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ lha lang stod
56b5(rnying rgyud): cing phrin las bcol ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos// dregs bzo mo'i chung ma rnams// mchags thabs kyi sbyor ba las/
56b6(rnying rgyud): dgye ba'i phrin las spros pa yi// mkha' 'gro ma rnams ji ltar sgrub// ces gsol bas/ bka' stsal ba ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro grub par 'dod pas// dur khrod chen po rab dben par// rab yar gyi nga la 'jug/ dkyil 'khor zla ga ma le'u dgu pa
56b7(rnying rgyud): las// thu chad dang ni blo 'bur dang // bar khyams sgo rim gnyis par bya// dbus su sngags kyi bdag po ste// gzugs dang bcas nas dgod par bya'o// go'u rI tse'u rI pra mo bi tA li// phyogs kyi le'u co dag la dgod// pun b+has+sa tsaN+Da nI/
57a1(rnying rgyud): mtshams kyi le'u tshe dag la dgod// seng gdong stag dang wa dang spyang ki rnams// phyogs kyi glo 'bur bzhi la'o// b+ha rgod du dbya bya rog thug pa'i mag/ mtshams kyi thu chad dag lang // rta gdang phag dang sbrul dang sa ga pa dra/
57a2(rnying rgyud): dang po'i gro bzhi dag la'o// srin mtshangs ma lha can gsum// shar spyod lpags dag la'o// gtogs 'dod gzhon nub rgya byin gsum// shang sdang lpags de dag la // rdo rje bdud rtse thab gsum// skyo stong lhag mar dag pa ro// bcon zin ma
57a3(rnying rgyud): gsum// lho slad lcags ri dag la'o// dga' ba stobs chen rdo rje gsum// nub stod lcags ri dag la'o// 'dod 'a nor srung drung lha gsum// nub slad lcags ri dag la'o// gsod byed chen mo phag mo gsum// byang stong lcags ri dag
57a4(rnying rgyud): rgan byed sna chen chu lha gsum// byang spang lcags ri dag la'o// rdo rje nag po rdo rje sder// rdo rje dmar mo ljang nag bzhi// phyi yi sgo bzhi dag la'o// de yi lcags de nag po la'o// mkha' 'gro ging dang pho nya sring mo rnams// rang bzhin don gyis gnas
57a5(rnying rgyud): bar bya'o// yang na snying po lnga bcu nyid// thod bu dag la bris te dgod// yang na phyag mtshan lnga bcu nyid// so so'i gnas su de bzhin no// dur khrod thod pa'i nang nyid du// ras chen sdong bu gsum sgril du// snang ba'i 'od can nyid du dgod// yang na
57a6(rnying rgyud): yab yum byang sems kyis// gsang ba'i thig le lnga bcu bya// rdo rje sha chen thang mar bdal// dmar gyi rak+ta rgya mtshor ba skyil// rus pa'i phung po ri ltar spungs// zhing chen g.yang gzhi sprin ltar gtibs// sprin chen lnga ldi bye ltar bkram// ba su'i rgyu
57a7(rnying rgyud): phreng 'khor bar ldan// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi gcad// mchod pa'i rim pa ci 'byor dang // yo byad la sogs bcad la bya// de nas rnal 'byor blo ldan gyis// phyi nang rgyu 'grul dam du bsdams// chag nyams dam bshags byin dbab ste/
57b1(rnying rgyud): rtags gdab mchod rdzas byin gyis brdag// dam bcas nal 'byor tshul zag ni// rgyal ba'i mdzad thung gzhung la ba stu// rdugs ngam bzhin du stan gas na gas pa// rang bzhan gangs nas stan drangs te// t+yang 'dun pa byed de hang la bsnyam// sa gsung
57b2(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi gni byin bzhed// sems can don du brtan par bya// khams gsum kun gyi gdug pa dang // 'khor gyi mtshogs zil gyis gnon// ye shes stsal dbang mi bzam gyi phyag kyang btsa'// 'gro ba don du dam bcas te// kun tu bzang po
57b3(rnying rgyud): mchod nas// bdud rtser k+ta gtor ma bus dbul bstod// don gsol rol mo yid 'ong sgrogs// 'byor pa tshogs mchod dus drug rgyun mi gcad// ma nor ma bcos dbyings nyid dang // rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas// mi dmigs nam mkha'
57b4(rnying rgyud): klong du bslab// bde chen byang chub brtan par bzung // gnyis med mngon pa'i lam bzang ba// srid pa dbang du bsdus nas ni// khams gsum stan las 'das paste// 'din bdag gi byang chub sems// rgya mchog 'das bu le ge ts+yai// sri dpa gsum la
57b5(rnying rgyud): dbang bltar cing // bcom ldan 'das dang skal pa mnyam// byang chub sems ni mngon sum brtan// A e/ ba~M ma/ yaM/ raM/ su/ ke/ b+hUM/ b+han+ta b+h+rUM/ oM bai hUM/ nam mkha' rdo rje rlung nag rgya mtsho dang // sa gzhi kang rus ri rab ste// 'byung chen
57b6(rnying rgyud): lnga las thub pa'i gagal yas ni// dbyings dang ba dog mtshan nyid ni// sa sor gas la kyang ma 'dres te// me nas ma btsas yum chen rdu la dang // brjid thal thos zil 'khor lo byas 'dabs gling // mkha' mnyam ngan chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
57b7(rnying rgyud): ni// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar kun tu khyab par bdal// phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// phyi dang nang med kun tu nang // dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// zhing chen gcal bkram rmang du byas// b+har+d+ha sam rlon rtsig tu brtsigs// gnam
58a1(rnying rgyud): lcags gzar btab rgyan rnams rdzogs// gdan tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// dbus kyi rmug napa dang// bu mad grong thang ska sa gnas sa mdzes// nga
58a2(rnying rgyud): bcad// du lu 'od kyis gnas sbyang dang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // srab pa slab chen rdzogs par bya// yan lag bzhi dang ldan b+has nA// mtshon ma 'byung bar gdon mi za// gsu
58a3(rnying rgyud): las// bug
58a4(rnying rgyud): 'tshong du la // yab yum rtsa ba'i skur gsal te// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri stengs su// ma hA de bI rdzi sngol kha// nyi shu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// chags med pa dral spyod rgyas// dz+haiM hU~M/ badz+rad+had+hA nA~M na/ a @
58a5(rnying rgyud): thim pas nam thur gnyis ka sngo/
58a6(rnying rgyud): lapa/ san bstan rdu / des btan can rdzas/ ma ti ti/ gi nga gi/ rang ma \u0f7fsa rgya parnam la/ darda bang ldan byas nas// byang chub sems
58a7(rnying rgyud): medadagyes pa'i byin brlabs las// de nas dkyus te he brjod pas// gnas kyi lha mo brgyad 'thon te// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad nyid du de// ngo mtshar stan dang lag char ldan// ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ de nas dgyes ho ga brjod pa la// yul rtse
58a8(rnying rgyud): lham brgyad 'bon te// kwa chad klu 'bur dag la yang // ngo mtshar rgyas nas grong bzhin no// taH/ de nas dgyes te phaT brjod pas// ye shes skos bzhi 'thon te// gzhal yas chen po'i sgo bzhir 'khod// phaT phaT patra phyar/ badz+ra /
58a9(rnying rgyud): Ar+tha ba d+hal/ mthal mo/ mab ma la / / / / rgya \u0f7f/ / ga dbyas pa'i dzin las sbya na/ rgyam khyams dang ge bar 'od/
58b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro rnams 'thon te// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i mdzad spad bzhin// las kyi mchags zil gyis mnan// phyag ca'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba dang // bye ma thab dbang bskur ljon byung bzhin// ma 'phrul chen po'arang bzhin du// mkhas ngang tran
58b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed deH// badz+ra ga'u dzin/ badz+ra tsiwa hA/ badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra ba tak+Shiha/ bang zad b+hita/ badz+raHswad+hi ha/ badz+ra swa shany+dzita/ badz+raHNahrIta/ badz+ra sa ha ShiH/ badz+ra \u0f7f/ badz+ra/
58b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kang ka mu khI haM/ badz+ra kA ka mu khI he/ badz+ra u lU ka mu ShI haM/ phaT Ad+ya ta tsa ta dza/ phaT u mu ka si te hUM baT/ phaT badz+ra lo ka ba~M/ phaT badz+ra b+hU grI pa la ya ba tu ho/ ma nu rat+na b+hI d+ho/ baHd+h+r-i tau/ d+hi d+yo/ ngi// @
58b4(rnying rgyud): 'a lamaH/ / sangs/ // / ba
58b5(rnying rgyud): bar NI dz+ha/ tsa mur+d+ha ts+tsha/ swa ta ni b+ho/ ba NIb+h+yo/ ma hAk+Sha bI b+h+yo/ tsakA la b+h+yo/ kus+tha kar+tha b+h+yo/ badz+ra la bo dar t+yo/ oM badz+ra kA le kI la ya sarba ba~M g+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ hUM hrIHtsakra ha he phaT t+yo ru lu ru lu hU~M paT/ nges pa'i don du rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams/
58b6(rnying rgyud): gdeng ldan rnal 'byor dag gis bsgrub gyur na// las kyi mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas kyis// dam bcas bzhin du rtags dang mtshan ma'i brda ston te// gding med dag la ston par ga la 'gyur// brda dang len du ma 'byor na// thabs med shes
58b7(rnying rgyud): rab zang ka bas// brdal len du brtson par bya'o// lha mo'i ngag gi sprul pa dag/ gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa// nges par legs par 'ong ba yin// de yis mor mo gnyis ston pa// g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcangs pa las//
59a1(rnying rgyud): bstan med phyug rgya'i brda yin te// g.yas pa'i mthathong bstan par b+ha// don dam bden pa ldan du ba'i// gang zhig phrin lag ston pa na// da yis mtha chung bstan par bya// kun rdzob byed ldan drab y-i// gang dug
59a2(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo ston pa la// de yis gung mo bstan par bya// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'dri ba// gang zhig srin mtheb ston pa la// de yis mgrin pa'i dus phreng bstan// lha yi sbyar bsgom nus pa yi// gang zhig gos ni ston pa la// de yis dbyug ta
59a3(rnying rgyud): tra bstan// sbyor ba'i byed pa dam pa yi// gang zhig nu ma ston pa la// de la gsang ba'i rdo rje bstan// bden rdzun legs par 'dri ba yi// gang zhig gsus pa'i so ston na// kha dang lce ni rab tu stod// bdenan sbyor ba bya ba yis// gang zhig 'khril de kye ston pa
59a4(rnying rgyud): la// bdag gi spyi gtsug dgo bar bya// sbyor ba ma nus sdigs byed pa'i// de yi khro gnyer ston pa la// de yi lag mthil bstan te bsdig mi dgos// sbyor ba'i don la nyal lo pa'i// de yis rkang mthil ston pa la// de yi gnas dgur sen mo gdang //
59a5(rnying rgyud): de ltar sbyor ba byas gyur na// tshig gi dbang gis srin mo 'du 'gyur te// slas dang grogs su the tshom med// rus phreng la sogs rgyan thogs nas// bdag la dbang ba ltur byed 'gyur na// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ci bstan yang // chos nyid mnyam
59a6(rnying rgyud): las ma g.yos na// bu yi dam tshig shes 'gyur te// e ma ha Ta ni rdo rje che// shin tu brtse ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// ma wAr dgos pa'i don byed 'gyur// brtul zhugs phyag rgya ldan gyur na// bran dang sring mong the tshom med// ma bcol bzhin
59a7(rnying rgyud): dulas rnams byed pa ni// nor bu rin chen bzhin du ba gongs// dzin las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'o// bdag gi bu mo'i tshogs ni ye shes mkhar 'gro ma// rig 'dzin sa la sprin te mngon pa nyid// rjes 'jug ga pa dag rnam shes phung po yul dang khams
59b1(rnying rgyud): rnams kun// ma spangs gnas su dag ste sangs rgyas 'ang yis 'gung // las kyi mkha' 'thab skabs pas sangs ma rgya// brda dang rtags bstan dkun sgrib pa ste// mtshan ma 'chas rgyas tang 'dzin g.yang bar bya// dbas sems dmams pas
59b2(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// las kyi mkha' 'gro 'dul ba nyid// ye shes mkha' 'gro srung ba'i shugs las 'byung ba ste// don dmade la bgrub pa'i rtags mi bcang // sngon gyi dam pas gsung rgya tshogs bsag cing// las kyi mkhadu 'gro gang dang
59b3(rnying rgyud): pho nya 'bar tshogs la// tshogs kyi lhag ma kha chus bran te sbyin// dam bcas bzhin du gsal ba'i lus bcol lo// spyan drangs ye shes mkhanga' 'grom// gtang ngag tshul du mchod phul la// nyes par shags te don gsol nas// ga
59b4(rnying rgyud): yas nyid du gshegs su gsol// bskyed pa'i mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kun// bdag nyid chen po'i yul bste// nas rim gyis mi dmigs par// thig le byang chub brtan par bsrung // gzugs brtan zhal gyis chag cag gdab/
59b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rdo rje phung pa gsang ba'i khyud chen po las/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma bsrub cing / las kyi mkha' 'gro ma yongs su dam la btags pa'i le'u ste sbram cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal por/ ngang 'dus pa
59b6(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ thabs kyi spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// khros pa'i rgyal la dbang bskur bzhin// rjes su 'jug pa ji ltar bya// zhes gsol pas// zos pa'i rgyal pos bka' phul ba// dod tshad rtag
59b7(rnying rgyud): ldan zlum mis// shA'i thugs bcang 'i thob byeng // me dang ma tog rgyas pa'am// bying byin pa ba dben du // mchod ta rdung ngam ba dag dri/ de ni dbang gi las bya'o// mchag martsam pa rnams sa dang dri/ sa
60a1(rnying rgyud): pas gon bya ba na// dkyil 'khor du ma rdzas chag chag bdag// lha rnams ca bar sngags brjod cag// 'du rgyalnga yi thig la d+d+ha// rjong pa'i bram pa 'arda ldang // drang chu rnams can // rangs dang
60a2(rnying rgyud): mthul brgyan te// zhing chen dag gi gdan la bzhugs// de nas slob ma sa gan ni// bsra ta yis srung skyed bya// rlung khrong dang pa po sh+yai \u0f7f// rdo rdo rje chu kha dag byung // dbang gi po byed mi lus cang // sa par
60a3(rnying rgyud): byung // de dag sngags dang bskul chog rnams// zhi ba'i las dang 'dra ba ste// thabs ni bdag nyid khros pa'i las su bsgyur cing rgya'o// thig rngon chog gong bzhin te// dkyil 'khor gru ba'i lba pa la// ng+ge rang bar khyam rdzung dang /
60a4(rnying rgyud): ga bkor gnyis byas la// nang can brgyad bcud nyid duH// dbus kyi po zang zlum po la// thig pa'i btab pas dekyil 'kho dbu// dbus su zug ma gcig byas te// mdun chub gnyis su thugam pa'i// phyogs kyi hU~M la sa nga
60a5(rnying rgyud): dbyabs// myur ma brgyad ma nyis 'gyur la// dbang gi phyugs bcu drug bya// thug sa rnams ni dmang par bya'o// las paka'i dbyings rje dgas dang sbyar// gzhan yang mdzes shing legs par bris// dbus su khros pa rgyal ba ste// mdun
60a6(rnying rgyud): stongs lagrwa ba zhi thob pa'o// phyir ma zlugs bcu drug dpyod// spyod phyugs bzhi yi dkyil 'khor bani// sras kyi phung ba rdza ba dgod// grum tsham sa bzhil phyag rgya bdi// zla bzhi dag la zho bskur ste// b+hag ma hA shu rtsa gad ni// shes rab
60a7(rnying rgyud): ma rgyag nyid// rgyab kyi rgyag ci na// zabs mtshag ya byor gyi// 'bras dang shes bar byed med ngan// rten dang mtsha nga mangs pa rdzogs// cho gang ma pagang banyid du// de nas gzugs par dam pa nyid// zhig bang brgya dzi
60b1(rnying rgyud): de nas dbang ga ma pa nyid// da pa// yo can dpang // rngon byu bad bltar bas// dang ba ma ma // dpa badza las dang // na sa te/ ngas pa
60b2(rnying rgyud): laM kI la yas rba bi g+h+nAn po trA~M phaT/ e ma hod ni rang byung ba'i// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i wa// 'khor ba yongs su stong ba'i phyir// ye mos sems dpas dbang b.lung ngo // dz+nyA nasarbaM/ lA pa ya / pra dang gsum la dpa /
60b3(rnying rgyud): chub sems ni mngon sum bstan// khams gsum ye shes skyed pa'i phyir// dbul rigs lngas dbang bskur ro// a AHhU~M swA hA/ ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// pha rol rten pa drug gartags// rdo rje la sogs phyag mtshan gyis//
60b4(rnying rgyud): gnas su sgrol bar shog/ zhag gi zo res don dam bcud kyi chun/ rtun cang // dalha'i thig le thugs rje chags pa'i rtags// thal chen thig le mtshan ma spos dang bral// mtshan ma gsum gyi don dam mtshon par shog/ ma hA ti ga swa/ ma hA ra rta/ ma hA ha~Mn
60b5(rnying rgyud): ri ti/ skam po chos skar ri longs spyod rdzogs// dran pa sprul pa'i sku yin to// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs kun dang // sku gsum por dbang bsrung ngo // ma hA ka pA la hUM/ sbal rigs bzhi yi chun 'khril te// mnyen la 'brel ba sku
60b6(rnying rgyud): rgyan// zhe sdang chen po'i rang bzhin pas// phrin las bzhi yis gdugs pa zhi bar shog/ ma hA nA ga hU~M/ glang chen ko rlon stobs bcu'i brjid du ldan// tshul khrims g.yang gzhi zabs la mkhas pa dang // stag lpags sham thabs dpa' bar
60b7(rnying rgyud): ldan pa yi// na bza' rgyan gyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ khams gsum zel gnon rdo rje gshog pa 'di// srid gsum 'degs byed rlung gi rang bzhin pas// g.yas pa thabs la g.yon pa shes rab ste// rdo rje gshog pa'i dbang mchog thob par
61a1(rnying rgyud): rgan rdzogs sa bang 'dul shA sa ga nga bdun pa gyud// gas sa cung man/ dgas/ na chen po pa'i kyang pa ts+tsha// An ga dang ba na tshad na pastan// dan/
61a2(rnying rgyud): thal ba'i chud 'byangs kyis// 'khong brtag na ga nyis kyi mtha gangs te// ma g.yas zlam ze rje'i don rtogs nog// 'bang bzugs rje'i rang bzhin dang // 'thobs khyab pa'i thug sa dud// 'du ba kying sa kyi sbyid // gleng ba da pa
61a3(rnying rgyud): hrIn las dang // 'khyil pa'i gnyis su med pa'i don// rdo rje me yi byang mchog thob par sheg// da ni sku yIn rkyen no// de nas mdzad pa sbyin las kyi dbang bsrung ba ni// bdag dang lag pa'i mchog rnams kyis// rab zhag sor ti d+hi byub nas//
61a4(rnying rgyud): kyis pa rabs shing dbang bskur bras// gnyis med chen po'i byini rdzob shog/ gru bral sbya ma'i rdzas mchog dam pa 'dis// sras mchog N+DI la ya lci gzi mdangs rab bskyed nas// mtshan dang dpe byud ldan gyur cing // 'gro ba'i don napas byed par
61a5(rnying rgyud): shog/ danyung dkar rgyal po'i sras mchog 'dis// bde gshegs sras mchog rnams kyi n+de// thugs dam chen po bsgral nas kyang // 'gro ba'i don rnams byed pa shog/ nga bya'i rgyal po chags pa'i bdag nyid 'dis// 'gro ba'i don la tshugs
61a6(rnying rgyud): dpa rab bskul zhing // rdzog s+ya cu'i 'jig rten rab 'bras su su// thugs rdzo chags pas 'gro ba'i don rnams byed par nog/ thugs rje chen po'i cod pa ni 'di// thabs dang shes rabartags yin te// gar+b+hang 'dzin mtha' rnams rab spangs te/
61a7(rnying rgyud): dbying nga dang ye shes mtshon par shog/ byin gsang ba'i mchod rngas to// des gsum sangs rgyas mnyis mchod cing // 'gro ba'i don la thugs bskul zhing // mtshang sbyin stobs kyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ bgrub pa'i shes rab tshon gang ga
61b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i sngags kyis rabab byed la// dus dang rgyan du bad+ma dgos pas// 'dab bskrun 'di yis dbang bsla ro// de ni mdzad pa phrin las kyi dbang // drag po babral ba'i dbang ni// dbyings dang ye shes don dam pho nya dang // thabs dpa
61b2(rnying rgyud): shes rab rtags kyi pho nya dang // 'khor ba'i gnas nas dgra bgegs 'gug pa'i phyir// mngag pa pho nya'i phur bu gzung // phyag rgya bzhi ldan phur bu 'di byin pas// dbug dang bcings dang dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// bang chad dgra bgegs
61b3(rnying rgyud): ling+ga la 'debs par shog/ rdo rje gdab phur 'di byin pas// ye shes dbyings la phur ba 'debs pa'i rtags// mtshan ma thabs kyi phur bu 'dris// gdab pa'i 'id+hA shes pa la// thabs mchog phur bu 'debs par shog/ mtshon cha lnga ldan
61b4(rnying rgyud): phung bu 'di phyin pas// 'joms byed rdo rje gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang // gtub pa'i ral gri brdung ba'i dbug to dang // gnon pa'i rgyu gram phrin las kyis// ma rig rgya mtsho 'dral bar shog/ rin chen byas pa'i phyang bu 'di byin pas// dmigs pa'i
61b5(rnying rgyud): mthu dang rtul byed lU la sogs// gnas subasbad cing rdzu 'phrul thogs nas ni// rang nyid tshe dang dbang thang rgyas par byed par shog/ khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// khro bo 'bang ba'i blo tshogs kyis// 'khor ba'i bag chags skyong ba'i phyir/
61b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i dngos po rdul du rnyog par shog/ drag po'i mchod gtor 'di byin pas// ngam can rnams kyi thugs bskul zhing // gdug cing sngar sems ldan pa rnams// lus ngag rdul du rlog par shog/ dbang mchog dug gi gtor ma 'di byin pas/
61b7(rnying rgyud): gnong byed ma lus kyis shing 'grubs pa dang // bag chags thong phyir sdig pa mthol gyur nas// myos 'tshub pa'i tshol sbyo ru chug// rdo rje srin po byed dang // rdo rje sri mo zhal gdangs par// ga rus khrag ste drug gsum mchod pa yis// dug+sa
62a1(rnying rgyud): bya/
62a2(rnying rgyud): gsum phongs nas wa gsung thugs ldan shog/ klong pa sa dkyil pa'i ho ma khyung du// 'byung 'tsho du kyang// ya mA mo yi sbyor ba par// lha rnams ma lus mnyes byed do// / do
62a3(rnying rgyud): pas// skal med kyang dran dus zadu rnams// byang chub sems ni ma skyes par// gnon byed stobs kyi dbang thob shog/ rigs rang lde she gdol pa'i rigs// kha cig khar lag tumam la// dkyil 'khor gsal bar bzhod
62a4(rnying rgyud): dbang bsrung rim pa gong bzhin no// gong gi gzungs ma de nyid las// zab mo'i dbang yang de bzhin bsrung // de ltar dbang rim rdzogs gyur na// mi zhes bya ba bder gshegs yin// sangs rgyas zhes ni lung na med// de yis las rnams 'du' pa
62a5(rnying rgyud): de ltar drag po'i dbang rdzogs nas// gnod byed ma lus rang bzhin du// zhe sdang gting nas ma g.yos kyang // rang ngam shugs kyis sgo la 'gyur na// dmigs pa bcas na ltos ci dgos// de ltar dbang mchog ma thob par// bsgral pa nyid las brtson
62a6(rnying rgyud): kyang // rang nyid tshe yi bar chad nas// 'khor ba'i g.yang sa chen por lung // de bas nan tan bskyed par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsar ba'i rgyud chen po las/ khro bo phrin las kyi dbang baphur ba'i le'u se sum can gnyis pa //
62a7(rnying rgyud): de nas pang rdo rje 'dus pa'i 'dri skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag/ bde gshegs rol pa'i rjes 'jug pa'i// rdo rje'i dbang rdzogs rnal 'gyor pas// rjes su 'jug dang dmachog rtogs// bsreng 'i dmachog rnam pa gang // phyi rabs
62a8(rnying rgyud): ru bstan du gso la/ rdo rdzogs rabs pa/ 'phrul ba/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus pa ga so// dam tshig mchog ces byab// rtogs pa 'don nyid yin pa ste// de las 'das na tshig par 'gyur // rtogs pa 'don tog// bde gshegs kyi// zhal nas
62b1(rnying rgyud): da ga/ dud su na ma // na/
62b2(rnying rgyud): pa ngas bya/ da gas//
62b3(rnying rgyud): ra 'dod// bzlam sa pag su nga spya par nga/ byi'i pa mag shes pa nga/ ba gsang thebs kyis thod nas ma na zung/ pa lte ba thong // sa kyid
62b4(rnying rgyud): thong dngas pab babyed pa pa dang / ga ba pa// da ming pa ga phy-i dus yin nga // dag leg par mthong pas pangs b+ha te/ kyidang ngo
62b5(rnying rgyud): gsapa sa/ 'phru g+hi'i ba bshi / la 'a nga phrul/ da pa ba dang / gas da ga yor
62b6(rnying rgyud): nga bang gsusas ra// gan pa du da 'a / shA D+h+we gyu / // 'dus
62b7(rnying rgyud): da po'i thababyad do// da dang nges pa 'dod rtogs par bya// khyang bangang mag bsrid bde// gan ga kyang rgyal ba se ga pa/ gsad par bya ba'i ngas ma yin// bang tog ga ring ched dag/ drag dmas thob pa de ni/
63a1(rnying rgyud): sug ma dag/ rbad nas gcad par bya ba med// gangs kyi phun chu bo'am dag/ khong du bzung bar mi rigs so// parba rgyas pa'i ze'u 'bru dag/ kha pe spyad par mi bya'o// zug rdol can tu lding dag tu// gsang
63a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i bzad rnams byugs pa min// ma brtags pa yi zas dang nor// mi bsrel bcang bar mi bya'o// shel grong bzhin dugs la zhing drag pa dag/ 'dam du bsgrub par mi bya'o// seng gi dkar mo'i 'o ma dag/ rin chen gser gyi sdod du thugs
63a3(rnying rgyud): pa las// dug tAn dag tu ga la zugs// dgos 'dod bskang ba'i yid bzhin nor bu dag/ thab tu bsreg par yang mi bya// bu rtsal khyung gi gshog pa dag/ bcag par bya ba la yin no// gnam lcags ngung mo'i mtshon cha dag/ sa la brtab par
63a4(rnying rgyud): me bya'o// stag gzig srol ba'i las byas pa'o// las kyi mtha' ma mi nyul lo// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa dag/ bshig cing 'bral bar mi bya'o// rdo rje rabs bskor bdag/ go mtshams bshig par mi bya'o// mun pa sel ba'i sgron
63a5(rnying rgyud): ma dag/ gsad cing bslab par mi bya'o// rdo rje chu bo'i rdol kha dag/ bcad cing bsgyur bar bya ba min// rgyal po rtags kyi phyag rgya dag/ gzhan la sbyin bu'i rigs ma yin// rdo rje mkhar rjo gtum pa dag/ rmang nas bzlog ste mi bshig go//
63a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal mtshan rtse la btags pa'i nor bu dag/ 'dod pa'i sems kyis dbog par mi bya'o// khyad par bston pa'i dam tshig don yang yang // mdor bsdus pa ni nye shu'i don dang bstun// sa la gnas shing myod pa'i rnal 'gyor pas// bdag
63a7(rnying rgyud): kan gnyis kyi don du lung bar bya'o// lhag pa'i dam tshig gnas par bya ba ni// mdor nartsa ba banor bstan te// spyod btsun dang rang bzhin lta ba dang // lba ba nyam pa rjod gal mdongs pa bzhi// yan lag don nyid bshad pa ni// rtsod pa
63b1(rnying rgyud): chun la dam tshig bzhir gnas te// gnyid kyi dgra spang myos 'gyur dgra bgegs gzhom// gsang ba'i brda bsrung le lo'i bdud gzhom mo// rang gzhan blta ba'i dam tshig bzhir bstan te// srid gsum po dam su bsgral ba dang // khams
63b2(rnying rgyud): gsum zhing du bskal ba'i dang // dus gsum mi ru bsgyur ba dang // 'khor ba gnas su dag par blta'o// lta ba'i nyams drod dam tshig gzhir gnas te// gdal ba chos nyid lta ba yi 'byams su// rig pa'i ye shes lta ba ye gas
63b3(rnying rgyud): du// sprul pa'i phyag brtan lta ba yi gnas su// khyab pa'i snying rje lta ba kun khyab pa'o// gal mdo nges pa'i mdo gsum mo// mkhrel ba yi tshul dang ni// ma nyams pa yi mdo dag dang // mthar phyin pa yi rtags nyid do// ya khrel ba yi tsu la
63b4(rnying rgyud): la gnyis// bde gshegs thugs kyis ma pas dang // gang zag yid kyis ma dpyad pa'o// nyams pa'i don la bzhir gnas te// zla bos nyams dang zhor la nyams// dbang med nyams dang kun tu nyams pa'o// mthar phyin rtags kyis de bzhin bzhi sung
63b5(rnying rgyud): dam can 'du zhing mthu rtsal che ba dang // byin rlab che zhing rig pa chags pa gnyis// yid 'ong 'byung zhing 'dod pa grub pa dang // mang pos bgur zhing grags pa thob pa bzhi'o// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'gyod pas// lhag pa'i dam tshig don la gnas
63b6(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// lci dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig rnams// rtogs shing bsrut+pa te gnas par byas gyur na// sa gzhi chen po 'dra ste kun kyang bskyed// nam mkha' da dra ba 'dra ste go yang 'byed// sreg pa me dang 'dra ste bag chags sreg/ rlan pa chu dang 'ja
63b7(rnying rgyud): dag par byed// g.yo brdung dang 'dra ste 'thor bar byed// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ste re bskong // gcan gzan seng ge bzhin te zil gyis gnon// gakhung du bsrungs na rang sgang 'bras bur 'char// rgyun tu bsrings na sangs byas sa la spod// de la sogs
64a1(rnying rgyud): ta yon tan bsam mi khyab// nyams par 'gyur bas mi 'grub ste// dngos su nyams na ljon shing mes tshig 'dra// zur gyis nyams nas blan mas nyams 'dra// kun tu nyams na brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// de yis
64a2(rnying rgyud): bklubs kyang mi 'grub ste// slar la rang sems rlag pa dang // 'bras bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// tshe dang srog gi bar ched 'ong ba dang // 'jig rten sgo dang srung ba'i gzhi// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dang // dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis
64a3(rnying rgyud): skad cig tsam yang sgra mi bya// sbas na dam bca' 'bras bu pad+mag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor de// dam la gnas pa'i rnal 'phrod pas// dang du blangs te basbal bar bya// bskal bzhi pa'i mchog yin no// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i badrag pos/
64a4(rnying rgyud): dmachog gsang ba'i bkor ba mdor gsungs shing bstan to// rdo rje phrang pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig rim par skye pa'i le'u ste gru bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas yang nyid las mi gzhan pa'i rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog dam pa des/
64a5(rnying rgyud): ru ka dpal la yang gsol ba ni/ gdug byed rtswa cal sogs pa'i// tshe dang gzi byin kun grogs te// khros pa'i lha tshogs tshe dang gzi byin rgyas mdzad pa'o// rol pa'i mdzad stong e mdo mtshar che'o// de yi rjes spong rnal 'byor pas// / jo bo'i
64a6(rnying rgyud): nyams cho ldog tsha 'thong ba// rjes su balbub na ji lter bgyi// zhes gsol ba'i don thugs su chud de/ bka' stsal ba ni/ tshe dbang chen po'i gnas dag ni// 'khor log na ma la pad+ma pa// ri bo chen po rab dben dang // yid 'od me tog rgyas pa ste/
64a7(rnying rgyud): dbyibs 'bri'is gzhi rab tu brtag/ yang na sngo ro gcig ma dang mes reg dang // lung gsum mdo dang dur khrod gnas// 'bab rgya chen po'i ngos su bslab// lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang // gdon rnams zhi bar bya ba dang // sri rtse'i nyes dkrigs ba
64b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// phyi yi ga sdor ma btang nas ni// rab tu gsang ste rgyan rnams bsags// dur khrod bdag po khyo shug dag/ brjid pa'i stobs kyis gnan par bya// dang po ma yi lha mo mchod// 'khor rnams kun la gtor ma sbyin// bden tshig
64b2(rnying rgyud): gnas su btad // ho kye gzhung ngu rtag byas nas// bgos las po ro rdza bsal// shin tu 'jams la sum pa'is// 'bras par legs pa nyid du bya// khru gang gyen du 'phags pa pa// zur ni grung ni te nga gyi// bkri shis dpa bsrung
64b3(rnying rgyud): shin tu gsar zhing mdzes pa yi// mkhas pas rab tu thogs nas ni// thig gi cha ni rnam par dbye// byang chub sems kyi thig le b+ha// lha rnams spyan drang bas ma mchod bstod// sdug 'tshal lha gon gnas gsol gdang // bkra shes pa
64b4(rnying rgyud): khrus byas phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab// slang lhung chems shing kha dag bya// ku she'i stan 'dug lta brtag ste// rtags kyi tshad rnams gces par bshad// rin chen sna lnga 'am dri zhim shing // yang nas las byas pA pi// bum pa'i mchog nye
64b5(rnying rgyud): bar bya// bdag nyid chen po he ru ka'i// tshe yi ye shes khyad par las// pad+ma 'dus pa spyan sngar te// rdo rje 'dus pacu 'phyogs su// gzhan rnams go rim bzhin du bsam// gzhan yang 'byung lnga'i snying po lnga// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang /
64b6(rnying rgyud): lnga la sogs mgul chings gzungs// la mngar sbur rlan lham pos dgang // tshe 'dzin mchog dang zas kyis brgyan// rgyan dang mchod pa bye brag sogs// bu mo gzhon nus bkal tshon spyad// gos rgyan mdzes pa yid 'od gzungs// phyi nang gas
64b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i mchod par ldan// thig go cho ga rim par bya// kha dog lnga yis mtshan par bya// cho ga bzhin du byas byas la// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin du// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// b+ha ga he 'i dkyil 'khor pa// rdo rje'i brag gis rnam par
65a1(rnying rgyud): !\u0f7f/ gtanas// dbang gi rgyug ma hA shu gcig/ rga zlas padz+ra klas paH// thag sa tham kyang ba la// ya ba rnams thabs kyi thag cang // sngagasang thugs nyi ga nga dgos// rdzun rdza bcwa 'dus pa sa// rdzogs
65a2(rnying rgyud): cha bzhi la rigs bzhi'o// sgo ba'i dag tu sgo srung dgod// byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam pa ni// spang ba'i 'od drung bcas pa bkram// sa baspyod pa mthar phyin pa'i// lung dang man ngag med mas brgyad// dngang mi ldog ma chog gnas// byangs bya
65a3(rnying rgyud): sems lang ba gzhol cing // byams dang snying rje ldan pas bsgrub// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// rnam par mi rtog rtog las 'das// 'di ni mi 'gyur byang chub sems// mkha' la de bzhin rol pa'i sku// de yi che ba'i byin rlab las// dkyil 'khor
65a4(rnying rgyud): bsam las ldan gyis grub// bu mo lo grangs nyi shu la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod de// sel ba can gyi mthu chen gyis// rnam gsum dag tu nan tan bya// rin chen la sogs bum pa la// dzaHshrI be hoHbzhis bkug la// sku gsung
65a5(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi snying po'i mchog/ lus ngag yid la bstim par bya// dri nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod// bum pa mchog ni bzang po yis// tshe bzhag gnas ni de bzhin no// yang nas yang du dgug byas nas// mngon sum byin par gyur pa
65a6(rnying rgyud): drang // dbyings su yang ni sba bar bya// rdo rje cho gas bsrung ba ni// brtan cing 'khor los gdab par bya// ldeng po 'byung lnga'i nang du bstim// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal po tshe dpag med par bsgom// sku mdog gangs
65a7(rnying rgyud): ri 'tsher ba la// rgyan phreng sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// yid bzhin rin chen spong ba dang // za ma tog dang rin chen dang // bum pa bzang la sogs pa yis// gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba'o// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas
65b1(rnying rgyud): mag// bgags kyis rnams sa stod na// yod pa gsod ci / sa ba nas sa pa'i khams bkang nas// bla ma drug do rgyad na ni / thams cadas sus tha'abyungadz+ram// tshad pagamad pa'i dbyung du bathang/
65b2(rnying rgyud): dang ni nye bskyen dang // tshe sbub dang ni srub chen po// thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis// ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par byed// tshe dbang mo ni chud 'phel mo// dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phro 'gyur// phyag na rin chen gang ba yi//
65b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya sna tshogs ci yang 'gyur// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas// gsang ba'i 'gro zug thams cad la// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin na// de las phan pa'i nus mthu med// yi ge bzlas pa 'phrul chen ni// rnam gsum tshul
65b4(rnying rgyud): du smras na ma ldan mamims /
65b5(rnying rgyud): A A A A A yu yu yu ru u/ shwe shweshweSh+Te shwe k+She/ hu~M hU~M tra~M traM trAM/ A a A A A/ tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na// bde gshegs lnga yang tshe dpag med// gru gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni// phyogs bcu na ma mkha'
65b6(rnying rgyud): khams bkang nas// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas// 'gro drug tshe rnams dbang du spyad// gshol dang gtun shing phyag rgya yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas// gshi
65b7(rnying rgyud): gnas nas cho bkug nas// snying po lnga lab sgrim par bya// phyag rgya 'khor lo chen po yis// steng gi 'jig rten khams dbugs te// dbang drag chen po la sogs pa'i// bar skang bgegs rnams chub las// khri 'o drag tu dgug par byed// 'khor mo'i 'phrul la stim par bya//
66a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ de nas yi ge 'brul ste// ni yi gnas ldang ba stim par bya// oM waM Sh+kaM/ badz+rak+ka thAgaH/ badz+ra ragar+b+ha/ Asarban thA ga tar+tha/ ta ya ad+hitrAHba dz+raswAH/ phyag rgya bsrung ba'i chog // 'brug cig mi dmigs dbyi
66a2(rnying rgyud): mu thim// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// rgyan dang rin chen phreng bas brgyan// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // 'bru lnga spos lnga snying po lnga// gsang mkha' rab ldan blo ldan pas// yan lag ma nyams gsang sngags bsgom// rgyan cha lnga dang ldan
66a3(rnying rgyud): byas nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog nges// yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par bya// gdong nas byang chub snying po la// rnam
66a4(rnying rgyud): rtog las kyis 'khor ba rnams// rnal 'byor dbang phyug thabs mkhas pas// 'khor ba'i dra ba bkral nas ni// yab yus gnyis med mkha' la ba sbal// sgrub pa po yi las su ni// brtul zhugs bskyed de sbyor rgol btsam// de dag sngags kyi
66a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ste// ming gis mi bya mi rung ngo // gal te byas na ltung bar 'gyur// ma byas na yang ltung bar 'gyur// rab brtags bsgom ste bya bar gsungs// rab bskyed spyan drangs mchod byas nas// bsnyen pa gzhung bzhin brtson par bya'o// 'bum
66a6(rnying rgyud): mam sum 'bum bzlas nas ni// ma btab bzhin du las rnams 'grub// bsrub pa'i bar chad byed pa dag/ nyin mtshan kung la rab bkug ste// gzugs la phab ste bcings la bzhag/ ting 'dzin bsar te rab tu gdab// mgo dang tsik+Shu lte ba
66a7(rnying rgyud): la// gsang gnas yan lag bzhi la gdab// bden pa bdar zhing yang nas yang // gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor du// bcu gnyis sam ni rtsa gcig gis// rked nas bskor la gnad du brdeg/ gnan cing gdir ba'ang de bzhin te// de
66b1(rnying rgyud): nas tshe yi dngos grub dag/ nges pa nyid du blang bar bya// bder gshegs mtshan brjod bkra shis gsol// rol mo yid 'ong mnyes mchod 'bul// gtor ma tshogs gsum gnas su dgye// bsku dang bsrung ba de bzhin te// rigs ma bsdu ba dang
66b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed par bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gzi byin tshe gsang bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rdo rje gsar pa
66b3(rnying rgyud): bdag/ sems can kun gyi sems can po// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi mchog/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bder gshegs rol pa'i mdzad spyod kyis// drang ba'i don du kun rdzob don bstan nas// nges pa'i don du ba
66b4(rnying rgyud): sems rtogs bzhin// phyi rabs don du bstan du gsol// a la la ho zhes bya bas ni// gsol ba'i don bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs chud do// chos nyid byang chub sems kyi de kho na nyid la cung zhig mnyam par bzhag ste/ nyon cig rdo rje 'dus
66b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gtso/ don dam byang chub sems kyi don zhus pa ya mtshan che'o// byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni// thams cad kun gyi rgyu 'bras te// rgyu las 'bras bu btsal ba'i phyir// kun rdzob don bstan ming grib cing // 'bras bu don dang ldan pa ste//
66b6(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob kun la mi gnas pas// 'bras bu don dam byang chub sems nyid sbyang bar bya'o// nges don bzod nas ma skyes rang bzhin ni// rnam par dag pa'i yum gyi tshul// ma skyes mi 'gag zabs kyi sku// rig pa'i rgyal po dang byung bas// thams
66b7(rnying rgyud): cad ma lus dbang du sdud// thabs kyi rgyal po bdag gnas par// 'gro kun tha med gnas su bsgral// chos kun rtsab sems yin pas// brtags shing don du rang sems bzang // sems nyid rtsa ba'i don rtogs shing // 'gyur med klong du don mnyam na//
67a1(rnying rgyud): gas gsu rdzon// rnam sbyang sa na// da pal gas tu rnam ma// tha sa smras // nga byang 'du phyi pas// thad pa mangs
67a2(rnying rgyud): srid gsum 'gro ba gad ba bcad// byang chub sems kyi phur du yis// ma btab bzhin du ldan gyis phug// mnyam pa'i rgyal po rig pas gdab// gyur pa chos nyid datings kyi rtags// byang chub sems kyi thar pa des// gzhan dra dadab pa ga
67a3(rnying rgyud): med de// gnyis med ma bcos chos dbyings la// rang rig zung chub sems kyis gdag// phung du 'dzin chags mngan 'das// matogs bzu dzin dang dang gal// dngos po kun thal phrad pa pas// dngos po byi mngag lag dang /
67a4(rnying rgyud): la gnyis med mya ngan 'das// glad ba dang mi gdabu gnyis las 'das// phung ba rtse ba med pa'i dod// sa rmis gdal ba'i phung ba yis// dacings la btab pas rig pa shad// sems la btab pas don dum rtogs// rang bad la rang bzhi zung pa yi
67a5(rnying rgyud): snang snang bskal nab par 'dug// dag phyogs rnapangs pa y-i// mngo ldan pa m-i/ tshogalas 'das na sangs nas sa ngas nas byung // dang mas// par #
67a6(rnying rgyud): nges zhes // nga ni sgrub 'ang pa' zangs// pa ni gag pa rjid // dkris pa med pas ma 'dras/ @// gas bdan pa'i dzin// dgas mye marnam pas ngo dra// ngas sa thab dam
67a7(rnying rgyud): nga pa gnags sa 'dra// kun la sngags pa' bor srung // sa kyi shing phung pa yis// rnam na nyi bye pa ya // sems kyigs sa ca pa 'o// drar ba chung gyi rgyal po me / nga pa srung ga dus med/ sa panang ba
67b1(rnying rgyud): dro// gas mo gang 'angs brjong pa / zlatha pa nyas 'ag tas dang // 'phrul la gang bam pa tu// mnyung nas TI gang bar gags// gas la bar byas pa tha ci/ nyams thag zung na bsngal da ra// gnyis ma ma na gyur ba san/
67b2(rnying rgyud): rtogs ni thebs pa yin// thags rjes zin na dmachod yin// de lta bu mngon ldan na// 'bar ba ngan song mya ngan rlom// drug bsngal byang chub byar na thos// sems can sangs rgyas rdzi ngan ltos// yul ni dbyings su kyang zlos// ma
67b3(rnying rgyud): gcan zung bdir gshegs su// rigs drag sems can ma ngan thos// se pas ni ches nyid kyang na thos// thams cad 'thung rgya sems yin pas// sem su la sa byung ngas med do// sems cid grol bar bya ba'i phyir// chos kyi bye brag
67b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin par da// gnas med segs kyi rang bzhin// tra 'bras gnyis las byung 'dus// 'dzid rtagasang pa'i thar pa la// dbyebs dang 'dag 'a ba ldan// gzugs dang 'jog sa pa grags// 'og tog sbyin gyilas
67b5(rnying rgyud): du byung tha ba dus// byur ba ba na dam sa rnamapa' nga d+ha 'thag// na du rdzu sna thug nas/
67b6(rnying rgyud): ma dag / gas meng marji su byu ga// da gsum dbang nga / rnam gas rnams 'das pa / byed pa gas
67b7(rnying rgyud): 'dru zhing // bcom ldan 'das dang skal pa gcig/ byang chub sems ni mang ngasus bkas// theg mar gzhal yis byang chub sems// da'i rgyu 'bras ma bkag cas// bsgrub pa'i ye shes tshan gang ba'o// gas pa blag cis babyed nas ni me /
68a1(rnying rgyud): rabab rgyan cing // khams gsum tho bos gang bar mdzad// gnyis ldan sgra gsung thugs su ldan// skra yi tshogs ni rab brgyan te// thugs la 'bang ba'i srog kyang 'azhugs// dbul rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
68a2(rnying rgyud): bsrung // khro bo mang pos gzir mnan nas// yul ni rnam par sgrol ba'i thugs// srid gsum khro bor rtogs pa'i ngang // srid pa gsum yang khengs zhes bya// de nas phur pa'i byang chub sems// rang byung gzugs med kun kyang pas//
68a3(rnying rgyud): sgra 'bras gnyis las mya ngan 'das// khams gsum ye shes bskyed nas ni// rang byung ye shes gsal ba'i rtags// phung pa ye shes khro bo la// nyi zla ri rab phur bu'i rgyan// shin tu brjid pa'i ye shes kyis// ba gting med pa'i thar pa la/
68a4(rnying rgyud): po'i tshogs kyis rab brgyan nas// rang byung ye shes shar ba'i phyir// khams gsum dbang du yang dag bsrub// khams gsum gdug pa bskal ba'i phyir// dag pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // tsham rnams pa'i byin rmog ltar 'bar/
68a5(rnying rgyud): gsum rtsa dag bcad pa'i phyir// me dpung gsum gyis khams bsregs shing // lhan gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// spyan drang bzhugs gsol dbyer med bstim// gnyis med gsum gyis khams bsregs nas// ye shes 'bar ba'i rmi
68a6(rnying rgyud): las brlab// khams gsum dus gcig dbang bskur nas// rang byang spu ru rnam dag cing // rab tu srog gi gor shum nas// gnyis ldan sku gsung thugs su ldan// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su gsal// dus gcig le ba can 'bar bar
68a7(rnying rgyud): snying ga mye steng spyi bo nas// yi ge 'bru gsum 'gro 'du las// sku gsung thugs su byin brlab dbang yang 'askur// hU~M oM AH/ rnam par shes pa ye shes mchog/ rang phyung phur bu mya ngan 'das// srog dang dbugs kyi byin brlabs ni//
68b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' lta bu'i ngang nyid las// gnyis med don gyi zla byung bas// byang chub sems kyi phur bu yis// snang phrad chos dbyings dang shing du// ma btab bzhin du kun gyi grub// snang srid daphung thar shang ba'o phyir// bdag dang lag pa'i mchog rnams la/
68b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis mod dbyings su sbyor ba'i phyir// yum bzhi'i phyag rgyas byin brlabs te// lag tu grangs te dril bas kyang // khams gsum sdang ba'i dug rnams te// dag pa'i dbyings su sbal ba'i phyir// dpa' po lawA tra'i 'gro 'du yis// l+r-ing
68b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya ste// rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku gsung sngags// rang bung ljang bur byin gyis bza // rab tu phrag bsngal gsal bar 'gyur// rdo rje rab tu kI la ya// dadzas po byings su bskal ba'i phyir// drag tu gsong thos byas nas kyang // chos
68b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// sems kyi sul ni rnam bsgral te// yeshes su yis khyab par gnas// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu// ldang srid phur bung nang ben// mkha' la de bzhin rol pa'i sra// chos dbyings jig leng gang du phyir// ma lus phur ba
68b5(rnying rgyud): 'debs zhes bya// gnyis med don gyi ngo bo las// rdzogs nas rang gang gsal phyir du// byang chub sems kyi khyad par gyis// nyon mongs sug bsngal spang ba'i phyir// khams gsum gsol bar bskal bar bya// nyon mongs ye shes gnas gyur cing /
68b6(rnying rgyud): srid gsum dbyings su bskal bar bya// de nas a las nam dag pa'i// srid pa gsum du gsal 'arjod nas// bdag dang phur bu byung chub sems// sems can lus la bstim byas te// spros shing bsdus pas bAs byas ka/ 'khor ba gsum na
68b7(rnying rgyud): sa// danas bras chen sus 'a// shes ma du byinges pa'as// babyed pa med pa'i tha bcos// dmangs pa sa dpa rgyas/ gshegs nanas/ gti pag med pa'i dbyi
69a1(rnying rgyud): 6napa me pa lagasaH// nya yang da ste bsgral bas nas// slad gsum phrad pas thobs zhus bya// sdang med kyi'atho thang pa' gzugs// mthanas ga rdzab tu gyung bsam// zhus rab / dbang bags// nas/
69a2(rnying rgyud): 'di brjod do// hU~M rang byung mchog sems gsal phyir du// mnyam nyid rtsal gyis bdag nyid bskal// de bzhin hU~M gis drangs nas kyang // phur bu gzi ldan thob 'gyur cing // gnyis med chos sur gcig pa'i phyir// yul de'i sems
69a3(rnying rgyud): dang 'od zer phur bu las// bdag la 'dus pas tshe ru zhim// de gnyis med kyis bskal phyir ro// bdag gi rnam shes tshegs brgyad nas// gang zhig gnas pa'i mchog rnams la// rdo rje phur bu mang shar nas// de yi tshogs brkyang dag par bya'o//
69a4(rnying rgyud): khams gsum chos nyid gdang bcad phyir// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung ngu// khro tshogs 'bar ba'i tho tshogs kyis// rdo rje thobs brdung byas nas// khums gsum ma lus bskal bar 'gyur// rtog 'dzin med pa'i dbang phyug des// mnyam pa'i rgyal
69a5(rnying rgyud): bos sbags par bsngal// shin tu gsol bas dgyes bstar nas// za byed kun la bstab par mdzod// ha ha bgyis pas dgyes par rol// hU~M hU~M bgyis pas dbang du srud// kha kha bkyis pas lhag ma ba zhes// bdag dang gsum du ldan nas kyang //
69a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi dbang spros pas// phung po rdul du rdzogs nas kyang // sha khrag khams gsum dag par dmigs// hU~M gis rab tu nam mkha' gang // phan gyis kun tu gtor byas nas// rdo rje ye shes tshen gang gis// khams gsum byang chub
69a7(rnying rgyud): sems bskyed dang // 'grib ma lus don pa'i phyir// sred pa'i gdang sha ba cad nas kyang // spong ba rnam pa bcu dang ldan// ljang gu las kyi sa bon te// dmar po srog gi sa bon yin// mthing gahe ru ka yi thugs// spros pas thig les nam mkha' khyab/
69b1(rnying rgyud): mas cad 'dras pas ga tu brjod/ thab rnamams sa rung bdang// khams gsus dung tho tha sa/ thugs rna chags pas bskul dang byung // blad pa 'gang d+hagab nas kyang // slong padamang batha //
69b2(rnying rgyud): grolas bcad// grub mtha' 'di la 'jig mtha' med// de ni ma dgyur byang chub sems// mya ngan 'das lnga rtag pa'o// sgrib pa med pas mthar phyin te// bcol du med pas ye nas thab// brkam pa las kya mya ngan 'das/
69b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten kun las 'das pas na// 'dzin dang rtog pa rnams sangs nas// byang chub sems ni skad cig ma// lhan ni par yang bdag nyid sbyor// 'jig rten kun las grub pa'i rgyal// mi nub pa yi rtags bcas shing // rdo rje sems dpa
69b4(rnying rgyud): mkha' la nub// nub mtha' med pas shin tu spangs// yid ni chos nyid mya ngan 'das// rnam shes hUM du mya ngan 'das// hU~M nyid byang chub sems kyi gzhi// byang chub sems ni phur pa ru// zhi gsum ma lus mya ngan 'das// phyi nang gsang bas
69b5(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'i chos thams cad// mthar thug pa byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin phur bas ldan gyis grub par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyung chen po las/ phur bu byang chub sems kyi de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsalnga pa'o// / de nas
69b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// rjes su spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// las dang lus kyi dbad+ma btsan nas// tshe yi dus byas pas kyis lus sems bral 'gyur na// lus sems gnas spang dge ba'i stongs ni gang // zhes gsol pas/
69b7(rnying rgyud): khros pas bkang phul ba ni/ lus sems gnas srung dge ba'i stongs byan// gang zhig lus sems thal 'gyur na// zhag grangs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tsun mang du// las 'di byas na spongs su 'gyur// rnal 'byor rgyal shugs ldan pa las// rjod ni
70a1(rnying rgyud): su/ gzhal pas bcud nas// dngos sdang sbal skra grag gsung // rang bzhin med thugs yin te// lugs thugs sa gsal ba dang // des b+han rnab smrab papas// 'das tan dugag zugs bshang nas// 'an nga/
70a2(rnying rgyud): ru dzas/ rgyung drug gang na gnas kyang sems drangs la// gsal bang thugs rjes lus la ba sgrim// de bzhin yang du yang du bya// rnam tog lus su gsal ba des// 'dir gshegs sna ba'i dkyil 'khor 'o// phyag btsapa gsol btub 'jug pa
70a3(rnying rgyud): smra ma thaM na // co // sa gang/ sgyu nga sa
70a4(rnying rgyud): smras na
70a5(rnying rgyud): na po'i sbyor ba mdzad// myong ba'i 'od zer chung 'dus pas// gsang ba'i byang chub sems dbang bskur// de nas lha rnams tshang ba'i bstod bsngags kyi don brjod de// ma sbar bzlog ste brjod pas ni// lha rnams kun gyi sags dbang bskur// de
70a6(rnying rgyud): nas bsdu ba'i sa bon gyis// gtso bo nyid kyi thugs kar bsdus// rdo rje yum drangs pad+mo'i dkyil// dbyings nas yi ge phyag rgya'i sgrar gsal te// de la phan pa'i dbang rnams kyis// bcu drug zla rdzogs pa ltar// su lim khyen rdzogs par
70a7(rnying rgyud): bsang // de ni sems srung rim par bshad// de yi sras la dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gsal// brtul grags phyag chang ging chen gyis// ro ni rab tu bshig gyur na// gang nas sha rus khrag babs bud// dri ma rba dum zur gzub nas ni//
70b1(rnying rgyud): don rtogs su yi tshogs la 'bral// dang po gzhung ldan gnas su ni// gzugs brtan dam pa mngon bzhengs pa// las kyi rim pa rdzogs pa dang // khro bo rol pa'i sbyangs stabs dang // khro mo gsang pa'i gar tshogs dang // ma namag brtan
70b2(rnying rgyud): kyis// dri de nyid ni rkang bar bya// rgya nachog dag gis bkrus nas ni// tri pis blag ste ras kyis zil// de la lha yi snying po dgod// sreg khang rim pa bzhi brtsegs te// dang po ba dbyi bas gnyis pa ye// gsu mu pA yA gzugs ba
70b3(rnying rgyud): drang po las kyi nyon mongs zhi badra bya// gnyis pa las kyi gsheng lcags drag pos bsgral// gsum pa las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug ste// dbang rnams rdzogs par rol pa slar// dra zhi ba zhi khro'i lha rnams kun// de yi phral byas par shas
70b4(rnying rgyud): mo nyid zhal gyi bo yi// phyi nang gsang bya'i mchod bas mchod// bstod de 'dod yon gsol ba gdab// yang na 'thung ngam nyid la// dmatshig me lha bskyed nas ni// ye shes me la spyan drung mtshan// de nyi grag la yas nang du
70b5(rnying rgyud): ngas bsam snyan dngas bzhugs gsol mchod// de nas ro de rab bshig nas// sa rnams kun pa bsod mchong 'bum// de ba dri na sras kyi gnas 'byongs nas// sems nyid spyod 'gror ma gzhan// yang na ngas la 'khor mngon bzhed
70b6(rnying rgyud): lha rnams sun gyi gang gnas su// ro ba shig drung khrod rdzas sra dpralnga// lha rnams ldan drang mchod pastong bsum// snying po byin dus rnal 'byor ror// des ni dngos grang mchog thob 'gyur// de nas las na nas rdzogs par bya//
70b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal drus turdzon// nga mang slong nga marnams / sa ba khyod nas// sa sa gas ba // de gyur bas su myong ba / u ngags pa myi ma dang // marje rnamags su
71a1(rnying rgyud): pas// sgras mchog khor ba yus mo// kyeg zug gnas du'i tu mdzad ba'ar// dbul pa'i mcha bzhinam rgyal 'khor// lag g.yas zla bzhi phyag sngon 'khor// chags byud phred bzhag shin rdzam dang / gang sa
71a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi mi g.yo 'khor// gsang ba'i gnas bzhi na mgrin 'khor// rkang g.yon lha bzhi ga zhan gyis mi thung 'khor// thugs kar gnas bzhi bdud rtsi 'khor// lag g.yon sku bzhi khams gsum bskor// sna ma khung gnas bzhi stobs chen la
71a3(rnying rgyud): yan lag sde bzhi sgo ma bzhi// de las sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kun// dam la btags pa'i dam can skong // yang na rtsa ba'i rim pa la// yang na nyon mongs rims pa'o// de ltar las kyi stangs byas na// lus sems bral ba'i gang zag du/
71a4(rnying rgyud): mi ldeg pa'i sa la gnas// mngon sangs rgyas la the tshom med// ces gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rnal 'byor pa sgrub pa po dang / gang zag gang yang tshe'i dus byas nas/ dge ba'i las kyi stangs gdab pa'i le'u
71a5(rnying rgyud): sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// bde gshegs rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog gi bdag/ glang dor med pa'i mdzad spyod kyis// drag po nyon mongs la zhen pa'i// zag
71a6(rnying rgyud): bcas longs spyod rnam lnga po// zag med bdud rtsir rol pa dang // thugs rje gsal gyi mdzad spyod kyis// 'bru dang sman rnams thams cad kun// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa kun// sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi gsos su mdzad pa'i
71a7(rnying rgyud): rjes su 'jug pas ji ltar bgyi// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog la bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol te// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog gis bka' stsal pa// e ma ho rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// bdud rtsi'i don zhus
71b1(rnying rgyud): pa'am tshan rjo// bdud rtsi'i don nyid bshad byan// nyon mongs pa yi bdud nying la// drags rgyun bdu btang na// khyab pa'i thugs rje men po yis// dbyangs su 'artul ba'i bdud rje 'don pa dang 'byung // bran rdzob tags srung srub rnga//
71b2(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob kyis ni sgrub pa ste// srid gsum b+han+ta bzang 'khor yug/ ye nus ma bcos rang bzhin sdod// de yi nang du thugs pa'i sngan// bcud kyi rnab lo ma rnams// dbyer med dang du bsdog par bya// de la nges pa'i bsam pa yis//
71b3(rnying rgyud): nyid dri ba sgrub par bya// mi phyed dgra dang ldan pa yis// tha ma rdo rje spod dpon gyis// thams cad mi lus don 'gyur// bdud rtsi dam pa bslab par bya// rin chen ri dang sman ljongs dang // rtsi sman 'khrungs pa'i sa phyogs sum// nags
71b4(rnying rgyud): bas gtibs pa'am// yid 'ong me tog rgyas par bsgrub// 'khor du bya ba'i rim pa yang // gyon drug rnam par spangs pa yis// nyi shu'am bcu'am yang na nyi shu la// khrims dang sdom pas bcing pa min// dang por ba'i chos brgyad la//
71b5(rnying rgyud): ni brtsam pa'i dus yin te// rtags kyi don nyid mthong ba'am// dus ni bcu drug nyid la don// yo byad ma lus ldan 'gyur na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// mtshogs pas ni srub thag ring // de bas yo byad ldan par bya// bkra shis
71b6(rnying rgyud): mchog ldan b+ha r+b+ha lnga// phyi nang gsang ba'i rtsa brgyad stong // dbang por sA ya na kun// so so'i rigs dang sdom gyi la// sman gyi bsung ma so sor bstim// dmangs rnams kyi rtog pa gzhom// rigs kyi kha dog dang gyis dgab// mtshan ldan pa
71b7(rnying rgyud): shes gzungs thig gdags// bkod ba rgyan spyo dkyil tshor ro// dkon mchog ngas la mchod bya yin// bsrub pa'i zhag grangs 'di tsam par// bar chad bgags rnams pas la byir du// gyi nang gsang ba'i chu 'bral bsdams// 'bar nga ma tshams//
72a1(rnying rgyud): kyad kyim na dang // nyan mangs pag chags gags pan byed// 'tham sa'i bzhugs pa zlab ste// nganas spyod pa' dkyil 'khor// zhal tha ldan labar bste// gsu ShA gang 'du na tu dang //
72a2(rnying rgyud): dang brgyad dang sgo bzhir bcas// phye ba'i dus na brgyad cha bzhi// ka ba 'khor lo padra rin chen sgo bzhi bcas// gong bu'i dus na blag mkha spong sgo bzhir bcas// gzugs brnyan 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// rigs lnga dang ni dbu brgya
72a3(rnying rgyud): gsum// gsang chen rigs gcig bsnyen pa yis// des ni khrol bu spangs pa ste// ye shes lnga'i 'phro 'dra'i bsnyen pas zlu ma stong // dgu pa'i sngags kyi grong bra la 'o// 'gro dra 'dra 'dul dkyil 'khor ro// bstan pa lnga la mkha'
72a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings// drang byed lnga la gsang ba'i mtshan bris la// btsag pa'i tshogs snod yab yum ste// srad ni thabs dang shes rab po// btsags btags bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla gam sgo shar bstan pa la// pad+ma 'dab ma brkyang
72a5(rnying rgyud): bris pa// ta ma grin dbang gi dkyil 'khorar// dkyil 'khor bla med gdang ni sbyar bshad// mdag nyid dang rang rung bzhin gyis// ka ba'i phul du bdud rtsis sbyangs yin// sbu ba'i gdeng chen nyid la des bzhag na// kab dz+ra me ga de
72a6(rnying rgyud): ni de ltar bshad// das rdzas dag la blang dor med pa dang // g+han dag la 'ching 'grol med pa dang // tan dag la skye shi med spad pa// spyod pa bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// sI yi dam tshig brtag par bya ba dang / khyad par dam tshig bsrung ba dang // lhag
72a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam tshig gnas par bya ba dang // dam tshig bla med ga deng ni de ltar bshad// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // gnan bzlog drug tu gcig tu ste// phrin las bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// phye ma khrol bu gong bu gang la yang // rtags rgya/
72b1(rnying rgyud): mngon du byung byung du// gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin bsgrubs na// bsgrub pa bla med gdeng ni 'di ltar bshad// bdud rtsi chen po'i bum pa yis// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i mthar thug dbang // 'dod pa de la rab sbyin pa// dbang mchog bla med shing
72b2(rnying rgyud): ni 'di ltar bshad// thun mong dad ni thun mong ma yin pa// don dam dang ni kun rdzob kyi// dngos grub khyad par can yang thob// dngos grub bla med gdeng ni de ltar bshad// bla na med pa'i gdeng brgyad kyis// bdud rtsi dam pa mchog bsgrub nas//
72b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas mchod cing rang zos na// dngos grub khyad par can yang thob// dam rdzas sman sA re re la yang // yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab cing // byin rlab mthu byin de bzhin no// de yi nus ma thu dpag las 'das// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phyar
72b4(rnying rgyud): slong na myi chen stongs da kyi myi mchog gi bsgrub ba 'dzi ga snyas na badzini de// de su yang nga rje 'dus pa'i ma mchog snga la las/ rnang kyis pabacal ba la dang ma ces nas s+ho// yin no// dang ga rgyags
72b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal po che// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon stong dang // sbyor dang skong dang bzlog pa dang // gnan dang gzir ba'i phrin las rnams// phyi rabs don du ji ltar brtsam// kun mkhyen khyed kyis bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ khros par rgyal
72b6(rnying rgyud): pos bka' stsal pa ni/ a ho rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras// sems can phyi rabs gzhan don phyir// phrin las don zhus ya mtshan che// phrin las rim pa bstan pa ni// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// rmugs par gyur pa'i sems can
72b7(rnying rgyud): la// sna tshogs las kyis zhi bar sbyar// bkra shis bde ba'i gnas dag tu// bkra shis mtshan ldan phra ma mchog gzung // rdo rje 'dus par bsam bya zhing // dkar la zlum pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bas rgyal// rin chen
73a1(rnying rgyud): dag dkar po'am// dkar ba'i gang las byas pa sa// zad ga rnam pa drug d+hA // zha na sargyags sman drangs su// rkang darnams pas mad wA bya'o// yam klung dkang lang dung // dgang nga
73a2(rnying rgyud): rdzas rnams kyis// zhi ba'i tshul du sbyin pasreg bya// dngul phye 'bras chen dkar po la// gtor ma byas te'i gang bya// sa yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gti mug las kyis 'chel ba rnams// zhi bar gyur ba'i dbyings su ma// 'di
73a3(rnying rgyud): las su bshad// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// phongs gyur pa yi sems can la// sna tshogs las hA sa rgyas par bya// tsan+dan me tog nags tshal dang // nyams dga' skyed mo'i tshal du ni// lcags na ma ye chu gu mchog gzung // r-i
73a4(rnying rgyud): chen 'dres pa'i bsam sbyor gyis// ser po bu bzhi'i dkyil 'khor lo// rin chen chu skyes rag gis brgyan// rin chen kha dog ser po'am// ser po'i shing las byas pa yi// phur pa zung bzhi btab pa ste// rgyas pa'i tshogs ldan drangs nas
