73a5(rnying rgyud): thams pa'i sems kyis mchod sbyin bya// se po'i shing las sbar ba'i me// khA ba'i ro sIn ser te'i rdzas// / swa pa'i tshul gyis sbyin bsres bya// gser phye 'azas can seng po la// gtor sa byas te rmas par bya// ma ma tshogs kyi dkyil
73a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// baN+Da la las kyis 'tshal rnams lnga// rgyas par gyur pas dbyings su rul// 'di ni chas/ 'i las su bshad// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'thams la// chags par gyur pa'i sems can pa// dbang du bya bar rab tu gasrung
73a7(rnying rgyud): nam tshan can nam n+ya gling dra// sdod gcig ma yi gzung sem ga zung / pad+ma 'dras pa'i bas/ sbyor gyis// klag ma dmar ba'i dkyil 'khor pa/ badra mda' gzhu'od kyis brgyad/ 'angs la sogs pa'i rin chen nam// dbang po
73b1(rnying rgyud): de las byas pa 'is// phrar ba zlag ma lnga bta sa// dmar thug ngan pal nyachags rnam// byangs/ sa sbyar dza // / dga' rgyags me kyis sa cad ston \u0f7f// da zang byung las spar ba'adra// sngar lam nga
73b2(rnying rgyud): dbang gi tshul du phyin bsgrub Ta// zangs rtse 'bras can dmar ba la// gtor ma byas te byang chu 'azlas// tshob kyang kyil 'khor du/ 'dod thalas kyi 'tsha ba rnams// dbang gyur ba gyis / 'dzi ga pas sra btud /
73b3(rnying rgyud): mAdams ni rab 'byams na// shin tu gadrug pa'i sems can la// drag sh+'ul smon pas las b+ha ste// rlung gtso// shing dam+ba dur khrod du// rigs ngan kle sha mes reg gzung // las rab 'dus pa'i bsam sbyor gyis// nAg ro grag
73b4(rnying rgyud): kyil 'khor la// gtsang bod rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// sngags la sogs pa'i rin chen nam// tshor ma'i shing la/ byas pa yis// phrar rabazung gsum drug btub ste// mthong nag 'bar ba'i lha tshogs rnams// rdeg pos 'dul phyir sun dza da
73b5(rnying rgyud): btang snyoms khros pa'i mchod sprin bya'o// tshor ma'i shing lus sbar ba'i me// drag po'i tshul du sbyin baphrog bya// thugs kyi 'thu nag sha Sha ga la// ster ba'i gtur ma drug shul snang // oM yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// zhe sdang las kyis
73b6(rnying rgyud): pa rnams// brlag par gyur byas dbyings su rol// 'di ni drag mo'i las su bshad// chags pa'i don du spor ba// dbang po bral la sbyar ba dang // chos ngan chos nyid sbyor ba dang // shes pas shes par bya ba'i yul la sbyor ba ste// chos rnams
73b7(rnying rgyud): ba med par sbyor ba dang // chos nyid skye ba med par sbyor ba las// rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum spar bkyed de// yab yum sbyor bas khro'o khro mor basbed// zho ga khro mo sbyor ba las// phra men mngags thabs bskyeng par bya// yab yum sbyor ba
74a1(rnying rgyud): las sras mchog yab tham bskyed// nom bzhis sbyor ba'i brdas bsgral te/ yab yum thams cad thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par sbyor ba dang // mtshan ldan pakra shas yid 'ong gzungs ma// ji rjes nyon spangs
74a2(rnying rgyud): gos dang rgyan phreng gdags// rnal 'byor nyid la'ang de bzhin te// rgyan gzungs gsal g.yon spel byas nas// bdag nyid ltar bsam gzungs nyid yum// bdag gi lus kyi gnas rnams su// thabs mchog nyi shu rtsa lnga bsam// yum la
74a3(rnying rgyud): mnams bsam// rang bzhin gnas nas dgrag gzhug bstim// mchod don gsol ba gdab bya ste// lcags kyus spyan drangs zhags pas 'khyud// lcags klog bsdams te dril zlas dgyes pa bskyed// yab yum dgyes ba rol lo dang // sra
74a4(rnying rgyud): gnas rnams spang ba ni// yum rnams chos dbyings gzhal yas su// yab rnams ye shes byang chub sems// dmigs med bde ba'i sbyor bas gtim// ma chags mnyam pa'i dgyes pa mchog/ bdag dang gzhan gnyis mi dgye bar// sangs
74a5(rnying rgyud): gyis sems can thams cad la// bde chen byang chub sems su mchod sbyin chen po thim byas nas// chags pa spyad kyang bla med thob par 'gyur// bka' lung gtan tshig tshad mar mi ldan par// mtshan med gzungs btsal 'dod chags dngos spyod na//
74a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu yul med ya ga'i gzhi dar nas// dz+wal chos chags pa spyod pas 'khor ba'i chu// 'di ni sbyor ba'i las su bshad// srog gcod phyir na sgrol ba ste// snod dang brgyad kyis bsdus pa'i chos rnams dbyings nyid la// rig pa byang chub sems
74a7(rnying rgyud): su snang ba ye shes te// gnyis su med pas mtshon pa mya ngan 'das// de ltar rtog pas khams gsum thun mong dang // thun mong ma yin thugs rjes sbal ba'o// snod kyi 'jig rten shes rab gzhal yas la// bcud kyis bslus pa'i khro bor
74b1(rnying rgyud): shar// khams gsum thugs rjes thun mang du bskal ba'o// bstan pa la gnod zhing bcug nas nas blang phyir/ gzhung dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gnas 'khor phrar pa yo byad dus ldan te// gzugs brnyan dam bzhengs te ting 'dzin pa
74b2(rnying rgyud): pa bsar/ rang bzhin mchod pa sbub rgyal ba'i bka' la brten/ dmigs pa'i rten ni bcas/ dbab dbral gzir btab gtub bstad rol te/ shes pa'i gnas sbyangs nas ni// sdig pa spyad kyang ye shes 'bar bya la// bskal bar byas
74b3(rnying rgyud): kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal ba'i bka' la ni khungs phyung / mthu rtsal 'dod pas 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa mchod/ don dang mi ldan par grol ba'i las byas na/ spyod rtsing khe rngams 'khor po'i g.yang sar lgang / 'di ni sgrol ba'i rim par
74b4(rnying rgyud): bshad// nyams pa'i phyid na bskrad pa ste/ dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga la ten bcas nas// yi ge dpa' bo 'bru las dngos po dang / mtshan ma'i bag chags sbyangs te/ phyag mtshan 'bar ba rdzas ni/ gzugs su sdang pa'i bag chags sbyangs te/
74b5(rnying rgyud): dug lnga'i rten ye shes lngar bsgral nas/ rigs lnga'i thugs kyi rgyud bdud ci lngas dbang bskur bas/ bde bar gshegs pa sku gsum gyi ngo bor bzhugs pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskang ste/ don dam pa'i bskang ba dang / dgongs rgyud rnam par
74b6(rnying rgyud): dgra ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ rgya mchog gi skobs gyur yang / mtshams bcad phrin gdags me tog dor te/ mig dbye lha ngo bstan/ phung po khams dang skye mched dang // rnam shes 'byung ba dmigs pa yis// lha rnams kyi thugs dam
74b7(rnying rgyud): dbyings su bskangs nas/ ka te ri ni byin brlabs ral gri bskur/ rgya lnga'i sgo dgag drug lnga zhe bcad de/ rnam shes gnas slar dbang bskur mi rdzogs la dgod// sha khrag la sogs tshogs kyi mchod par 'bul// de yi don ldan rnapa
75a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bas// sog sazhabasal bstan ma shes thugs dum bslangs// dmangan dang maldan pa'o// mang tsam 'dzin pa'i rnam dbyung bas// dugangs rlu sa gas 'a ba don duthal nas// bsangs pa sa sa /
75a2(rnying rgyud): nyid 'khor ba'i rgya// 'di ni bskang ba'i rim par bshad// yid gnyis za phyir bzlog pa ni// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// mi pade'i gnas su gting 'khyams pas// thugs rje nyi zer 'dra ba yis// lus sems mra
75a3(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs su bzlog pa'o// 'di ni 'khor ba ru bzlog pa'o// mu stegs bya lta spyod log pa dang // ny+dzan thos la sogs sna rtogs dman pa rnams// sngags pa lta stong 'khrul pa rnams// blta ba spyod pa bstan te ya rgya bar khrid pa ni// 'og
75a4(rnying rgyud): dman 'khrul pa ru bzlog pa'o// byang sems sangs rgyas chu nyid la// nyon mongs bdud kyi rgyu byas phung po'i bdud du sprin// lha yi bdud kyis bar du glags btsal nas// 'chi bdag bdud kyis bar chad byed pa'i tshe// don rig rtsal shugs ldan
75a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bka' yi gzhung dang mthun pa'i rdzas bsags te// rgya mchog mtshan ldan dag la rten bcas nas// srog pa rjes sems skra rag khrag rdzas kyi bzlog/ skad cig tsam yang lus sems ma thal po'i thob dge slong ngo // dani
75a6(rnying rgyud): skrod thabs med nams kyang 'khor ba'i rgyas bzlog nas// dge ba skad cig tsam yang sangs nas rgya// dge ba'i don sad rtsa ba'i bzlog pa'o// dam med rnal shugs mi 'chang rnal 'byor tshul spong bas// dge don sar myed gzhan gyi rigs kyi ga
75a7(rnying rgyud): pab nas// tshogs ma bstod pas ring gi tshe skyes te// don du gags 'ad phyir bzlog pa nyid// dam mchog ma thu byin kun kya rangs bzlog na// 'jig rten bye na dbang can dag spos kyi dges// de skad zer zhing bzlog pa'i pas byed na/
75b1(rnying rgyud): bzlog rang gis gshed mar 'ong ste 'khor ba'i chu// bzlog pa'i rim pa 'di ltar bshad// gnod bye sa la gnan pa ni// don dam sems la gnod pa ni// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la// bgu chags grangs rim bzhag nas pa// phung po la gnas
75b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs drug yul la ma btang bar// bag chags thams cad mnan te kun gzhi ngo nger gnas// des ni don nyid don mthong ste// don dam bden pa'i mnan pa'o// gnas dang dkyil 'khor rdzas dang cho ga thabs// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas byin
75b3(rnying rgyud): brlabs te// 'gog byed bgegs rnams gnan byas na// spogs pa'i thabs med de la thar dus med// kun rdzob bden pa'i gzhung du mnan pa'o// dkon mchog bden pa'i bka' la mi bden par// 'jig rten 'di yi drag po'i dbang bzud nas/
75b4(rnying rgyud): mthu chen dregs pa'i lha klu'i gnas rnams su// de mchod de la las kyi mthu ltos shing // de la lhar gsol dgra bgegs gnod byed pa// de ni 'jig rten ldog pa'i mnan pa ste// chos 'gal ya ga'i gzhi ste de mi bya// gnan pa'i rim pa
75b5(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar bshad// 'gran sems can ma gzir ba ni// chos dbyings ye shrIs ye nas gnas phu la// bag chags nyon mongs 'aglan 'jug pa// rig pa'i ye shes bsar te chos dbyings dang du gzir// mthar b+hag don gyi gzing ba'o//
75b6(rnying rgyud): dpal chen 'bar ba'i cha byad kyis// 'gran sems b+hU tA gzir ba ni// sgrib gnyis byang nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// 'di ni rtags kyis gzir ba'o// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sgrub pa la// 'gran sems can gyi dgra dang bgegs// ras
75b7(rnying rgyud): sam gro ga'am shing shun la// ming ngam yang na gzugs bris la// khrag 'thung thugs rtags phur pas gzir// 'di ni rdzas kyi gzir ba'o// bdag nyid ting 'dzin gdeng zhugs la// 'og tu gzhug cing kun tu gzir// 'di ni bsam lhor kun
76a1(rnying rgyud): na/ na su ga na su sa phyu da
76a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi don gyi phrin las rim par bye ba 'a kyi bram cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nus yang rdo rje bdus pa'i rdul bros/ 'di ga daces gsol to// em nye bad gshegs ting dang mchog gi byung gi/ sa pa 'dal 'a sa
76a3(rnying rgyud): bzla' ba tung gos rgyan bu byed dang // sbyor pa 'gro nyal 'dug ldang pa'i// dz+nyAn tA tI 'dzin ji ltar lags// ting 'dzin mchog gis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sman gyi ting 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/
76a4(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so// a mA ti rdo rje 'dras pa'i mas// zla brgyan k+Shi ting 'dzin ni// gtsang sgra med par zas rnams kun// snod chen dag gi nang du bsog/ mdun du bzhag ste sems bgyid nas// bdag nyid lha li rnal 'byor gyis/ ba
76a5(rnying rgyud): b+hagasum gyis dngos po skyong // byin brlabs gas lub tu bu mchod sbrul phrin las bcol// byin bsku'i dngos grub yin// lhag ma byin te gshegs su gsol// 'gro ba'i don du smon lam gdab// A~M badz+rA k+Sha sa~M kI la ye sar+b+ba ba~M g+h+nAn thaM mu~M hU~M phaT/
76a6(rnying rgyud): d+h+ye d+h+r-i nI smr-i She/ kr-IT+TarnA mA a pa maN+Da la/ oM AHSh+NI da l+yo ta rmAHnAM/ UM badz+ra k+Shi pik+Shi la yA/ kr-I ta kr-it+ti ha hUM phaTasam+b+ha yad+haH/ U badz+ra dz+nyA na ma hA g+ha \u0f7f pa ny+dza ba li ta a mr-i ta raSh+Ta Shi d+hitsi t+ta ma hA ar+b+he rbatI dza ti// dzaHshrI bAn+ti ba ShA tAM/ sarba paR+tha a
76a7(rnying rgyud): hrIhU~M/ phaT paT lan/ mang pa y-i/ oM hrIHhUM/ chos pra ti pan d+hamad+has tra~M hU~M \u0f7f/ ra sa rnam ma byu chu rnam pa la hU~M swA hU~M/ kA la la hU~M na cig tu/ sa ma yan//
76b1(rnying rgyud): drug bldan pa mi tshogs la phyag 'tshal la// 'byar ldan 'das sdad kun 'phel cas// sbyin pa rtab tu la ga skron cing // zlab gnas kyang nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs par ga// A lA wA // btung btsun na// brtan dan na
76b2(rnying rgyud): gyis bsdus pa yi// 'bru bcud dza gad la sogs btung ba la// gdong ldan drang ba'i 'phro 'du las// ma mA ki yi ting 'dzin bsam// 'byung ba bcud ldan phyag rgya yis// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ bAM mA ma ki d+hI trAM/ hU~M badz+ra badz+ra/ dgra pra ba la
76b3(rnying rgyud): nan hU~M swA hA/ bsil mdar bdud rtsi'i ror brlabs// sbom po dbang mo thabs dang shes rab kyis// rtsir gur sran gyi 'phro 'dur gsal// lha yi tshogs la thim par mchod// A.AM AHhU~M gis byin pa lus twe// rang nyed bzung bas sgrib kyang
76b4(rnying rgyud): nas// sku gsung thugs kyi gzi byin pheb// bgo ba rgyan gyi ting 'dzin ni// reg bya bgo ba'i bye brag rnams// 'jam dang rtsub pa gnyis med par// gsal ldan ho yi 'gro 'dra yis// gar+b+he reg bya'i lhab lu ba can// oM badz+ra kI li
76b5(rnying rgyud): ya gan+d+he pany+tsa le ka pU dza ho// nang med lang tsho 'de ba dang // mtshan gyi me tog thob par 'gyur// rgyan phreng rgyan gyi ting 'dzin ni// rgyan dang bye zag thams cad la// legs dang mi legs dbyer med par// nges ldan traM ga 'phro 'dra las//
76b6(rnying rgyud): lo rin chen phreng thogs ma// A~M badz+ra kI mi kI la ya/ mA le rat+na b+ha dza sa ma ya ho// bde gshegs zas dang bcas pa mchod// byin bsdus wAg ma bdag nyid gdags// sha ba krag gsal zhing mdangs chags dang // dpe byed 'bru rnams thob par
76b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// bya byed tan gyi ting 'dzin ni// bya dang mi bye dbyer med par// mkhyen ldan ha yi 'gro 'dralas// bya ba mo ni chos kyi dbyings// byed pa po ni ye shes te// bya byed dbyings las ye shes rol// AM badz+ra bI li kI la ya/ kama? d+ham two na maN+Da la/ yU
77a1(rnying rgyud): sams// chub byed pas na dang lda// da brdzun gyidang 'dzi ni// sdud par thab 'jas rnams cas// ngas par dang 'dun bags la bas// thob kyang cir na la baH// snang bas tshogs can nas rang thub// sa la mdu
77a2(rnying rgyud): grwa tsa ny+dzadza sa ma ya ho// nyal brgyan gyi ting 'dzin te// byang rdugs g.yengs dang 'gyo ba langs// zlos 'pheb gnyid kyi dgra bcom te// seng ge'i nyal thabs rab tu brtag/ gsal ldan chen po'i ting 'dzin de// rtag chad gol hrIs ting 'dzin mas spangs /
77a3(rnying rgyud): med pasam med brjod bsam las 'das pas// chos dbyings bde ba chen po'i dang du gsal// oM badz+ra k+Shi li kA la ya ma hA shA tsaH/ des ni don dam tshogs chen rdzogs// blta ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// dngos po mtshan mar ldan pa med// ngas dan chen par
77a4(rnying rgyud): gyis// chos nyid skye ba med pa las// 'gag pa med pa'i su bzhengs pa'o// dz+dza badz+ra kI li kI la ya kA ya wA ka tsar+N+Na sa ma ya hUM/ lus ngag yid gsum gyi sku gsung zags// 'grib rgyan gyi ting 'dzin na// grub ldan chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dang don chad med
77a5(rnying rgyud): phyir nyid 'gro ba ste// des don dmigs med 'pho ba'i don du brtag/ A badz+ra kI li sI la ya A baM bA yA d+ha ma ka ma traM/ 'gro ba 'dul gyir gshegs pa ste// gzhan gyi don du 'gro ba bdag gi don// 'dug pa rgyani gyi ting 'dzin ni// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa
77a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyis// bdag nyid ston pa'i rang bzhin de// gang na gnas pa gnas kyi mchod// nyer gnas 'khor ni rang bzhin khyad par 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'khor// brjod pa thams cad bstan pa dang // de ltar 'dzem pa dus shes bya'o// oM badz+ra kA li kI la ya mthal
77a7(rnying rgyud): hUn+tu/ des ni kun sum tshogs par 'jug par 'gyur// zhes gsungs pas/ sa la spod pa'i rna 'thor ba rnams/ rgyun gyi ting 'dzin las su rung ste/ sel smin par gyur to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i chud chen po las/ sprin gyi ting 'dzin rim par
77b1(rnying rgyud): gyi ba'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma tog tang mchog de nyid bdag/ sa la stod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de nyid yongs su rtogs kyi'i phyir// dmigs pa'i mtshan ma la brten de nyid kyis/
77b2(rnying rgyud): spyang tshogs rdzogs 'bras bu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dang ni maN+Dal dang // su gzugs dang ni mchod rten dang // glegs bam dang ni phreng ba dang // rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang // mchod rdzas dang ni rol mo dang // 'di rnams de nyid ji ltar lags/
77b3(rnying rgyud): 'byor don du bstan du gsal// a la la to// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul ba'i don thugs su chud de/ de kho na nyid bcu'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ 'ad pa ces gsungs so// sa pa spong ba'i rnal 'byor pas//
77b4(rnying rgyud): don zhus e ma ya mtshan che'o// de nyid dam pa bstan par bya// de yi dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// gzugs brnyan ste'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs dang ting 'dzin bsgom// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor sgrub pa ste// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu// rngub tshon khang bas pa
77b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin// re khA gr-i so bsgreng ba ltar// gzhal yas khang ni tshul lam dbyibs// legs shing mdzes par bres pa ni// gzugs brtan gyi yaM dkyil 'khor ro// lha yi go bgo gnas rnams su// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma gang // bkod nas mi shes dra
77b6(rnying rgyud): phyir bstan// lhag pa gzugs brnyan mngon bzhengs pa'o// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// ting 'dzin snying po tsha ga yis// gzhal yas dam pa bsam bya ba// gnas kyi ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor ro// de yi bzhugs pa'i sa gnas su// chos
77b7(rnying rgyud): gsum mam lnga nyid kyis// lha yi rnal 'byor gdeng ldan de// nges pa nyid du bsam pa nyid// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ste// ting 'dzin khyad par dkyil 'khor ro// chos nyid padal ba chen po la// rang byung ye shes 'khor gyis brgyan// dmigs
78a1(rnying rgyud): par gsal yang dmigs med pa// rang bzhin don dam dkyil 'khor ro// chos nyid skye ba med pa las// khro bo'i bsam pa drang don du// 'gag pa med pa'i phyag rgyar bzhengs// bde gshegs bzhugs phyag mchod srub pa// rang bzhin
78a2(rnying rgyud): don dam dkyil 'khor de// rang bzhin don gyis gnas pa yin// 'di ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid do// maN+Dal de nyid brtag pa ni// dge don maN+Dal rtsom pa brtson 'grus te// 'bu srin sems can bsal ba bzod pa'i mchog/ gdar byi dor byang chub
78a3(rnying rgyud): tshul khrims de// sman dang dri yi skyang nul sbyin pa yin// me tog phud bu bkod pa shes rab po// de nyid lha ru bsam pa bsam gtan te// sbyin drang bzhugs phyag mchod bskor thabs su shes// sgrib gnyis kyangs nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs te thobs//
78a4(rnying rgyud): de yi 'bras bu thob pa ye shes so// 'gro ba'i don du shes pa smon lam nyid// maN+Dal don gyis pha rol phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur// de phyir maN+Dal de nyid don la brtson par 'bad// sku gzugs kyi de kho na nyid ni// zangs lcags gser dngul la sogs pa// bzhu nas lugs
78a5(rnying rgyud): su blugs kyang rung // dur khrod tshon rtse rnam lnga yis// khang bu'i logs ma thang ka la// thabs la mkhas pas bris pa'am// rA dang ba so sa rdo shing // kun la 'bur du btang ba ste// mkhan po gang yang shes rab ldan 'gyur bar// legs shing dod la tshad dang ldan pa
78a6(rnying rgyud): bya// rang 'dod lha yi gzugs nyid la// nges pa'i ting 'dzin rtse gcig tu// yang dag par ni bsam byas nas// phu gyis sku lus gsol ba dang // dbu bshad snyan spabs bsal te spyan dbye shangs su btog// chom 'bru ljags bzhar nas// rang bzhin gnas nas
78a7(rnying rgyud): spyan drang ba stim phyag mchod de bsrub byas nas// bkur 'os mchod 'os phyag bya'i gnas// 'khor ba ma stong bar du na// zhal ba sro bkra shis dbang bskur mnga' gsol nas// sku gzugs mchod pa'i rten du de nyid bya'o// mchod rten gyi de kho na nyid na/ dang
78b1(rnying rgyud): ba nga nanas sa ste/ sngags shA ma/ ma / 'a// ga ya sa/ ga/ ga /
78b2(rnying rgyud): ngarje'i dri'i ning ba ban// bzhi ba ldang ba'i dbang bathom// ma tan ldang ba dbang // dam byang rgyab lan lag btun/ srog ning mthon pa bcwayin to// ngas sa ba cag gram bas ca ter gzhug gsus// ra ba sa thapas da thag
78b3(rnying rgyud): de// t+ya dra thabs dang shes rabal// tog na mi dmigs chos kyi blo// dril bu chos nyid stong pa'i sra// ngar 'phyangs 'khor ba'i thabs las 'das// chu 'bras chos las grub pa'i bya mchog la// mu kyi sku lus gsol te gzhal yas bsam// de ted ma
78b4(rnying rgyud): bsam pa'i gzhal yas sa// sdugasum ngas gang yang rung b.ras// 'di ni phul ba'i de// stan drang bstisam chud danags pa ga nga // ba da / ye bar sa s+ho// 'khor da mtha' bajugs papa ste// phrag nga mched pa'i din du bcugs// rmon
78b5(rnying rgyud): bamadze nyid bstan pa ni// glegs pam thabs dang shes rab pa// thog pa thug pa'i sa gzhi ste// ni gnas stag mthong zhing ni rgyags// dbyings dang ye shes kha chags gnyis// thig na mdzar bden pa lam// dmigs kor tsas de khyo
78b6(rnying rgyud): bral// lug gru rig pa'i ye shes te// byang chub sems rtags b+hag tshwa yis// ya ge gsung gi phrag tu bri// byed pa po ni dam tshig can// legs shing chang dang ldan bus nas// sngags mkhan dmachog blo can gyis// dus gsum brdegs
78b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas de// gsung gi de nyid byin bsdus nas// glegs pa ma nyid la bstim par bya// de nyid 'jig rten ma sbyangs par// gnas par byas te zhal bsros pa// de yi don bklags chos kyi char bab pas// 'gro ba'i shes 'grol bde gshegs
79a1(rnying rgyud): gsung brtes te// glegs pa mdo nyid byas gsum mchod pa'i rten du bzhugs// bgrang 'phreng de nyid bstan pa ni// rag sha'am ni rang su yis// yang na gdug pa'i char ma 'ashang // phreng ba chen po brgyang nyid ni// ba su ta
79a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas chen la// dgu spel dag tu byas nas ni// bzlas pa'i mdo la bsnyen phur gdags// mthe bong mthe chung gnyis kyis bzang // bdag nyid mi phyed dpal yin te// phur pa sras mchog sde la ya// phreng ba yige bcu dgu ste// phreng thag thu
79a3(rnying rgyud): nyid do// phar 'gro ba dang tshur 'dus pa// mgal me klad la bskor ba 'am// lcags kyi tshe cha brdabs pa 'am// gser gyi ba thag gzings pa bzhin// phar 'gro chur 'du chun maM gtsang // bgrang phred de nyid ngan la gnas par bya// rdo rje
79a4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni// gnam lcags thog gi ljags dag gam// phal ba'i lcags ni gang zung ngam yang na// shir shing la sogs gdug pa'i shing nyid la// rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni// lte ba pad+ma gnyis bskor bya// de la nges pa'i sgo D+yan gyis// thab kyi rtseg
79a5(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bsam// lte bar dpal chen 'bar ba nyid// yar gyi rtse la sras mchog lnga// mar gyi rtse lnga gsang ba'i mtshan nyid do// yang 'bur mar 'bur steng 'og khro bo ste// pad+ma brgyad la phyogs mtshams khro bo'o// hUM/ ye shes 'bar ba 'jo rje 'di/
79a6(rnying rgyud): khro rgyal 'bar ba'i thabs kyi sku// bde chen yab yum skra bzhugs pa// dgyes pa mchog gi phrin las mdzad du gsol// rdo rje'i de nyid rab tu gnas par brtag/ dril bu'i de nyid bstan pa ni// 'khar ba dang ni ljon dmar la// rdol bu tshang dang
79a7(rnying rgyud): ldan parabya// rnal 'byor nges pa'i blo can gyis// de nyid shes rab rig pa'i gzhal yas khang // rnal 'byor khro mo'i dkyil 'khor dgod// lte bzlum po 'khor lo gyis 'debasam// rA lags 'debs yum lnga ste// lung ni nyaga'i mtshan nyid yin/
79b1(rnying rgyud): sku yi rtse dang lcel ni// steng 'og khro mo rnam par bsam// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po la// phyogs mtshams blo mo rnam par bsams// rang bzhin shes rab khro tshogs rnams// rdo rje dbyu/ pas ldan drangs nas// shes rab mal bstim mthong ba
79b2(rnying rgyud): nga yi sba bsngags dus gsum rgyal ba mnyes// 'khor ba'i sgrib pa dag par 'gyur// hUM/ shes rab chen po'i rang bzhin de// chos nyid stong pa chen po'i sgras// 'khor ba'i bag chags zil gyis gnan// dus gsum rgyal bkun kyang mnyes
79b3(rnying rgyud): dril bu'i de nyid mchog tu bshad// mchod rdzas de nyid bstan pa na// phye nang gsang ba'i mchod rdzas gang la yang // dbul gnas 'bul byed dbul ba'i rdzas// phul bas sgrib pa gang dag 'bras bu gar thob dang // sngags dang phyag tu nyid
79b4(rnying rgyud): dang // 'di brgyad ldan pa mchod pa'i de nyid don// mchod pa de nyid don la brtson pas 'bad par bya'o// rol mo 'di nyid bstan pa ni// rtse 'jo byed kyong la sogs dang // bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs dang // ba dan dang gyi lnga rdzi dang /
79b5(rnying rgyud): thogar gru tshogs la sogs dang // 'bred dang brdung dadag sel dkrol brdab pa dang // sdug mdzes me sdug 'jigs pa'i bye brag rnams// tha dang sna tshogs dbul ba yang // nam mkha' skye ba med pa las// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba
79b6(rnying rgyud): yang // phul bas chos nyid ngang la bzhes// rol mo g.yer ba'i lha yin te// mi ga yar chos nyid gyur gyur yang // rol mo de nyid don dam rtog pa'o// de nyid bcu mngon dam gang rtogs pa// rnal 'byor de ni shes rab can// me
79b7(rnying rgyud): sa thab bder gshegs yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen pa las/ de kho na ter bcu'i rim pa bstan pa'i leT sna zhe badz+rarnam pa // de nas yang rdo rje 'dras pas 'di skad cesags pa te/
80a1(rnying rgyud): dam chos gzhung myod rnal 'byor la// bar chad bu dag zung thar na// gzhan nyid thug par bya ba'i phyir// thog dang sar ba dbab pa dang // mind phyag nang nanam 'chad par btang ba dang // spro ba dang na 'dzag pa dang /
80a2(rnying rgyud): myos pa dang ni chug pa dang // 'thab cu gzhug dang bslad 'gyur na// thabs dang rim pa ji ltar lags// dpa' bo khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ gsol pa thugs su chud nas/ gzhan skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa
80a3(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de la thog dbab par 'dod pas/ lcags snga lnga la drag po'i phurang pa byas te/ kra nag pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor nag pa bu gsum byas pa/ 'bras kyi zan pa gra nag po'i gzugs byas pa/ khwa'i rtsa
80a4(rnying rgyud): po dkug gzhug bstims nas/ phur pa rdo rje 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ klu'i rgyal po de la btab nas klu gnad la bor nas thog dus su phebs par 'gyur ro// ser ba dbab par 'dod pas/ shir shing nag po la phur pa byas te/ 'bras ser po'i 'an
80a5(rnying rgyud): khyab 'dug gza'i rgyal po'i gzugs byas la/ bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyi gdeng dang ldan par byas la/ lce pog nag po'i dud pas bdug cing // bu ba 'jug chu ba'i dus su// khyab 'jug nyid gzugs la phab ste/ phur pas 'atang nas gnad la pha na
80a6(rnying rgyud): ser ba dus bzhin du phebs par 'gyur ro// me nang gtong bar 'dod pas/ mi gang rims kyis shi ba'i mchog phur g.yas thogs la/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor blag ma dmar por byas te/ rims kyis shi ba'i ro ras la bram ze nag mo'i mngal khrag gis ming du
80a7(rnying rgyud): ra rig po'i dud pas bdug ste/ dgra bgags bkug la bstims nas/ brla 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ phur pas btab nas dgra bo'i la la sa re sras na me nang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// phyags na gtong bar 'dod pas/ seng ldeng gi phur ba thogs
80b1(rnying rgyud): phyugs nad kyis shi ba'i snying khrag gis ma he'am/ rta mchog gi pags pa la/ phrug nod gyi ming bris nas phur pa btang ste/ phyug lhas sam bres su btang na/ phrugs nad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// skyo bar 'dod pas bram ze'i mchog phur g.yas pa
80b2(rnying rgyud): thogs la/ nags tshal chen po'i gnas su dkyil 'khor chen po ser po zla bzhi pa gcig tu byas te/ rtswa kun ma'i lo ma la gzugs byas la/ nya du ra yaM du bas bdug ste/ gzugs la phab nas phur pas lce la btab ste/ yi dwag
80b3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i sar mnan na// mi de skyo bar 'gyur ro// myos 'bog par 'dod na/ gser shing ngam skyer ba'i phur pa thogs te/ ras sam grog la a gar gyi khu bas ming rus bris la/ gong ma bzhin las byas pas 'byung po gnas pa'i sar/
80b4(rnying rgyud): smras na mi de 'brog par 'gyur ro// myos par bya ba 'dod pas rgyal rigs kyi mchog phur g.yas pa thogs te/ re bo 'dus pa'i rtser dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po byas te/ dug shing gi lo ma la gzugs byas te/ tsan+dan dkar
80b5(rnying rgyud): po'i thang chus ming bris te/ mi tshil gyi du bas bdug ste/ bud+d+ha 'dus pa'i bsnyen pa 'bum byas nas/ gzugs la phab na/ sde gtsug tu phur pas btab nas/ ma mo'i gnas su sbas na/ mi de shin tu yang myos par
80b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// lkugs par 'dod pas/ shug pa'am 'dzag gi phur pa thogs te/ gro ga'am shing shun la sngags lkugs nas shi ba'i klang khrig gis ming dbris te/ gong bzhin du phur pas lci la btab nas/ sa bdag gnas/
80b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sar sbas na/ me de shin tu yang zhugs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig 'thab par 'dod pas ni/ dmangs rigs kyi phur pa g.yon pa thogs la/ shing rkang gcig gi gnas su/ dkyil 'khor nag po gru gsum byas te/
81a1(rnying rgyud): zag pa'i phagasu dang / ga sa lagags / nga dang mang ba' mdun du / thal dang zhugapas ca 'byung du rgyun pa/ tus 'byangs nas/ rnas panas pa mas dras/
81a2(rnying rgyud): rang 'dus pa'i brten pa 'bum byas la/ yid bya gnyis kyi bar du phur pas bti la/ drar dzad kyi gling rings la btu gsal/ rlung chen po la gyur na/ mtshan dang 'babangar 'gyur ro// brla bar 'dod pas/ che shing gi skur ba
81a3(rnying rgyud): thogs te/ zung gi rnga mo'i pags pa la rAnyas ni dang / rus yul khyim gyi ming bris la/ gong bzhin du las byas te/ khyim gyi rtsigs mang mu pras na/ mi yul dbyung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan grag pa las kyi rim pa'idi ni/ 2
81a4(rnying rgyud): dngang pa rnams kyi sgyid yul ma yin na// ting nge 'dzin las su rung zhing rtags mthong rjod cad rin pa rnams kyis ni/ gdan maza par 'gyur ro// zhes ga spangs so// rdo rje 'ur pa gas pa'i rgyang chen po las/ gzhan skrag par byed pa'i ris pa
81a5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pa yis/ 'di skad ces gsal to// kye mardo rje khros pa'i rgyal/ rdo rje phur ba'i don bsrub pa'i tshe/ 'dug dang thugs yul chags par ba bskyed
81a6(rnying rgyud): phyir// nyung dkar rgyal dang gu sul sur dang dag bslab// rdzas su 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid de// de yi thabs ni ji ltar lags// zhes gsol bas/ gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyung dkar rgyal po srung
81a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pas// yang 'ong gnas rba 'dug nas ni// yal g.yed pa'i d+had+ha pa sham sa// mjal phrag sum cung rdul bya'o// bu bul chu yi khyad par thar// yab yum dze chen dur 'angs// khrag chen bcas pas pon 'asres/
81b1(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab chus zan te// mthong nag dar gyis kha bkab nas// maHla dbus su de bzhag nas// mchod pa'i bye brag ci 'byung 'bad// b+harma khang pas can sa?/ bzang dang spun drang rim par mtshud// mtha' mjung
81b2(rnying rgyud): m+bu'i dkyil 'khor 'bar// khra bo jo nag mtshan cha 'dzin// thugs las 'thon zhing 'dre bang rlabs nas// gsang sngags 'di nyid 'brum du bzlas// mA~M badz+ra kA li kI la ya bo d+ha la~M kr-i d+d+hi maN+Da lar wA raT+Ta hU~M phaT/ ces 'dras
81b3(rnying rgyud): skrag bdug dus drug tshang bar bya// bar chad bgegs rnams drab tu bsrung // sangom pa 'bras myu gu lazangs pa dang // sprab po'i g.yas su nye ba yi// gnas su su gsum thar dub ni// sa yair lha bsal ba yi// dbya
81b4(rnying rgyud): zla ra ba'i nya la ni// bzang po'i mtshams su b+han d+ha lnga'o// zla ba drug bar du ni// gsal gdababazlas badzang bar mi gcad// stan zla ba chud nya la brda'o// tshul dang bam sums ma shor bar// nyi grib mtshams
81b5(rnying rgyud): legs bsams na// grub pa'i 'bras bu sran ma ma sha tsam// dgun zla ra ba'i nyal zhal bsro dngos grub blang // de yis bder gshegs thugs bskul zhing // sdang dgra gdon bgegs rdul du rlogs// rnal 'byor lus
81b6(rnying rgyud): sam mgul du gdags// rtag tu lus la bcangs pa las// g.yel bar byas na mi rung nga// gu gu la sbyar bar 'dod pa yis// dur khrod chen po rab dben par// dpyid zla ra ba'i nyal 'jug/ maN+Dal mu bzhi gcig
81b7(rnying rgyud): byas la// bslang lcags kyi nyan tub shams// dwa mig nya ma go pra lu'i gzhag/ khyi lung pag gi dri chen dkar// kye sge'u yi 'bras bur drug kyi rtsu ba// zir d+ha dra ra khyi bog su gzas chen dang // 'khril
82a1(rnying rgyud): shing rje khrod sa tha ma hAgazang nA dan+ta/ thag sag khrag kyad \u0f7f \u0f7fgca ga can sngar mnams// nges par bsags tergyagams la// rapa grag sa dbang rang byas chub sems thag
82a2(rnying rgyud): tshan gyi snadang pas dam bsgyings la// / ba ra la ma mi zhabs mas spel// tsarda ma la rjes zad pas// maN+Da la de bus sa de sazhag la// badz+rat+ta yi gzungs cag gdags// bdag gas yo ta le// ba
82a3(rnying rgyud): byasal bar rab zhugs te// pat+ta drug mo 'khor ldacan// haM mad+hi dang ldan pa la// b+han dra pa nyis mtshad rim par \u0f7f// de nas bzhin pa 'di bzlasaH// ma grub bar tu kun mi gcad //
82a4(rnying rgyud): bi bi d+ha li mthul te la nya la pra N+Da la r+b+hu paT+Ta/ dal med rten du bzlas par bya// ting 'dzin 'dres shid 'gro 'dugs sa pa dang // 'ad dang dri dang rjeb 'dra'o// yang na grong rjod cha bzung te// rtags byang nas nangs bsams/
82a5(rnying rgyud): mtshad de pag leH// des na~M gzi byin thob par byed// lus la bcangs na gdan bgegs 'joms// rung btang dgral badrug gyur na// wa dang khyab brten 'bral bar 'gyur// rtags rnams mngon du byang nas na
82a6(rnying rgyud): sral dang grams dang ma bsdu par// de Ar+d+has tan la 'byor bcang // gu gul sbyar ba'i rdzas su gsungs// rag thub par 'dzad pa yis// rgya gling gnas sa 'dug nas ni// maN+Dal dmar po zags \u0f7f/ dgun zlang ba
82a7(rnying rgyud): la'adug/ parma can gyi na tar+tha// gzho ranya dang / rigs kyi thA dang / sgrol ba'i raSh+Thadang / ma tog gir nywa lnga dang / rtse'i raHyA / 'bras bu'i rag lnga dang / shing gi rag lnga dang / rgya mi D+ha tra dang /
82b1(rnying rgyud): sum rdzas gsum bsag/ de la sbyar ba'i rags zan// le brgan dar gyis kha bkab nas// seng ldeng me la zlos bsros nas// ma tha la dbus su de bzhag ste// bdag gsal chags pa'i dbang can bsam// dbug
82b2(rnying rgyud): bstim mnyes nas bsnyen pa bya// A~M badz+ra kI li kI la ya ma hA rak+ta rA ga sa ma ya bu dza hU~M phaT/ ces ni 'bum ma ma bye ba bzlas// mngon du khol lam rlangs pa phyar// yang na lung ngam 'phags gas nas// wa la
82b3(rnying rgyud): mchod de bdag nyid btung // chags pa skyes kyi na mdangs kyang dmar// khams gsum mo yis pad+ma'i mdangs// chags skyes nas ni 'bul du 'ong // zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyang chen po las//
82b4(rnying rgyud): b+ha ga brdeg bdug pa'i rdzas bsrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'dus pas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye maho// bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje phur pa gsang
82b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i chung 'di nyid la bdag cag la sogs pa ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ de la rnal 'byor du bgyi ba'i gang zag dam pa de la ji ltar bzhi bar bgyi/ ma dad cing sbyar ba'i nyes pa ni gang / snga re 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang /
82b6(rnying rgyud): gang gi ring la bshad/ de ltar gyi bstan pa 'di nyid la/ sred pa gsum la dad pa can gang gi ring la dar bar 'gyur/ phyi'i dus na sangs rgyas gang gi ring la ston par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan cing
82b7(rnying rgyud): gshad du gsol/ bka' stsal pa ni/ rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal po// rdo rje phrar pa gsang ba'i hud chen po 'di tud thams cad kyi rgyal po'o// lung thams cad kyi skye pa/ man ngag thams cad kyi 'byung khungs so//
83a1(rnying rgyud): sgru ba kun gyi yang byar// spyod pa thams cad kyilam ma// dam chog can gyi spang gnas sa// zin pas thams cad kyi rim pa'o// dkyil 'khor thanas ca bya 'a yin// / 'an tangan rdo rje 'dus
83a2(rnying rgyud): pa chen po/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mtshungs so// 'on tung na gsang ba'i'i ge 'di/ gdan gnas pa'i lcags den ni/ rdo thos pa'i rgyal po banyid gnas par shes par bya// gnas 'khor da nyid ni 'jig
83a3(rnying rgyud): rten pa'i dgos pa phun sum tshogs par 'byung ba shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra gsung thugs yon tan zin las yin par shes par bya'o// 'on tang na gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags la/
83a4(rnying rgyud): rim gro dang bkur sti dang / mtshad pa phu dud du byas te/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/ bri bar bya'o// bklag par bya'o// mnyan par bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// mchod par bya'o// sems par bya'o//
83a5(rnying rgyud): par bya/ bsgrub par bya/ bshad par bya/ kun chub par bya/ rdo rje 'dus pa yang rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgyud 'di la'ang rnal 'byor du bgyi ba'i gang zag dam pa de ni/ khyed la sogs pa rnams kyis/ de sems can lta bur
83a6(rnying rgyud): blta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du blta'o// rdo rje khros pa nyid du blta'o// de ci yi phyir zhe na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kyis nga nyid dang / so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang rdo rje 'dus
83a7(rnying rgyud): gabyang nyid dang 'dra ba ste/ de bzhin du 'das pa dang da lta dang ma 'ongs pa rnams dang tshul mthun dbye ba med pa'o// yang rdo rje 'dus pa ma dad cing spar ba'i gang zag de ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba ma byas par/ lung ma bstan par ma nges pa'i
83b1(rnying rgyud): ma na/ gan mas pa rnas pas sa pa la ngan dus da / pa du du nga ga rlab ba chug kyang pa la ga // yongs
83b2(rnying rgyud): 'jams pa'i bsam pa can/ de lta bu'i rnalamaH/ 'gro zhi rtogs par med tha rangs tha ci'i slong // sa kyi rnam zer smin pa ma bzad de/ rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyu 'di la medad cing/ spa ba'i debang gis/ ngaH
83b3(rnying rgyud): gnas na yang rnga rdza mi bzad paradang zhal pa gzim du smrams// de yang tsha 'bastan pA la song po gnas nas kyang / bkal stong can rje bsal pa gsum du gnas so// de nas tha 'phos nas yi dgas kyin yang/ zlab pa can gyis pa
83b4(rnying rgyud): 'a ma ga na 'disadas ma'an pa jug spya na 'a mi ga ngam das ni sa nga na la nga du pan la drug ma
83b5(rnying rgyud): dA satsha' bas nas kyang kyi dpral ba cha rang po'i gnas sa brtul pa gcam du zhes te/ bskal ba chen dang rdzab kyang du rgyad drug ladzi ra ba'i gnas su 'khyams nas/ sang+yas rgyas kyi brten pal med pa'i tshul na kyang / des n+ya maN+Dalar
83b6(rnying rgyud): bang sngu rdzun dang / thugs rngubabs ma 'i stan pa da spyod kyis brnal brgyal// ngan 'dus pa pa/ sa pa theg pa 'di byung na ga tu mang / dbangs sung mi 'i nga'i matig 'jigs da pa dang
83b7(rnying rgyud): gas ba'i mig pa 'dun can byung ba'i sangs sa nga byeng byin pa// 'bras rdzo ga pa kyi ba yang na 'a / gzing du 'breg pa'ing yang ni brjod// dkyi nan/ sapa 'gyu rnams gas
84a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'di yi sdod du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag zugs rtsa bzhis kyang gsang ba'i theg pa 'di ma bshad do// sngon thog ma'i 'asgral ba kun bkad ces bya ba byung ba
84a2(rnying rgyud): sangs kyis sngon byang gi rgyal po bya ba de'i bstan pa la rgya cher bsgrags te/ nges pa'i don rgya cher spyod do// de'i tshe 'gro ba rnams gsang ba'i theg pa 'di la shin tu dang bar gyur te/ rnam par grol ba'i lamachen po la bkod do// rdo rje 'dus pa chen po/ nga lngar
84a3(rnying rgyud): brtan pa 'di nyid kyang / lung bstan pa'i dang ba can ne/ lha gnas su ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogapas spyad pa la/ klu'i gnas su ni bu'i rgyal po 'jog po la sogs pa la/ 'jam dpal dang lhan ras gzigs kyis lang bstan cing rgya cher grags par 'gyur la/
84a4(rnying rgyud): gnas su ni dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po dza zhes bya ba tshogs bsags pa de la/ rim la ya zhes bya bar phyag na rdo rjes lung bstan cing / des ni mi'i gnas su rgya cher spyod par 'gyur ro// de yang skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis spyod par 'gyur te/ ched
84a5(rnying rgyud): 'ga' ni dang / ched 'ga' ni nub/ tshad 'ga' ni mngon du byung / ched 'ga' ni gab cing sbas/ la las ni tshul bzhin du sbyang de sngags kyi mthu stobs kyang rnyed/ phal cher 'dra tshul log par lhong pas lcang gnas su 'gyur bas/ 'gro ba la la ri dang
84a6(rnying rgyud): la la nA ma dang ha/ drus nas zhig na stegs ma lnga'i dus 'ong ste/ sprul pa'i lus bstan pa'i tshe na pa zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i theg pa 'di nyid/ da nye bskal babye ba 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal ba me tang
84a7(rnying rgyud): dko nga zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i tshen/ sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba/ da ltar dang tshul mthun pa zhig 'byung ste/ des gsang ba'i theg pa 'di rgya cher rton par 'gyur// sangs kyis gzhan gang gis kyang gsang ba'i theg pa'ang stan par ma
84b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te/ dza tsa'i phyir zhe na/ 'gro ba rnams gsang ba 'di nyid kyi snod dum gyur pa'i phyir ro// rdo rje 'dus pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bcangs shing bskur ba'i spyan yon dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas gang gis zung gang la
84b2(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa zhus lan du bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor chags dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ mtshang pa dri mas ni mngon par mdzad cing lan stong du bcang mag ba
84b3(rnying rgyud): nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ bdag gzhan gnyis kyi dpal mnga' zhing // phyin ci log bzhi spangs pas khyad par mthu byin che// gzung 'dzin rnam spangs
84b4(rnying rgyud): ma g.yos rdo rje de// don rtogs drang don nges pa'i don khros pa'i sku gsung thugs// ston pa'i bdag nyid de la phyag 'tshal bstod// a ma ho/ dgyes pa chen po yum gyi mkha' klong nas// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par sbyor// gnyis
84b5(rnying rgyud): med thig le byang chub dag pa'i sku// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// bka' yi 'khor lo gsang ba'i 'khor la bstod// e ma ho/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi thugs// mi nub tshes srog dbang po 'dzin byang ba/
84b6(rnying rgyud): smra ba'i seng ge zhu ba'i spobs par ldan// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje nyid la 'dus// rdo rje 'dus pa de la phyag 'tshal bstod// e maho/ sku gsung thugs klong gsung gi chos mchog bdud rtsi che dang mtshungs// rgyud dang
84b7(rnying rgyud): lung dang man ngag kun gyi mdzad du bzhugs// 'das dang mgyon dastan la 'byor bzod pa'i lam// theg pa can las 'phags pas 'og mthil gyis gnon// don dam bden pa'i mdzod ni dmigs pa'i sngon mar sdang // bstan pa rgya mtsha' chas
85a1(rnying rgyud): laphyag 'tshal ba stod// ston pa'i bzhugs pa'i gnas mchog khyad par can// bka' ba dam chos ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// shes rab thug dus gsum bzhugs pa'i gnas// gyi nang gsang gnas pa
85a2(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal bstod// ston pa gnas 'khor dam chos 'byung ba'i dus// 'das dang ma gyon de lta dang // ma des dus na gang 'tshams pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa'i dus la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces mngon par bstod do// de dang
85a3(rnying rgyud): yang sangs rgyas 'dus pa la sogs 'khor rnams kyis/ rdo rje 'dus pa la bsgo ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'dus pa khyod ni/ bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ zhu ba spobs pa dang ldan pa ste/ phyi rabs kyirna la 'byor pa'i phyir/ da
85a4(rnying rgyud): kyi don bsdu bar gsol lo// zhes rnam par bskul lo// de nas rdo rje 'dus pas bskul ba'i don thugs su chud de/ gsol ba ni/ e ma ho// bde bar gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/ gyi rabs rnal 'byor don gyi phyir/ rdo rje gas
85a5(rnying rgyud): ba chen po'i rgyud kyi don nyid rab bsdus nas/ gnas shing rtogs par ji ltar bkyi/ zhes gsol bas/ zhes bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dus pas brgyad khri bzhi stong sgo mo dang / yan lag bcu gnyis sde sdong dang / bsdus pa'i sde snod rnam pa gsum
85a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i bye brag bstan pa yang / bkri ba'i don du bstan pa ste/ des don pasdus pa rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud 'di nyid/ khyod la sogs dang da ltar phyis 'byung yang / lta spyod smra ba dang phrin las dkyil 'khor dbang dang dam chog ting 'dzin rnams/ rdo rje ga
85a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i hud las gsal bas na// lam gyi nang na nye lam dang po ste// rdo rje 'dus pa khyod la gtad// gsang ba'i rgyung 'di nub par gyur ta re// zhes gsungs so// de nas rdo rje 'dus pa/ shin tu yang dga' ba'i yid g.yos nas/ rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje
85b1(rnying rgyud): nas su gsor zhing / 'di skad ces dam bcas so// e ma ho// bde gshegs kun gyi gtso// kun gyi don bsdus te rdo rje gsang brgyad 'di la/ bdag la sogs pas da lta phyis spyod pas/ lam gyi nad na nye 'am dam pa bgyis te/ gang dag blta ba la dang bas rgyang 'di'i blta ba'i lam
85b2(rnying rgyud): blta bar bgyi'o// gang dag spyod pa la dga' bas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi sbyong ba'i lam la mngon par spyod par bgyi'o// gang dag sgrub pa la mos pas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi sgrub pa'i lam la mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o// gang dag phrin las la gus pas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi phrin las kyi lam la
85b3(rnying rgyud): phran las su bya'o// gang dag dkyil 'khor brtsam pas/ rgyud 'di nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lam la mngon par rtogs par bya'o// gang dag dbang nod par sems pas/ rgyud 'di nyid dbang gi lam la mngon par nod do// gang dag dam tshig bsrung ba'i sems yod pas rgyud 'di'i dam tshig gi lam la
85b4(rnying rgyud): mngon par dka' thub tu gnas par bya'o// gang dag ting nge 'dzir la mnyam par 'jog par 'dod pas/ rgyu 'di'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la mngon par bsgom par bya'o// 'on tang na bdag dang kyis 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis/ rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud 'di'i chos kyi srog shing mngon par gzug go// chos
85b5(rnying rgyud): kyirnga mngon par rdung ngo // chos kyi dung mngon par 'bud do// chos kyi char mngon par dbab po// chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun 'chang med par bskor ba ste/ mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan chen por gnas par bgyi'o// zhes dam bcas so// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rdul bsdams
85b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la zhugs te/ mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das nyid ni dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings la mnal lo// rgyud kyi don bsdus pa de dag ni rin po chen po gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUr+ya zhun mas bris nas/ sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa gsum gyis/ sri
85b7(rnying rgyud): pa gsum du chos kyi char mngon par bab pas// sgra dang klu dang me'i rnal 'byor rnams/ chom bu'i las lam chags par ri / 'dzin byang chub kyis blangs so// rdo rje phung pa gsang ba'i rjed chen po las/ rlud yongs su bzung zhi gtang ba'i 'du bye bani du rgya bzhiba'o// rnga rnga ru rang gas pa'i byud chen //
86a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ kI la ya gu n+ya sA sha ya mab+h+yaH/ bod skad du/ phur bapa gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bad bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras 'jigs kyang can po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad 'das
86a2(rnying rgyud): gis thos pa'i dus gcog na/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po badz+ra kI la ya drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i nang nas bzhengs nas/ gdug pa can thams cad 'dul ba dang / dregs pa can dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnod par byed pa thams cad tshar gcad
86a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i gyi rab tu drag po mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos nyid zhi bas 'dul ba'i skabs lam pa bste/ thabs mkhas pa'i sku drug po'i phrin las kyis 'dul bar gzigs nas/ sku rab tu khros pa mi bzang bar bstan pa'i phyir/ su gsung thugs las
86a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i sngags 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM bi hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas/ rab tu khros pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ skye ba med pa las skye ba'i cho 'jal dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad/ zhabs bgrang bapa/ spyan bzlog pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/
86a5(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs shin tu mi bzad pa gcig tu gyur to// rab tu mi bzad pa'i thugs ka nas/ thugs ye shes kyi sa bon las/ gsang ba'i sngags 'di phyung ngo // e raM yaM khaM/ e ri laM su kaM/ b+h+rU~M b+har+b+ha b+h+rUM/ zhes 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul gyi sdang ba chags shing / ye shes kyi
86a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul du bsgyur to// nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ karma shrI he ru ka zhes brjod pas/ khro bo karma he ru ka sku mdog ldang nag/ spu shin tu mi bzad pa 'thon to// de nas khro bo karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// ba
86a7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya/ dbyang thag chad pa'i ngan song 'khor ba la// thugs rjes bzung nas tsho 'phrul bstan pa 'di// 'di lta bu yi tshe 'phrul ngo mtshar che// 'di yi rjes su bgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// stong pa'i rin rtogs ji ltar lags// e zhes bya ba ji ltar
86b1(rnying rgyud): 'gas// ngang Sha cu bya/ zla/ 'di// drung du 'phral bas car ma/ rjem pa las lung 'di bstan drugasal// bad ba dag shags pas lung bstan drags sa// zhes nasam pa dang / danas 'ardag la smras/ kan ga chun na chagags na nas/ dun
86b2(rnying rgyud): dka' stsal to// nyon cig sa ka/ nga mi rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// nganapa stong pa nyid du bsgom// rdo rje khros pas de sdang gcod// thugs ni yang dag rdo rje nyid// stong pa nyid kyi yo shes ni// rnam par me tog cig las 'das// de
86b3(rnying rgyud): nyid du bsgom par b+ha// de ni chos kyi sku nyid la// bzhin ni mnor pa yang yin// nyid ni bcos su med pa'o// ma hA shAn+ya t+tha yis ni// rtog pa'i dngos po zil gyis gnon// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yi// sgra mi mtshon brgya'i ting 'dzin// dri nyid bya
86b4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin// r-i/ raM las ma yi dkyil 'khor gyis// dngos por snang ba'i sdug bsngal bsal// dngos po rtag pa zer zug bsrag/ yaM/ yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal ye shes rlung gis bsgod// phrin las tshogs
86b5(rnying rgyud): pa med pas don yang mdzad// khaM/ khaM las ye shes chu yi dkyil 'khor gyis// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i bag chags ldan sngon rnams// dag pa ye shes chen po'i grong du bkra// aM/ a las nam mkha'i rang bzhin dmigs pa med// bskal pa
86b6(rnying rgyud): zhig 'khor ba stongs pa ltar// chos nyid mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du bsgom// yaM/ yaM las ye shes rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis// sa ma khregs ye shes rdo rje rgya tha ma gyis// thams cad 'dogs pa'i stobs kyis shugs dang ldan//
86b7(rnying rgyud): 8khrag gi rgya rtse// 'khrugs pa'i klong dkyil thugs rje chen ze'i dang // sdug bsngal dbang 'dus 'bras bu gcig tu shar ba mdzad// sa/ su las gsar gyis gzhi yis// thams cad brtom pa 'dags par byed// kau/ las
87a1(rnying rgyud): man na/ gas na rgyun du na smra na
87a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi thams bkyang rlungag kyag pa ste// bye dang med me ga so so gas sa// \u0f88\u0f90d+h+we/ bar bskam tshan la shes dkyil 'khang sa// 'bar ni ga btu'abar 'i yul pas khung // gshes tshe 'bre' rnyi pa na la 'i phung// drang srong du la gang can pa
87a3(rnying rgyud): brdzu nam yad+b+h+yAM/ zhem pas b+hU d+h+rU'i ga sngal pa smra pang // mthing nag hU~M ba ba la// 'bras ba/ la 'dzin du gang dang bang da // dngas yang yid d+hI ta bta te hU~M/ zhem brjod pas/ nga bzhin nyid rje pa ngas/
87a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas 'a'i sa ma na ts+tsha ste/ nyid kyi tshul lakhril pa'i tshul du zugs par gyur // rnasus pa na ni gas pa // gan sun dunang bdang // nga gi dkyiladrab ni mang // ma mags gag la mas dang // rnags
87a5(rnying rgyud): srang ljon migs// he T+wA~M rjo gdan rgyangs su// byang chubasams kyi thogs par shing // grogs nas gang gang bas do jig rjer dang // dzin nal mi 'a rje legs pa ma pa'i dgas// darje'i chang gzung ba zlas pa'i lags pazhi dbang brtsom
87a6(rnying rgyud): bcwamam mchog // 'dzi cing panan pa ma yin te// yang bang rdzas gtamathas nas// ram pa shes pa rje tu// sems gsupa ba nga ton pangs rnag 'jas dmas// thugs ni byeng rlab sems kyi bdag dang gnyis su ma pa
87a7(rnying rgyud): ting nga sru ngas ngas dang nan pa nan// bdag pa 'angs gsum sngal ba su marin pa dgas // phyug nga dngas kyi sa// 'a ga nga bye dam pa gas pa rdzogs/ sa na
87b1(rnying rgyud): bsgom// nga nas drags pa can thams cad gti mug gi dbang gis/ d+hu 'bras kyi don ma rtogs shing / mtshan ma med pa'i don dang rnam par bral/ mtshan ma can la zhan cing chags pas/ ngan song gsum du bskal ba mang por sdug bsngal mi bde ba sna tshogs nyams su rtsod nas/
87b2(rnying rgyud): las kyi 'bras bu smin pas// las kyi srin por skyes nas rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus shin tu 'jigs shing rmongs/ sems can thams cad la gnod par byed pa// sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang / srog dang bral bar bgyid/ de'i don la thugs rjes dgongs nas/ yab yum
87b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems las/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ mU hUM hUM/ dzaHdzaHdzaH/ phaT phaT phaT/ kI la ya ti ra bi/ hUM dzaHkI la ya sod chom gtogs/ zhes phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs ngam rjes su dran par gyur/ nyid kyi sku las kyang sras
87b4(rnying rgyud): chog grangs med pa thon par gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can thams cad bsdus nas bsgral bar gyur to// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/ hUM kA ra dang sgra 'byin ma// rnam par rgyal dang rnam skems ma// dbyug pa sngon po
87b5(rnying rgyud): sder mo dang // gshin rje'i gshed po dur khrod ma// mi g.yo mgon po gtun khung ma// rta mthen rgyal po gtum me dang // ta ki rA \u0f7f mda' snyems ma// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rlung 'byin ma// khams gsum rnam rgyal gsod byed ma// stobs po che dang rdo rje bskyod ma
87b6(rnying rgyud): dang // gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa'i phra men yang // phag mgo stag mgo g.yag mgo dang // sha ba gzig dang byi ya'i mgo// spyang mo'i mgo dang seng ge'i mgo// dred dang dom gyi mgo ru bstan// smig bu bya rog bya rgod mgo// 'ug pa khA dang pu shud mgo//
87b7(rnying rgyud): tha yi mgo dang pha wang mgo// sre mo'i mgo dang byi ba'i mgo// yang sprul pa sum srul grangs med kyis// srid pa'i rlung yang mi thar gtams// de nas bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas/ 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can gyi 'bras bu rgya mtsho tsam du rngubs nas badz+ra kI
88a1(rnying rgyud): lalam 'a gyu bral ba nyis/ rdzun pa nga/ la pa'i yang dag pa bdan ldan na dus la rgyal lta'i 'brangs sa ma da/ sa bahAbs thag sa/ sngam du na/
88a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i grogs dang tshogs bsrung bar dam bcas so// rgyal rnams bcan du bzung ba yis/ 'bangs rnams chams la phebs par 'gyur/ de'im thogs spong ba rnams/ tha ba'i zhabs 'og tu zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skye gsung thub
88a3(rnying rgyud): ste gsang ba k+Shi ya ya/ gsang ba'i 'gongs chud chen pa las/ dregs pa can btul ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la/ 'amar rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig
88a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzirnams// srid pa natha ma dang cig/ sring par dgrang pa ste// lags thab thub par mad// sangs cas can rgyal shes rba// nga nyid de rjems dbying sams/ 'a ba'i ga ma bzang po// sku yid kyig tu bdin kyi /
88a5(rnying rgyud): dang thugs kyang de bzhin nga // thabs kyi sdud pas 'gro na rtsa// rnams dang sbyang rjes gang 'dral ba// sangs cas zid las rdzogs ma danas// dbang dang byin rlabs thal dug stsol// gas mabar rnams kyis kyi na gsang ba'i mchod pa thul nas/
88a6(rnying rgyud): na dra ga sang ba'i dbang gasra pa dang // yug sung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// hong gsu ma lus 'od zer 'a'o// thams cad byang chub sems su gyur/ bsdus pas sku gsung stabs chen pa// sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur ro// kA la yags /
88a7(rnying rgyud): dngas rgyan can po la mi bang ga po gnyis pa'o/ danas pa tha/ bya gas/ sa na 'das badz+rag l-i yal 'ad skyed ces zhu sa // ngas su bsgrub pa rnas
88b1(rnying rgyud): gnas ni gang dang gang dubaH// dmyal bar rnam gsum sku gsung thugs// 'di yi don nams ji ltar lags// zhes gsal ba dang / nganas badz+ra kA la yas// gnas kyi/ khyad par 'ad gsungs na// tan \u0f7fga ka ha ka/ gnas rgyad bang bas
88b2(rnying rgyud): de// zur thu bsgrub pa'i gnas rnams na// dred byed gnas dang shing gcig drung // Na ma lam bya ba dang // ngam thog gnas dang khang rtso // de je dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bya// las li phan 'dog sa yod pa dang // 'dris zhing shugs kyis ting 'a
88b3(rnying rgyud): gsal// de la thabs dang rtags med na// bdag gi gzugs lung brlag pa dang // cha dang srog la bar chad 'od // nags tshal chen po gan bar// dar ni legs par dpyad pa ni// klu yi mig dang 'byung po'i srang // sa yi bgegs dpa sa rungs sa/
88b4(rnying rgyud): mi shis pa yis min par// las kyi bya ba'i gzhung brtsams na// bkra shis don gyi gnas yin pas// yun ring bsgrub na 'grub par 'gyur// me tog gling dang rin chen ri// dpag bsam shing dang skad snyan gyi// 'bru sna tshogs dang gnam sa legs// dbying
88b5(rnying rgyud): legs lung par na ba ni// bkra shis gzhung bzang gnas yin pas// gnas kyi dam pa yin zhes bshad// drag po'i las su bya ba la// dang por phur ba sgrub pa'i gnas// nags ri tshar ma can gyi shing // gcan gzan gdug pa lnga tshogs yod// gnasa'i mi
88b6(rnying rgyud): mda' dan ze'i thAs// sa ni zhu gsum mi dpung 'dra// logs la dur khrod gling yod pa// bakhas pas btags te btsal byas na// 'di ni phur ba'i sgrub gnas yin// tshor ba can gyi shing dag dang // drag shing gdug pa meng pa dang // drag la 'di 'o ma
88b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang // thog po gting za ba ngan pa dang // stag giso 'dra sbrul gyi rtse// sdig pa'i rwa 'dra chu srin la// ban glang lnga 'thab brag chu'i bar// rkang gcig shing dang ma rungs sa// 'di na phur pa gad ba gnas yin// bsad pa'i gnas su btsun pa ni// sngon chad
89a1(rnying rgyud): snyam grangs dang // gsul brje ba dang mtshan 'thab dang // bslad bcang pa dang ma thAl// san pa bskal ba'i bsha gshedang // srog pacad pas pa'i mag rjes dang // gsul dab shams pa'i smra byung ba tog
89a2(rnying rgyud): bsad pa' phrang ba'i sa// zag ni srin madra ba 'dra// ri ni thal phrang bsnyil ba 'dra// srang ba me yis bsregs pa 'dra// shing rtsi rkang thang 'bros pa 'dra// skang gshongs mer zas pa 'dra// 'di ni brde gcing bskal gnas yin// sems la chos nyid migs la dang// 1
89a3(rnying rgyud): dang ting 'dzin g.yel bas ni// gnas 'di dag tu yongs mi za// nam phug nal 'gror bdag la gnod// de bas gzhung dang mthun pa yi// bkra shes sA yi gnas dag tu// yun ring bsrings na gdon gtol med// dam tshig mnyams des nab dang // ting 'dzin
89a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i ba can gyis// gnas ni de dang de dag tu// cho ga'i las 'di brtsam par bya// nges par 'grub par gdon mi za// de lta bu yis rnyed nas// yulas de yi bdag pa la// bden pas bkrol lams rin bcal// de nas zhag grangs 'di tsam mam// drag po'i las 'dis
89a5(rnying rgyud): grub bar// gnas 'di rnal 'byor ba dgag yar bas// gtor mthun pa 'di long la// mgrub par du gzhan du dngas// dgra shis pa yi smon lam gdab// de skang zas la gtor ma sbyin// bzla ba'i las rnams gnyer yang gtad// de nas gzhung bzhin
89a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor brtsig/ khams gsum srid gsum dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// rak+Sha chags pa'i dbang gis chag chag gad ba/ srid gsum ye nas ye shes chen po lnga// gti mug sogs pa'i dug la gnas su gzhom phyer dra// dam rdzas bdud rtsi lnga yaMs chag
89a7(rnying rgyud): rtag gdab// rin chen sna lnga'i kha dog tshan// 'bru lngas byin gyis brlab cing bri bar bya// tha'as dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// byang chub sems kyi thig gdab po// 'khor lo rtsibs bachad thig tu gdab// dbus su drag po grwa gsum la/ blag
89b1(rnying rgyud): dmar pa dbang gi rgya la// rnam pakru bzhizhi rgyas sa// bla chad bzhes ni rab tu brtan// grwa bzhin / byad bzhi dang ldan// chags pa bcu gcog bsngal man bsgom// zla parda'i gtan snang du// dbus su rdzogs pa'i gdan dag la/ 'a sa
89b2(rnying rgyud): khyen// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs dag la// dri za bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// rnam par rgyab pa yab yum bskyed// shar lho'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// me lha bsnol ba'i gdan dag la// dbyug pa sngon po yab yum pa myed// blo phyogs 'khor
89b3(rnying rgyud): rtsibs steng du// gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// gshin rje gshed po yab yum bskyed// lho nub 'khor lo'i rtsibs snyed du// bden bral bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// me g.yo mgon mo yab yum bskyed// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs snyed du/
89b4(rnying rgyud): dbang bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// rta mazin rgyal po yab yum bskyed// nab byang 'khor lo'i rtsibs ster du// rlung lha bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// gzhan gyis mi thub yab yum bskyed// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i ga
89b5(rnying rgyud): steng du// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yab yum bskyed// byang shar 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// dbang ldan bskol ba'i gdan steng du// khams gsum rnam chal ya ba yum bskyed// mdun du tshangs pa'i gdan steng du// hUM mdzad yab yum bskyed par bya/
89b6(rnying rgyud): tras bdag gdan la ni// stobs chen yab yum bskyed par bya// de dag g.yas g.yon gnyis su ni// phra thabs g.yas lam men g.yon// yang sprul sram sbal bskyed par bya// sgo bzhir sgom bzhi dag dgod// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han d+ha ru/
89b7(rnying rgyud): zang snying ba kres la ni// dngas grub rten ni rub tu gzhag/ thod pa 'i tshal bu bcug rdegaH// la tshon me ma rab cu gcig 'ang // tshogs sa bcad pa'i rdo r-I ra~M ts+yai// mtshang ba'i phrir lam ba su dang gong // dag mang ba mtsho ltar rdzob pa// rjes mang bar
90a1(rnying rgyud): spang // thun chen g.yang gzhi sbyin ltar gti ba// zhing phrin mang po 'phan du bkram// gzhan yang ldan rnams gzhung bzhin datham// de ltar gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// maN+Dal 'dom gang du
90a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi la// thig bzhi btab pas ling chod dbu// dbus su pho brang dkar zlum por// yig 'bru a ra tshon gyis bri// snying po'i zhabs la a re gdags// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// sgo rnams zur la gtad par
90a3(rnying rgyud): dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// gru bzhi sgo rnams sgol gtad// yi ga 'bu tAM sA gang rung dgod// lha steng zhabs la tAM swa ga dwags// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa lags// maN+Dal 'dom gang grwa bzhi la// pad+ma 'drab brgyad thig tu gdab/
90a4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma re la zla ga ma re// steng du yi ge aM re dgod// lha snying zhabs la ai re gdags// dbang gi dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// maN+Dal gru bzhi 'dom gang la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad thig tu gda'// 'khor lo ral grwa gsum re// yig 'bu yig tshon phaTar dgod/
90a5(rnying rgyud): snying zhabs la phaT re gdags// drag po'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// sgo rnams sgo khyud kun dang mthun// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bur du gdon// kha dog rigs dang mthun par bri// sgo yi gyi logs snam bral// khru gsum brgya dang rtsa brgyad mi// dug
90a6(rnying rgyud): dug d+hA'i tshor ma can// lcags thag nag pos bsdams la ni// yig 'bu dz+wa la rkyen mas dgod// ha ma nag dkyil 'khor dam pa'o// rgyud kyi chal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung tshugs kyi gsang ba/ kA la ya gsang ba'i dgongs kyang las/
90a7(rnying rgyud): gnas kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang dkyil 'khor gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang khrag 'thung gi rgyal po badz+ra kI la ya la/ ka rma he ru kas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye/ bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// lha la dbang bskur
90b1(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lam/ rkyen gyis bdab na de ltar brlag// byas gsal padag/ das da ces pa / nagag sa// thags kyi mngasacas ldan pas sa// da cag mas pa nga mabenaH// gsol gdu ba dbang
90b2(rnying rgyud): par bya// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan phrin lasA lA ru 'askur// phyogs bcu'i srog la dbang bskur nas// phrag ni ye shes byar nas ni// khams gsum sgrol ba'i dbang bskur ro// ya/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas// gnyis su med par
90b3(rnying rgyud): bstims byas nas// bdag nyid grub pa'i dkyil 'khor la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa brtsam// bdag nyid thugs ka'i 'od zer las// lha mo mang po slar 'dzin nas// bdag la mchod la byed par bsam// skad 'a gsung dang thugs gsum du// nam skar mi
90b4(rnying rgyud): dpyod snang mtha' yas// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje 'um// 'bru gsum po la yig 'bras bskor// sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon las// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phros// srid gsum byang chub sems sra bskal// bde bar gshegs pa'i zug dam bskad//
90b5(rnying rgyud): slar 'dus bdag gi gnas su thim// thugs nas rim par dbang bskur bas// bdag nyid ldan grub sku gsung thugs// bdag nyid kho rgyal yin pa'i phyir// swa las ye shes 'od zer 'phya// khams gsal yenas sangs rgyas yin/ rtog pa'i dang
90b6(rnying rgyud): gis 'khor ba rnams// gnyis med byang chub sems su bskal// slar 'dus bdag la dbang basbyar ro// dar gyi de ni gzungs zag la// dkar dmar mthar ser rin po che// bdag dang khro bo phung ba rdzes// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su// rig
90b7(rnying rgyud): dag m+WAr ta tsA ba ste bya// rin po che yi sbu gu ru// re re la yang gsum gsum dkar// dbang bsur byin gyis brlab par bya'o// bum pa lnga la rgan mas 'acan// so so'i lha yi snying po yi// zhams lang pa' bo 'bru waM gdags// wang dkar bzlas la 'dul pa
91a1(rnying rgyud): bya// rdo ji zil ba rin pon// ngo nye la sogs so so'i sngags kyis bsgrim// pra dbang dus sus so'i rnabs lag dgas// grangs kar brnas la bstim par bya// na ba'i dbus sde bcud bslus rtsal ni// yig 'a na
91a2(rnying rgyud): pas// ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan pasdad par bya// ti yang bang bzla gan pa dbang / thugs nin rten gzhal las khang // maud ma zhogs pa banas la// ye shes sde yis dbang bskur bas// yi dam nyid zhu bar gyur// gang gis dbang ba
91a3(rnying rgyud): zhom pa'i dbang // yig mthil nyid kyi rtsa nyid la// lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas khang // ye shes tshen gang don yad grub// thugs ka'i rgya gra ma yig 'bruhA// las kyi rigs kyi bzlas pas bskor// rdo rje rgya thal dbang bskur ye shes sems dpa' grwa/
91a4(rnying rgyud): na las dbang bskur dam pa yin// kye dbus padra'ang ba brgyang la// dbus su sdang ba mtha' yas 'byed// padz+ra A la bzlas pa'i yig 'bras bskor// gsung rab de la bras dbang bskur ye shes sems dpa' zhu// bshad bzlas gnyis kyi dbang bskur mchag
91a5(rnying rgyud): mnano// dbang rdzas rnams kyang de bzhin du// mkhas goms grab bas dbang bskur te// bsnyen pa'i kyil 'dir gzhung bzhin pa// mkhab pas lha phrar rnam pas 'god// tan ta'i nang du bzlas nyung bsags// phur ba brtul khra ba cu'i snying po bri// tshogs la snying po
91a6(rnying rgyud): dpal la las sngags so// brtsa mtshams tshong mtshams mchod pa stod gzhung bzhinaH// thang dkar rgal pos dbang bsrin byin gyis ba rlab// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i dpal 'khar gsal ba sgoms la// phrar pa dar gyi cod pan gzungs thag gdags// rin po che yi sku gu khong
91a7(rnying rgyud): byang byang chubs mas// lags la sngags dathugs kyi leg 'brul bregs// de 'i rba ba man lagagasum du bral// ta cang sems cadang ning gdag \u0f7f// sems gnas dran gshi 'i rtsal 'brel// skragasang thugs kyi 'gro 'dra grangs mang hA// ra la ya
91b1(rnying rgyud): rnam ga sa sa du chu/ pa // dang// za sa sa // las ldan sa // dab sa
91b2(rnying rgyud): rjes 'dug da'ang mchag 'dad pangs// dpel bar dam pa brten 'i phyir// rmob pa na sang dang ldan pangs// bdad mi bang rtag mna' mes banag// mamyota yis na ka/ bzlas pa'i bde brgyag// gsang ba'i dkyil la 'a 'di rtsegasas
91b3(rnying rgyud): Tima~M gzhan la ma sgra zhig/ gal te gzhan la slas gyur na// mug bsal chen pas zlar mi 'phur// srog la bar ched myar budzad// sems can dmyal ba chen par bya// de las par pa'i dus med 'gyur// grod la dam tshig dpog pa ni// yid ma lhal rtag par
91b4(rnying rgyud): gnas// thugs dang phyag rgya kun mi gsong// tha ma mig gi 'bras sa bya ta// don sran la ba rtseg dung che// gsang ba'i mnang ga zabs mchag 'di// sna dang na gzhan la mi thal lo// rlung 'brel gro zhen srab la zhugs// sgor grol mchod pa rgyan mi gtsad/
91b5(rnying rgyud): da lag rtag tu dngas// bska banams pa bcas pa meng // blad pas gzhibazhin gyis// dmathag 'jigs pa'i mabar pa na spangs// gsang ba'i tham pa 'da'adaka' ba/ gsang dwags zang ma nyin pa'is pa pon la// mang son pa
91b6(rnying rgyud): nr-is // dngos thub med cing dpral bar srung // mgal bar rgyad zla nga dang // de ga da mi rtag pag pa dang // gas dgrags pa ma bang mthag/ 'bras bral// lAs 'graskal bar ldan dang mi ldan pa// las bzlas gos gtsang bsan la nyal dugazhug/
91b7(rnying rgyud): skegs rdeb pa'i slar zhugs dbang ma cha gzong// dang sro pa dpa na phyag cha gnang gi mi// thugs kyi dngos gru ba zab pa'i chags// lag tu ba na thogs pa dang // kun gyi dmag dpan byed cing me// sul rgyan cha 'dogs shing me// su yi dngos bu'i thob pa
92a1(rnying rgyud): rtags// gsur ga sulas la bshags shing na// gzhan yang bangs sngags na// 'dag gas brtags dang 'byung bas// yang/ ngas rgya kha pa dgas// brdzu ga dang/ nags pa sam
92a2(rnying rgyud): ba// rgya mamo chen po brgal sbyin tshwa// bdag gi lus kyang bshas nas ni// sha khrag mi yis bgos kyin mi// gsung gi dngos grub thob pa'i rtags// mda' gzhug mtshan thogs pa dang // rtsi shing mang po bsrel ba dang // nam mkha' la ni
92a3(rnying rgyud): 'phrar shin // dzin las dngas grub rtsab pa'i rtags// gsang thags zab me bang gi 'bras bral// lus dang skal bar ldan pa'i rigs ze'u mtshagad// bdag lus sra gang 'dir la sogs// tha dang kyad mar bcas pa rnams// zhum pa med pa
92a4(rnying rgyud): sems kyis dbul// rdo rje rigs kyi yon yin no// bran dang bcas pa'i 'dod yon wa// 'khor lo can gyi yon yin no// rin chen sna lnga la sogs dang // glang po rta dang maher bcas// rin chen rigs mi yon yin no// ma srang bu ma chung ma dang // rab tu
92a5(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa dag dang ni// rgod ma la sogs mo chags rnams// pad+ma'i rigs kyi yon du dpral// rta dang ma he glang chen da / rdzas kyi bye thug mang po bkal ba ni// las kyi rigs kyi yon du dbul// slob dpon pa dz+ral zi la bzhugs su gusal// gser la sa gra
92a6(rnying rgyud): na poH/ da b+h+ye tham par jug pa// gzhan yang rdzas rnams kyi phrul pa// nyid la gtu ma// rdo rje thabang po thugs ng+ge// la shes sems pazhi mi ngag/ 'dus dzun 'grim pa las// srabam man nags rba/
92a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' nyid lathim// thim pas 'di du zla bar gyur// a khaM dwe blang hU~M/ de skad brjing la 'as rab bya// de nas dkyil la ba'i chen pa Ta// dbang gi rim pa bka bar bya// dang po rgyu 'bras mi ba swA bsan// dkar 'bral byed slab ma la// rdzogs pang /
92b1(rnying rgyud): 'das na sa// tham sa 'das la// ga tu' kyil sa ngasasul ga// ladugs sus sa sa/ gsas pad pa yang na bamasas// la thag pal nabasam// thabs dang gas dang gnas thos byung// gas pa
92b2(rnying rgyud): su bskur bar bya'o// dngos grub chen po thob par nges// dngos grub rnam gnyis mi ldog pa// shes rab ma yi mtshan brtag pa// swa ni ser la li ba dang // mig la kri ka chags pa dang // 'bras bu dkar nag phyed pa dang // so la so zho chags pa dang // dang
92b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i byin pa phra ba dang // lus la dri zhim nad kyang nyung // nu ma chung la sked skabs dod// skad kyang dang ba gzhon nu 'dra// lce 'jebs ma ma chu so yis 'jud// nA ma mnye zhing kha gnyis sbyar// mkha' gsang gnyis ni byin brlabs la// e steng nyi ma parla brkyang
92b4(rnying rgyud): zla ba rdo rje rtse lnga AH// s+t+waM dung to yis bstsal la ni// de la gnyis med sbyor bar bya// pad+ma la ni rdo rje zhugs// ni rje'i lam nas pad+mar 'khyil// bde ba gsal zhing mi dmigs pa// byang chub sems chu rab phab nas// gsang ba'i pho brang dbus su ni// bde
92b5(rnying rgyud): bar gshegs pa'i lha rnams bskyed// skad cig ma yi sprobasdus zhu// dkar 'tsher byang chub sems su gyur// byang chub sems ni spyan drangs nas// byang chub sems ni bsag pa'i snod// mtshan dang ldan pa'i ka pA la// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas
92b6(rnying rgyud): rnams su// dbang bskur dngos grub pastim par bya'o// gang zag rnams la bsgyur ba ni// dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song gsum du ljang mi srid// lha dang mi yi dbang por 'gyur// bskyed rim la ni sems zhugs nas// bum pa'i
92b7(rnying rgyud): dbang thob sems zin nas// zar pa'i lam las ldog mi srid// zab mo'i dbang ni thob gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa non pa zhes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya
93a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad cesna gsol to// kye gsang mchog badz+ra kI la ya// sras
93a2(rnying rgyud): mchog thar ba'i dkyil 'khor gang // gsad pa las kyi dkyil 'khor gas// zhes gsol pa dang / kI la yas bka' stsal pa/ nyan cig kArma he ru ka/ sras mchog phur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// yang dag nyid dungs bshad kyi// lus ngag yid
93a3(rnying rgyud): gus par ton// las la sbyor ba'i dus su ni// gsang ba yum gyi dkyil 'khor la// me 'od 'bar bas bskor bu bre// dbus su grwa gsum mthing nag la// phyi rim sgo rnams gnyis brtsegs su// nang rnams phyogs bzhi mtshams bcad la//
93a4(rnying rgyud): gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig la// sras mchog nyi shurtsa gcig dgad// rtsi rnams lcags bzhi mtshams brgyad du// gru gsum brgya ni rtsa brgyad la// gnan phrar brgyad du rtsa brgyad dgod// 'di ni sas mchog dkyil 'khor ro// gsang ba las sde dkyil 'a
93a5(rnying rgyud): ni// dkyil 'khor brang shar mtshams su ni// 'brug khun las kyi dkyil 'khor bri// ho ma khung gru gsum ga'adus pa la// rtse mo lho yi phyogs su bstan// dug gi rgya yis chag chag gdab// rob sags sol bas nag por byag/ bar rim gsum
93a6(rnying rgyud): dang ldan par b+ha// trAM dang laT kyis bskor ba bri// nyi shuHbrgyad kyang gis bskor// n+ya grog dmar po'i tsha ba dang na// mtshal khams chu yis khyer ba dang / grabs ma'i lo ma gangs kyi dum bu dang // ji chen ze rtsa ba se ye ras ma dang // ma dog gzhi byung
93a7(rnying rgyud): yin sa bya'i mdog/ dmal bar rdzas thos ste gar ma gro'o// sa kon na ma mtshams su bstan// rkang pa theng shar mtshams su bstan// tamakhrang nang du mag bstan la// smrab sheg sngon mo byung bar bsam// denas rnal 'thar ting
93b1(rnying rgyud): n+da// srid pa'i war bu bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// zla ba chen po gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yo dngos grub stsol// sred gsum phrar thar btA /
93b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// slob dpan 'khor gnas phran sum tshogs// 'chab zas dang sgrub rdzas gyen bzlog sman// phyi nang rgya 'gul mtshams kyang bcad// rgyu las byung dang rkyen las byung // par gcod dngos grib thob du mi ster bar/ ting 'dzin pas ral gyi ma tshams
93b3(rnying rgyud): dang mtshams bcad/ dbang dang dngas grub grang ba'i phyir// ye shes tha ba~M spyan drangs nas// za thabs yang sbrul sra mA sbrul dang // dmal btags pa'angam can rnams// sman dang mchod ba stod gzhung bzhin bya// bzhin pa bdun 'bram nyi khri gdan/
93b4(rnying rgyud): bye bas yas gdon mi za// mchod pa dus drug rgyan mi gcad// da ma can srang ma 'khor bcas la// drag po'i gtor ma byin nas ni// gang la bya ba'i phrin las bcol// mgyogs zed ye shes pho nya yis// ting 'dzin pas ra te gnas nas dgra ba// ga
93b5(rnying rgyud): gdon drag pas bstan par bya// wAn mas drag po'i las la bskal// thugs las sprul pa'i po nyini// wa men drag po'i las la bskal// ting 'dzin pas ra ti las la bskul// bka' nyan phan las po nya yis// dam can gnad phab bskul ba yis// tr-Id 'dzin
93b6(rnying rgyud): bsang ta gnas nas dgug/ gzir gnon brag pos brdung bar byar/ sngags dang ting 'dzin phrin las gsum/ dkyus dang phrin las sbyar ba ni// skor tshoms gsum du sbar bar bya'o// dug gtor khrag dang nyung dkar gyis// lirga la ne thun du zab// 'go ba'i lha dang bral
93b7(rnying rgyud): bar bya'o// du gu la nag po'i drang bas bdug/ 'gros kyis mi thar gnad gzir bya// steng na bur bu'i ser bdab ba// drod tshad gtan la phebs pa dang // brtul zhugs pa skyed de gdab par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud
94a1(rnying rgyud): lus/ sras mchog sar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khe 'brel par// nas yang kas ga zugs 'di skad ces gsas te// thabamam ldan bad kA la ya// 'gyur ba dbyangs su ba/ la ba gyur// srod ga smra ra
94a2(rnying rgyud): bas gdabapa la// thar pa'i Sh+Ta zil gyi// da sa tshad do lta lags// da ma ma tan byung ba de d+ha lags// gsang ba'i bdag pas yang bsnyen du gsol// bde ba gshegs pas grang brtan drags pa// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das ba
94a3(rnying rgyud): pas 'di skang ces bka' stsal to// ko na cig kam he drag/ phrar ba'i kun mas ngas pashad kyi// thag po ljags kyi phrar pa la// grwa lcags mde' rked rtags byin dang // gnam lpags thog gi lcags dag dang // gcod dang rdo dang wa la sogs// sed du mor gcig
94a4(rnying rgyud): rgyamadru \u0f7f/ rkang par bar gtsus cha 'dud// ras bcad rid chen ning brkyang la// maN+Da gnas pa gzhal las khang // ba kyi tsa madrad brtags pa la// thangs da shes yang kyar med do// gzhal las rang bzhin ba rtsegs mar gnas// tsam thar gsas
94a5(rnying rgyud): gang rab shad// dbang la blangs kyi phar ba'o// rgyas par gser po sogs pa N+Di// zhi ba dngul dang tsan+dan do// tso mo'i dbyibs rnam sor bstan// gzhan yang tshar ma can gyi shing // rab tu mi sman gnas dang nas// gang dag skyes pa gang yin dang // drug dang gca
94a6(rnying rgyud): nagadrug pa can// yat+ta/ gdug 'ang gnas dgan// rgyas pa'i nang mchogs mtshan// ster ba na sa lde dang // gang dag phyir klu mang po zhing // rna ba'i phyogs sa chu mdza la/ rtse me 'phags su zur gsumaH// dbyibs dpa' dag gang nga
94a7(rnying rgyud): zlan// gzhan yang gadrug pa'i tshor mtshan// gang mang rnams ma 'thod na// gdag pa'i shing mchog gang nyid pa/ ti de dzi kyis dkyil 'khoral// yid ladru dang gsas pa saH/ srag dang thab ma na// ngas pang thub par gsung las badz+ra/
94b1(rnying rgyud): 'di dag ring thung chod bstan pa// sor bzhi pa dang sor brgyad pa// bcu gnyis pa dang bcwa brgyad pa// de las thung bar ma gsungs te// de las rang bar yongs ma bshad// sar bzhi 'byung ba bzhi yi tshad// sor brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi tshad// bcu gnyis skye
94b2(rnying rgyud): mched bcu gnyis tshad// bcwa brgyad khams ni pacwa brgyad tshad// rtags dang sbyar te de rnams bshad// rtags phyin pa ye lcags rnams la// de yi yon tan bshad pa ni// dper na nags kyi sdong po la// sngon chad bcad pa'i sgra de dag/ de dag chod par gyur na ni/
94b3(rnying rgyud): tshad mi chod kyi the tshom med// de dag sngon chad ma bcad na// tshod dam mi chod yongs ma nges// de bzhin rgya yang de dang 'dra// mdor na rnal 'byor rtsal mchog gces// re re la yang skyon med de// yon tan yod par 'di las bstan// nag po shing gi dug can la// wa
94b4(rnying rgyud): ba byas pa'i yon tan ni// naka po gzhan gyis mi tshu yas la// dug gis pha rol gsod par byed// tsher ma can gyi shing rnams la// phur pa byas pa'i yon tan ni// skyer pas tshe dang longs spyod 'phel// mdo mos dbang du bya ba 'grub// gzhan yang kha dog rigs dang
94b5(rnying rgyud): sbyar// mdor na bde gshegs sa bon gyi// byin gyis brlabs pa gces par bshad// de bas kyang ni dam tshig gtso// rnal 'byor rnams la dam pa bsngags/ dang po gzhung las byung ba bzhin// de dag ma nor bsham par bya// tshogs pas the tshom med ces bya/
94b6(rnying rgyud): bshams pas bye ba chud ma zos// kun gyi rgyu ni byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni bsngags pa ste// rgya yi rgyal po rang shar ba'o// gzhan yang khur pa'i rgyu bstan pa// zangs lcags 'khar ba gang yod pa// de yang dod cing legs par bya// mdod pa'i
94b7(rnying rgyud): rkyen rnams ni// gar dgar byas pas tshul las nyams// stab tshal byas pas bka' las 'gal// rnyed btsan byas pas byin rlabs chung // yod btsan byas pas bsgom mi bde// ngan dgur bshams na rtog par 'gyur// legs par bshams pa
95a1(rnying rgyud): ya rang zhis/ tshogs par ba shams na gzhung dang mthan// dod par byas na dang brtse/ bka' bzhin byas na byin rlabs yod// mdor na rtogs pa gtso ba yang // rtags pa dan la mthar phyin na// rnam par mnag yangs pa/
95a2(rnying rgyud): dgos// ma rtogs pa la 'di dgos pas// log pa'i phyogs rnams 'dul slad du// 'di la chu bshams 'byung ba yin// mi rtog pa la rtog mi dgos// rnam par rtog la khro 'dul bzang // nyon mongs pa la gnyen pos 'joms// rtog pa bas la
95a3(rnying rgyud): bar bshams pa gces// gzhan la tshugs 'do grangs ma ltos// rtags phyin 'dod na yun du bsrings// don+da la rlab 'dod ma g.yel gyis// rings par 'dod na brtson 'grus byed// don 'di yid la bzhag nas kyang // sngags pas de la nan tan
95a4(rnying rgyud): sred// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ phrar pa'i chu bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru kas/ 'di skad ces zhus so//
95a5(rnying rgyud): kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// phra rab bskyed pa ji ltar bgyi// byin gyis brlab na ji ltar brlab// blta ba ci la dmigs pa lags// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes glengs pas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad gsungs so// nyon cig
95a6(rnying rgyud): ka rma he ru ka/ phur pa dang po bskyed pa ni// mtshon pa'i phur pa gzhal yas khang // bde gshegs spyan drangs gnas na bzhugs// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dbul// 'od zhu ba dag gi thugs kar thim/ byang sems hUM ni yungs 'bru tsam/ ngag dag lam nas
95a7(rnying rgyud): gaslong 'phros pas// las gnyis byas nas rlung blo ma zhugs// sku nas rim par de bzhin du// dung khang nang nas gsang lam brgyud// pad+ma las 'pho 'od phung las// so so'i yig 'bru phyag mtshan gyur/ kI la ya yi sngags brjod pas// skye med rnam da
95b1(rnying rgyud): rdzas dbang su las// zlo tsho 'phrul 'jigs par bstan 'o// sangs rgyas 'das pa'i mas pa nag snrel ya// rtswa nang thul gsam tha badrug pa// u rbad grags par na gsum sa/ ral pa bas na gsan // 'ad
95b2(rnying rgyud): de ni sras mchog bsred pa'o// gyen gyis brlab pa bstan pa ni// chos su'i dbyings nas sprul skur bzhengs// thugs kyi rdo rje mi 'gyur ba// zhe sdang rtse gcig ldan par brlab// de nas langs spyod rdzogs pa'i sra// rigs pamo tshogs 'khor bcas brgyarba/
95b3(rnying rgyud): grangs brgyad cu rtsa drug la// so so'i snying pos dbang bskur bas// rang rang su la 'jug par nus// longs spyod rdzogs sur byin gyis brlab// de nas rigs lngar byin brlabs te// gnas lngar 'bru lnga bskyed la ni// so so'i snying po gnas su bstim// rigs pa
95b4(rnying rgyud): bskur byin gyis brlab// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs pa// rigs rnams 'dus pa'i khoras su brlab// de nas thugs nyid mi 'gyur bar// ye shes rtse gcig byin gyis brlab// zur gsum phaT gsum drag po'i rtags// logs gsum hUM gsum drag
95b5(rnying rgyud): snyoms// ri rab tshul du rab brjid pa// sku yi rdo rje spu yi stobs// skra stobs brjid par byin gyis brlab// gsung gi rdo rje gsung gi stobs// gdangs skad drag por byin gyis brlab// thugs kyi rdo rje thugs kyi stobs// 'dod dgur bsgyur bar byin gyis zla
95b6(rnying rgyud): nyung dkar khrag dang gu gul gyis// bdug cing thugs la gzi byin bskyed// de nas bdag nyid chen por byin gyis brlab// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du ma// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyur pa'i steng // hUM gzhag kun tu bzang po'i mkha'// g.yon pa'i a las r+tha
95b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor// oMb lag kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'// yab yu mthabs dang shes rab las// gnyis med byang chub sems las ni// g.yas pa'i gung mo'i steng du wa~M// de las rnam par snang mdzad do// mtho bang snyed du hUM bsams la// de las rdo rje sem
96a1(rnying rgyud): da sa// ma byung smra bas // / das smra na can grung na// mad lag skyeng sgru bsamasus// dran ya bya ba'i thu bste// sa nang sma sasmra bsams pa// dulas sbyar ba mthal mas// ngas nga /
96a2(rnying rgyud): byed la// yab yu thabs dang shes rab las// zil mo mi ta ma d+hu byas la d+he// I dang badz+re sanang le// dz+riM nas yongs su brdud das // sar ma cung rjod pa sgye la nas ni// badz+ra ban \u0f88\u0f90 zhes pas// sar ma rab tu badz+ral ta bsnama?// sa ma
96a3(rnying rgyud): bskul// phur pa lag gnyis bar du gzhug/ dbus su phur bu bcug la dril// AM dang badz+ra A be sha yas bstim// bde gshegs sku ni nyung 'bru tsam// grangs med spro bsdus ngur la thim// badz+ra satwa rA dza hU~M// sras mchog rdo rje phur ba'i thugs// rigs lnga ya
