96a4(rnying rgyud): yum sbyor ba yis// byang sems sras mchog nyid la bstim// stong gsum khengs pa'i 'od zer spro// gu gul nag po'i drad pas 'dug/ khri khragar khrag rnams kyis byug/ dug sna mang po rnams kyis byug/ byin brlab gzi byin bskyed la ni// phur pa sras
96a5(rnying rgyud): mchog chen por bsam// gyen du gsor zhing 'di skad do// hUM bzhi gsol 'gro hUM bzhi'i tshogs las bskyed// dbu la rgya mdud bstan pa thabs kyi rtags// rtsibs la zur brgyad bstan pa khro bo brgyad// rin chen nu rab chad bstan pa khrim brgyad// dbus su
96a6(rnying rgyud): bya mdung bstan pa shes rab rtags// rtse mo nur gsung bstan pa spu gsung thugs kyi rtags// steng 'og gnyis su bstan pas khra bo gnyis// khong stong byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nas// khro rna la 'dus pa'i sras mchog k+She la ya// ma gangos ma mdzag
96a7(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi bdag/ sdug bsngal log par 'grams pa'i sems can rnams// thugs rjes dbyer me dang byings su snre la mdzad pa'o// thabs kyis bskal ba'i skal dang mi ldan kyang // shugs kyis bapral ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// rtsi nang gas
96b1(rnying rgyud): da pa dadug// bag sa zugs da// bangasamam paca gdas par 'jug/ nga sa rgya du nyan pa// 'drug pa'i gags bya// / zung da bcan pa dang // ngan cha cad nyan dadad
96b2(rnying rgyud): drub rjegs shing// ba nam kya pa ma rnyes// na la gas sbyin dung// sbyin par bad pa ban+de 'gag papa dang // byang ga sa nga 'bas pa dadu// ban
96b3(rnying rgyud): pa di // 'a rgyal ba 'du yig// rgyung can gzhi gang na tid// banarnam shes pa gas gas // dz+nyA ni rjegs zin pa la// 'arnaM la rnas ma bcom pa // mi pa sa pa d-i// ya sa
96b4(rnying rgyud): khyim shes rab rjongs// don la dgangs pa'i tshe 'gyu // byang chen pa'i tshe 'phrul lo// dag pa'i rgyal bar nga gnas pas// rkyen kyang rnam par dag/ rlabs kyi rgyal par bdag gyur bas// maud gi cil ming ba sa nyi
96b5(rnying rgyud): da gagagis sa ga ga gan / klul pags dus na / gagang sbyi ci smra / da
96b6(rnying rgyud): hU~Ml lal sunasum te// ci maldan sa pa// sangs rgyas cang kyil gyi rlong// sbyin ma drags pa 'dral pa gyi// dper dus 'dug na la sbyor bas// dmigs da gang da ga bya// bzhis gas
96b7(rnying rgyud): padaso// gnyis pa gsal bdag su chus// des grosas pa dang/ byi 'das pa thil pas kyi skyed dum bye la ba gas sa sa pabyen // 'dal ba 'du nga sa
97a1(rnying rgyud): pa bdun yod de// dam las nyams dang bka' las nyams/ don las nyams dang las kyis nyams// mtshan mas nyams dang 'dod pas nyams// log pas nyams pa bdun po lnga// 'di la nyams pa zhes b+ha g+ha// da dang /
97a2(rnying rgyud): 'i mtshan nyid ni// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// srog las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// pha dang ma dang mkhan po gsad// slob ma gsong dang ngan sems can// 'di ni rnam par ltung bas na// bskal ba'i dmigs gcig 'di yin no// don las nya
97a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje slob dpon bka' bslus dang // ngan sems dpya sems byed pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun gcod dang // gsang ba'i man ngag sbas pa rnams// snod med rnams la ston pa dang // 'di ni nyams pa chen po ste// 'di yang bskal
97a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i dmigs gcig yin// bka' las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dmal btags na sku mtshang 'dra// srub zlar sbran na kha yogs 'dogs// man ngag bstan na skur pa 'debs// bden par bstan na log par khrid// don rtags bstan na go la
97a5(rnying rgyud): sar 'dzin// 'di ni nyams pa chen po ste// 'di la bskal ba lhur yang brtsam// don las ha mus pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bya ru mi rung sna tshogs byed// rdzas dang lag cha mngon du 'byir// tan gaN sbyor ba dngos su byed// blta ba ting 'dzin chub tu bor// spong pa
97a6(rnying rgyud): brlang po dang du len// khro ga tum rgyal rang gar gtong // don gyi man dag log par ga/ pha rol 'dren la log pa'i chos// byin tse log ga nal mkhas// bka' gzhung bar nas kyimam tsho// log par spyod pa mtha' dag yod// 'don du dngos
97a7(rnying rgyud): mang drung 'azla'i tha~Mng slob sa dang // las byas byams pa'i nga na// bdag dang mus gadris zi gcig par // bskul ba lang kyi zla pangs nas// rngon ce da ben 'bras 'angs 'dapag// sregal bab rdzams kyang // zheb
97b1(rnying rgyud): mnyan par// nyas mad gzhan la 'dzugs pa dang // dpung pas bskums nas klan kacol// kha rgya rgad cing bzhi na rdzog nas// brgal ba me par bdag la rgol// das na tu ma par bdag la 'jog/ bdag gis nyes pa mdzan rdzing // bdag ni
97b2(rnying rgyud): brgal bar ma bsams kyang // las kyis bdag la gnad 'dzugs shing // bdag la mthu dang rtsal 'dod pa// las kyis nyams pa 'di yin pas// 'di ni bskal ba'i dmigs gcig yin// gzhan yang las kyis nyams pa ni// gal mi che bar yag
97b3(rnying rgyud): tshol// phan pa med par bdag la 'tsho// 'od rgyu med par sgrub par 'ong // las kyis nyams pa'i rtags yin pas// 'dri la bsngal ba lhur yang brtsam// las kyi 'khor ba sdig med bshad// mtshan mas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// chos la phyogs
97b4(rnying rgyud): char 'dzin pas nyams// blta bas sgo khung byed pas nyams// rnal 'byor chen po'i thugs dkrugs nyams// rang bzhin med pa'i chos bshad kyang // mtshan ma can gyi chos bzung nas// lha srin bran du ngas 'khol lo// mthu 'gran byed pa su zhig
97b5(rnying rgyud): yod// nga yi nyams su dpal chen byung // da ni khro bo'i rgyal po yin// gzhan yang khro zhing 'tsho la sogs// 'di ni mtshan mas nyams pa ste// bsgral bar byas kyang dam mi nyams// log par gyur pas nyams pa ni// mnyan nas go rtogs med
97b6(rnying rgyud): pa ru// la lar mthu che rtsal 'dod pas// las kyi don du mtshan ma spyod// sdig pa'i phyag rgyar mi mgo thogs// ral pa gsi gcing so gtsigs nas// dmar gyi ar+g+ha glo la 'dogs// zhing gi pag pa phrag la bkal// spro ba nag po sha dang tshil//
97b7(rnying rgyud): skrod gad khur zhing log chos spyod// spyod pa ma nor gzhung bor nas// bya bar mi 'tshams sna tshogs byed// ngo dang gdong pa khrag gis byug/ tshul 'chos dam 'dral sna tshogs byed// tho tshor spyod cing dam mi bsrung // spyod pa brlang pos bkang gzhung spod//
98a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun ci zhabs 'dren byad// rnal 'byur sngags pa'i nang nas 'dren// dpal chen phyug 'byung thugs khrel bskyed// mu ma mkha' 'gro'i gzan gus pangs// rdul nga yang tu
98a2(rnying rgyud): phral ba'i dmigs gcig yin// 'dod pas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// 'dod chags nor gyis steng bus nas// shi bar shes kyang 'dod pas brgyal// phreng bar rtogs kyang sngags 'chang 'joms// dug tu stong yong ruH// gtad pa yin
98a3(rnying rgyud): zhabs kyis smod// thob tu 'do nas gsang sngags bcu// bza' du 'dod nas rnal 'byor na// zas suM su pa?'i langs spyad chu// nor du gzhung spyod rnal 'byor 'joms// 'di dag 'dod pas nyams pa ste// 'di dag ba phral na rdol 'byor btsun// btul zhing
98a4(rnying rgyud): tshar bcad bsten pa gnyen// med cing stongs na bar chad nyung // 'di dag bskal par ma byas na// mtho ris 'grib pa dmyal khams 'phel// rnal 'byor dam can gyid lug nas// theg pa chen po'i chos sgo 'gag/ 'di dag bsgral bar byas na
98a5(rnying rgyud): ni// rnal 'byor bsrub le bar bar med// theg pa chen po mtha rabs// legs pa la yon tan brjid las 'das// thabs kyi tha ma tham rba// ting nge 'dun gyi rtsal rgyar yang // 'di dag bskal ba byas pa ni// demyal ba'i gnas su yun rdzang
98a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// kA la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ bsgral ba'i dmigs bstan pa'i be'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang karba te rugs/ 'di skadacas gsol te// gya bcom ldan dz+re tI la ya// bskul ba'i dmigs ni lags na// 'di
98a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus grod ji ltar lags// bde bar gshegs pas lung re stan du gsal// zhes gsol pa dang / badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// nyon cig karma he ru// brdeg pa'i dus tshad bstan pa ni// gnas stong dang na chos brgyad dang // 'adz+ra
98b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis la bya// mig dmar phurd bu'i gza' rnams kyang // brdeg pa'i dus la bab par bya// dang po dkyil 'khor gzhung bcug nas// bsnyen bsrub chog tshad byas la// 'jab grangs bdun 'bum nyi khri 'don// bzlas brjod nyin mtshon rgyun mo gcad// rtags dang
98b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma phyin pa dang // brdeg pa'i dus la bab par shes// nam gyi gung dang nyi ma dros// de la brdeg par rab tu shis// dur khrod chen po gang na bor// bskal pa la sogs gzhung bzhin bya// n+ya gram lam ni gang na bar// brdeg pa la sogs gzung bzhinaH/
98b3(rnying rgyud): 'di dag brdeg pa'i dus chod kyang // srod la zhugs nas tho rangs kha// 'di dag brdeg par yongs mi bya// 'di dag brdeg par bya ba ni// yun ni lo zla tsam du bsring // grangs ni bye ba 'bum du bzlas// mchod pa dus drug rgyun mi gcad// cho ga bzlas brjod
98b4(rnying rgyud): byas nas// dbang po mngon sum khugs na rab// tha ma mig rngon la sogs pas// der ni nges par 'ong ba yin// gzhan yang brdeg pa'i dus tshod ni// dang por bsgrub par khas blangs nas// ma thon bar du dus tshod min// gzhan yang brdeg pa'i dus chod ni//
98b5(rnying rgyud): ter 'dzin 'gro 'du gsal ba yis// bsnyen pa bdun 'bum nyi khri gdon// rab 'bring gsum gyi rtags rnams kun// dus der mi 'gyur mi srid do// brdeg pa'i dus tshod rab mchog yin// bdag mi dgos par lhun gyis grub// yang na brdeg pa'i dus chod ni//
98b6(rnying rgyud): dam tshig tshon pa'i dus la bab// lha rnams drag po'i las la bskul// lha snying gdags sngags gzing gnon dang // drang zhing bkug la dbab pa dang // mkhas shing goms pas man ngag sbyar// sprul pa chen po'i dus la ba ba// phra men drag po'i las
98b7(rnying rgyud): bskul// lha snying gdags sngags gzir gnon bya// drang zhing bkug na dbab pa dang // mkhas shing goms pas man ngag sbyar// bka' nyan chen po'i dus la bab// dam can gnad dbab las la bai sprul// lha steng gdags sngags gzar gnod \u0f7f/
99a1(rnying rgyud): mkhas shing goms pas man ngag sbyar// rnal 'byar rgyud grel blo zhen pas// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las kyi// grub sras man ngag sbyor shes shing // man ngag gsum bu rkor tshoms kyis// rim gyis dbang byed
99a2(rnying rgyud): bab nas// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par byed// gal te bka' bzhin ma byas na// kho rang mgogs stir tshig go// dbyer ba dgug po nya gtang // zhag bdun gyis ni jug par 'gyur// 'di dag
99a3(rnying rgyud): par bya// zla dgug po nye gtang bya ste// b+h+rUM dpal gyi lo nya las mkhan mo// dkar mo rung gi mche ba can// mkha' la 'byung ba'i mdzod 'khyil ma// lag na spu gris sems can sgrol// zhal du sems can skyir khrag rngub// sngal ba thog dag na
99a4(rnying rgyud): pota sum bcu drug cu 'gyed// sum brgya drug cu'i gtso mo ste// bskal pa brgyad khri'i pha rol nas// dam lngas 'das pa'i zla 'dren ma// nyams pa'i bla la nan mo chung // lho yi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// nag mo lpags kyi lan chad can// khung gi kha thog gang
99a5(rnying rgyud): pan// d+hAr+N+Na gr-i rdzogs gsod la rngams// tshangs pa dkyil ba'i cha lugs can// mi sdug sago la gcer bu'i lus// yo nya sum brgya drug cu 'gyed// sum brgya drug cu'i gtso mo ste// bskal pa bachad nas gla 'tshol ma// dpag tshad kyi bar srog dbug
99a6(rnying rgyud): nyams pa'i blo dang srog la ya// nub kyi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// dmar po nyi ma'i 'du 'gro ma// gdug pa 'dul bgrang ba sel// gsod la rngam pa'i las la btson// mche gtogs pa yang gzhigs su gon// pho nya sum ba mjug cu 'gyod// sum
99a7(rnying rgyud): ru'i gtsom d+hi// rab tu me spun bla'i bugs ma// nyams pa'i blo dang srog la la// byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba na// ljang dag 'khyil pa'i drod gdangs can// ser mo ral can 'bum chis bskor// phyag rdo ral gri nag po bsdams// pho ha sum brgya drug tu 'gyed/
99b1(rnying rgyud): drug tu gsum na// sngon nas dag pa'i tha 'grugs ma// nyams pa'i tha dang srog pa ya// nam mkha' lha mo phur ba'i lha// lag brgya sngags kyi phur pa 'brel// spyan brgya khrag gis mchi sa 'jag// zhal bcu gajug pa 'dan sngags
99b2(rnying rgyud): tshems kyis skye shi rtsa ba chod// phur bu'i las mkhan chen mo la// rab tu mi srun las la brtson// pho nya mang po gyogs bcur 'gyed// rdo rje sku gsung thugs las sprul// nyams pa'i bla dang srag la ya// gzhan yang dam la btags pa rnams// ded
99b3(rnying rgyud): las la bskul bar bya'o// de dag mngon par khugs pa dang // bsad pa'i lam la myur bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gamang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ brdeg pa'i dus tshod kyi le'u ste dang
99b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru kas bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// drag po'i las la 'jug byed pa// dregs pa nyams pa bdun po la// gang dang gang du gdab pa \u0f7f/
99b5(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig ka ma he ru ka/ gang gis ga' la gdab bstan pa// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bud+d+ha 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// gti mug bdud 'dul chos
99b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba dbyings nas bzhengs// mdzod nag gcer bu khrog tu ma ngal pa can// dbus kyi ram bgegs khug pa rdo rje phur pa yis// ngag 'khrul rdzun du smra ba'i snying la kyob// phugasum mthing dge 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje 'dus pa'i sras mchog NI la ya/
99b7(rnying rgyud): zhi sdang bdud 'dul khrus pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// dkar nag gi zer bu thig tu ma ral pa nan// shar gyi dgra bgegs khug la rdo rje phur po yis// zhe sdang 'dod chags can gyi snying ma rgyag// mthing rtag su gsum 'ber ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/
100a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i sras mchog snrel pa// dmyal bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// seng nag gzer gro bo gzum ngal ba can// g+ha yi dgra bgags// b+hag la rdo rje phung ba yis// srog gcod log par
100a2(rnying rgyud): snyed pa rgyopa// mthing nag gru gsum 'phar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// 'dod chags bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// dmar nag gcer bu khrog tu ma ral pa can// nub kyi dgra bgegs khug pa rdo rje rung
100a3(rnying rgyud): pa yis// phra ma ma byin len pa'i snying la thob// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// karma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// phrag dog bdud 'bul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// ljang nagA gcer bu khro gtum ral pa can// kyang gi
100a4(rnying rgyud): dgra bgegs khug la rdo rje phur pa yis// ngag rtsub gnod sems can gyi snying la kye ba// lha rnams drag po'i las la bsku la// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsheb pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnad
100a5(rnying rgyud): cing gdug pa'i das dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tsho ba rnams// jo bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bskal ba dang // lus ngag rdul du bshigs nas
100a6(rnying rgyud): kyang // sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// phra men drag po las la bsrul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing ldang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig skyob cig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// renges par du
100a7(rnying rgyud): slar chu gcig/ tso ba cag rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas ni// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// dam can gnad dbab las la bskul// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas pa'i// khyed kyi thugs
100b1(rnying rgyud): mya la bab// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// las sngags sa sos gzi drug rton // rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' lngas ni// sdig can gang zhig 'dra 'byed pa// stobs chen jo bo men po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya du los// nyon cig bgegs dang
100b2(rnying rgyud): log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// btab pa'i ting gnon pa mon gyis gtub// khro bos mtshon cha'i char phab bsam// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// wA'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // ngal bar chad byed pa rnams// mthung
100b3(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul med par byos// bsgral ba rnams kyi mthu rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul ldang mi nus par bya// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'gal byed sdig can dag/ rdo rje med pa la snying bsregs nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du kro
100b4(rnying rgyud): khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khud du// de rdo thobs brdungs byas nas// lha yang rung ste bsrel bar bya'o// yak+kha kro ti'i zhal du de// khams gsum basbal ba'i mchod pa 'bral// lha rnams dkyil 'khor dam can lha srin rnams// mnyes dbang gzug bden pa
100b5(rnying rgyud): bdar lnga ni// chos nyid bden pa gsang sngags byin rlabs dang // sangs rgyas mthu yis a b+hi tsAR+Ya yi// pa rnag pa de dag dkar nag mtshams su gad ba// sems gnas dran gzhi tse d+ha'i dkyil na ni// tshon gang 'od kyi kun gzhi lung ma bstan//
100b6(rnying rgyud): nang rtswa rtsi nang gnyis kyi rtsa// nyon mongs yid dang rnam shes kun gzhi gsum// phyi rgyu nang gnas gyi nang gnyis kar rgyu// khrag rlangs bye'u ni leb ma'i mgo tsam la// de dasnyi la rba dud til 'bru tsam yang gnas// rtsa zhon khrag rgya dbugs kyi rta byas nas//
100b7(rnying rgyud): ga mtshams kyi rtsa chen gsum la ni// drod tshad gtan la phab par gad byas nas// sri dang gsum dang khams gsum du// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chu rgyun 'bab// ma rig gnas su basbal na ji ltar bsgral// bsgral tsho ba chu 'dra bas gtums ga
101a1(rnying rgyud): nas rnamam sa gan pa 'o gdang // gas drag pas las thugs gdud la thongs/ tan 'dus tu mdag ta myo bathus pa 'ang // logs ba ldan par gyur 'grus nas// dan nan
101a2(rnying rgyud): lpags dam bskangs nas 'gri ba'i don kyang byas// thams cad a dkar byang chub sems su gyur// bsdus pas gser dngul zhi ga byug pa bzhin// phur pa'i rtsa yi ya ni gnas len des// khab len dol lcags rnams 'dra ba bzhin// byang chub
101a3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dkar la 'tsher// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su bstim par bya// snang srid tshe bzud che yi dngos grub thob// khams gsum 'khor ba'i bag chags gdang sha bcad// nyon mongs 'khor ba thams cad dbyings su bsgra'i// rdo rje phur pas ske shi \u0f7fda nas cod/
101a4(rnying rgyud): dper na drim pra yis bkrus pa bzhin// khams gsul ye shes byang chub tu yis bkra// Ni lung khrus lung sgrol mchog dam pa yin// gzhan yang phur pa'i gnas bstan pa// rtsa gcig bcu btud bcu gnyis dang // brgyad dang lnga gsum gcig tu
101a5(rnying rgyud): bstan// gdab pa'i dmigs ding dri la// bran ta dza tsam gyi mgo// phran tsapa 'od nag dkyil du de// khrag gi hr-iti tel 'bru tsam// de la dmigs la gdab par bya// gzugs mthong nyan mongs phrag dgra sdes// mthing byed rten dang dpal ba'i phyir/
101a6(rnying rgyud): mig gnyis la yang sras mchog ste// rta thos nyon mongs zhe sda byas// nyan byed rten dang dpral ba'i phyir// d+hU ba gnyis la sras mchog ri// dri tshor nyon mongs nga rgyal skyes// snom byed rten dang dpal ba'i phyir// snga bug gnyis la sras mchog re//
101a7(rnying rgyud): da thang nyon mongs 'dod chags kyi// ro stong rted dang dbral ba'i phyir// we ye ky-i dzes pa mchogar// dbang po nyin byed gti mug gnas// tshe gnas rted dang dpral ba'i phyir// dpral ba'i dbyes su sras mchog gcig/ dartsal rtsad ngas gcad pa'i phyir/
101b1(rnying rgyud): rgyung dang dbal pa'i phyir// dpung pa gnyis la sras mchogar// srid pa cad nas gabad pa'i phyir// gas pa'i gnas sums gcog // gta mug labar butan dbral cir// tsAb 'dakyil thams pa cag// thams cad phyogs par byed pa'i du ta/
101b2(rnying rgyud): cig pa byed / dpa la zed// nga da gnyis la byas partsog// 'bus gathapa'abar brjod pa'i ste// 'dudu gas cad nasug dpa'i byud/ ga da dzu dusas da pa sa gad pa'i byed/ da shi ci 'a byas kyi
101b3(rnying rgyud): gcig/ sring gi sum cad nas gzad pa'i phyir// mthen gsupa la zas pajug gsus// dbang 'a'i dang mam ga yid pas// wa'am na pa kyar pad la// ba nyig tsug tusas mchog gcig/ pathA dang rtswa 'phrul 'phrog pa'i phyid// hU~M ba gzugs
101b4(rnying rgyud): rkang mthel \u0f7f// srab mchog phrang ba byung la ni// khams gsum bskal ba'i mchod patho'o// sran tsam 'od nag dkyil du ni// khrag gi thaM ni nyil 'bru tsam// gnadas de na ban khyab pas// sran la de bzhin dmigs la gdag// gnadasang btab pa de la/
101b5(rnying rgyud): rje phung gus lung rdzogs pa re// bdag dang lur thugacas pa pa// sku gsung thugs su gnyis med bstim// d+hI 'din sngags dang brid las gsus// gab pa'i gdams pa khong bkrar bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gi sngag sung thugs kyi gas da /
101b6(rnying rgyud): me gas pa'i dgangs spya las/ sras pa chog phrar ba gad pa pa'i ma skye bcupa // de nas yang kan gas ldan 'das nga thil pa la 'din du nas nas te/ bcom gan pa N+Dal ma// bde ba ga shegs pa tham rjod
101b7(rnying rgyud): dra gsung dun su kyil 'khor nas// gsang sngags dam padzo bar lags// bskyed pa'i grags niji ltar lags// gsod pa'i drag soni ba ltar lags// phrin las sngags di gang dang gang // gas sngags bdag pos wang bstan du /
102a1(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol pa dang / ma ldan 'das 'a sgri la las/ 'din du kyis bka' stsal te// nyod cig kung+gA kyil la// dang tha klung du gasgos// derjes na par yin / do gros padag gagasu da /
102a2(rnying rgyud): gsa'o// spyan drang phyag baN+DI' bakhrugs bu gsol// de nas kyi nang mchod pa 'phrul// oM sa twA rbaHtwAdz+nyAn badz+raHg+h+nA Ta A mr-i/ NAM/ de rjes mtshon pa'i ye ga~M trAM/ hUM wA Na phaT/ mahA8oM badz+rany+tsi li hrI pa pA/
102a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa bya// yo ba ky-i k+kol du / bdu hU~M Ta/ thas bskyed pa'i rtags so// sum la ng+ge/ ba m+mA hA// hA// byA sgru baphrul ba'i rdzogs so// yi du mad+hahA/ skye nas d+hA / oM tha pa te'
102a4(rnying rgyud): nagasas/ / sag smye 'i byin kyis rgyas dag+sas/ sa// ga byung pa ba nga sgrub kyi mas \u0f7fk+Sha // h+na 'i sbrul ts+tsha
102a5(rnying rgyud): par// ma/ le ma sa da dzin+ta/ k+Shi 'i k+Shil pa/ skyes m+b+hi ba/ mair+d+ha te ba/ oM hrI li ti bri/ yAm ya ting pe/ tI baM/ bdUN+Da pa te bye/ dz+wa ba ti / sa ma
102a6(rnying rgyud): bye/ na pa'i tI ba/ rdzogs pa bcu bskal ba'i sngags so// mahA d+h+ya maN+Dal/ pipad+hA ba ta lA/ a Ni hA mAd+g+ha pa/ rdegs pA tsa na rnams sbyiSh+Thabad+d+ha sras bA rtseg ste kyis mdun pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra b+h+yota trA~M k+Sha tra~M/ A badz+ra ba dbye ba
102a7(rnying rgyud): du ba gro la rdzu tu/ hU~M/ dzun til hrI hU~M/ kyita ya hU~M/ badz+ri/ hU~M/ rji tu tu // nga
102b1(rnying rgyud): blugs pa// cig pat+naHbadz+ra t+tas gabang po// rkang na/ tha shA tu badz+ra N+DI thus hrIH/ brjo/ \u0f7f/ ba / oMb mas sa /
102b2(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kr-i ti tsud da ya hrI n+te/ khro mo rnams bskyed pa'i sngags so// badz+ra b+ha ka ra mu khA te/ badz+ra u bi Sha mra 'a hre/ nA r+tha mu la te/ barba pra dz+nye mra Sh+Ti te/ badz+ra tsa mar mu kha~M he/ badz+radzoHlu Sha~M tre/ badz+ra tA rI N+Da ka mu khA he/ badz+ra A lu kA ru Sh+NI ti/ badz+raHSh+TA
102b3(rnying rgyud): he/ badz+ra thA ka mu Sh+Ti te/ badz+ra bi TA la mu kha he/ badz+ra ba kA ti mu kha he/ badz+ra shA na mu kha te/ badz+ra ba tri muSh+NI te/ badz+ra sing hA m+b+ha kha te/ badz+ra d+hi tI lu mu khI te/ badz+ra d+hak+Sha mu kha he/ badz+ra da gu la u kha ti/ badz+rA haM ra~M k+Sha mu la te/ bAdz+ra lU ShI ka~M mu ShI ha~M/ de ni grwa thabs bskyed
102b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kI li kI lA pa/ dz+wa la dz+wa la tha dz+wa la pradz+wa la k+Sha ta sUta sarba na sha sa na hUM phaT/ de ni sku'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+TA ni pAka shri ta go d+hA ya hU~M phaT/ gsung gi sngags so/ oM badz+ra kI la ya/ tsit+ta tsid+hi hUM phaT/
102b5(rnying rgyud): de'i thugs kyi sngags so// gardza gadza hU~M phaT/ han tan hUM phaT/ btsam tsa n+de phaT/ da ha ts+tsha Ta/ bstabacu bru~M phAT/ shral+yA shrala? hUM phaT/ tipra ti tad+d+hi phaT/ s+t+waM paT/ na d+hi hUM phaH/ s+yai tat+k+r-i phaT/ rgyo bo barba'i phrin las kyi sngags po// taH
102b6(rnying rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ra ya ha ta na hUM phaT/ shI k+She na A nA ya hUM phaT/ dz+wa la ba pA dz+wa la pa la hUM phaT/ A be sha yaM A be sha ya hUM phaT/ bi da ya bi da ya hU~M phaT phra thabs yang sprul rnams kyi phrin las kyi sngags so// A~M na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+rA nAn/ A~M g+ha
102b7(rnying rgyud): ta pa g+hA ta sa/ sarba duSh+TAn mA ra ya hUM phaT/ kI li kI la ya/ sarba pA baM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hU~M hU~M trAM/ phaT phaT phaT/ badz+ra kI la ya b+ha ro A dz+nyA ba ya ti/ kA ya lA ka tsita/ badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje sder mo'i sngags so/ A~M la~M hU~M ya~M b+h+rU~M b+ha na na mo ha d+ha ya/
103a1(rnying rgyud): shAm/ / / / na pa sa dus / na
103a2(rnying rgyud): bid+d+ha d+h+waM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na b+h+rUM phaT/ ta na trAn hUM phaT/ badz+nyA bar+d+hab+h+rUM phaT/ hi nab+ha na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badz+ra/ btsA ba tsa badz+ra/ mthi ma tha badz+ra/ dzA la dz+wa la bar+d+ha/ su ru su rba bar+d+ha/ mA ru lu ru badz+ra/ ka ta da krAt+te/ d+hU pe be+e dzA pe/ a tsid te/ ya ba ra dzota/ yang si b+ha man+ta
103a3(rnying rgyud): pheM hUM phaT/ gdab pa'i sngags so// A~M badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba dud+h+wa~M wA ra pa hU~M phaT/ bde bar gshegs pas lcags phur drag po'i phrin las kyi mi bzad pa drag pos dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya su ru su ru u tsu sa kro ta pa tri mA pa hU~M phaT/
103a4(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pas skyer pa'i phur pa rgyas pa mi bzad pa bsad pa drag pos dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ bid bid mA ra ya hUM/ bde bar gshegs pas mchog phur zhi ba'i phrin las mi bzad pa bsad pa drag pos dbang bskur ba'i sngag so//
103a5(rnying rgyud): A~M badz+ra kI lI kI la ya aM ku sha tsad+hi tsat+ti mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bde bar gshegs pas seng ldeng gi phur ba dbang gi phrin las mi bzad pa bsad pa drag pos dbang bsgyur ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya b+ha gri mu kha mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bde bar gshegs pas bya cad
103a6(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i phrin las mi bzad pa bsad pa drag pos dbang bskur pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya na ma sa man+ta bi shu d+ho b+hi be mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bde bar gshegs pas tsan+dan gyi phur pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi bzad pa'i bsad pa drag pos dbang bskur
103a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags so// oM mA ma ba shaM ku ru ma ta ma dz+nyA kar yi di d+ha ti ma ma ka ra ma shIg+h+ra~M kA ra ya/ khro bo mtshon cha'i sngags so// sarba A na ya hUM phaT/ mthu 'phrog pa'i sngags so// ta thA ya ta tha ya hUM phaT/ zil gyis gnan cing ldab mi nus par bya
103b1(rnying rgyud): nyes nyes 'byung ba bzhin du yang byur
103b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i sngags sa// badz+ra ste li krI la ya/ ba // ba pa 'azab 'jam/ !\u0f7f/ n+d+ha phaT sa/ badz+rag la m+b+hi'i pho bcwo ga ban po kAk+Sha/ ta/ gzhan du bdang dang bslab pa'i sngags s+ho// tshwa la la gags
103b3(rnying rgyud): de pa'i sngags so// A~M badz+ra ki li kI la yab gro ta na/ tan tun pa pa thogs theg gi rnam par shes pa gdan pa'i sngags so// A~M badz+ra kI li ki la ya badz+rA kr-i ta sad lAnd/ ga shadza ga na/ da ba da ha baH/ rnab rnas par shes pag na/ rdzags
103b4(rnying rgyud): 'i ny+dzi la pa/ bag tu thal las med/ / badz+ra pi ti la lA/ sar mi tshal pa 'a di / dz+wa la dz+wal ban/ nyin pangs pa 'byung ba'i// rabs pa bas pa ba / pan+d+ha t+ya ba r+b+ha baH/ gang dra danapa/ rnal pa dang /
103b5(rnying rgyud): u/ dag pa pa rdzog/ nga/ mi
103b6(rnying rgyud): bad brjod kyi gdu pa'i 'gus mi// mirnams pa pa'i ng+ge kyi byabs da bka stan par byed pa'i dugs sa// dus / togs pa'i thags ba na pa 'ang
103b7(rnying rgyud): pa ga sbyi/ shA du byu da thams pa dbub dang byu pa'i da / nga la duldan / sa mi srid pa sa // yab rnathos sa sa/
103b8(rnying rgyud): sa gas la mdu /
104a1(rnying rgyud): ngi sku saM dpyis da dzI kAr ye myo sa pra/ me bskyil ba'i sngags so// man ma na man ti rdzas/ rgyud le sus kyi ti kha la phras/ sarbA sA lus/ mu l+ye phas/ me sAr+ya pA'i sngaljags so// oM AHtrA~M hrIrtid+hi sa shir/
104a2(rnying rgyud): nyer nyer raM/ dzA la raM/ dz+nyA na raM/ ag+ne raM/ slob pa pa yu/ sa ra na ya/ s+pha ra na ya/ la ma zhu pe swA hA/ me'i snying po drang ba'i sngags so// me gzi byi na bskyed pa'o// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya badz+ra krot+ta yAk+She ye dzA na dz+wa la raM/ sa ma
104a3(rnying rgyud): bzugs su gsol ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra k+Shi li kI la ya/ dz+nyA na de wa akle rA \u0f7f/ mA rA ya dz+wa la raM ShA hi/ AM badz+ra kI li kI la ya mA ra ya phaT/ kha re DA ki dz+wa la re \u0f89\u0fa4 hI/ kro d+ha ra dz+wa la ri ShA hi/ ha la rbaM dz+dza [।]/ to sha ngi dza la raSha
104a4(rnying rgyud): ma mdz+wa la ri khA ti/ snyam sha ma dz+wa la rai ShA hi/ kro tI kha raM dz+wa la raM khA hi/ yo gI kha raM dz+wa la raM khA hi/ nyon mongs pa bskal ba'i phung po ni/ dkyil 'khor lha'i zhal du/ kr-i kro ti kha ri dza la ro khA hi/ mi bzad pa'i rdzas gdug pa can dang / rnam zhig gis
104a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyogs bsreg pa'i sngags so// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs kyi sngags// bskyed dang rdzogs dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang // dgug dang de bzhin bstis pa dang // bcing dang mthu 'phrog gzing ba dang // ting 'dzin sngags dang phri nal
104a6(rnying rgyud): gsum/ gab pa'i sdom pa man ngag 'di'i// rgyud dkrug lung gcus bye brag rnams// bla ma'i thugs la rag lus pas// bla ma mnyes na rin chen rnyed// dus tshod can la rgyud lung gzus// rang shes rig pa mi gsug pa/ rtog
104a7(rnying rgyud): yi las skal min// blta ba zab mo rgyang du bor// spyod pa bzang po deng du blangs// gsang sngags zab mo po na gyir// de d+hal gtum khro rang gar byed// bya ru mi rung sna tshogs byed// dam tshig yod la mingan pas// gang la bsam pa
104b1(rnying rgyud): 'thung cing // bar thog labar chad 'byung // dunas dang dmyal bar ltung// de ga zuzhim smin te// mang duthas la las la mkhas// rlung khrel bu zhan sru lagrags// gdang can srog med sems dang ldan// gnan ma kyang bang slo
104b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan la re ba mi 'jog cing // rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams// ma nyams nges thub gsung bzhin bsrung // de lta bu yi rnal 'byor des// las su bya ba thams ca 'grub// dang por shes rab rnam gsum gyis// gtan tshe gdon la yid ches nas// den
104b3(rnying rgyud): dbang gsum rdzogs pa dang // snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa yis// khams gsum 'khor ba gzung bar bya'o// spyod sgrol ma byin len pa dang // rdzun tshig brlang po spyad par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo // dri chen
104b4(rnying rgyud): rak+ta dang // zil pa mAM sa dang du blang // phung po lha dang gnyis su med// sems ni chos nyid ngang du gnas// theg pa bsam yas sems la gsal// lta ba mi 'gyur gdeng du 'jodag// sgom pa ma yengs don rab gsal// dam tshig nyan po
104b5(rnying rgyud): khrims bzhin pa sungs// rlung yes sgrub pags la ma'os// rdzas dang lag canas tung // don dang man ga gzhung bslab// bram grogs dpa'i din mi mya 'as// tshwal dang ngang tshul bzad la gyis// khyong chul mtshod pa tu
104b6(rnying rgyud): rnal byo rtogs da pa pa // lab satha byas rdzogs nas// 'ang mos pangs med nan dranapas// sngags dang byeg rgya sa byed do// las dang bya ba gdon mo// nges pa babyams pas kyi 'dod 'thab// las su tu mag
104b7(rnying rgyud): mang shing // cib kyi bka' nan 'kho la ma khas pas// tso kol phrin pas spab par byed// drug thul thabs kyi nyini// yu' brul zin las thugs kyis 'byed// nam tog mtshanas babs kyis 'joms// dag byas na 'grub par 'gyur// shes pa'i
105a1(rnying rgyud): dam pa ni// rgyud 'grel po zhen srub la zhugs// yi dam la la rtag gnas pas// rna la rngas chod 'byung mi srid// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la pa gsang ba'i dgongs
105a2(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa'i le'u oM bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas kam he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yA la 'di skad ces gsol to// rtse bcom ldan khrag 'thung badz+ra kI la ya// phyag rgya D+yan rlabs yon tan dang // sngags
105a3(rnying rgyud): zlos phyag rgya ji ltar lags// nges pa'i don rnams ji ltar 'gug// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / badz+ra kI la yas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig ka ma he ru ka/ kho bo rnams kyi phyag rgya dang // phyag rgya'i yon tan bshad pa ni// lag
105a4(rnying rgyud): g.yas rdo rje'i phyag rgyang bcas// g.yon pas phur pa bcangs nas su// brkyang bskum bgrad nas khro tshul gnas// spyan bzlog mche gtsigs rgal yang gnyer// ku mA ra yi phyag rgya yin// rtsa ba'i sngags ni drag tu bzlas// las sngags zhabs la btags pas ni
105a5(rnying rgyud): ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sprad// lha srin sde brgyad bran du 'khol// srid pa gsum yang zil gyis gnon// phan gnod smon lam 'gyur shog 'grub// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs phyag rgya ni// g.yas pa byabs kyis gtsol 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar
105a6(rnying rgyud): gtsel stob// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis stang stabs mdzad// lum gyi gsang sngags drag tu bzlas// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad mnyes// dngos grub chen po thob par nges// g.yas pa dor zhing g.yon pa bzad// lag g.yas ster rtsen
105a7(rnying rgyud): du phyar// g.yon pa phung bu 'debs pa'i tshul// gzug phung gcu zhing thung mig blta// spyani 'phrog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag po bzlas pa ni// mas mchog phrar pa'i phyag rgya yin// sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'argyal bar 'gyur/
105b1(rnying rgyud): rnonags gzhan sa slos cadags// g.yon pa mdub bsgreng zhing gang gtud// g.yas pa thal ma kyag du bsgred// gzugs pa ga tu zhing brkyang bsdam paza// kAr yi phyag ma yin// gAsang thags rbag cu ba thas pasas// dgra bgegs ga
105b2(rnying rgyud): blos ci dgas// srid gsum ma lus dbang du spyad// rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag d+hani// guyod pas dzub baphreng zhing gang gtud// g.yas pa mdzub palag chags kyu'i tshul// gzugs phung gcu zhing brkyang bskum bzad// pra dang thog ma che ba gtsigs da /
105b3(rnying rgyud): gsang blags drag tu bzas byasta na// rlung dang thog ser chu chen dang // gang ltung 'dod pa rtog par byed// dbyug pa lon mo'i phyag rgya ni// g.yon pa mdzub pa sbeng snying ga gtad// g.yas pa rtse gsum bye dadu gyur// gzugs dra dag za ging bzang bsngal ba 'di//
105b4(rnying rgyud): ga tsho ba gtsigs nas ni// gsing thags drug tu ba nas bya stan// de rab sul mkhar 'jig pa dang // gang lnga dmigs mcham par 'gyur// gshen jig shed pa'i phyag rdzanA~M// lag gnyis Sha nu nga zangs lan// thang gnyis nga
105b5(rnying rgyud): rang bya// rgyab kyi tshogs pa mdzu mos dkri// mtheb gnyis gshibs te mdun padag bya// a yi tshul dubyas la ni// gzugs phra gcu zhing brkyang bsum bskyed// smyan zlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drug
105b6(rnying rgyud): nga gdul ba byag// babang ba ca drug pathogs pa med// man mamen na jug rgya// g.yas pa'i the bar mi bzung bas/ ma su ma thong ba man lag brjed// g.yon pa rung ba bas pa'i chos// ga
105b7(rnying rgyud): rje ba pa'i tshal// gzugs pa na tu brkyang bsdus ba zang // blan ba cwag mchig gcigasanas // gsang zugs cas kyis rgyas na// 'jig bye su 'dre'ad shing srung sa// gang la mngags pa'i phrin las byed//
106a1(rnying rgyud): narba sna // nyam thon rgyal po'i thag rten// mthe rlung gnyi san la sargyu// sa su sngaganas ni gshegs pa blang la// gzugs pa gras zhing brgyang bskum pa // sran bzlog mam ba gtsigs nas ni// gsangs na
106a2(rnying rgyud): dzag tu bzlas byas na// gdug pa kru yi 'jigs las thar// mdzub ris byas pas ser ba bzlog/ bklog pa gang yang thogs chags med// gzhan gyis mi thu'i phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis khu tshur so sor bcangs// chub srad mthe'u chung la ku chud/
106a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis rtse mo spad nas ni// gzugs phyang gtu zhing brkyang bskum bgrang // snyan pazlog mche ba gsogs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// das can gnad la phebs pa dang // lha srin sde brgyad 'dar zhing zed// mA bcol par
106a4(rnying rgyud): las mdzad// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong gis// mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo mnan// lhag me gsum po dpung mgro bsnol// gzugs phung gtu zhing brkyang bskum bzar// spyan bzlog ma che ba gtsigs nas ni//
106a5(rnying rgyud): zhabs drag tu bzlas byas na// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i don la bskyod// lha srin rnams ni las la bskyod// bgegs dang 'byung po'i gnod pa skyog// ngan song 'khor ba gnas na na // / las dang bya ba thams cad 'grub// khams gsum rnam rgyal
106a6(rnying rgyud): cu ni// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs la ni// mdzub gnyis bsgrer ste sdig mdzug 'phyar// gzugs lung gzu zhing brkyang bskum bgrang // spyan bzlog mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// brag la dmigs na mal bar 'gyur/
106a7(rnying rgyud): tshul dmigs na skabs par 'gyur// me la dmigs na 'chi ba pa/ gyur// rlung la dmigs na 'chan par 'gyur// khams gsum 'khor ba las rgyal 'gyur// stobs so yi rgyag rgya ni// g.yon pa phung bu 'debs pa'i dz+wasra// g.yas pa gtun shi
106b1(rnying rgyud): ga pa rdul// gzugs thang gzu zhing brkyang bskum pald// snun ma drug mche ba gtsigs nas ni// gsung sngags drag tu bzlas byas na// zan pa byung nasarab 'bebs// ma ba kres nagatud par byed// phan gdon 'gyur dag stobs dang rdza
106b2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi chag rgya ni// g.yas bathangs kyis gcol 'gyur// g.yon pa rung dmar gcol stob// gcol 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// gsang sngags zag tu bzlas byas na// rnal 'byor rjes 'jug dngos grub thob// thar pa'i lal
106b3(rnying rgyud): mi mid// lag gnyis sor mo nang du bsnol// nang du phrar ba bzug pa ni// phur pa babyed pa'i phyag rgya yin// mtheb mdzub gnyis kyi bar du ni// phur pa bcug la yas mar mngag/ phur ba bskul ba'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis thal mo sbar nas /
106b4(rnying rgyud): phar pa bcug ste dril byas na// phur pa 'jil ba'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs nas gtad// g.yas pa thob brdeg pa'i tshul// phur ba brdeg pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis kyi rting sbar nas// gung mo'i rtse mo sprad pa ni// phung ba
106b5(rnying rgyud): chog phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni// mdzub bkug lcags kyu'i tshul du byas// 'gugs shing 'dren pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yas g.yon lag pa sor mo bsgreng // tshig chen bkug nas sur du bya// mthe bong gshibs nas mdun
106b6(rnying rgyud): bzhag pa// ri rab kyis gzing phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni// mdzub bsgreng dmigs la gtad pa ni// g.yas pa zhags pa 'phen tshul bya// yan lag bcings pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yas g.yon sor mo bsnol la ni// ba
106b7(rnying rgyud): sdub pa ni// gzugs la 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu chur bcangs nas ni// gung mo bsgreng nas rnga spang ba// brdeg pa'i tshul du byas pa ni// bka' bsgo bran bzhin nyan pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis mthe bo mdze'u chu
107a1(rnying rgyud): sor mo gsum po gshibs bskyed nas// ral mi 'debs pa'i tshul du byas// dam bgegs cad nas gcod pa'i phyag rgya yis// pha thabs yang sbrul mo so rnams// gtso ba'i phyag rgya'i bzhin // nges pa med pa rgyal bas
107a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs// gzhan yang phyag rgya la sogs pa// yang dag rtogs na kun kyang rgya// ma rtogs pa la rtog pa gzhi la// sngags dang ting 'dzin ma nor na// las dang bya ba de yis 'grub// ting 'dzin zhan na gzhung du bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
107a3(rnying rgyud): cad kyi gru gsung thugs kyi gsang ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas ka ma he dru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad skyes gsol to// kye bcom ldan pa
107a4(rnying rgyud): ya// bde gshegs phyag rgya de lags na// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// sku mdog phyag mtshan ji ltar lags// so so'i bye brag bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom
107a5(rnying rgyud): 'das padza kA la yas/ 'dri skad ces bka' stsal to// nyo cig kama? he sa?g/ nal 'byor nga li rjes 'jug rnams// bskyed dis ting 'dzin thabs ni 'di yan mI// mthing dag phugs mya 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// ku nga la bsgo/ byug 'tshal/
107a6(rnying rgyud): nga ni khams gsum 'khor ba'i ya'o// khams gsum snyeng rje sgrol mchog ste// dbregasu phyu g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthong nas// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba dang // rgong dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang // snying rje rnams dang
107a7(rnying rgyud): zhi ba la sogs pa// sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yis// bdud bzhi gtan nas 'joms pas dpa' dpa' 'dra// rgyan dang cha lugs len pas sgeg sgeg 'dra// sgra tshe yan lag rags pas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra// zhal g.yas dka la
107b1(rnying rgyud): bzhad pas rgod rgod 'dra// zhal g.yon dmar la gar dra pas gsheg she 'dra// zhal dbus mthing la gnag pas khro khro 'dra// zhal nas gdug rtsub 'gyi na pas rngam jam 'dra// rgyad thug rdzas rjes 'dzin pas snying rje che che 'dra// chos sku mtshan ma med pa
107b2(rnying rgyud): zhi zhi 'dra// de 'dra'i khro bo 'jigs sku gshegs su gsol// de 'dra'i khro bo 'jigs su gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir// rdo rje rtse dgus sa dgu'i rtog pa 'joms// rdo rje rtse lngas chud lnga'i rtog pa sgrol// ma dpung 'gags
107b3(rnying rgyud): khams gsum nyon mongs bsreg/ kha dz+haiM rtse gsum dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// ri rab phur bus khams gsum dbang du sdud// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar
107b4(rnying rgyud): gtsol stob// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// khro bo chen po hUM kA ra// dbu gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngon zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje g+har+N+Na bsnam
107b5(rnying rgyud): bad gnyis be con sog le bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur du bsnams// thod pa skam rlon phreng bas brgyan// rdo rje sma 'byin chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stong // gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul
107b6(rnying rgyud): gnas// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bzad// g.yas sngog yon sdang dbus dkar zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// deng gnyis rdo rje b+har+d+ha bsdams// bad gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu bsdams/
107b7(rnying rgyud): mtha'aganyis ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje mda' snyim chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa rud dmar gsil stob// gcol 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs// khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngo// g.yas dkar g.yon dam
108a1(rnying rgyud): rlo// sa rgyas ga // rdzun sa pa 'a mas// nA du/ sa/
108a2(rnying rgyud): kyis gcol 'khyud// g.yon bdud dmar gcol stob// gtsul 'brel ba'i tshul du ga nas// khro ba chen po gshin rje gshed// g.yas rdzog yon srung dbus rdzo zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyug mtshonani ni// dang gnyis rdo rje rtan bsnyam /
108a3(rnying rgyud): bar gnyis dgra sti brtson bsdams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phreng ba 'jil// rdo rje ngur khod chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa babs kyis gcol 'khyud// g.yon brdung dmar lngab snga stob// gsol bakhyil ba'i tshul du gnas// kho chen dam ga yos
108a4(rnying rgyud): g.yas blo g.yen srog dbus sdang zhal// phrag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan+da ni// dang gnyis rdo rje g+han+ta bsnams// bar ma gshol dang ral bri bsdams// mtha' gnyis ri rang lung bu 'jil// rdo rje gtun khung chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa zangs
108a5(rnying rgyud): kyis gcol ba khyud// g.yon pa drung dmar gtsel sgob// gcol 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// khro mo chen po rtam zin ni// g.yas dkar g.yon thod dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje rtan bsdams// ra
108a6(rnying rgyud): nyis nyal lags la yang bsdams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje ba su mtsho chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis bcol 'khyud// g.yon pa bung drim dag co la stong// gcol 'grel ba'i rdul bya bzhugs// khro bo gzhan thos mi thu pa
108a7(rnying rgyud): ka yas si ga yon dmar dbus dpar sgra// lcag drug ga yas g.yon phyag mtshan na// rang gnyis rdo rje gnA bsdams// par gnyis ba ngan rdal ba'i rnams// mtha' gnyis ri rang phur pa 'jil// rdo rje ma dang snyems chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pabab kyis gcos
108b1(rnying rgyud): bltad// g.yon pa drang dmar gcol stob// gtsol 'khri ba pa'i tshul ngu bzhugs// zla bo chen po bdud ci gzi bA ni// g.yas seng ga skyon dung dbus ldadu zhal+ya// phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+harna bsdams// nga
108b2(rnying rgyud): sa drug tob rnams// mtha' gnyis rirab phrar ba brnyes// da chung byin chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtsul labyung // g.yon ba zung dmar gcol stob// gcil 'khril ba'i tshul du zhugs// dzA ga rma gsum rnam par rgyal//
108b3(rnying rgyud): ragayon dmar dbus ldang ser// phyag drug g.yus g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje b+han+da bsnams// ba ra ma tri shUl mda' gzhu bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdo rje gsod ma chos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa thabs kyis gtsol
108b4(rnying rgyud): khyud// g.yon pa dud dmar gtsol stong // gtsol 'azil ba'i tshul du bzhugs// khro bo chen po stobs po che// g.yas nag g.yon dmar dbus dung ka/ phyag drug g.yas g.yon phyag mtshan ni// dang gnyis rdo rje baN+Da bsdams// par gnyis gtun
108b5(rnying rgyud): ma byung thung ba rnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phreng ba 'dri la// rdo rje bstod mchos kyi dbyings// g.yas pa zhangs kyis gtsol 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gcol stob// gcol 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs// mthangs nyi shu'i sku mdog ni// g.yas
108b6(rnying rgyud): 'on rigs drang sbyar bar bya// pra thangs nyi shu'i phyag rgya ni// gtso bo rnams kyi bar ma byin// shar gyi sgo ma lcags kyu sku mdog dkar// lho yi sgo ma zhogs pa sku mdog sngo// nub kyi sgo ma lcags glog sku mdog dmar// byang gi sgo mthil bu su mdog
108b7(rnying rgyud): sngag// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdu ga sung thugs kyi gas ba kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs kyang las/ pra mdog dang phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang karma te drags/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra pA la
109a1(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya/ lus 'di dngos por blta ba la// dngos po gzhi la na dri ltar lags// thugs nyi ye nas mya 'jos nyid// gdug pa 'dul ba'i srung bstan pa// 'greng ba'i dbang
109a2(rnying rgyud): ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ lus 'di dngos por 'dzin pa la// bde gsheg dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// g.yeng ba'i sems can don du bsdu// bde gshegs
109a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor lus la bskyed// phung po lnga ni gnas su dag/ gzugs kyi phung po gnas su dag pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i rtsa la bud+d+ha he ru bskyed// rnam shes phung po gnas su dag pa'i phyir// sa yi rtsa la badz+ra he ru bskyed// tsher ba'i phung po gnas su dag pa'i
109a4(rnying rgyud): phyir// chu yi rtsa la rat+na he ru bskyed// 'du shes phung po gnas su dag pa'i phyir// me yi rtsa la pad+ma he ru bskyed// 'du byed phung po gnas su dag pa'i phyir// rlung gi rtsa la karma he ru bskyed// 'byung ba lnga ni rgyal ba'i yum lnga'i mkha'// dngos por 'dzin pa gnas
109a5(rnying rgyud): su dag pa'i phyir// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku ru bskyed// zhe sdang gnas su dag pa'i phyir// rna ba'i gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba bskyed// nga rgyal gnas su drag pa'i phyir// dpung pa'i gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po 'byed//
109a6(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags gnas su dag pa'i phyir// pho mtshan gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo rta mgrin bskyed par bya// phrag dog gnas su dag pa'i phyir// mig 'bras gnad kyi rtsa la ni// khro bo bdud kyi 'khyil pa bskyed// rdzun du smra ba gnas su dag pa'i phyir// lce yi gnad kyi rtsal
109a7(rnying rgyud): ni// tho ba dbyug pa srin po bskyod// srog gcod gnas su dag pa'i phyir// dpung g.yon gnad gyi rtsa pa ni// khrob meg yo mgon po bskyed// ma byin len pa gnas su dag pa'i phyir// nang mthi la gan gyi rtsi la ni// cho gzhan gyis mi thub bskyed/
109b1(rnying rgyud): sems gnas su dag pa'i phyir// rkang g.yon gnang kyi rtsa la ne// khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal bskyed// pog lnga gnas su dag pa'i phyir// mig g.yon ga nad kyi rdu la ni// khro bo d+hA kAr yang bskyed// gti mug gnas su dag pa'i phyir// skye ba bdang
109b2(rnying rgyud): la ni// khro bo chen po stobs chen bgyid// btang snyoms byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men phag gi mgo can bskyed// g.yo sgyu byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men smig bu'i mgo can bskyed// dbang rtsal byang chub sems dang ldan// phra mon stag gisaso
109b3(rnying rgyud): can pa skyed// thogs med byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men bya rgod mgo can bskyed// gzi brjid byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men g.yag gi mgo can bskyed// rang rig byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men bya rog mgo can bskyed// gtsang ma
109b4(rnying rgyud): grong byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men sha ba'i mgo can bskyed// bra la gting zab don rtogs byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men thug pa'i mgo can bskyed// 'khor ba rngam 'joms byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men gzig gi mgo can bamed//
109b5(rnying rgyud): mi tshong 'joms byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men khwa yi mgo can bskyed// gze myur 'joms byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men byi la'i mgo can bskyed// thabs mkhas rdzu 'phrul byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men pu shud mgo can bskyed//
109b6(rnying rgyud): rngam mgyog gsod byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men skyang mo'i mgo can bskyed// 'dzin cing mgyogs byed byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men khra yi mgo can bskyed// gnyen po gzhal med byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men seng ge 'i mgo can
109b7(rnying rgyud): bskyed// shes rab thabs mkhas byang chub sems dang ldan// za men pha wang mgo can bskyed// gtum shing gdug pa byang chub sems dang ldan// za men dred kyi mgo can bskyed// mgyogs shing gze ba byang chub sems dang ldan// phra men zer
110a1(rnying rgyud): chags na// ma tsun rdzogs na kyang sgrub pasas nga ldan// ma das rlom zhes/ rnamatha cwo rgyang sas na// rnam ba'i mgacan rgyan tham
110a2(rnying rgyud): gis// srid pa rlung yang mi thar gtams// snying rje byang chub sems dang ldan// rkang mthil g.yas pa lcags kyu ma// byams pa byang chub sems dang ldan// lag mthil g.yas la zhags pa ma// dga' ba byang chub sems dang ldan/
110a3(rnying rgyud): lag ma zil g.yon pa lcags srog ma// btang snyoms byang chub sems dang ldan// rkang mthil g.yon pa dril bu ma// lus 'di dngos por 'dzin pa rnams// rtog pa'i dbang gis 'dzin pa las// lus 'di yi nas mngon sangs
110a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas// ye nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// bskyed kyang mi dgos rang bzhin gnas// sngags dran snying po brjod pa tsam// bde gshegs lha gsung thugs su rtogs// rgya mtshor nyi zla gza' skar ltar// snang la rang bzhin med par to/
110a5(rnying rgyud): thugs ni ye nas stong pa nyid// stong pa nyid kyi cho 'phrul ni// 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gnas// spyan drang mchod pastong bya ru med// lhangs kyis rtogs na spyan drang yin// gnyis su med na mchod pa yin// de nyid gus brtson bstod pa yin//
110a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin mi gtong sangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal du med// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsung ba/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ lus dngos sor blta ba gnas su dag par
110a7(rnying rgyud): bya ba dang / gdug pa can btul ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang karma he rukas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// bye bcom ldan pabadz+ra kI la ya// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad la// mchod
110b1(rnying rgyud): gyi nu mchod pa mi 'tshal lam// phyi mchod nang mchod gsang mchod gasnam// 'di yi don rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan badz+rA kI la yas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig kar+m+ma b+he dra ka/ skye mchod nang mchod gas /
110b2(rnying rgyud): mchod gsum// rmad dubyung ba'i mchod sbyin zhes// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bslab// ting 'dzin brtan pa thob nas ni// de nas gnyis me blo yis ni// grong na sems can ster rje// zhing brgyas 'bras mi shes pa// ge ngan 'jig rnan
110b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor// snying rjes bzung zhing bskal ba'i thabs// gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya// gnas ni yab yum mkha' la 'phang // gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur phyir// 'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// bskal ba'i rnam shes
110b4(rnying rgyud): gsal bsgom// yi las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bteg/ dza yi lcags kyis dgug bstim bya// bdag gi thugs nas khar bton la// shangs kyi rlung sgom dung khang nang // sku gsung thugs kyi dbang bskur bya// skal tshig rta brgyad rdo rje'i lam//
110b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i mkha' la spos// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o// yum gyi mkha' gsang dkyil 'khor las// spros pas phyogs bcu'i tshul ba mchod// bsdus pas bdag gi thugs kar thim// su dang gsub dang thegs gsum du// gan
110b6(rnying rgyud): nas thi ma nas rdo rje'i la'o// yum gyi mkha' la gang bar spros// yum gyi mkha' gser dkyil 'khor las// rgyal ba mchod cing bdag mchod la// de nas mgal me bskor ba bzhin// yang ras yang du spyod sras mchod// bdag nyid mnyes pas thams
110b7(rnying rgyud): mnyes// gseng mchod rmad du byung zhes pa'o// nang mchod rmad du byung ba ni// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+haN+Da lngar// dri chen ji chur k+ta dang // mAM sa byang chub sems bkod la// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du yis// so so bcud bsdus phyogs phyogs
111a1(rnying rgyud): bstim// thim pas ngong du khrab las// oM a mr-i ha Sh+T+rI hU~M pra zhes brjod pas/ dkar 'tsher byang chub sems su gyur// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// bden pa'i sngags dang byin brlabs rdzas// nas mabyangs
111a2(rnying rgyud): par 'byung bar 'gyur// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ 'khor gsum yongs su rig par bsngo// bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'phral// gang dang gang gis phul mchod na// rigs lnga'i dngos grub thob par nges// rdo rje'i rigs la
111a3(rnying rgyud): pa yi// rigs lnga'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// nad mchod rmad du byung ba'o// phyi mchod rmad du byung ba ni// bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms la// rin po che yi snod drug tu// 'tsho ba'i zas rigs ci yang rung // 'og tra yi ge yaM bsams pa// drang
111a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bus// rgya gram pa ngan phyar ba'o// rlung gi sa bon 'khrigs par bsam// de steng raM las me'i dkyil 'khor// kha dog dmar po 'bar ba la// me yi sa ben 'khrigs par bsam// de steng i AHhUM swA hA lA/ s+pha ra Na baT kyis rlung
111a5(rnying rgyud): g.yos pas// me sbar thams cad dngos po bsregs// hU~M nyid dkar por yongs su gyur// rdo rje dkar po gcig gyur te// rdzas kyi skyon rnams dag par gyur// de nas a dkar gcig tu gyur// a las 'od zer spros pas ni// so so'i gnas rnams
111a6(rnying rgyud): rin chen khang // de dag byin gyis brlab par bya// dri bo pang phung rin chen phung por brlab// chu rnams bdud rtsi chen por brlab// rtsi shing dpag bsam 'dod dgur brlab// sba smad mchod bstod byed par brlab// gos rnams lhab lbu ba byin gyis brlab/
111a7(rnying rgyud): 'tho ba mchod pa'i lha mo rnams// rgyan gyis mdzes shing mchod rdzas thogs// bder gshegs rnams la mchod byed bsam// sngon du ci 'phrad la sogs pa// me tog phung por byin gyis brlab// me tog phreng ba rab mchog ste// bde gshegs rnams
111b1(rnying rgyud): la mchod par bsngo// rmang du byung ba'i gtor ma yang // mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams su// thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya// byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di brjod// b+hU dza s+phar tra phaT/ bgro b+had+d+ha/ dzI b+hA pul/ d+hu k+She buSh+pe m+b+ha mo/
111b2(rnying rgyud): bA ts+tshawA ra Sh+kaM/ mis drug/ amra sarba kAdzA s+thAH/ bam+b+hi pA m+b+hi She Ta gad ak+Sha sa pa/ sah+lAd+harmANAM/ AH mraTar+tha d+ha ta ma~M A s+t+wa~M swaH/ ting 'dzin sngags dang tshigs su 'dzad// skad cig mi migs chos rnyed bstin// de ltar gA gleng byed na
111b3(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur// de le mi chubasdus pa ni// tshul khams pa rang sbyin par 'gyur// de 'i las rba po 'i rjes sring // bsamag tan pa rom phyin par 'gyur// dul 'dzur de kyi brtson pa 'i// btson 'as par ma sbyin
111b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de la yang dag na dgongs pa// shes rab pa la byin par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di la ni ring zhing // nang me dganod pa lci bar 'gyur// bu lon sanA na gzhal ba dang // zas kyi rgol ba char rkyod 'gyur// mongs skyed 'byer ba 'gal ba dang /
111b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'di la bde skyed tshogs// bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de ha zla mi mchod pa de// rmyi yi mchod pa dam pa'o// kI la la gsang pa'i dgongs rgyud las/
111b6(rnying rgyud): rkyen gsang ba'i mchod pa bstan pa'i leT ste 'azlas pa // / de nas yang lus kyi rgyal po N+DI tre drags/ bcom ldan 'das ba kI la yA la 'di skad ces nar+sa bA ta// kye bcom ldan padz+ra kI la ya// dbyang zab chang po'i da
111b7(rnying rgyud): khye 'khor bal// thugs rjes zung das rje 'phrul bstan pa // dadas pa'i rje bral sa // 'du sa rjes bsgru ba me bya sa// srang chu bskyed pa dzini byung lags// yang ba na shegs pas sang bstan drugs pa/
112a1(rnying rgyud): gsol ba dang // de nas yang badz+ra kI la yas 'di sad ces gsungs so// nyon cig kar+Na te ruka/ nga yi rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang po kun gzhi stong pa nyid// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdangag can// thugs ni yang dag rdo rje nyid//
112a2(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// rnam par mi rtog pa las 'das// de bzhin nyid du bsgom par bya// rdo rjes mtshon pa'i rgyu ba sman pa// ye shes mtshon brgyu yi lung // mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// thugs kyi mtshon pha chu yi ting nge 'dzin// rang rig ci yang
112a3(rnying rgyud): ru shar ba dang // kun rdzob sgyu mar snang ba yis// rig pa so sor gnas gyur pa// srog sems go ru shar bas rdo rje gzhon nur shar// thugs ni ye shes lnga dang ldan// snying gi go ru bsgom par bya'o// tsi ta'i gzhal yas khang du ye shes sems dpa'i
112a4(rnying rgyud): thugs// rdo rje'i chang zung bzlas pa'i 'bras bus bskor bAr bsgom// snying rjes bskal ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mAnan pa ma yin te// rang rig ye shes sgyu mar snang ba dang // rig pa so sor snang bku mA rangar bsgoms la// snying rje byang chub sems ni
112a5(rnying rgyud): nyis su med// shes rab dbyings kyi rtags su yum nyid bsgom// dam tshig snying rjes bskal bas bsad mnan ma yin no// phung po rdo rjes gtams byas nas// bdag dang skad srid basbal ba'i lus ngag yid gsum ni// rig pa so sor snang ba rtsa
112a6(rnying rgyud): gsung rdzogs su shes// me shes sbrul phra mo mang pos gtams// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// log rtog sgyumar snang ba'i bdag dang sems can rnams// bdag dang tha~Mng srid rnam par shes pa'i chags// 'dus mabyas kyi rdo rje dbyer ming ba
112b1(rnying rgyud): pa ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyung las/ bdag rtsu ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nus yang kar+m+ma he rugs/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces zhus so// k+She bcom ldan bad+yA kI la ya/ snang srid tho ba'i dkyil /
112b2(rnying rgyud): du// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol ba dang / de nas badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karmA he ru ka/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor
112b3(rnying rgyud): rnams// ku pA ra ru yab yum bsgom// mkha' gsang gnyis ni byin brlabs la// e steng nyi mu pad+ma brgyad// zla ba rdo rje rtse lnga A// dzaHyis dpung pa g.yas g.yon bzung // hUM gis stod slad 'khyud la ni// baM gyis thugs mtshan sbyar ba'o// hoH
112b4(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa bskyed par bya'o// s+t+waM dang ho yis bskul ba ni// de nas gnyis med sbyor ba bya// pad+ma la ni rdo rje gzhug/ rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mor 'khyil// bde ba gsal zhing mi dmigs pa// byang chub sems su rab phab nas// yab yum gnyis med
112b5(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pas dgyes// thabs dade shes rab gnyis su med// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang la bzhugs// byang chub sems ni dkar la 'tsher// yum gyi mkha' la gang bar lud// thogs med 'od zer lan gcig spos// rdo rje'i brag chen gtums
112b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// gnyis pa sras mchog grangs med spos// zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa la// tho ba g.yas na lcags kyu g.yon// dregs pa pho mo bzung zhing ni// gsang sngags drag tu bzlas la brdeg/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng
112b7(rnying rgyud): zlog bcur// dregs pa spyi chings bsnol mar dbab// gsum pa mo yi 'od zer sgo// bzhi pa a yi 'od zer sngo// lnga paM baM gyi 'od zer spro// drug pa byang sems hUM sril bcu// slob sum gyi mkha' la blo// skyed pa yab kyis bskyed par bya/
113a1(rnying rgyud): rang rang gsung sngags lhar rdzogs pa'o// sdang sring khro bo'i dkyil 'khor la// yang sbrul sram sprul grangs med kyis// rlung yang mi thar gtams pa'o// ye shes gnyis med spyan drang bstim// kI la ya yi
113a2(rnying rgyud): skra chen ni// gsang sngags rab tu 'brug stong ldir// khams gsum srid gsum dbang du sdud// skye shi 'khor ba dbyings su bsgral// dregs pa thams cad mngon spyod bskal// nyon mongs bag chags gdar sha bcad// kI la ya gsang
113a3(rnying rgyud): bA'i dgongs rgyud las/ phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste'i rtse badran pa'o// / de nas yang badzaka ma he rugs/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya/
113a4(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum dang khams gsum du// nyon mo dra 'khor ba'i chu rgyun 'bas// ma rig gnas su bskal na ji ltar bsgral// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
113a5(rnying rgyud): nyon cig karma he ru ka/ srid pa gsum dang khams gsum du// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chu rgyan babs// ma rig gnas su bsgral ba ras bstan gyi// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// ku mA ra ru bdag bsgoms pas// sgra gsung thugs kyi 'od zer
113a6(rnying rgyud): bskul// dbyings las ye shes gzugs kyi skur bzhengs la// sku stod zhal gsum phyag drug la// sku smad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa// rtse mo ye shes 'od zer 'phro// gsal ba rnam gsum ldan par bya// khrus lung rnam gsum rdzogs
113a7(rnying rgyud): byas la// rnam shes rten ni dag par bya// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yis// gab pa'i man ngag sdom pa klong bcu yis// gnad chen bdun la gdab par bya// re re la yang rtsa brgyad do// tha ma rtsa gcig bdun du'o// 'byung ba bzhi dang rgyu bzhi la// thob
113b1(rnying rgyud): b+his slong par 'gyur med kyis// bzhi'i mdo'i drangs man thang cad nas bcad/ dbugs kyi bskam phrag dag cad nas gcang // sems kyi yul byung nga rgyal cad nas bcad// dngas pa'i gnas slebs 'dod chags cang nas pa dang / Na yi tan du /
113b2(rnying rgyud): gti mug cad nas bcad// kun gyi gnas bcom rten 'brel gAtid byung la// khab len rdol lcags rnams 'du ba ltar// bzag mdangs zog nas tshe phreng bstan par bya'o// tshe lung la yang rnam gnyis te// drug wa gnas su dag pa pe shes pa/
113b3(rnying rgyud): shes gnas su dag pas rgyal ba'i sras sgyu \u0f7f// de kA kho yi tshe lung bstan pa zhes bya'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ man ngag phur gcig ma'i le'u skye bcwa brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang kam he ru kas/ ba
113b4(rnying rgyud): 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// chos rnams thams cad dngos med pas// gsal ba rnam gsum gsal byas la// mngon spyod bsgral ba mi 'gal lam// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra hrI
113b5(rnying rgyud): yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// gsang ba mchog gi phrin las zab mo la// nyon mongs phyin ci log gi dbang byas te// snying rje byang chub sems dang ma wAn
113b6(rnying rgyud): par// zhe sdang dbang gis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// thos bsam shes rang gsal bar ma gyur pa// / gti mug dbang gis gsang ba'i don ma rtogs// gsang sngags gnyis med yon tan ma rtogs par// nga rgyal dbang gis bdag nyid gcig
113b7(rnying rgyud): chur bathun// khengs drag dbang gis slob dpon sprul bsngos// sri zhu chung bas rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams// dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i rnal 'byor dam bsrung la// phrag dog dbang gis bdag bstod gzhan la smod// khe rngam dbang gis ras tshod
114a1(rnying rgyud): 'dod dgar byed// gzhan mthang tsam na snying nas sbyar 'dabs shing // gnyis mang ngon ngam zab ma rngub tu bod// \u0f88\u0f90 'bras don ma rtogs pas gleng sbyin pa bskyed// dani na chen ma tha cu ba rnyed/ pa dang /
114a2(rnying rgyud): brlangs dang du blangs// nga rgyal khro gtum rang khar gtong // gsang sngags zab mo'i don la bon du gyer// thugs rje byang chub sems dang mi ldan pas// kha la gnas skyod zer zhing spyor sgrol byed// rgya mthun 'bras bus las kyi srin po skyes// rdzas
114a3(rnying rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi lha srin mthu bo che// 'jig rten khams su mdangs 'phrog srog bcad nas// de yi rnam smin rdo rje dmyal bar skye// de rnams rgyu mthun rnam sbyin de 'dra bas// gsang sngags rdo rje'i rnal 'byor de ma yin// gsang sngags
114a4(rnying rgyud): rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag don// da lta nyid du sku gsung thugs 'dod na// nga yi lung zab 'di la thos bsam na// mun pa'i nang du rin chen stor ba ni// sgron me btags pas rin chen rnyed par 'gyur// nga yi lung zab 'di la thos bsam na//
114a5(rnying rgyud): nyid du sgra gsung thugs nyid do/ blta sprod brlang po srung na tshogs su 'gyur// nga yi lung zab 'di la thos pas man// lcags gi ril bru chur bsgyur gting du 'gro// de nyid snod du byas pas kha ru 'phyo// lha sbyong brlang po spad pas tshegs su
114a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de yi lung zab 'di la thos bsam na// nam mkhang stong pa nyid las sbyin dang na bun 'byung // 'brug dang khru rlangs bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bab// sa gzhi snyam nas lo tog rgyas pa dang // 'bras bu smin nas sems can gsos su
114a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// ltalha spyod brlang po spyad pas tshogs su dgyur// nga yi lung zab 'di la thos pasam nas// skye med rnam dag chos kyi dbyings nyid las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang bstan pa ni// thugs nyid zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// spu nyid khro
114b1(rnying rgyud): cha grags bstan// snang srong dkyil 'khor namu gsum yang // gtso bo'i dbyings las ye shes gcig/ rang rig nyid du shes spyad na// mtho mor las ni ming shes bzhin// sbru ma lta ba 'i blo dang ldan// skrong bzhin ma chags chu ba ta/
114b2(rnying rgyud): mkhang la bya lta bu yi tshul gyis ni// skyon ma gos par tshogs gnyis 'gyur// gdul bya'i dbang gis sangs rgyas bstan// rang rig ye shes gnyis med gzhan nas btsal du med// rig pa yul gyis mi 'thogs rig 'dzinas//
114b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu mnyam pas mthong gro lnga rdzogs// nus mthu go phye reg pas khyab pa'i phyir// gang du rgyas pa'i mthur ldan mthar phyin kho na'o// rgya 'bras dra gzhan med pas ro gcig pas// rgya mtsho chen por hrI zla gza' skar ltar// sdang la ra
114b4(rnying rgyud): pas gzhan gyi gzugs// dang po gang 'a byung ba tha dad ma yin te// gzugs snang thams cad dkyil 'khor rnam gsum bya// zag pa thams cad dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsung // shes rig thams cad dkyil 'khor rnam gsum thugs// nga yi lu
114b5(rnying rgyud): 'di la thos bsaman// gnyis med don de shes na yang dag don// gsal ba rnam gsum bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ltar// nam mkha'i sprin dang lung stong brag cha bzhin// gnyis med so so ma yin tha dang med// don de shes na yid bzhin nor tha
114b6(rnying rgyud): de nyid rnal 'byon gnyis med dngos med ba thal// kI la la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyad laswA// sgra spyod dngos med kyi thA sgri baphrad dbu pa'o// / de nas yang ka ma he rugs/ bcom ldan 'das 'adz+ra kA~M pa yu ba 'di skad ces gsol to/
114b7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// bde bar gshegs pa'i lung zab thos bsam pas// de nyid sangs rgyas sku gsur thugs nyid dam// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karba he rug
115a1(rnying rgyud): dbyang ngas su 'dag pa rnams// nad pan kyis sbyin pa'i blag bsngal ba// klan pamakhas brtson pad na na das la ltur// mnu pa mkhas mchogags par na pa yis// rlu gzhon pa bdang bar btu pa ma// dang
115a2(rnying rgyud): pas ma spyad nad kyang sel mi 'gyur// sngags kyi brtul zhugs bsgom bsu ba de bzhin no// skyes byas 'bros kyis ta yi lam btsal na// mthur gyi dgras kyis rta si lam bstan kyang // ma brgyug bar du dus sar sleb mi 'gyur// sngags kyi btus zhugs bas
115a3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub de bzhin no// dper na mi gcig so ka'i nags tshal bsreg 'dod pas// rtswa dang gtsub shing lag gi 'du byed shes// ma bsrubs bar du me ni 'byung mi 'gyur// bsrubs nas me mthong bar du 'gro mi gcad// rtags phran tsam la yengs nas me nyid chad
115a4(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// sngags kyi brtul zhugs bsgom bslub de bzhin no// ri klung shod nas ri bo chen po'i rtse mo ru// ka la ping ka'i phru gu'i sgra dbyangs ltar// yud tsam gyis ni nam 'phang bcad nas slebs// sngags kyi bsgom bsgrub brtul zhugs de bzhin no// dpe
115a5(rnying rgyud): mang rig pas btsud na lung dang 'gal// de bas bla ma'i lung dang gdams dpral// gdong can bzlog med bslab na 'bras bu myur du rnyed// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa'i dus tshod ni// rab kyis zla ba gcig na 'grub// 'bring gis lo gcig dag na 'grub// thams
115a6(rnying rgyud): lo gsum dag na bgrub// phyi ma'i dus la mi sdod pad// tshe gcig 'di nyid dngos grub rnam gnyis thob// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa chen po yi// man ngag rtseg ma gsum gyi don rtogs rnal 'byor de// ting 'dzin mi gtong da ltar sangs rgyas nyid//
115a7(rnying rgyud): grangs kyi bsnyen pa 'bring ni bdun 'bum mam// rab ni nyin zhag re la bcu phrag bcu// mi tshe gnyis kyis phyag rgya'i rig 'dzinas// dngos grub rnam gnyis dus der thob par 'gyur// dus kyi bsnyen pa po bla ma yol bar// yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
115b1(rnying rgyud): zhal phye nas// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang gsum rdzogs byas shing // bsnyen pa gzhung bzhin dam tshig ma nyams na// mi tshe gsum gyis phyag rgya'i rig 'dzin sa// dngos grub rnam gnyis dus der thob par 'gyur// mchod pa lo zla 'das na nyams pa
115b2(rnying rgyud): dang // rdo rje spun gyi nang du khong khro mnar sems nyams// ngan sems dpya sems khro sems nyams pa la// lo zla dus su nyams skongs bshags brtson bya// phyi bshags nang bshags tshogs ni brgya rtsa dbul// de yis nyams skongs sor gsol gong
115b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin 'gyur// dus las 'das pas nyams pa skongs mi 'gyur// 'bras bu med cing de nyid brlag par 'gyur// rdo rje spun la ngan sems dpya sems pas// dbul po'i nang nas lkugs pa mdze can dang // kha mig yon po yan lag ma tshang ba// de nyid
115b4(rnying rgyud): bor nas dmyal khams bcu po dag/ yang dag don ma gnyis med mi shes pas// dra ni theg chen sbyor sgrol dngos por blta// rgyu mthun pa yis gnod sbyin mthu bo che// mdangs 'phrog srog gzod de yi las thogs nas// de nyid ber nas dmya
115b5(rnying rgyud): 'grus bcu po dag/ dam log rdo rje 'khras pa'i khang khro can// rkyen las byung ba'i dam gri'i was len rjod nyal ma// dngos grub bang du gcong pa'i bgegs byas nas// zag par byer mi zin pa'i sbrul du ste// de nyid bong nas dpal khams
115b6(rnying rgyud): bcu po dag/ rdo rje dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ sngags kyi brtul zhugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bco ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces
115b7(rnying rgyud): gsor te// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// rnal 'byor las ni dang po la// gzugs brtan dkyil 'khor mi 'tshal lam// bde bar gshegs pas grang bstan du gsol/ zhes gsol pa dang / nyon cig ka ma he ru ka/ de yi don rnams ngas
116a1(rnying rgyud): na na// sa ma pa / sa na su kun na/ gas gag nga su// da nga / 'ad ma
116a2(rnying rgyud): 'a byams so pa na byed dang / na sa nam sul// lung stsal ba bye pa'o sa/ phyogs bzhes kyis skyes zlab dang// da ba par gdags/ pa sa bcang
116a3(rnying rgyud): la gas gnas pas 'ang/ na rna pa / ga nga
116a4(rnying rgyud): kyil 'khor gyi ba rgya nyi shu gcig pa'o// / 'a sa/ ba ma ldan brda la ye// thong ba rgya me kyil 'amar ston mo mabyon snang sas/ brtan ma'i dkyil bad nyid ma 'gal nga
116a5(rnying rgyud): min pa 'bu dang / 'a du bye su pa la mas 'angan sa // sa nam bag ga se las 'ang // med bdin kyis ba 'o// da gshegs thags 'a
116a6(rnying rgyud): la ba'i gdus// rnala'i phreng ngos subanab pas// da bags dbang dusnad pa'i sa// btsod dang myang nang gnyis med duste/ mang mthor ladul gardzogs byas na// das srab tsa da nga 'ab par gyur/
116a7(rnying rgyud): gas pa'i dgangs skyid mas/ gzugs patad dkyil la bar gyi yin tan bsad pa'i 'i du / das pang ya dpa/ sa dan 'das bcwosngal ma la 'dri ga ga gsol/
116b1(rnying rgyud): ldan badz+ra kI la ya// sbrang srid ye nas sku gsung thugs// bdag nyid phung po yi sangs rgyas// gzhan nas spyan drangs mchod bskyod mi 'gal lam/ zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// srid pa'i thur bu srung
116b2(rnying rgyud): padang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// gang la gang nas ji ltar du// gang du gang gyir gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir// kIl
116b3(rnying rgyud): dngos gru brtsol// kI la la gsang ba'i dgongs rgya lus/ stanA drang pa'i le'u sa nyi shu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru kas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// bde gshegs thugs kyi gsang sngags
116b4(rnying rgyud): 'di// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa lnga// 'di yi don rnams ji ltar lags// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/
116b5(rnying rgyud): byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags 'di// chos kyi sku yi ngo bo yin pas na// ye shes lnga yi sgra yis dug lnga gnas su baphreng // rdegs pa 'dul mdzad dug 'dul sngags kyis// sngags ni byin rlab tshabs sangs rgyas
116b6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlab gsang sngags 'dis// sgra bzhin me yin yid la bzlas mi chad// bul pa'i nang du mar me btang ba bzhin// rang la gsal zhing gzhan gyis mthong ba min// sman pa'i brtul zhugs brtson 'grus drag po yis//
116b7(rnying rgyud): gsum gsal zhing sngags sgra ma nyams par// mi chog par mchod cing sems g.yeng min// shes rab me la brtson 'grus rlung gis bgyod// drug gsu mi gnas su bsreg pas sku gsum 'grub// tshe gcig nyid la sku gsung thugs nyid do//
117a1(rnying rgyud): mtshams med rig pas ldog pas dmyal bar ltung nges pa// rnam gsum gsal zhing sngags kyi 'od zer sgo// tshur 'dus gnyis su med par bsti ma byas na// gzhan gyi rig pa sbyor ba lta mi smos// ngan song de yig
117a2(rnying rgyud): bu srung mi srid// thar pa'i lam la rig pa'i me tog bor// sngags kyi ska la yan lag bsam mi khyab// ljags kyi spa bshad byin nyams dngos grub yal// gsung gi sgom pa 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di// dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis gnyis
117a3(rnying rgyud): brgyad myi dgos par rdzogs pa'i lung // mthu dpung 'od zer rab tu 'bar// bde bar gshegs pa'i mthu ni rang gi rig pa'i mthu// gzhan la re ba 'jog pas mthu mi rnyed// kIl la gsang ba'i dgongs spyad las/ thugs kyi gsang bsngags kyi la
117a4(rnying rgyud): nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang kam he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad rjes gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// nyams pa bdun po bskal ba la// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// rim shes rnye
117a5(rnying rgyud): ltar lags// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan drag sol/ zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// 'byung ba bzhin pad+ma bzhi/
117a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi na chen bzhi po dag/ rnam par shes pa'i rten can yin// dkar po dmar nag mthing gser// chos nyid byang chub sems kyis// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bya// glo bur rgyud la 'dzin pa'i rtsa// skyon yon dbang po dang byed rtsa// zag dang sa da
117a7(rnying rgyud): dngas dbang po dngas// rtsa dngas nyid la zhe sdang rgyu// de bzhin rim pas rgyu ba'o// ku gzhi yid dang rnam par shes// dbang po la sogs de bzhin chu// bzhi mdo'i dngas ma dag la ni// rta rnga bcur gshegs dkar po la// khrag dang sa dmar po rtseru
117b1(rnying rgyud): lelamago// de la dbugs dang mdzod gnas pa// yod de'i mngon par spangs tsas// de la 'od ji dngas ma chags// kha dag lnga pa sems yul rgyas// da' tshal rten gnas pa// dkar po pa rgya bcings pa'i tshug// de rnams dbus na rngam shes brgyad//
117b2(rnying rgyud): sems gnas dran gzhi'i dngas ma la// sems can dran gzhi tsit+ta'i dkyil// tshon gang 'od kyi thig ler gnas// kun gzhi cha phra yid rig dang // rnam shes brgyad dang nyon mongs lnga// rtog pa thams cad de yi ma las byung // rnam shes pa cung dang
117b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dang sA ma ni// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med rang bzhin gnas// glo bur chud las 'dzin pa'i log nyig gis// srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing rgyad drug sbyin// thog ma med par bsags pa'i bag chag 'i sgrib// nyon mongs kyi mdun
117b4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu ni// gos rdeg gangs bzhin brtsegs nas mgyag gnas// de yi sa bon las rnams rim bzhin 'byung // las dbang btsan pa'i mthu ni zlog par dka'// gal te pas dbang btsun te bzlog med min// de bas rnal 'byor rjes 'ja
117b5(rnying rgyud): bzlog med mthus// rmakha'i me shor nags re bcom pa bzhin// rnam gsum a yi gnas len byang sems kyis// nyon mongs rten can gnas ni dus gcig bcom// bsul ba las kyi gsang sngags 'di// bab pa'i mnang ge slong
117b6(rnying rgyud): yis// gnod chen bdun la phur gcig mas// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las kyis// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas shing gdab// re re la yang rtsa brgyad do// than rtsa gcig bdun du'o// rnam shes rten ni brtag par gces//
117b7(rnying rgyud): bskul ba la sa kyi gsang sdigs la// yon tan nya shu gcig rdzogs pa// dngas ma bdun po rim bzhin du// gab pa'i sdom pa rim bzhin bzung // gzas po'i tshe ye rten ni thal// nyon mongs kun gyi gnas kyang 'acom// gsang sngag
118a1(rnying rgyud): rab tu bzlas pa'i gab sbas dang // nam gsum a yi gnas len byang sems kyis// bla chen rgyu ba'i thod tshad drug sngar la// rnam shes rten rtogs tshe rten phur btab na// de la mi thebs mi srid 'gyur ba med/
118a2(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa mod la 'jig/ mun mda' bzhin du phyogs tshod 'phangs pa yis// thobs par mi 'gyur rang rgyud bsreg pa las// gong ma'i don de de ltar de bzhin na// skye ba'i sgo lnga rnam shes tshogs parkyang dang //
118a3(rnying rgyud): rten dang mthu thog zil gnon rnams// drag po'i gdab dmigs der 'dus mang na skyon// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ nyams pa bdun po bsgral ba'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru zhes/ bcom
118a4(rnying rgyud): 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skyed ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// nyams pa bskal ba de lags na// bla cheni rgyu ba'i drod tshad mi 'tshal lam// zhes gsol ba dang / badz+ra kI la las 'di skad gsungs so// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa
118a5(rnying rgyud): de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// bla chen rgyu ba'i drod tshad dag sbyar ba// 'u khams ji khams shang khams dang // kung keg khams la sogs te zla chen rnams// ba glang sha ba lug dang nya// de rnams so sor rgya bar bshad// g.yag dngang dang gla ba gsum
118a6(rnying rgyud): de rnams blo chen gyi ru rgyu bar bshad// de yi drod tshad dag sbyar ba// dang po'i bla ni 'khor nyul ba// bar ma'i klu ni khug pa'o// gsum pa'i bla ni pu li d+ha ra ya// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa yi// khugs mkhugs kyi drod tshad sbyar// gcig pa gnyi
118a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dzod tshad la// lha dpral dgug bstim byad 'jug go// gab sbas klong gi man ngag sbyar/ gsum pa'i drod mod rab sleb na// gaphur bsnyun la gdab par bya// drod tshad zhan na btab pan med// rab tu sleb na ma btab 'tshor// khugs ma khugs
118b1(rnying rgyud): drag zhan drod// sbyar te de bzhin grwa phur gdab// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ zla chen rgyu ba'i drod tshad kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas yang kar+m+ma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to//
118b2(rnying rgyud): bye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// h+la chen rgyu ba de lags na// lta bru la dgug bsti mo byad gzhug gi// gab sbas klong gi man ngag 'di// de yi don rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
118b3(rnying rgyud): nyon cig karma te ru ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// bla chen rgyu ba'i drod tshad sleb// lus la lha dpral gnas nas dgug/ rnam shes gzugs bstim byang du gzhug/ swa sgo thal bar rlog par brde
118b4(rnying rgyud): phung po zhal du sto ba dang drug/ re re la yang drug drug ste// dang po lha dang dpral bar bya// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// lha rnams drag po'i las la bskul// srul pa chen po'i dus la bab/ phra men drag po'i las la bskyal// phyag bcwa
118b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i dus la bab// dam can gnad dbab las la bsrul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rengs par khug la grogs dang bral bar gyis// pho nyas lha dpal dam pa'o// pho nya drag po da
118b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin bsrul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// po nya bkug bstim dam pa'o// pho nya drag po de bzhin bsul/
118b7(rnying rgyud): dngo' grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig chings shig rnam par sdom// pho has byad gzhug dam pa'o// pho ha drag po de bzhin bsul// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug
119a1(rnying rgyud): srang sems byed pa rnams// rnam par gzir la spyod chug cig/ po nyas sbyor gzhug dam par// ma nyanag po de bzhin bskul// dngos grub par du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing snang sems byed pa rnams// rgyob rdeg
119a2(rnying rgyud): gtogs shig thal bar rdzogs// pho nyas rtogs byed dam pa'o// pho nya drag po de bzhin bskul// dngos grub bang du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams// bstab po dpal chen zhal du the skab// bsgrim mo sumachen dkyi
119a3(rnying rgyud): sku stim// 'khor rnams rol cig kha raNati// zhes kI la pa gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ lha thal dgug stim byad gzhug gi'i rje lce nyi shu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang kAm he rugs/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan pa
119a4(rnying rgyud): kI la ya// pho nyas dgug bsti ma de lags na// drag po rdzas kyi dgug bstim gang // zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra k+ShiM la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig kam he ru ka/ grA yi drod tshad rab sleb pa// su gul sbyar ba 'dud pa
119a5(rnying rgyud): bag/ rdzas drug sa thal dam pa'o// kyang dkar rgyal po lta// bdun 'brupa ti khri bzlas zur zab// dgug bstin rje rje drag dam pa'o// zang zag mnyen pas bcig pa dang // lcags srog dam par gzhug pa dang // sngon dmar rdza
