119a6(rnying rgyud): gyis bcings pa ni// dzas ngag byung gzhug dam pa'o// a sh+log pa yi 'bras bu dang // lug meg rtsib sgrab pa thos pa dang // bzlas cung gsum du brdeg pa ni// sgra skyong gzhug pa'i rdzas rbeg dam pa'o// khabs kyis nirtsi ba dang /
119a7(rnying rgyud): kusha yis dkar nag dang // rdo rje thobs brdung ba ni/ gtog byed rdzas dra ga dam par// lo sa lon pa'i gtor ba dang // rtags kyi zengs phyed byed dang // hung dkar khrag dang snying lha sha/ dam rdzas drag po bsreg pa ni// mju dag da
119b1(rnying rgyud): bstab// dz+ha byed rdzas drug dam pa'o// zhes kAl la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ rdzas dag pas ma dpal dkrug pa rjes thad gzhug gi 'anyi tha bcad phyur// denas ya gas/ 4
119b2(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol te// rtse bcom ldan padz+ra kI la ya// rdzas drag dgrag bsti me de lags na// drag po sngags kyi dgug pa ni ma ga // zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ton cig kas he rbaH
119b3(rnying rgyud): bla yi drod tshad rab tu sleb pa dang // lha dpral drag po'i gsang sdug bzlas// rtsa brgyad rtswa gcig lnga bdun du// gsang sngags lha dgal dam pa'o// dgug bstim drag po'i gsang sngags la// gong ma de bzhin drag tu 'bras// gas
119b4(rnying rgyud): dgug pasti mdam pa'o// byad gzhug drag po'i gsang sngags la// gong ma de bzhin drag tu bathas// gsang sngags byed gzug dam pa'o// sgra blo drag po'i gsang sngags la// gong ma de bzhin drag tu 'azlas// gsang sngags
119b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// gtug byed drag po gsang sngags la// gong ma de bzhin drag tu bzlas// gsung snga gus gtog byed dam pa'o// byed drag po'i gsang lpags la// gong ma de bzhin drug tu bzlas// gsung sngags skyo 'byed dam pa'o// sbrum
119b6(rnying rgyud): ye gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ gsang sngags drag po ljang bra la dkrug bsgrim byung ga zhug gi le'u ste nyi shu dgra pa'o// / de nas yang karma he rmukas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la la li 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bcom ldan badz+ra kA la ya~M/
119b7(rnying rgyud): gsang / gas dgug pa stim de lags na// smon lam drag po'i dgug bstim gang // zhes gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das bang nyi la yas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rnaM mi rjod tshad rab sleb pa// lhang pal gron lam drag po gdab/
120a1(rnying rgyud): dbyang rdzas su 'jug pa yis// byang chub mchog tu sems bcud cing // don dum bzung ba da bzhin du// marung ba dang gzhags rigs badz+ra ga// dngas grub bar gcad dgra bgegs rnams// dpags pa dag da mang
120a2(rnying rgyud): spyod srol// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas myur du sgrol// khyed rnams 'tsho ba'i lha lnga dang grol cig/ lha dpral smon lam dam pa'o// dgug bstim smon lam drag pos gdab// rnal la rdzas su 'jug pa yis// bya
120a3(rnying rgyud): tu sems bskyed cing // dan dam kun rdzob de bzhin du// ma nor bder gshegs rigs bzung nas// dngos grub par chad dag bgegs rnams// rnam gsum drag dal mngon spyod spel// bran dang po nya bka' tan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas ma
120a4(rnying rgyud): khyed rnams rengs par dzAHhU~M baM hoHyis// rnam shes li d+har phobacig gnyis med pa snyim// dgug pastim smon lam drag pos gdab// byad gzhug smon lam drag po gdab// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// byang chub mchog tu sems pa phyed tsa/
120a5(rnying rgyud): don dam kun rdzob de bzhin du// mnor bder gshegs dgas bzung nas// dngos grub par tshid dgra bgegs rna ma// rnam gsum drag dal ma rdo ni spyod srol// bran dang po nya dka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas mya rang srong // yan la
120a6(rnying rgyud): 'bru gung dong // gzas pa mnar byang du chug/ smon lam bud gzhug drag po dam pa'o// gzir te sbyor gzhug smon lam drag pos gdang // rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa'i sa// byang chub mchog tu sems bsring cing // don dam dun rdzob de bzhin
120a7(rnying rgyud): nor bder gshegs rigs bzung nas// dngos grub par chod dgra bgeg pa rnams// nam gsum drag da'i mngon spyod sgrol// bran dang po nya bka' nyan tshegs// sngon chad dam bcas myung du spol// nyams pa bdun po gzos pa di
120b1(rnying rgyud): rba.A rna mas sna rgyag/ khong nas me 'bar kha nas khrag/ drag tu skrag cing lpags su chug/ prA m+b+ha man lam dzag pa dam pal/ gartag byed smon lam drag pa gdab// nal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yas// byang chub mchog tu sems bskrod cing // ngan dang
120b2(rnying rgyud): kun rdo ba de bzhin du// ma nor bder gshegs rigs brdung nas// dngos grub par chod byed pa'i bgegs// rnam gsum drag dal mngon spyod sgrol// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas myung du rdzol// khyed kyis nyams pa'i ga
120b3(rnying rgyud): pa 'di// phung po thul cig lus ngag rdul du rlog/ brtog byed smon lam drag po dam pa'o// stob byed smon lam drag pos gdab// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yi// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // den dam kun rdzob de bzhin du/
120b4(rnying rgyud): bder gshegs rigs bzung nas// dngos grub par chod dgra dang bgegs// rnam gsum drag dal mngon spyod sgrol// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad dam bcas myur du grol// gzas pa'i ga khrag gzugs phreng gsol// bra ga bAn badz+ra kAH
120b5(rnying rgyud): ra sarba pU dza khA hi bud+d+ha sa ma ya/ kA ya lA ka tsid+d+ha sid+d+hi hUM/ stob byed smon lam drag po dam pa'o// zhes kI la ya gseng ba'i dgongs kyang las/ sman lam drag po'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// de nas yang ka mA he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'ad
120b6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan da dzA kI la ya// drag po'i smon lam de lags na// ting 'dzin drag po mo 'tshal lam// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// del
120b7(rnying rgyud): rjes su 'jug pa rnams// ting 'dzin drag po nges bstan gyis// lha dpral ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// bdag nyid rtse ba'i thugs ka nas// dza hUM ba~M hoH'i phyag rgya bzhis// ye shes 'od zer drag po dzang // lha rnams bya nag rdos bangs bzhin
121a1(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhi dag tu 'thor bar bsam// lha dpral ting 'dzin drug bdam pa'o// de rjes rnam shes bkug bstim ting 'dzin \u0f7f// bdag nyid rtsaba'i thugs ka nus// rnga chub lta'i phyag rgya bzhes// 'od zer drug pa tsho tshar ba
121a2(rnying rgyud): gzas pa'i rnam shes mi 'tshor bkug/ chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa 'am// bye ma mar dkar thim pa bzhin// rnam shes laM ng+gar gnyis med thim par bsam// rnam shes bkug bsti ma ting 'dzin drag po dam pa'o// byang du gzhug pa'i ting 'dzin drag pa na// bdag
121a3(rnying rgyud): nyid rtsa ba'i thugs ka nas// ye shes 'od zer drug pa 'phros// dza hUM pa ho'i phyag rtsa bzhis// zangs thag phyogs thag zung du bzhugs// 'gyur mi shes pa gra gra thal// 'brug zung dkyil 'khor nang du ni// kru gu bzhin du bskongs par bsgom/
121a4(rnying rgyud): gzhug ting 'dzin drag po dam pa'o// gzir gnon sba sgo'i ting 'dzin drag po ni// bdag nyid rgya ba'i thugs ka nas// rdo chub tso'i phyag rgya bzhes// 'od zer tsha cha brdabs bzhin gzir// skyo ba sleb mtshams med pa// tha mar gyos shing lpags pa
121a5(rnying rgyud): dang // khong nas me 'bar kha nas khrag/ 'phongs nas ngan khrag 'dzag par bsgom// sgra skyo'i ting 'dzin drag po dam pa'o// gtogs byed ting 'dzin drag po ni// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i thugs ka nas// ye shes 'od zer drag po yis// dzats+tsha ba~M ho'i phyag
121a6(rnying rgyud): bzhis// pho nya tho ba can dag ni// grangs med 'od zer bcas pa byung // gzas pa'i gzugs kyi phung po ni// lus ngag rdul du song bar bsam// gtogs byed ting 'dzin drag po'o// stob byed ting 'dzin drag po ni// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i thugs ka
121a7(rnying rgyud): nas// sprul pa'i pho nya bsam mi khyab// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum de bzhin du// 'od zer sprul pa grangs med kyis// gabs pa'i dbang po bsdus pa dang // sha khrag rus 'cha' rgyu ma gzed// bsgrub pas de bzhin rol par bsam/
121b1(rnying rgyud): snong byed ting 'dzin drag po dam pa'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgangs rgyud las/ lha dpral dgrag stim ting 'dzin gyi le'u sgra sum cu gcig pa la// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal ba karma te ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das ba/
121b2(rnying rgyud): kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// lha rnams dgug bstim byed gzhug de lags na// rdzas drag sngags kyi nus mthu'i bye brag ni// so so'i nus mthu bde gshegs bstan du gsol// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom
121b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// nyon cig karma hAR+Yaka/ de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// nyung dkar rgyal po rdzas drag don// nyung dkar nang nas zur bzhi pa// phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs pa'i rtags// pa ma ga
121b4(rnying rgyud): thod pa ru/ go re tsi nam bral bar// thabs dang shes rab kha sbyar la// b+han d+ha'i spyi bo brtol la ni// de yi nang du sa bzhag lud// mi ro bsregs pa'i thal chen dang // nyung dkar sa bon gsum du sbal// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rtsa ba'i sngags// bsnyen pa
121b5(rnying rgyud): zhag bdun bzlas brjod bya// brgya mtshams stong mtshams mchod pa yis// chu lung du ni bran bzhin dbul// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las kyis// khyad par mchod pa bdud rtsi dang // phyag rgya'i mchod pa gzhung bzhin bya// 'bras bu ma smin bar du dbul// cung
121b6(rnying rgyud): dkar khyad par thob par 'gyur// hud dkar rgyal po rdzas drag 'di// gsang sngags brgya'am stong tsam du// dam bcas phras la bcangs gyur na// las dbang dag srung bzlog 'gyur cing // bar chad gyen gyis tshugs mi 'gyur// yid la dran pas smon lam
121b7(rnying rgyud): bcan// reg 'dzin byang chubs gnon cing // gang la mngags pas nus mthar 'gyur// zhes kI la ya gsang pa'i dgongs rgyud las/ phreng dkar rgyal po'i ledra ste pra ma cu gnyis pa la// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal bas/ kyi tsaman
122a1(rnying rgyud): ba kyi la sa// cung dkar dus drag da lags su// kAthal spar ba rdzas dag dgar lags// zhes gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'ad skad cas bka' thal ta// san traka sa thang rgya dang // maT
122a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis ci dri ma dang // sbrang ku'i la du na phur mo// sle ba lnga dang za 'og dang // 'bob tshad mi gtsang sna tshogs sbyar// 'brang ru g.yas kyi nang du thug/ lam po che yi bzhi mdo ru// sgra nag phub la zhag bdun du// gsang sngags bzlas shing mchod pa
122a3(rnying rgyud): 'bral// khyad bar 'phags pa'i dri 'byung ste// khri ba rnams kyis sngun byung dran// sgrub rdzas sems bskyed yid dran gyis// sras mchog pa gzi ma dngas bskyed// bdu gcong rten dang dpral bar 'gyur// rnal 'bor dmigs pa grang ba
122a4(rnying rgyud): kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ gu gul sbyar ba rdzas drag gi le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o// / de nas karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// gu gu la rdzas tra
122a5(rnying rgyud): de legs na// rak+ta'i rdzas drag ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mu la rak+ta rtsa ba'i khrag/ rdo shing rtsi thog dmar po brgya// pad+ma rakye lnga bcu dang // bskal ba'i ma hA ra ku stong // na chung mtshan dang lda
122a6(rnying rgyud): pa yi// ban+d+ha'i nang du rdzas blug la// mtshan ldan gzhan nu'i pad+mas bcad// bsnyen pa zhag bdun bar du ni// gyes pa dang ma'i rdo rje yis// dkrug cing gsang sngags rgyun du 'azlas// 'bru bcud bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul// rek+ta khol ba'i
122a7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ste// rnal 'byor rnams la rgyas btab na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// lha srin rnams kyang bran du khal// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// dngos grub sgrib la bar mi gcod// sras mchog rnams kyang de bzhin du// thugs
122b1(rnying rgyud): rjes dran gzi mdangs bskyed// gang la nus mthu mthar phyin pa'o// dbang du bsdus pa'i rdzas drag ste// gang la dmigs pa 'grags par byed// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ rak+ta rdzas drag gi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//
122b2(rnying rgyud): de nas yang karmA he ru kas bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// gre bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum po la// phyi nang maN+Dal gsum gyi don// 'di yi don rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gso
122b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// byin rlab gzhung bzhin gong nas 'byung // gzugs brtan dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bri// phur pa bcu gcig so so yi// lo
122b4(rnying rgyud): la thugs kyi snying po bri// dpal la phrin las gsang sngags bri// sngags dang ting 'dzin phrin las kyi// rdzas drag gsum gyis byin gyis brlab// so so'i gnas nas bkod pa ni// spyan drang mchod bstod gnyis med bstim// rtags dang da
122b5(rnying rgyud): grub nod pa'i phyir// 'di rnams sgrub phur dam pa yin// phur pa nyi shu gong bzhin du// logs dang dpal la snying po bri// sngags dang ting 'dzin rdzas drag gsum// byin brlab so so'i gnas su dgod// bra na dang pho nya de bzhin du// gang du
122b6(rnying rgyud): mngags par 'gro ba'i phyir// 'di rnams mngag phur dam pa yin// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// logs la badz+ra gu ya man+da thi// dpal la karma gu ya man+t+ra pri// thugs kyi sras mchog dngos la bstim// mtshan dang ldan pa'i
122b7(rnying rgyud): b+han+d+ha ru// bu gsum kha ru bzhugs su gsol// ting 'dzin sngags dang rdzas drag gsam// 'og min gnas nas spyan drang bstim// rgyun du bsnyen pa 'bral mi bya// sku gsung thugs su rtag par bsten// 'di ni bsnyen phur dag pa yin//
123a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan pa drug cigan pa cad dus// sngags du 'dun byung bag/ klung zhan zugasum mA 'a ba ga // lhag par bag pa nyams pas// na su ma 'bas ma/ 'donag nga
123a2(rnying rgyud): dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum de bzhin la// bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od zer ba sgral// sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dran te// dam pa'i tshul gyis spyan drangs nas// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gnyis med bstim// phye nang gisang
123a3(rnying rgyud): mchod bstod nas// ting 'dzin mi gtong yun du bsrings// myo ngal med na sangs rgyas yin// sngags dang smon lam mthu byin che// las dang bu brag don mi za// nges par brtsams pas ci 'dod 'grub// dngos grub rnam gnyis rdob par
123a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// sra gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'di// mkhyen par yang rgyun du blang // rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin yin// bya yi dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dam pa'i mchog/ nang gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsum ni// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// da
123a5(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi sung po nyid kyi lung // gnyis pas 'gro dan tu 'bras mtshams tshur lung // gsum pas ye shes mtshan po b+hu li lung // de rjes ye shes cog pa gzhil ba'i lung // sdang srid dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gtan lang 'ad// bdag gis ba
123a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dang // rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnam gsum spyan drangs nas// sngags dang ting 'dzin gnyis su med par bstim// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgyun du 'bul// bzlas brjod bsten pa rgyan du drang // sdang srid dkyil 'khor rnamag
123a7(rnying rgyud): yang // gtso bo'i dbyings su ye nas gcig/ so so ma yin gnyis su med// de bzhin gzhung byed rnal 'byor yin// de las ldog med sangs rgyas yin// nang gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dam pa'o// kI li ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyad las/ dngagi
123b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam gsam kyil Ta skyes ma rgyas rdzapapa// de nas kA ma te rugs/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra k+Shi la yal 'ad skad ces gsalaH// tsabacom ldan pa da kA la ya// rnal 'gyur gang zhag dngos grub gyur mad pas/
123b2(rnying rgyud): nang rtogs nub tu sku gsung thugs kyi ngan// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsu mngon ci lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// nang rtogs rngub tu/ gsung rngus
123b3(rnying rgyud): kyi don// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsum ngas bsran gyi// log par ma g.yel don la gus par nyan// dang por shes rab rnam gsum gyis// gtan tshig gtan la ma phebs par// rang bzhin med par mi shes pas// dngos po mtshan ma'i chos
123b4(rnying rgyud): nas// theg chen khro ba'i rgyal po zer// don dam zab ma rgyab tu bor// gsang sngags zab mo'i don la bon du gyer// smon pa 'ba' ba rlang dang du blangs// gti mug dbang bcan rgyu 'bras don ma rtogs// nga rgyal dbang gis rlom sems chen po bgyid/
123b5(rnying rgyud): dog dbang gis bdag bstod gzhan slong byed// 'dod chags dbang gis sras 'debs khrel 'jom med// zhe sdang dbang gis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// rgyud dang slab thabs man ngag blor ma zhan// ras chod thod rgal tshogs kyi dben byas nas//
123b6(rnying rgyud): 'dras rdzas la me yin mchod rdzas bslal ba zhes// bskal ba de la phan zhes pu dza khA he// long bas long ba khrid pas ngam thog g.yang sar lhung // nam smin klo ga bar dka' ba snying ri Te// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor de ma yin// gab tras rba
123b7(rnying rgyud): gdems ngag med pa rje// bka' rkun bka' 'khyal dkrug tsang dam mi bsrung // g.yo sgra tshul 'chos byed pas yod tshul ston// bsod nams che ba dag la khungs phyung nas// pha rol 'dren pa bslus 'debs log pa'i chos// rang la yod ches
124a1(rnying rgyud): med par srub gzhung bar la nyan// bsgrubs kyang mag 'bar don mangs pang bsregs// rgan la ma bcal ma nyid mas mi 'gyur// da ltar de bzhin na la 'byor dam yin// tshig gi theg rten dang du'i spyod pa// na
124a2(rnying rgyud): phra mo rnams la sun 'byin skur pa 'debs// snga rabs 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa yang // dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// bar du chags bsags tha mar mngon sangs rgyas// 'dab cad rjes su 'dab med mkha' la 'byor
124a3(rnying rgyud): pas// nus pa'i mthu med g.yang la ltung bar 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor de ma yin// gsang sngags theg chen nyid la rig pa'i rgyun bcad nas// theg pa 'og ma'i chos la sa zin 'thas// de la gsang ba bshad na sngar 'debs
124a4(rnying rgyud): skye// rnam smin dbang gis theg chen 'phrad mi srid// bskal pa chen por 'bad rdol sangs mi rgya// snang srid ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa la// mi rgod lta bur lcags sgeg bcug pas bsdams// rang gis rang bcings 'khor chu smin pa'i chos//
124a5(rnying rgyud): rdza be'u so ma btang bas rlan phrad 'jig pa'i nyan// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor de ma yin// theg pa 'og ma'i chos la lce sbyangs nas// lam drang rjes zhugs pa yi rnal 'byor la// sgra dang tshig gi rig pa btsud nas ni// gsang sngags zab mo
124a6(rnying rgyud): la sun phyung nas// 'bras bu rdo rje'i chos la skur pa 'debs// gsang sngags don la ma brten 'bras bu thob thabs med// bskal pa stong du rang don byal par gtong // rtsod pa'i tshig rgyal rmos sems 'bras bu med// zhabs rdol snang du thugs
124a7(rnying rgyud): kyang tshogs mi srid// tog ge ba dang mig non mkhan// gsang sngags dngos grub sgrub pa'i bar tshod yin// de ltar de bzhin rna la 'byor ngas yin// de la gsang sngags bshad na nyams chen yin// de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byong nga ma yin// na rtogs na
124b1(rnying rgyud): nadrugasung rnags dang // rdal kya can pas dang cang tub mang byas/ Tham pan lagadam chogs nyam sangs gyus/ dbang gsus rdzags pas pananas dam du dbus pas dang thal ba cang sums // rgyang nyadag 'dangasas
124b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrims de can gzhi la'is dang // 'gang rung nyid kyi pa la'a'ang // rigs phra sa pa'i tshan cid// da ma ba byed pa 'ang rdzogs// dang ga na ga dang sa pa gyi gnas// thog dung saphel la kyis ngas na
124b3(rnying rgyud): bam gnyis du gnyis padi lan/ bzhi dgral babyung 'i de sram pad// gsang nga'i phram pazhi ba nga nas dang byung banas// sra mad rgal dpa de shes kyang sa/ khra ba'i rdul ba rnam rgyal byung bzlas// g.yas na 'a'adu la tha
124b4(rnying rgyud): na thogs ma kyang chub sems// da pa par ni gas ngas// can du rjid nga byung nis// sasu par myu byung chub sems// ga nags la bas byang chubasams// marnas pa'i rnalam tud rigs ci sa//
124b5(rnying rgyud): rang byung gnas// g.yas na gtsang ma byang chub sems// g.yanan mun mthong byang chub sems// gsang ba'i rtsal phrin las rigs kyi dngas// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba rang byung gnas// g.yas na gtan da byang chub sams// g.yan na gas rig khyeng rgya
124b6(rnying rgyud): sems// mthong byed rtsa yi dang sa ma la// khams gsul nam rgyal rang byung gnas// g.yas da dpa' 'dul byang chub sems// g.yon nag sod pyod byang chub sems// thos byed rtsa yi dngas mA la// dbyug pa sngon porang byung gnas// g.yas na gang
124b7(rnying rgyud): brji dbyang chub sems// g.yon na rang jig byang chub sems// tshor byed rtsa yi dngas mal// mi g.yo mgon po rang byung gnas// g.yas na rngam 'joms byang chub sems// g.yon na mi tshar byang chub sems// myong byed rtsayi dang sa mal// tan/
125a1(rnying rgyud): 'di 'jam dpal dbyangs ldan las rgya
125a2(rnying rgyud): sug/ na/ sa/ sa/ sa/ / sa ma
125a3(rnying rgyud): sems// snying dngas pal// zhing stobs can dang byung gnas// g.yas na gtan bye byang chub sems// g.yonan nu mkhas byang chub sems// rtse chen rnams kyi dngas mni// sha mug rnaMs ba chung yin// rin chen gsor
125a4(rnying rgyud): nang // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rang byung gnas// mgo gzhug rtsab na'ajam ba lag yongs// sras mchog tshan gang grangs med kyis// 'od zer no myur chas par gtams// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rang zung gnas// ma mdag
125a5(rnying rgyud): 'dapal bzhid// lha ma ma lhang nge 'od zer bcas// gu ya 'an rnga'i sgra chen rdzogs// shel gyi bum par rin chen bcug pa bzhin// pri dang rngang me kun tu ma bsgribs par// sdang la rang bzhin med pa bzhin gyi gzugs// dzaM ltar de bzhin rtogs pa
125a6(rnying rgyud): des// bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'grangs// kun la phan pa'i rdzas ga 'ang // thams cad dbra' bing bsnyen par bye'o// gsol ba'i rjes ni ci yang rung // dang ba nga gis spangs// a dag par d+ha bcas pa las/
125a7(rnying rgyud): 'i 'khor bar bsam// 'od zeng don gnyis byang chubasams// ya / bdud rtsi gnyis meng ba stim// oM ma~M ta mi gsung rdzogs phyi// 'od klu bdud kyi chen po drar// yos pa pa ya hrI / zhes la' pa ma shes
125a8(rnying rgyud): gzung kyis// 'am ma kha rgyas kyigs lags su// bying sa dang mi shes gnyis mad med par la// btag pa'i thas sa yongs na// bden dang mnyas yang chags pa dbum// mang sa la ldan 'dung #
125b1(rnying rgyud): ga gang yongs su pa na dbyams yongs ma dkyil sa 'a thog// chos nangs mang chos kyang dzin// grags du sa dbyas ga shes// gnyis sun ngatsun pa'os// nags zugs sungs pa ga/ da dang /
125b2(rnying rgyud): pa za' mi the// del rdzog med ma g.yo len// nang rtogs chub ni sku gsung blugs// dngas grub chen po'i mtshan chan pa// la del gyi ba yin pa par// gsang thugs ting 'dzin ma g.yengs na// chu dang gdung dang 'od dang pa/ dad TI rtag /
125b3(rnying rgyud): tshan ma yang // sades rgyas rtags rnams dus su 'byung // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// gzhan yang gsal ba'i lhag ma ma// dang bsgyung sbrul gang bzhin du// sa mA nyid gsal bsgo smra'o// skyeng srid rje
125b4(rnying rgyud): nam gsum du// ting 'dzin sngags kyis rim bzhin bskyed// ye shes 'od zer bskul bas ni// dmas pa'i tshul gyis spyan drangs nas// gsang ba'i sngags kyis gnyis med bstim// bran dang po nyid bzhin du// ring rang snying pos ldan
125b5(rnying rgyud): drangs nas// bdud rtsi gtor ma dbul bar bya/ dbul ba'i gsang sngags rab brjod pas// bdud rtsi rnam gsum tshim par bsam// mthing nag gru gsums bar ba'i maN+Dal na// bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum dang // phyogs brgya gro rgya la yaT
125b6(rnying rgyud): yuma? sras mchog za byed chags// 'khor gyi dam can bran dang yonya tshogs// dam rjes bdud rtsi'i gter ma 'di 'bul bas// bar ched med cing gnod pa zhi bdung // las kyi 'bras bu bsam pa 'grub par mdzod// dngos grang rnam gnyis tshogs gnyis /
125b7(rnying rgyud): gyur cig/ bdabar gshegs so gtan du ma lags par// thugs rje 'gro don rtsa gcig mdzad par hUM// dngos gru thob par skad cig mi dmigs sam// rnal 'byor gang zhig tshe ring 'dod pa dang // nad nyung gnod pazhi zhing len chags khyer bar 'dod// phas
126a1(rnying rgyud): rgol ba tshar gcod gnod pa zhi pa dang // longs spyod 'byor pa 'phel zhing bsam pa 'grub pa dang // bar chad med par dngos grub rnam gnyis thob// le lo med par brtson pas tshogs gnyis rdzogs par 'gyur// zhi rgyas dbang dang
126a2(rnying rgyud): mngon spyod dang // dgra bgegs bskrad dang dgug pa dang // de ltar de bzhin rnal 'byor des// thogs pa med par thams cad 'grub// kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gyi le'u ste sum cu drug
126a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra nI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya/ baphrul ba las kyi gsang sngags la// yon tan nyi shu gcig rdzogs pa// de yi don rnams ji ltar lags
126a4(rnying rgyud): de 'ur gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol/ zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma ha ruka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi gsang don ngas bstan gyi// badz+ra bu ya man+da la//
126a5(rnying rgyud): ti ma// karma g+hu ya maN+Da s+phar// gsum pa mngon spyod mar dgug/ 'gugs byed man ga klong du sbyar// 'gugs pa dag kyang thog pa med// badz+ra b+hu ya man+t+ra la// tseta sa ma d+hA ra ya// kam gu ya man+ta sbar// dngas ma gnas kyi d+hA ra ya// badz+ra s+t+rai ya maN+Da
126a6(rnying rgyud): ta su kor d+ha ra ya// karma gu ya man+da la// dbugs kyi dngas ma d+ha ra ya/ badz+ra b+hA ya man+dA la// girti wi ti d+ha ra ya// karma gu ya man+dA sbyar// 'od kyi dbus me d+ha ra ya// badz+ra b+hu ya man+dA la// ku sA la hiM d+ha ra ya// karma gu ya man+ta s+yar// khrag gi dngo sa ma d+ha ra
126a7(rnying rgyud): 'dza la man+t+ra la// ku li/ bdad d+ha ra yaM// kaurma d+ha ya man+t+ra sbyar// drod kyi dang sa mad+hang ye// badz+ra b+ha ya man+t+ra la// swa ri ku ta shad+ha da ya~M// karba g+hA la mad+hA sbyar// 'byung ba'i dngas ma d+hir ya// badz+re b+hu ya maN+Dal// lo ma ru hi d+hi ra pa// ka r+Na d+hu ya man+t+rad+har/
126b1(rnying rgyud): dbang du srud pa d+ha ra ya// badz+ra gu h+ya man+t+ra la// sa 'brur shi d+ha ra ya// karma gu h+ya man+dA byar// dgug pa ma 'char d+ha ra ya// badz+ra g+hA ya man+ta la// ka ba la d+hA ra ya// ku ma thu ya man+ta sbyar// dbang po 'dra rtan d+ha ra ya// badz+ra gu N+ya man+t+ral// gurba Te but+ta ra ya/
126b2(rnying rgyud): karma gu h+ya man+ta sbyar// bskyed par byed pa d+ha ra ya// badz+ra gu ya man+t+ra la// karma gu ya men+da s+yar// bskyed pa byed dang rten 'brel d+ha ra ya/ badz+ra gu ya man+ta la// u pa ti ko d+ha ra ya// karma gu ya man+ta s+yar// 'khor ba rtsad gcod d+ha ra ya// badz+ra d+ha yaM mdza /
126b3(rnying rgyud): rtan 'brel karme g+hu ya man+tha yis// lha dpral dag gi klong dang sbyar// badz+ra b+hU ya ma T+Ta la// karma 'bebs pa'i gu ya man+ta yis// dgug bstim dag gi klong dang sbyar// badz+ra g+hu ya man+ta la// karma byad gzhug gu ya man+ta yis// bcing ba dag gi kong dang phyir//
126b4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra g+hu ya man+ta la// karma sgra skyo gu ya man+tha yis// sma smyo dag ni klong dang sbyar// badz+ra b+hu ya man+ta la// karma gtogs byad g+hu ya man+tha yis// gtogs byed drag po klong dang sbyar// badz+ra g+h+ra ya maT+Ta la// stob byed karma g+na ya man+tha yis// stob byed drag
126b5(rnying rgyud): po'i klong dang sbyar// badz+ra gu h+ya man+t+ra la/ b+hi ha ra d+ha tse pra li hi te/ karma d+ha d+he he tsun d+ha hi/ karma g+hu ya man+ta sarba mA ra ya/ wi hi wi hI li/ de dge slong du sbyar ba yis/ zhag bdun zhag bdun khri hi li wi hi li/ klong drug de ltar gdon mi ze/ ka pa la g+hu ya man+tha
126b6(rnying rgyud): yis/ tsi d+ha du hi de la tri hUM/ dun tri ta tri mA ra ya/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gdon mi za/ badz+re g+hA ya man+dA la/ karma b+hU ya marta/ 'du hi ri ta 'bu hi ri ta/ gzhan gyi rig pa sbyor ba tshur phrog pa/ zhag gsum dag na gdon mi za/ badz+ra gu ya maN+Da
126b7(rnying rgyud): karma gu ya man+t+ra 'ba' hu laM d+hI ma pa hu la tri ma/ gu ya man+t+ra stong gis ni/ tri d+hi la ma tri hri lam/ mA re ya sreg par 'gyur ro// badz+ra g+hu ya maN+Dal/ karma gu ya man+da la ma lu hri ni ti hUM hUM/ nyi shu rtsa gcig ma nA yi sa/ b+he ta hri d+hi ta ri/ gyis
127a1(rnying rgyud): tsargyad gargyu dag dumapa/ \u0f7f/ bdugags/ kas thams gas/ na susam ba dubs pa dang rgyub/ baTas sa/ ngag/ mad blan 'thag rgya d+hA than/ dam lamadu sa blangs
127a2(rnying rgyud): s+t+waM sa mA ya/ kam g+hA ya mar+tha/ oM paM d+ha bi d+ha ra yA/ hU~M le badz+ra ma ti dza/ swAm b+hanan/ rangs par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ mo hA D+ha ya mA ra t+ye d+hA ra ye/ myur bar sbyar ba'o// b+ha ga wAn bri ma ma/ myur bar bka' ba ma tha'/
127a3(rnying rgyud): NA kri shi hi yung ba/ shrI badz+ra hU~M kA ra/ phur pa 'du wi ra d+hi 'du li ri d+ha/ de la sems n+dan thams cad kyi tshe ni srog yin/ srog gi dbang po ni dngas ma yi ni/ dngas ma ni dbugs so/ dbugs ni gnad bdun no// de ni gzhi'o// de rnams
127a4(rnying rgyud): rtani dbugs so// dbugs kyi rteni khrag yin/ khrag gi rtani ci'o// rtsa thams cad kyi gzhi ni snying ngo // snying gi snying po dadra ma bdun no// gu ya man+ta badz+ra karma man+ta b+ha turta ya de he/ gu h+ya man tsho yi dang sa ma d+ha ra ya/ gra ya man+ta srog ga dang+ga ma d+hA ra ya/ gu ya ma
127a5(rnying rgyud): dbugs kyi dang sa ma d+ha ra ya/ gu ya maN+Da 'od kyi dang sa ma d+ha ra ya/ bu ya man+ta khrag gi dngas maN+Da ra ya/ gu ya man+tan+da yi dngas ma d+ha ra ya g+hu/ mena? 'byung ba'i dngas ma d+ha ra ya/ badz+ra b+ha ye man+da la// karba b+hu ya maN+Da sbyar// gsang sngags yon tan nyi shu ga cin
127a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pas// dngas ma bdun la sbyor ba mes// zhag gsum dag gis gzes pa 'dig/ ka btsas lus ngag yid tre d+ha ra ya// sas ni d+hA ra ya/ nas nId+hA ra ya/ sras ni t+tar ya/ mar gyi sa ni d+ha ra ya/ ngas rba~M sa rdar ya/ sbyar ba gsum gyi d+ha ra ya//
127a7(rnying rgyud): yi ge bcu drug gis// dzA wa ri wi ti li/ zhag bdun gyis ni d+ha ra ya// sgra yi yi ge dgu dag gis// don gsum duni shes par bya// sgra yi yi ge bcu gcig gis// mnan phur gyis ni d+ha ra ya// bcu drug dag gis ni/ badz+ra lak+sha kr-i ta ShA ti ni n+ya ya/ dz+wa la ra
127b1(rnying rgyud): pa/ ba ga ga gi / srag chugs nas gas gra kya dadu gags nas ga gos 'bang gyur pa/ gzhung sa/ gdang sas thams dang dang / la gas 'a da/
127b2(rnying rgyud): spyad las/ bsgral ba las kyi gsang sngags kyi le 'u gyi sum cu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang kau drags/ bcoM ma ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan pa ki le pa// drin las gsang sngags de la gsun/
127b3(rnying rgyud): mai ma d+hA/ gis rba tra bsreg pa ji ltar lags/ lung brtan du gsol zhes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'dug pa la// de yi dan rnams ngas bshad kyi// stong bsnam ye shes gzhal yas khang //
127b4(rnying rgyud): dpung dbyings nas bzhengs// maM yi snying po chu dang drug rgyar gsal// dkyil 'khar rnam gsum me sku dmar po la// me zhal dmar po chos nyid chen por bajal// mo so dmar po 'i me thun tshogs la gtsigs// me mag dmar po rdul gyi cha dang mnyam// me lAg
127b5(rnying rgyud): dmar po nam mkha' khyab pa la// me phur dmar po srid pa gsum la 'debs// me zhal dmar po stong gsum khyab pa la// me dpung 'bar bas 'khor ba dbyings su bsreg/ mi skad 'bar ba 'ur 'ung chems chems srog/ thams cad ma lus ye shes 'i
127b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba la// lus dgra yid gsus bab chags bsgeg/ rdo rjes yi sa ni dkar nag 'bar// zhe sdang 'khor ba'i sha rus bsreg par byud // rdo rnga chu yi ma ni sde dag 'bar// nga rgyal 'khor ba'i khrag ni dz+wa la ra// rdo rjem yi ma ni dmar dag
127b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar// 'dod chags 'khor ba'i drod ni dz+wal ri// rdo rje rlung gi sa ni ldeng nag 'bar// phrag dag 'khor ba'i dbugs ni dz+wa la re// rdo rje nam mkha'i ma ni mthing nag 'bar// gti mug 'khor ba'i yid ni dz+wa la raM// ye shes klong yangs ta ma khung du
128a1(rnying rgyud): thags 'bar ba'i mthA na// ngas samams shing thun la// mtshan ma med du ca nas// dbang bam na sum bcus pagatus/ dag dag dkrug pa tisaH// nga dad ba po thong // drang
128a2(rnying rgyud): dgongs don gsum dang sbyar// dngos grub bar du gtsang ba'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams// bka' las 'gal byed sdig can 'di// rdo rje med pa la snying bsreg nas// lus dag rdul phran bzhin du grogs// bcu drug dang ning
128a3(rnying rgyud): la nI// drag pa'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya// bsod nams chags su bsreg pa dang // bstan pa gnyen po 'jig pa bsreg/ ces kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ drag pa hom na gra dz+wa rje rnam gsum gyis bsreg pa'i le rtses sa ma
128a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan pa dzA kI la ya// drag po hom nag bsreg pa de lags na// tsam gyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// zhes gsol ba dang /
128a5(rnying rgyud): cig ka rata b+hakA/ sgros gyi dkyil gakhor bu bzhil// chom lngal thag brtsegs ma brtsigs// su bzhi sring las byas pa'i la// cha dang dbang bar rgyas pa'i ster// b+hag sum gyi mkha' la brtsigs// drum po phreng chen pa'ijom// dang
128a6(rnying rgyud): bgegs ma lus zhi ba'i phyir// mthus thig le chen par brtsigs// rtswa gas dmar po dbang gi tam// da zla bgegs dang byung sdu 'i phyir// stong gtum phun gyi mkha' la brtsegs// sku gsum ma'i na ga cig do'i hor/ 6/ dgra bgegs
128a7(rnying rgyud): drug gsum bsreg pa'i phyir// du rjid can pa'i glang du bcigs// rmar rdzar 'bar ba'i nam// dgra bgegs ma lus bsreg ri byar// dkyi 'khor yin bribar \u0f7f// tshor ma can gyi shing rnams dang // drug shing gdug pa can rnams dang /
128b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i shag pa bzla gsum la// maHla nam gsum gsang sngags la// d+hi ni bar du bcug la ni// mo ha b+hA ya bri bar bya// sngags thag gis ni bsdams la ni// gru gsum nang du bzhugs su gsol// bcu drug nI dang bcas pa
128b2(rnying rgyud): yis// brgya dang stong du sreg phyir bshams// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ drag po hom nag gi le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru kas/ badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol
128b3(rnying rgyud): to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kA la ya/ rdeg pa homanag dkyil 'khar de lags na/ srog rngus bcu drug gis bsreg pa paM// de yi na ni ji ltar lags/ lung bstan du gsal// zhes gsol ba dang / 'di skad ces bka'
128b4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// b+ha yi s+tha ni b+hi sha sta// mi sha khye shar dang rta// nr-i dang gnyis su bsreg pa ni// mod la srog ni phrog par gyur// he ni te che'i tshe la dang rkang // mi khyi rta stang glang dred tshil// rbang
128b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis su bsreg pas ni// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlab sangs rgyas mthus// a b+hi tsAr+ya'i gnag pa 'di kho na// rtsa ba kha skong mi stong par// skor choms dkyus su man ngag sdebs// bde gshegs thugs dam skong ba dang // rnal 'byor dngos grub thob
128b6(rnying rgyud): dang // dgra bgegs gag pas mod la 'chi// nr-i dang thal ba spags nas ni// chu bdag dag la gtad na ni// mdze rims ngag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje mi dpal snying bsreg nas// lus rag rdul phran bzhin du zlog/ ra ni ram chen po ste// mi khur sbyar
128b7(rnying rgyud): 'phar baspre'u// chen po gsum ni rab mchog ste// nr-i dang spags te bsreg nas ni// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya// khrag nad gzer nang dag gis 'chi'o// te ne ti la'i mar khu ste// gang gi rkang mar 'bru mar dang // tsha mar ni dang sbagla la bsreg/ de ltar nge
129a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin rjes su'o// cha ba'i rims kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// rgyan gyim nyung ma dang // nyung dkar nyung nag tsutsha tA la// rba dang sngag+sa te bsreg la ni// des de bzhin rjes su rgya'o// ting na gas nas 'chi bar 'gyur// rngan pa ga
129a2(rnying rgyud): yin te// ra drag sbyang drug dragazong drug/ bse no dang ni sbags la ba zag/ lugs nas 'chi bdag tu 'gyur// le ni l-i/ ji mtshal rnams te// tri dang wakral bsreg pa ni// de ltar de bzhin rjes su ste// skye ba'i rgya myong 'chang bar 'gyur//
129a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rdzi dbul zhing bsreg pas ni// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// kan ni kan rje chen po zhes bya ste// nr-i dang lpags te 'asreg pas ni// lus bsreg gti mugasangs nas su// sku yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de skang de bzhin
129a4(rnying rgyud): gtal ni gtang gtur gtang ma ste// dmadzas tshangs pa'i gtor ma la~M// yo mchong ba'i bye brag rdzogs// 'asreg pas sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// de ltar de bzhin rjes su \u0f7f// zhe ni ga bzangs kyi ste// ni dang lpags te bsreg pa me// dgang zag 'a
129a5(rnying rgyud): mas pa nas ni// gsung gi dngos gru zab par 'gyur// de ltar de bzhing rjes su bya'o// btsun ni btsun cha lcags kyi ste// nr-i dang sbags te bsreg pas ni// yid dang cha grang bsregs ngas nas// thugs kyi dngas srab zab par 'gyur
129a6(rnying rgyud): d+hA na rta la gu gul te// bdun 'bumathun pa'i bzlas nyung dang // nr-i dang swag+h+ra te bsreg pas ni// dkri g-ig tan dang bral bar 'gyur// de ltar de bzhin rjes su rtsa'o// b+hi ni ti shog pa zhes bya// rta d+ha ra yi 'bras dri dang // lug mig pa mi me rta ga dang /
129a7(rnying rgyud): dz+ra dang lpa ga nas bsreg par // skyo dang brgyal dang 'bog nas 'chi// ka ni ka pA la zhes bya// ka rA la ye rjod dag tu// ka ni phrin las chen po nye// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las g.yul// brtul zhugs bskyed de phrin las bya// de lta rang bzhin
129b1(rnying rgyud): rjes su bya// klong drug de ltar gdon miza// zhag bdun tsam gyis skr-i ti li// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs spyad las/ bsreg rdzas bcu drug gis dri bsreg pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas yang kam ha ru kas/ badz+ra kI la yal 'a
129b2(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// sgra ni yi ge dgu dag la// don gsum 'grol ba ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// ka ni in las chen po ste/
129b3(rnying rgyud): snying po dag tu bshad// dza ni 'dzin cing 'gugs par byed// gsung gi steng pa dag tu bshad// a ni 'debs par byed pa yin// thugs kyi snying po dag tu bshad// mAr bsad pa drag po'i sngags// dr-i ni rgol bar byed pa'o// sa ni nus pa'i/
129b4(rnying rgyud): mthu dbrog sras mchog snying po yin// da ni chags pa dbang du spyad// dbang gi sras mchog snying po yin// pra ni gzing zhing sdig pa ste// bsdigs pa'i sras mchog snying po yin// mar ni slar yang mi ldang ste// zil gnan sras mchog snyi
129b5(rnying rgyud): ni mngag pa'i phrin las te// dgrag pa'i sras mchog snying pa yin// spyod kyi drug dang slad kyi dgu// dgug bstim bsreg dang 'phar ba'o// drug dang dgu dang bcu gcig dang // yon tan nyi shu gcig las sogs// kha rkang ba dang bskang me dgas/
129b6(rnying rgyud): snying pa nyi shu gcig gis ni// 'dod pa'i bya ba don sgrub pa'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ sma'i yi ge'i don dgrol ba'i le'u sde bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang kam he rmugs/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra k+Sha
129b7(rnying rgyud): yal 'di skad ces gsol to// drag pa ho ma nag de lags na// bor gyi phrin las ji ltar lags// zhes gsol nas/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// drag po zor gyi dkyil 'khor la// thig dang chag chag gzhung bzhin gyi/
130a1(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i maN+Dal gzhung bzhin gyi// mthing nag zla gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan dpal can rdo nga gzhan na la// sprul ba'o/ ba rnams byung ba// dam chog can pa'i dus la brub// sprul ba man pa'i dus la
130a2(rnying rgyud): bab// phyag pa rnyan chen mo'i dus la bab// khro bo bcu yi phyag brtan te// mon mo 'di ltar ya mtshan can// mon mo'i lus la phra thabs mgo// g.yas pa thabs kyi phyag mtshan la// g.yon pa zor gyi mda' 'phon mo// phur bu'i zer 'dzin krol
130a3(rnying rgyud): lo// nyud mo'i zor 'phen si li li// mtshon zor mang po zangs se zang // dugazor mang po thibs se thib// nad khrag khrag zor tshi li li// khrag zor chen po dgra la ya// gnag pa'i khong du dug mda' spyos// khro bo bcu yi phyag
130a4(rnying rgyud): brnyan te// mon mo 'di ltar ya mtshan can// mon mo'i lus la phra men mgo// g.yas pa rtags kyi phyag mtshan la// g.yon na zor gyi mda' 'phen ma// de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya'o// dam tshig drug gi dus la bab// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs//
130a5(rnying rgyud): chad ji ltar dam bcas pa// khyed kyi thug dam dus la bab// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// dam can gnad la phab la bskul// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // de ltar de bzhin rjes su bya// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// de ltar de yi rjes su bya//
130a6(rnying rgyud): slad kyi stong dang slad kyi slad// slad kyi smad kyi dang po dang // smad kyi stod kyi dang po'i slad// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi sbyor kha'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ drag pa zod kyi las kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas yang karba he
130a7(rnying rgyud): kas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// drag po zor gyi phrin las de lags na// drag po zor gyi drag sngags gang // zhes gsol pa dang / rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// ka ni mu yi snying po yin// ga
130b1(rnying rgyud): grol ba dag sngags pas// na gsung gi nga baH// ngaganam la bu 'drag sngags can// yan thugs kyi stong badzin// yid na thul ba'i das pags yig/ sa ni zugatugs pa// shAn ma mi drug grags da// na bya// bdug pa 'on
130b2(rnying rgyud): sngags yin// sa ni bdud kyi bu mo yin// ni ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// rwa ni btsan gyi bu mo yin// ni ri sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// pra ni gza' yi bu mo yin// ni ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// mar ni klu yi bu mo yin// ni ni grol ba'i drag sngags
130b3(rnying rgyud): yin// rnga ni ming po dag yin te// ni ni tshul ba'i drag sngags yin// smad kyi stod kyi drag sngags dang // stod kyi bar gyi drag sngags dang // sgra yi yi ge dgu dag dang // dgra yi yi ge bcu gcig gis// bstsal ba las kyi gsang sngags sbyar// phur pa por gyi dag
130b4(rnying rgyud): sngags so// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ drag po zor gyi drag sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang kam he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la gsol ba// drag po zor gyi drag sngags de lags na// drag po zor
130b5(rnying rgyud): rdza rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gsol ba dang / rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// hung dkar nyung nag ske tshe mtsha// gtan po'i khrag thun zor dgal// mche ba can dang mchu gug khrag/ thun tu tha bste thor 'phangs na// khrag gzo
130b6(rnying rgyud): nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe mtshe// mdze bo'i khrag thun zor 'phangs na// mdze rims nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// nyung dkar la sogs mir khyi// sna tshogs dug dang khrag thun gyis// khyim ma ma yul phyogs zor 'phangs na// myol da
130b7(rnying rgyud): grangs dang lugs nas 'chi// nyung dkar la sogs mir khyi// d+ha dur dang lug mig dang // sna tshogs dug dang khrag thun gyis// khyim ma ma yul phyogs zor 'phangs na// skyo 'bog brgyal nad 'chi bar 'gyur// 'brum nag nad kyis shi ba'i khrag/ nyung dkar

131a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa na

131a4(rnying rgyud): na sa na sa sa

131a7(rnying rgyud): sang gi
131b1(rnying rgyud): dang // slad kyi stod kyi bar gyi gu ya mthun// drug po dag na btu b.raH// slad kyi snod kyi ka maman+ta ye// bcwo brgyad dag gis byin gyis brlabs// kha skong ba dang kha mi bskang // man ngag gis ni btu bar bya// stod kyi slad kyi bar gyi mtha' btul bya/
131b2(rnying rgyud): zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs chud las// mngon du rab rgya rtsa brgyad kyi gdang pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcwa lnga pa'o// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ brtsartse bcing gdab pa de lags na/ rtsabacad
131b3(rnying rgyud): sa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol bas/ de yi don nams ngas bshad kyi// mnan pa rtsa brgyad btab pa de// gnyen pa'i thod chen dag tu ni// mnan phu rabargya ni rtsa brgyad kyis// sbyor ba gsum gyi gu ya man+t+ra yis// chu yi mig tu mnan nas ni//
131b4(rnying rgyud): padu tshud mdze rims kyis// rtsa gcig bdun gyis the tshol med// phames thod chen dag tu ni// mnan phur ba tsun rtsa bzung kyis// su ya man+da sbyor ba gsum// chu yi mig tu mnanan ni// gnag pa du tshad mdze rims kyis// rtsa gcig bdun gyis the tshom
131b5(rnying rgyud): rabs chad ge na lcags thod pa ru// mnan phu rab rgyani rtsa brgyad kyis// gu ya man+ta kyor ba gsum// chu yi mig gi rgya mtsho'i gting // mnan par du chung bdun rgyad chad // rtsa gcig bdun gyis the tshom med// gshed po'i thong pa dag tu ni// mnan phu baH
131b6(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyis// gu la man+t+ra s+yor ba gsum// drud kyi dkyil du mnan na ni// mnan pa du tshud bdun rgyad chad// rtsa gcig bdun gyis the tshom med// gnyen po'i thod pa dag tu ni// mnan bur sbyor ba gsum gyis gdab// mnan pa mtshor gyi 'og tu mnan// rdzas phur
131b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung zhing 'chi bar 'gyur// shi mthog gi mdze can gyi// ya mkhal ma mkhal ma thul ba// kha yi nang du gnag pa la// sbyor ba gsum gyis them par gzhug/ de ltar de bzhin rjes byas nas// rtsig mang nang du bcug mnanan// sbas phung chen po rgyang nas
132a1(rnying rgyud): 'chi// po rog thug pa'i thod pa ru// mnan phrar rnams la de bzhin du// gang choms rnams kyi maN+Dal// gnag pa'i them yig bcug la ni// mnan pa'i gnas su bcug pas ni// rtsis kyi rigs pa rgyan bcad nas// da ra?
132a2(rnying rgyud): yang thob nas ni// gnag pa'i sngags pa 'chi bar 'gyur// mdze can thod pa'i nang du ni// sbrul gyi pags pa thod pa la// skor tshoms rnams kyi man+t+ra la// gnag pa'i the ma yig bcug nas ni// gnan phur de ltar de bzhin du// klu btsan gnas pang gnad
132a3(rnying rgyud): na
132a4(rnying rgyud): gnag pa'i btsun pa bdun chad 'gyur// seng ge dag gi thod pa ru// gnan phur rnams kyang de bzhin du// skor tshoms rnams kyi man+ta la// rgyal po gnag pa them yig gzhug/ gsang bdud g.ya' bdud sar mnan na// rgyal po'i chad pa bzlog gyur nas// rtsa
132a5(rnying rgyud): po'i lus kyang 'jig par 'gyur// sbyang ki gcan gyi thod pa ru// gnag phur rnams kyang de bzhin du// skor tshoms gsum gyi man+t+ra yis// blon po gnag pa them par gzhug/ lha khang mchod rten dur dkyil du// gnag pa'i blon po 'chi bar 'gyur// byi la 'pharab
132a6(rnying rgyud): yi thod pa ru// mnan bur de ltar de bzhin du// skor tshoms rnams kyi man+ta la// skyes pa gnag pa'i the ma yig gzhug/ mngo nan mgo lpags gril la ni// chu bdag dag la gtad byas na// skyes pa'i lus kyang mod la 'jig/ dre'u dang khyi yi zod pa ru// bAn
132a7(rnying rgyud): phur de ltar de bzhin du// skor tshoms rnams kyi man+t+ra yis// rje'u rigs gnag pa the ma yig gzhug/ khyi lpags mi lpags gril nas ni// klu bdud klu btsan sar gnan na// de yi lus rdzings 'chi bar 'gyur// grum pa khyi nag mi yi thod pa ru// gnan phur de
132b1(rnying rgyud): tAr da bzhin du// skang tshams rnams kyi man+tal// dud med ga nag bzem yig gzhug/ sa bdag gnas pa'i sang mnanan// zhagam skad rdzings 'chi bar 'gyur// bla bang ma dzang brda// gnan bung da ltar de bzhin du// ga tshams rnams kyis mardzal/
132b2(rnying rgyud): gyis pa gnag pa them yig gzhug/ klu sri ni gnas pa'i sar mnan na// gnag pa'i byis pa'i sreg 'phrog 'gyur// srin bya sreg pa'i thod paru// gnan phur de ltar de bzhin du// skor choms rnams kyi maN+Da la// phra ma gnag pa'i je ma yig gzhung
132b3(rnying rgyud): mdze can thod par bcug la ni// mdze can pags pas thil nas ni// rgya mtsho'i gting ngam chu mig tu// nag po klu la gtad byas nas// kha 'thams lce ljobs rjengs nad kyis// gnag pa'i phra ma mdze nad kyis// myur ba nga chi bathe tshom med// stong
132b4(rnying rgyud): skor tshoms dang // slad kyi dkyus kyi skor tshoms la// de la gsum gsum dbye ba yi// ting 'dzin sngags dang phrin las kyi// sgra yaM yi ge btu bar bya// gdab dang bsreg dang 'phang dang gnan// gdams ngag gla na btus nas ni// pra yis bad cing
132b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang // sgra yis gdab dang bsreg pa dang // skra yis 'phangs shing mnan pa dang // dgongs parlabs chen 'khrug pa dang // phrin las zab mo theg parjes dang // blta ba zab mo khyab gdal dang // bsgom pa'i khog dang dgongs pa'i don// don ni so sang phye
132b6(rnying rgyud): sgrub// khabaskyang ba dang snod mi dgos// kha bskang sgrub thab bcu bzhi pa// re re la yang tha dad ste// de yis 'dod pa'i byab sgrub// swa yi yi ge'i nang nas ni// bskang mi dgos pa'i bya ba sgrub// 'dod pa'i byab zab mo yin// rdob gnyis las zhus nas
132b7(rnying rgyud): ni// thong pa la sogs shing bar bya// de yi nang du rdzas rnams gzhug/ thod chen la sogs the ma tshig bri// rdo ba dag la them yig bri// sbyor ba rnam gsum thim par gzhug/ sku stegs mtshal chen sbyang la ni// rdo la gzugs ni sbal bar bya// rdul pa
133a1(rnying rgyud): pa // sgru/ / na/ / // //
133a2(rnying rgyud): gsum// blon lam drag pos gdabapar shA// gnag pa'i gabs pacu rgyad po// de rnams par med zas thog dang/ de pa pani spyad pa dang // nal byor yongs kyi byed ga dang // degan mchog bden pa 'jog pa dang // ci gnyims pa brje pad
133a3(rnying rgyud): mas bsgral ni bstan pa gnyas// bas byung brdung ba sdud na chags sa 'gyur// than cigs tsam la badrang ba skad gyur // / rang ga zlog zung dumyal bar ste// zhes kyil lugs pa'i dgongs rgyud las/ sang bcad kyi 'a'u bag cwa drug par/
133a4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// mnan phur brgyani rtsa brgyad de lags na// dbus ni slad kyi spyod dang ni// srad kyi slang dang skor choms su// gad btsong mnan pa de lags na// dkyus ni dbu zhabs dag tu ni// gad
133a5(rnying rgyud): medad pa ltar lags// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa'o// dri mdon namasangs bshad kyi// zur ba bdun myor ngal// gu lam n+ta grang sa ni thim pa dang // don thos pags sogs pas//
133a6(rnying rgyud): mgasang na chen pol// snying gig dus sgom par bya// de ltar de bzhin de rjes la// nying rjes bskal ba'i dmatshig ni// dmigs rung ba dngas gtims// lus ngag ying gsum phung po la// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer brkom// zhes sI la yagasang pa'i dgongs spyad pa/
133a7(rnying rgyud): dkyus dbu zhabs kyis phung po ma gzhabs su mnan phur gdab pa'i le'u ge bzhi cu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// phung po mag gzhug mnan phur btab pa de legs

133b3(rnying rgyud): sa// ba cag tsun dag gi ni// ga d+hA man pa nos// dbog ga sheng ba yis// sag men pazhan// tshog sas gsus rnam rgyal gyis// t+ya mragang ga nga nan nas/ m-ig sa mnan pa hA/
133b4(rnying rgyud): gang dan s+ho/ nyis m+b+hi ne// grag she gdi man nas/ nyig kyims// rji rdzig la ga ba zhem 'ad rje labasapa// dug la ga basbyin pazhom/ rjeg sa rkyen dag ga /

134a4(rnying rgyud): spyod kyi byed kyang byas tshig bab ma dang bra gnyis// smang kyi smad kyang kyus tshig mthar gnas gni// stod kyi skor choms gsum gsum dag pa// gsang sngags bcu gcig de la// sbyor choms lnga yigasang sngags la// mtshan ma'i ming du babs pan//
