134a6(rnying rgyud): gnasung // rangal yang bzhi pazhing thal// thang kyi zin las dbazhin man dag spyad// stod kyi stong gsum gas sngags sam ma// drug dang nyi shu gcig rdzogs thor// de ltar de bzhin pa na dag gyur// grags kyi gsang sngags su gsung thugs/
134a7(rnying rgyud): nigs sngags dril ba med// de ra ra bzhin gdams pan// sman gyi spyod khyim pa gan mtshan ldan// dang thugs kyis ngan ngo // byams gsul bsgral ba kyang sems mtshad pa dang // dam gsu ma rdzogs pa'i tsha gas byang sems na/
134b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa thugs kyi sa bon ni// gsang rgyud rdzogs rgyud byang sems rin po che// gsum pa thugs kyis bon ni// sku mchog rgyun gyi ting 'dzin byang chub sems// las kyi mtha' brtul dgug cing gdab// mnan pa rtsa brgyad gdams ngag sbyar// de ltar de bzhin thong
134b2(rnying rgyud): la rgyar// b+ha her te tse la sogs rdo rje me dpal snying bsreg go// slad kyi yi ge drug dang dgu// stod kyi yi ge drug pa dang // sbyor ba gsum gyi man+da yis// don gsum lnga ru gzhug par bya// smad kyi stod kyi yi ge drug/ kar ma'i yi ge rgyun du drang // zhe sa kI la ya
134b3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ dkyus dbu zhabs su gdab pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyo bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// dkyus ni dbu zhabs 'debs pa
134b4(rnying rgyud): lags na// dkyus ni dbu zhabs gdab mnan zhe sdang rgya// 'bras bu dmyal bar skye ba mi 'gal lam// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas
134b5(rnying rgyud): bshad kyi// mdzod spyad thams cad dngos po med pa'i lung // rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// rug sdod rtsad nas gcod pa// mtshon chen chen po 'bar ba yis// snang srid lus ngag yid gsum rtog pa la// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshon chan sngon po 'bar ba yis// rnamam
134b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil nas thigs pa shar// nam mkha' gtir mtha' med pa chos dbyings bzhal yas khang // thigs pa lta bur sdang srid dngos med shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang // srid pa'i lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// sems rig phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ye nas yin par
134b7(rnying rgyud): shar// snying gi dkyil du bsgom par bya'o// srid pa'i rtog tshogs phung po ni// lung ni gsum brgyad rdo rje bsgo me// srid pa'i lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs su bskal// 'dod chags zhe rdza rgyas nas gsang gnan ma yin na// phung po rdo rje gtams byas
135a1(rnying rgyud): nas// sred pa'i lus ngag yid gsum byung po ni// yenas rdorje'i thugs ni yang dag gtams// rnam par shes pa rdong bsgom// bdag dang sbrang sring rnam par shes pa'i tshags// yanas 'dus ma byas pa na rje dbyung med paspong/
135a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas mdzad spyod ma 'gags dbyings dang ye shes nyid// blta ba zab mo khyab gdal nam mkha' ltar// dgongs pa zab mo bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrugs// phrin las zab mo thog brdzis klong phab nas// mtsho la rlab byung chu yi ngo bor gcig/ blta spyod brlang po
135a3(rnying rgyud): spyad na tshogs su 'gyur// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ mdzad spyod dngos med kyi lung gi le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan pa dza sde la
135a4(rnying rgyud): gtso bo mdzad spyod dngos med lung gi le'u de lags na// phyogs bcu khro bo'i mdzad spyod dngos med ji ltar lags// zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bshad kyi// ku rjes
135a5(rnying rgyud): gdug pa ti ra ba ma// gtso bo badz+ra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i phrin las chags pa ma btang bas// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// ha nas In+d+ra gdug pa ti ra ba ma// gtso bo badz+ra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i 'khor ba bag chags rnam par rgyal/ sre gdug
135a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// da ha sa gdug pa ab+hi ti bam// gtso bo badz+ra dz+nyAn yis// gdug pa'i 'khor babag chags dbyug pas 'joms// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// btsas gdug pa ya ma ti rab ma/
135a7(rnying rgyud): gtso bo badz+ra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa 'khor ba'i bag chags gshin rje gshed// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// ban d+has gdug pa ni dr-i tir ba ma// gtso bo badz+ra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i 'khor ba bag chags mi g.yo mgon// dbyings dang ye shes
135b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis med byang chub sems// hu lus gdug pa ba du ting ba ma// gtso bo badz+ra dz+nyAn yis// gdug pa'i bag chags myur drag 'joms// rengs pa'i rta mchog phrin las bzhi// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// tiSh+Tha sa gdug pa ba ya ti ra ba
135b2(rnying rgyud): dz+nyAn yis// gdug pa'i bag chags par gcod gzhan mi thub// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// ha nas gdug pa ku be ti rab ma// gtso bo badz+ra dz+nyAn yis// gdug pa'i bag chag ye shes bdud rtsi 'bye'// dbyings da
135b3(rnying rgyud): shes gnyis med byang chub sems// ts+tshin+das gdug pa in+d+ra ti rab ma// gtso bo badz+ra dz+nyA na yis// gdug pa'i bag chags khams gsum rnam par rgyal// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// sngo rus gdug pa u ti ti ra ba ma// hA
135b4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra dz+nyAn yis// gdug pa'i bag chags gnas stobs stobs po che// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med byang chub sems// gtso bo badz+ra dz+nyAn yis// mu kha he yi rtags dang don// byang sems lus dang yan lag tshul// srid pa ye nas sku gsung thugs//
135b5(rnying rgyud): zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgo rgyud las/ phyogs bcu khro bo mdzad spyod dngos med kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kA la ya/
135b6(rnying rgyud): khro bo'i mdzad spyod dngos med de lags na// theg pa 'og ma'i dngos med sgyu mar 'dod// gzugs stong stod gzugs gzhan ni ma yin 'dod// rang bzhin med pas snang stong dbyer med 'dod// gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar//
135b7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid stong pa nyid du 'og mas 'dod// snang ba sems nyid chos nyid rang rig 'dod// brtags pas dben pa'i bzhin ltar 'dod// chos nyid yongs su grub pa 'og ma 'dod// ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas 'di skad
136a1(rnying rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// theg pa 'og ma'i sgyu mde yin te// bden pa gnyis kyis sems nyid gtan la dbab// sgyu ma'i blo ldan bden pa dbyer med 'dod// gzugs stong stong gzugs bden pa gnyis// gzugs sa
136a2(rnying rgyud): tog sgra gsung thugs nyid de// de nyid bden pa de khyer med ye yin 'dod// rang bzhin med pas snang srong dbyer med pa// de ltar de bzhide 'den pa dbyer med 'dod// bden pa gnyis shes stong pa'i don tshol ba// mnyam par gnas pa'i ti
136a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings su ltung // langs pas kun rnga ba gang dang tha dad 'dod// snang ba'i sems nyid chos nyid rang rig pa// chos nyid skad cig grangs ma'i rdzas nyid de// brtags pas bden pa'i chos nyid yangs su grub// ma brtags nyams dga' chas cad
136a4(rnying rgyud): mi 'dod// snang ba'i chos nyid rang rig ye shes yin// rang rig bden pa dbyer med sgra gsung thugs// gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar// bden pa gnyis kyis stong pa'i don tshol ba// bskal pa grangs med kun tu 'od kyis/
136a5(rnying rgyud): da yi lung 'di gsang ba che ra gsang yang gsang thugs// snangad tsam nyid na rang bzhin med pa de// bden pa rang bzhin med pa dbyer med do// snar srid ye nas sgra gsung thugs nyid de// de bzhin nyid kyi gzugs brnyan bden pa dbyer med do// snang srid yenas
136a6(rnying rgyud): gtso bo'i thugs nyid do// sbed tsam nyid nas bden par dbyer med yin// skang srid ye nas mnyam pa chen pos// mnyam nyid tsam na bden pa dbyer med yin// zhes kI la la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ bden pa dbyer med kyi le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o//
136a7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang min las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di sad ces gsol te// bden pa dbyer med de lags na// gdab dang gnan bsreg 'phang ba 'di// zhe sdang la sogs nyan mongs lnga// de yi cha las gtogs gyur na// dngos po dbyer med me ga
136b1(rnying rgyud): lam// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// de yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// zhe sdang lam du zhugs nas ni// zhe sdang ma spangs gnas su dag/
136b2(rnying rgyud): gti mug lam du zhugs nas ni// gti mug ma spangs gnas su dag/ nga rgyal lam du zhugs nas ni// nga rgyal ma spangs gnas su dag/ 'dod chags lam du zhugs nas ni// 'dod chags ma spangs gnas su dag/ phrag dog lam du zhugs nas ni// phrag dog ma
136b3(rnying rgyud): grangs gnas su ngag/ de ltar de bzhin lam zhugs ma spangs gnas su dag/ dngos med bden pa dbyer med do// rtsa dngas khrag dngas dbug dadra dang // 'od dngas tsha dngas 'byung ba dngas// zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin rgyu// byang chub sems su gnyis med bstan//
136b4(rnying rgyud): ma spangs gnas su dug lnga dag/ gnyen po la ni ltos ma yin// dug lnga khro bo'i phur pa yis// drag lnga byang sems ye shes lnga// zhe sdang gnyen po byams pa yin// zhe sdang la sogs bde ba'i dus// mtho yor la ni mir shes tshul// mdzad spyod bden pa
136b5(rnying rgyud): dbyer med don// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs chud las/ mdzad spod bden pa dbyer med kyi le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// mdzad srid bden pa dgyer
136b6(rnying rgyud): med de lags na// gsang ba rgyud kyi bsgom rdzogs ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bskyed pa'i rim pa byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni sems nyid don// rtag dang tshad dang sems nyid la/
136b7(rnying rgyud): gzang 'ji khan nag nga ldan dang // kha dag dbyibs bral nam mkha' la// dkar po dam ser mthing ldang dang // gzung dang gdags su yongs med de// ser bra dang ni gzha'atshon ltar// snang ba thabs la gting mtha' med pa sam// thams cad thabs dang shes
137a1(rnying rgyud): rab ma sbyar med// ma mas med pa gzhan ladi ltar 'bebs// yul dang rig pa par shar bur 'jug gnyis// lung po \u0f89\u0fa4 dang sangs rgyas pa// kham pa dang zlas cad da bzhin du// 'amanyal 'dug ldan grad sa marnam bzhol/ du/
137a2(rnying rgyud): dang rol dang / thi ma dkyil 'khor ro// ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga gsum// chos rnams thams cad skye med gcig/ thugs rje chen po zab pa che// cho ga gsum ni sprul pa'i sgra// 'jig dang chags dang srid pa'i tshul// mtha' dbus med pa'i bzhal
137a3(rnying rgyud): khang // bcas dang bcos dang sangs rgyas rnams// gzhan nas byung ba ma yin te// kha dog lnga dang phrin las lnga// thams cad sems nyid gcig pa ste// sems las dzaM sdes sangs rgyas so// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs chud las/ gsang ba
137a4(rnying rgyud): rgyang gyi bam mardzogs kyi le'u sa lnga bcwa gsum pa la/ de nas zin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// gsang ba rgyad kyi banas rdugs de lags na// char gsang lung gi bsgo mardzogs ji ltar lags/
137a5(rnying rgyud): sa gsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal ba'i sgra dang 'jig tshogs dang // mtshan mar snang ba'i sdang sred las// kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' klung du// yid b+ha dkAn tu bzang po'i rol bar shar// #
137a6(rnying rgyud): swa spang ba'i sras ni s+yA ru shar// mA Ta zag pa'i dag ni gsung du shar// ngan ga shes ny-i// 9 ni thugs su shAng/ rnamamakha' yangs pa'i mkha'adabyings la// gna' gar shA rab bzhin// ku mengs la yo ni mu gsung zag
137a7(rnying rgyud): lus dang yan lag tshul du shar// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes su// rang nyid rdo ches dbyings la// 'bar ba'i kho bo ma bzang ba// sku yi dbyig tu bdag phyir shar// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gsum// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings la// 'bar ba'i
137b1(rnying rgyud): po mi bzad pa// gsung gi dbyig tu bdag gyur shad// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes blugs// ngang nyid rdo rnga chos dbyings la// 'bar ba'i khro bo b+h+rUM bzad pa// thugs kyi dazig klu bdag gyur shar// kun gzhi ma long lta bral// yid ni bzhin gyi gzag
137b2(rnying rgyud): brtan shar// kun gzhi cha mtsho lta bral// yid ni nyi zla gza' skar shar// kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la// yid ni kun tu bzang po'i thugs kyi s+phu ru shar// thugs kyi gsung dang thugs kyi thugs// 'khor ba ma ngan 'das pa'i chus/
137b3(rnying rgyud): bkag pa med par dras gcig tu// sku gsung thugs su rang las shar// sdang ba'i rang bzhin med par shar// yid dran sngags brjod tsam yang lta bar ma bsnyegs so// kun gzhi dbyings la yid ni ye shes shar// ci spyod rnam rtog mtshan ma ci byang yang /
137b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pas byang chub sems// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med sku gsung thugs// blugs kyi sgra dang thugs kyi gsung du shar// thugs kyi thugs ni thams cad dbyer med shar// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs chud las/
137b5(rnying rgyud): gsang lung gi bsgom rdzogs kyi le'u ste lnga bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// cher gsang lung gi bsgom rdzogs de lags na// man ngag yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil
137b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor de ltar lags// zhes gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snang ba thams cad yul yin te// yul gyi rnam pa sems yin na// nir snang cir mthong sems yin pas// sems las ma gtag gang yang med// sems
137b7(rnying rgyud): yang gsad zugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// yang gsang thugs ni chos ma// snang ba'i sems nyid yang gsang thugs// nas rtag skye ba'i gzhi med par// rnas rtog nying zang yang gsang thugs// nam rtag yang gas thugs la 'char nub med// sems nyer
138a1(rnying rgyud): yang gsang thugs la yul dang yul can med// sems kyi bo yang gsang gnyis med la// nyams su len pa'i bsgom bya sgom byed med// yang gsang thugs ni rdo rje phrar ba'o// wAr ni kun gzhi sun tu bzang mo la// pa ni yid de kun tu
138a2(rnying rgyud): phur ni kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo la// bu ni yid de kun tu bzang po'o// phur ni kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo la// bu ni yid de kun tu bzang po dkyil 'khor rtsam gsum mo// bur ni kun gzhi thugs nyid la// bra ni sku dang gsung nyid do// rdo rje kun gzhi kun tu
138a3(rnying rgyud): zang mo la// khros pa yid de kun tu bzang po'o// gnyis med dug sdong rtsad gcod zhe sdang gcod// snang srid dkyil 'khor rnam gsum ye nas thugs su mtshon// gnyen po med pas ye nas bsregs// kun gzhi kun bzang nam mkha'i dkyil// yid ni skad srid ye nas
138a4(rnying rgyud): thigs pa shar// lus dang yan lag tshul du srog gi go ru shar// kun gzhi stong pa snying gi dkyil du bsgom par bya// dam tshig kun tu bzang mo yis// yid ni snying rje thugs su bsngal// kun tu bzang po yab yum thugs// rol bas da mnan pa ma yin no//
138a5(rnying rgyud): dang srid lus ngag yid gsum phung po ni// kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo rdo rjer gtams// rnam par shes pa yid ni kun tu bzang / kun gzhi kun ta bzang mo rdo rje dbyer med bsgom// srid pa ye nAs phu rab ru// yang gsang thugs su rtogs pas bslab// yang
138a6(rnying rgyud): gsang lur du rtogs pas dbang dang dngos grub blangs// rang ga sems nyid rtogs pas ye shes khro bo dag/ rang la rang nyid spyan drangs drang du med// gzhan nas sman drang med par sems nyid rtogs nas ni// rtags dang mtshan ma'i phyin rlabs bcu bzhi 'gyung // kI la ya
138a7(rnying rgyud): sagrub mngon shes drug dag 'byung // zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs chud las// man ngag yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga bcu lnga pa'o// / de nas yang srin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
138b1(rnying rgyud): ma na ya nas na po pa gan shA/ ga rnams 'dun sun// sags pas kyi na u ma// byar bas// sa
138b2(rnying rgyud): bsang thim bka' su nagasadangs tha zer bzur ga// bad ga zugs thagapa kyang med/ 'ad gzugs / 'ang rdzo / sa da myig ma dzi
138b3(rnying rgyud): zag 'tshal dang // mdzad banang chag gaspang ba'inabya// rkye dang rgyal khrimasapa da can 'grus// bas mi gtan shes rab par la tho// de' bcug meng ma yengs pas// das srab rang bababang des/ dkyi la 'gro gad ldan pathog
138b4(rnying rgyud): do khros pa 'khor bcas kyis// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bskyed pa ni// de la thabs dang thabs la brten// dngas thab rnam pa gnyis po don// zla gcig lo gcig lnga gsum dang // rab 'bar gsum gyi rtags rnams ni// dus der mi 'brang yi sred de// nas
138b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ thabs dman pa la bstug pas dang sa brang myur du thub pa'i le'u lngab cu drug pa'o// de nas yang zin las kyi rgyal pos/ badzum ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsapa te// zabs dman pa la sogs pa
138b6(rnying rgyud): dngas grub myur du thob pa de lags na// de yi bskyed pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rdo khros pa zhe sogs pas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// ting 'dzin gsum
138b7(rnying rgyud): ga gsum// bzhi pa dag gis bablang par bya// yab phram ma pa' gsang byen parabs nas// bsgral brgyang bde ba'i rjed mad 'am// mad ze drug gis thab ba sgriban// dang rje gnyis pa pa dang can// bar drimartson nyings sar bcug
139a1(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis bzhi pa bskyed// kamagul man+tha yis/ 'dad pa 'byabs sor bsgrub// srid pa'i phur ba zhes sogs pas// byin brlabs bcu gcig sras mchog bskyed// 'ad zlar bklag nas su gsung thugs// gsang lam parba
139a2(rnying rgyud): las 'phros pas// 'od phung gu ya tha mar gtad// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi bskyed rim ni// dad pa thun du bcad de bsgom// nus pa gzhug dang nus pa bskyed// nus pa brtas dang nus pa thob// nus pa bzhi pa thob nas ni// gar mkhan lag pa de bzhin du//
139a3(rnying rgyud): gang ltar byas pa de bzhin snang // snang ba'i nus pa thob pa ni// gdams ngag rin chen dag las 'byung // byin rna bA bcu bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ thabs dman pa la bsnyegs pas dngos grub myur du thob pa'i
139a4(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// brabs dman pa la bsnyegs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pas// dngos grub myur nga thob pa de la gla na// de yi
139a5(rnying rgyud): ga'i rim pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje khros pas zhes sogs nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// rtsa ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// A~M dang hUM nyid phaT dang bzhi// bar nga mtshan nyid so sor
139a6(rnying rgyud): ka zhug/ karma gu ya man+t+ra yis// 'dod pa'i bya ba don grub pas// rdo rje he yi bar du ni// mtshan nyid so sor bcug pa dag/ phyogs bcwa cho ga'i rim pa'o// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa nas/ gshegs su gsol ba'i bar du ni// bcu gcig rtsa gcig cho ga ni//
139a7(rnying rgyud): rjes kyi cho ga'i rim pa'o// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa nas// gshegs su gsol ba'i bar gyis ni// gang la gang nas gang dag gaN drag phyir du// sman drang cho ga'i rim pa'o// khro ba chen po gshegs nas kyang // dngos grub gsol ba'i bar gyis ni// dang
139b1(rnying rgyud): rnam pa gnas padan// bzhim pa chagani ma pa'o// dbang dang byin nupa 'dar rtsol cig/ 'ad pa dun la gsal ba pa dang // dbang dang byon rnapa na par chaga'i ma pag/ sa pa blang bas 'thad na du// thug sa dung skang rdum gang 'dul ba// sangs
139b2(rnying rgyud): min las rdzogs mdzad nas// prAd+ha'i mdzad spyod phrin las ni// tshad med bzhini sngon du 'gro// theg pa chen por mi tshad bzhin// bya ba spyod parnal 'byor dang // thabs che thabs mang thabs ma pas dang // thabs ma cho ga'i rim pa'o// rdo rje gzhon nu reg 'dzin nam
139b3(rnying rgyud): srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig// srid pa rdo rje wa pa'i lha// ye shes khro ba grub par mdzad// 'dad pa'i bya ba don slab gsol gdab pa/ longs su gnyis tham srid pa'i lha// dbab pa'i cho ga'i rim po'o// badz+ra yan go ka \u0f85 ni/ rtsa ba gu ya maN+Da la// mchod
139b4(rnying rgyud): zag thams cad kyis// 'dod bya gnyis su dbul bar bya'o// mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ thabs dman pa la bsnyegs pa'i dngos grub kAr du thob pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'i lewa sa lnga bcwa bcud pa'o//
139b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// cho ga'i rim pa de lags na// gzhal yas khang du gsal ba yi// 'di yi don rtags ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
139b6(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas gsal ba'i don rtags ni// gzhal yas gru bzhir 'byung ba ni// tshad med pa'i yi don rtogs yin// phyogs bzhir sgo bzhi 'byung ba ni// rnam thar ye shes don rtags yin// rnababs yang dag spang ba bzhi// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i don
139b7(rnying rgyud): rtogs yin// drab nga phyed brgyan pa ni// nyan mongs che chung gnas su dag pa'i don rtogs yin// zhing sdug ka pa brgyad btegs pa// 'phags pa'i lam bcad don rtogs yin// tshangs pa'i gdung ldab kye ba ni// dug lnga gnas su dag pa'i don
140a1(rnying rgyud): rtags phyen// ny-im+b+hi ka gdan kun byas pani// thab pa dang nasar rab don byugs len// keng ga yas khal ma 'khal gyis// yags sa ses byasmra pa'o// phya ma gnas srubs pa'i dan dgas yin// sbal drug skyes
140a2(rnying rgyud): rdzas pa ni// 'khor ba zhel spang ba'i don tegs yin// rngamathod chen pos brgyan pa ni// nyon mongs tsho 'phrul mngod byung // yang yul sum sprul rtod rting za ba'i don nags yin// 'dod yon lha mos brgyan pa na// longs spyod don nag
140a3(rnying rgyud): yin// ring lde phra ga la sogs bstan// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rtags// drin chen lnga lo cigs pas brtad pa'i// ye shes lnga li de ni rtags yin// nga gror rgyal mtshan pakris brgyad de// rnam rtog bdud las rgyal ba'i
140a4(rnying rgyud): dpag bsam gling gi su ba rtan pa ni// thags rje yongs la khyab pa'i don rtags ljin// ri dwags skar sa bcan pa ni// byang chub sepas dbus pa skor ba'i ngan rtags yin// chos kying sa la bskang bani// sa bcu'i byang chub sems kyis ni/
140a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba'i don rtags yin// zhing gi gdug dang 'phran gyis brgyan pa ni// sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la// so so yang dag don ni ston pa'i rtags// drang ni thod pa'i gzhal yas khang // gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral ba'i don
140a6(rnying rgyud): yin// dbus su glug sum mthing nag byung ba ni// chos kyi dbyings nyid ste myed la// sku gsung thugs gsum 'byung ba'i don rtags yin// b+ha ga ma dmar po gsum du byung bani// srid gsum dbang du sud pa'i don rtags yin// 'khor lo cings
140a7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba ni// don gyi 'khor lo rgyas par bskor ba 'dod rtags yid// dbus kyi ma phreng zlum pa 'byung ba ni// skye 'od spyan gyis grub pa 'od ni rtags yin// dkar po zlum po byung bani// zhi ba chen po'i don rtags yin// ser po su bzhi byung ba ni// rgyas baparjod
140b1(rnying rgyud): pa'adon rtags yin// rdo rje rabs bskor ba ni// thugs ni yang dag don rtags yin// zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang gi don tags kyi le'u ste lnga bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas phrin las kyi rgyal pos
140b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang gi don rtags de lags na// 'od zer bskul ba'i don rtags ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa
140b3(rnying rgyud): rnams// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rjes dran nas// dmas pa'i tshul gyis 'od zer bkye// dam tshig mkha' la ri dgas 'grogs pa bzhin// 'og min gnas nas 'od zer
140b4(rnying rgyud): bskul spyan drangs// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rjes dran nas// ngams pa'i tshul gyis 'od zer bkye// dam tshig mkha' la ri dwags 'grogs pa dang // mar me gnyis dag
140b5(rnying rgyud): gcig tu bsdom pa bzhin// dam tshig 'od zer bskul bas gnyis med gcig tu bab// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rjes dran nas// dmas pa'i tshul gyis 'od zer brgya// snga chu'i
140b6(rnying rgyud): steng du phyi chu bab pa bzhin// gnyis su med par ma thob bar du bskul// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bsrung// thugs bskyed bug dam rjes dran nas// dmas pa'i tshul gyis 'od zer bkye// dkar dmar mthing
140b7(rnying rgyud): gsum gnas rnams su// so ma la lcags la ngar byud bzhin// yon tan gsum du byin rlab bskul// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer spro// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rjes dran nas// dmas pa'i tshul gyis 'od
141a1(rnying rgyud): zer brtse// so ma la lcags la dar blad bzhin// dbang dang byin parlabs nus pa thob par gyur// dam tshig sems dpa'i 'od zer sgo// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul// thugs bskyed thugs dam rje 'dran na/
141a2(rnying rgyud): dmas nas thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang chub sems kyi 'od thos pas// srin mtheb thabs dang shes rab kyis// 'brug sum srab mchog dngos sub blang // dam chog sems dpa'i 'od zer ste// de sa de bzhin pader gshegs bsngal/ ba
141a3(rnying rgyud): mchog pade spyir b+ha gA'i klong yangs nas// rab dgyes byang chub sems kyi dngos grub bskul// dam tshig sems dpas 'od zer blo// de ltar de bzhin byang sems daste// ye shes bdud rtsi dam tshig bdud rtsi zlum// 'od su gnyis med kha dog
141a4(rnying rgyud): smyos// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni char bzhin phab// dmadzes bdud rtsi 'bar pa'i mchod pa dam pa 'dis// mchod pa'i bye thag rnams la mchod par 'bral// zhes kI la la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ 'od zer bskul bas dngos dadab kyi nus bgyur
141a5(rnying rgyud): thob pa'i len ste drug rnguba'o// / de nas smin las ky-i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas la to// 'od zer bsgral pas dang kun kyi// rdzas pa myur du thob pa da lags na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// rdul 'byor la
141a6(rnying rgyud): ni dang po yis// bde bar gshegs pa'i zhal mthong ba'i// sdang ba'i nus pa ji ltar thob par 'gyur// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor las ni dang ba las// rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa dang po
141a7(rnying rgyud): ye// ring sa yang brgya brgya la// dbugs dang tha te 'gro gyi// ting 'dzidags 'a ba'i gnas gsu ma du// rnal 'byo snang ba dres pa 'dzag par 'gyur// rnal 'byor snang ba'i rjes pa gnyis pa'o// ro la yang gsum gsum ma// @
141b1(rnying rgyud): su te 'gro 'dram// ting 'dod gas labs gnas gsum // rdul 'byor snang ba'i nus pa bskyed par 'gyur// na 'byong snang ba'i nus pa gsum bra la// rimapa yang ring// dbugs dang snang 'byo' bya// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i gnas ca/
141b2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa brnyas par 'gyur// rnal 'byor snang ba'i nus pa bzhi pa la// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad blo dog bather// ri ral yang gting mtha' med// dbugs dang sbyar te 'gro 'du bya// tIng 'jan gas la brdzun mi chad//
141b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rnas pa thong pa 'gyur// rin che kyang du byin pas sa do nga 'gyur// drang ba ngas yo pas dang bachub par 'gyur// rdo gzhon nu'i rig 'dod pas// sgyi mi rtog pa'i sa yang gadzin// yid bzhin rdo bu phyi'i phyag 'tshal ba /
141b4(rnying rgyud): skyil pa gas pa'i dgangs rgyad las/ bdebang gshegs pa zhisas pa'i byung ba dus pa sa sa pa'i lang da seM ni ldas mkhos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di// de cis gsal te// bdag nyid
141b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs su byas nas dbang dang dngos grubaskad bris pa ra~M la las nod pa'i don ji skad lags/ zhes gama' ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' thal to// 'di gshegs sdang ba'i dus pa ma thob par/
141b6(rnying rgyud): dam thugs brjod pas// bde gshegs thugs rje byed dang 'byung // mang me gcig pas gnyis shrI dz+wal// dpal ba'u gsum bcud gsang pas nas// padz+ra las 'grom sras mchog byung // gzhal las kheng la lan gsum du// @
141b7(rnying rgyud): b+hag byas la// badz+ra dbang gi slor thugs la// dgal po'i mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i rtsa// ring ba'i dus nas bskyed pa'i rtsa// thugs dam ga rtse nga kyarang 'dong // sdug su thugs kyi dngas grub dang // gnyis su med pa@
142a1(rnying rgyud): sngol// mchod pa lan grangs brgya stong dang // khri 'bum bye ba dbul bar bya// gsang sngags lan grangs brgya stong dang // khri 'bum bye ba dbul bar bya// dngos su byeb brgya stod dang // khri 'bum bye ba grangs byas na//
142a2(rnying rgyud): ba gshegs pa'i thugs rje 'byung // bdag sras gzhan sras de bzhin du// thabs mkhas thabs mang thabs myur bas// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// dbang dang byin nab 'dir gsol pas// ye shes khro bo grub par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs
142a3(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thob// bdag la bsgo 'ing 'od du zil// dbang dang byin rlabs dngos grub 'byung // zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs chud las/ dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i le'u ste d+ha ga cu gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las
142a4(rnying rgyud): pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba de lags na// dbang dang dngos grub thang ba'i dus// de la bar chod 'brog 'tsho me 'byung ngam// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
142a5(rnying rgyud): tu gar mgo dang rgyal skrag dang // byang sems phur ba pa wa sangs// ra ba bzhi yi sku rengs gsum// bde gshegs rig 'dzin po nya gsum// bde bar gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin gang na gnas par yang // dbang dang dngos grub dus der 'byung bar 'gyur//
142a6(rnying rgyud): dang dngos khu bgrub pa'i rnal 'byor la// dam log dam sri ru dra yis// ye shes rtsal 'phang mngon po sgrib// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tsho bar byed// dge ba'i bsam par bar chod byed// khro bo chen po'i ma lugs kyis// bar chad drag tu bsgral bar bya/
142a7(rnying rgyud): zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ dbang dang dngos phubaslang ba'i dus chod dang / dam sri bar chod bskal pa'i dus kyi le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ dpa
142b1(rnying rgyud): dang dngos grub srub pa'i rnal 'byor la// dang srid ma log rungs par chod byed// 'di nyid ci las gyur pa yin zhes gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// 'di yi don rnams ngas bstan gyi// lha sgra phyag rgya chen
142b2(rnying rgyud): po bsgom las sbyar// sangs rgyas mdzad stod sngon du ma bzung bar// dngos po khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed// bde gshegs yi dam gcig bzung bde gshegs kun gyi dang // yi dam bzang ngan bde bar gshegs la kye// chos la rgyags
142b3(rnying rgyud): bzung bas dam+ba log phyogs chad nyams// lha bsgos khur bcad pas sangs rgyas dgongs ma longs// nga ni thig ched khro bo'i rgyal po yin// sku dang yan lag rags pas 'jigs par bstan// ting nge 'dzin gyis stong gsum khengs par stsal/
142b4(rnying rgyud): dgug dang bstim dang gzir gnon drag pos brdung // 'dre srin rnams kyang lha ru bzung ste bran du kho la// 'dod do gzas pa'i sha dang khrag la 'dong // srog tshod dbugs phrogs rtags ni myur du ston// mgo sbugs so gtsigs mig bzlog brang
142b5(rnying rgyud): brngub cing / sangs rgyas mdzad spyod bor bas don mi 'grub// 'jig rten 'di la phar bas tshur gnod che// sa bon me yis tshig pa la// 'bras bu skye ba ga la srid// sangs rgyas dgor sa spyod bor ba las// dngos su 'a thob pa ga la srid/
142b6(rnying rgyud): de yi rgyu mthun 'bras bu 'byung ba ni// dam log dam sri ru tra gsum du srid// 'jig rten khams gsum mdangs 'phrog srog gcod cing // rnal 'byor dngos grub 'phrog dang bar chod byed// sngon gyi los dbang brjod pa'i mthu yis ni// gcig la spong
142b7(rnying rgyud): gsum khengs par sgrub nas ni// yi dregs 'dre srin ma po cher gyur nas// 'jig rten khams ci srog dang dbugs kyi bdag/ dge ba'i phyogs la dad pa'i bar chod byed// 'jig rten khams la gnod pa sha stag mo// de yin ma smi dmyal khams
143a1(rnying rgyud): rder bcu// zhes kI la la gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ b+hU Ur+dz+dzagar+b+ha chen po 'asgom pas/ dam srid ma log tutu gsum du gyur pa'i le wa ste drug rgya bzhi po'o// / de nas zin las kyi rgyal ba /
143a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye'i sku phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa las// ru tra dang ni dam srir myo ba de lags na// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// lha mu phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa yis// sangs rgyas dgongs pa phreng 'dzidun mi
143a3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa rnams// sangs rgyas dgongs pa blang ba'i don// lha spu phyag rgya chen por bsgom// rgya dad b.lung dang man ngag dang // bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa/
143a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// gcig la gsum rdzogs ma rtogs par// mun mda' bzhin du phyogs tshod kyis// sangs rgyas dgongs pa longs ma 'gyur// dang bar shes rab rngam gsum gyis// gtan tshig don la phebs par dbyed// de na
143a5(rnying rgyud): bla mdam pa pas// gdams ngag rin chen thob byas la// thabs ma thabs chen thabs mkhas thabs kyur byas// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// tshang med bzhin sngon du 'gro// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul bas// sangs rgyas dgongs pa longs par/
143a6(rnying rgyud): bya// sangs rgyas zin las rdzogs mdzad nas// sangs rgyas dgongs pa longs pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub 'byung ba yin// sangs rgyas dgongs pa longs pa la// lnga bcu gcig nas lnga yi bar// bzhi po dag nas blang bar bya'o// zhes kI la yag
143a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgongs rgyud las/ sku phyag rgya chen po bsgom pas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa longs pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// bde
143b1(rnying rgyud): par gshegs pa thams cad la// longs spyod tshogs 'bul ji ltar bgyi// 'di yi don rnams bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang bugs//
143b2(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa'i khog gsum dgongs don sbyar// kun tu bzang mo yum gyi b+ha ga la// rasta chags pa chen po mtsho ltar 'khyil// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu dbyings nas bzhengs// yum chen 'khor ba rgyas 'debs ska la 'khril// phyogs brtse'i /
143b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal tshogs ni smin ltar gtibs// phra thabs yang sbrul tshogs ni sku de ltar 'khrug/ ci bgyi bka' nyan tshogs ni glog ltar 'gyu// dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs ni mun ltar gtibs// thugs dam dbyings nas bzhengs te gshegs su gsol// srid
143b4(rnying rgyud): phur 'u bsgrub sogs nas// gshegs su gsol ba'i bar gyis ni// bsgom pa'i kho ga gsum dgongs don sbyar// longs spyod tshogs kyi zhal zas ri ltar spungs// zhing chen gsar rnying tshogs ni bye ltar bkram// seM sa tsiN+Da 'tshogs ni ji ltar lhag
143b5(rnying rgyud): rak+ta mang po'i tshogs ni mtsho ltar 'khyil// sbyang ba'i yi ge gsum pos spang // spel ba'i yi ge lnga pos spel bas ni// so so'i bcung bsdus ltar thim pa// bskyil ba'i snying po dag gis bskyil// longs spyod bdud rtsi chen por gyur// phra med michog
143b6(rnying rgyud): mchod pa dam pa 'di// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par spro// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni char bzhin phab// dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dam pa 'di// bsgom pa'i khog dang dgongs don gsum// ting 'dzin sngags dang srin las gsum/
143b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i skye brag thams cad kyis// thams cad du ni dbul bar bya// kyal ba mnyes te dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor pa yis myur du thong // theg pa chen po sman pa'i sa// bskye rdzogs tshogs stor mthong bskal gcig/ bsags 'das tshogs
144a1(rnying rgyud): par zlas// sags pasgrags dngas sa sa nga// sa snal lags dgangs rgyud ldas/ las / gas ca sa drug pas danas ngan

144a3(rnying rgyud): mod nam mkha' dbyer med bzhin// mas pa'i bsnyen bkur dbul bkod// rgyags bcu'i rigs kyi gcol phyag 'tshal lo// zhe sdang rtul gyis zhe thang 'jams mdzad pa// rnga rnga gzhan du'i spel bag 'tshal brtad// 'did chags rgyal gyis
144a4(rnying rgyud): chags gnas su dag/ 'khor ba rgyas 'debs spu la phyag 'tshal bstod// rmongs byed za byed che 'phel rgyas 'debs ma// gsang ba'i yum bzhi la yang phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rjes drag snyoms gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa// 'jigs kyad
144a5(rnying rgyud): bcul phyag 'tshal ba stod// khro ba'i chags pa thugs dam skyong mdzad ma// 'jigs byed srin ma bcul phyag 'tshal bstod// r-i ta thogs pa med par byug pa yi// phra thabs nyi shu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal la// rings grub par chad dgra bgags 'dum pa'i phyir/
144a6(rnying rgyud): N+yai pa 'dus pa'i sras mchag kI la la// yon ta rdzogs pa'i sbrul phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i lus cacu gang yang thags pa med// 'dod pa sa tshogs sbyar ba'i 'phrul mo che// gyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal dbyor dngos bu don
144a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa// dgongs don gsum gyis bad gshegs pa// gas ba char gsang yang gas dathugs// thos pa'i sgonas gdams dag gis// theg btsa'i dngos su gyur du thog// ces tri la lags pa'i dgangs rlung las/ bos zla cig 'tshal dngas thung rdzu
144b1(rnying rgyud): dri thob pa'i laru ste drug tu bdun pa'o// / de nas phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ phyag 'tshal don ni de lags na/ dgongs don gsum la mos pa'i sgo nas pastong pas/ 'angos grubamyur du thob pa 'ad na ji ltar lags/ zhes
144b2(rnying rgyud): gsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa yis// dgongs don gsum la mos bstod pa// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu ni// sku mdog mdzang
144b3(rnying rgyud): nag 'jigs pa'i tshul bstan pa// zhal gsum phyag d+hag zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthor zhal// chos dang longs spyod sbrul skra'i rtags// nyon mongs bag chags thams cad zhal du rngub pa'i phyir// zhal nas khrag gi rdza
144b4(rnying rgyud): klo mchil 'amin// dug gsum cad nas gcod pa'i phyir// mche bzang yag gtsigs pa yin// bag chags 'thor zhing g.yeng ba'i phyir// shangs nas rlung nag 'chu bas ma 'thor ba yin// nyon mongs bag chags sreg pa'i phyir// spyan nas me yi
144b5(rnying rgyud): phung po 'brar ba yin// phrin las thogs pa med par mdzad pa'i phyir// smin mtshams khro gnyer blom tu 'gyu ba yin// khams gsum srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// lhan nas bskal pa'i 'brug stong ldir ba yin// thugs rje'i sprul pa phyogs bcur
144b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyed pa'i snyir// dbu ska la pa kham nag phyogs brgyar 'khyil ba yin// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje rtse dgus sa dbu'i rtog pa 'joms// phyag drug g.yas kyi bar pa'i phyag mtshan ni// rdo rdo rje rdzas rgyud lnga rong tu grol// bya
144b7(rnying rgyud): drug g.yon gyi dang po'i phyag mtshan ni// me dpung 'bar bas nyon mongs khams gsum 'phrog/ phyag drug g.yon gyi bar ma'i phyag mtshan ni// n+dertsa gsum dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// phyag drug g.yas g.yon tha ma'i phyag mtshan ni// ri rang phur du
145a1(rnying rgyud): khams gsum dbang du snang pa yin// du g+hu pa bstan gyi mgrags na// gti zug lam du zhugs nas ni// gtisug gnas sgra dag cu'i gyur// brang can dag galags pa thas nas// mu gang can na brda' gsam pa
145a2(rnying rgyud): yin// zhe sdang lam du zhugs nas ni// zhe sdang gnas su dag pa'i phyir// zhe sdang sbrul gyi chun po ni// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs gdol pa'i rigs// dbu rgyan mgur chu skan cha phyag gdubazhabs gdub rkyen gyis brgyan pa yin// nga rgyal
145a3(rnying rgyud): gnas su drag kyi'i phyir// nga rgyal rtag gi lpags bshus nas// sku smad stag gi sham thabs gsol ba yin// 'dod chags lam du zhugs nas ni// 'dod chags gnas su dag pa'i phyir// dregs pa brgyad kyi mgo bcud nas// sa ral
145a4(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa yin// phrag dog lam du zhugs nas ni// phrag dog ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i phyir// phrag dog mi yi lpags bshus nas// sru la zhing che nA ga yang gzhis brgyan pa yin// snang srid thugs rjes snum pa'i rtsir// zhag gi zongs
145a5(rnying rgyud): sku la brgyan pa yin// snang srid thugs rjes chags pa mi gtod phyir// ra rta'i thig les su la brgyan pa yin// phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs pa'i mthar gyin phyir// thal chen tsho me bus su la brgyan pa yin// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas
145a6(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i phyir// thod pa skem rlon da de'i phreng ba yis// dbu rgyan se ral kha ru brgyan pa yin// dregs pa thams cad dbang du sbed pa'i phyir// brkyang bskum tshul gyis lha chen po mo gdan du bting ba yin// 'khor ba'i bag chags gtang nas sreg
145a7(rnying rgyud): phyid// skul bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba yin// de 'dra khro bo 'jigs tshul bstan la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/
145b1(rnying rgyud): srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// sgom pa'i khog dang dgongs pa'i don// phyogs kyi don dang ldan pa stong na// mthu 'phrog dgug dang bstim pa dang // gdab dang gnan bsreg 'angang ba nga
145b2(rnying rgyud): gnyen po stobs dang 'jig las thar// gnyen po grub pas gang yang 'grub// mos pas bstod pas dngos grub myur du thob// ces kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ mos pas bstod pas dngos grub myur du thob pa'i le'u ste drug
145b3(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gtso bo la mos pas bstod pas dngos grub myur du thob pa de lags na/ khro bo bcu la mos pas bstod pa'i yon tan bshad du gsol/
145b4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// phrin las gsum gyis bag chags dbyings su spyad// khro rgyal hUM kA ra la phyag 'tshal bstod// gsang ba'i thugs mchog
145b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba rnams las rgyal// khro rgyal rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba'i don la phrin las 'joms byed pa// khro rgyal dbyug sngon dag la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzung 'dzin log rtog 'chi bdag tshar gcod pa// khro rgyal gshin rje gsheng
145b6(rnying rgyud): lal phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba'i skyon spangs sdug bsngal mgon mdzad pa// khro rgyal mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal ba spyod// gdangs skad rnga ma bzhad tsham rngams phyogs bcu sgrogs// khro rgyal rta mgrin sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rjes 'gro
145b7(rnying rgyud): don chags pas skyon mi gos// khro rgyal gzhan gyis mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba'i bdud la thugs rje'i rtsi gtong ba// khro rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshal bstod// khams gsum 'khor bzugs rjes bskal bas rgyal// khro rgyal
146a1(rnying rgyud): khams gsum nam rgyal skyal phyag datshal ba nyid// 'khor bsngags rjo stabs kyis tha med gnas su sprul// khwa rgyal rnabs pa rgyal phyag 'tshal bskyed// 'jigs byed rnam pa'i tha chal yab yum badra// 'khor ba
146a2(rnying rgyud): byang sems phra thabs nyi shu'i tshogs// zhal bgrad mche gtsig spyan bzlog 'gying bag can// phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// dur khrod chen po'i chas brgyad sgeg phyir brgyan// 'khor ba'i bag chags sreg phyir sku la me yi phung po 'bar//
146a3(rnying rgyud): brkyang bskum chu la gyis 'gying bag d+ha dra stabs can// dregs pa thams cad dbang sdud phyogs skyong bcu dag mnan// bdud 'dul dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thabs dang shes rab sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal
146a4(rnying rgyud): bstod// sgom pa'i khog dang dgongs pa'i don// gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// dgongs don gdam+ba dag sbyar bstod nas// thun mong stobs kyis 'jig las thar// gnyen po stobs dang dngos grub dag/ myur du thob par the tshom med//
146a5(rnying rgyud): ces kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs don las/ khro bcu la mos pas bstod pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu dgu pa'o// / de nas yang phrin las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rnal 'byor rjes su
146a6(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa rnams// phur ba sras mchog bstod pa ni// byin gyis brlabs dang gzi byin bskyed// bzhengs su gsol dang las la gzhug/ gyen du gsor zhing glang la bskor// hUM bzhi gsal 'phro la sogs bdun pa bzhin// khro rgyal 'dus pa'i sras
146a7(rnying rgyud): mchog kI la ya// ma g.yos chos mchog sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// but+ta 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la la// gti mug bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// gti mug chen pos
146b1(rnying rgyud): gte mug 'joms mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// phug sum dkar nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// brda 'dus pa'i sras mchag kI la ya// de sdang bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// zhe sdang chen pas zhe sdang 'joms pa'i lha la phyag
146b2(rnying rgyud): 'tshal bstod// gru gsum ser nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rat+na 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// nga rgyal bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// nga rgyal chen pos nga rgyal 'joms mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gru
146b3(rnying rgyud): gsum dmar nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// 'dod chags bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// 'dod chags chen pos 'dod chags 'joms mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gru gsum
146b4(rnying rgyud): ljang nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// karma rus pa'i sras mchog kI la la// phrag dog bdud 'dul khros pa'i rgyal po dbyings nas bzhengs// phrag dog chen pos phrag dog 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// phur pa sras mchog bstod pa
146b5(rnying rgyud): drung du bstan la drag tu gzer// gdab pa'i sras mchog kI lA la// d+hi h+Na tsakra rur ba'i rtsa// mi bzang drug pa'i phur ba drug po yang // de ltar de bzhin rjes su'o// mu stod khro bo zan pa la// zhal gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// lte ba man
146b6(rnying rgyud): che chas rnams ni// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// drag por gyur pa'i phung ba ste// dgra bgegs gzhan sa spos ci dgos// gdang dang mngags dang sngags la sogs// btaban lnga yang brtag par 'gyur// rtag tu mchod zer 'grangs byungs

152a1(rnying rgyud): k+Sha// su na/ rgyu su/ sa su gas ga sa/
152a2(rnying rgyud): gas phrar rabargya baspel cing // zhal brgya cag sngags drug dang bdun pa zas par bas ma// drug sngags drug gi 'od zer rjo das 'thos// drang gi srung mo mgo dgra yis// gabs pa'i da sbeng 'drub bsam/ gdu'i dang chu bdab da
152a3(rnying rgyud): sbyin las ma grub 'di yis srogs// dkrug bstim ma khrag 'di yis sgrogs// gaphur ma thebs 'di yis thebs// tha phur gdab pa'i gdung mnan// thaphung drug cu pokar bcas// mnag pa ri rabartsel mnan// rgya na da bas zin las gsong
152a4(rnying rgyud): grogs pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni// nyi shu gcig gis the tshom med// li hi li wi hi laM/ zhes kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud las/ tha bkug pon spogs pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o// / de nas phan las kyi rgyal pos/ bcom ldan
152a5(rnying rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya// rnal 'byor rjes su 'jug pa la// gzung 'dzin pazlog nas sangs rdzas su// yang dag dgongs pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das badz+ra kI la yas/ 2
152a6(rnying rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// gzugs sogs 'byung ba bzhi po yang // nye bar len pa len byed lnga// 'phen par byed pa las yin te// sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rgyu drug tu// rten cing 'brel pa'i 'khor lo bskor// de la zlog thabs yang dag don// bskyed pa'i rim pa yang dag
152a7(rnying rgyud): don// de ltar de bzhin dkyil 'khor la// gnyis su sbyor ba gcig tu gsal// nus 'jug bskyed dang lhas thob pa// au dang AM dang rmu gis gzung las bzlog/ nyon mongs sgrib pa phyi gzung yul las 'das// au dang I dang hU~M ga bo las// 'dzin pa'i se
152b1(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa'i dan ma 'ongs// chos rnams thams cad me sgra yin te// sems kyi rnam pa sa yi su// bde gshegs 'dzin pa gnyis su rig par gsang// de nyid sangs rgyas dgongs pa longs// phung ga khams dang blo marjed dang // 'di gshegs dkyil 'jo slong ngo'o// was dag
152b2(rnying rgyud): yid gsum phung po yang // dkyil 'khor gsum gyi grong dkyil 'khor// snang la rang bzhin med pa bzhin lta za// kha mig rnga ba yan lag gzung 'dzin gnyis// rang bzhin med par 'dzin patsam yang min// mang me'i 'od kyis sun pa sel 'gyur te// phyogs gcig sman pa
152b3(rnying rgyud): se la mi 'gyur// 'od chung mun pa sel mi 'gyur// bcu drug 'od kyis mun pa sel// tha dad rin chen rnyed 'gyur tsam// dang por de ltar de bzhin no// rin chen rang las rtogs pas rnyed// mun pa'i srag ni tshon nag bzhin// sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i nyi ma bzhin// rin chen
152b4(rnying rgyud): dang de bzhin no// sprin med nyi ma shar ba'i 'od// nyi zer drogs la bde 'bras 'byung // rang las rin chen rnyed 'gyur te// yang gsang thugs la bde 'bras 'thung // sku gnyis 'gro don byin rlab snang // 'gro ba rnams la bde 'bras sdang // rgya mtsho'i kha dang rgyam tshol
152b5(rnying rgyud): gting // rkyen gyis de ltar de bzhin du// tha dad pa dang tha mi dad// rin chen rnyed pa de bzhin no// yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems nyid rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// chos dang chos nyid gnyis su med//
152b6(rnying rgyud): chos rnams thams cad 'khor ba dang // 'khor ba nyid kyang sems yin pas// sems nyid rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa gnyis su med// chos rnams thams cad kun rdzob ste// kun rdzob nyid kyang sems yin te// sems nyid rnam
152b7(rnying rgyud): par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med// sangs rgyas sems can de bzhin no// gsang ba cher gsang yang gsang thugs// gnyis la re re gdams ngag ni// 'od kyis mun pa se la mi sel// tha dad pa dang tha mi dad// rim bzhin rin chen
153a1(rnying rgyud): ba mas dag 'gyur// zhes kyi la lags ga sa nang las/ ga / zhan pa 'ang dag pa 'dun papa byatan pa'i mabagab na can nan ma ldan 'das na mnas/
153a2(rnying rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas/ zin las kyi rgyal po gam kau rbaka la sogs pa la/ dgongs rgyud gtid pa la brtan par bzung ba'i tshang du 'di gsungs so// chos rnams thams cad bye med la// rtog pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal sbyin// de dag spel bar ba' byed// 'dra
153a3(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang po babam nas gsungs// rjes 'jug rnams kyis brtan por zung // 'gro ba las ni dang po yis// dgongs rgyud yi ger bris gyur nas// klog dang khatron byed pa rnams// bla med gnas su mi bye bar// dkon mchog sgra sgrogs gnas su hA/
153a4(rnying rgyud): ngan pa len par por// rim pas bgrod nas byang chub thob// dgongs rgyud 'di la thos bsams na// rjes 'jug thogs med shes rab 'gyur// dgongs rgyud 'di la bshad gyur na// bye ba ma brgyad gnas lnga la// 'di yis 'bras bu 'phel bar 'gyur
153a5(rnying rgyud): dgongs rgyad 'di la bsgom gyur na// tshe 'di gid la phyir mi ldog/ mngon shes drug ni 'char bar 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen la/ ci 'dod don ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gru gsung thugs kyi gsang rgyud las// snga rabs nga sngar slad kyis 'byor//
153a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas 'di las 'byung ba yin// rjes 'jug las ni dang po yis// mthong zhing thos na rtogs par 'gyur// 'di la ma yengs dam tshig che// rdo rje'i thugs las rtogs gyur na// thugs kyi sgra dang thugs kyi gsung // bde bar gshegs pas rab sngang
153a7(rnying rgyud): pas// yon tan thams cad 'di las 'byung // dngos por lta ba'i gsang sngags kyang // 'di nyid bzung zhing bklags spyad na// dam pa rnams kyi dam pa'i mchog/ dngos po sgyu ma na bud mthong // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje'i
153b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med par bzhugs te/ tIng nge 'dzin las bzhengs so// zin las kyi rgyal po ka te rugs kyang thugs rdo rje la gnyis su med par zhugs te/ gcig gi rang bzhin du mnyam zhing dbyer med par gyur te/ mi snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra
153b2(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs la gtad cing bzung ba'i le'u ste brgyad cu gnyis pa'o// / bid+yo d+ham 'bum sde'i nang nas/ kI la la gsang ba'i dgongs chud ces bya ba rdzogs so// / u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma thod phreng dang / mang yul gyi lce ku ku rA tsa dang /
153b3(rnying rgyud): thang ti dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// gzungs ma mkhar chen bza' la gtad pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la ya dwe Sha pa ri shud+d+ha rA dza tar+b+ha tsA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur ba zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i chung kyi rgyal po
153b4(rnying rgyud): zhes tha ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs so so ma yin pa'i rang bzhin te/ de nyid kyi ngo ngos
153b5(rnying rgyud): mtha' dbus med pa'i gsang ba nas drag po zung gsum ste/ 'jigs byed drag po'i rgyan mang pos bklubs pa/ de nyid rigs dang rdo rje dang grangs dang rnam pa thams cad kyi khyad par dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi phur pa'i ngo bor bzhugs so// de la bcom ldan 'das ches bka
153b6(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi phur pa gsad pa 'di lta bu/ e ma 'khor/ e ma he ru ka legs so legs so// snying rje chen po byang chub kyi sems chen po dam tshig chen po snying po rdo rje phur pa zhe sdang yongs su dag pa
153b7(rnying rgyud): sa bya ba nyon cig/ karma he ru kas gsol pa/ byang chub sems 'di snying rje ji ltar 'gyur// rnal 'byor dbang phyug ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas/ lus dbus ye shes ros gang ba// mong nga byang chub sems su bshad// phyag
154a1(rnying rgyud): che la rab gnas pa// thig le dbus nas 'dren pa ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por gsungs// karba he ru kas gsol pa/ badz+ra zhes pa ji ltar 'gyur// de yi mtshan nyid zin bu// kI la la zhes ci zhig gsungs// bcom ldan
154a2(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// badz+ra zhes pa rdo rjer gsungs// kI la ya zhes phur pa ste// rdo rje phur ba bdag nyid rgyud// nga yis bshad kyi khyod nyon cig/ dgug dang dbul dang gsad pa dang // rengs pa nyid dang bskrad pa dang // sde dpung ba ma dang mngon myed pa'o//
154a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa'i rim pa dag/ brtul zhugs bcas pas mnyan par gyis// ye shes chen po lus la gnas// kun tu rtog pa'i 'ching ba bcom// lus la ye shes sred mi 'gyur// ka ma he rugs gsol pa/ kye khrag 'thung gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das nyad
154a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi gnas su mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rten gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis po// sum cu rtsa gnyis 'di dag kyang byang chub kyi sems bde ba 'dzag pa'i mtshan nyid can kho na'o// de la gtso bo gsum ste/ la la nA dang / ra sa r+tha dang /
154a5(rnying rgyud): dA t+yASh+Ta'o// la la nA ni g.yas nyid gnas// ra sa nA ni g.yon du shes// a ba dA tI dbus na 'dzag/ gzung dang bral zhing dri ma med// shin tu phra ba'i bdag nyid can// a h+ye hA wag+h+nA r+'u pA dang / di zla dang / bA lA dang / b+ha min+ni dang / kAr ma tra dang / thA ba k+Shi dang /
154a6(rnying rgyud): shaMkA dang / doSh+Tha dang / ShA dz+nya dang / mA tA rA dang / sarba d+hi dang / shI tad dang / ts+lit+ma dang / lamahA dang / a bar+d+ha d+hI dang / ras rbA dang / pra ba d+ha dang / gr-iSh+Na dang / su rba pi NI dang / pA mA tre dang / hai tu dA li kA dang / pi yo gA dang / pre ma N+Di dang / si d+hi dang / sA
154a7(rnying rgyud): dang / su ma hA s+thA dang / hrakr-in+ti dang / kA mad+hi dang / ge d+ha dang / tsaN+Dak+Sha dang / sA rang ri kI'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos ji ltar blta/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ khams gsum po ni khu ba'i gzugs
154b1(rnying rgyud): brel thig le'i gzugs can nyid// rtag tu rnam spangs bde ba'i gzugs// gyi dang nang gi dbye ba gsum// A li dang ni kA li dang // zla ba nyi ma g.yas dang g.yon// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid do// chos kyi thig le dang / longs khyod ci thig le dang
154b2(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i thig me dang / bde ba chen po'i thog pan// page bzhin/ yongs ma'o// sum pa'i nyin la thig bzhig su/ shing gzus ba'i'o// chos kyi thig le la bcad do// longs slod zag pa la gdu ga to// 'ad bachen pa'ibag pa sa
154b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis so// mtshon pa ni bzhi ste/ sna tshogs dang / smin pa dang / btsing ba dang / bral ba rnams so// gnas lcags kyi de kho na nyid bzhi ni/ bdag dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang / lha dang phung pa'i mtshan nyid kying kho na nyid do// sa zhi ni/ bde ba'i sa dang /
154b4(rnying rgyud): ma dang thal bu'i ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i sa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa 'o// bang gi sa dang a la dang thal ba zhes pang dag par 'tho'o// deltar bams da ni pazhi ba'i nga ba byaba'o/ la pa'i rig mi spang bas theg sa rnams pas bas
154b5(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po'i thig le 'dzag pas phyag rgya chen po bskyed pa nyid do// rdo n+d+ha phur pa zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las byang chub sems kyi le'u skye dang po'o// / de nas byed rngub sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ yi dwags rnams ci gto
154b6(rnying rgyud): sasna/ sa /
154b7(rnying rgyud): lA yi ge oM la sogs pa dang / sA hA ni mthar ro// hUM dang phaT ni bar dri gzhug pa'o// oM badz+ra k+Shi pi kI la ya a ka tsa Da ta ba ya shaM swA hA/ gnas nas bskrad pa'i sngags so// lha mo rnams kyis bon ni/ a a yaM a a a a a a a a/ sa bon
155a1(rnying rgyud): ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra bo ta trUM k+Sha gardza ga dza hU~M phaT swa hA/ g+h+raM kA ra na ta badz+ra kI la ya ng+ku trUM hUM phaT phaT/ dngos grub don ni dbye ba'o// sngon du bsnyen pa ni sum 'bum mo// der bsgrub bya de rnam par bsams te bran chen po des 'asgo napa
155a2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub bya thams cad kyi go bcad par 'gyur ro// rdo rje sman gyi cho ga'o// tsha ba'i rims kyis thebs par 'dod na/ gnod sbyin gyi shing arga ta'i 'dab ma la drug dang skye tshe dang shing tsi ta ka'i khubs gdugs can gyi ming bris pa/ phur khrod kyi kAR+Sha bcug la sngags bzlam pa
155a3(rnying rgyud): khrir b+ha ba ni/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sha hUM hU~M hU~M hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ bri ru bzlas pas 'grub pa'o// bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod pas/ dpyid zla ra ba'i yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la shing a shwa ka'i drung du gos dmar po gyon la shing ma gau ta'i 'bras bu bza' shing
155a4(rnying rgyud): ma ki tsi ka'i thig le byas te sngags bzlas pa ni/ oM a ma yo gi mi hri b+ha shi d+ha ru swA hA/ khris khugs so// de nas dud 'gro rnams kyi snying po dbye ste/ oM badz+ra kI la ya b+he lub uts+tshaT ta u phaT/ khres brjod nas glang po che'i mche ba'i phur bu zil pas kyang rdod 'thos
155a5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra kI la ya pad+ma ma ma uts+tsha Ta ta hUM phaT ces brjod pas/ stag gi mche ba g.yas pa'i phung pa dril bas stag mi gzan 'bros par 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya i li mi li phu phuM uts+tsha Tata hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas sbrul chen
155a6(rnying rgyud): po'i mche bzil bas/ sbrul mi gzan 'thos par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin rdo rje rnon po'i phyag rgya bstan na// khri rgod 'thos par 'gyur ro// rdo rje rin chen las rnams kyis// so so tha dad las sogs bya// rdo rje phur ba zhe sdang yongs su dag
155a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud las sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ dang po byams pa bsgom byas te// gnyis pa snying rje rnam par bsgom// gsum pa dga' ba bsgom pa nyid// btang snyoms
155b1(rnying rgyud): gyi mjug tu// de nas yang ni 'di ltar te// stong pa'i bde babyung chub dang // gnyis pas dngos thos bon bsdus// gsum pas khrag 'thung gzugs rdzogs pad// bzhi pa sa/ sa po'i dbang po dgod// dza na nyis mngon du bsgom// nyi mdes chog
155b2(rnying rgyud): rje dngos// rdo rje de nyid bsgom par bya// ra ba dang ni thog gis bcings// dang por bsgom bya dbang phyug chen po nyid// blo ldan chos nyid rang bzhin no// rnal 'byor de steng gnas pa ni// khrag 'thung 'bar ba bsgom par bya'o// rang nyid nyi ma'i snying po bsgom/
155b3(rnying rgyud): dngos po de nis bon dkyil 'khor ro// yi ge hUM byung 'jigs men po// shes rang rang bzhin cher rnyed nyid// kha dog nag po 'jigs med do// yi ge hUM las rdo rje byung // rdo rje lte ba'i dbus na gnas// kyi ljid yongs su zhu ba las// zhe sdang bdag por rnam pa
155b4(rnying rgyud): bsgos// nag po chen po rdo rje rtse// kun rnams kun gyi 'chang byed pa'i// lha mo lnga yis yang dag mchod// nag mo las nag zug dzin ma// chags pa'i lag na rje 'dzin ma// 'jigs zed ma ni sra 'dzin ma// sngobasangs ma ni ro 'idon ma// 'jigs
155b5(rnying rgyud): moni la khyad byed ma'o// lha mo lnga yi khyad par gyis// bde chen 'jigs pa'i gzugs mchod pa'o// dpa' bo gajigs pa'i gzugs can la// bsdus te snying gar rab zhugs pas// rnal 'byor pa bdag zhe sdang 'gyur// sngon po cung zad dmar mdangs mdog
155b6(rnying rgyud): khros pa'i gzugs 'chang zhing // dmar nag ral pa gyen du brdzes// rgyan lnga yis ni rnam par brgya// ngus pa'i 'khor lo sbrul gdub dang // spa yi ske dgas thal chen tshom bu dang // rak+ta'i thig les rnam brgyan pa// 'di dag rgyan lngang rab tu thag pa/
155b7(rnying rgyud): na rdza bang dag pa khrag 'thung la// lo ni bcu drug yon pa yi// lus 'dra khros pa'i lha stangs mdzad// g.yon gyi dang po me dpung ste// bar pa kha d+hi ci gsum 'dzin/ phagayas na rdo rje nag zo ste// bar brtse lnga thags kar bstan// zas rab thar ba bstan/
156a1(rnying rgyud): phaT srog pa'i bdag nyid can// mgon po dur khrod khrag rnon gsol// khro rgyal khrag 'thung bcus bskor zhing // mi bzad gar thabs rol pa'i tshul// shes rab rdo rje chus 'debs ni// chags pa 'grol 'dzin yab la 'jung/
156a2(rnying rgyud): g.yas pa lha mi nad k+ta stob// phyag drug zhal gsul 'jigs pa'i gzugs// hUM gas la lha yi 'khor lo rdzogs// zhabs 'og dbang phyug chen po mnan// nges par rnam par brdzis pa'o// rdo rje phur pa zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las lha nyid kyi le'u ste gsum pa/
156a3(rnying rgyud): nas dbang bskur ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ snying gar 'od zer 'bar 'gro 'khrug/ phyung bas sngon po lugs kyu'i gzugs// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag na gnas// spyan 'dren mchod bstod dang po yin// 'og min sangs rgyas spyan drangs te// nam mkhar 'dzegs pa
156a4(rnying rgyud): gas can bsams// de nas khro mo lngas mchod de// khrag 'thung rjes su bskul nas ni// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu maM sarba badz+ra ka tha/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// khrag 'thung gzugs su gyur nas ni// mkha' gsong sbyor ba'i byin rlab las//
156a5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyi bor bskur// lha yi dbang bskur chags chen la// kur gum char dang glus bstod nas// mgo steng rang gi bdag por bzhugs// de ltar khrag 'bung skur rdzogs nas// thun mtshams bzhir ni byin gyis rlobs// bsgom pa lus
156a6(rnying rgyud): langs nas su// khrag 'thung gzugs su gnas par bya'o// rdo rje phung ba zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las lha la dbang bsrung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas gnas kyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ shing gcig rlung dang ma drangs pa// ru
156a7(rnying rgyud): shing gdug pa yod pa dang // ma bdun gnas pa'i khyim rnams dang // srog chag ra dang chu srin kha// g.yul ngobakye dang mtshon phog dang // bsad bcad pa dang ma rungs pa// 'di ni drag po sgrub pa'i gnas// srin po bsgral ba'i sa mkhar dang // srog
156b1(rnying rgyud): bsang pa'i khrub rjes dang // ma bdun 'dus pa'i sa dag tu// zhi bsrub pa'i gnas su gsungs// me tog 'bras bu ldan pa'i de// gcan gzan gdug pa yod pa dang // rang ba bzhad dang skad stun bya// mchi spring dang nr-i rgyal ba'i gnas// bram po'i rjeb dang sa
156b2(rnying rgyud): yod// kring bzeng dag dang lha yi gnas// rgyu rten drung dang drar khrod bya// 'dir ni rgyas pa bsgrub par bya'o// stag gi so 'dra sbrul gyi sde// khrag ni srin mo'i mgo bcad 'dra// lung ba zangs 'drab dang // ston pa'i zhabs kyis bcags pa gnas// 'di nang
156b3(rnying rgyud): bkra shis bde ba'i gnas// 'dir ni dbang gi las sgrub gsungs// 'di dag gnas kyi rim pa ste// gye bas rnam pa bzhi rnams ni// sgrub pa'i gnas su gsungs pa'o// rdo rje phur ba zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste sa //
156b4(rnying rgyud): de nas phur bu'i rgyu bstan pa'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ kI ya ya yi sgra rnams ni// ni zhing gzug pa'i mtshon shing la// zangs sam lcags sa ma rin chen rnams// bkra shis pa yi chu ru gsungs// drag po lcags kyi bur pa la// gr-i lcags mdo nyi rtag byin dang
156b5(rnying rgyud): gnam lcags theg gi lugs dag dang // gcong dang n-i dang bra la sogs// lcags snalnga po dag la ni// drag po mi bzad phu rang bya// bsod nams can gyi rus pa la// kI la ya yi chur gsungs pa'o// dbang la zangs dmar nyid kyis bya'o// rgyas pa gser la dog
156b6(rnying rgyud): bas bya// zhi btsan dan dkar pos bya// rtse mo'i dbyibs ni so sor byed// gzhan yang tshor ma can gyi shing // rab tu mi sun gnas dag nas// gang dag skyes pa gang yin pa// dug dang btsan dug gnas pa dang // rab tu gtum pa'i gnas dag dang /
156b7(rnying rgyud): skyes pa'i shing mchog tshor ma can// gang dag skyer ldeng dug shing dang // srin po'i mchog phur g.yas pa la// rtsa ba'i logs su rgya mdud bya'o// rtse mo'i phyogs su zur gsum bya// gzhung mthun de dag ma rnyed na// yi ge gsum gyis bya bar gsungs
157a1(rnying rgyud): de dag tshad la mi ldan yang // las rnams 'grub par bshad pa yin// sor bzhi pa dang sor brgyad pa// bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs pa te// debs ring bar ba gsungs so// blang bar yang na yongs ma gsungs// dzar
157a2(rnying rgyud): bu'i tshad kyi dbye ba ni// dgug bzangs kyi phur bu yin// dbye ba seng lded phur ba yin// bskrad pa dug shir phur pa'o// mA ra ya yi lcags phur nyid// mnan pa gser gyi phur bus bya'o// bur bu de rnams rgyu rnams la// sor gcig pa ni rgya mdud bya// stod
157a3(rnying rgyud): zur brgyad mtshan nyid la// smad ni zur gsum nyid du bya// ri rab che ltar brjid chags pa// 'bar sprin 'khrugs pas rnam brgyan pas// shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshul 'chang zhing // gsal ba phye ba de kho na'o// rdo rje phur pa zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las hUM
157a4(rnying rgyud): dang tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ thog mar sku gsum du byin gyis brlab par bya'o// dang po stong pa nyid bsgom nas// chos skur byin gyis rlob pa'o// rgya mdud gzhal med khang dmigs te//
157a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga rnams su// rno myur yi ge hUM lnga bzhag/ dbus su khrag 'thung 'bar ba nyid// shar du khams gsum rnam par rgyal// lho ru gshin rje gshed po nyid// nub tu rta mgrin rgyal po ste// byang nyid du ni stobs po che// 'di rnams so so'i snying po dran ce
157a6(rnying rgyud): gyis bsgral te/ gzugs dang gnyis su med mchod de// dkyil 'khor rgyas par rab dmigs te// phyi nang mchod pa ma lus 'bul// de nas dam tshig nyid bskul nas// gnyis su med par lha rnams rdzogs// gsal ba lha yi dkyil 'khor ro// longs spyod rdegs
157a7(rnying rgyud): skur byin gyis rlob pa'o// de nas sras mchog kI la yar bskyed pa ni/ lte ba yan chad mthing nag la// dbu skra kha ma nag gyen du 'khyil// sbrul nag brgyan cing thod phreng bcings// spyan gsum pa ni sdang mig bgrad// g.yon pa'i phur bu dag la gzigs// mche rnam
157b1(rnying rgyud): par gtsigs pa te// rab tu dam pa'i zhal dang ldan// dra khrod me dpung dbus na 'gying // lte ba yan chad chas rnams ni// lcags kyi phur ba zur gsum pa// me yi nang du brtan par bzhugs// phrug bzhig las kyi dang pon// rdo rje chen po'i dbug zo 'dzin// de dza /
157b2(rnying rgyud): rje rgya tha ma 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po kha T+wAM 'grol// khro bos bdud dpung rnam par 'joms// de 'og phur ba zur gsum pa// 'debs pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa yis// ngan song gsum dag 'jigs byed pa'o// stobs dang mthu dpung rtsal chen drag/ thams cad 'dus
157b3(rnying rgyud): teb+ha ga par 'jigs// thugs las phyung ste rtag pa chen por bzhugs// 'di ni sbrul skya'i byin gyis rlob pa'o// bde gshegs lnga ru byin rlob pa// gnas lngar 'bru lnga gzhag ste brlag/ sku gsung thugs su byin brlab pa// spyi bor oM la sked par hrI// rtse mo ra phaT ni bsam
157b4(rnying rgyud): bar bya'o// shes 'ogazugs kyis shes ni// rtsegacig pacu byen gyis bana'as// bu gsum du ni paT gsum bzhag/ ngos gsum du ni hUM gsum ste// de yi rigs rnams sasano// jo bo rnams kyis dbang bskur te// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur spos// bsdu
157b5(rnying rgyud): pas gzugs rnams thams cad kun// hUM dang phaT kyi sba 'byin pa// sku yi tshogs la rnam par bstim// bdag nyid bdag nyid chen po yin// phur ba yang bdag nyid chen po nyid du dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ lag pa g.yas pa'i steng du ma las nyi ma'i dkyil
157b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi steng du hUM bsam/ g.yon par a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rtswa a bsam/ gung mo ya oM bsam/ mthe bong la hUM/ mdzub mo la tAM/ srin lag la thibasam/ mthe chung la a bsam/ 'di rnams nyi bla'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rnam par gnas par bsam/
157b7(rnying rgyud): nas rdo rje thal mo mnyam par gzhag par bya ste/ oM badz+ra any+dza mi hUM zhes brjod pas/ sor mo cung zad bsnol te/ badz+ra b+haT+Ta hUM zhes brjod pas sor mo rgya ba sbyar te bsdam/ de nas sa ma ya hUM zhes brjod pas phur ba zang bte lag par bcug la/ lag pa ting pa rtse te/
158a1(rnying rgyud): sa tu san/ sto sananas bya dun ga nas
158a2(rnying rgyud): smra na
158a3(rnying rgyud): sun
158b1(rnying rgyud): sa tshor bar bya ba dang // spos nA ro la myong ba dang // dag badrug med bsnyen pa nyid// gzugs ni rnam par rgyal ba'o// tsher bu gshin rje'i gshed po nyid// 'du shes ha ya grI bya'o// 'dra byed bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'o// rnam shes phung po zhe sdang ba dang /
158b2(rnying rgyud): sa pa dbyug pa sngon po ste// khrag ni mi g.yo mgon po'o// drod ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// dbugs ni khams gsum rnam rgyal nyid// pags pa khro bo stobs po che// rtsa rgyas khro bo hU~M kA ra// rnam par rgyal dang gshin rje'i gshed// ha ya gI dang bdud rtsi
158b3(rnying rgyud): 'khyil// dbyug sngon can dang mi g.yo mgon// gzhan gyis mi thug khams gsum rgyal// hU~M kA ra dang stobs po che// bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs// srid pa rang gi ngo bo yis// lha 'di rnams kyi ngo bor gnas// yul gyi dngos por snang ba yi//
158b4(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi rdo rje snyoms ma nyid// skra yi cha la skra 'byin ma'o// dri la rdo rje sder mor gsungs// ro la dur khrod bdag mor grags// reg la rdo rje gtun khung nyid// chos khams rdo rje mda' snyems ma// rang bzhin dngos po dag pa ste// phyi yi dngos po rdo rje rlung bgyin
158b5(rnying rgyud): mdo// nang gi cha la rdo rje gsod ma'o// go ro tsa na rdo rje bskyod chen ma// phyag drug pha rol phyin pa druzug/ zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi rnam rgyal nyid// khams gsum rnam par thar pa nyid// rdo rje gsum ni spyan gsum mo// chags pa yis ni lha tshogs ni// dbang
158b6(rnying rgyud): rlamag sum rnam par grol// 'di ni phung po rnam par spungs// gang dang gang gis 'jig rten bcings gyur pa// de ni bcings pa las dgrol te// de nyid mi shes 'jig rten grol ma yin// de nyid rnam spangs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// de phyir dri med bla med gzugs
158b7(rnying rgyud): me'o// ro dang sems kyi rnam par dag pa med// reg pa med cing chos kyi dngos po med// gnas lnga rang bzhin dag pas rnam po la nyid// rdo rje phung pa zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas slo
159a1(rnying rgyud): thal dbang bgra pa'i 'thab nga cuta/ da soras yin pa byang 'a'adabs spyo sa sa/ 'a bya 'khor 'dogs pa gro/ dang TI ba spang / rgyu ba stan myadang bangasanan/ nga
159a2(rnying rgyud): ma pa rab tu bzhengs// rus pa la sogs drug tshan dam pa dang // rin chen lnga yi phye ma dang // nas dang 'bru la sogs pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor khru gsum dang // mthe bong bdun gyis legs par bya// rdo rje rigs kyi mtshan ma'o// rig ma bzang po rnam
159a3(rnying rgyud): par gzhag/ yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de// lo ni bcu drug lon pa nyid// gang 'di khu bar ldan 'gyur ba// de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya// phyag rgya gdod yang bcings pa la// thabs kyi gdod yang de bzhin ni// pad+ma rin chen bu ga'i rtsa// rdo rje khros pas kha rda na
159a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen thig le dbus na drangs// shi bya'i kha ru mu kha 'dren// ro mnyam bde ba'i spyod yul nyid// rmi lam 'dra ba kho nar 'gyur// dngos su mtshan nyid mi phyed pa// phyag rgya rnal 'byor 'di yis 'grub// ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs pa//
159a5(rnying rgyud): gsum yang dag 'bar ba nyid// sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen po ste// thod phreng rdo rje ra bar bcas// rdo rje me 'od 'bar bar ldan// do shal do shal phyed pas brgyan// phreng ba sna tshogs rnga yab ldan// zhing gi rkang chen brgyad kyis brgyan// rdo rje srad bu mnyam
159a6(rnying rgyud): pAr rdzan// mye tog sna tshogs nye bar brtun// bdug pa mar me nye bar bri// bum pa bcu gcig sogs par ldan// de yang yal ga la sogs brgyan// mgrin bzhing gis bka' ba dang // rin chen sA lnga yongs su gzhug/ rnam par thal ba shang
159a7(rnying rgyud): sbyin// rang 'dod khrag bzung gzugs kyis ni// dur khrod spa shad na spyad pa// sar pa legs par bkal ba dang // shin tu tshad ma mdzes pa yis// mkhas pas thig ler thig gdab po// 'khor lo'i bdag po'i bzlas pa 'bum// dkyil khor

159b2(rnying rgyud): da bye ba/ rlung gi dkyis 'khor chog bzhin// mtshad dang gsol ba gdab pa dang // ji ltar bshang pa de bzhin 'dir// bslang bdi ltar gsungs pa nyid// dbang ni rim pas sbyin par bya// dbang sngags rim gnyis dkyil 'dod de// dkyis sa
159b3(rnying rgyud): ngo'i dbus sra ni// rdo rje nag po'i dkyil 'khor bri// brgya byin rdzogs su rdo rje ba myed ni rdo rje rin chen bri// gshin rje'i phyogs su rdo rje mda' nyid bri// badren thal phyogs su rdo rje gzhu nyid bri// chu bdag phyogs su rdo rje stong bri// rlung
159b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs su rdo rje me nyid bri// gnod sbyin phyogs sku rdo rje dbyug tho ze// dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje tse gsum bri// shar stod du ni rdo rje thod pa bri// rngub smad du ni rdo rje rkang pa bri// shin tu 'dzegs pa'i gzugs can ji// so sor thar ba dang po d+ha
159b5(rnying rgyud): dodang byung chung ngomachen rjen// de nas dbum chos rnams bshad// mthar ni 'bras bu'i thig chen rje// dbang sbyin 'bras bu'i rgyud 'di bshad// de nus rdo rje stem bcus nas// rgud pa g.yas pa brgyad byas nas// 'og gnyis phyags rje/
159b6(rnying rgyud): slo dben dkyil 'khor ba drug pa nyid// khrus dngag cing thu zhim thas// hUM tshogs rgyan gyi rnam par btsud// hU~M rnams thams 'di sa yang sgrogs// hiti 'jigs pa'i hU~M sbyi nas// dkyil 'khor chen por gzhug par 'gyur
159b7(rnying rgyud): dge gling dpon mtshan nyid ni// lus sems gzung ba med pa'o// sha dang khrag kyang med cing bshad gci med// smug bro mongs med gtsang sgra med// chags med sdang ba med pa'o// ser snga med cing thag dog med pa'o// rgyal med pham pa med
160a1(rnying rgyud): ba'o// khro ba med pa'i slob dpon kyis// skyob ma lan dpung sbyin no// bum pa nacod pa na dang // rdo rje nil bu thur ba drin tshun dadang // mau dab de bzhin bdag pa'i dbang // mthang myos bkra shes pa dang rga
160a2(rnying rgyud): rin chen thig le sems dbang ngo // dbyings phyug rtsa nas drangs te bskur// yid bzhin pa ni rin chen mchog/ dbang sbyin pa yi slob ma des// der ni 'di rnams ma byin na// mi bde sna tshogs 'byung ba dang // ma 'ongs mnar med 'a
160a3(rnying rgyud): ni// zhe sdang bdag po nyid kyis gsungs// de byas 'di rnams dbul bar bya'o// ka rA pa nA stong rnams dang // bu drang chung ma rgyan gyis brgyan// rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i rdzas// bran pho bran mo 'khor dang bcas/
160a4(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur bla ma de la dbul// de med dbang rnams mi thob po// rdo rje phur pa zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las dbang gi rim pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas spyod pa'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ gang gi dngos grub mthar 'gro ba// rdo rje gzhon nu
160a5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub rgyu// sgrub pa po yis bcang bya ba// rna bar rus pa'i rna cha nyid// spyi bor rus pa'i 'khor lo bzeng // lag par rus pa'i phreng pa nyid// sked par sgra yis ske ragra gnyis bskor ba// rkang bar de bzhin dus gdub dang // dbyung ba'i rtsa bar rus phreng nyid// mtha
160a6(rnying rgyud): par rus pa'i phreng ba ste// 'go ba glang chen pags pa nyid// khrag 'thung he ru skyes bu nyid// spyod pa dngos grub don du byed// sman chen po ni bza' bar bya// rdo rje'i chu nyid btung bar bya// rim gyi nad kyis 'chi mi 'gyur// mi do'i sgra yis cod pan bya// hU~M zlos
160a7(rnying rgyud): sbyor bcan// khrag 'thung lnga yi thod pas brgyan// btul zhugs sbyor pa rnam par 'dzin// thod pa sod lnga'i tshad duH// gra la ke rags nyis bskor ni// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin yin// thal klu zhags mchog gyi ru thogs// rdo rje rtse dgu bzlas phyir thogs//
160b1(rnying rgyud): shes rab rang bas te// da bad ngogs bcu grags dang // skal med rnams kyis dmyigs// baba' dang de bzhin drang tid// nga gar rnyed paras tha bzang // bapa' dang mi bzang dbyung mibya// bza'angam yin thams ca pa'// gtsang dang bcan drang
160b2(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog med// 'gro dang mi 'gro nam rtog med// phyag rgya rnyed pa'i slob ma yang // blam pa ni thon phyag 'tshal// dur khrod dang khrag pa byed cing // btul zhugs chen pos rgyu bar bya// phyag na rdo rje phur pa 'dzin// gu gul khrag dang sha chen 'dzin// hud dkar rgyab
160b3(rnying rgyud): po khrag chen bsnams// gnod gdug rnam gnyis bsgral slad du// rnal 'byor spyod pa seng ge lta bur bya// 'jigs med spyod pa mchog tu gsungs// rdo rje phur pa zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las spyod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas dkas grugs pa
160b4(rnying rgyud): gzugs// mthing nag gur chen rgyan gyis brgyan// 'azub khung mtshan nyid 'di ltar gsungs// gzhan yang sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ni// lha yi dkyil khor rdzogs pa dang // phyag brtan dkyil 'khor dbar bslar dang // phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang /
160b5(rnying rgyud): phyag brnyan rnam ni bskul ba dang // snying po bzlas brjod 'don pa dang // bsrub pa'i cho ga zhis su bshad// rgyas 'debs ma yis don 'di gsol// dgug pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// dgug pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa// rlung gi rnga mo'i steng du ni// zla ba'i
160b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgya tham bsam// dmar skyug rlung gi tshogs kyis gtams// de yi steng du bsgrub bya ni// gcer bu ral bsnyil 'dar ba bsam// rdo rje khro bos spa nas bzung // lcags kyu 'bar bas rab drangs te// dmar skrag 'bar ba'i ral ba can// rdo
160b7(rnying rgyud): zhags pas 'dzud par bsam// nag po'i lcags sgrog sdang sgra can// shin tu 'bar bas bsdam par mdzad// sngo sangs dgyes pa'i tshul bzhin gnas// rdul phran dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan// dgug pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ltar bshad// rgyas 'debasam

161a3(rnying rgyud): rin chen phyag gis bzang // khro bo'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// skye bo mgrin pa snying ga dang // lte ba gsang ba rkang mthil rtsa// sras mchog phur bas phug nas ni// khro bo'i tshogs kyis sems drangs te// bka' nyan rnams kyis khrag 'byungs pas/
