161b4(rnying rgyud): dris par bsas// bdag can cirig pa dag/ 'i dbyel 'tshor byeng gnang // thig ma gzing ding can par du ji cing bye drung rnam par 'azhugs/ ga'i brjid can par gan par 'grags/ thang bags pa'i mtshan nyid // 'a
161b5(rnying rgyud): sangs ni// bka' thu lta ba'i dbras su brtan// bskab cug sa nga'i mtshan nyid de// dad byar pa zhe sdang rmongs dag pa'i rlud pas bsdad bya'i la ste badrug cig // de nas breg med bye 'a'i 'tha bshad par byas/ gangags pa'i dzin
161b6(rnying rgyud): bramra gyis// bsgrub pa'i dngos gru ba thob ra 'gyur// bslab bya'i lte ba'i rtsa drag pa// 'jigs pa srin po'i gzugs can bas ma// snying gar byin pa'i sadon nyid// gcer bras grol khrag skrag cing // 'dar zhing stidra tshugs gnas par bang ma// shAn/
161b7(rnying rgyud): rjo 'a mdun// badrad kyi bakhyil ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bshang pa'i sam du phrag nang ni// shathag mnar te srin pos thos// mthag par na myor mi 'gyur// thug pas dga' ba 'byin thon// gang yang dmigs pa kang cig gis// lung tsam gyingan/
162a1(rnying rgyud): gsod par byed// rgyud 'di la ni sprin theg med// phyag rgya bcing bar bya ba'ang med// rgyud 'di bklags pas grub pa yin// bsam ga tun tsam gyis 'jub par 'gyur// nam rtog med pa'i rnal 'byor dag/ bstan pa 'dzi du
162a2(rnying rgyud): byed dang // bla ma la ni smod byed pa// bla ma thab pa la zhus nas// snying rjes gsang bar bya ba las// gzhan du bya bar ma gsungs so// rdo rje phur bzhi sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las thig le dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas ltan
162a3(rnying rgyud): masru ba shad par bya'o// mnyam pa mdungs dpral ba can// dkyil 'khor byed pa'i bskabs ni// gsong ba'i lta ba mchog tu 'ashad// bus mo zlum por bcugs nas nI// dbang gi lta stangs g.yon na gnas// g.yas pa g.yon du rdzog nas de//
162a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i chal rnam par gzigs// dbang gi blta ba yin par bshad// dpung pa'i 'dug stangs legs gnas nas// mig phur gnyis ni ldog nas ni// sna yi rtse mor blta ba ni// rgyas pa'i lha stangs yin par bshad// mig phur gnyis ni legs bzhag nas
162a5(rnying rgyud): dbus su mnyam por blta 'dra ni// zhi ba'i lha stangs yin par bshad// 'di la 'khrug par mi bya ste// 'gru ba 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// lha stangs chen po 'di yis ni// dregs pa can rnams brtan par bzung // sems
162a6(rnying rgyud): can bya ba spang nas ni// thub ma yin thams cad bya// de la dam tshig bza' ba dang // na nA ga ha dang po dang // tha ya~M sha dang dang po'i sha/ zhe sdang bdag pos dngos grub 'grub// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te// lha stangs bzhi yis kun bltas nas// thams
162a7(rnying rgyud): cad kun nas bza' bar bya'o// rdo rje bur bzhi sdang mongs su dag pa'i rgyud las lha sbyangs kyi le'u skye bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas srin mo'i le'u bshad par thun// dang po byams pa bsgom par bri// gnyis pa la ni snying rje ste// gsum
162b1(rnying rgyud): dar dga' ba mchog tu gsungs// thams cad pam gang noms te// de nas yang ni 'jig te// gang ba'i rin chen byang chub sems// gnyis pa ga gzugs ston mongs 'doms// gsum pa rin che na gzugs rdzogs par// bag ba dang/
162b2(rnying rgyud): na nyim rnam par bsgom// nyi ma ma tshogs rdo rje'i dngos// rab dra bar dag bcings nas// dang ba bsgom pa rlung nyid de// de 'og rin chenas gzhi ste// bzhi bzod pa'i gzhal yas dang // snga ba ma'i sgog nas 'jib// dbus sa pa dom bya'i ting /
162b3(rnying rgyud): d+has gnyis dbus su ni// dro 'i dbus su a nyid gnas// a mas 'ad+hi gar byung ste// da d+hi dbus pa A yes margyan// nag po rtsen ma stobs chen mo// zhu ba las ni dazungs pa'o// me tog 'bangar ngu'i dmar spyan nan// dmar ser dab sra then naganas/
162b4(rnying rgyud): thod pa lag na 'dzin// rak+ta'i zhag dang thig pes bstan// rgyas 'debs nag mo 'jigs chen ma// lha mo 'di bcus bskor te gnas// steng du lha mo sla babyin gnas// brgya byin phyogs su snyems ma gnas// gshin rdo'i phyogs pardo rje drang khrod gnas// zla ba
162b5(rnying rgyud): gas su rdo rje gtum chen gnas// gnod sbyin phyogs su rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// me lha'i phyogs su sde mo ste// bden thul phyogs su rdo rje gtun khrung ma// rlung lha'i phyogs su rdo rje mnga' snyoms ma// dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje gsod chen ma// sa bdag tu
162b6(rnying rgyud): rje ba spyod chen ma// lha mo 'di rnams bskor te gnas// ha ta klog pa'i bdag nyid can// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can lha mo'i tshogs// srin mo'i tshogs ni dri 'dzin mo'o// mi bzad srin mo'i dkyil 'khor po zang rdzogs// rdo rje phur pa zhe sdang yongs su rag pa'i
162b7(rnying rgyud): delas rdo rje srin mo'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas me'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ me la rnam pa du zhig mchis// khro bo'i rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ byas 'debs ma la dam 'khyud nas// me yi mtshan nyid rnam gnyis gsungs/
163a1(rnying rgyud): smra na chu / na// // ga tu
163a2(rnying rgyud): ga pa'i gong du'o// ma mo da migs pa'i thog sa nyid// brtan par byed pa thamag// gus 'byed 'od kyi gzugs can rnyed// thig dbus nas badzin pa nyid// ji dral de sang sreg paci tshig/ nang gi sbyin gro de ga gsungs// sa seM thegasas
163a3(rnying rgyud): dal 'byor mnyam ga zhag chos nyid kyis// dkyil gakhor ga tso ba mngon skul nas// mchong bu ma dang ldan pa / oM d+hU mA dzA thAT+Ta/ oM bdad+ha pa s+ya hU~Ms na/ oM ba dzI bi A dz+nyAk+ShaSh+Ta/ oM 'dzug na hA/ A ba ni sa /
163a4(rnying rgyud): ni brjod pa dang // me tog la sogs 'bul ba ni// gong ma'i chog ni rim pa yis// mchod pa zhabs dasil gong ma bzhin// zhi bar thab khung rgyam po nyid// rgyas pa la ni grwa bzhi pa// dbang shIng la ni drug ma ste// bamang bal ni grag sum bzod
163a5(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid la ni lhag sa bsgrub// khrag dang ni khwa byed nyid// zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin// drug dang ni khyod nyid// rgyas pa'i steng drang 'og tu brjod// sod ni nyi shu 'am de 'i n+ye// bsad pa'i rtang dang 'og tu yin// zhig pa dog dan por bgyur/
163a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa ser po de bzhin no// bsad pa lnga la gan// dbang yang shA shA grags// de la de bzhind ltang dathug/ bas padi ltar man la sogs// kaub te 'dung cas pa'i// bsang pa tshor ma de bzhin no// snang latshor mdang zhin brjod/
163a7(rnying rgyud): pa dkrug pa u t+pal// zhi bcom can gyi shing // rdzas la gse 'dra'i shing ting // dbang la tsan+dan lam shing nyid// gsod la drug shing nag po nyid// oM lag na se ma hA can te ba rnangs na sa mas taka/ a krar+tha mra the tas rbamasas sa smin na/
163b1(rnying rgyud): d+haH/ ma dkrug pa'o// khrag lung d+ham tham tsha ba la/ mad na dpang ngatha / chag bdag nid kyi la gakhong ba// san+dan mams nang bdu sa la myod+ha/ abla ngamapa/ zlas blanan na bas/ mdag par byed 'angad dang
163b2(rnying rgyud): so// dzaHhUM baM hog pabaM/ mchod yon gyi sngags so// oM nai ri ti trUM baM/ zhal bsil ba'i sngags so// oM 'dra'ang/ ba li'i sngags so// rdo rje phur ba zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las me'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//
163b3(rnying rgyud): gnan pa'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ phung byed sa la gzugs byas te// dri chen po yis byugs nas su// ra ma ya yi dung bas bdug/ me chen po yi drung du bzhag/ drar khrod ro yi shun lpags la// 'khor lo bcu gcig rtsibs mtshan bri// dbus su
163b4(rnying rgyud): bya'i ming gis brgyan// mthar ni ma hA ba har ldan// pho rog sgo yi sgra bu yis// gdug pa can gyi gzugs bris la// b+han d+ha kha sbyar dbus su gzhug/ khrag chen po yis byug par bya// gzugs brtan de yi snying gar gzhug/ tsan+dan me la dros par ba
163b5(rnying rgyud): lam chen rgya tham dag tu mnan// rdo rje khros pas mnan par bsam// tsan+dan shing gi shun pa la// khrag chen po yis ming bris la// ha dang sha dang bcas pa ru// gdug pa'i shing la sbyin bsreg bya// bslab bya de ni khrid par 'gyur// grog ma
163b6(rnying rgyud): dang dri chu dang // rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyis dag la// gzugs brtan sor ni bcu gnyis la// d+ha drar yi khA bas byug/ tsan+dan stug po'i me yis 'gro// bdud rtsi 'khril pa'i sbyor ba yis// dum bur gtubasre nas sbyin bsreg bya// thal ba
163b7(rnying rgyud): do nga sgyur na// nges pa kho nar spro bar 'gyur// mthing nag dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// bsgrub bya 'dar zhing 'jigs par bsam// snying gar byin za'i sa bon te// rdo rje khro bo 'jigs chen gyis// lte ba snying ga phug nas ni// khrag dang rgya
164a1(rnying rgyud): bar bsam// srin pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis// sha thAg d+ha ma zas par bsam// byin pa'i gzugs can 'bar ba yis// de ni nges par bsreg par 'gyur// de ni bsad pa'i las su gsungs//
164a2(rnying rgyud): zag dang rnga mo'i sha/ dug gi me la bsreg gyur na// des pa kho nar khugs par 'gyur// tsi ta'i khrag dang dur grangs// shAna'i dka bsres pa yis// gzugs brnyan sar ni bzhi pa Ta// kun tu sabs med nang du gzhug/ mkhal la~M
164a3(rnying rgyud): ngar thong gang la bathos gyur // bzla \u0f7fsa pa'i rlos nga rabs// dra dag gisal la// baN+Di gyi'i gzugs brnyan ga par bya// lagags thugs nas ni// ma / dgam mas pa// na pa sa

164b1(rnying rgyud): nga de nyid bza' ba nyid// der nabs nas yang dang yang // srin ma tshogs ni mchad par bya// tshogs kyi labar lo sgrub par 'gyur// bres pa'i thod pa cha gzig pa/ mang ni bzang pas yongs bkla // tham la dbul na lagyon pa/ thug bcal nas ni rang mang
164b2(rnying rgyud): btung // pad+ma'i lag pas blang ba dang // de nyid kyis kyang slar la dbul// yang nas yang du btud nas ni// tshogs kyi yum gyi don nyid zhu// 'jigs byed rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// shin tu ring min zung ba min// bad+ma'i rnam pa'i 'dang 'dra ba// de yi dbus su ji
164b3(rnying rgyud): zhim ldan// rdul dang dri zhim ldan gyur pa// ri dwags lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs// pad+ma la yang 'dab mchog dri// skad cig pad+ma lta bur 'byung // de yi ga pur si h+la dag/ lag pas dri bzang mtshon par bya// ut+pa la yi drir 'gyur zhing // a ga ru ni nag par
164b4(rnying rgyud): mtshungs// dal zhing mi g.yo ma nyad dang // snyan pa smra zhing yid 'ong ba// bla bzang dbus su gnyer ma gsum// phal pas pad+ma can du brjod// lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs 'dzin la// der skyes nas ni dngos grub 'gyur// de nas mas 'debs
164b5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor mas// gsol pa khro bo'i rgyal po yas// smon lam ji ltar gdab par bgyi// kho bo'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// khrag 'thung rigs su skyes pa yi// bsnyem med rdo rje gzhon nu nyan// bla ma la lus snying rje ldan// sde shi med par 'gyur bar shog
164b6(rnying rgyud): lag na rdo rje phur 'dzin cing // zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang // btsun mo'i khub mnyam zas can// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ de nas lha mo dgyes nas ni// tshig ni 'di nyid yang zhus pa// skal med sems can gang gis 'dral// khro bo'i rgyal pos
164b7(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// gsum pa rtsa yi sbyor ba yis// gdug dang bsad dang dbye ba dang // nga ha'i sgra yis 'dul bar 'gyur// lha mo gzhan gyis 'dul mi 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//
165a1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang phyag rgya chen po'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ thig le e baM rin chen gzugs// dbus su ba~M gis rgyas pa rab can// thig le'i rin chen gnas nyid do// sangs rgyas rin chen thig po'i gzugs// rtsa rnams kun
165a2(rnying rgyud): drangs nas ni// phra ba'i bdag nyid snying gar bsgom// phra ba ba thag tshul bzhin gnas// shin tu 'bigs pa'i bde ba'i gzugs// 'bar ba'i rtsa'u thim gyur te// yo gat+tar phra ba'i gzugs// gtum mig mar ni bde ba can// ka ta ra ya
165a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs te// bde ba 'dzin du rdo rje 'dzin// phrad pa thub pa'i bde ba mchog/ b+ha gar rin chen 'dren par byed// pad+ma rin chen rtse kha byed// rin chen bde ba phra ba'i gzugs// thig le bde ba thim gyur te// phra mo'i ye shes skye bar 'dur//
165a4(rnying rgyud): le gang bu'i gzugs can de// rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor 'dzin// bde ba phra mo phrad pa'o// 'khor lo 'bar ba drangs pa yin// shin tu badre ba'i gzugs can no// dang po bde ba'i ye shes so// 'khor lo rin chen lce dbus drangs// gtum
165a5(rnying rgyud): mo de ba'i gzug can la// mchog gi ye shes dang po yis// snying ga'i dbus su thig le 'dren// rtse gnas pu ga gsal byed pa// thig le rin chen phreng bar gnas// bde ba'i ye shes gsang mdzad mchog/ rin chen dbugs 'dren
165a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'o// 'bar ba'i thig le rin chen 'dzin// ka hA ya nar thig le'i gzugs// rin chen bde ba mchog gi mchog/ gsang pa'i bde ba gsum par gsungs// mchog gi ye shes sel mdzad pa'i// gu ga rtsa yi thig le 'dren// dbus
165a7(rnying rgyud): su phra ba'i gzugs can de// thig le ba thag rgyun bzhin gnas// nA da thams cad thi ma gyur nas// mthar phyin ye shes 'bras bu'i mchog/ phyag rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur// 'phar dang dga' dang dgod pa dang // sa la 'di dag
165b1(rnying rgyud): byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas mtshon pa dbye ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ gang gis nges pa shes gyur nas// grogs dang bran mor the tsham
165b2(rnying rgyud): med// gang gis sor mo gcig ston pa// nges par legs par 'ong ba yin// g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcas pa la// bskrun med phyag rgyar shes par bya// gang gis mthe ba srin ster ba la// de yis za chung sbyin par bya// gang gi
165b3(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo ston pa la// de yis 'og ma bstan par bya// gang gis srin lag ston pa la// de yis mgrin pa'i rus phreng bstan// gang gis so ni ston pa la// de yis dbyug to bstan par bya// gang gis nu ma ston pa la// de yis gsad pa'i
165b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bstan// gang zhig rus pa ston pa la// de yis kha ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig b+h+r-i gu ston pa la// de yis spyi gtsug 'khor lo dgrol// gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la// de yis lag ma thil bstan par bya// gang zhig rkang mthil
165b5(rnying rgyud): ston pa la// de yis brtse ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin// rdo rje phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni// bus ni dam tshig shes par 'gyur// e ma ho bu ni snying rje che// brtul zhugs phyag rgyar ldan pa de mchog/ dam tshig dbang gis srin mo 'du// rus chen phreng ba zogs
165b6(rnying rgyud): nas ni// de la dbang bskur byin rlabs 'gyur// lce khrag 'thung gi rgyal po de rnams 'du ba'i gnas gang lags/ khro bo'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang / tsha N+Do dang / pra ba ni dang / bu rtse ka dang / li he da ta dang / 'dre

166a2(rnying rgyud): med pas de'i drang // khro ba grangs pas sha nams bza'// mtshan ma rnams ni tog niH// srin ni'i tshags la gtung mthen// slab pas dngas lub thob per 'gyur// rdo rdo thar bzhe 'ang yangs srung ga pa'i chung las mangs cad pa 'ang bzad
166a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas rigs pa rtag pa'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ chas 'debs ma la dam 'khyud nas// tshems kyis ma mchu bzung nas su// rigs can rnams kyi rigs gzugs zhu// 'khor lo'i gtso bos bka' stsal pa// lus can rnams
166a4(rnying rgyud): kyi rigs bshad kyi// lha mo tshul can mchog nyon cig/ skyes pa bud med gang zhig gi// mtheb srin gyi ni rtsa ba la// rdo rje nag po ce dgu pa// de yi rtsa bar de gnas pa// rdo rje rig chen mchog tu bshad// de yi rtsa bar 'khor lo'i rigs// rin chen
166a5(rnying rgyud): kha gnyis gyes pa ni// rin po che yi rigs su gsungs// pad+ma'i sdong po chags pa ni/ pad+ma'i me yi sdong po'i 'od// dpag med pa yi rigs nyid do// rgya gra ma ral gris mtshan pa ni// las kyi rigs su gsungs pa yin// rnal 'byor gang dag kha dog nas
166a6(rnying rgyud): de yi lha ni zhe sdang sbyin// rnal 'byor pa gang dkar po ni// de yi lha ni gti mug sbyin// rnal 'byor pa gang ser chen po// de yi lha nI nga rgyal sbyin// rnal 'byor pa gang hUM sngo che// de yi lha ni phrag dog sbyin// rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dmar nyid/ chags

167b6(rnying rgyud): ngo rnabs dang / ma dz+ha thAM tha la kutra d+han de bas bsgyur/ yul dubyas 'gyur 'ad ma'i tshul du/ slad kyi bamyur ning gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kI la yA ku h+ya man+tatar+N+Na sa rba thAta s+t+wa~MH/ bad skad du/ rdo rje wa rab gas

168a7(rnying rgyud): sesems 'ang 'dres bu'i tshe phru du na rkyen 'a / nga ga bas pas bya'i // thes gsong // cos pan 'angs 'byig spyong sa bya ba'i thu sra 'i dang 'dran pa rmoms nga
168b1(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di ltar cha 'phrul snang bar byas te/ 'dra ba'i dus la bab pas dris shig// dris pa lags so// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dge bsrog dang 'dra ba la bar du gcad cang / dkar po'i las rnam par 'gegs par byed pacang
168b2(rnying rgyud): gcad pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten du cho 'phrul bskrun pa'o// sems dpa' chen po dam log dang / dam gri dang / rU dza'i sde char gcad pa'i phyir phur pa gtun khung rdo rje tho ba'i rgyur ces kyang / 'bar ba'i khro bo rol pa'i las 'di bshad par bya ste/ na yang
168b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba'i phyir gus par gyis la yid la zung zhig/ ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i sngags chud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang ba'o// / de nas sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las kyis gsol pa kye brtsams
168b4(rnying rgyud): 'das/ das leg dog mi nga // blangs kyi dming sar gcad// sgrub la bar med de ltar bskul// khro bo'i sngags dang dkyil 'khor ga // gdug sa bsngal zhid man pa'i las// 'jigs byed ral pas bstan du gsopa// ces pa

169a1(rnying rgyud): ngan zhing pas dpyang thag chad// 'di dag drang ba'i skal ba med// rtag tu 'khor 'gyur rtag tu gzham// 'di dag lang ka ni grong gdal du// srin pa lang ka mgrin bcu'i dra// rung bum zan dang kha 'bar ma// zhe sdang ma

169a3(rnying rgyud): lpags ram go thungs su 'tsher/ sgor te sran mo thag phug sdod// lus dang mnyam pa'i ral pa la// mag gsum sprul zhing ro dag ther// bu zur ched nya yi mgo// zeng bde thang zhing rlung nag dang // kha nas me 'gro chu g.yung gan// srog cha
169a4(rnying rgyud): na gsod cing // srog dang dbugs kyis 'tshong byed// sngags kyi rgyas pa log pa'i mthus// las kyi srin pa'i rigs su grub// gshog par ldan zher sa rna// sder mor ldan zhing mi grags cu// gsang sngags dam las gtan lag pa// das pa'i
169a5(rnying rgyud): nabyed pa'i dgrar// smon lam ldan zhing sngags bral spong// ming yang 'jog tu 'u dag po dang // nag mo bya yi mgo can grags// de dag bu che meng sring dag/ me lcags phra mo pa na yang dri// dge bar na nyan par chad byed// srog chags brjed

174a2(rnying rgyud): nan/ dza dza ba badz+ra ya g+ho nan/ 'byung ba duSh+Ta na mA ra ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ pa ra bi ta na ts+tshin d+ha ts+tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra rag+ha rA tsi tsit+ta zung zung / kha la rag+na cad cang
174a3(rnying rgyud): rapra rma sha nA dang sto/ 'khun dum bu shIg shig/ 'da' nar ga sha tsid+ha phyung zad/ ldog na rag sha zad/ snyoms ting ting sdoms zung zung / gtubs gtubs sdoms/ rag sha tset+ta gtubs/ rA tsa sha ga sum kha tri rbad/ tsa pu tri tri ta nan song/
174a4(rnying rgyud): kro d+ha rA dza sid+d+hi a mr-i ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nA na baM hUM phaT/ bdud dzi me tri tha hri/ shu la tri bi tre ya ma tre/ dzA ga tri sa ma tri sum dri pu tri a sha traM/ a sha tri rA tsa tre/ trig nan tur thums dza/ badz+ra a rbu sha ya dza ra/ badz+ra A be sha ya a/

179b2(rnying rgyud): na po cha dang thod pa gsar d+hing las grub pa/ drag po 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / rtsi bas brgyad la sgo bzhi bdud srod kyi rgyan rnam pa sna chags pas bsrubs par/ bdud dang phyogs rkyong dang nyi \u0f88\u0f90'i gdan la rab tu bzhugs te/ thugs kyi sras mchog 'dzus re dang /
179b3(rnying rgyud): khro bo dang / khro mo dang / za byed dang / gsong byed dang / sprul pa dang / yang sbrul brjod kyis mi lang ba dang / gzhan yang dur khrod kyi ce spyang dang / zangs kyi wa mo dang / lcags kyi srung mo dang / dur khrod kyi khyi dang / rdo rje la mo ya byin dang / de byin dang /
179b4(rnying rgyud): byin dang / phag byin dang / nug mo'i tshogs ram ti dang / ra mdzi dang / re mdza dang / re mdzu dang / gzhan yang drung khrid kyi ma bdun dang / sring mo bzhi dang / skyes mchog pho mo dang / rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang /
179b5(rnying rgyud): las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rab tu mang po dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe thugs kyi sras mchog badz+ra kI la ya 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// guHb+ha ga wAn/ shri badz+ra rA mA ra na maHsarba'i d+ha na
179b6(rnying rgyud): yang na do// a la la tonas gsol bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dzad de man po'i ting nge dun kyis sring babams cad rje thub par ma dang / 'bar pa'i thob sha stag pas/ gsum pa dang / dang pa dang / brtul zhugs kyis gdug pa'i chod pa
179b7(rnying rgyud): dbang du brtsub dang / tshar bcad nas slar chos kyi dbyings su bsdu bar mdzad do// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba gdams ngag gi rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas thugs kyi sras mcho ga badz+ra kI la yas/ bcom ldan 'das la mtsha cing

180a4(rnying rgyud): de nas drags kyi skas mchog des// de yi don nyid yang drag zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bas 'phral ba// rang bzhin ma bcos gnas pade// matogs gdul ba'i zhing du dmigs// hring rjes dmigs par bya ba yin// bsgrub par bya 'a'i shangs

180b1(rnying rgyud): bu gsung thugs su dbang bskur ba'o// spyan drang mchod drang bsnyen pa dang // dngos grub bcud ni brang ba ste// phyag dang mchod pa gtor ma dang // dadung rtsi dak+Sha s+phor sgrol lo// tshogs dang lhag ma'i cho ga brgyad// bsnyen pa lha dang ngam can dang /
180b2(rnying rgyud): ngan sngags nye bar bsnyen pa'o// dngos grub ye shes lha dang ni// dgra la tshe lung khrus lung dang // sgo bzhi'i phung ba mtsho bzhi ste// yum brgyad lus kyi rten brgyad dang // kha bcu tshogs brgyad zhar byung gnyis// gnyis kyis drug sdig ma mnyam
180b3(rnying rgyud): gdab// mtshon gyis gtub dang thun gyis brab// gnas skabs dag ni shes par bya// mnan pa sbyin sreg bun dang gsum// las kyi mjug ni bsdu bar bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba'i rgud las gdams ngag gi kho ga khor bstan pa'i

180b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil nas thigA pa shwa ra// snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// d+hi s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ badz+ra ye yaM/ ra su~M karI hUM/ b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+nyAn tsakra maN+Da la e b+h+yAM/ dzaHhU~M bi hoH/ hUM s+phur Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na d+hI/ oM bar+NakI li kI la ya hUM phaT/

184b1(rnying rgyud): cibaden pa'o// chos nyid kyi byin kyis babs so// gsang sngags kyi 'gyur// ma dus la bab pa rnams kyis dug 'ang // mad ba'i sprul pa nyi shu rtsa gcig zlams// hU~M hU~M zhes pa nyi shu ca gcig parla na
184b2(rnying rgyud): dkar dag gi mtshams su'o// kI li kI la ya zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya'o// dkar nag gi mtshams su'o// hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ ces bzlas pa bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur ba rtsub gdams ngag gi chung las ga pa'i ngo
184b3(rnying rgyud): gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas thugs kyi sras mchog des// dbang rnams bskur ba'i ngom pa zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// rdo rje slobang pon rab mchog gis// bkra shis pa
184b4(rnying rgyud): mthar shems dga'i gnas// bshags grong la sogs sa chog dang // dkyil 'khor mcho bum la brten pa yi// gsung bsrang bsten pa'i cho ga bya// ste gon ltab skyed cog gzhung bsrang // gsol gdab gnang zhing maN+Dal 'bung // so
184b5(rnying rgyud): dor na mchos bshad cing // srung srung gdags dang ku sha rmi lam brtag/ de nas thig dang tshen bri zhing // rgyan dang rdzas dgod las gzhung bsrung // gdong g.yog gsol gad ba 'jug par du// lha la gsol gdab me tog dpral/
184b6(rnying rgyud): dris ldan yon kyad khas su blang / dkyil 'a khor bsgong 'amagags bzung cing // ngan rngu nas dmatshig dpog/ me tog la lhad dpag tid // sang ba'i mtshan gdags rje rje/ bsgri pa pa bye shes dbabang grol ba
184b7(rnying rgyud): dbang gi skyegs 'ag zus dang ldan// dbang bsrung bani buma~M pa dang // dab rgyan rdo rje la du / sangs rgyas yab sum la tshogs / du marjong rdzas brjid 'dang ngan rje// ye zhes dbang spyor byed kyis bcwag/
185a1(rnying rgyud): bdadu kyang sngon lasugadag// yon dbul dge pa'i ba// dbang nga byin snang 'di stsol 'gyur// zhes gsum pa// rdong thar bcab gdams dag ku rlu las na chen dbang gi phreng ba'i na pag//
185a2(rnying rgyud): ci zas mchog des// 'job dgongs rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kI li ya yi bsnyen pa dang // mtshan ma rtags kyi bsnyen pa ste// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim gnyis las// rdzogs pa'i rim pa rna
185a3(rnying rgyud): rmugasun chos nyid a dkar la// gtad la rang sems bzung bas bzlas// des ni tib 'dzin zin par 'gyur// rgod na skye med bde ba che// dbugs dang shas pa yig 'brur 'grogs// phar 'grophros yul stongs 'dus pa bde// 'gran pade chen
185a4(rnying rgyud): ra rdzog cig/ thabazung mkha' 'a ba bsta rtsor bsgoms paso she rdzog / thed mang brnas pan/ mdzang dang nas / mtshan pa ngan cingags pa// ma sa rtsa ga 'dor ba bzhi
185a5(rnying rgyud): gsen gyi bathag gzings pa dang // zung tshang ba shig baji bzhin du// mgar kyi cha lpa ga dab bltar// yang na dbyangs dung zin 'as dang / chos nyid nus pa ldan par bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje phur ba rtsab gdams ngag gi rgyud las
185a6(rnying rgyud): 'dab myi dgongs pa'i 'i skye drug pal// de nas thugs kyims sa// mnan pa sreg bang ba do rnams thus// 'acon ldan 'dam kyis 'ana' phral pa/ kyid sreg zag kyi sa ga sum du/
185a7(rnying rgyud): pa sa mib pa ja/ 'ji gag ga / tam ma ngag da
185b1(rnying rgyud): na// dgra ci ma tshad dang bkung byas la// bar rtsibs brgyad gzhal las khang // myuthugs pabyung bar mag gzung // skran dang ma dang srogadus das// gshegs gang 'dag gilas rnams sa// ga na ga ba/ man
185b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ga bor la bcas nas ni// ting 'dzin tshig gong ltar te// lha rnams sun kyang ta mgrin bsgyur// oM bad kI li k+Shi pa ya ha ya gr-I la Ta lu tu lus rbabi bAn pa hUM phaT// 'di 'phros bsam gyis mi khyab pas// dgug dang bstim ste bcing byas nas// mtshan dan
185b3(rnying rgyud): thod par bcug la btab// thun sngagra dra ba ste mnan byas la// rim par g.yogs te sngags kyis ma nan// 'phang ba thun gyi las rnams ni// rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin// de ldan pas ni bya bar bshad// gzhan yang nA ga klu 'dul
185b4(rnying rgyud): gyis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la rab bzod pa// am ho// chos kyi dbyangs las babang ba'i skur rma ding // sangs rgyas kun dang ye shes rdzogs pa'i sgra// rgol ba'i tshul man pas rdzogs mdzad cing // dpa' sreg 'jigs pa
185b5(rnying rgyud): sbrul phyag 'tshal 'dung / ces bskrad de// ma ldan 'das kyis srung pa po lnga bka' stsal pa// nyon cig grang zhug stsal ste// snying po bslus pa man gabyung // rdo phung ba gas pa 'dod// khyod nyid 'di gtad bang //
185b6(rnying rgyud): zhes gsung du/ dang byar ba gsang ba sa na ngag gi rgyud la maston pa la bting ba dang / byung pa po la gdung pa'i ba'an pa byung ma/ de ngas pa gagi tung gangasas chen ga tu sos kyi
186a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ kI la ya d+ha sha dA ya tan+t+ra ma hA yan/ bod skad du/ phur bu bcu gnyis 'byung ba'i chung chen po bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das/
186a2(rnying rgyud): khro bo 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po/ badz+ra kI la ya drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i gnas na bzhugs nas/ gdug pa can thams cad 'dul ba/ dregs pa can thams cad tshang bcad pa'i phyir/ rab tu drag po mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyis byin rlab las/
186a3(rnying rgyud): sa dpa / sa/ sa/ sa rgya /
186a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus la bas par shes pa lags/ gang gis 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs pa lags/ khro bo chen pos lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol// thabs mkhas pa'i bdag nyid can/ de'i dus la bab pa lags so// phrin las kyi mngos
186a5(rnying rgyud): bdag ces gsol pa dang / dpal badz+ra kI la yas e h+ye hi sha hU~M zhes brjod pas/ nam mkha'i gtos kyi phyogs ris med pa/ chos nyid bde ba'i ro 'dal ba bskyed do// yaM karma rak+Sha tri zhes brjod pas/ rdo rje chung nag 'tshubs mas dbang du bsdus shing byin gyis 'arlas
186a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas btab pas/ phrin las thogs pa med pa'i don mdzad/ mAhA rak+ta dz+wa la maN+Da la zhes brjod pas/ khrag gi rgya mtsho gting dpag med pas/ sdug bsngal dbang du bsdus nas/ 'bras bu gcig gi rang bzhin du shar bar mdzad/ ke ni ri dz+wa la maN+Dal zhes brjod pa
186a7(rnying rgyud): ba gnas su dag pa dang / cho 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i phyir/ keng rus kyi ri rab tu gyur/ b+han d+ha dz+nyAn tsakra dz+wa la maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ b+han d+ha'i gzhal yas khang gu gsum mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba gcig tu gyur/ de nas khro bo kapra he rukas/ @
186b1(rnying rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje dbyang thag chad cing ngan song 'khor bar skyes nges pa lnga/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul bstan pa ngo mtshar che'o// 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar bstan pa ngo mtshar che'o// 'di'i rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor
186b2(rnying rgyud): pas/ gnas ni gang dang gang du bstan/ dmigs pa ni gang dang gang la bgyi/ rnal 'byor rgyu dang ldan par bya/ phur pa'i rgyu ni gang dang gang lags/ phur pa bsgom pa ci ltar sgom/ byin gyis brlab pa ci ltar rlab/ brdeg pa'i dus tshad gang la bab pa lags/
186b3(rnying rgyud): ma tshig gang du bstan pa lags/ lta ba ci la dmigs pa lags/ yo byad dang rdzas gang 'tshal/ rtags du nas 'byung / 'di brtsam pa'i dgos ched dang / yon tan ci thob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad cing lung bstan du gsol// kI la ya yis bkra
186b4(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// nyon cig karma he ru ka/ phur ba bsgrub pa'i gnas rnams ni// yang dag don du bshad par bya// dang por gzhung dang ldan byas nas// dur khrod gnas dang shing gcig drung // rgya gram lam du bya ba dang // 'byung po mang po gang yod par// drag po'i las 'di
186b5(rnying rgyud): ra kyis// las la phan 'dogs yod pa dang // grims 'byin shugs kyis ting 'dzin legs// de la thabs dang rtags med na// bdag gi gzugs phung rlag pa dang // tshe dang srog gi bar chad 'ong // nags tshol chen pa'i nang na ba// der ni legs pa dang pyad pa yis//
186b6(rnying rgyud): k+Sha yi mig dang 'byang po'i srang // sa yi bgegs dang ma rungs pa// tsha sgo dmyal ba'i rgyu med par// las kyi bya ba gzhung brtsams nas// bkra shis don gyi gnas yin pas// sgrub yun ring na bkra shis so// me tog gling dang rin chen ri// dpag bsam shing dang skad snyan
186b7(rnying rgyud): 'bru sna tshogs dang gnam sa legs// dbye bas legs lung pa ran par ni// bkra shis gzhung bsrang yun ring bas// gnas kyi dam pa yin zhes bshad// drag po'i las su bya ba la// dang por phur ba sgrub pa'i gnas// nags ri tsher ma can gyi shing // gcan gzan
187a1(rnying rgyud): gdag pa rdzogs pang// ga pa la shrI // 'i gas skye nga// lag ldang zh-i bang bdug// mkha pas gags pa rdzus/ rtsu gas pas// tshar pa can gyi gang dag na
187a2(rnying rgyud): drug shing gdug pa yod pa dang // brag lar ro mang ba dang // grog po mang po gting 'bra dang // stag gi so 'dra thul gyi rtse// sdig pa'i rwa 'dra mu srin la// pan glang sna 'thab brag cu'i bar// rkang gcig shing dang ma rungs pa// rngan chung lha mi phungs dang /
187a3(rnying rgyud): gsul brtse ba dang mtshan 'thab dang // bsang bcad pa dang ma rung sa dus// srin po bskal ba'i bcas gzhi dang // snog chags bskul ba'i khrag rjes dang // gzulang bgos pa'i sa mkhang rnying // mang por bas cing phung ba'is// brag dri srin mo ngas pa 'ang/
187a4(rnying rgyud): ri ni thal phung bsnyil ba 'dra// lung ba me yis bsregs 'dra ba// shing rtsi gang thang bros 'dra ba// skang de'u mi ro sbas 'dra ba// 'di ni brdeg cing bsgral gnas yin// sems la chos nyid migs la zhing // nyams dang ting 'dzin g.yel bas ni/
187a5(rnying rgyud): gnas 'di dag tu phongs mi b+ha// nam phugs rnal 'byor dag la 'gyod// de bas gzhung dang mthun pa yi// bag shis pa li gnas dag tu// yun rings bsrings na gnas tol med// ngam chog ma nyams nges bub dang // ting 'dzin btan pa'i po rme
187a6(rnying rgyud): gnas ni dang re dag du// tshiga'i las ni brtsams byas na/ nges par thub na gdong rdol myong // de lta bu yi sa rked na// dang por byin pa rlabs mtshams bcad nas// mtshungs pod na gtong ma sbyin// de bas zhag sangs 'di tsamam ma// drag po
187a7(rnying rgyud): las 'di ma 'grub par// gnas 'dir rnal 'byor bdag gnas pas// gtor ma byin pa 'di long la// ma 'grub par du gzhan du dengs// de skad byas la gtor ma sbyin// bsgo ba'i tshig rnams bsgo bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bcigs// dam
187b1(rnying rgyud): rdzas rgyag cag gzhung bzhin gdag// kha dog zan rnams dgye byas nas// dbus spya drug po gra gsum bri// mtha' ma mtshon gyi 'khar ba la// kha bo rnams kyang rim bzhin dgod // de bzhin brgyad dang brta nga bstun// ban po dag tu gang brtan dang / hi bu rtsa brgyang /
187b2(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa// mkhas pas gzhung bzhin dgod par bya// gzhan yang bur pa'i rdzas dkong ba// 'og nas 'byung bas shes par bya// de phyi mtshan dang ldan pa dang // zhag grangs tshang ba'i sgrub rdzas bzhi// yo byad tshogs par mchog tubya// gnas rnams 'di dag pos
187b3(rnying rgyud): ni// myur ba 'grub dang shugs 'byin dang // ngan pa'i las kyis ngan pa 'grub// don lathe tshom med par ni// ngan pa'i gnas su 'grub par bshad// bkra shis bzang po'i gnas su ni// yun ring bsrings na phung 'tshangs med// don la des kyang 'grub par bshad//
187b4(rnying rgyud): bzang nga na gnas kyi cha dbye ba// bdag gi rtogs pa'i tshad dang sbyar// rtog pa chung na bzang po 'dam// ting 'dzin rtsab nang na ba bdam// myur bar thogs pa med par ni// gang la dmigs pa 'grub ces bshad// 'di ni phur pa gnas bstan pa'i le'u dang po'o//
187b5(rnying rgyud): bskul ba'i dmigs rnams bstan pa ni// kun la bya ba gzhung la med// nyams par gyur pa bdun yod de// srog las nyams dang dam las nyams// bka' bas nyams dang don las nyams// las kyis nyams dang mtshan mas nyams// 'dod pa 'gyur bas tams/
187b6(rnying rgyud): pa ni// 'dri la nyams pa zhes bya ste// de dgas so'i mtshan nyid ni// mo ga lus nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// padang mdang mkhan po gsod// slob sa gsod dang nang ma can// badzi ni rnams kyang lhung bas na// bsgral ba'i dmigs ni 'di yin no// dang
187b7(rnying rgyud): bas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rjeslopa dpon bka' ba gyung dang // ngan sems 'phya sems byed pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun gcod dang // gsang ba'i mnangag gzhan la brel// 'dini rnams pa chen po ste// di ni bskal ba'i dmigs gcig yin/
188a1(rnying rgyud): bka' las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// dmal btags na nu mchang 'bru// thub la thanan yag 'dags// man+ta dag bsnun na gyur pa 'dabs// bden par brtanan lag par byed// dngan rtags bstan na gal bar 'jan// 'dajanyams
188a2(rnying rgyud): dam pa ste// 'di la bskal ba lhur yang brtsam// 'di dag bsngal ba'i phrin las ni// gzhung kun las ni gsal bar 'byung // don las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bya ru mi rung sna tshogs byed// rdzas dang lag cha mngon du 'dzin// rta na gan kyor stsol dngos por spyod// ra'i
188a3(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin rgyab tu bor// spyod pa dpa' brlangs dang du len// khro gtum nga rgyal rang gar gtong // don gyi man ngag log par go// pha rol log par 'dran pa'i chos// phyin ci log gi don la mkhas// bka' gzhung por la rdzob pa che// log par rtsod pa mtha' dag yod// 'dini
188a4(rnying rgyud): dU tra dngos yin te// mngon spyod bsngal kyang mi gyon no// las kyis nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bdag dang rtse gnas mi gcig par// bskal ba'i las kyi glor 'ongs nas// sngan chad pa kha nas khon yongs med par// glags la bab par dran nas kyang // zhi badrang pos mi
188a5(rnying rgyud): par// nyes med gzhan la 'dzugs pa dang // dpung pa stogs la klan ka tshol// kha lce rgod cing bzhin mdog bzlog/ brgalas med cing bdag la rgol// phrog mi dgos par bdag 'a phrog/ bdag gis nyes par ma dran zhing // 'dag gis brgal bar ma bsams kyang //
188a6(rnying rgyud): las kyis bdag la gnad 'dzugs shing // bdag la mthu dang rtsal 'dod pa// las kyis nyams pa 'di yin no// gzhan yang las kyis nyams pa ni// gal mi che bar klan ka tshol// phan chu med par bdag la 'tsho// 'od rgyu med par bsgrub sar 'ong // las gyis nyams pa'i
188a7(rnying rgyud): rtags yin pas// 'di ni nam yang bsgral dgos pas// las kyis 'khor bas sdig med bshad// mtshan mas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// chos la phyogs char bzung bas nyams// lta ba sgos khur bcas pas nyams// dam can yongs la thugs dkrug cing // rang bzhin
188b1(rnying rgyud): dad pa ngas paka bang // mtshanam canas sa bcang nas// na panasas gsas sa// su ban zad ba ga sod// nga byams kyang can byung// rnam pa rgyas pa// gdu du na sa sogs// 'dzin pa can nas nyams pa// 'thal da /
188b2(rnying rgyud): kyang dam mi nyams// 'dod par gyur bas nyams pa ni// de yi mtshan nyid bshad bya ba// nyan pa ga rtogs gsal med par// la lar mthu che ba can 'dod pas// las kyi don du mtshan ma spyod// sdig pa'i phyag cur mi mgo thogs// ral pa bsreg cing so gtsigs byed// dam
188b3(rnying rgyud): kyi gtor mtho la thogs// zhing gi pags pa phrag la bkal// blo ba nag po sha dang tshol// steng bkang khur zhir lo gtses stong // sdod pa'i don kun gzung bor nas// byab mi 'tsham sna tshogs kyang // nga dang gdong ba khrag gis rgyags// tshul 'gal
188b4(rnying rgyud): dam 'dral sna tshogs byed// blo tsor khyod cing dam mi bsrung // spyod pa bzang pos bka' gzhung spang // sangs rgyas kun gyi zhabs 'dren gyis// rnal 'byar sngags pa'i rkang nas drangs// dpal can 'bar ba thugs bral brjid// ma mo mkha'
188b5(rnying rgyud): gzan tshogs bkram// rnal 'byor yongs la dme btsog byas// gzhan yang mtshan nyid gang yin pa// 'dod pas nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// 'dod chags nor gyis bslus pa dang // shi bar shes kyang 'dod pas brgyal// phung gar shes kyang sngags 'char 'joms// dug tu skar
188b6(rnying rgyud): yang nye ru ba// gtan pa yin kyang thabs kyis smod// btsun pa yin kyang dmas par shos// thob tu 'dod na gsang sngags chu// bzang ru yod na rnal 'byor za// / zas su sgrub pa'i longs spyod cu// nor du gzhung spyod rnal 'byor 'joms// 'di dag 'dod pas nyams
188b7(rnying rgyud): pa ste// 'di dag baphral na rnal 'byor btsun// btul zhing tshar bcad bstan pa gtan// ded cing stong pan par chang zung // 'di dag bskal bar ma byas na// mtho ngas 'gribs la dkyil khams 'jal// rnal 'byor ngam can skyid lugs nas// theg pa chen po
189a1(rnying rgyud): sgo 'gag/ 'di dag bskul bar byas skye// nul 'argya sgrub pa par chang 'ad// theg sa can pa'i mam ngas// lags pa rab tan dod las 'das/ thabs kyi thas ba ni 'di TIn la thud na// 'dudag parnyang /
189a2(rnying rgyud): bya na ni// dmyal ba'i gnas su yun thung 'gyur// 'di ni bsgral ba dmigs bstan le'u gnyis pa'o// // rnal 'byor gang dag gis bya ba// 'di gnyid du bshad pa ste// dang po shes rab rnga ma gsum gyis// gtan tshigs don la yid ches nas// rdon
189a3(rnying rgyud): nges par dbang thob ste// snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa yis// khams gsum 'khor ba gzung bar bya// don 'di dag dang mi ldan zhing // nges pa'i lung rnams ma thob dang // mkhas la sgo skur 'dogs pa dang // gsang sngags theg tson skur 'debs dang // rang
189a4(rnying rgyud): gos srud chog tshul gnas dang // dam tshig nyams par gyur pa dang // don med phyal bar gtong ba rnams// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma yin te// log pa'i lam du shes par bya// de yis skad kyang yongs mi grub// slar la rang sems rlag pa dang // 'bras bu mnar med dmyal
189a5(rnying rgyud): bar bya// 'di dag rtsom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rigs kyi rnal 'byor gral du spos// zag pa bsam yas sems lagasal// bltab phyogs med gdeng du 'jog/ bsgom pa ma yongs gser phur 'debs// dam tshig nyan thos khrims bzhin bsrung // rgyu dang
189a6(rnying rgyud): prA thabs mtha' dag 'chang // phyogs su 'jig rten mkhas pa brten// rdzas dang lag ma rtags su 'chang // don dang man ngag gzung du bsgrub// tshul ldan dang tshul bzang la shis// sbyor sgrol mchod pa chun chad med// phung po lha dang gnyis med mchong// sems ni/
189a7(rnying rgyud): chos nyid dang la gnas// rnal 'byor rtags ldan dam pa des// las su bya ba kun rdzogs nas// 'dzub drus grangs mang rgyun 'dzin pas// sngags dang phyag rgya mam khyen che// las dbya ba gdon miza// nges par brtsams pas dgos pa 'grub// dmar ci gtor na//
189b1(rnying rgyud): gzhung bsrang zhing // tsa bgyi bka' nyan 'khol mkhas pas// dgar zhing dgug pa bya bar shis// drag shul thabs kyi bonya ni// rdzu 'phrul shugs las thabs kyis 'gyed// rnam rtog mtshan ma las kyis 'grub// de dag byas na chud mi za// shes pa'i nang na dam pa
189b2(rnying rgyud): ni// rgyud la gro zhen sgrub la zhugs// yi dam lha la rtags gnas na// de la bar chad yongs mi 'thud // gal te 'byung bar gyur na yang // de la reg pa tsam gyis 'grub// gzhan gyi las 'di brtsam pa yi// rnal 'byor ba ni gang yin na// phrin las b+h+ra
189b3(rnying rgyud): brag byed pa dang // rnam rtog mtshan ma spangs pa dang // gtsang sme med par spyod pa dang // thang dor med par sgrub pa yis// gang la dmigs pa 'grub par byed// phun sum tshogs pa gsum ldan zhing // dus tshod grangs su bsten pa shes// ha dang shi ka
189b4(rnying rgyud): chos brgyad la// drag po'i las la rab brtson pas// las su bya ba de byas te// ma mo mkha' 'gro bka' nyan tshogs// de yis bkol na bran bzhin nyan// de yis bkol na bu bzhin spab// de yis bya ba chung ma zos// tshe dang longs spyod 'byor pa dang /
189b5(rnying rgyud): legs pa kun rdzogs dngas grub ster// de yis yid la bsams pa bzhin// ci 'dod rang la 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang 'jig rten bsam pa dag/ phan pa dang ni gnod pa gnyis// gzhan la phan cing sgrub 'dod na// sad dang sar ba bcad pa dang /
189b6(rnying rgyud): char chudus su thebs pa dang // mi na byugs nad chad la sogs// de yi gtan tshigs 'di la gnas// gzhan la gnod pa'i rgyu btsal na// dbya ston gnyis la gnod byeb// sang dang sa gtong gtan tshigs dang // shwa dang chu dang thog patong ga/
189b7(rnying rgyud): dbyar dgun mi nad ribs gtong ba// bu tsha rabs chad ma thung ba// de yi gtan tshig 'din yod// dastar gtan rdzogs sus shes pa// rnam 'byong ngan dang ldan pa na// 'di ni brtsam par bya ba gsungs// rnal 'byor gyi ldan brtsam pa'i 'a
190a1(rnying rgyud): sa na sa na/ ngadag rdzu / ngas ma dug// ma 'jugs nas / ma tsu // ga dang
190a2(rnying rgyud): bri sngags mang ba tigags zin dang // gnas thegs thog gi su gis dag da // gcang dang dang pralas gus// grags snga lnga pa dag las ni// ma rgyal gnas pa'i chamadu dang // gagal pas khang gi rtags suH// logs brgyad khrim brgyad pal// nga
190a3(rnying rgyud): margyad cig pas// thas dang shes rang da// gzhal las bang rang chags dpa nas// tham nA da rdzam 'dams pa'i rdum// dras pargya kyis yang dag pa shing // dbang la zangs kyi bung ba dang / zas pa gsang 'joms pa dang // rna
190a4(rnying rgyud): dkar ba dang // rtsa mo dkyibs ni sa sor 'bar// bya ba'i med rnams mthun par bshad// gzhan yang tshar ma can gyi shing // rab tu mi srun gnas dug nas// gang dag skyes pa gang yin dang // drug dang gcan ga zan gdug pa dang // rab tu gtum pa'i gnas pas
190a5(rnying rgyud): nas// skyes pa'i shing tshag tshor ma can// b+hair ba dang ni sing sring dang // gang dag sbyar lding mngam shing // rdzu ba'i lagras swA mdu \u0f7f// rtse mo'i lags su bur gsum tha// dbyibs dang 'a dge gang dang mthun// gzhan yang gdug pa tshor ma can// go
190a6(rnying rgyud): de dag ma 'byir na// gang rnyed pa la bya bar bshad// gzhung dang mthun rnyed na legs// de dag ga nga yang marnyed na// ti de 'dren gyis dkyil 'a khoraH// yid la dran zhing gsul ba sgom da// sngags dang bya ba mnar na// des kyang bya bang gadrung las bshad// de dag re thung cad
190a7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa// ma rabazhi pa dang sa brgyad pa// bcug nyis dag tu bshad pa ste// dalas thung bar ma gsungs zhing // de laba'i yar yang ma bstan// sor ba ni byung babazhi'i chad// sang brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi ched// badz+rag nyis khyim med bcu gnyis te// rtags dang /
190b1(rnying rgyud): slar tid rnams bstan// rtags byin pa yi sngags rnams kyis/ dayo yan tan bshad pani// dbar nanags kyi thung ba la// mAn chad bcad pa'i sgrar dag// de dag yang par gyur nAn// thadas kyang kya tha tha ma med// de dag ldan chad ma bad pas// 6
190b2(rnying rgyud): dam mi tshad yongs mengs// de bzhin cu yang de dang 'dra// mdor nardul 'byor rgyal mchog gces// re dag da yang byen med de// yon tan yod bar 'di las brtan// nag po'i shing gi drug can las// phur ba byas pa'i phan yod ni// nag pa rgazhan gyis
190b3(rnying rgyud): thogs la// dug gis pha rol gsod par byed// tshong ma can gyi shing rnams ni// skyer bas tshe dang longs spyod 'phel// mdze mos dbang du bya ba 'grub// gzhan yang kha dog rigs su spang // mdor nang de gshegs sa bon cis// byin gyis brdung pa
190b4(rnying rgyud): gces par bshad// de bas kyang ni dam tshig gtso// rnal 'byor rnams la dam par bsngags// dang por gzhung las bstan pa bzhin// de dag mnor bsham par bya// tshogs pas the tshom med ces bya// bshams pas bya ba chud mi zos// kun gyi chu ni
190b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni bsngags pa ste// d+ha ni rgyal po radang shar ba'o// gzhan yang ngur pa'i chu bstan pa// zangs lhags 'khar ba gang yod par// de yang da cing legs par bya// mdod pa yi skyon rnams ni// gang dag \u0f7fsa na tshul
190b6(rnying rgyud): la nyams// sta ma col byas na bka' las 'bral// rnyeng btsan byas na byin rlab chung // yod btsan byas na sgom mi bde// ngan dgur bshams rtog par 'gyur// legs par byas da yis shing // tshogs par bsags na gzung dang mthun// dad pa byas na dang rtse/
190b7(rnying rgyud): 'a bzhin byas na byin rlabs yod// mdor na rtogs pa nin pa yin// rtogs pa'i ngan la mthar byin na// nam tog las 'di yongs mi dgos// matogs pa la 'di dgos pas// log pa phyogs rnams 'dul slad du// 'di la rgyu ba sha ma 'thung ba yin/
191a1(rnying rgyud): ma rtog pa la rtog mi rtogs// rnam par rtog lnga 'dul bzang // nyon mangs pa la gtan pa 'a bas// rtog pa bsal bar bsham pa gnas// gzhan la tshugs na grangs du gyu// rtags can 'ad da chu
191a2(rnying rgyud): ru ba rnam pangs kyis// rings par 'dodon brtson 'grus sbyid// don 'di yid la bzhaganas kyang // sngags pas dalanan tan byed/ di ni phung ba'i chu bstan pa'i 'bas bzhi 'o// par 'dzin 'dom paso// don 'a me de/
191a3(rnying rgyud): ni// nges pa nyid du bshang bya ste// byin gyis brlab pa'i thabs pa ni// nges par rnam pa lnga yang // gnyis su med par byin parlab dang // khob chen por byen brlab dang // shin tu brjod mabyen brlab dang // dr-i b.ras basbyin brlab dang // mdu 'du
191a4(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra kA li kI la ya kI la ya/ g+ha~M ts+tsha ha he phaT/ dzaHdz+hai ru lu mA ra yA saM/ de la lag pa gting sbyar nas// sar bcu'i bar du phur pa bcug/ bcu yis byin badrab tshul bzhin bya// hU~M wa~M k+Sha la 'i rna mags
191a5(rnying rgyud): nas byin gyis brlabapar bya// lcags sam shing ngam gang yin pa// Ni khrag khrag gis byugs la// drug dang ma rdungs pas kyang byug/ rje dang dzaH dang phaTal sogs// zla bathu tshul bzhin byas nas kyang // d+hi nang rlang bar mkhangs pa pa dang// yang
191a6(rnying rgyud): banamangs pa ni// dbu la mang // byA shrI rtsa 'du sa sa stong dgas// rtse mo phul pa'i thA yin// rgyal dpa' ldan yab sum dang // 'khor gyi dkyil 'kho gas papanod dang / yang bral la sogs pa// ci bcom
191a7(rnying rgyud): ngas bzhin no// 'bar 'thung rdzogs kyi rgyal po yis// gas pa'i bu pa // yang dge brta pas phyi gyis brlabs// la 'gyur sngags kyi tho san pas// dam pa'i dod chu sa sa// pas
191b1(rnying rgyud): sa // na / sa na // nga ga du sun dru// / na nga
191b2(rnying rgyud): gis bsregs spangs nas// rnam gas snying gi dkyil 'kho nga // byang chubamams kyi rgya gtadad// danang nag mtshams thang byab nas cang // dag ji ga las kyi gagag kyi te// rnam par rtog pa'i ngag sungs nas// dang 'a dzud kyi nas
191b3(rnying rgyud): gsum rim par bcoms nas kyang // ha ta kha yis bajam pa byas// gsar zhun bzhin du soms gnas pa// 'gro ba'i dgongs pas btags nus kyang // gnyis med yum gyi mkha' la bstim// nges par rjem gyis sbas byas// oM gis byin nang
191b4(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs sugs la byas nas// phyir yang ngan song sgo gsum bcad// rnam rtog bskal ba'i zhing brdung brlags// bskal ba dbyings dang ye shes te// don du thabs dang shes rab la chos kyi sku yi bye rlangs kyis// rnam par dge ba'i ngang du 'gom//
191b5(rnying rgyud): phur pa bsgom pa'i le'u lnga pa'o// byin gyis brlabs pa bstan pa ni// rgya mdung rtsa ba'i legs su ni// chos kyi sku yi khro bor rabarlab// logs brgyad khro mo brgyad yin te// bar gyi rgya mdud longs spyod rdzogs// rtse mo sprul pa'i sku nga na
191b6(rnying rgyud): don du mnga' gsol 'di skad do// hU~M bzhi gsal 'phro trai las bzhi tshogs brkyang // dbul rgya mdung bstan pas khro nu la bcu// rtsibs la logs brgyad bstan pas khro mo brgyad// rtse mo 'ur gsum bstan pas sku gsung thugs// nga stong byang chung sems kyi mig
191b7(rnying rgyud): blo rgyal 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// me g.yos chos mchog su gsung zugs kyi bdag/ sdug bsngal log par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams// thugs rjes bye brag dbyings su spro ba mdzad pa//
192a1(rnying rgyud): bskal ba'i skab dang ma ldan pang // thugs kyis bskal ba'i phrin las mngang dugasal// oM badz+rag d+hag+hA ta ya/ sanAs pa'i la ba d+ha ro// AnA mA la ti/ k+Sha pa drug ta dud+ha thAngasaH/ byin badrung 'tshams bcad drag
192a2(rnying rgyud): yis// dbang bsdus yongs su spang bar bya// thabs la mkhas pa'i byin rlab kyis// yongs kyis bsdu zhing gzir ba dang // thabs kyis dbang du bya ba'i phyir// 'bar ba'i thugs rjes mtshams bcad do// 'di ni phung bu byin brlab le'u drug pa'o//
192a3(rnying rgyud): brdeg pa'i dus tshod bstan pa ni// gnam stong dang ni tshes brgyad la// bco lnga nyi bu gnyis la bya// mig dmar phur bu gza' rnams kun// brdeg pa'i dras la bab par shes// dang po dkyil 'khor gzhung btsugs te// bsnyen bsgrub chog tshad byas
192a4(rnying rgyud): nas// 'dzab grang bsnyen pa 'bul du gdon// bzlas brjod nyin mtshan par mig cad// rtags dang mtshan ma phyin pa dang // brdeg pa'i dus la bab par shes// nam gyi gung dang nyi ma dros// de la brdeg par rab tu shis// phur khrod chen po gang rda bar//
192a5(rnying rgyud): basbal ba la sogs tshul bzhin bya// n+ya gram lam gyi gang na bar// brdeg pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya// 'di dag brdeg pa'i dus chod kyang // srod la zhugs pas tho dngas kha// 'di dag brdeg par yongs mi bya// 'di dag brdeg par bya ba ni// yun ni
192a6(rnying rgyud): la// brdeg pa'i dus chod yin par ni// rnal 'byor pas ni shes par bya// gzhan yang 'jig pa'i rus tshod ni// dang por bsgrub pa khas blangs pa// ma thod bar du dus tshod min// tshad nas brtag pa'i dus chod ni// bla dgug pa yi po nya la// 'di dag
192b1(rnying rgyud): btang nas bdeg d+ha te// b+h+rUM/ dpal gri po nya las ma khan mo// de mi mo drung gi mche ba can// mkha' yang dbyung ba'i mdod bgyil ma// lag na sems can srog gcod ma// zhal na sems can yongs su gas la// bskal pa'i thogazog char pa dang po zang
192b2(rnying rgyud): bkral pa byed kyi pha rol na// dmanyams dgra po'i zla 'dren sa// dam po'i thalan na makyang // nag mo lcags kyi lan tshar can// byung gi 'ardzogs g.yas pan// thAn+ta gri thogs gnod la mas// tshangs pa bsgril ba'i malugs na// me thag mad
192b3(rnying rgyud): gcer bu'i lus// bskal pa brgyad nas bla tshol tshol// dpag tshad brgyad nas srog 'gugs 'gugs// dgra bo'i bla dang srog la ya// dmar po chen mo me 'gro ma// gdug pa 'dul ba gang ba las// gsod la rngam pa las la brtson// mchog tsog ga yang
192b4(rnying rgyud): gzhi gos su gyon// rab tu mI kun tha 'khrugs pa// da mnyams dgra las ma ya// ljang dag bsgyings pa'i thod gdangs cad// ser mo ra la can 'bum gyis bskor// rjon nas dgra pa'i zla 'bugs ma// glang la bye ba grub par byos// rnam sa pa'i lha mo phur ban
192b5(rnying rgyud): lha// lag bcu gzugs kyi phur pa 'dril// spyan brgya khrag gis mchi ma 'dzag/ zhal brgya gdug pa'i sngags zor zlo// tshems kyis spyi shi rtsad kyang tshad// phur pa'i las mkhan chen mo la// rab tu mi sun las la brtson// gang la b+ha ba grub par byos//
192b6(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang pho ha grangs med kun// de dag las la gtang bar bya// de dag mngon par zhugs pa dang // ting 'dzi na rab 'bring gsum du bya// rab kyis mngon du khrug par bya// 'bring gis yin 'gul bar byas// thams nyams dang rtags tsam 'ong // gzo
192b7(rnying rgyud): bdag pa'i drum cad yin// dedapas med par dum tshad yin// chogs bar 'ar ni// bdag pa dzu tshad yin par de// dris la bab par shes par bya// 'di ni brdeg pa'i dum tshad 'a bdu / dam cig gang yi dang pya pa /
193a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan dum chags tso poH// dpangag mnyams gadzang tshugasan// 'di dga' 'gyur bar bshad// nyams par byung bas Sh+Ta bab+hUH// ska sa ng+gA ljid dag par 'a n+tu// nu po dam chog tud 'daka' ba'o// ga jug
193a2(rnying rgyud): dal tshig par mig cad// thugs kyi dam tshig gsang thub pas// las ni brtsams nas 'grub ces ni// dpa' bo khro bos yang dag bshad// dam tshig dag pa 'di yis ni// rgyal ba mnyes te dngos grub thob// bka' bzhin spyod la gzhung bzhin bsgrub// nges
193a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i dam tshig dam pa yin// nges pa'i dam tshig bstan par ni// yang dag rgyal pos yang dag gsungs// 'di ni dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u brgyad pa'o// // lha ba ci la dmigs pa ni// yang dag nyid du bstan bya ste// lta ba'i rgyal po des
193a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings// gzod nas ma skyes sems kyi dbyings// rnam par dag pa yum gyi tshul// ma skyes mi 'gag thabs ci sku// rig pa'i rgyal po dang blang bas// thams cad ma lus dbang du spyad// thabs kyi rgyal por bdag gnas pas// dgra kun bla na med
193a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ sgrol// chos kyi rdzab sems yin pas// brtag pa'i don du rang sems bzang // rang gi sems kyi don rtogs shing // mnyam pa'i rgyal po klong gyur na// zhal nas gsungs pa thams cad dang // tshig tu brjod par sten pa la// thugs la dgongs pa
193a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin te// phyag gis bsgyur ba phrag rgya ste// yung ba'i phyag rgya lnga du bshad// phur pa dam tshig phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyi rting ltang nas// phung po rje ljang drag tu gzir// de ni phur bu'i ngam tshig rgya// chang pas sor ba byed rim pas bzung // gung
193a7(rnying rgyud): po na chad la// phung ba brdeg pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis ni za' srung nas// gung mo rtsa srad pa the'u chung brkyang / srin lag mdzub mo thub bsngol te// mtho bo gshibs te ba tu dril// 'di ni phur pa dril ba'i rtsa// lag pa gnyis kyi ting grang nas/
193b1(rnying rgyud): ma pa rnam pa rnya byin pabasate// sras pacog dpal drag na ni// da sa bab pa byas na// ma byin gyis bad smra hrIH// mab bya ma bag kyis kyi ba da ni// rlung ba bdag pa yang yangs pas// babs pas brdag pa'i gzugs
193b2(rnying rgyud): bskul// 'di ni sung ba bsngal 'i myo// don du kyag rgyal sogs pa// yadi dag rtogs na gud yang // ma rtog sa macanams rtog pa'i shing // tog pa sbyin cos nyid la// 'khor ba'i bu nyid kyang chub ste// bas pa' 'a 'dreg las sre dang // na'atog
193b3(rnying rgyud): can kun bsad na// dam pa'i bde gshegs kun mnyes te// nges pa 'alegs pa'i dgongs pa 'phel// sangs rgyas bka' bas de skar 'thung // dam pa sems kyi rang bzhin pa'o// lta ba 'di la dmigs pas bya// 'di ni lta ba dmigs pa'i le'u dgung ngo //
193b4(rnying rgyud): pa thaM des das bstan T+Thi// gleng dug pas 'i rgyu pas kyi// drag pos bcwas phyi ba sa par byung // khyad pa la sogs nga na// ma gro phyub gyi dkri pa nga byung // bangs rgyags cags yang // dag pos grang byu
193b5(rnying rgyud): bsham// rkang rjesas dang dri ma rnams// nges par yod na bzang par bstan// gzhan yang phur ba'i rdzas rnams can// gong nas 'byung ba de shes bya// 'di ni yo d+had rjes kyi le 'u bzla pa // rtags ci nags grangs bsta pa ni// khyad par
193b6(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa gzhung btsugs te// bka' yi bsgrub pa tshul bzhin du// gzhung las 'byung ba de byas na// rab kyis zla ba gcig gis 'grub// rtags ni zhag bdun nyid kyis 'grub// 'bring pos lo gcig byas na 'grub// rtags ni zla ba pyid na phyin// thams
193b7(rnying rgyud): lo gsum tshun chad kyis// 'grub par 'gyur te gdon pa za// rtags ni lo dus dag na 'gyur// yan lag bskam pa'i nad la sogs// rtags rnams kun ni tshul bzhin 'byung // 'di ni phung ba rtags bsten pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa'o/ / 'di
194a1(rnying rgyud): rtsal ga dgos cid gan tadang // sems ca dgang bkapa pad // ngam thong byed pa'i chu lagapas/ gang 'ga' thang ci dpal 'ang byungs// shes 'bas sha shang ba'adad// dngangad ba nga ba ga
194a2(rnying rgyud): don 'di nor gang rtsod pa// kI lA nga pi yon tan ni// tshe ring na kyang med pa dang // dgal dang 'byor ba 'phel ba dang // gdodan dang 'byung po thul ba dang / lha srin mthu chen kun 'arol dang // dregs pa dbang phyug pagang tan dang /

194a4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi klu dang dbyer med na// ngan song gsum po rko bkag nas// thar pa bde ba'i gnas kyang 'dren// sdig can bsad na las ngan bcad// dpa nyams bsgral nu bka' gzhung brtan// phyogs log bsngal na dkyil masong brtan// sru dgra bsngal na

194a8(rnying rgyud): yalen na
194b1(rnying rgyud): mchod nas/ nyid kyi sbrul mi snang ba 'i tshul gyis thim par gyur to// phung ba bcu gnyis 'byung ba'i rgyud chen po gsum tsas bsgyur ba rtogs so// rgyag ga du/ pradz+ra nIl pa rjing shwataH/ bod skad du/ rang thang pa
194b2(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byed chen po la phyag 'tshal po// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pa badz+ra dzI pa pa dang / gung gzhi kun tu bzang por tsur ma
194b3(rnying rgyud): b+ha ga la yid kun tu bzang po ye shes 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ dbyings ye shes gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub par gnas par bzhugs so// drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i nang nas/ bcom ldan badz+ra kI la ya bzhengs nas/ chos nyid zhi ba
194b4(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i skabs la ma bab ste/ mtshan ma med pa dang bral/ mtshan ma can la zhen chags pa sa/ gdug pa can dregs pa can du srin te sems can thams cad la gnor cing 'tshe/ sangs rgyas ci brted la gnod pa thams cad mar gcad pa'i phyir mig
194b5(rnying rgyud): bya ba tu drug po'i dpung rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thabs mkhas pa'i drag po'i phrin las kyis 'dul bar gzigs nas/ su rab tu khros pa mi ba'ang pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sku gsung rdugs las gsang sngags pa dbyu
194b6(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+h+nAM baM b+hu phaT/ ces brjod pas thun mong ma yin pa'i gnas nas/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sprul lo// ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'amatsho dang /
194b7(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / gdod sbyin do// yi dgas dang / sha za dang / dr-i Ta dang / 'byung po dang / zhem byed dang / brjid byed dang / spro byed dang / chen po dang / phyogs spong ba brgya dang / mkha' 'thos la 'ogs pa rnams thams ca
195a1(rnying rgyud): gis las rgya 'bras kyi don la togs shing / mtshan ma med pa dang thal/ mtshan pa can la mngon par chags pas/ nga song gsum du yang bskal ba mang por sdug bsngal zhing / mi bde ba mang po nyams su thong dang /
195a2(rnying rgyud): las kyi 'bras bus las kyi srin por skyes nas/ rgya mthun pa'i dbang gis shin tu 'jigs shing rngam pa dang / yi sdug pa dang / dring ba dang / bregs pa can la sogs pa'i gzugs su byung nas/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bcing / la da
195a3(rnying rgyud): 'phrog par bgyid/ gnod par bgyid/ zed skad 'dod par byed/ yid mi bde ba mang por bgyid/ 'khrug par byed/ mya ngan du byed/ srog dang bral bar byed/ 'joms par byed pa rnams la zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ dbu dgu pa/ phyag bco
195a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad bzhabs bskrad/ sman bzlog/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ su gsung thugs mi bzad pa gcig tu gyur to// gsang pa'i sngags bcu gnyis phyung nas kyang / lcang spur ye shes kyi cho 'phrul du gyur to// nyid kyi chu las d+hi staH ba zhes 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma
195a5(rnying rgyud): g.yon phyog su 'bon to// yab yub gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems las sa sa mchog rdo rje thob sngags su thogs pa grangs med pas/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dza hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ti bikI la ya/ sod chom/ gtogs/ thabs shes rab las/ cha 'dzin
195a6(rnying rgyud): hrIsh+tha b+hang / de las cha 'dzin grangs med pa blang ste/ gdug pa can bskal te/ mab dbyings dang ye shes las cha 'dzin nyi shu zung / dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems nyi sh+ya thung / de las byang chub kyi sems grangs med bsam gyis
195a7(rnying rgyud): mi lta ba bzung ste/ yid la dran pa'i snying po brjod pa tsam gyis/ nye zer la ser ba 'bab pa bzhin du phul ba'i sgra byung te/ gdags ging bsngal lo// de nas 'jigs byed dregs pa'i bdag po rgyam mo mthal du rngubs so// de nas 'dza kil pa'i 'od zer lus la
195b1(rnying rgyud): bstim pa la/ bsngal 'bog bcom pa brtul ba sangs te/ dran pa rnyed de badza thi la ya'i yang dag pa'i bden pa mthong ngo // de'i gdug pa can dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par bajug pa de ma de 'dus su/ phyogs bcu'i le shes pa khro ba dang / dbyings dang
195b2(rnying rgyud): mo las dbyangs dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems/ gti mug byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'o// 'jigs byed chen po'i byin rlabs las/ ka ma shrI he ru ka zhes pas/ khro bo karma he ru ka spu ljang nag/ su gsung thugs nyid las
195b3(rnying rgyud): mi gzhan pa 'thon to// thugs ka nas kyang sras mchog stod zhal gsum phyag drug pa la/ smad ljags phur zur gsum pa grangs med pa thon to// sngon gyi thugs dam gyi dbang gis/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rjes su dran nas gdug pa can tshar bcad de//
195b4(rnying rgyud): de'i tshe 'dogs byed chen po dang / khro bo rnams kyis lus gdan du phul lo// yid phyi rabs kyi rjes 'jug gi tshogs kyi grogs dang chos myong ba'i bsung mar dam bcas te/ rgyal po btson du bzung nad mangs mas la phebs te/ dbang med dad pas brdzus pa'i
195b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi tar+b+ha las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas ka rba he ru kas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs zed chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// bcom
195b6(rnying rgyud): ldan badz+ra kI la ya/ dbyung zag chad pa'i skyo ngan 'khor ba la/ thugs rjes bzung nas cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul ngo mtshar che/ de'i rjes su grub pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ de ltar de bzhin yang dag don// gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan du gsol// zhes
195b7(rnying rgyud): gsol pas/ de nas kI la ya'i bdag pom/ su gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la/ rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// yang dag don ni ngas bstan gyi// gsang sngags
196a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ yang dag dan dman// theg pa gsumanan ba pas byugs// thal bcang bskad ma dang // dka' thab ba rnams shid dam ga mdu// dan gyi gsang thags mang ngas bkrug cang // nyel mag gdon las 'grang // mam
196a2(rnying rgyud): rgyud 'di rtogs par dka'// bsam pa mchog tu gyur pa'o// dbyings nyid rig pa rgyun mi gcad// rtag pa par ba'i pha rol na// rtog med btsal bas mi rnyed pas// tog dang martog gnyis med la// yang dag don gyi snying po re// bad par gshegs
196a3(rnying rgyud): pr-is mi gzigs so// kun yang byang chub zhing po bas// sangs rgyas gzhan nas bca' dra med// dza na khros pas de sdang gcod// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// de bzhin nyid ni brdal pa'o// stod nyid ye shes dag pa la// gzugs spun ma gnyis
196a4(rnying rgyud): byin napa cam// 'din rang zhin dag pa // 'dzin nang mnas pa gas te// dan dam tham da yul ma// / rang bzhin rjod min gas pas tha'i// sangs rgyas kyi ma mi byaste// tha mablangs pa'i mnyan bas ca// las sengasacas
196a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes rtogs// chos nyid bden pa'i byin napa mthus// thabs mang zangs mkhas thabs lha rabs// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// gsang sngags 'ba' sho d+heb tha dang // rnan khros pa zhes sogs nas// mthar gnas thugs kyis bon par dag
196a6(rnying rgyud): gis// rnal 'byor da gangs don spang bar bya// yang dag dpag gi gter bus la// zheng rab gshin las ban gdab// glen pa'i brtul zhugs drag pa dang // \u0f88\u0f90 su sa me rgyad pa yis// bden dran le la dgas dang // bcom med na kun ces grang// b+h+r-i
196a7(rnying rgyud): la ba'i dmachog ni// ngamachog chen po'i dus la bab// sku gsung thugs kyi dmatshig na// re re la yang gsum gsum mo// ma dang bu ma chung ma dang // rab tu brgyan pa dag dang ni// ngag san tshig mtshon ma shor ba// snod ngan gsang ba mi brel
196b1(rnying rgyud): ga/ sems pagyud nga rnalam yongs pa// gsang rtags dam las bya// dan dam sems pathu na ga dang sa ga // rtswa ga par bar thag dang // groms can 'an pa dang // 'an chags gang nga ga zug dang // da
196b2(rnying rgyud): phrag dag ma spang // rje chen dri chu ga dang // sras thil pas bcan par bya'o// don das kun rnga ba byin ci lag/ gnang bkag gnyis ni bad ragasungs pa// rlung dang lung dang man dag dang // 'byu phreng gsung drab shi par // thugs phra tsho
196b3(rnying rgyud): chen chen pa 'bar pa yis// snang ba ye shes tsha 'phral gsam ces sbyangs// byi nad ye shes cha 'phral gsum gyis spangs// gyi nang ye shes tog pa gzhol bar 'gyur// an+dA la 'o/ e mer sro kau hU~M/ de khro ba dkyil la// du mngan par 'ang
196b4(rnying rgyud): mdad pa ni/ gab bams 'bar de'i mang dkyil na// rnga rnga gzhan nu byas 'debs mo// DU k+Shar dang tha byin pa// rnam par rgyal dang rnam sems ma// dbyug pa rjen pa thar ma dang // gzhan rje'i gshed pa da dong ma// migs lag dpas na thangs/
196b5(rnying rgyud): rta mgrin rgyal po gtum mam// gzhan gyis mi thub mda' snyems ma// bdud ci 'gyel brlad 'byin ma// khams gsus nas rgyal gsod ma dang // stobs po cha dang brgyang ma dang // gnyen su med pa'i skul pas men dang // phag mag g.yag mag tag
196b6(rnying rgyud): maMgo dang // sha ba gzig dang byi la'i mgo// ma ma ga dang ma ga mas/ rjed mad kyi mgan bdan / sdig pa thar sa bya nangam s+ho// ngas pa mata tha thad mgo/ zhwa ye mgo dang pa wang mgo// se mo'i mag dang gyi ba'i mgo// yang sbal kram sbal grangs med kyis// phreng
196b7(rnying rgyud): pan+dar yangs 'tshar gtams// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcag sung thug pa/ spel ya bcu gnyis kyi snga las/ yang dag pa'i na gyid gangs pa'i sa gnyis pas / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'angags byed can pas
197a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gsang sngags drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rjes 'dug rnams/ e ma n+ta sangs rgyas thams cad tu
197a2(rnying rgyud): za na med pa'i byang chub sems// 'da' dka' de bzhin mi shegs pa// 'da' bar mi mdzad dmachog can// phyogs bzungs gsum rang bzhin dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga ba nyid// rang gi rtog pa phra rgyas kyis// so sor sbyin cing phyag bsngal zla//
197a3(rnying rgyud): bya phyir tha med rnams// bstan gyir rdzogs longs sprul par mdzad// nog min btsun mo'i thag nas// rdeg po mthing nag 'bang ba gzhengs// mgon po bdag nyid can go byas// rdo rje gsang sngags 'khor po ra// sngags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni//
197a4(rnying rgyud): don du gsungs pa 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang // rnal 'byor rjes 'jug brtan po bzung // nam mtha' mtha' chen chos da byings gzhal yas khang // thigs pa lta bung snang srid dngos med shed// srog sa
197a5(rnying rgyud): go da gzhon nur dashang// gang phred phung po rdo rdzing yang dag gtams// gsang sngags don rtsidang po la// dkyus cog 'bru tshig dan cog dang // dbum chog gnyis dang 'bru jig dag// dan cig bcang dang yad gni// rin chen dag 'di da sa
197a6(rnying rgyud): po gnyis skyed kyang sems ldan// gnyis pas rigapa ni so sor btan// gsum pas drag po'i 'dzub dgongs bstan// bzhi pas sreg sung thunas su bstan// don de shes pa'i rnal 'thor byas// babras pa'i las la 'jug par bya// oM nga rje 'i kI la hU~M/
197a7(rnying rgyud): sarba ba m+b+hi bral/ yi dang po yong d+ha 'on dz+dza)/ i na ya NAM/ oM bzhi kro d+ha yas d+ha hU~M/ oM badz+ra ma nas rgya ma tsa hU~M/ e 'dzib rgya ma hrIHhUM/ oM badz+rag tus pa da trAM/ oM badz+ra d+ha sa mr-i ta gaNal
