198b1(rnying rgyud): nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag gsang sngags 'di// rdo rje 'dzin 'brags 'bebs pa'i sgrol ba'i mthu// rdo rje 'dzin 'gugs dkyus tshig e ka ne// oM na Ta gsang sngags kyis/ phyogs bcu'i bde gzugs thugs kyi gsang sngags kyang // byin pa tsha
198b2(rnying rgyud): bden pa'i mthus// rdo rje sder mo'i dkyus tshig gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa'i lus ngag yid gsum snying gar mnan pa'i mthu// rdo rje 'dzin dgugs dkyus tshig rdzi yi gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa'i dbang po 'du rten klad pa brgya tshal 'gas pa'i
198b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin 'gugs dkyus tshig tse ra'i gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa thams cad dbang po rnam shes bsdams shing sgrol ba'i mtha// rdo rje 'dzin 'grags dkyus tshig pa cu'i gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa'i steng nas 'dabes par byed pa'i madra//
198b4(rnying rgyud): dkyus tshig cha yi gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa thams cad rtsa sbub btsir zhing khrag rgyags sgrol ba'i mthu// rdo rje 'dzin 'bugs dkyus tshig tsit+tA'i gsang sngags kyis// thugs kyi gsang sngags dbang du bskus nas gnyis med 'debs pa'i tshu//
198b5(rnying rgyud): dkyus tshig tsa yi gsang sngags kyis// tshe dang bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid thugs kyi dngos grub thob pa'i mthu// rdo rje 'dzin 'gugs dkyus tshig du wa'i gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa thams cad dbang med 'tshir ba'i mthu// rdo rje sder mo'i da ltas tshig
198b6(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob pa'i mthu// rdo rje sder mo dkyus tshig sprin dza e ka'i gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje phur pa gzi byin bskyed cing dbang du bsdus nas sgrol ba'i mthu// bdud kyi bdud chen bdud kyi bum bzhing gsang rba hA 'di khrin las dku tshig
198b7(rnying rgyud): e ka'i gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa dgas shing yan lag gnon pa'i mthu// phri na las dkyus tshig ra yi gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa'i dbang po bcing zhing gnon pa'i mthu// phrin las dkyus tshig tri yi gsang sngags rnam shes sdom zhing gnon pa'i mthu// phrin
199a1(rnying rgyud): las dkyus cig tsari'i gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa'i gzugs thang rdul du gang gcing gnan pa'i mthA// phrin las dbus tshig pa'i gsang sngags kyis// bcom ldan 'das brdang bdag bkang ba nyan pa man// rbad pa sang
199a2(rnying rgyud): tsha la gsang sngags kyis// khro rgyal byin brlab migs ba yi sngags// dbang du bsdus nas drag tu mnan sgrol mthu// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste// bdud kun tshini bdud chen po// dpung bu ga sang bco brgyad po// g.yas pa
199a3(rnying rgyud): padagra ni gsod byed dgu// phra men phyag nas 'od zer 'phro// shin tu mi spun gtum bag can// sdang ba'i dug lnga rab tu 'bar// kI ya ya yi ma sgrogs pas// g.yos sprorab tu g.yos so// shin tu rab tu ga yos so ga yos phrar gyur te// 'jig rte
199a4(rnying rgyud): ba thams cad brtul ba sangs nas rab tu thag par gyur nas/ 'jigs byed chen po'i bdud bdag gi// zhabs la spro bos phyag 'tshal nas/ skabs su gsol te mchig ci tu 'di skad ces sbas te/ rdo rje bdud bdag 'jigs byed kyi// phung ba'i 'a
199a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar // khro do'i me dpung 'bar ba yis// 'jigs tshul 'chang ba'i khyad par can// dbu mangs grub pa'i sgra sgrogs shing // phyaka mangs 'jigs pa'i martson nabasdams// 'jig rten khams kun nges bkang nas// khyo gnyeng thal gdang sa ngar skad kyis// nga
199a6(rnying rgyud): rten khams gan 'dug stong sgrog/ rgyod dang garke dang babyed pa// don dang rtags dang ldan pa yi// 'bar ba'i rgyan cha mtshan cha 'chang // bskal ba zhig pa'i srid rtse 'ber// 'jig rten thal bar rtag mdzad pa// dpa' de spyang la rgyabs sa mchi// bdud pa das
199a7(rnying rgyud): khyod la skyabs su mche// khro t+pal khyod la skyabs su mchi// thugs rje chen pog gzung du gsol// nan tan pags rjes ma bzung na// mgo dang lus kyang gas su brtsi// me lce phreng pas bsreg par bgyid// de phyir bdag cag zugs rjes bzung
199b1(rnying rgyud): zhes dregs pa can rnams mthun par skabs su gsol nas/ mdang sring mo dang chung ma dang than mo dang / ril phul re sas su gsol te/ gdan dang grogs myong ste/ rdzas stong ba'i srung mar dbang mang dad pas bzlas so// snying rjes pa bral ba dag
199b2(rnying rgyud): tshig ni// gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te// kun la khyab pa ma yin no// srog don bka' dam las kyis nyams// mtshan mas nyams dang 'dod pas nyams// 'di bdun spang ste yang dag don// bsgrub na nges par 'grub pa'o// srog pas nyams pa'i
199b3(rnying rgyud): nyid ni// pha dang ma ni slob dpon la// 'gal ba bsgral ba dam par bshad// don las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gsang ba la sogs smra zhing spel// bka' las nyams pa 'di lta ste// skur 'debs log par 'brid la sogs// sbyor grol la
199b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba rnams// mngon du byed pa dan pa'i bdud// yag la sogs srul bsngo// bdag la mthu dang rtsal 'dod pa// las kyis nyams pa dbang med bskal// skye ba med pa'i chos bshad kyang // mtshan ma'o chos la zhen pa sogs// mtshan ma nyams te//
199b5(rnying rgyud): shin tu bkral// rtag tu zhen chags zas la sogs// 'dod pas nyams te bsgral ba yin// de nas kI la ya'i bdag po la/ 'khor rnams kyis mazin gcig tu gsol pa/ kI la ya yi bdag po lags// bsrel ma bskal gyi sngon yon ji ltar lags/
199b6(rnying rgyud): de dag bsngal na rnal 'byor btsun// bdud rnams btul na bstan pa gnyan// med par bsgral na bar chad nyung // ma bskal skyon ni dmyal khams 'phel// ma btul bar chad pas ma mi khyab// chos nyid bden pa gsang sngags byin rlabs dang // thugs rje
199b7(rnying rgyud): chen po sangs rgyas mtha yis ni// a snye tu gnag pa 'di kho na'o// zhes snrel ma bcu gnyis kyi tan las/ rdo rje gsang sngags drug po'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas 'jigs byed chen po rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
200a1(rnying rgyud): par thugs nas/ byas kyi dam pas bka' sru da um tho rigs kyi byed par can// byang chub skyemasas sa dul// sbyin pas rnam pa kyil ma na// ma ba thams mdzad papas//
200a2(rnying rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor bcas pa la// bdud kyi bdud bdag khro bo rnams// rgyas 'debs la sogs khro mo rnams// stag g.yag la sogs pa byed tshogs// gsod byed la sogs phra men tshogs// grags kyul sogs dam pa btags// gzhal yas khadu na N+DI/
200a3(rnying rgyud): sgor gnas so// lho nu bcom lnga yang dgod la// phyi nad gas ba'i hom shing la// bsreg rdzas rnams dang brdeg pa'o// shar lhor srin las blo dkyil 'khor// mda' bcu smras dran sgo bzhi la// kho cu'i snying po gas 'bris la// thun khung phur bdun rtse /
200a4(rnying rgyud): mda' gzhu// nub byang thod pa'i mnan dkyil 'khor// gdab phung ba rgyani rtsa brgyad de// gru gsum el thun du dbab// byang shar brnag pa bskal dkyil 'khor// gru gsum pang rim gnyis pa brus// brdag pa'i rnam shes dgrag bzhi ma byar// dmachog
200a5(rnying rgyud): che dbag dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brtan chen po'i rdzas la bab// chos slong dmacan dus la bab// than dang po nyi de bzhin bsgral// sngon du bskal banyams pa 'dun// sngags dang ting 'dzin gyi rdu las gsum// dpyas dang
200a6(rnying rgyud): sbrad ma ga ba par bya// rab 'bring gsum gyi rtags byung na// dam tshig drug gi dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // dus gsum N+Dal ba'i gdungs bu pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang
200a7(rnying rgyud): bgags// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // dngos gru 'grog cing 'tsho rnams// khro ba chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// lung tsam gyis ni 'dir babrag nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bskal ba dang // lus dag rdul bzhin gzhiganas kyi
200b1(rnying rgyud): srug baphrul nyams su myong bar mdzod// dkar nag mtshams kyi gnad chen la// so sor gad ba dang dril la gdab// dgrag cing gad ba dang bsreg pa'o// zhi rgyas dbang dang mdzatshan spyad dang // dri dngas yo chog no// zlog dang rir drug drug go// rna
200b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rtsibs bcad pa// lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// mchod rdzas thams cad dkar por bya// sngags dang ting 'dzin phrin las rnams// bsgom na thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// thog med bsags pa'i sdig sgri ba dang // gdug pa can gyi da
200b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus zhi bar 'gyur// 'di ni zhi ba'i las sa // dkyil 'khor to mkhrang zlum po la// rdo rje 'dros brgyan par bya'o// bsreg rdzas dkar po mchod byas nas// lha rnams 'khor bcas zhi bar 'gyur// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlab sa ma du
200b4(rnying rgyud): na rtog sems 'khrug zhi bar 'gyur// 'di ni zhi ba go la zlas bya// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams pa// mgo po rgya brdud rtsi thang rnam// 'ong seng byang sems gzhal yas khang // logs pa na ba'i lta ba mas la// btab pas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/
200b5(rnying rgyud): zhibar ma sbyar gang yang med// zhe mdzad ltal phyag 'tshal lo// ting 'dzin grags dang zhi ba gsum// chos nyid bden pa'i byin brlabs ma thas// thams cad ma lus zhi bar 'gyur// zhi ba'i phrar gdab c+doMs bya'o// dngul dang 'bras chen no mno// gtong
200b6(rnying rgyud): mdakar byo tsun dkar ba// sngags dang ting 'dzin phrin las gsum// chos nyid bden pa'i byin pa tubs mthus// zhi bar bzhis shing gtor byas na// dgra gags dngos lta zhi bar 'gyur// snyi dang kyi nyan par 'gyur// zhi ba'i gtor sa zhes bya'o// sku
200b7(rnying rgyud): dkyis par chen po // sgra bsnyen pa rdzogs pa sgoms la// snga rnams gsang bags thaMng spyod// nas chen man mar gnyis// btsun rgya shun mom tog dadang // bamaton ma ton snga tshogs dkar// de rigasang sngags ca
201a1(rnying rgyud): gzangs dadag/ TIg gyi bsdig pa'i 'ang gyur// de ga smre zhin rnon 'am ba dag/ deni ga sung thags myong bapangasmra// rjesas drug pa rgyu 'byor byas// kaubya'i byin theg cad kyi// nyarnams gagadunas padang /
201a2(rnying rgyud): rgol bar sems dpa' zhi ba dang // gdug pas zin bzhi ba dang // slad kyi bar chad bya sems zhi// 'di dang gzhan du bde mchog thob// sbyin bsreg sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// tshogs chen tshogs gnyis rdzogs par 'gyur// zhi bgrub pa'i yon tan no// grwa bzhir
201a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa// lha rnams 'khor bcus spyan drangs te// mchod rdzas ser po me tog ser// chos gos thams cad ser por bgos// lha rnams thams cad ser por bgom// bdag nyid nga rgya rdo rje bsgon// kun bzang mo chos dbyings la//
201a4(rnying rgyud): tu bza po'i gzi rji gyis// bdag nyid lha rnams gnyis med bsgom// de ni rgyas pa'i las zhes bya'o// hos khung thubung zhi 'bar 'al// rdo rje 'khor los brgyan par bya// hom shing ser po'i shing rnams la// gser gyi zag pas bcings byas pa// lha rnams bskyed da
201a5(rnying rgyud): sman dngas la// der byed mchod bsreg par bya// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor nam zhes bu// gse dang ma ser ba shing rnams pa// mgo tu mdud kyi brar ba'i// khong sar byung ngoms gzhal las khang // sogs gazlas pa'i rta bsgoms la// btab pas 'ang zung
201a6(rnying rgyud): par 'byung // rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med// rgyas mdzad lta la phyag 'tshal lo// ting 'dzin sdug dang nin las gsum// chos nyid bden pa'i byin parlabs mthas// thams cad ma gras rgyas par thebs// rgyas pa'i phrar ba gang ba ces bya'o// gser ram thor ngo 'dem dang/
201a7(rnying rgyud): me tog ser po rje tshogs phye// ser po'i 'bru snga mang sbyar la// rgyas par gyur pa'i gtong ba ste// gtong bas thams cad rgyas par 'gyur// rgyas par mgyur gang yang med// 'di ni rgyas pa'i gtong mamo// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// 'a rnams dkyil 'khor brtsen
201b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nas// rnams gsang sngags rgyas par gyur// shA da ka m-igag zang shing par// de reg pang sngags ca brgyang byung// brdeg rdzas byom du bathag pan// thams cadam rdzas rgyas par 'thar// zas pazlogs sags snang b.las// rjes su 'dun pa /
201b2(rnying rgyud): 'byor bas// rgyas pa'i sbyin bsreg rtsu brgyad kyis// chos nyid bden pa'i gsang sngags byin rlabs mthus// g+ha dang rnal 'byor gzi byin byin rlabs rgyas// dpal dang tshe dang bsod nams rgyas// don dam kun rdzob 'ongs stong rgyas// rgyu dang 'bras bu bsod nams
201b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen rgyas// 'di ni rgyas pa'i yon tan no// zla gam dkyil 'khor rtsi bas brgyad par// lha bskyed dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// mchod pa la sogs gzhung bzhin bya// lha rnams go rim dmar por bsgom// chas gos dmar po rnam pa lnga// khro bo chen
201b4(rnying rgyud): po'i byin rlabs kyis// rdo rje phra men ma mngags nas// ma dang bu la byams pa'i tshul// thams cad dbang du bskus nas 'grub// 'di ni dbang gi las zhes bya'o// hom gyi dkyil 'khor zla ga ma la// rdo rje zhags pas brgyan par bya// seng ldeng mjo mo glang 'ja
201b5(rnying rgyud): ba// gzhan yang shing rtsi dmar po rnams// gom shing thag dmar bkyigs pa ni// rnam tog gnag pa gnyis bsreg na// ci bsgo bka' nyan dbang du 'das// 'di ni dbang gi hoH zhes bya'o// zangs sam dmar pa'i shing rnams la// mgo ba tu mdud
201b6(rnying rgyud): rtse zlar gnyis// khong seng byang sems gzhal yas khang // 'ogs la dbang gi lha bsgoms la// btab pas thams cad dbang du 'dus// dbang du ma 'dras gang yang med// dbang mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ni dbang gi gyur pa gang ba ba'i las so//
201b7(rnying rgyud): zangs skye shing dmar gong dmar phye// 'bras chen dmar po me tog dmar po'i phye// bur ma chu yis sbyar la gtor// blo chen po'i byin rlab kyis// phra man tshogs kyis bkug nas ni// ci bsko bka' nyan dbang du 'dra// dbang gi gtor ma'i las zhes bya'o/
202a1(rnying rgyud): dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen po zla// lha dbang dkyil 'khor bstan rdzogs nas// lha rnams gsang grags dbang du sbyor// zangs me seng lded mdzam ma// nad dmar kha dag dmar pa' 'dra// ro re gsang sngags rtsa brgyad spyor
202a2(rnying rgyud): bsreg rdzas hom du phul bsregs na// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs sangs rgyas mthus// gnyis su med pa'i byin rlabs kyis// srid gsum khams gsum dbang du 'dus// mi mthun rtog sgrib dbang du 'dus// bdag dang gzhan gyi tha mi dad// kun
202a3(rnying rgyud): bzang yab yum gnyis med kyis// thams cad dbang gi rang bzhin ni// dbang gi grub pa'i yon tan no// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// de la gru gsum re ngo // bar khyams sgo khyung ldan par bya// lha rnams dkyil 'khor bskyed spyan drangs// gnyis
202a4(rnying rgyud): su med par bstim byas la// gakhrag dmar gyi mchod byas lnga// bsnyen bzla rdzogs par bstsal bar bya// drang ba bzhi bcu rtsa drug la// rang rang snying po zas pani// dkyil 'khor go nas dag bar bya// sngags dang tid 'dzin nyin las kyis// pha men tshogs
202a5(rnying rgyud): rbad par bya// de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni drag po'i las zhes bya'o// nyo ma khrang grag su mnyis brtsegs la// thod pa me ris brgyan par bya// gsang bu'i nas ni bcu gsum dang // gdug pa can gyi char drag shing // ljags thag bsdams la
202a6(rnying rgyud): gzug par bya// phrar ba brgya ni rtsabargya brkyang kyis// mtha' ma bskor la dgod par bya// ming zlang lugs sa so yi sgrar// bzlas la mtha' ma bskor la gzhag/ maita khyo slo gi'i drad spaH// bse na drug dung sna tshogs dang // lan tshwa tsha mar nyung nag dang // skye
202a7(rnying rgyud): rdzo sa gru bral dang // grags kyi 'angs phyi bri dang // bcos pa'i shadang bsreg pa'i gsung // rje mo tsho sa dang bre ba'i rgya// rding grwa yi dbyangs blangs nas// lan gradas brgya dang stong du dbu bar bya'o// lharnapas gsang sngags ma 'grub par// gnag bajos
202b1(rnying rgyud): par bcug pa ni// gzugs dang ming dus bsreg par bya// dug gsum 'byung po shA khrag bkang // gsol te thams cad rgyas par mdzad// hom du bsreg na mo la 'chi// 'di ni dran pa'i nyom gyi las so// lcags samanag pang shing rnams la// mag brgya mdu rtsa
202b2(rnying rgyud): zung gsum// khong seng byang sems gzhal yas 'ang // logs la drag po'i lba bsgoms la// btub pas thams cad drag par 'gyur// drag par mgyur gang yang med// drag mdzang lhal phyag 'tshal lo// cho ga jo mo phra men tshogs// gnag pa'igs
202b3(rnying rgyud): dang ming rus la// drug tu bskul lag dab par bya// gnad gcod skyog dang phral bar 'gyur// 'di ni drag po'i phur pa gdab pa'i las so// sna tshogs drug gi phye ma dang // nyung nag sa tsha tI la nag dang // gdug pa'i tsher ma phye ma dang // sran chan bya can thugs
202b4(rnying rgyud): bye dang // sha khrag gtor mar bsregs pa ni// rdo nag phye ru bsres la gtor// kho bo chen po'i byin rlab kyis// phra men tshogs kyis bkug nas ni// gdug pa can rnams rlag par byed// drag po'i gtor ma'i las zhes bya'o// drag po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru//
202b5(rnying rgyud): wA yi dkyil 'khor bskyen rdzogs nas// lha rnams gsang sngags drag por sbyor// ljags phye drug phye nyud nag gi// re re gsang sngags rtsa brgyad sbyor// gzas par then par bcug la bsreg/ rdo rje med pa la snying bsreg go// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs
202b6(rnying rgyud): kyis// gzas pa'i rnam shes tshe rten ni// bye sgo me yis bsreg bzhin tshig/ 'di ni drag po'i sbyor ba'i las zhes bya// rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// drag po'i sbyin bsreg rtsa brgyad kyis// chos nyid bden pa'i byin rlabs mthus// bar nga
202b7(rnying rgyud): 'gegs rnams rlag pa dang // ga nag pa tsha ba'i nad kyis 'che// skyo 'bog brgyal nad bgegs rnams thar// gzas pa'i gnad bdun mo rten bsreg/ rnal 'byor gyur shog dngos grub thob// drag po 'grub pa'i yon tan ni// phrin las rnam bzhi'i
203a1(rnying rgyud): stu/ dkyil 'khor smra// hom lnga yang rdog rtswa mor brtsegs// kha dog reg dang mthun par brtsig/ gdug pa can gyi hom shing la// lcags thag gis ni bskor la gzugs// kI la yan nyi shug cig/ snying po nyi du
203a2(rnying rgyud): gcig gis bsdus// lan grangs nyi shu gcig tu ni// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor phrar bskor la// phur ba'i 'od zer stor khams khangs// gsang sngags 'brug stong sgrogs par bsgom// mgyogs byed ye shes pho nya 'gyed// za na dang pho nya bka
203a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs// khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas pa// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i gsang sngags kyis// lha rnams gsang sngags bsdus te dgug/ sder mo'i sngags kyis dkug cing gzir//
203a4(rnying rgyud): than dang pho nyas dgug cing bstim// de nas btab pa'i las byas la// gnad la dbab ni brkyang dag la// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing snang sems ldan pa rnams// rdungs shika rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'ad byed sdig can na//
203a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje me dpal snying bsreg go// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlog/ chos nyid kyi bden pa'o// gsang sngags kyi byin rlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o// a b+hi tsan+da'i dus la bab bo// brnag pa 'di kho na la'o// rdo rje me dpal gyis snying bsreg cing / skor chos
203a6(rnying rgyud): re zhing bcu drug dag/ rtsa brgyad dag tu dbul bar bya// gsang sngags gnag pa thems par 'gyur// gnag pa 'dod pa'i bya ba 'grub// ces kI la ya bcu gnyis kyi tan+t+ra las rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom
203a7(rnying rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rjes 'jug gi don du mchod pa dang / bstod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// bdag po'i phyag rgya mnyam bzhag la// mi dming
203b1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// lha rnams dkyil 'khor spyan drang ngo // sred pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// la shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// ye shes tha ba gshegs nas kyang // thugs dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // k+Shi nga
203b2(rnying rgyud): yA yi dngos grub gsol// lha rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad la// sman drang phyag 'tshal mchod bskyod bya// dngos grub rnam gnyis 'thob bya'i rjer// dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes mchod do// bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od zer las// mchod pa'i sa
203b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs tsam// nam ma khrug khengs pa'i char bzhin byab// bdag la mchod pa byed par bsam// gtor ma tshogs mchod rdzas la yang // sbyang ba'i yi ges spang bar bya// spel ba'i yi ges spel la ne// thod pa'i snod ni 'jig rten langs// bdud rtsi chen po'i 'od zer
203b4(rnying rgyud): las// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'gro// 'dod yon lnga dang lha mo brgyad// nam mkha' khengs pa'i sprin tshogs las// bar snang khengs pa'i char bzhin bab// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad la// mchod pa'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya// thog mar rtog gom
203b5(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid bsal// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo na sems can yun du 'khor// gnyis su med par bskal bar bya'o// de bzhin nyid du gnas bcas te// thugs rje chen po 'byung bar byed// 'tsho ba'i zas ni byin brlabs nas// hom gzung thom wa
203b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchod// bdag mchod kun 'grangs thams cad mnyes// kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas// thams cad bza zhing brgyan par byar// dkyil 'khor lha rnams mnyes gyur na// nyes pa thams cad rnam par dag/ dngos grub rab mchog thob par
203b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// sku tshogs dkyil 'khor dam tshig can// spyan drangs pa la sbyin par bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la// mchod dang bshags dang dgrag bzhim dang // bkug nas rdo rje phreng bas gdab// khro ma 'bar ba'i gtur khung du// rdo rje thobs brdung byas nas/
204a1(rnying rgyud): nga bzhal pa zag das so na mu // byabadangags thams cadam/ gabags ca na mongs sastsa// pa gas byang nga/ rtswas so gan bad / dab /
204a2(rnying rgyud): gnas brgyad nas// dkyil 'khor 'khor bcas spyan drangs nas// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ca// zhing chen gsar rnying ti nga bcas// dmar gyi.a d+hi t+ya mchor bgrel// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas rnams// ma lus gshegs nas brnam
204a3(rnying rgyud): dru gsol// mchod pa'i yo byar thams cad ni// nag por byas te dbul bar b+ha// thun dang ponya bka' nyan tshogs// dam n+dan tshogs la bstab pa ni// skya bshig gcer bur phyung la ni// thal bar b+ha zhag gis mtshan// khro ba'i cha lugs bzung nas ni//
204a4(rnying rgyud): kha nas khrag dang zhag 'dzag pa// lag par thod khrag thogs nas ni// hi hi dgod cing spyugs pas 'bor// so so rngams kyi ming nas 'bor// gnag pa bos nas zhal du bsgrub// srin mo rnams ni tshogs kyi bdag/ he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod//
204a5(rnying rgyud): 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// mkha' dbyings b+hag klong yangs nas// byang chub sems ni mchod par spro// phyogs bcu'i lha rnams sku gsung thugs// mchod pa phul bas mnyes rab mchog/ rgyal ba mnyes pas dngos gru bathod// rto
204a6(rnying rgyud): gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la// mkha' grong me dpung gzhal yas khang // kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'// 'di yang nga yi gzhal yas khang // sngags dran ye nas bde gshegs sku// yid ni kun bzang rang
204a7(rnying rgyud): la shar// mkha' klong me dpung dbyings nas bzhengs// me yi snying po sgra dang phyag rgyar gsal// gnyis med rtogs pa chos spyi yin// byang chub sems ni khyab pa'i sgra// 'jigs byed rngam pa khro rgya lasu// dpal chen 'jigs byed spyi yi mchog
204b1(rnying rgyud): nga namam can dus nacan ma dad // nasadu sa sa // bdag gis padags na kun sa mdzad// stong grasus to gdag na/ na / sa // du no tu
204b2(rnying rgyud): gan yas dang // banag can bang mo'i mtha'// 'di ya nga migag ga sus dang // thugs dran mnas padag shegs gsu // yidi ni can tu pabyung pa nga la g+hA// mang klong mi dpyi dbyi sa na she// khyod du
204b3(rnying rgyud): gad dbyings nas spogs// rnams pa'i 'odo khro bo'i gsung // snying po 'bru dgu bsten pa'i gsung // sbal pa'i brda' tshig ma mo'i gsung // sna tshogs mi las gsung mchog ste// zhi ba'i gsung gi mchod pa yin// mchod pa chen po mchod pa che//
204b4(rnying rgyud): 'di yang nga yi gsung gi mchog/ bdag gis bdag mchod kun mnyes mchod// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la// mkha' grong me dpung gzhal yas khang // kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'// 'di yang
204b5(rnying rgyud): yi gzhal yas khang // sngags dran ye nas bde gshegs thugs// yid ni kun tu bzang po rang la shar// mkha' klong me dpyang dbyings nas bzhengs// tsit+ta gA zhal yas gsum chung thugs// phyi ngo nang bzhi lha yi thugs la spyos// dbyings dang
204b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes gnyis med thugs// kun bzang yab yum dol pas mchod// zhi ba'i thugs kyi mchod pa yin// mchod pa chen po mchod pa rje// 'di yang nga yi thugs kyi mchod// bdag gis bdag mchod thams cad mnyes// stong gsum stong gi 'jig
204b7(rnying rgyud): rten na// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la// mkha' klong me dpung la sogs nas// dbang dang mngon spyod par dag gi// de ltar de bzhin de rjes las// rgyas dbang mngon spyod mchod pa che// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod chen po// de ni kho bo'i dkyil
205a1(rnying rgyud): gas ga du / zhug / sa sa// klu ma nan// rnas du tu/
205a2(rnying rgyud): bdud can go// gadrug pa 'dul byer srung sgrub pa// phyi nang bdud rnams rnam par joms// 'jigs byed ches phyag 'tshala'o// te ru ka la phyag 'acom mo// sri gsum 'joms mdang stsal phyag 'amal 'o// srid pa chen po nyid mnyes byar/
205a3(rnying rgyud): byud pa 'di bsungs s+ho// de bzhin ga sungs pa'i dang migs da// byang chub byud pas rnam par spyor// byang chub sems ni mgrang sa sheg/ rdo thug nam thogs pa// dam pa'i chos kyang ni slong ci // mi shes papas ldan da // bla
205a4(rnying rgyud): bstan par bye ni// de bdag yongs su grangs pa ni// dkrung thub kyis kyang gzir bar byas// rtag tu sgos pa bskyangs pa nye// bdud rtsi sku dang dkon mchog la gnod pa skal ba dbya// gsung sngags bud med 'dod pa rnams// byeng chub sems ni wa bar
205a5(rnying rgyud): D+ha// rdzun chog brlang po gas don sra// blor grol mchod pa gzhung dusgra// nyams bdun ma btang ba sgral bar bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa chen po ni// goms lam ting badzin brtan pa zob// gsung sngags thabs chen thabs mur bas// tha~M'i
205a6(rnying rgyud): skyong ngas bgro don na// de nasam du kying la gtad pa/ nyan mongs pakor ba'i sams can 'di// bskal ba chen po'i bas su rung // dpral chen zhal du bstar po k+ki// chogan ma'i tshogs la ba zo// sems can 'dral ba'i ga' du bshes/ tan
205a7(rnying rgyud): po'i zhing du sbyor// gying chen rdo rje'i phyag tu 'bul// ye shes rgya mtshor ba zhes su gsol// de nas ma tri sdig can de// dkyil 'khor chen por drangs nas ni// thar pa'i lam byang dkyil 'khor 'dir// brod pa can dag 'ongs pa ltar// sa la bad ldan pa
205b1(rnying rgyud): sems can khyod// bad bar 'ongs so legs so 'ongs// b+h+yod ni bsod nams skal bar ldan// badreg shegs thugs rjes rgol mkhas pas// blong na 'jig rten snying rje// gnyis su med par babral bar snang // thabs dang shes rab rnams
205b2(rnying rgyud): kyang // de nas kyi dgis bstab par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dkrisu bsngor lha tshogs rnams// e ts+tshi e hi tshur blon 'khor dang bcas// dze dzI ba te spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// kIli kIl ya dga' ba'i bzhad mos bkang // bde
205b3(rnying rgyud): kyi nan
205b4(rnying rgyud): dbyor kying chen gyis// ma trai la yang sdang mig blta// zhabs bathad mdzub g.yon gtad de ni// ye shes mkha' lding sder chen gyis// 'khor ba'i bye phrug blang ba ni// bu phrag ma la gzan ster bzhin// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kun dgyes// dkyil
205b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i steng du gzhug/ gnyis med ye shes dkyil 'khor du// 'dus shing tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan// su dag phyen pa phyir mi ldog par nges// sbyangs pa'i sngags ces sbyang bar bya// khrus wang rnam gsum rdzogs byas las// khro bo ma men po
205b6(rnying rgyud): bskul// rkyod ni phonya gying kar// 'dar sngon po dadi long la// a b+hi na d+ya gnas bstod de// dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur cig/ ye shes rdo dpal mtsho che 'di// nyon mongs sdig gzod ral bri ste// 'khor ba'i rtsa brdung nas phyung /
206a1(rnying rgyud): tsit+ta drangs nas b+han+ta'i snod du bskul// sdig can shes pa yi ge hU~M du bsgom// skar phaT kyis don gnyis byas// hAr d+h+r-i gis thugs kar 'dus// rdo rje thugs su dbang mchog bsgyur// gsung dang ska nas de bzhin du// drang 'ang
206a2(rnying rgyud): gsangal mardo rje'i lam// pad+ma las bzos byang chub sems// lha rnams dkyil 'khor skur rdzogs par// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskyed par bya'o// lha rnams dkyil 'khor gnas gsu ma nas// sku gsung thugs kyi 'od zer spro// dkyil 'khor bdagazhes/
206a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad mchod// don gnyis byas shing tshur 'dus nas// mgal me bzhin du bdag la mchod// thugs nas sku gsung rim bzhin du// gsang ba'i lam byung rdo rje'i lam// byang sems b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor thim// lha rnams 'od zhu gyung sems kyi/
206a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi thig le ni// tsan ka yi 'bru tsam la// kI la ya yi gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje gzhon nu chen gang ba// b+ha ga'i gzhal yas khang nas ni// phyag rgya bzhi yis spyan drangs nas// 'og tu yaM las rlung dkyil 'khor// btegs nas 'og min gnas su
206a5(rnying rgyud): drangs// rigs lnga yab yu ma lhums su drangs// rdo rje sems ni rlung lta bu// gang dag bsgral nas rdo rje'i tshe// de nyid sbas kyi dang po ni// rdo rje sems dpar khyod nyid 'gyur// thabs la mkhas pas mchod pa ste// ta na ga Na sbyor ba mchod chen po// sla
206a6(rnying rgyud): ni kham pa gyen du brjes// brang thag sba la gsus pa 'bor// tshigs bzhi sbom la rdum pa dang // rkang pa bsnol phra zheng che zhing // dri dreg ma yin sha dreg chags// mig ni shel la 'bras bu ster// nyams bdun zhing bcu de dang mnyam/ lcags pas
206a7(rnying rgyud): byong khong ri bzhin te// dkyil 'khor chen por bcug nas bskal// gong bzhin de ltar de bzhin bya'o// mchod pa chen pos rgyal ba mnyes// thun mong dngos grub ci 'dod bya// dngos grub yon tan 'di la blang // ta na ga Na mchod chen po// zhes kI la
206b1(rnying rgyud): bcuganyis kyi rnams/ mdzad pa'i blan mngan par bru ba zhes bya ba'i la // de nas des 'dag gidon dung bang bskur ba dam pa zhes zla ba'i/ de na sa nyams pa thugs nas babad rnams pa bkang sas pa// narnags na/
206b2(rnying rgyud): mang pa pa' da / med pa // rigs pa'i thub par mdzad// sangs rgyas rgyan sa // nam bya sams// 'bar bamamam pa da // tha m-i dbyig bdun
206b3(rnying rgyud): spyon// tham sa dang b+hU ngas gang byu bag/ sangs rgyas rnams tshugs sa dang ma// dab ga sus rtse papa 'don du gyi/ don ma ni spyod pag min// bdag pa da byung lung bag med/ 'don shang bcom ldan 'das/
206b4(rnying rgyud): spyod bums// yang dag dbyings nas rol pa las// thabs dang shes rab ldan pas ma// stong pa las ni skA byung // 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa dag pa yis// dbang bsgyur dngos grub ci 'dod 'byung // zhings 'bru drog na lung rtsen// de las 'das tha
206b5(rnying rgyud): thog pa ca gas pa sa/ dag cigagag sa/ dmas can mams na pa ga/ rnam ma mam rna cad// rag ga zung nags / pa'i pa dang / la nga/

207b1(rnying rgyud): pos dbang bskur bas// 'chi med sgrog sngags dam yang brtan pa thob/ byang chub sems kyi mar mos dbang bskur bas// snang ba ye shes rang shar dngos gru thob par 'gyur// tshwa d+hi la zas dbang bsrung bas// thabs dang shes rab gtas dang
207b2(rnying rgyud): dbang rdob 'gyur// dngos grub rten ni lnga dag ste// bdud rtsi srug srung thugs kyi dngos grub rten// shar du rdo rje tshe yi dngos grub rte ni// zla grom b+ha rgyas goraro can no// sbron rin chen 'bar ba'i dngos bu brten// mIs sdes bla zlas srar ga dang pra ta//

207b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin rnams// dbang dang dngos grub blang bar bya// shes rab ma yi mtshan brtag pa// bla ni seng la li bu dang // mig lnga smig chags pa da // rkang pa rgyas phra ba dang // sras pa dri zhi ma nad med dang // na ma chung zhing zhed skabs dong /

208a5(rnying rgyud): lag rag pas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra// zhal g.yas dkar la gzhad pas dgod dgod 'dra// zhal g.yon dmar la gdangs pas gshe gshe 'dra// zhal dbus mthong la gnag pas khro khro 'dra// zhal nas gdub rtsub 'byin pas rngam rngam 'dra// rgyud drug

212a4(rnying rgyud): pe r+ya/ e ka 'ad ma tshig gsang sngags kyis// chos nyid bden pa'i byin brlabs mthus// yan lag bcings pa'i gnad brtag gzer// ra ma dan tshig gseng sngags kyis// sems dran myas byed gnang brjid rjod// badz+ra'i don chos

217b6(rnying rgyud): bsngags pas// yon tan rnams cad 'dri la mi 'brug dam par bag pa'i gsang pas kyang // de nyid ga zung shing g.yang blang na// dam pa rnams kyi dam pa'i mchog / dang sa baphrul na bran ma thong // 'ang sa blang rdzag pa'i sgrang nga gsung thu bra ngal bri nas gnyisasu med par byed 'dzin las pa /
217b7(rnying rgyud): da pa'i zugs rdordul gnyis su la par thugs te/ gcig pa nga bzhin dum nyam zhing dbyer med par gyur te ma stsu ba nga // de bzhin gsheg pa mams cad kyi srog grang thub kyi gsang bsngal la 'du te kyi sgralas 'dra bus pa ga par yos su da pa'i'i 'dra dra nyi po
218a1(rnying rgyud): ma dza lacan to/ cag dad du/ ka sa lang sa d+d+ha ma hataH/ bod nang du/ yus gzungs ma'i dngos grab chen po'i byad/ bcom ldan 'das dpal ste ka la phyag 'tshal lo// skyon 'das pa'i dus ma byung ba dzin do ra/
218a2(rnying rgyud): ri rab ri'i rtse lha g.yung drung gi gnas na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dpal he ru kas/ srid pa thams cad yum gyi b+ha gi le shar bar mkhyen nas/ yu ma chen mo nyid bzhi mu kha le'i mkha' bde ba chen po'i klong nas/ phig le chen po'i
218a3(rnying rgyud): bzhengs te/ rdo rje gsang ba'i thugs ka nas/ hU~M dkar po zhig las/ gsang ba dgyes pa'i 'gro 'du rgyun mi 'chad par bkye ba las/ yum chen mo nyid bzhi mu kha le'i b+hag la dgyes pa chen por thim par mdzod do// yum chen mo nyid bzhi lnga sa led kyi
218a4(rnying rgyud): chen po thim rngas/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas par mdzad do// pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas par mdzad pas slong gi 'jig rten gyi khams khebs par mdzad do// stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rakar chags pa thams cad g.yos par gyur to// des srid pa'i 'jig
218a5(rnying rgyud): rten gyi khams na/ rdo rjer gyur pa thams cad rdo rje'i rtsa ba btegs par gyur te/ chags pa'i sems g.yos nas/ shin tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs kyis chags pa'i gzhi po ga la ba der dong ngo // dong nas tha ga'i dkyil 'khor chags pa'i
218a6(rnying rgyud): nang du phyin te/ spangs nas gus pas bskor te phyag 'tshal ba ni/ g.yung drung lha'i gtso bo/ gnod dul lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ lha g.yung drung gi chags dang / g.yung drung lha'i rgyal mo/ srid pa'i phra men rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ ma mo bcu bzhi'i
218a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / srid pa sran mo'i rigs/ lha mo tshogs kyi rnga mo la sogs pa/ phran po'i tshogs thams cad dang / gzhan yang pad+ma thag la sogs pa thams cad chags pa'i mdangs byung nas bskor zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang / bstong pa bgying pa las
218b1(rnying rgyud): na po nyid pa'i rtsa kha le'i b+hag las/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnas spang gsal la sogs te/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'grom lnga'i dkyil 'khor thod par gyur to// de nas sum chan mos bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po la gzigs te/ sbrad kyis brda 'dib 'a da
218b2(rnying rgyud): grwa mra 'dzub pa phyung ba dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das yum gyi b+hag la su phyed nub tsam du bzhengs te/ rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum byung nas/ g.yung drung rtswa'i rgyal po zhwaganod 'dul la gzigs nas/ 'dzum par mdzad pa dang / de rnas pacom ldan 'du
218b3(rnying rgyud): rje gyig gyis brlabs kyis/ lha gnod 'dul stan la 'dug par gyur te/ de nas chags pa'i yid can/ de dag thams cad phyogs rgyags su gnas par gyur to// de das yum chernams lha gdod 'dul la gzigs das/ sngags kyis brda 'a di myang pa la
218b4(rnying rgyud): de nas rta gnod 'dul stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan stong du brkyang phyag 'tshal zhing / bag bzhis la brda bla nas gsol pa/ 'byung ba lnga la sogs pa yi// me la sogs pa ji ltar 'byung // srid pa'i 'jig rten thams cad de// ro dang mo yi mtshan nyid
218b5(rnying rgyud): de// thabs dang shes rab su las gyes// sems nyid rtag chang kyicil bgyi// yaM shes wa hi gang nas sbyar// sprul du ma po gang nas rkar// b+hi med chos dbyings ci la zer// yu ba nyi mkha' zhes jig bu// mngal la sogs pa mi 'tshal na// dang ngo
218b6(rnying rgyud): med pa gang gis sgrub// srid pa'i bu mang gzhi ji snyed kun// rabs drung rtsu bci ltar lags// dam tshig lung do dang ci ba'i tshe// srog las drang ji ltar lags// 'jig rten 'dir smra ba ji ltar bsrul// dus min 'chi ba gang gis bskang // yang gcog
218b7(rnying rgyud): 'dagazhan btsas// de skad gsol ba gas nangs // yang dag rdzog sa mas bka' stsal ba// nod cig gnod 'dul na yin ci// la khyer rnams kyi las dbang pa'o// po rjems kyiganyi tshogs su// srid pas kyi ba 'ag rnams/
219a1(rnying rgyud): ngag nyid du bshad par bya'o// de la drimam bcu bzhi rnam bshad par thab/ khram panam tad pa zhis pa la zhes zab sgra'i chan dkar byo bgrang ba'inas mdang / dbug cog 'gal ma btu srung ba thag na
219a2(rnying rgyud): zhabs rnam pa brgyad du bstan pa/ tsit+tar+Na ba gcig la rtsa mo rnam pa war 'bar ba/ shar phyogs kyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar na gsang ba'i mkha' grang la 'drad pa/ shel gyi thag 'ardo rje'i gsu canan// go phyogs cazha bas gnyis kyi b.ran/ gas
219a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' do la 'jam pa/ ke ke ru'i b+ha ga la rin po che'i gi sar can no// nub phyogs kyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar na/ gsang ba'i mkha' gsher la rnan pa/ pad+ma'i thag la bye 'u'i ge sar can no// byang phyogs kyi zhabs gnyis kyi b.ran/ gsang ba
219a4(rnying rgyud): mkha' rtsu ba la grang ba ste/ ge lar gyi dpal can no// de ltar mkha' bzhis skul brgyan pa/ mkha' bzhis skyong sku gting khung du sdud pa ni/ g.yu'i bde grong la chags pa'i gas can no// zangs kyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa gcig yod de/ de ldanapa
219a5(rnying rgyud): rnam pa rdza la/ shar phyogs kyi zhal dkar la 'tshor ba/ mchi ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ shel gyi rdo rdorje rtse dgu 'dzin pas/ 'byung ba sar byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje'i rigs su gyur te// mo phyogs kyi zhal snga la gdungs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i na
219a6(rnying rgyud): nas/ ke ke ru 'bar rab dgu 'dzin pas/ 'byung ba mer byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che'i rigs su gyur to// nub phyogs kyi zhal dmar la gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ pad+ma dgu brtsegs bzung bas/ 'byung ba rngu byin gyis brlabs pa
219a7(rnying rgyud): paTA'i rigs su gyur to// byang phyogs zhal ldang la gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ rdo rngam gram dgu brtsegs bzung bas/ 'byung ba chung du byin gyis brlags te/ las kyi rigs su gyur to// dkyil gyi zhal cir yang 'brar ba/ mche ba gtsigs
219b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i nang nas/ gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa bzung bas/ nam mkhar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su gyur to// 'byung ba lnga yang de ltar bskyed do// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas der byung ngo // zhal so so yin pas na ral
219b2(rnying rgyud): so so'i rigs dang ldan par snang ngo // tsit+ta gcig la rtse mo lngar snang ba yang / rtse mo lnga las rigs lnga'i ye shes lnga yang de las shar to// rtsa ba gcig la chos skye ba med pa'i dbyings kyang de las 'dus te/ mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes kyang grags so// rtse mo
219b3(rnying rgyud): lngar 'bar ba las srog gis bsdus pa'i kun gzhi la sogs pa'i dran pa thams cad kyang de las byung ba'o// rtsa ba gcig las sems can gyi sems rtag pa chen po yang de las byung ngo // de la mkha' bzhi las shar phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' grang la 'dred bas/
219b4(rnying rgyud): dgun du byin gyis brlabs so// byang phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' rtsub la grang bas/ dpyid du byin gyis brlabs so// nub phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' gsher la rlan pas dbyar du byin gyis brlabs so// lho phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha 'dro la 'jam pa ni/
219b5(rnying rgyud): du byin gyis brlabs so// dus bzhi yang de ltar cha bskams so// sku stod kyi zhal nas 'byung ba rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams/ skra spang gsang ba'i b+ha ga la/ sbyor ba'i tshul du skra phyed nung tsam du bzhugs pas/ skye ba rigs so so yang der 'dus so//
219b6(rnying rgyud): phyag bzhi la g.yas g.yon gyi dang po gnyis kyis khol mo bcu bzhi'i gtso mo srid pa bde 'gro ma dang / nyi zla thod phreng ma gnyis kyi tsit+ta bzung ba/ g.yas g.yon tha ma gnyis kyis khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'i snying nas bzung ba/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsi rnam
219b7(rnying rgyud): pa lngal longs spyod mngon du mdzad pa/ zhabs brgyad kyis dbying phyug ma bzhi dang / thugs kyi dgyes sde chen mo bzhi'i snying gnas brdzis pa/ dbus kyi zhal dpral ba'i dbyes nas/ mig zur gsum pa gcig gis bltas pas/ ma mo bcu bzhi'i kho la
220a1(rnying rgyud): srid pa chags byed ma dang / shun shan ne'u dang / e ka tsa ti la sogs pa 'dar lcug lhag byed pa/ dkyil gyi zhal nas rgan sgra brdabs pas/ hwe nuka sI la sogs pa ste/ srid pa'i dman mo la sogs pa'i snying rtsar gyis dbyi pa
220a2(rnying rgyud): mo dbang du yang des spyad do// dbus kyi zhal gyi ni mkha' yel yel bar rdzogs pas/ srid pa gsum gyi gtso mo yang der rdzogs so// skra gsang ba'i b+ha ga la/ yum gyi mkha' bde ba chen po'i klong zhes bya'o// su rtag pa chen po g.yung drung du bzhugs pas/ skye shi
220a3(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa zhes kyang de la bya'o// de la sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang de la bya'o// de la blang dor med pas kun tu bzang mo zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi bcud len pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya'o//
220a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba lnga sku la rdzogs pas/ 'byung ba'i rgyal mo zhes kyang bya'o// dus bzhi dbyings las shang bas dus bzhi cha skyomA ma zhes kyang de la bya'o// sku stod nas 'byung ba rigs kyi sangs rgyas rnams/ sku slad gsang ba'i b+ha ga la rngubs pas/ rigs kyi yum zhes
220a5(rnying rgyud): kyang bya'o// spras pa'i phyag gnyis nas bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i bcud 'dzag pa mngon sum du mdzad pas/ bdud rtsi'i rgyal mo zhes kyang bya'o// snang srid thams cad chom lha 'bebs pas/ srid pa'i rgyal mo zhes kyang bya'o// sgra lus gcig la mtshan
220a6(rnying rgyud): zhes bya'o// de la thugs las dngas pa'i snying po ni/ nyid bzhi mu kha le/ kro d+hI shwa rI/ b+ha gA pad+ma tsa/ bde klong 'das 'dus na snying dza sha yu ti d+d+hi d+ho/ zhes bya'o// de ltar bdag nyid bsgom pa ni/ dang por de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bsgom
220a7(rnying rgyud): la thugs ka nas yi ge oM dkar po gcig la/ ye shes wa'i gzhab med 'ang / chos kyi dbyings ltar khyab brda' ba'i dbyings su/ bdag nyid bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/ snying gar mu kha le las/ ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo bsgo
220b1(rnying rgyud): mig g.yas par ha las mkha' 'gro ma rnam snang gsal bsgom/ mig g.yon par ha las mkha' 'gro ma 'od gsal 'bar bsgom/ rna ba g.yas pa la ha las mkha' 'grog nyen gas la 'bar ma bsgom/ rna bag yon pa ha las mkha' 'gom yang gas
220b2(rnying rgyud): g.yos bsgom/ sbrul ha las mtha' 'gro ma bzag gsal mnyam bsgom/ sku mdog phrag mtshan ni 'og gi chog bshad dang sbyar ro// yang ma mo zhes bya ba ni// ma ni N+Dal ba kun gyi yab// 'o ni snang srid kun drim// n+yaji skyed med parji d+hi ngas/
220b3(rnying rgyud): mo ni 'gag pa med pa'i klong // ma ni thabs mchog 'dod med mkha'// mo ni shes rab chags med grong // de lta bu yi yum chen mo// skra stong zhal nas 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang // su slad kyi b+ha ga sbyor ba mdzad pa'i bu mo lnga yod de/ gcig ni tang
220b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo rnam snang gsal zhes bya ste/ mdog dkar mo la shel gyi ral pacan/ gsang ba'i mkha' shel gyig zhur 'khyil pa/ ma chags pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar zhes bya ste/ spu mdog sngon po pa rin po
220b5(rnying rgyud): ral pa can no// gsang ba'i mkha' la rin po che'i grwa'ur 'khril pa/ mi len pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal ma zhes bya ste/ sku mdog dmar po bye na'i len phran can/ gsang ba'i mkha' bye ru'i gzur ba skyil pa/
220b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos zhes bya ste/ sku mdog lgang gu la rdo rje'i len phran can no// gsang ba'i mkhan rdo rje'i gzur bskyil ba/ grub pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgya
220b7(rnying rgyud): bzag gsal mnyam zhes bya ste/ sku mdog cir yang 'gyur ba lag yu'i ral pa can no// gsang ba'i mkha' g.yu'i ga'u bskyil ba/ gnyis med brten pa'i rlabs la rol pa'o// 'di sa ni mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi sras
221a1(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba 'di lnga yin/ sems can dus chen po la bab pa yang 'di lngas dbang byed de/ tshe'i bdag mo chen mo yang 'di lnga yin no// srog las drangs pa'i skang ban/ hrIs mu ra na d+hata/ ral par ta/ pa sha ga na tan/
221a2(rnying rgyud): yi te ta/ ma hA'i te ta/ ma mo rnams kyi gtso mo'i yang gtso mo/ gtan tshigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang // bdag nyid phyag rgyar de skyer byed// 'byung dang 'dug pa'i mchod
221a3(rnying rgyud): nyid las// ji ltar ba dag gis nan tan bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // mngon rdzogs dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// 'byung dang bajug pa'i mtshan nyid las// ji ltar dkyil 'khor lha bskyed pa// ngas
221a4(rnying rgyud): brten pa yan non min// nyon cig gdon 'dral lha yig ce// 'byung ba ske ba'i ba dang // 'dug pa 'asu ba'i mtshan nyid ni// sa thon gyis ni bstan par bya// bdag nyid thig pa m-inyam sbyar nas// dmya gsum rim gyis ting 'dza bsgom/ dzamags med ting dzin
221a5(rnying rgyud): ma bcing / bla ma chos kyi dbyings sa kyis// dmigs med mchogs sa pon gyis// dri bzhin nyid dam par grags/ ting rje mam tho mtshil// blang ngong ma byar sngang // marnams su stong pa'i bar gyis// bu Sha mgus pa'in/
221a6(rnying rgyud): bredag nyid drung pas gyur bas// 'og gi tshugs sus bon btan// bdag gi sulas gyu ba 'i// dim ste dum thon brtan// bdag gis las zlar ba'i// mngon sas ni bris mar brtan// bdag gi me las slar ba gyi// mabon las ni drod du ldam// 2das
221a7(rnying rgyud): ma med da/ ma las zas gyung/ sa
221b1(rnying rgyud): parba rnam par gsal// gdan gyis bon gyis spungs nas// rtsibs brkyang skyed du bcu bzhi bsgyel// dkyil du rgyamatsho thong phreng gnyis// shar dang nub tu mgo bsnol ba'o// sgrol byed dkar mo mag gcig gnyis// brgya byin phyogs su mug bsnol ba'/
221b2(rnying rgyud): dbang sdud nag mor la gcig gnyis// gshin rje'i phyogs su mgo bsnol ba'o// bdud rtsi byed dang ma mo gnyis// chu bdag phyogs su mgo bsnol ba'o// gnas skul ser mo las mkhan gnyis// gnod sbyin phyogs su mgo bstan pa'o// rgyan gyi rgyal
221b3(rnying rgyud): me lha'i phyogs// dbyings phyug ma ni bden phral phyogs// bdag nyid ma ni rlung lnga'i phyogs// gcig pu ma ni dbang ldan phyogs// rim gro skyed phyir 'khor rnams bsgyel// b+ha ga bcu bzhi'i gdan snyengs nas// bdag nyid byang chub thig le las// snying po
221b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes mngon du shar// byed pa po ni kun tu bzang // rnam par thar pa'i dbyar ldan zhing // ye shes drug gi phyag rgya can// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// bdag gi gzugs kyi ngo bo la// rnal 'byor
221b5(rnying rgyud): gzhi bde mchog ma// bya ba mo ni chos kyi dbyings// chos nyid rtag pa thugs kyi dkyil// 'od zer lnga po rtse nas 'phro// 'byung ba lnga yi zhal mnga' zhing // ye shes drug gi phyag rgya can// phyogs mtshams gnon pa'i zhabs brgyad kyis// ma gshegs
221b6(rnying rgyud): par ni srid par byon// dus bzhi 'char ba'i b+ha ga las// skye ba med pa'i klod du thim// srid pa gsum gyis sku brgyan cing // spyi dpal mchog la 'di skad gsungs// hUM ye shes snying po bla na med// bla med khrag 'thung dpal gyi dpal// 'jigs
221b7(rnying rgyud): byed gsang ba'i rdo rje ni// mkha' glong kun gyi gter lags kyi// mkha' klong bde ba'i lam mchog ni// phye 'gro yongs kyi thar pa'i lam// sangs rgyas yongs kyi'i sgod phyir// thar lam bde ba'i lam mchog ni// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags
222a1(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa'ad ni gsor nas kyang// rang badra na can na// rto sa gzhan ma gos ba byings// 'thung gnas kyi tho nga ba'i lan// rje kyil 'ang ma mad 'dus// nga bdang
222a2(rnying rgyud): gter// re skong badrad rtsi'i char chen thob// ho// hU~M ga pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dir // 'dab brgyangs yid kyil 'khor ldan// hUM lcags nang rten sgo 'phar bcus// rin chen dkyil 'jam gdan steng nas// bla me nga phrul gyi mimig gi /
222a3(rnying rgyud): dkrol gdan bye gdan pa bzhugs// rkyen rkyen brtsegs pa'i gta ca// bla med khrag 'thung phu bsas sa// brdad rtsi chen po'i zlum pa yis// sri ga sum 'gro ba'i bag chags bzlas// hU~Mmi dmigs pa la mig na// mchagus pa pa chags papas
222a4(rnying rgyud): thar 'am bde brtaka'i dbyings// blang dor med pa'i song yangs su// srid pa'i bab chags pakra ba'i phyir// sbri dpal tan meng pa yis// gsang ba'i don ldan skye mig gis// rnam par thar baji phyenas// me gas nu bos khrus chen mdzod// oM byabs
222a5(rnying rgyud): las dbyings byung dUr ba'i las// dbyings las thabs bzhengs pa med pa// bla med dbyings dang ye shes slo ba ni// bdud rtsichen po'i nang chen srir par blo// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchod par spro// rnal 'byor ma kha 'a gro zhing ba'i tshogs suste/
222a6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba rigs d+h+r-ig sgrib pa spyod pa'i phyag tu chen por spro// mu stegs bdud 'dral lo rgya la tshogs su hA// sdug bsngal byu bad rtsi'i tshang can no// dbang blogs la byed kyi shrI b+h+yon ma spro// 'dod chags choms byed gsang ba'i sems su s+ho//
222a7(rnying rgyud): mas kyi ba lamaso// mdakas su kyi ba rdzogs pan// thams cad kyib / / gnyis phram gyu // gnyis med stong ba'i drig 'dzi// gnyis med myor ba'i 'ong zir las// dbyung ba me 'pho dra bya//
222b1(rnying rgyud): bdag gis yi ngo bo las// sa bon las ni skur bsdud pa// mkha' 'gro bdun 'bar sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'jigs pa yi dbu gsum gyis// drag gsum dbyings su sgro 'byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag Na las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong // mtshon
222b2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i sgra mdog la// dkar la dang ba'i na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// sa bdag gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi rlung las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro yang gsal sems ma'i mchog
222b3(rnying rgyud): thogs pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis// khams gsum thig ler sgo 'byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtod// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ljang gu bi DUn+da// rdzu 'phral bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// gnod
222b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi chu las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni slar bskyod pa// mkha' 'grog nyen gas la sems ma'i mchog/ rol pa chen po'i dbugasum gyis// drag gsum dbyings su sgrol byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya la/
222b5(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong // mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// dmar mo dbang gi na bzlas brgyan// rdzu phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// chu bdag gdan labarkyang bsum bakhrugs// bdag gi me las kyar pA ye// sa bon las ni sbyar bskyed pa// mkha'
222b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro 'od gas la sems ma'i mchog/ stobs ldan mchog gi dbu gsum gyis// srid gsum thig le'i sgo 'byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong // mtshon du med pa'i sgra mdog la// rin chen sngon po'i na bzas brgyan//
222b7(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// gshin rje'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi bkreg las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni sbyar bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro bkrag gas la sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'gyur ba yi dbu gsum la/
223a1(rnying rgyud): na du da na nang sa sa
223a2(rnying rgyud): gdan la bcung bskum bzhugs// bdag gi gsang bya'i thig le las// sa bon las ni skur basbed pa// bla na med pa'i sa pa yum gnyis// sbyor ba'i gdun du drug po 'ding // bdag gi 'od chen ma tshogs las// sa bon las ni srung brtsed pa/
223a3(rnying rgyud): dpal 'bar khro mo nyid kyi sgra// bdug gi dngas ma bzhi po las// sa don las ni slar bskyed pa// gsang ba'i yum bzhi nyid kyi sku// bdag gi da dri ma brgyad po las// sa bon lang ni srur bskyed pa// khams gsum brdang gcod nyid kyi sgra// bdag
223a4(rnying rgyud): gi bde chen gsang ba las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// dug gsum dbang sbyor nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dpag bsam shing bra lus// sa bon las ni slar bskyed pa// skye shi rtsad gcod nyid kyi sra// bdag gi zangs kyi sbu gu las// sa ngon
223a5(rnying rgyud): las ni sgrar bskyed pa// pad+me bA rI dbang gi sra// bdag gi srid pa'i mdo bskyas parje// sa bon las ni bAr bskyed pa// yagA sha mo mchog nyid kyi sgra// bdag gi dbang po mdo bsras las// sa bon las ni sbyar bskyed pa// reg sha kro d+hi shA rI'i pra/
223a6(rnying rgyud): g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// sa bon las ni sbyar bskyed pa// kr-i d+hi shA d+hi sa ma ya// bdag gi srid po 'jug byed pa'i// sa bon las ni spar bskyed pa// b+hu yA pro d+hI shA rI'i sgra// de ltar rtag tu bsgom pa ni// byed pa po dang bya ba mo// pham
223a7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i somo gnyis// srid pa'i sngon du byung ba yin// sangs rgyas nyid las shin tu bkres// lnga las gyur pa'i bud med lnga// gnyen med byed pa'i gsu rung yin// bskyed pa'i kho mob cu gsum ni// kyir mi 'ong gi spun drug ste// dus med spu drug bcugs
223b1(rnying rgyud): rnam ma pa mas 'a'as/ bla ma drug / thung bsnamapa cicig rtsus/ gdu ga sna pa dab/ skang nashAm nga nga rdzas sus+ho/ sa na nagams/ dgadu/
223b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'thar po// ngas gsungs pa la thatsam chod// dkyil napor brnyed pa'i bca'as te/ zas pa'i theg pa'i 'ibage gnyis pa'o// / gnod 'dus lhamim yang gsol pa// klub grosems sa nathams cad ga/ de tog na skyes pa
223b3(rnying rgyud): kyi'i sman chen ji ltar gtong // ngo mtshar lhal bdag nyan 'tshal// de mad gsol pags na nas kyang // bla med dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// rtog pa'i nang gzhi la spyan chen po// ngas gsungs pa la gdon miza// nyon cig gsung du yang dag pa// d+ha gcig dang ni rten gnyis
223b4(rnying rgyud): pas// sa bon las ni rnam spangs pa// spo bsdu byas pas dri mchog 'gyur// dug gsum nad kyi gnyen po yin// chu gnyis dang ni rkyen gsum las// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs pa// rdzobasna bar 'bral bas ni// nyon mongs lnga yi nad rnams 'byung // rgyag tus
223b5(rnying rgyud): dang ni rkyen lnga las// sa bon gyis ni yang dag sbyangs// spro bstugayos par gyur bal// nam shes brgyad ni kun du rgyu// 'dug pa'i nang rnams zhi bar byed// bdag gi drim chen po la// sa bon gyis ni nam sbyangs bA// zos na yon tan nam gnyis ldan// dngos bu/
223b6(rnying rgyud): chen po gti mug yin// bdag gi mAM swa chen po la// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyarnas pas// zos na yon tan rnam gnyis ldan// dngos grub chen por rgyal yin// bdag gi khrag las gyur pa yi// sa bon gyi sna ni rnam sbyangs pa// zos na yon tan rnam gnyis
223b7(rnying rgyud): ldan// dngos grub chen po 'dod chags yin// bdag gi dri chu las gyuraro// / sa bon gyis ni nam sbyangs pa// zos na yon tan rnam gnyis ldan// dngos grub chen po sreg dog yin// bdag gi gsang ba'i sabon la// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs te//
224a1(rnying rgyud): tu ldan / sa / sa gyur bdang// thab na dz+ra// sprul ga sa zlas// ba mas sa byung /
224a2(rnying rgyud): ra ba/ thabs dang sa sgru sa// tsa dpa tsun ma tha thog/ mkha' tho nu bye// tshigasas na ni// rlud ba can pa da sa ra / sa bas rgyal 'as
224a3(rnying rgyud): gnas te// mkha' 'gro dam can kun gyi srog gi rgya// rang byung bdud rtsi chen po'i 'byung gnas yin// rang byung rnam dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// bdud rtsi chen po stong pa nyid bzhugs pas// drug gsum rnam rtog nad kyi gnyen po yin// theg chen sa gzhi
224a4(rnying rgyud): chen po las// rtsi mchog mang po kun skyes te// sde 'gro'i gsos su gyur pa sngar// bdag nyid bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor las// srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can kun// rnam rtog nad kyi gsos su che// rgyu gsum rkyen lnga'i 'dud rtsi ste// ma rig brgyal
224a5(rnying rgyud): da do
224a6(rnying rgyud): gsol pa// srid pa'i sems can thams cad kun// 'dod chags kyis ni khams gsum 'khor// zhe sdang gis ni ngan song ltung // de las nan tan ji ltar bgyi// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pags na nas kyang // nyag
224a7(rnying rgyud): gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ji ltar chags sdang rnam pa gnyis// dngos grub chen por ngas bshad kyi// nyon cig g.yung rdung yang dag pa// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// pha dang phu bo mes po dang // lha dang bram ze mu stegs dang /
224b1(rnying rgyud): bye dang / sog pa la grogs dang // gangasatha tuldan pas// rlung po bad pa gyung // dngos thab lam can ldan par gyur// 'ad chags na po 'a gyis/ mad ba ma tham dang // gas sa/
224b2(rnying rgyud): srogs te// gdol ba mo dang phral ba dang // tshul dgur slar na dngos gru ba zo// tsos bka 'phrul ba dang / zhwag zung drung la sogs pa yi mtshan du gyur nas/ dngangs te rkyang mi sku ba dang / 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa' stan las langs te/
224b3(rnying rgyud): zhes pazhi'i rgyung sgru ga rdzogs bzhir baN+Da ldan du/ reg bzhis la bdabs te/ lus brkyang hAs/ bral brjogs pa'i 'bus dus to// ngas thab sgyur du 'od pa'i byi/ phyag rgyabacas nas gso pa/ dani pa'o gzungag
224b4(rnying rgyud): ni dngos gru bathob pa yi// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin dang // mdang nye bstsal ba dag/ sbyar na ngos pabathob pa'i// bdod chags chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dngos thab rten po bdag 'tshal na// snad pal chen pos bshad dra gsol// zhesu byas te/ ngas

224b6(rnying rgyud): gcig tu smras nas/ bslab 'bus pa ltar sngor bcu spyi bo la blangs te/ mig mi ldog par mngon rdzogs rgyal po lartog go// de nas de lta bu'i spyod bzugs su gsol nas/ 'dor thams cad la dgyes pa'i ye shes kyi mdangs kyis gzigs te bka' stsal pa
224b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bdung bdang / sems can dran pa nyid nga byer// rdo rje sems dpas thus pa legs// kun kyang ngan dganas sangs// rdzid ba mas cid ba de la 'dod// ngas kya ba tu kyi'i skye lo sbyin// bdun sa matan te/ zhes gagrangs palas/
225a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad sems rnam du khebs so// skyid pa thams cad dus gcig tub de/ rna ba'i dbang po blags nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i rjes su grags nas 'khor kunany+dzan to// de nas ste dpal chen pos bka' stsal la/ gtan sdug dang
225a2(rnying rgyud): nizhing bculnga// bsad pa'i phyir na zhe sdang bsgom// spang ba gsum mes bon gyis// sbyangs na srid pa'i bag chags 'byung // lnga yi tshom bu'i sa bon gyis// sgo lnga bcad na 'chor ba med// snying brtse ba yi shugs dag gis// bsrus nas rgyal ba'i buM phyid//
225a3(rnying rgyud): sgo 'byed pa yi sa bon gyis// b+ho d+hi tsit+ta'i sgo phyes nas// rna brgyud byin pas sems bzhu ste// mU shwar+ya bzlog pa'i sa bon gyis// spros te 'bru bcu'i snying po sbyin// chu dang 'o ma bsres pa bzhin// mya ngan zlo ba'i phyag rgya yis// bci ngas nas bde skyid g.yung drung
225a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin// rkyen lnga'i sgo dbyed sa bon gyis// ri rab chen po'i sgo phye ste// lha mo lnga yi phyag rgya yis// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas bsdams nas su// rgyu gcig dbyings nas byung nas ni// mtshams su sbyor ba'i sa bon gyis// ye shes g.yung drung brdal ba las// spyi
225a5(rnying rgyud): dpal chen pos mtshams sbyar nas// gser dang dngul du bsres pa bzhin// sdig pa byas kyang ye shes 'bar// yang na dkyil 'khor gsal bkram ste// phung po mngon spyod lha la mchod// rtsa ba gsang ba'i b+ha ga la// mtshams su sbyor ba'i sa bon gyis//
225a6(rnying rgyud): sras su bskyed na bsod nams mchog/ bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba yis// srid pa'i bud shing sgeg pa ltar// ye shes me dpung 'bar ba yis// 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags bsreg/ me la shing ni bsnan pa ltar// sdig pa byas kyang ye shes 'bar// mdang
225a7(rnying rgyud): sring mo phyung ba dang // sbyor ba'i phyir ni 'dod chags bsgom// lnga yi sa bon rnam tha las// gcig la lnga sngar tshom bur spor// lam du bde ba'i sa bon gyis// b+hag la ni 'dab ma brgyad// gdan du bde ba'i sabon gyis// grong 'a 'khor lo rtsibs su bcas/
225b1(rnying rgyud): las kyis bon g.yas g.yon gyi// dbul mkha' 'gro lnga po nyid// dril bu'i sa bon rkang mthil la// zhags pa'i sangon lag gnyis la'o// bdag nyid snying po'i brtan pa'i sgra// gnas wA ral grwa'i sa bon lnga// gcig la mkha' 'gro lnga lngas bskor// 'dren
225b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa bon sga tshigs la// dgyes pa'i sa bon g.yas dang g.yon// bstim pa'i sa bon gsang ba la// lcags kyu'i sa bon nad gnyis la// lcags sgrogs bon lag gnyis la// bskyod pa'i sa bon mtshams su ste// spros nas gnyis su med pa'i tshe// spros
225b3(rnying rgyud): nas mtshams su spros bstim ste// mchod pa bzhi yi sa bon gyis// stong khams bkang ste mnyes mchod la// rigs drug 'gro ba'i sdig sbyongs nas// 'jug pa'i sa bon chen po yis// bsdus nas kun bzang mkha' la bstim// gting dpag med pa
225b4(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho las// chu bran mtha' dag 'dra ba ltar// bya byed gnyis kyi klong dkyil du// ma sring la sogs klu mo dang // gdol pa rigs ngan phyal pa la// tshul dgur sbyar na bsod nams mchog/ ces bka' stsal bas/ 'khor thams cad chags sdang gi

226a3(rnying rgyud): smos pa'i b+h+yod kyang dngos kyis sbyong // rnam par smin pa stong pas med// byed pa po dang bya ba mo// gdod nas stong pa'i 'bras bu zhen// rtogs pas stong pa'i 'bras bu len// legs dang nyes pa gnyis su med// thig le tshan po len pa med// gdod nas 'og

227b1(rnying rgyud): gru chad sgo bzhi b+ha ga'i tshul du brgyan// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyal mo skya baspyod cig/ hUM 'khor lo 'bar ba'i ste dbus su// ya bdud bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// yum gyi rgyal mo spyan drangs te// bzhi zlar zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams gnon// mkha'
227b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// mkha' la dus bzhi'i cha snyoms ma// dbu gcig zhal lnga srid pa gsal// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// phyag drug phyag rgya sna tshogs bsnams// dang po rdo rje dril bu dang // bar ma dril zhags b+han+da dmar// tha ma bdud
227b3(rnying rgyud): rtsigayang gzhi ldan// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sgra mdog la// na bza' sna tshogs shin tu 'bar// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte ba la// tshogs kyi gtso mor gshegs su gsol// hUM shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// sa bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su//
227b4(rnying rgyud): shar gyi mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong // rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' dkar po shel ltar dkar// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rdo rje ban+d+ha 'bar// bar ma dgra sta gtun shing brdag/ tha ma
227b5(rnying rgyud): sesong ge'i mchog chen stod// 'byung ba sa yi mnga' bdag mo// 'gro ba'i rus la mnga' mdzad ma// rus pa'i bdag mor gshegs su gsol// hUM byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// byang gi mkha' 'gro byung chen
227b6(rnying rgyud): gdong // rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sgra mdog la// na bza' ldang gu shin tu 'bar// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po b+har+d+ha n+ya gram bsdams// bar ma dbug chen rgyu phreng 'dren// tha ma spyang mo 'i zhing chung rnyod//
227b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba rlung la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i dbugs la mnga' mdzad ma// dbugs kyi bdag mor gshegs su gsol// hUM nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// chu bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nub kyi mkha' 'gro srad ka'i gdong // rtag pa'i
228a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo gtan gas lam// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' dmar po dbang gis mdzes// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bkrang// dang po bung ka blan dam 'bar// bar ba zhag sa drang rdu ma// tham nang
228a2(rnying rgyud): chung ce spyang stod// 'byung ba tshul dbang sbyar zhing // 'gro ba'i khrag la mnga' mdzad ma// khrag gi bdag mor gshegs su gsol// hU~M lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// gshin rje bsrel ba'i gdan stengs su// lho yi mkha' 'gro ba na sa
228a3(rnying rgyud): gdong // rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' sngon po bai DUr+ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rin chen b+har+d+ha dmar// bar me me sbal dbyug to bsdams// rngam stag mo'i zhing chung
228a4(rnying rgyud): stod// 'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i drod la mda' mdzad ma// drod kyi bdag mor gshegs su gsol// hU~M dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lte ba la// brgya byin bsrel ba'i gdan stengs su// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro rje mthu// rtag pa'i
228a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo bkrag gsal mnyen// sna tshog 'gyur ba ni sku mdog la// na bza' ser po bcom gsol// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po 'khor lo b+han+ta dmar// bar ma Tal mtshan spu gri bsdams// tha ma drug pa'i ning chung
228a6(rnying rgyud): stod// nam mkha' stong la dbang gyur zhing // 'gro ba'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// bkrag gi bdag yor gshegs su gsol// kun kyang ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// mche ba can la datsigs shing bzhan// 'jigs tshul can la snying rjer
228a7(rnying rgyud): ldan// ye shes drug dang ldan pa ste/ pha rol phyin pa de bzhin gshegs// sems can kun la thugs pa rjong phyir// 'grol phan phyir gshegs su gsol// da ni ma mo dbang du bsdu ba dang bkol ba'i thabs 'chad de/ nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yig go//
228b1(rnying rgyud): rgaT mo la sogs drug po ni// bdag nyid chen por bsgom par bya// brla ba'i man chad gdan du gding // bdag nyid che bar bsgom par bya'o// mni dgyes chen rtag pa'i mkha'// mo ni pade chen longs spyod ngogs// mu ni rtag len g.yung drung mkha'
228b2(rnying rgyud): mo ni shes rab chags med klong // ma ni sku gsung thugs kyi mkha'// mo ni lus ngag yid gsum klong // ma ni rgyal ba kun gyi mkha'// mo ni snang srid kun gyi klong // ma ni skye ba med pa'i mkha'// mo ni 'gag pa med pa'i klong // ma ni thabs mchod
228b3(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i mkha'// mo ni shes rab chags med klong // ma ni nam mkha'i dbyings nyid mkha'// yo ni sems kyi sems nyid rmong // ma ni chos kyi dbyings nyid mkha'// mo ni b+ha ga'i dbyings nyid grong // ma ni kun gzhi bde chen dbyings//
228b4(rnying rgyud): rnam shes hUM chen 'bar// mkha' klong dbyings su bdag bsgom zhing// thig le chen por klong brtan nas// lus lam mo dbang du bsdu zhes 'byung ste/ de la ma mo dbang du ji ltar bskrun tshig dang don 'di skad do// ye shes thig le chen po yi// gsang che
228b5(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i lam mchog dang // man ngag rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// yang gsang ma mo drug po de// chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// 'od chen kha dog sna tshogs kyis// srid pa bde 'gro chen mo dang // nyi zla thod phreng gdan du bting // thig le
228b6(rnying rgyud): po'i rgyan bzhi yis// khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi po dag/ chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// srid pa'i daja ma brgyad po las// sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi po dang // thugs kyi dbyes rje bzhirnams dag/ mngon sum gdan du gding bar bya// bde chen
228b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// srid pa chags byed sprin gnyis ni// mngon sum gdan du gding bar bya// srid pa rang lpags gnyug ma yis// e ka tsa ti spun drug mnan// chags pa'i dbang med dmar po yis// 'dod khams gtso mo phud gnyis
229a1(rnying rgyud): sman// mad du smos do na rjes// rnam pa zhal la rdzu nyis / dbangs po mdags pa ces// sbyin ma ma bdu rnams na// gangs gas gas // da
229a2(rnying rgyud): dgi mnan// srid pa 'jug byed pa mo yis// TI shu rtsa brgyad gan rgyal yanan// de ltar gdan du gdong bya ba// snying 'dren phyag kyi bcas nasas// drag po sngags kyis gnan par bya// hU~M kha la ta ha ha ha byad drun po rje rnyed/ srung padra la ga phreng 'bod
229a3(rnying rgyud): Sh+Ta na tid dun Ni/ dan dzin/ ta kes twa kes nI la tan na/ ma hA r+g+ho sbyinan/ ma / yang du ldan pa d+hAR+ShaSh+Ta/ sra mi ga napaT/ shes brjod pa yis// skad kyi ku rnams pasgral nas ni// bdud rtsi mar mem par byug ga/
229a4(rnying rgyud): a mri ta u kra/ tsit+tanan/ rba tra phaT/ don srog 'phrog pa'i thabs min te/ gdan gyi snying khre gzhal du dub// lho yi steng du gsal bar bzhag/ de nas gdan nas brtsenas su// grub pa'i las rnams byed par bsgom// che ba'i rtsal 'di skad
229a5(rnying rgyud): 'byung // hU~M ni khrag 'thung kun rnying // ngani mi so thod kyi phaT// nga ni sred gsum s+t+raing rje mchog/ de ni mos kyi 'o// thams cad kyi snying khrag pa dang// khyod kyi snying khra ga la yod// de yi las bcol khyod kyis srubs/
229a6(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo m+ba bi b+h+yo ru lu ru su ga mod+d+hi/ ye shes zal dayang thig le yi// bsgom bya'i mamo bcu gsum la// drug du rje brgya dadakyil la khor rdzogs// zhes byung ste/ bdag nyid thad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsal bur byas pa/ se
229a7(rnying rgyud): 'byed pa'i mamo bcu gsum dang / la mo drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi srog gi snying po bsdus la 'khor du bzhag go// de nas rnal 'byor tshogs kyi mthod pa gzung bzhin bgams pa/ ska la ye shes las bskyed pa'i mkha' 'gro na pas mchod/ hri
229b1(rnying rgyud): dbyings las bskyed pa'i khro rgyal yum// ye shes thugs las sbrul te khro mo'i skur ston pa// gnyis med ta ha bzhad cing rngam pa'i hUM sgra 'byin// mche ba dmar po gtsigs nas snying 'dren rkan sgra can// skye ni rtsa ba bcad nas bde klong dbyings la sdung // sru dang
229b2(rnying rgyud): sku mdog khro mor bzhugs shing dbang chen dkyil 'khor rdzogs// phyag nas skul ba gtong zhing dug gsum dbyings la sbyor// mtshogs 'khor du bsdus nas b+ha ga'i mnga' mdzad ma// drug cu rtsa brgyad tshogs la yab kyi rngam pa'i sgra phyung zhing // hU~M sred gsum 'do
229b3(rnying rgyud): lo rdzogs pa'i thig le la// dgyes pa'i bzhad sgra rol pa'i tshul bzhin mdzad// chu las bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi lnga po 'di// rnam rtog gzhom phyir sru la thim par mdzod// hUM ha te ma ma b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hUM dra lu b+h+yo b+h+yo a la la oM ha ho// sgra las bskyed nas bskyod
229b4(rnying rgyud): nas su// 'khor gyi drug po spyan drang ngo // hUM ma mo chen mo'i dkyil 'khor nas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor mnga' bdag mo// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad zhal lnga 'bar// mkha' bzhi bde klong dbyings la gsal// mkha' la srog gi mnga' mdzad ma// dkyi
229b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor gtso mor bzhugs su gsol// hUM ma mo chen mo rgyu bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum shar gyi mkha' 'gro ma// hUMm mo chen mo dbugs kyi bdag/ sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum byang gi mkha'
229b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma// hUM ma mo chen mo rlan bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum nub kyi mkha' 'gro ma// hUM ma mo chen mo drod bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum lho yi mkha' 'gro ma// hUM ma mo chen mo
229b7(rnying rgyud): bkrag gi bdag/ sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma// yang sbas drug gi dkyil 'khor nas// thugs dam chen po rjes dgongs te// bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// de nas bcu bzhi man
230a1(rnying rgyud): cad dang // rang lhags rlung bzhin bskal bar bya// sum kyil 'bar bams cad dang / dbang bskur ba dang yang gsang thugs kyi tshogs kyi le'ug napas// dngas su ga rnams//
230a2(rnying rgyud): don du ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// ya la la ho// sa mA ya hU~M hA twe s+t+waM/ lag gi 'du byed pasgos pa ni// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// rdo rje gar du bsgom pa las// shes rab mchog gi snying ger bstan//
230a3(rnying rgyud): dbang mo rtse sprad de// thabs kyi phyogs mtshams bskor ba las// ma mo tshogs kyi rgyal mo'i rgya// rdo rje sder mo dam bsnol te// oM bsgreng spyi bong rgya bcings pa// ma mo rdo rje rus pa'i rgyu// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// hUM dad ha gnyis rtse spus rngas
230a4(rnying rgyud): 'bru gsum brgyad nas gshog pa'i tshul// na ra ha sar bzung ba ni// ma mo rdo rje dbugs kyi rgyu// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa la// oM dang ha gnyis rgyab bsnol 'khyud// 'bru gsum rtse sprod sku gsung thugs// bzhad pa'i zad kar bzung pa ni// ma mo rdo rje
230a5(rnying rgyud): khrag gi rgya// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te// ha gnyis rtse smad gyen du bsgreng // oM gnyis rtse sprad bud kar brkyang // sgra gnyis rtse spang thur du brkyang // 'bru gnyis so sor dam bsnol nas// 'akru/ 'i thad kar bzung ba ni// ma mo rdo rje me yi kye// rdo rje
230a6(rnying rgyud): tshur bcings pa las// oM gnyis rgyab bsnol lu gu rgyud// 'bru gsum so sor ste mnan te// hUM gnyis drug tu g.yob pa ni// ma mo rdo rje bkrag gi rgya// rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba yi// thabs kyi oM dang ha gnyis las// shes rab tu gis bsten pad bya//
230a7(rnying rgyud): shes dang oM dang ha gnyis las// thabs kyi rtsi gas brten par bya// shes rab oM dang hUM rkyang ba// rdza kyi I dang swa bkan nas// sems kyi dkyil 'khor mnan bkan pa// sa mo ye shes mkha' 'gro yi// rdorje tshogs chen rdzogs pa yi// phyag
230b1(rnying rgyud): rgya phan zhes dpa' bos bshad// gnod 'dul wA yi sa yang gsol pa// sems nyid 'jig rten zla ba yi// phyag rgya chen po de ltar lags// dbang phyug gcol bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bka' dang /
230b2(rnying rgyud): pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yig tso// thig le chen po'i phrug ni// rdo rje khu tshur kha sprad de// shes rab mchog gi phyogs gnas su// oM e ha gsum rtse sprad nas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bya// thabs mchog spyod pa'i phyogs rgyas su/ aH
230b3(rnying rgyud): gsum rtse sprad pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i chu// thabs kyi hU~M ga~M sgo gsum ni// rang drig ye shes phyag tu yin// shes rab sA ye sra gsung thugs// thig le byang chub sems ci rtsa// shes rab hUM gi rtse mon// thabs kyisgra yi sbyor mnan nas// zabs
230b4(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab phyag rgya zhes// yang dag rdzogs kyis nges par bshad// thig le chen po'i rgyabacings nas// ma hA su khar bsdams nas su// bla na med par gsal gyur na// dus gsum nyes dmig sel bar nges// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med//
230b5(rnying rgyud): dus gsum mgon pos de skad bshad/ dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang / sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa dang / phyag rgya sgrub par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten 'di na dbang bgyi
230b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i// rim pa gang dang gang lags pa// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag bgrub pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung lha yig tso// 'di ltar 'jig rten gang byed pa// dam bstan pa la the tshom med// 'byung ba lnga las
230b7(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa ni kun tu bzang mo// dbang ba sgyur ba ni bu mo spun lnga/ ze snyoms ni srid pa bde 'gror/ 'byung ba lnga yi nyul len ma ni chags 'dzin srung gnyis so// dus bzhi rdzogs par byed pa ni kun tu bzang po/ dus bzhi la dbang byed pa ni bu mo kun
231a1(rnying rgyud): dzadang nyas thong bad canano// mtsho ma rnams pa'i dbang mo chen mo bzhi dang rnags da kyus sde bzhi'o// dus pa'i yul 'ad da/ phyag ya bdud gyi chung bya'o// ma mo dang rang bko zabs te/ myod dul
231a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i ma mo gsum dang / dbyings las shar ba'i ma mo gsum dang / yid ma bsgom legs ma dang bdun 'khol lo des srid pa bde 'gro ma la khol lo// des rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang po che 'khol lo// des srid pa chags byed ma 'jo pa'o// des
231a3(rnying rgyud): la logs pa dang sa po bdun 'khol 'o// des 'dang khams zhwa yi bcwo po dang / rdo rde gar gyi bang lhag pa gnyis 'khola'o// des nidamam b+ha'i rtsal mo dang gling ba'i gyi ba ga nyis 'khol lo// thabo spyan lnga srid pa thams cad la dbang byed pa
231a4(rnying rgyud): rtag pa'i rgyal mong grag gsal mnyam gyis ni// nyi mthod phreng can 'khol lo// des ni srid ba dz+ra s+ho m+b+ha pa ladi lnga'o// des nis bdag pa d+matho phreng ma 'khrob lo// dus ni eka tsar 'dul lo// 'di rnams ni dbus kyi nyal le ba ste// nam gyi grang la rgya
231a5(rnying rgyud): rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal gyis ni/ khams gsum khros pa'i dbang po che 'dul lo// des ni dkar po mig gcig ma 'khol lo// des ni rgyad gyi rgyal mo la po lngalo// des ni gru 'de gas ma hA ting dkar mo lo la// des ni dmag gi rdza
231a6(rnying rgyud): po pa che ba tsan 'khol lo// des ni sring po bzhi rje gling bzhi spyi 'grol 'khol lo// de rnams ni shar gyi nyal byed ma ske slong la cug go// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'odagasal mas ni/ srid pa bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des ni thugs kyi dbye
231a7(rnying rgyud): nag mor la pa gcig ma 'khol lo// des ni dbang phyug ma 'khol lo// des ni gru 'degs mdu zhing nag mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo nag mo kha yal ma 'khol lo// des sring po nag mo mkha' 'khrung lder ma 'khol lo// 'di rnams ni myong
231b1(rnying rgyud): b+h+ya / rnas ngas lanags/ rtag ga lalag nags la mas / da sa ga 'a bu pol // des thugs da kyis rtsom mad par bsgyur ma 'alala'o// sa pa 'jon na// sa rba dag dun
231b2(rnying rgyud): mo ma 'o// des mag gi rgyal mo dkar mom kyu 'dibam 'khol lo// des snying mo dkar mogs gzod 'khol lo// ni rnam rnaM kyi nal sbed du ste/ num bung lo cug go// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gas la gsus kyis ni/ pad+ma khrag
231b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang mo che lakhol lo// des thugs kyi dgyes sde ser mo las mkhan ma 'khol lo// des gcig bum 'khrol lo// des gru 'degs ma grub ting ser mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal me ser mo rkang lpags 'khol lo// des snying mo nag mdzong chen
231b4(rnying rgyud): 'khol lo// 'di rnams ni byung gi mug byed ma t+te/ nam gyi tho rangs phyug go// yum chen po ni rjen mtshan med par gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi ma thams brgyad kun la mnga' badzad do// spyi dpal ni yum chen mo rtag pa'i rgyal mo wal sogs pa'o//
231b5(rnying rgyud): mo grags bkun la mang mang do// rtag pa'i rgyal mo lngas mamo chen mo bdun 'dul lo// des srid pa bde 'gro sa dang nyi mthong phreng can gnyis 'dul la/ des khros pa'i dbang po che 'dul lo// des thugs kyi dkyis sde mo bani 'dul ma// des sras
231b6(rnying rgyud): sa mo bzhi 'dul lo// des srid pa chags byed ma dang ma snyoms gtus badrung/ des srin mo bdud 'dul/ des aka tsa ti sun drug 'dul/ des 'dod khams sgo mo'i gtso sa ni mtshan thun bdun 'dul/ dris rdo rje gar gyi dbang drug thun bdun
231b7(rnying rgyud): 'ju// des dam ga gi rgyal ba rdzun pa ni 'dul/ des sring mo zhi 'dus/ de phy-i nang la jug na yang // zan nas de ris bzhin te// gcom bcos kun kyang bde// dem mo brgya rdzam pa dab rjo // sem /
232a1(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa'amam bcug sum mnan pa dang / zug tu rtsa btu tshogs nas cu'o// rnams sa 'dabang ga des pa tul 'a drag pa'o// 'drul rtsams yang ga'alug// brkyang nan du du mang
232a2(rnying rgyud): rabs byung \u0f7fba'i sbyar lags// 'khrugs dang 'dren pa'i sngags rnams gang // nal 'byor mchog la bdag nyan 'tshal// ded gsol pa gas na nas kyang // rnal 'byor mthog gis bka' stsal ba/ rkyen cig gdong 'dral zhwa y-i gaN+DI/
232a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi lasags rje khro la DI// rabs chud 'grags 'dren sngags rnams ldan// gtan tshigs rgya ba zlas padams// gtan tshegs rtsa ba gtan la dbab// de la ri ba gling bzhi ni gang du chags pa dang lugs su yang / nyi ma dgu brgya rtsa gcig dang
232a4(rnying rgyud): zlab dgra N+Das gcig gi// nyi zla stong dang rtsa gnyis kyis/ ri rab kyi phyi rol gang na gnas pa'i skasnang srid thams cad ri la tshogs nas ci yang mi sdang ba las/ ri rab kyi nang ring thung drang pag bsam kyi shing matra 'dus bcol zhes bya ba med pa las/
232a5(rnying rgyud): m+ba re rab kyi bum pa'i nang na/ yus chen mo srid pa ba 'gro khams gsum yum mchog ma zhes b+ha ba su mdogs thing gar bzhugs shing dbu dang phyag dang spun cing yang ston pa/ rin po chernam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa can/ sbas pa'i sgra
232a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis nas/ g.yas nas ni khrag gi mchi ma/ g.yon nas bdud rtsi'i mchim/ sbas pa'i zhal nas 'bras rnarnam pa lnga'i bcung 'dzag sras pa'i phyag gnyis la g.yas pas med pa thams dang ce nas 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas 'og
232a7(rnying rgyud): rdog ga na 'dzin pa/ thus pa'i zhabs gnas byung / g.yas pas 'jig tud myed ba ba thams kyi nga su mayin pas 'jig can gyid bang mthathams cad kyi nying tha mnan pa/ gsang ba'i ma 'jigasar byeng rgyal nas/ /
232b1(rnying rgyud): srid bams cad kyi 'phel 'grib mdzadadu/ ma nos kyi gnas rang las rkang ba las ma gtogs pa kun nam mkha'i gting khung du byung du hU~M bo'i gzugs khrag gi ral pa gcig gas/ srid pa'i ma mo thams cad dbang du mu ba/ ngar gyu rtsa
232b2(rnying rgyud): bum pa'i nang na bzhugs so// de'i khol mo srid pa chags byed ma dang / srid pa cha snyoms ma gnyis shing gi sked par gnas so// yum chen mo 'khol po srid pa zhig 'dzin dang / sring ba byan byen gnyis/ shing gi rtsa ba na gnas te/
232b3(rnying rgyud): rab kyi phyi rol na snang zhing srid pa ril tshigs nas mi sdang ba la/ srid pa bde 'gro mas nyi zla dbang du sdud pa'i phyir 'byung ba lnga'i drod las sprul ba'i bu mo mdog dkar la g.ya'i ngal ba can dpral ba'i dbyes na mi gzung gsum pa gcig yod pa/ lcags dang
232b4(rnying rgyud): zangs kyi gri zhigs la snying brkus pa'i zhags pa 'phen pa zhig skyes pas/ des nyi zla stong thod dang phreng bar bcings nas/ nyi zla zung gcig btang ba las/ gzod srid pa cha b+h+yon mo// de nas yum pa de 'grems phyi rol gyi snang sred thams cad phyung ngo //
232b5(rnying rgyud): de nas dkar mo nyi zla'i thod phreng can deng nyid ni gsang bar bzung / rab tu gsang zhing sbas pa las/ mu stegs kA la chen po zhes bya ba ri rab kyi 'og rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pas mthong ste/ byi ba'i lo la yid kyi sbyor ba gcig byas pa las/ glang gi lo
232b6(rnying rgyud): la bu mo spun bzhi skyes pa dang / khol mo srid pa cha rnams mas lte ba bcad de/ bu mo yun bzhi'i ying yang mas btags te/ dbyings phyag ma dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang / bdag nyid ma dang / gcig pu mo dang bzhir btags so// ming yang
232b7(rnying rgyud): ches te ngo bzhis srid pa phung ba dang 'dra ba lan cig byas so// de nas nga nyid ye shes sprul pa dang // srid pa bde 'gro rnam gnyis kyis// yid kyi sprul pa bkye nas su// 'jig rten phung byed de bzhi yi// mdal la sogs pa dbang du bsdus// hrI las
233a1(rnying rgyud): na na na pasang nan na mas ba
233a2(rnying rgyud): pa ban stor thos pa'i dbangs ni / dmu pa sa gsu rgyapas kya dus pa sa ma che bzhi byi na so// ming 'gas mam mang ban las ma ban dang du brdzasas// de nas me pabang ba la bgang de// skal pa'i byung re ba'i dang / ra
233a3(rnying rgyud): dpag sa sbyi 'ag // sa / mas bye kyi byang mus// / ci'i ba ma na
233a4(rnying rgyud): rtses dmas pa dang / dam saldan sa sa na na sa sa sagyi ba cad nganas mi ma 'a thongs pa ni bu bzhig pa las/ ma ba
