233a6(rnying rgyud): dulas ma da/ ga na
233a7(rnying rgyud): sa kyi drug sa/ nas/
233b1(rnying rgyud): zug tu du na sa pa d+harnamam/ de gnyis las rnam thun dus skyes te/ bzhin thos pa'i dbang ma bye ba zhi thun partsal bcan pa bzhi'i du pa mang rnanas dab rdzun pa nas dgas su rgyag / du surdzun dadra rna du
233b2(rnying rgyud): btags so// bum drung blan gnyis la gcig ni sring pa bya mkhan gyis zung mir blangs so// rngam nyi mthong phreng gis te cag ming btags nas/ srid pa'i bya sgra bla ma byed du bcug ga/ da'i bus drung meg nga te/ dbyings phyug mthun pani pa'i khod na pa
233b3(rnying rgyud): rtul badzin pa'i las cu rdzun sa te/ dkar ma mtha brnyan/ nag mo yas/ dam ma n+t+ra bam/ khyer ban sngags pa'i / de zhizugs kyi byas ma pana' lal mong po'o// dam gag rgyal yang bad //
233b4(rnying rgyud): denag ngas pa'i dbang mtha ni lakhal mo mis ca thogs ldan pa/ spyananam bdun sngam/ sbrid mnan mo bdun rjes 'jig rten du btu brjod pa las/ phram chen ma thugs las bral ba/ dbyings las thar ba'i mam gsum dang / mkhar la rgyan rje
233b5(rnying rgyud): gas ma rdzug ba rnas/ ldan nu pa na 'as 'i khyab ma bya /
233b6(rnying rgyud): chu / zhing rten tug byung ba/ dngas rgyan gyi rgyal ma dang / khal phrul bdudu cis/ blang ba byus pa'i / grang sa tshul yang la gad kyi rgyas 'ding / 'dad pa 'bas kyis ma nyis mim ma gyi 'o//
233b7(rnying rgyud): pa yin sa dang / ri ma ma ma/ srin na ma sus/ bdag nyi ma gyu ba / rang kyis pa rgya me/ ba 'chas btsas la mngang gyur hU~M/ na peng mdzar gyis na byinapas su ting pa' 'ang ga cag 'dug pa /

234a2(rnying rgyud): bco lnga las bdag pad+ma phreng skyes/ de nas yang dbying phyag ma dang / ya ra la shod kyi skyes te ri dang gnyis spenya lo la bye ba kyis pa'i bu/ bya'i lol ming sring gnyis mtshe mar skyes te/ ming po ni shar phyogs kyi shel seng ge/ sring po ni pad+ma gar gyi debang phyug mo yin no//
234a3(rnying rgyud): de nas ya bdud dang / e ka tsa ti khyo shug gnyis las/ bu ma stan gnyis skyes te/ tsha ba ni 'jig rten srid 'degs zhes bya ba nam mkha'i rgyal mo'o// chung ngu ni gling bzhi spyi phud mo zhes bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang sdud ma'o// srid pa cha snyoms ma ni he ru ka s+thir zhes bya/

239a4(rnying rgyud): dran ting dag sa chen mos// shir gyimarnams so klu 'dogs pa// shan tad dmar margyan ma ny+dzu// y-i snarnams kye sa / 'degs ma// thub nyid ser mi man ma se// rab byang mtshams kyi su 'dugs ma// mamanan bu 'dags can sa @
239a5(rnying rgyud): metsho dgazungs pase las mdzod cig/ d+hu dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo ste// shar kyi dkar mo mcho gtsigs ma// lho yi nag mo la yal ya// nub kyi dmar mo man+ta 'dib ma// byang gi ser mo nang ldag ma// rigs bzhi'i dasag dpung 'a bar gyes bsar// dardza/
239a6(rnying rgyud): ni ts+tsha ba mi gshegs su gsol// tra~M gling bzhi mgyogs ma swa maM sring // shar gyi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i srid// b+h+yo y-i na rdzogs ma gshegs su gsol// dkar ma g.yag thod klu yi phreng /
239a7(rnying rgyud): mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// nag mo sder can gnod sbyin sring // byang gi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// zhes bya ba ni las kyi sring mo bzhi'o// 'di yan chad grub pa'i rnal 'gror ma rnams kyi las byang dang / bskul chog gi le
239b1(rnying rgyud): gcagasas// sung drab rnams pa galas dag tan pa can byung ban/ med pa'i mas sun mdan// ma pa na thub pa dziltar byas// su dang rgan pa ltag// gsadang gas bya dang /
239b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyan cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// dben pa gnyes zhing nyams dga' bar// ci pyir yo byad gzhung sogs la// bad+ma'i mtshan dang ldan pa yi// rigs sa gyur pa'i phrag gsum par
239b3(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i don du gzhag par bya// rdzas su gyur pa'i yo byad dag/ tsit+ta bcu gcig yang dag ldan// b+har+N+Na lcang lo ldan pa ru// pad+ma'i rigs sa gyur pa yi// mtshan dang ldan pa'i rakrus bkang // tshil chen mar me khag lngar btang // gsung chen drad pa rgyan mi gcad/
239b4(rnying rgyud): gas da rnying zhing gi gshog pa bkram// ci 'byor yo byad phun tshogs la// bdun gsum tshul bzhin pasgrim par bya// rgyan dang chas gos la sogs pa// shun chen ral ka gtso bo la// srid pa spyi thug zhwa bgos te// rtse lnga 'bar ba'i phyag cha bsnams//
239b5(rnying rgyud): phreng brjen po de bzhin mgrang // yum yang g.yang gzhi'i skrag pa la// rje gsum 'bar ba'i g.yab mo thogs// phreng ba chen po gtso dang mthun// dngos grub zhal bu rin chen rigs// dar dkar kha bcad de bzhin bzhag/ rdo rje rig ldan rtags sra so la/
239b6(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid man nga ga he ru ka/ yum yang srid pa bde 'gro ma// gnyis su med par bsgoms byas te// dka la ni srog snying drangs// badz+ra shAn+ti pa dz+ra ga rba ti b+h+yo/ steng gi dkyil nas drangs nas su// mngon sum 'ong bar bsam pa ni// sku mdog dkar mo la nyi ma tha ba 'bum
239b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas grod dang phreng bar byas pa/ dpral ba'i dbyes nas mig zur gsum pa gcig yod pa/ gsang ba'i zug gnyis kyis srid pa'i bad+ma thams cad bya ge ser bzung ba/ lcags dang zangs kyi dri la zhags pa sbe ba krus pa'i phreng 'thogs pa/ min ga ya
240a1(rnying rgyud): // 'dzag pas/ thams cad dbang du sdud pa/ mig g.yon pa nas bdud rtsi'i chu mig 'dzag pas sems can thams cad kyi gsos byed pa/ mig dbus ma nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdzi ma 'thor ba/ g.yu yi ral pa can no// bzod pa gsol zhing brten dbyangs sngarnams
240a2(rnying rgyud): bskul pa ni/ hU~M che zhes chen mo gsang ba'i gzung // thig le sbyor ba'i yum gcig ma// dkar mo nyi ma'i thod phreng can// gru gsum 'bar ba'i mig gcig ma// g.yu yi ral pas srid bskol// chags pa'i phyag gis pad+ma 'dzin// rin chen
240a3(rnying rgyud): gsos// tsit+ta'i zhags pas mu stegs sgrol// thig le gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// sngon chad sbyor mdzad ji bzhin du// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// zhes bya zhing gsang ba'i gzungs mar bya'o zhes dam bcas na zhag bdun na zla ba gcig lgang ngo //
240a4(rnying rgyud): bcu bzhin nyi ma gcig lhung ngo // zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la dngos grub kyi b+had+har snying gtubs pa dang / rak+ta bsres pas gang 'ong ngo // de min pa gzhan dag kyang 'ong ngo // ci ltar byung yang mtshan ma spangs/ nyi shu rtsa gcig la sku mngon du 'ong ngo // der bdag
240a5(rnying rgyud): nyid ting nge 'dzin gsal bar byas la/ gsar gyi rak+ta dbang du bsdus te/ sbyor ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa dang / blag ma 'bul zhing sbyor ba'i tshul ston to// bdag chags pa ma gyes pa dang // mo rkang dkris bor nas/ mdzes pa dang chas te sbyor ba 'bul lo// der
240a6(rnying rgyud): du sbyar te/ gsang ba'i sems dang dngos grub lngar 'byung ba rnams bsres la/ snal bdag nyid mchod par bya/ de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mo la sbyin/ de nas ma mo gzhan la'ang sbyin/ de nas tha tshig dam bsres te gsang ba'i gzungs mar dam lung stsal lo// de nas phrag
240a7(rnying rgyud): dog spang ba'i phyir/ srub zla gsum chad sbyar nas su/ sgrub bla so so'i dam bze'o// de nas slan chad ci bya yang mi 'gal te/ bsam dku 'ong ngo // grub pa'i yon tan ni ma mo gzhan lta ci smos te/ khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi dang / thugs gsang ba'i rtse mo yang
240b1(rnying rgyud): sing gi tshul du las byed ba sprul na bran bzhin du bsgo banyan no// he ru ka sIs sku man chad bskyed pa tsam gyis 'dar lcag lcug rgyug te rang ngo // 'jig rten 'di'i bsam pa ni je thal mi 'grub pa med do// 'dra sgrub pa'i dus su/ dang po gtor ma nam gsum gtang /
240b2(rnying rgyud): bshags sbyang bya/ tshe rabs kyi lan chags la gtor ma gtang / dam bskang bar bgyi/ 'di ni nyi zla thod phreng can gyi sgrub thabs so// srid pa bde 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs ni mya ngan las 'das te/ 'gro ba'i don thugs rje'i 'od kyis mdzad pas/ bsgom pa'i ma
240b3(rnying rgyud): yin no// dben la gnyen pa'i gnas su ni// rigs bzhi'i yum dang ldan byas te// yo byed bzhi yang de bzhin bsham// gsar pa zhing gi mchog ma bsham// rigs bzhi'i b+han+d+ha yang dag ldan// zhing gi dud pa rgyun mi gcad// mchog gi phung bu
240b4(rnying rgyud): yang dril// dung chen phreng ba yang dag bgrang // stag lpags g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// shun chen g.yang gzhi de bzhin gsol// rgyu ma dril pa'i zhags pa sdog/ chu dang ma 'dres dngas ma'i khrag/ dam rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o// rtse gsum g.ya
240b5(rnying rgyud): mo thogs nas su// bsgrub cing brten pa'i lha mo'o// rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che ni/ rdo rje'i rigs la dbang byed ma/ sku mdog dkar mo la g.yu'i ral pa can/ spyan gsum rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' la rdo rje'i ga'ur 'khyil ba/
240b6(rnying rgyud): nams pa'i sbyor bas srid pa 'khyung ba/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje rtsa gsum bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na zhing gi g.yab mo bsdams shing / bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud pa/ ma rgyan gyi rgyal mo la khros pa'i tshul ston cing sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// rdo rje
240b7(rnying rgyud): khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che ni/ rin chen rigs kyi dbang mo che ste/ sku mdog sngon mo la/ nor bu rin po che'i ral pa can/ spyan gsum rin po che'i mche ba gtsigs pas/ 'od zer sngon po phyogs bcur 'gro ba/ gsang ba'i mkha' rin po che'i gzhu
241a1(rnying rgyud): tu na sa rdzun du nga nan na gan na na
241a2(rnying rgyud): gAs bye bang po ste/ sbru mdog dmar mo ba ma'i man thad can/ sman gsum ma rgyag gzigs pa/ gsang ba'i mtha' thu gzungs sgril pa/ 'dabar mang ba rlab phyogs dang du spad pa/ lag ga dang sa badrad dang su phyogs kyi ti byi

241a7(rnying rgyud): gam ma mapa pa gas/ rnamam khal ba'i gag dri ba gyos/ badra dang su byugs thams cad 'byed// ngan banag pa ga ma rigs 'chab// mi 'an myong bas sbed par rjod// byurang ba'i mdangs kyis bun lathab// yul lakho zhi ngam ma ldan
241b1(rnying rgyud): bdag dang gnyis su med par spyod// hUM che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dmar mo bse yi ral pa can// spyan gsum gyi ngu'i mche gtsigs ma// khrag gi dang sams bdud dpung 'joms// b+hi nu'i gzhur gnas rigs 'cha'// gnyis med stong pas khams
241b2(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khyud// yum la khro zhing rnal 'byor skyong // bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// d+hINe zhes khros pa'i dbang ma che// sgyu mdog ljang gu sgeg ma la// rdo rje dril bu'i ral pa can// spyan gsum mche ba rgya gram gtams// kha T+wAM ga yang gnyis mu stegs sgrol/
241b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gabur gnas rigs bca'// grub pa'i sbyor bas 'jig rten 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khro zhing sems can skyong // bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// zhes bskul lo// sgrub pa la zhugs pa dang chu gcig bsgral/ zhag gsum
241b4(rnying rgyud): nas gcig bsgral/ zhag bdun na gcig bskal/ zhag bcu gcig gi nub mo gsang ba'i yum du dam bca'/ gsum gyi nub mo sgra chen po 'byung zhing / me chen po 'bar ro// bdun gyi nub mo nam mkha' la sna tshogs pa'i ngal pa thibs se 'byung ngo // de lta bu dag byung ba dang / bdag
241b5(rnying rgyud): nyid dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad ste// zhabs brgyad lha la de bzhin brdzis// phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// zhing gi na bza' rlon pa la// sbrul dang thod pas yang dag brgyan// dbang gi ngang las bsnyen pa bya// dgu la mngon du byung ba dang // bdag
241b6(rnying rgyud): nyid dpa' bo sgeg pa yi// ting nge 'dzin du gsal ba dang // 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis pad+ma bsdu// de nas lha mos chags sems kyis// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba 'bul// gus pa'i tshig gi snyan sgrogs pa// dpa' bo sgeg pa ye shes sku// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// /
241b7(rnying rgyud): bad+ma gsang ba'i mchod 'bul gyi// dgyes pa chen po'i ngang nyid las// chags pa chen pos byin gyis rlobs// de skad bstod nas sbyor ba 'bul// der ni bdag dang mngon sbyor te// drod kyis byang chub sems nyid dang // ra k+ta'i dngas ma bsres nas su// sna la bdag nyid
242a1(rnying rgyud): nam sa/ nan dun/ yang na / don na/ kA ga ga sardzu ga // bad du dus sa gas
242a2(rnying rgyud): ma gzhan ni gong ma bzhin// 'di 'dzub na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub la/ lhur yang cha dang srin la mkhas so// ma ma 'oganas 'byung ba lta blos kyang ci dgos ma mo bzhi yang than mo 'khom la// deni khros pa'i dbang po bdi'i sa
242a3(rnying rgyud): thabs mo// de bzhi'i ma bzhi sgrub tu ston ci ste/ spyid na mo bani bsgrub na thu mos ma 'khol pas/ srub lhag par mi dgas so// da ni thugs kyi dkyis ma bzhi'i grub pa 'byung ste/ da ni ta'i lo la chos bdun la bsham// brgyad la 'jug te/ nying ba
242a4(rnying rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o// de'i yo byad btsal ba/ dkar mo mig gcig b+han+da na// zlum po pad+ma chags pa dang // 'jam la mo nyung ba ste// gtsug tu bug byung ba de// dkar mo chen mo'i phyag na bsdams// ljon shing lcang los rab tu brgyan// sngon shing lta bu'irtsa
242a5(rnying rgyud): yod pa// ma mtshan mo'i phyag na bsnams// pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyar bris pa// ya kar gtsug na yod pa ni// ma mo bang phyur phyag na bsdams// dum ze gnyis su 'jug pa la// rdo rje sagram kyar bris pa// ser mo las mkhan phyag na bsdams// gtsus
242a6(rnying rgyud): srubs nang du rub pa las// cha rnams gtsug du bsgyings pa la// spu chen dgung ni 'bar bya ste// dpal tshan nyid kyi zug na ba rnams// zhes 'byung ste/ b+had+ha de lnga ldan pa dang // shel gyi rtsa bzhi yang dag bsogs// gtan po rgyas su zhugs pa dang // gzhan
242a7(rnying rgyud): yang // rjes sde tshogs pa'o// sgeg pa chen po ga tsa pra d+h+we/ zhwa dkar pos yang dbu brgyan no// 'jig rten gzungs bzhi 'jigs bstan pa// sha ma dog dka l-i mdoge babang ba// so chags dam la sprin dgrus ring // dkar mo mig gcig tshul du phyung // brtson 'dru
242b1(rnying rgyud): can la drag shul che// ral pa can la ha ra'i mig/ nag mo ral pa can ltar snang // sha ma dag dmar la mdangs sdug pa// sgrub snyan la 'gro ba sdug/ dmar mo dbang spyad tshul du sdang // sug bzhi ring la mcheb no// sha mdog rdzo la brtul zhugs che// ser mo
242b2(rnying rgyud): mkhan tshul du snang // yum bzhi'i gzungs dang ldan byas te// yum bzhi'i bsnyen pa so sor bgrang // bdag nyid man ngag sems ldan pas// bzhi char bsnyen pa gcig tu drangs// brtan dbyangs snyan pos bskul ba ni// huM shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma/
242b3(rnying rgyud): na bza' tshal chen dud pa la// b+han+ta rlon pa'i dril bus brgyan// len phran zhag gis 'dril ba la// dung gi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// shar phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// dung chen 'bar ba'i thod gdengs can// zhag gi len phran bsigs pa yis//
242b4(rnying rgyud): du ya bdud btul zhing 'ching // bair du brgya byin phung bar byed// 'og tu dmya' khams stongs par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// b+hai ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs na// nag mo chen po mche ba can// na bza' zhing lpags go zu la// b+h+ya
242b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dril bus brgyan// rdo rje'i lan phran rin chen brgyan// lcags kyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// lho phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// shes rab thabs kyi thod gdengs can// dri chen len phran bsigs pa yis// steng du ma hA de ba 'ching //
242b6(rnying rgyud): dugashin rje phung bar byed// 'og tu byol song stongs par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// hU~M ri rab gling bzhi'i nub phyogs nas// dmar mo chen mo dbang sgyur ma// na bza' rak+ta'i go zu la// sbrul nag 'khrigs pa'i chun 'phyangs can// pad+ma
242b7(rnying rgyud): rak+ta'i len phran can// mche ba dkar po gtsigs pa yi// nub kyi srid gsum phur bas 'debs// mi khrag 'bar ba'i thod gdangs can// dak+ta'i len phran bsigs pa yi// steng du tshangs pa chen po 'chings// bar du klu yi nad rigs 'joms// 'og tu yi dwags d+hangs
243a1(rnying rgyud): par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs na// ser mo chen mo las mkhan mo// mdzes pa'i na bza' chen mo ni// mAMs rlon pa'i thul pa la// dri chu khol ma'i ya bas bskor// len phraT
243a2(rnying rgyud): rlung bar bar 'gyur// gser gyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// byang phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// mangs spangs pa'i thod gdengs can// dri mu'i lan phran bsigs pa yis// steng du tshogs kyi bdag po bcings// bar du gnod sbyin phung bar byed// 'og tu
243a3(rnying rgyud): snying 'byin ma// g.yon na b+har+b+ha khrag 'dzag pas// bud med thams cad dbang du sdud// ral ba can gyi 'khor skyong ma// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i 'khor mnga' zhing // sgrub pa po la brtser dgongs ma// 'dir byon sgrub pa'i rtags phyung shig/ ces bskul pa

243a6(rnying rgyud): phyung ste/ ge sar gyi rak+ta dbang du sdud la/ pad+ma'i nang du rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya bcas la/ rim pa bzhin du zla gam 'byed cing spong ba 'bul lo// de ltar sbyar te gong ma bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas phyi de nub mo/ mchog phran chas su stsal ba bsgral ba dang / khams
243b1(rnying rgyud): das skal ba'angs thab ca dag nga// 'a ga na 'a la thag sa tu/ das kya gas pa dang 'thu na/ bamadas yang na thub pa nams/ gtang ba sdug tham dru tu ta gnanas/ ngathas du bya gas / snang ba dang /
243b2(rnying rgyud): su bral lo// las kyang tshul bzhin du byud // sgrub pa la 'dug pa'i tshul na gang ma dang 'drag// 'di ni thugs kyid kyis tham gsang ba'i mang byem pazhi sgrub thabs pa// 'di san mad kyim mthab na/ 'di'i yin tan gyis stong / byung ba 'jig pa'i
243b3(rnying rgyud): ng+yas su yab/ g+ha byangs dang rol tshwa la sogs pa 'di dang rtags mang pos bsunas/ bdeb can gyi gnas su srub mi dgos par skyel lo// 'di yan chad kyi ma mgrub na/ 'diman chad kyi ma mthams cad rang bzhin grub pas 'ogs lhag par zlab mi dgosas// 'di ni ma
243b4(rnying rgyud): mi'i gtsa ma rnams kyi srab pa'i thabs snal bcu gnyis pa'o// de na pam banan grub par 'drin/ gnas drung byed du mang la/ sram da dgas kyi mtshan dang ldan pa gsas/ dang ngog pa'i zab dpa na ga tus dang gang gcig gis bcu te/
243b5(rnying rgyud): napa ma sgru ma / ma na du na
243b6(rnying rgyud): tsaM nag pa gas sa/ shel dgang pog // ba bar dkar bgacig/ nam mkha' lding gartog/ mchog rten gyi thun pam skam po gag/ chas gos thams cad dag par btur te/ gsung chen drud pa thun ma ga da byung ba/ 'ang drang ba dang / zhag na pa men gyi
243b7(rnying rgyud): da nga ga la lam brgya/ sa / gang su mdzug nga rgyags / da cagacig la/ ga tu na na ste/ dbrang ga cig rnam/ grang sa tshul gas/ thal ma na
244a1(rnying rgyud): bdag dam mnyams na mdzes pa dang ldan par 'ong / nyams na nag ma ral ba can mas chag chog byed pa/ mchab dmang kyang 'dug par 'ang ste/ bdag man ngag gi ting du 'dzin gas lan dbang du bsdu/ mi gsal nab zad pa gsol te/ bkang bar bya/
244a2(rnying rgyud): na ngag dang ldan na dang po mi sdug pa las kyang sdug pa'o// dang po nas sdug na pad+ma dbang du bsdus la/ nga rgyal bskyed de/ su mo'i tshul du bsten no// der phyag 'tshal zhing 'on dpon zer zhing 'o byed do// de nas pang+ka'i rak+ta hUM gis rngubs pa dang / rgyan bor te gzungs
244a3(rnying rgyud): sum dang bcur byas te/ mel tsho thun re la gnyis gnyis kyis sbyor ba 'bul/ sA la gtso mo dang sbyor// de nas 'khor dang sbyar ro// de nas yo byad sna tshogs dang / sbyor ba'i byang chub sems gnyis gnyis kyis 'dod pa bzhin du dam bsres te/ dra yi brnag pa'i las rnams
244a4(rnying rgyud): na// bka' yang sgrub ces pho brang sbas// bran mo yin pas mna' ma za// zhes lung stsal lo// de phyin chad bran mo bzhin du las byed do// da ni sbas pa'i ma bzhi bsgrub par bya ste/ yo byad gong ma kun gyi steng du/ zhing gi g.yang gzhi/ zhing gi rtse zhags/
244a5(rnying rgyud): med pa spyi blugs kyi zhwa ral pa can/ dung chen dang / bye ru dang / gser g.yus brgyan pa/ zhing chan gyi rje rnga thogs te bsgrubs pa dang / rtags gong ma dang mthun/ sgrub pa'i thabs gong ma dang tshul gcig/ yon tan ni ma bdun man chad kun 'khol lo//
244a6(rnying rgyud): sa bsam pa 'grub// lhur yang dgra la rbad pa bzang ngo // da ni e ka tsa ti bsgrub par bya ste/ stegs bu gru bzhi pa gcig gi steng du/ gra phyir gtsang ma gcig bting la/ dam rdzas rnam pa d+ma tshogs pa'i dmar gtor gcig gi nang du/ sman b+hi ha~M su la/
244a7(rnying rgyud): mang po kha gcig gis bcad la kha nub phyogs su bltas te/ zhag bdun du bsnyen pa bgyis la/ yum mtshan dang ldan pa la dbab po// bskul pa ni/ hUM srid pa'i byan mo g.yang dam can// kye 'gro la gcig 'jig rten srol// mig
244b1(rnying rgyud): sbyong khams bsreg/ kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// ma byung ba yi dus mtha' nas// 'jig rten las kyi dbang bsgyur te// sems can don la rab tu brtson// snying rje byams pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bzla ba'i shugs kyis gshegs su gsol//
244b2(rnying rgyud): gis bskul ba dang / yum mtshan dang ldan pa la phab ste dris na/ stang srid kyi gtam spra'o// da ni ma mo spyan gnyis sgrub pa bstan te/ sbom mo chen mo yal gam can// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dpal mo btsan// gnam phyed dgos su gon pa mo// sa
244b3(rnying rgyud): phyed gdan du bting ba'i bdag/ 'khor ni gnam sman 'bum gyis bskor// chibs su gser gyi sha ba chibs// mgo la g.yu yi rwa bcu 'bar// phyag na gser gyi dril zhags bsnams// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// tshe zhes sring gcig ma g.yes
244b4(rnying rgyud): zhig/ dani nu mo chung ngu bskul lo// sbom mo chen mo yal gam can// dun ting g.yu yi ga kyog la// gser dang g.yu yi cod pan can// g.yu yi dril zhags 'bum gyis brgyan// chibs su dung sha dkar po bcibs// khas blangs dam bca' babrel lam/
244b5(rnying rgyud): ci// bskul lo ma bzhengs da tshul byon// gser skyems gang bu de yi rten// byas yul gar 'gro yang bsam pa 'grub bo// hUM he dun te hUM/ 'di gsum nang du mi bsten bcos dka'/ ma mo phye ma rnams ni zhal nas gsungs pa'i sgrub thabs yod na phrag
244b6(rnying rgyud): dog che la bcos dka' ste/ blo chung rnams kyi don du mi rung ste 'dir ma gsungs so// sgrub thabs tha ma'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / da ni ma mo dbang du sdud pa'i le'u 'chad de/ gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ye shes rang bzhin sran mo
244b7(rnying rgyud): rnams// rtogs pas ji ltar dbang du bsdu// man ngag nges bstan ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// yul dang dngas ma
245a1(rnying rgyud): smras/ rgya rnams las// rigs kyim ma lamags te// gzugs pa'i yus bzhi dang // rgyun rdzim sring ba rnam par bya// des rnam ma dbang du spyad// dbang du ldad pa'i sacugyu 'drubazhi pa la/ gdung
245a2(rnying rgyud): yis yang gsol ba// 'jig rten dbang chen 'di rnams kun// srog chags kun la gnod bgyid pas// bskang ba'i cho ga ji ltar lags// 'jig rten mgon la bdag gnyen 'tshal// de skad gsol ba gsan nas byed// 'jig rten mgon gyis ba
245a3(rnying rgyud): stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul yang dag pa// sarba rU pas thams cad bskang // bskang bzlog chen po'i las zhes bya// ma hA shan ti mi g.yo rdzogs// zhi rgyas chen po'i las zhes bya// ngas gsungs pa la gdon mi za// de la sarba dru pa'i thabs
245a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis te// sna tshogs pa yi 'bu sgra la// ngang phye bregab btag nas su// snang srid gzugs byas nas ni// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i byin rlabs kyis// rnam shes tshang bar bsgom byas te// sna tshogs spyan gzigs dgor chas brgyan// khams gsum sems can
245a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad la// lus ngag grud du bsngos byin te// tshe dpal pho nyas bkug byed pa// de ni phyi yi chog yin// g+hu ma sarba nu ba ni// hi shu na gcig 'bru sbru la// ngar bye bre gsum bcal nas ni// rin chen sna tshogs rtse bdang te// bram cha gcig la ri rabag tu
245a6(rnying rgyud): rigs su mthun pa'i kha dog bya// de nas dar phye gsum chal// gcan gzan rgyal po drug gi gzugs// dkar la mdzes dang ldan par bya// rtsal gyi rgyal po drug po la// mdzes ldan g.yed kyi rgyan gyis brgyan// srog chags gtso bo drug po zhon// shugs kyi rtul po
245a7(rnying rgyud): drug pa la// bdog ldan zhing rgyag zas brgyan// 'dod chags gtso drug bzhon// 'dod chags rgaci badrug po la// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// sems can rgyal po de dag kun// srin gzigs dgor zas yang dag ldan// ri rab bang mdang
245b1(rnying rgyud): la'o// btso mo drug la dbul bar byar// de nas dang bye sumachal// grang chen gzugs ni bcu bzhi dang // stag gzig la sogs bcu bzhi dang // mdangs ldan bya yi gzugs can dang // 'dab nags rgyal po bcu bzhi dang // dkar mo ku kur tsa'i dargyu/
245b2(rnying rgyud): srog chags gzugs ni de dag kun// ri rab bang rim par ma la'o// ma mo bcu bzhi'i rdzas yin no// de nas ngar phye sum tshal// snang srid sems can gzugs su byas// sna tshogs kha dog yang dag ldan// ri rab bang rim tha mang bzhag/
245b3(rnying rgyud): zas dang gos su ldan// sring po chags byed la sogs te// sman mor grags pa kun gyi rjerdzas// ri rab bum pa'i rtse mo la// sna tshogs dar gyi rgyal mtshan lnga// gru bzhi dbus dang lnga la'o// dkyil du dmar po dang kyi gdugs// gser sems phra man phyogs
245b4(rnying rgyud): byA ste// dbus su ste yi bya'o gang // stegs bu gung zhidri zhim ldan// dak+ta dza gang maN+Da le// sna tshogs me tog gcal bkram ste// de'i stergyung drug tor ma bzhig/ de las pags pa'i maN+Dal la// rdzas dang ldan pa'i dmar gtor bsham// dbus su dpal/
245b5(rnying rgyud): gyi mtshan pa la// mda' dang dar sna rgyu zhags ldan// phud dang rak+ta sman sbyar ba'o// sngags mkhan chas su bya ba ni// dmar po nag po sngon po gzung // zhag gsum bsnyen pa byas nas ni// bla med ting 'dzin gsal bar bya// yang na che mchog he ru ka/ sku
245b6(rnying rgyud): mdog mthing nag ral ba can// dbug sum pa la phyag kyang drug/ dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar te// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje la// bar ma zhing gi dbyug pa la// tha ma sbrul gyi zhags pa yis// khams gsum ma mo dbang du spyad// g.yon
245b7(rnying rgyud): gyi dang po nyan+ta la// bar ma zhing gi g.yab mo las// ma mo thams cad 'gugs 'dren pa'o// tham dung chen gzul// gnam lcags gzer gyis gdams pa yis// mi phyugs gnyis ka'i tshe dang g.yang // yi ge tsu du sdud pa ste// yum yang dug gsum dbang spyad/
246a1(rnying rgyud): sa// rgyan dang mjug gco nga la// gnyis sume par mchod pa 'thal// dpal mamachoganya du ka dang dbang mchag nya ka yab yum 'dud pa'i mchod pa 'phrul bar bsas la/ phram na man cad lakhang du ba zhag pa 'ab ga du
246a2(rnying rgyud): hUM shrISh+T+rI drug kro d+hI shwa ng+gi s+t+waM/ ha he phaT/ ma ma mo gI ni ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ zhag gsum bar du 'bum bzlas shing // de nas bskang bzlog gtor ma gtang // gong du spags pa'i dmar gtor la// che mchog he du la sogs pa// dpal gyi dakhor tshogs mchog
246a3(rnying rgyud): tu mchod// the bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// dkar nag dmar ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ phyag drug phyag chas skye shi sgrol// sbrul chen zhags pas mtshogs bkug/ g.yang gzhig yang mos thams cad 'du
246a4(rnying rgyud): dug gsum dbang du sdud pa'o// yum dang gnyis su med pa ste// khro bo'i tshogs kyis mchod pa ste// thugs rjes dbyings nas rol par mdzod// ces bstod pa la sogs pa dang dpal gyi tshogs gzhung bzhin mchod/ bshags sbyangs bgyis nas phrin las
246a5(rnying rgyud): bcol lo// de nas ma mo rnams kyi srog gi snying po bsdus te// a mr-i ta la bden pa bdang / bdag nyid che ba'i dargyal bskyed// snying ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// khams gsum stong khrag kun gyi bdag/ gni rus bza' chen po ste// khams gsum keng dus dur /
246a6(rnying rgyud): gro bdag/ da ni ga za chen mo ste// khams gsum sdes kun gying dag/ nga ni skye 'gro dbugs kyi bdag/ nga ni lce 'gro'i bkrag gi bdag/ ma mo kun gyi re gnas yin// mtshogs bskad bzlog gtor ma long // tshe rang dbang zang mngon par spel// spos rgod dud pa btang nas kyang /
246a7(rnying rgyud): gtor ma bsngo ba 'di skad do// hUM ma tshogs ni gtan mchod phyir// 'bru sna ni mang po dang // rin chen ni sna tshogs las// gling bzhi yi gtor ma la// srog chags ni mang pos bskor// kun kyang ni rin po che'i// rgyan dang ni cha lugs ldan// 'jig rten na
246b1(rnying rgyud): gyis bskor// dkon pa yi rdzas kyis brgyan// mu man gyi stegs bul// rin chen ni gcal bkram ste// b+he ru li sgras btsugs nas// smros kyi nis gzhi la// dbang gi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// dar dkar gyi yol zas nas// gsal ba yi me bus nas/ rgyal mtshodzin
246b2(rnying rgyud): chog btsugs// le brgan ni gdugs kyis bkab// dud pa ni gnyan phyung zhing // gser gyi ni skyem bltams te// tshe srog gi sbyin du 'bul// chus srid kyi glung du 'bul// longs spyod kyi sbyin du 'bul// 'dir gyon ni gyur bzhes shing // hUM ri rab gling bzhi
246b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// 'jig rten yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// ma mo'i tshogs kyi rgyal mo ste// srid gsum yongs la mnga' mdzad mo// skye 'gro yongs kyi za byed ma// na bza' stong gsum g.yang gzhi la// thong rlon mang po'i phreng ba can// ligA na snying gi
246b4(rnying rgyud): longs spyod mo// 'dir byon tshe srog grung bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ rdo rje rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// shar phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// dkar mo sprin chen go bra la// lag na gser gyi spu gri thogs// srid pa gsum
246b5(rnying rgyud): gyi dus 'cha'am// 'dir byon tshe srog grud pa zhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ hU~M rin chen rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// lho phyogs sa khams mnga' bdag mo// nag mo g.yu yi go zu can// bskal pa mo yi 'od 'bar zhing / phyag na
246b6(rnying rgyud): me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// srid pa gsum gyi drod 'bebs te// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe 'phrog ma// 'dir byon tshe srog grud bzhenas shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdzes bzhes shig/ hUM pad+ma rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nub phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo//
246b7(rnying rgyud): dmar po khrag gi go zu la// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang // skye 'gro kun gyi khrag 'thung ma// 'dir byon tshe srog klud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes shig/ hU~M las kyi rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// byang phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag
247a1(rnying rgyud): smras gas/ gas/ sa na/ du sna nga na / ba ma nas/ sa

247a4(rnying rgyud): g.yas pas spang srid dbang du phyud// g.yon pas rje 'tha' gsos mdadam// rdzabacwa ban ma ste// TI phrin gyi meng 'am dadzem// mam grin nags ng+yas kyang / sangs bdag chanam mangs pa zhes shig/ sdang bdag can ma thung bzhas
247a5(rnying rgyud): shig/ s+t+waM che zhes chen ma dkar mo ste// nyi zla stong gi zong phreng can// lcags dang zangs kyi dri zhags la// snying gi zhags pa brjog cing 'dzin// sprul pa chen po'i ming nas phyung // mngos bdag chen mo mongs bzhes shig/ grung bdag chen ma grud bzhes
247a6(rnying rgyud): ga/ hU~M che zhes dkar mo nyi ma'i mdangs// srid pa gsum sgrol mdzad ma// lag rnga zhal gyi ru bri thogs// khros pa'i rgyal po'i ming nas zung // mdas bdag chen mo mangs bzhes shig/ glang bdag chen mo grung bzhes shin/ hrIHzhes nug
247a7(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung mo// med pag bang da// do shes dang / nas byung // 'angs bdag das ni // thung bdag chen mo krung bzhes sachen po dmar mo jur bya'i bdag/
247b1(rnying rgyud): dasum gyogs snyam das// lagan bdu ci rnam pa bstams// mas pa'i rnas ma bang nas byung // mangs bdag nanam mangs pazhes ga// mad bdag canam byung ba sa shi// nas nga nag gnas thangs// srad bugs car gas nga /
247b2(rnying rgyud): byung// lag na shing lpags tul mtshan migs// zlos pa'i rgyal mo'i mang nas byung // mdos bdag chen ma mangs bzhes shig/ klung bdag can ma spring bzlas shig/ spem can ni sri 'i rgyan byed de// lag na bla legags pa rdzogs// rbang rje
247b3(rnying rgyud): hU~Mg mo 'amang nas byung // mdos bdag can mo mngos pa zhes shig/ klung ba dag chen mo krung bzhes shig/ rnaMm can ne byeng phyug can mo ste// lag nam yi dbyug pa thogs// zung byed nag mi'i ming nas byung // mangs bdag chen na mangs pa zhes
247b4(rnying rgyud): shig/ grung bdag chen mo grud bzhes shig/ dri mtshan ni gcig pu chen mo ste// lag nam yi g.yang gzhi rde bas// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mangs bzhes shig/ krung bdag chen mo grung bzhes shig/ hUM gling bzhi
247b5(rnying rgyud): mtshugs ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// srid pa shar gyi mnga' bdag so// dkar ma chen mo mig gcig mo// lag na b+hanra zlum pa thogs// skye bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung // mangs bdag chen mo mongs bzhes shig/ ud bdag rten mo thung bkres shig/

248a7(rnying rgyud): dri mi// bsri ma ma mi mthogs// zhon mi so nas tun 'du byed ma ma du bri sus nga bdag ma drung dus tsug/ TI bye da ma thugasal// baban rgya mi ba mabyas// nga su /

249b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyan// 'di yi yon tan bsod nams kyis// phyi ma'i dngos grub mchog yin te// bsod nams nyid du gong na med// 'di la yon tan brjod me lang // de skad gsungs pas lha rnams dga'o// mdos kyi phan man gyi la'u ste bcu drug pa'o//
249b5(rnying rgyud): gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dbang chen mo rnams bskang ba yis// dbang byed po la mi 'tshal lam// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal ba// 'dod chags rgyal che ba yi// zhe sdang byed la dbang mche// srid pa'i so yis 'jig rten bskyed/

249b7(rnying rgyud): ri po che// gsal byed brgyad kyang de bzhin pa dag/ sna sde dang gyi tsam bul// lus dang yan lag yang dag ba rtson// bdud dang drang dgar na pa dang // debarjor gyi bdag pa ste// gshinang ru dra'i rjes yin te// skyes tong la'ang ngo zhen no//
250a1(rnying rgyud): gsang rgya tha bzhal// mkhar thabs mda' yis rnam par brgyan// medzad dad// rang nas rgyan// dbuzhan gdang can can cag/ dkar gyu rgyun dang mas pa 'a// dan pan man bzhan// bachags d+hanags la// ma'ag /
250a2(rnying rgyud): yis rnam par brgyan// le bgan leb bzang mda' yis brgyan// de bzhin rin chen sha dang chang // bas krud rgyan dang chas pa 'di// byung shar mtshams su de bzhin na// nas dang srungs kar don gyi rgyan// med pa kun la de bzhin te// 'thung ngo
250a3(rnying rgyud): la me gtor byeng // ji tshe 'di skad brjod par bya// kye dpag bsam shing gi srid pan// gser mkhar de ni ser po la// gser sgro doni rtsibs sa thob// gsub ni sngon pos bskod// de yon bdag po ste// skyes dze thang dkar la// nas mkhan ni meng nas
250a4(rnying rgyud): zung // mangs bdag chen mo mdzes pa zhes shig/ klung bdag chen mo krung bzhis shig/ gser mkhar ni dbu rtse nas// rin chen ni sngags bral// lcags kyi ne mu khyud can// da ye steng na ni// srid pa ni dang dkar ba// zhig 'dzin ni ming nas phreng // mdo
250a5(rnying rgyud): bdag chen mo mdzes bzhes shig/ grud bdag chen mo gyud pa zhes shig/ rim pa ni bcu gsum la// gnam gyi ni steng shed na// lcags mkhar ni sngon po la// gser gyi ni mtha' bskor zhing // zangs kyi ni grogs la ba// de yi ni bdag po ste// dbang phyug ni
250a6(rnying rgyud): chen po ste// ma d+hA ni shwa ri dag/ nag pa ni chen po ste// ya bdud ni ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig// krung bdag chen mo glang bzhes shig/ de yi ni gling phran la// yang byin yang la shod// bdud pas ni thabs mkhas te// bdung
250a7(rnying rgyud): pas ni shugs drug ste// 'gro ba'i kun gyi bdud// 'gro ba yi tshe dpal 'phrog/ skyes bu ni lces ter// ya bdud rgyal ze'u ming nas byung // mdos bdag chen mo mongs bzhis shig/ zung bdag can mo klung bzhes shig/ kye sto phyogs gling na gnas paste
250b1(rnying rgyud): rus mkhar gling dgu'i bdag po ste// 'chi bdag kun gyi khram 'debs ma// gshin rje'i rgyal po'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ grung bdag can ma gyud bzhes shig/ gnam gyi mthongs na gnas pa ste// 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdor gyi bdag
250b2(rnying rgyud): mahA de ba lha chen po// btsun mo u ma dbye bcas// nor lha chen po'i ming nas phung // mdos bdag chen mo mangs pa zhes shig/ krung bdag chen ma krung bzhes shig/ byang phyogs gnam gyi mthong na gnas pa ste// dud mu khar de ni dkar po la// g.yu yi
250b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' bskor te// ba se yi sgo bstsal ba// de yi ni bdag po ste// khyab 'jug dung gi thor tshugs can// gnam lha dkar po'i ming nas phyung // mdos bdag chen mo mangs pa zhes shig/ krung bdag chen mo glang bzhes shig/ byang shar gyi mtshams shed nas//
250b4(rnying rgyud): bse mkhar ni gling dgu na// dngul gyis ni mtha' bskor zhing // lcags kyi ni sgo bstsal pa// de yi ni bdag po ste// shar phyogs gnams phyed kyi bdag/ tshangs thur lus la thor tshugs can// btsan 'god rgyal po'i ming nas snang // mdos bdag chen mo mdos bde
250b5(rnying rgyud): sheg/ grung bdag chen mo grung ba zhes shig/ sa btsan rol pa skya rol po// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ grung bdag chen yo byung ba zhes shig/ btsan la sogs pa de bzhin no// da ni ma hA shan ting gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gtsang phye kha la phyed la/ ji ltar
250b6(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i gzugs byas te// dkor cha spyan gzigs yang dag ldan// de ni phyi rgyud zhin+ti // de la 'jig rten shas bskangs te/ dmar gtor dam rdzas ldan pa ni// sha gsang ba'i cho ga'o// bstan pa'i gnas ni dbenas rba// gru bzhi spos chu'i maN+Dal la// zas
250b7(rnying rgyud): steng du gang ba s+ho// bsngos nas dngazhin gzhag par bya// ming chung mthun te dkar ze 'gos// gsang ba mthun te gnyis kar 'dra// 'di brtsam bsam pa ma 'grub na// 'jig rten dbang chen phung bar 'gyur// las rnams kun gyi brnag pa ste// cho ga
251a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs dang ldan pa te// gdugs gas pa dngas thang// sa gsungs pa la ba ma ma dzad// dan rdzas d+hA bka'asal ngas// dag tan dang na ba dag // spyad mas thams pad 'a thos //
251a2(rnying rgyud): la phad par bsgrubs// dam tshig mtha' la gnas par 'gyur// ma mangs kyi laT d+ha bcu bdun pa'o// garjod 'dul sgra yis yang gsol ba// 'khrugs dang 'dzin pa'i las rnams de// sa ti'i las rnams bdag nyin 'a
251a3(rnying rgyud): gyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srid gsum btul ba'i ro \u0f85 nI// bdag nyid man ngag ldan byas te// sems kyi dkyil nas bskul ba ni// hUM dpal gyi ngo nya bka' sdod ma// khyung gi kha chen lding pa la// lcags kyi mi 'o khung /
251a4(rnying rgyud): mgo bo gsum la lngag drug ma// g.yas no rdo rje kha T+wA~Mg/ bar ma su gros srid gsum grol// tha madril zhags mu stegs 'ching // g.yon pa b+han+d+ha ra k+ta 'bar// bar ma 'khor lo bskal pa'i ma// tha ma sngags kyu'i 'dra 'dzi chen// gnas ni phur khrod dkyis na ba
251a5(rnying rgyud): brdungs ni thugs kyi dbus na bsrungs// bton ni ljags kyi rtse nas bton// 'gyid ni dam nyams dgra la 'gyed// dbang ni srid pa gsum la dbang // za ni skye 'gro yongs la Ta// nyul ni gling bzhi kunA la nyul// bangan klog pas nges par btsogapa// brad
251a6(rnying rgyud): nidangos po gcig la zad// rgyal po chen pos bdud dpung 'joms// tsham rngams chen pos dgra bgegs sgrol// nga rgyal chen pos mu stegs 'dul// rdzu 'phrul chen pos ri rab bskyil// khyod ni srid gsum grol // ldan 'ag dzag tu 'phrul ba'i
251a7(rnying rgyud): gang 'bya ba sgol bar byed// de sa bon bzhi 'arjengs// dkar mnyi ma'i thang thung can// phyag drug su gsum thun mig la// migs kyis bya ming byen// mdzad ji spri dkar gzug can// phyag gnyis pad+ma slong bzung zhing //
251b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten dbang sdud ma// g.yas na mi yi rgyu zhags 'phen// bdud dang mu stegs bcings mdzad ma// mtshan ni sbrul chen zhags pa can// g.yon gyi dang po bsnams pa ni// mi mgo rlon pa'i thod pa ru// ma khrag dran mas bkang nang du/
251b2(rnying rgyud): bcud dang bsres nas 'thor// sgrub pa po la dngos grub 'bebs// mtshan ni bdud rtsi longs spyod ma// g.yas kyi bar mas bsnams pa ni// mi yi rus pa'i phur bu 'dril// dgra bgegs gnon pa'i las la 'artson// da ni
251b3(rnying rgyud): can// g.yon gyi tha mar bsnams pa na// lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la// mi snying brgyas pa'i zhags pa yis// srid pa gsum car 'ching mdzad ma// mtshan ni gser gyi dril zhags can// sprul pa'i phyag brnyan rdes pa yis// mi
251b4(rnying rgyud): rlon pa'i g.yab mo yis// khams gsum rdul du brlag mdzad ma// mtshan ni g.yang gzhi chu mtshon can// sru la mi lpags rlon pa gsol// stong khams thams cad myos mdzad ma// mtshan ni zhing gi na bza' can// kha nas mi khrag rlon sde 'a
251b5(rnying rgyud): stong khams thams cad sreg mdzad de// mtshan ni kha nas me 'bar ma// sru la mi mgo se ral kha// skye 'gro thams cad bskangs mdzad ma// mtshan ni me tog chun 'phyang can// 'bar ba gtum chen khro bo 'dul// go rgyal chen mo gshin rje'i gshed// bka'
251b6(rnying rgyud): yaM dza&gyogs ma ste// nga rgyal can rnams dbang du sdud// gang la bya ba rdul du rlog/ 'di ni pho nya'i gtso mo ste// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod/ ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// po ha can po'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang
251b7(rnying rgyud): gsom mo// srid pa'i dbang can 'di rnams kun// srog gis bskang na ji ltar skong // nyag gcig yabal bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol bags na nas kyang // tag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyin cig gsung durang yang dag pa// srid pa'i dbang can 'di rnams
252a1(rnying rgyud): swAH/ kun// srog gis bskang ba di sa dang// sman rtsa ba yum gyi mngan byud sa// skye gcug gsupa nan \u0f7f dbu'abyar// gsus ras bas gang gsum bya// g.yas kyi phyagan dgas su sangs nas brnams// rnam mag na
252a2(rnying rgyud): lnga yi longs spyod 'byed// ye shes rol pa'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs// khams gsum srid pa gsum la mda' mdzad sa// rtag tu dbang phyug chen mo grogs 'dzod cig/ bskus pas mi mthong gcig kyang med// bkang ngo bskal ba'i rdugs dang 'dang // sha phyogs
252a3(rnying rgyud): mnga' bdag mo// 'byung bas la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i dus la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi rus pas thugs dam bskang // mthun pa'i rdzas chen 'di 'bul gyi// bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// lho yi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag po// 'byung ba rul dang
252a4(rnying rgyud): sbyar zhing // 'gro ba'i khrag la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi khrag gis bskad byas na// mthun pa'i rdzas chan ngas 'bul gyi// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// nub kyi phyogs kyi mda' bdag mo// 'byung ba mel dbang sbyar zhing // 'gro ba'i dong la mngang mdzad
252a5(rnying rgyud): ma// 'di yi drod kyis bskang byas na// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// byang phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba rlung la dbang sbyar zhing // 'gro ba'i dbugs la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi dkrugs kyis
252a6(rnying rgyud): bskad byas na// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// nam mkha'i rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nam mkha' stong la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi bkrag gis bskang byas na// mthun pa'i rdzas
252a7(rnying rgyud): chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol ba'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// rgyu baspel ba'i phung po yis ma shes kyi mkha' 'bo ma lnga dang gtso bo ba yus bstang ngo // da ni mdos bdag gi mtho rnams bskang ba ni/ srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum kun gyi yu ma mchog ste// sgra mdog
252b1(rnying rgyud): nithong gcan rdzong // dbang dngaga' gyis stod khams khangs// rin chen ral bas snang sring gsal// khyod ni 'dod khams gcom s+ho// phrad kyi bdag ma 'thugs dam bdang // ma nas rdzogs d+ha rma // gnyis su ma bar thad pa / nga ba
252b2(rnying rgyud): rnams 'brub par mdzod// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga la// dkar mo g.yag thod del gajig ma// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong nas// khrag gi dri snyoms dmar gyi'o myong ma// rab pa'i thar bu g.yon nas gcig tu 'gyel// sprid
252b3(rnying rgyud): gzhi g.yo zhing khengs mdzad ma// g.yas na lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la// snying gi zhags pa bsdog cing 'phen// g.yon na b+han+d+ha mgo bcad khrag 'dzag ma// tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad kyi mgo bcang ma// nyi zla stong gi dbu la brgyan cing
252b4(rnying rgyud): zlabs// snang srid snying gi bdag maH// 'di la snying gis pakang byas la// mthun pa'i jas chen ma bre gyi// du yis las brgya 'i grub par mdzod// tsheg dkar mo nyi ma'i 'dangs// dag zo pa gcigazugs dam pa gang // rje mam
252b5(rnying rgyud): dbang mo che// khams gsum thams cad gsal mdzad ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // che zhe khams gsum khros pa'i dbang moche// khams gsum gsang bar thams cad sbyor// bskar ro bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // srid pa bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang
252b6(rnying rgyud): mo che// srid pa thams cad bde la sbyor// che zhe khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud// che zhe bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che// srid pa thams cad de de la sbyor// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // stang srid kun gyi rgya
252b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad ma// rgyan gyi rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang // mtshan ni dbyi phyug rgyal mo ste// dbyings phyug rgyal mo'i thugs dam bskang // bdag nyid lhag lhag bzhad mdzad ma// bdag nyid chen mo'i thugs dam bskang // mtshan ni gcig pu chen mo ste// lag na zhing gi g.yang gzhi
253a1(rnying rgyud): thogs// bska nga ba/ sa pa'i thugs dam pa dang// dan thags kya byas sa/ 'jab pa rtags byung / rtag rgya bang byug can ma grags// phreng gcig gang bya mang bdag ma// da/ ra ma mig gcag ral pa can// 'amang na na
253a2(rnying rgyud): mo 'bum rjes bskor// bskang bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // srid pa lha yi mngang bdag mo// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// 'khor ni nag mo 'brum sngar bcas// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bzang // srid bachub kyi 'ang bdag do// dmar mo
253a3(rnying rgyud): mob+ha// 'bar ni dam ma 'bum thar bcas// bkang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bzla // srid pa zung gi bdag mabya// ma ba chen na las kyigaH// lab nis mong dum sngar bcas// thugs dam gtan pa bdag btang ba// banangs pa bras tham chis par

254b1(rnying rgyud): ran paM/ phaT tsit+ta su khaM/ zhes gsungs pas// khasas gsum thams cad mkha' gu gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor/ gting dpag med pa'i gzhal yas khang / dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor du gyur nas/ dbang drug gi phur bu ye shes kyi mthakha'

254b3(rnying rgyud): chen mang po ni gan rgyal du brgyal te snying dkar nag gi mtshams su phur bu phog ste/ dge sdig gi shan phyes nas/ sems kyi ye shes su byin gyis brlabs so// de ltar thams cad btul ba sangs pa dang // 'di skad ces ni glu blangs so// dbang drag dkyil 'kho

255b4(rnying rgyud): dru ga dag sang po dang / rdo rjeg tsunam la gas te/ ga don gyi pang me ba du mang ba dang / dug sde lasags te/ 'jig rten rnam mdapa ma zhes po dang / 'jig rten dbang rtsed pa mang pa rnangs cad/ lus pa rang te/ thar pa 'a
255b5(rnying rgyud): thob nas/ yal la'i sabyung ste/ rig 'don byed patshig can du gyur to// 'jigs byed dpal gyi zhal sanas/ dbang btsug pa'i le'u sngon supa'i// ming da'i ngong lung chen mardzogs so// chog sung badra rdzogs pa 'o// gang gis rnyed par ngos thub //
255b6(rnying rgyud): nyams dag na bsas pa 'thug/ dam chog gtsang na rnyed par 'gyur// srid pa gsang ba 'dzing lung da // 'am ba'i don la dga' ba dang // theg pa chen po dag tsar len cing// de rdo thob dpon mchod byed cing / lung chud la bcoM thos pa'i// srab thad de dang 'thang
255b7(rnying rgyud): ban// rgyud gta pa 'i nyi shu gcig // la snyams par gsol pa// 'a ma mchog pa pa dang // nab phyo gams pa pan gang gas kyi// mi'i rdzogs pa pa' bdag sa tshang/ ma rdzogs pa byam pa
256a1(rnying rgyud): stsa ba// nyon cog gnod sprul sa yig so// rnab 'byor ba la cho mchog ni// yang dag nyid dungs bshad do// de lagro zang rnam pa mang mchis kyang / lung byas man ga tubasgrud pas/ mi thogs pa ji ngas dzin
256a2(rnying rgyud): nagyi tshe dang gnyis so// de ba mi 'phrogs pa rjengs pa'i tshol/ sgrub pa chen pa'i dus la babal bab bstan pa dang / dus pa bab na rigs rdza gang du 'gro/ bang sgrub ba'i thabs dang / 'on pa dag la rgyas par bya ba dang / bsrangadas gtas du pa dang /
256a3(rnying rgyud): nyid la sgrub pa dang lnga'o// de la bslab pa chen po'i dus la bab ma pab brtag pa ni/ pus gar lan gnas gang du 'gro ba bsgoms pas thag bcad/ dus la bab ni sgrub pa'i thabs ni/ bdag lnga lu na bi mu a yi thugs gsel ba dang / tshe po rigs la bu d+ha na
256a4(rnying rgyud): gsal ba gnyis/ bin+du la'i thugs gsang ba byang chub sems dkar la 'chor ba dang // / bin du dze ta'i thugs gsang byang chub kyi sems dmar la dngas pa bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'phro 'du las/ gser dngul bsres pa zhun byas pa'i kha dog 'dra ba'i/ 'od zer
256a5(rnying rgyud): gyis rigs lnga'i gnas su khyab par byas te/ rigs lnga thams cad chags pa'i sems bskyed do// gsang ba dgyes pa babyed nas bde ba'i mchod pa phul lo// rigs lnga zhes bya ba ni mkha' bzhi dbyings dang wa ste/ dung can gyi mkha' dang / brda thang can gyi mkha' dang /
256a6(rnying rgyud): pad+ma can gyi mkha' dang / ra mo can gyi mkha' dang bzhi'o// dbyings ni gsang ba bde ba'i blam grogs mo'i rgyar mo'o// dus men mo la ba kyang 'di lnga'i mkhar 'gro ba las ma gtogs pa gzhan med pas 'di lnga la gsang po bde ba'i mchod pa phul te/ thugs dam bkang la/ ye
256a7(rnying rgyud): gro 'du bsrur ba ni/ bsnur ba'i thabs so// de la bskul ba'i cho ga 'di skad do// a ni ma byes su nyid las// gsang ba bde ba'i don byung ba// rdo rje la gnas bzor bakhyil// ma chags mi ldan 'gro 'dradu yis// yum gyi bud me dam des bskangs la// 'gro ba'i cho
256b1(rnying rgyud): brtan par mdzod// bde ba rgyas 'debs cho ni rdo rje brtan// bde ba rmongs byed tshe 'di pad+mar bsten// bde ba za byed tshe 'di nges par spel// bde ba tshe dbrel 'gro ba'i re bskong // bde thong yangs pa srid pa kun gyi yum// gang 'dir dus la bab kyang mkhas pas slar sbyar cig/
256b2(rnying rgyud): nyams bskur la gdags pa'i sar ni slar mkha' dbyings dang lnga nyid gsang ba'i 'gro 'du dbang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed la gdams so// de la bsgral tshig ni/ shar phyogs bde wang pho brang nas// nges pa'i chol dbang bskur zhing // sku mdog dkar mo sgeg ma la// sun
256b3(rnying rgyud): dung gi len tshar can// 'od zer dkar po phyogs bcur 'phro// ma chags thabs la mngon par rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la shel gyi ga'u bskyil// g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje rtse dgu bskams// g.yon gyi phyag ni ga'u nyid la brten// rdo rje che gsum shang phyogs dbang du spyad//
256b4(rnying rgyud): ga'ur nges pa'i cho ga dmas so// lho phyogs bde thong pho brang nas// nges pa'i cho la dbang sgyur ma// sku mdog sngon po sgeg ma la// nor bu rin chen len phran can// spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs mdzad ma// 'od zer sngon po phyogs bcur 'phro// gnyis su med pa
256b5(rnying rgyud): thabs la rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la rin chen ga'u bskyil// g.yas kyi phyag na nor bu rin chen ke ke ru// g.yon pa gzhu nyid la brten// nor bu rin chen ke ke ru// lho phyogs 'dzam gling dbang du spyad// rin chen ga 'ur nges pa'i cho ga dpyas po// nub phyogs
256b6(rnying rgyud): klong pho brang nas// nges pa'i tshe la dbang sgyur ma// su mdog dmar po bsgyings pa la// / spyan gsum bye 'u'i yin phran can// 'od zer dmar po phyogs bcud 'phro// mi len thabs la mngon par rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la byi ru 'i ga 'ur bskyil// g.yas kyi phyag
256b7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i ga'u brtsegs pa bsdams// g.yon gyi phyag na ga'u nyid la brten// pad+ma dgubartsegs du ba phyogs dbang du sdud// b+hu ru'i ga 'ur nges pa'i tshe gdams so// byang phyogs bde klong pho brang nas// nges pa'i tshol dbang bskyar zhing // sku mdog ljang gu sgeg ma la/
257a1(rnying rgyud): s+thAn gsus dza'i lan pan hA// 'di zlar ltung gra phyogs brdar 'gro// thub pa'i thabs la mngon par rog// gsang ba'i mkha' la rdo rdo 'gabab sgril// g.yas kyi phyag na rdo bsdums// gsod pa da kyang
257a2(rnying rgyud): brten// rdo rje n+ya grum byang phyogs dbang du sdud// rdo rje'i gzung nges pa'i chog dmas so// steng 'og bde grong po brang nas// nges pa'i tshul mnga' mdzad ma// cir yang 'gyur ba'i sgra mdog la// spyan gsum lan phrin cing yang 'phro// zede 'gA' gsu sa
257a3(rnying rgyud): ral pa can// 'od zer sna tshogs gling bzhir 'phro// gnyis med brten pa'i thabs la nges par rol// gsang ba'i mkha' la g.yu yi ga'u bsgril// g.yas kyi phyag na du mtshon shing bsdams shing // g.yon pa g+han+tar k+Shas bkang nas ga'u nyid la brtuH
257a4(rnying rgyud): ru mdung shing gi g.yang gzhis sdang srid thams cad dbang du spyad// g.yu yi ga'ung nges pa'i tshe gdams so// de nas bad+ma dbang du bsdus la/ snying po'i ga'u phyes te/ nges pa'i byang chub sems la gdams so// dngos grub ni gsang ba banod do// @
257a5(rnying rgyud): gdams pa'o// cha son bdag la rgyas par bya ba ni/ gr-I la a dkar po/ mo la i dmar skyes byin gyis brlabs la/ thabs deng shes rab kyi 'gro 'du khrel dbab/ de nas tshartags mngon par bstim/ der bsgrims nas rtags dang mtshan ma sna chags su dang /
257a6(rnying rgyud): deng snang shing gsal ba'i ngo bor 'byung / de la 'khor kyang de bzhin te// yi ge brgyad kyang 'khor bar bzhag/ las kyi bum par snyim par byed// des ni phung po yang dag rgyas// gzugs na rdo rje rab pas// che bar byin gyis brlabs nas su// rtsis kyang mi 'jigs
257a7(rnying rgyud): brtan par bsgom// de ni nus par bya ba'o// tshe sngags mkhan la bsrub ni// bdag nyid che ba'i lhar bsam ste// 'od kyi 'brong du yang bsam la// rgyun mi 'chad par gyes pa yis// dbyings la sogs pa'i thugs dam bslang // nges pa nyid du gnyis su gsal
257b1(rnying rgyud): pas/ a dang e gnyis rgyun mi chad par gyes pas/ mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga yi thugs dam bskang // gcig nas gcig tu gnas gyur te// 'dren pa'i phyag rgyas gsal bar drangs// gsang ba nyid du 'du bar bsgom// bdag nyid rin chen dkyil
257b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// thugs ka'i ngo bo gsal bsgom ste// shes rab dbang gi mchod pa 'bul// dngas ma'i lam du byung nas ni// ye shes sras su bzhag nas ni// ye shes sbas pa'i tshe zhes bya// tshig tu yang / khro bo'i thugs las bskyed pa'i 'gro 'du ni/
257b3(rnying rgyud): A yur+t+ta na bin du a ni thabs kyi sku// A yu r+d+ha na bin du dza na shes rab gsal// thabs kyi rang bzhin sku mdog dkar ba la// yum gyi tshom du 'od lam lam// g.yas na rdo rje thugs kar gsor// g.yon pa mkha' la chags pa'i g.yab mo 'dor// yum
257b4(rnying rgyud): gyi sgra mdog le brgan la// dgyes pa'i rtags su gser gyi 'od zer 'gro// phyag g.yon rdo rje ga'u bsnams// g.yas na le brgan g.yab mo 'dor// srid pa dbang sdud yab kyi thugs kar snyims shig bin du dza/ de ltar thugs la mchod pa phul nas/ dpal
257b5(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor tshogs kyis bskor te bzhag/ 'phel 'grib brtan pa'i cho la don la rnam pa lnga ste/ brton pa'i tshe nyams ma nyams pa brtag pa dang / nyams na dgug pa'i thabs/ khrugs nas bsrung ba dang rgyas par bya ba dang brtan par bya ba'o// de la tshe nyams ma nyams brtag
257b6(rnying rgyud): pa ni// pra dang mtshan ma lhas dang mo bya yan chad kyis brtag go// nyams na 'gugs pa'i thabs ni bdag nyid dbang gi he ru kar bsgom la thugs kar ye shes kyi 'od zer spros la/ tshe yi ma mo rnams bskul te dgug go// dgug pa'i dngos po ni yi ge nr-i las hU~M du dmigs te/
257b7(rnying rgyud): lcags kyu'i phyag rgyab drang ngo // hUM sher phyogs b+ha ga'i klong yangs su// 'byung ba'i lag tu tsho nyams pa// dri za'i lag tu dpal nyams pa// de yi po ga bskyod mdzad de// su mdog ser gyi sun ga/ sus ral ba can// phyag ma g.yas na lcags bya dbus gtams shing
258a1(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa gar sta bas g.yab 'dod ma// 'byung po'i laganas cha drangs la// ji za'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ lho phyogs b+ha ga'i klod langs su// gshin rje'i lag tu chanyams pa// srin po'i lag tu dpal phrogs kyang // da ya !
258a2(rnying rgyud): bskyod mdzad de// sku mdog sngon mo spyan gsum ral pa can// g.yas kyi phyag na lcags kyu dgus gtams shing // g.yon pa gang thabs g.yab 'dor ma// gshin rdo'i laganas chodrangs la// srin po'i lag nas dpal skyobs shig/ nub phyogs b+hag klong sangs su/
258a3(rnying rgyud): yi lag tu tshe nyams pa// yi dgas pa gtad pal phrogs na// de yi 'o ha bapyod mdzad de// sku mdog mtshal du spyan gsum ngal ba can// g.yas kyi phyag na lcags kyu dbus gtams shing // g.yon pa gang stab g.yab 'dor ma// klu yi lag nas tsho drangs la/
258a4(rnying rgyud): dwags laganas dpal skyobs shig/ byang phyogs b+ha ga'i klong yangs su// gnod sbyin lag tu che nyams pa// bgegs kyi lag tu dpal phrogs na// de yi pho ta bskyod mdzad ma// sku mdog lja gu spyan gsum ral ba can// g.yas kyi phyag na dril bu dgus gtam
258a5(rnying rgyud): shing // g.yon pa gar thabs g.yab 'dod ma// gnod sbyin lag nas tshe drongs la// bgegs kyi lag nas dpal phyobs shig/ steng gi b+hag klong yangs su// ya bdud la gnas tsho nyams pa// rgyal 'gong lag tu dpal phrogs na// de yi phra ti brtsod mdzod de/
258a6(rnying rgyud): mdog dmar po khrag gi ral pa can// nyi bu stan du mdzad pa'i mthu mo che// g.yas kyi phyag na zhing gi g.yang gzhi bskyams// g.yon na tshangs pa'i mgo bcad khrag 'dzag bsdams// yang dud laganas tshe drongs la// bgegs kyi laganas dpa' phyobs shig/ rog phyogs
258a7(rnying rgyud): de'i slong langs su// sa bdag la gnas kyigams pa// ma ba rga lag byud pa rdzogs kyi// de'i la nyid byi ma nam// nanamatshan ma pa ba na// g.yas kyi phyag na'i shul du ru ba rnams// g.yon pas kya gas bkang ba bsngang sa// sa bdag
258b1(rnying rgyud): lag nas tshe drodus la// ma bdud la gnas dpal skyobs shig/ mtshams bzhi b+ha gzung bzhi la// btsan 'grong gnas nas tshe nyams pa// 'brog srin lag tu dpal phrogs kyang // dwe yi bo d+ha bskyor mdzad ma// rin chen srid 'degs mdzes pa'i za ma rtan
258b2(rnying rgyud): g.yonan du ga ci zugs// la rnagasul pas to// bcan gang laganas mi tshungs pa/ zlog sbyin la gnas dpa' byabs shig/ brda la sbyi brdzun / denas nyas ma byur te/ nas pa dang/
258b3(rnying rgyud): b+ha ste/ 'phel 'grib kyi tshe rten la bsdus te/ tshe rten ci yang rung ba gcig la bstims/ de nas badz+ra shing gi gi ri gI ri zhes brjod do// tshe rdo rje'i gur du gyur pas bsgom mo// de yi nang du tshe hUM mthing sbyar dmigs te/ khro be ha ya grI mas bsrung bar bsgom/ gur gyi
258b4(rnying rgyud): phyi rol du mgo brnyan ma brgyad bsgom la/ rgyas gdab pa'i tshig bshad byas la rgyas gdab po// tshig tu yang / srid pa rgyas 'debs dbang phyugang yi rtsa// de nas gnyis med rol pa'i bde mchog yum gyi bya// de nas mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgya// rang byu byas gdeb las
258b5(rnying rgyud): mkhan rgyas thob shig/ ces banod la las mkhan mos rgyas gdab po// rgyas par bya ba ni tshe dpa' bo 'bru lngar dmigs la phung po lnga la bsdus te/ de nas rgya gram gyis glo bgo// de nas rdo rje chung bas bka' nan bya/ de'i sngags ni/ sarba mi ti tri kA btson pa/ rdu
258b6(rnying rgyud): rota gA ts+litra/ bskul ba ni ngas pa'i tshe dang mthun no// rdorje rje'i leb ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i bang chen thabs kyi ni// dgrang gogs thun lanab pa pa'i las// mngo ni rdzogs yab la bdag
258b7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' cu / gnyin ga gsung chung yang dag pa/ dgra bgegs thun mong ba po do// de'i bcul tshig 'di skad do// TI gseng kyinam ma'a'amang ba byung dkyi' na// gseng mtsholo mo byung de byang diganas// gsang
259a1(rnying rgyud): sa thA gas nas// mang rgyams mags na// gnam sun samags sa rgyasas banasapa// nag par ngas dbang rnams// nan la dzin pa da// gas na na
259a2(rnying rgyud): dpral ba'i mtshams sra brdeg/ tshe dang srog gi rten phral ma// gcig ni mig gi dkyil du brdeg/ lta ba kun gyi bzung 'phrog ma// gcig ni kyi yi dkyil dus rdeg/ smrab dag gi dbang spyad ma// gcig ni dpung mgo gnyis la brdeg/ stobs
259a3(rnying rgyud): snyan gyi rtsal 'phrog ma// gcig ni snying gi dkrol du bdeb// chosog gnyis kyi dbang spyad me// gcig ni po mtshan dkyil du brdeg/ ste shi gnyis kyi rabs gcong ma// gcig ni pus mo'i dkyil du brdeg/ 'gro ba kun gyi dbang snang ma/
259a4(rnying rgyud): yin ma mkha' sngon po phyung dpyad // mnga' bdag rngo mosu bzhugs na// nam mkha' ga yu yi ga yu sku zhugs// phyag na ga yu yi zor ba ston pa bsdams// dngul gyi nam mkha' dkar ba phyung nga phyang // mnga' bdag rje mo su bzugs na// dngal gyi btsu
259a5(rnying rgyud): zas 'khrugs// phyag nad du la zong dkar mo bsdams// zangs kyi nam mkha' da mang po zung dbyung // mda' bdag rje mo sra bzhugs na// zangs kyi rje dmar mo bzhugs// phyag na zangs zong dmar po bsdams// lcags kyi nam mkha' sngon po byed dkyil na// drag
259a6(rnying rgyud): nan po kyad dkyil na// mnga' bdag na mosla bzhugs na// srog ga bdud ma chen mo bzhugs// sder ma chu mang pos kyi rgyas 'dzin// snying gi rgya chen dkrug cing ba// ma mo mkha' 'gro las kyi dus// stag gi mgonan ma moni// rdzas mya gsum pa cudrug cu
259a7(rnying rgyud): 'dras// 'phrog cing 'gred pa'i sa ma yin// las mkhan chen mo las mdzod cig/ chud bdag chen mos cung baphrul tshig/ ma mthor ma kharda chen mon// tsan pa ni'i sngags blo zhing // mu stegs phung po bshig byed ma// 'joms mtshan mo med 'phrog/
259b1(rnying rgyud): ma na tu gyu tu ga dun tun ma na/ gyu sa du ma nadu du
259b2(rnying rgyud): na
260a1(rnying rgyud): tid byangs bshad do// de la dang go khrag zo 'di ltar btang ba ni// dngu 'a phyogs dag por gdus gyung ba nag/ ga phyogs ldan pa dang bugs dang chu bzhag/ 'angs phyogs da yang daH rdza snar lab d+hag/ gas
260a2(rnying rgyud): dang mangs dri dar bzhag/ gser stsogs ser por bkrag dang mdangs dang sha chen bzhag/ sde tshe dang lan tshwa dang / nyung nag la sogs pa gang bya ba spon cing stsal lo// de la bskul pa'i tshig 'di skad do// hUM dngul stsogs dkar po ru// bdud
260a3(rnying rgyud): dmar chen// brag zugs shing // zor ngo shar du zor// 'phang ngo shar du 'phang // ma mo shar gyi mnga' bdag mo// shar bdud choms shig rnam snang gsal// btsan la sbyar cig rdo rje dbang mo che// dgra bo tshoms shig sbas pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// ge yu phyogs ljon
260a4(rnying rgyud): bo ru// bdud rtse chu sbyar cing // dmar chen khrag blugs te// zor ro byang du zor// 'phang ngo byang du 'phang // byang gi ma mo b+h+yo// byang bdud tshems shig yang gsal g.yol// btsan kha sbyar cig las kyi dbang mo che// dgra bo choms sheg sbas pa'i ma mo tshags//
260a5(rnying rgyud): zangs sgyogs dmar po ru// bdud rtsi rak+ta sbyar// dmar chen khrag zugs shing // zor ro nub tu zor// 'phang do nub tu 'phang // ma mo nub kyi ma mo b+h+yo// nub bdud choms shig gnyen gsal ma// btsarga baspyad cig pad+ma dbang mo cha// dgra bo choms shig sbas pa'i
260a6(rnying rgyud): mamo'i tshogs// lcags skyogs nag po ru// bdud rtsi mAM saM sbyar// dmar chen khrag blugs te// zor ro lho ru zor// 'phang ngo lho ru 'phar// ma mo lho yi ma mo b+h+yo// lho bdud choms shig 'od gsal 'bar// btsan bsgyur cig rin chen dbang mo che// dgra bo tshems
260a7(rnying rgyud): shig sbas pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// gser stsogs ser po ru// bdud rtsi chen po sbyor// dmar chen khrag blugs te// zor ro 'og dang steng du zor// 'phang ngo stong dang 'og tu 'phang // mamo sted 'og ma mo b+h+yo// ya bdud choms shig bkrags gsal mnyam// ma bdud choms shing

261a2(rnying rgyud): brgya tshar gcig ni brgya byin pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni srin po pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni brtan ma pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni dbang ldan pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni gri sri pho mo gnon// brgya tshar gcig ni tshar ba'i pho mo gnod// @

261a4(rnying rgyud): lcang lo bsnams// brgya tshar gcig ni sha chen zhal du bstab// brgya tshor gcig ni rdo rje mgo phur 'dril// brgya tshar gcig ni tsan+dan bir chen gsor// de la dmar gyi ar+g+ha sbreng zhing stsal la/ snying po 'di skad brjod do// ma ma ru ru traM ga shig/ ma ma ru ru b+h+yo/ gu ru ma

261a7(rnying rgyud): ma/ mthong no// tu na/ ga na to/ mi'o

261b3(rnying rgyud): us pas/ nga/ a thas pa/ a than// a than ka/ a than ta/ a thas/ gas man/ gas maH/ gas bes m+b+ha/ bag no'i ma sa can/ bag mo'i mche ba can/ lung ka'i mchu ba nam/ lhang ka na nas/ mamod ldan
261b4(rnying rgyud): ste nyi thaH lnga ba'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po gshigs pa dang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen su dgral// bskal ba'i las rnams ma bstan pa// sangs cas dka' dim btsa rnyid / grwa rtogs son
261b5(rnying rgyud): mthung rangs// nal byeng sgrub po dman par nges// 'di dag rnams pa phan ga dgas phyir// das po bskal ba'i las blan// dang ba dang ji ltar 'thal// ma rdzogs pa pa bdag nyad 'chag// yad dag rdzogs pas bku' tho // de bdags sa gagasunas
261b6(rnying rgyud): snar// mngon rdzogs rgyal pas bka' stsal ba// sgrub la bar rtsod byed padung // nal 'byor dgra dang dum 'jal la// dgra po lha dpral ngas bstan gyi// nyon cigag phung drung yang dag pa// drag po'i las 'di ma bstan na// log pa'i lam 'byo drug pas/ don
261b7(rnying rgyud): nyid drungs bstan gyi// dang po dbang bskyar bka' thob cing // srang 'di nyan zhing bsgom bsgrub skye// 'di mi tags dang dngos rgyab dang // las la blas dbang thob nas// thugs rje'i dbyang thag chad pa dang // ngan so gnas su skye nges la// tshaga'angs 'di bya thab sade/
262a1(rnying rgyud): byag dang drug da// zag pa'i na na // sa pa/ du ga // ga 'anas ma// gcig sud pa ra ga/ gnas pazugs sa/ ga tsam ca gdangs/
262a2(rnying rgyud): banadu 'thab cu gabyug pa ni// sngags ming rnams ni zapa bzhag/ dam pa mi da ga thug pas gnon// byang dgaman tho nyag s+ho// gog shog can gang tha bzhig// ngog nas byung ba sngags thos pa// ga zug pa'i bar drug tu// do srung na
262a3(rnying rgyud): nas ni// shang ring rtsel btags nas ni// rlung po che la 'thung tu gzhug/ bdag nyid ches chog slar bsgom la// / par ni sngags ni ci mang bzlas// ma mjugar mar khyed ma dragar mar pa/ yungs kar gyi tshe hAl nag la// sngags brgya rtsang rgyad bzlas nas rba/
