268b2(rnying rgyud): bskal ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa ste// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar te gcig/ phrag dog rlung ltar 'tshubs te gnyis// 'dod chags chu ltar gtams te gsum// gti mug ri ltar spangs te bzhi// nga rgyal ba se ltar khengs te sa?// ser sna rtsi ltar 'byar te tra~Mka/ @
268b3(rnying rgyud): khro chu 'dra ste bdun// gsod gcod sen po 'dra ste brgyad// 'phrog rlom srin po 'dra sted dgu// chos phyog kha dpon byed dang bcu// 'di dag bskal ba'i dmigs yin te// 'di dag bskal bar ma brtsams na// snying rje dmatshig nyams par 'gyur// ngan por ste ga
268b4(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur// bla med zar lam stongs par 'gyur// 'di dag bskal ba'i las brtsams na// rnal 'byor mthu stobs mthu dpung btsan// sgrub la bar chad byed pa med// las ngan 'phro bcad dmyal yun drung // bla med thar pa'i bde sgo/ phyed// ngan song 'khor ba ga
268b5(rnying rgyud): spangs// bstan pa srungs shing gang zag btsun// nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'grub// bskal pa'i dmigs bstan pa'i le'u ste sum hA rtsa brgyad pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bskal ba'i las rnams brtsams pa yang // na
268b6(rnying rgyud): babyor mtha' dag gang brag gi// kun gyis brtsanas na 'grub mi 'gyur// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' myol cig/ de skad gsol bags na nas kyang / nyag gcig yab kyis bka' skal pa// rnal 'byor gang zag mang 'dag
268b7(rnying rgyud): gis// bskal ba'i las rnams 'brib mi 'gyur// ngas pa nyid rjes bskrad kyi// nyan cig g.yung dung yang dag pa// nal 'byor gang zag sA dgu dang // kun gyis brtsam par ma gsungs te// thos pa chung la man ngag med// 'dzin rtog che dang blo sngar bas/
269a1(rnying rgyud): sa rnams tha shAs/ klu skyed ce // ngan mas ga gas/ ga pa pa / ga zlas// dmana' la ma tho// na da/
269a2(rnying rgyud): mi skye// dam rdzas ma tshogs rdzas dang bral// 'asgoms la mi brtson ras chong byed// grong du ma glar bston thabs byed// bas 'di pa rtsams kyang mi 'brab ste// rang gi 'bras bu rlag par byed// chos nyid thol ma grags shing // brtag chung bas ladzu 'phrig cos// ba
269a3(rnying rgyud): rtags phyag rgya ma byin zhing // dbang bskur gnang ba mthob pas// las 'di brtsams kyang mi 'grub pas// tshe dang srog gi bar chad 'ong // nyams dang sdig la mi 'jom pas// snying rje'i 'am dang bral ba yis// brtsams kyang 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// dang brdung/
269a4(rnying rgyud): dang theg pa dman// slob dpon me dang bka' bton pa// des ni gdon rdzol med pa tsam// bkra 'jig che dang tshor gyen dang // smyo rkyen kun rkyen bur lud kyis// bas 'di brtsams kyang mi 'grub ste// slar yang phog chos yin zhes bdogs// gting nas thag bcang mi
269a5(rnying rgyud): 'azu bas// dbyor dang sgra bod ce 'dod pas// las 'di ba rnams kyad mi 'asrung ste// slar su rtson can long zhes bzur// bsgom dang sgrub pa sran thung zhing // zhag grang po blar mi bsring la// bsnyen dang 'arab kyi blangs byung bas// byas kyang bas di mi thab te/
269a6(rnying rgyud): sbyar yang sgo sems sde bar 'gyur// rlung dang mchod pa'i 'bul zhing // dmathas gtsoru mi len pas// byas kyang las 'di mi 'grub ste// slar mang sman mo'i bka' cad thong // cho ga'i las 'di brtsams pa yang // thos pa tshe dang man dag thob// 'din tog cung dang blo ting
269a7(rnying rgyud): hrul zhun sa chen por ldan pa yis// las 'di ba rnams na 'grub 'gyur te// rtog pa'i gang gis mi tshogs te// dam tshig mnyams bka' brtan dang // sdig can ma yin grims 'byin dang // bcad tsam ma yin shugs phyung na// rtsol zhing brtsams pa 'brab bar
269b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// smad cing bkol bas nyan par 'gyur// des ni bskal ba'i las 'grub cing // lidi rang chos pa dang bskyed// dam rdzas bdud rtsi stan rdzogs dang // rdzas dang lag cam thal zhing // bzhom pa brtson pa dang zhing // ra cod drug thub ma yin par// yid ces la gsen rdo/
269b2(rnying rgyud): 'brengs pa/ gachos nyid mnyam pa'i slong gyur te// las dang brtsams bgo 'byed pas// des ni rtsams kyang 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi 'bras bu mi sgrib cing // bskal ba des kyang mtho ris thob// chos nyid zab mor blo zhugs shing // lte ba mthon pos btsod ste// sems kyi
269b3(rnying rgyud): 'phrig mnor zhing // rdo rje slob dpon po ldan pa// chos la dad pas lung thob po// bkas rtags phyag rgya byin pa dang // dbang bskur gnang ba thob pa yis// las 'di bcwa sman 'grub 'gyur te// tshe srog par chang ma 'od ste// pha rol dmigs te bskag par nges// nyams dbu ma
269b4(rnying rgyud): 'dres dam tshig gtsa // sdig chen rnams dang mi 'grogs shing // snying rje'i lam dang ma bral bas// brtsams na 'bras bu thob pa yin// dad pa che dang theg pa mtho// slob dpon rim pas gnyan pa dang // des ni 'grub par the tshom med// sems kyi 'khu 'khrig chung ba dang // tshor
269b5(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyo rkyen mi byed cing // sun gyen sur lung med pa yi// brag la bur pa btang 'dra bas// las 'di brtson na 'akrung 'gyur te// tshe srog par chod mi dor ste// man ngag yin zhes 'di la bsngags// gting nas zag bcad sgrub pa dang // dbyor dang spa ru mi gtong bas// che 'byin//
269b6(rnying rgyud): khengs bslangs nas ni// gsang zhing bsgrub la brtson pa dang // ma yengs 'dzab bzlas brtson pa yis// las 'di brtsams na 'grub 'gyur te// rnal 'byor kun kyang btsun par byed// bsgom dang sgrub pa yun ring zhir// zhag grangs lo zla grangs mang par// bsnyen dang 'job bzlas
269b7(rnying rgyud): grangs ma ngab// byas na las 'di 'grub 'gyur te// 'gyod sems med cing btsun par 'gyur// phung dang gtsang ma'i mchod phul nas// so so'i dam rdzas gtsor len pas// byas na las 'di 'grub par 'gyur// dman mo'i chad pa mi 'ong zhing // gang yin bka' bsgo bran
270a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyan// skyon yon gnyis ka 'don 'ad yin// kun la bstan par mi byazhing // bla bus bya ba ngas ma gsungs// nal 'byar spyan yon gyi ba skye skyes bu \u0f7f gra pas// gad dul sgrangs pa gso /
270a2(rnying rgyud): du chog brtan dang / daci gagams pa'i tho mas dang // datsog zung ngojigan tad nga / mi 'angagre nga sa dmas/ dpe do pa na rags rjegs ba bdag na // 'ang rdzog sa pa
270a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal pos bshang du gsol// de ga gso 'gas nas sa// nyag cig la bkyis bkung thal ba// ba tsag stsog na dang // bkra shan pa sa bstan gyi// cigag nga ba dgapa/ cig tu / da pa mams pa
270a4(rnying rgyud): snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // dmachog 'di la ba rten nas 'thab// da ltar bathugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // dan chog dri ba nanas 'acug/ rbad kyis pyod pa'i song rgyas kyang // dmachog 'di ba rte na 'brab// dpyir dam cig thog na pade// phyirabs sngags sacha pa
270a5(rnying rgyud): bar 'grangs// dmacho dris gzhi // sa la byed rdzas kun rtse rnyed// dmamigs gzhi ma pa'// sgra dang me napa byed pa byed// caba'i ngachog gsum po dang // yun gdam chog tu rnams pa// mungangs bsrung na sangs rgyas yin// de bas 'dang nasems can
270a6(rnying rgyud): yi// dam cigag tung bzhin 'grang bas// man rnaMs kyang slog na// gang nye sgo ba nyanan/ nyid nu 'chis// nyayang dang ngas pabya // rab byor dang sa smos dgos// da rtsog zhin kyi nyes// kun pa dang rgyams yang dag pa da
270a7(rnying rgyud): 'ad ba das byed no// datshig bden pa'i 'gro sa kyi sa chu sa/ na/ myo kyi/ su sa byung dang / srin nang ma byed pa ba
270b1(rnying rgyud): mas mas pas// klags dang shAg rnyan das// gakunas ngos su brjo 'dug/ byas sa pas gags na// nga gabang bang ma pa rnams// kun du pa ga gang // bya ga na pa dad /
270b2(rnying rgyud): thag tu ston cing 'chad// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// zang zing nor gyi mthong 'dod kyi// snod med kun la skyes byas na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// rdzas dang lag na mngon thogs nas// pha rol gzhan la sdib byed na// de yang nyams pa'i sa rtags
270b3(rnying rgyud): sha khrag gtor ma mngon sum du// mi nag mang po'i sar bstod na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// drar khrod dbenas mi bsgrub par// grong khyer na dang ri ngos su// rnga s+tha b+h+yo yi sgra 'don na// 'di yar nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// nanA dag gteng nas mdzod
270b4(rnying rgyud): rtags dang mtshan ma mabyin par// ag tsha kha yis ngoms smin na// 'di yang thams pa'i sngartags yin// dus sA byung ba ma gtogs pa// tAl khrab phyung ngo blags nas// mi nag dkyil du drang brdung ba// 'di yang nyams pa'i ga rtags yin// dzig
270b5(rnying rgyud): pa rnabs dang mi ldan par // kha nas su srin gnyen pa 'dod// 'di yang nyams pa'i sngardugs yin// mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma pa// babyud nas sbyor bam brtsams na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// lasangan sngon can mdzang sa tshogs napa// pram
270b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i zhing bzlum bskal na// 'di lung nyems pa'i brtags yin// demachog nyams pa'i blon rnams ni// cha ba dis tshig gsam nyams na// rdo na myu bar skye bar 'gyur// de 'a sdug bsngal bcod byug med// mchod bangs drug ma nu te// bas byiHga cam bzu sa
270b7(rnying rgyud): na// 'di yang nyams pa'i bdags yin// de nas bskapa ra mi srid// yan lag ma chog su nyams na// 'di yang nyes pa snga 'ong // phyis kyang na dag dmyal bar skye// mnanan no thogs pas brdung // 'ogs nas sna thogs pas gcod// zhab rnas
271a1(rnying rgyud): na sgyu na// gang / sags//
271a2(rnying rgyud): yang // dam tshig nyams pa'i bdud du babs// ma mo kun kyang gshed du 'ong // tshe dang srog gi bar chad 'ong // bci 'pho dmyal ba'i gnas su skye// de ma tshig 'de la ma gnas na// brtsam pa mi 'grub mya ngan ston// brngu bas kyang dngos grub rtags mi 'ong // bka'
271a3(rnying rgyud): gsang dam tshig gzhung bor nas// phyi nang sde snod mtha' dag dang // rgud dang tan tra ci bshad kyang // de yis 'grub par ngas ma gsungs// lhar yang rang sems brlag ta re// dam tshig nyams pa'i skyod bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//
271a4(rnying rgyud): dmachog bsrung ba'i yon tan ni// ci bsam las rnams 'grub gyur te// mkha' la 'gron bya bzhin 'phur// chu la 'dzul na nya bzhin 'phyo// sngags kyi dngos grub ci 'dod ster// rig 'dzin rnam gsum gang bsgrub bgrub// rang bzhin ma mo rang bzhin byams// srin
271a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma mo bran bzhin nyan// ci bgyis bka' nyan 'khor bzhin 'khol// mkha' 'grom chen 'khor bzhin 'dra// dngos grub rnam gsum rim bzhin thob// tshe dpal dbang thang bsod nams 'phel// 'byor pa kun tshogs longs spyod ldan// ma sring kun kyang
271a6(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin khur// dgra bgegs kun kyang gzhob bzhin 'dul// bstan pa kun kyang rang bzhin rgyas// dam tshig 'di dag gtsor len pas// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// kun tu bzang po yang dag bzhin// sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso chen yin// rgyal ba kun gyi lam
271a7(rnying rgyud): yin zhes// kun tubabang pos yang dag bshad// dam tshig bsrung ba'i 'on tun bstan pa'i le'u sde bzhi bcus gnyis pa'o// / dam tshig bsrung ba'i rim pa ni// rdo klogag dpon bka' nyan zhing // man dag ston pa khrur byed cing // rdon kul po sagar thar/
271b1(rnying rgyud): yum gyi dbang ma ma ltar bgyur// rgyal thebs kan bu ltar bkur// mched dang yu ma thal bu ltar bkur// bstan pa don bzhin gsung rtogs na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// nyin dang mtshan du dus med par// thugs dang phyag rgya rgyun med par// ma yengs//
271b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don brtson na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// gsang thub man ngag batsho mkhas dang // yun du brten pa des che ba// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// nyan pas ma thos pa rgyang skyed nas// 'du 'di'i dbang du mi gtong dang // rtag tu sgrub la brtson byed na//
271b3(rnying rgyud): yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// gab pa'i gsang ba gting phyin cing // spras pa'i gsang ba'i gzhung thub na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// slob dpon mnyes pa phul byas na// dbang rnams rim par nod byed pa// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// dam rdzas yo byad tshogs
271b4(rnying rgyud): byas nas// gzhung bzhin ma nor sgrub byed na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// pha rol dam nyams dgra bo la// kha chos smon 'jug mi zer bar// gsang zhing 'dug nas las brtsam pa// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// dkyil 'khor brtson 'grus shugs phyung
271b5(rnying rgyud): nas// mi nag bca' khar mi gtong na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma la// byin rlabs sbyor ba rtsom byed na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa la// dpyad thag chad pa bskul ba ni// 'di yang bsrung
271b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rim pa yin// mchod pa dus drug rnams su 'bul// las kyi phyag rgya gzhung bsrang na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// dur khrod dben sar sgrub byed cing // rtags dang mtshan ma mngon sum du// ma phyin par du mi gtong na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// gzhan pa
271b7(rnying rgyud): phyar 'tshong mi byed cing // gcom bskyungs yon tan tshogs sbed na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// gzhan yang yon tan mtha' dag pa// gzhung nas bstan pa kun spyod na// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// dam tshig bsrung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//
272a1(rnying rgyud): gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol ba// ma mo'i sprin sreg ji ltar 'bral// nyag gcag yab la bdag nyan 'chahA// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol bags nA nas kyang // ngomatshad zhwa yis bka' stsal da// nyan
272a2(rnying rgyud): cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// dang po phun sum tshogs ldan nas// rdzas dang yo byad tshogs byas te// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // phrin las rnam bzhi gang byed pa// rdzas dang kha dog de bzhin bsgyur// ho ma khur yum gyi gzhal yas su// hom shing yab
272a3(rnying rgyud): kyi mkha' brdzangs te// gnyis su med par me sbar nas// ye shes rang bzhin dman mo rnams// cho ga gong nas 'byung ba bzhin// me dpung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// spyan drang phyag 'tshal bzhugs su gsol// rdzas dang yo byad kun thogs la// mchod pa 'a13/
272a4(rnying rgyud): ba 'di skad do// hU~M kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha' dbyings su// kun tu bzang po yab kyi shing brdzangs nas// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me sbar la// che mchog he ru spyan drangs gdan pa bzhengs// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// dam rdzas bdud rtsi
272a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// skye med byang chub sems kyi mchod pa bzhes// yab yub gnyis sra med pa'i me sbar la// yum gyi rgyal mo spyan drangs gdan la bzhengs// bzhi zung zhabs brgyad 'bar bas phyogs mtshams gnon// ye shes klong yangs 'armiHla pa'i hom
272a6(rnying rgyud): khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// dam rdzas bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa 'bul// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsid ma rdzas mchod pa bzhes// skye med chos kyi
272a7(rnying rgyud): dbyi kyi dngos grub stsol// ye shes klong yangs dkyil pa'i ho mkhrang du// b+hung lnga dag nangs ma lus kun spangs te// sman dang bdud rtsid mdzes mchod pa bzhes// dmanyams dam bslangs mthu dang dngos grub stsal// yab yul gnyis med sems kyi me skar te//
272b1(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i rgyal mo 'dir gshegs gdan la bzhengs// sha rus bdag mo nam snang gsal// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// spyan dang bdud rtsi dab rdzas mchod pa bzhes// blang ba pa yi dngos grang yul drugs la// ye shes klong yangs 'azil pa nyos thang
272b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud la bag chags ma lus kun spangs te// sran dang bdud rtsing ma rdzas mchod pa bzhes// dam nyams dam bskang mthu dang dngos gru batshul// yang yum gnyis med sems kyi me sbar te// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'dir gshegs gdan la bzhengs// dbung/
272b3(rnying rgyud): kyi bdag me ma mo yang gas la gsol// 'bang ba me oM gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang ma rdzas bdud ci mchod pa bzhes// 'byung bzung gi dang sa grub thul du gsol// ye shes slong yangs 'khyil pa'i gam khyung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma sras kun stangs
272b4(rnying rgyud): te// sra dang bdud bye dmangs mchod pa bzhes// das nyams dam bskapa mthu dang dngos gru'i snrel// rab skur gnyis med sems kyi methar te// drug pa'i rgyal lo ldan 'dzin gdan la bzhongs// khag gi bdag mo ma mo gnyen gas pa 'bang// 'ab ba me'i
272b5(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas nang du bklags// sran dang bdud rtsi dmardzas mchod pa dbra'// dbyung ba rgya yi dngos grub stsam du ga song// ye shes 'od yangs 'akyil pa'i nyom thang du// chud snga ga chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud ci mnas mchod 'bul gyi// das nyas pa sa
272b6(rnying rgyud): bsangs ma tha dang ngam thu b+h+yo// yab gram ga ces med sems kyi men pa/ dag pa rnasas sa che ga nam shi // do kyi bdam mo dgas pa 'du// 'ab ba la yi gzhal las nang rgyags// ska dang bdu cingasanas mchod 'phral ni/ @
272b7(rnying rgyud): 'apo'i sa grub rgyam du thos// ye shes thong 'das 'gyel ba'i nyim ldang du// rgyangs bag gas mgrus kun sbyangs te// nang rgya kya mdzes mchod 'phrul ze// ngam nyams dag grangs mthang ngas srung stsos// yab sram gnyis med sems kyi mtha //
273a1(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i rgyal mo spyan 'dren gdan la 'azhugs// bzag dang mdangs kyi bdag mo bkrag gsal mnyam// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dum rdzas mchod 'bral gyi// 'byung ba nam mkha'i bkrag
273a2(rnying rgyud): mdangs dngos grub stsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i ho ma khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs ma thu dang dngos grub stso la// yab yum gnyis med mkha' dbyings 'bar
273a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i ho ma/ gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me sbar te// rang bzhin ma mo spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// yongs kyi ma mo phra men rgya mtsho ma// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud ci dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// srid pa'i dbang sgyur dngos grub
273a4(rnying rgyud): la du gsol// ye shes klong yang sa 'khyil pa'i ho ma khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dad bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub sgrol// yab yum mkha' dbyings 'brel pa 'bar ba'i ho ma//
273a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me sbar te// rang bzhin ma mo spyan 'dren gdan la bzhugs// dbang sgyur ma mo spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// gling bzhi dbang sgyur dngos grub
273a6(rnying rgyud): stsal du gsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khrang du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma gras kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bral gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum mkha' dbyings 'brel ba'i ho ma khung du//
273a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me sbar te// khros pa'i rgyal mo spyan 'dzin gdan la bzhengs// rdo rje nyi ma thos pa'i dbang mo che// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// ma bzhi dbang sgyur dngos grub stsal du gsol//
273b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes grong yangs 'khyal bdi hom khrang du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun spangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// pad+ma khrag 'thang khros pa'i dbang mo che// rdo rje badra khros pa'i dbang /
273b2(rnying rgyud): rdorje khams gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// ma bzhi dbang sgyur dngos grub sbrul du gsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khrang du// rgyad lnga bag chags ma lus kun spangs te/
273b3(rnying rgyud): sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bral gyi// da ma nyams dam bskangs mthu dang dngos grub stsol// yab yum mkha' dbyings 'brel pa'i hom khung du// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me sbar te// phung byed ma bzhi spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// phra men sbas pa'om
273b4(rnying rgyud): mo dbyings phyug ma// gung byed sbas pa'i ma mo gcig pu ma// phud byed sbas pa'i mamo rgyan gyi rgyal// phung byed sbas pa'i ma mo bdag nyid ma// babar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// da ma nyams dang bskangs mthu dang dngos
273b5(rnying rgyud): grub srol// yang yum dbyings dang 'brel ba 'bar ba'i hom// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me sbar te// gsang ba'i dgyes sde spyan 'dren gdan la bzhugs// dkar mo mig gcig rgyas bde bas ma// nag mor la gcig rmongs mdzad ma// nub kyi dmar mo phud byed ma/
273b6(rnying rgyud): byang gi ser mo las mkhan ma// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// byang chub sems kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i ho ma khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags mabu sa kun sbyangs te/
273b7(rnying rgyud): sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam pa rkang mthu dang dngos grub sgrol// yab yum mkha' dbyings 'brel pa'i ho ma khung du// srid pa'i rgyal mo spyan 'dren gdan la bzhugs// a byi chen mo srid pa chags byed ma// srid pa cha snyoms ma mo shAm
274a1(rnying rgyud): sa kun// ma / na/
274a2(rnying rgyud): rgya zi pa gsus kyi dngos srung rgyam// le shes grong 'dus 'khyil pa'i gas khrung ngu// chud lwa ngag chags ma zas kun kyangs // sma dang bdud ci dmangs mchod dbrub kyi// ngas nyams dang pa sade'i da ma bya// rab su ma
274a3(rnying rgyud): babrel pa'i hom zad du// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi me sbar te// dman mo ma bdun spyan 'dren gdan la 'khrugs// rdo rje kun grags sman 'dren gshegs su gas pa// kun tu bzang mo spyan 'dren gshegs sa gsol// rdo kun gsal ldan 'dzin
274a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// rdo rje ye shes mchog ma spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// rdo rje 'ong chag spun 'dzin gshegs su gsol// rdo rje gas la 'gro spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// rdo rje ga suM sgron spyan badren gshegs su gsol// 'bang ba po yi gzhang
274a5(rnying rgyud): yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bral ste// dmanyams dam bska mthu dang dngos grub stsol// ye shes slong yangs la khyi la re'i ho mkhrang du// skad lnga bag chags ma lngas kun spangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod
274a6(rnying rgyud): bzul gyi// dam nyams dam bgrang me thA dang dngos grub byol// sisrid pa dmar mo sman chen gdan pa bzhengs// rid chen sring 'degs ma mo mamag// ma/ lo tshig 'dzag pa momathu maH// gling bzhi ste 'grom mo many+dzu rA// rdo rje zhig mos rdzus ma// badz+ra
274a7(rnying rgyud): gang bye dang byug sacu nas/ bdag can mo ba / 'ab bum pa sa na ci bajugs/ nang 'du byed mangs sa da dras // dag nyams ngam pa dang mthung dngos bu gyu// sa gas tha~Mng 'angs gargyas batshangs kyang sa
274b1(rnying rgyud): rlung pra bag chags ma thas kun sbyangs te// sman dang badrad rtsi ngam mas mchod 'brul kyi// ngam nyams dam paskang mthu dang dngas thub rdul// yab sam gnyis mang dra'ang 'bar ba tam// gnyis myeng byang chubasams kyi me sbyar to// bu 'dug sub rnams
274b2(rnying rgyud): spyan 'dren gdan la bzhugs// byang shar shAn ting dkar mo gshegs su gsol// shar lho dran ting nag mo gshegs su gsol// lho nub har ting dmar mo gshegs su gsol// nub byang grub ting ser ljang gshegs su gsol// 'bar ba me yi gzhag yas
274b3(rnying rgyud): nang du bzhugs su gsol// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskrang mthu dang dngos grub stsol// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khrang du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod
274b4(rnying rgyud): das thams ma nga da sanapa shAnamam thad da ma / sa pang kyang rgyab sems sahU~M/ sa kyirgyapa dzin gangan la bzhis// gang bye 'i mam gri gdags/
274b5(rnying rgyud): nag mo kha yal ma// nub kyi dmar mo ma chu 'jib ma// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// 'bar ba me yi gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi dan rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskang mthu dang dngos grub stsol// ye shes
274b6(rnying rgyud): klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du// rgyud lnga bag chags ma lus kun sbyangs te// sman dang bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod 'bul gyi// dam nyams dam bskad mthu dang dngos grub stsol// sring mo bzhi rnams spyan 'dren gdan la bzhengs// gling bzhi mgyogs ma
274b7(rnying rgyud): lha yi sring mo dang // mkha' mkhyung lding gshin rje'i sring mo dang // dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring mo dang // nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring mo dang // 'bar ba me yaM gzhal yas nang du bzhugs// sman dang bdud rtsi ngam rdzas mchod 'brul kyi// da
275a1(rnying rgyud): da ma nga sa na ldan na gas / nas rdzus/ nga sa sa nga 'du na
275a2(rnying rgyud): sgrol// nyi hu rtsa brgyad kyi mchod pa gzhan dang mthunano// sbyin patheg mchod pa'i san ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi la// gnod 'dul na yis yang ga stsol pa// mam sgrub pa'i gzungs ma la// gaN+Di gling ba ltar ba gyi// ma rdzogs me la 'dag
275a3(rnying rgyud): 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de sang gsol ba gsan nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// gzungs ma sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid dungs bshad rtsi// nyon cig gaskyer bung yang dag pa// gang bsla ba gzungs ma'i
275a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid la// so so'i mtshan yod rnyed nas ni// dgon pa chen por brtsam par bya// cho ga'i las rnams rdzogs nas kyang // sbyor ba'i las rnams brtsam pa ni// g.yon phyogs dag tu yum bzhag la// dang po sun dang zhal gyi brda'// mig 'akum ma chu sbed
275a5(rnying rgyud): brda byas la// gzhan yang brda skad sna tshogs spras// de nas yum gyi spyan srings nas// yab la chags pa'i snyom bag bya// de nas yab kyis gsos pa bskyed// nu ma mnye zhing mtshan khung brdeg/ yum gyi chags pas yid g.yos nas// yab
275a6(rnying rgyud): ma mkha' dbyings byin gyis bcwag// sum gyi gnas sa ngag nani// Tanga? nyaM traH yA gad// nga zhes dazang nas gzung ba bya// hUM zhes gnya nas 'khyud par bya// bzhis stod skang bsdam par bya// ha~MHmis yab yum bslang bablod nas//
275a7(rnying rgyud): gis gral nas kyang // b+h+rUM gis byang chub sems bskyed do// dgyes pa'i ro rnams btang nas ni// dkar dmar 'dres pa'i sems dag la// dkyil 'khor lha gsal mamed cing // bdag nyid dngos grub dam par blang // 'don sbyor ba'i thung
275b1(rnying rgyud): bstan// gaN sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// thugs dam bskang ba'i rgyu rnams la// bskal ba'i las rnams ci ltar bgyi// mngon rdzogs yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rga
275b2(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// thugs dam bskang ba'i sems can la// ta na bsgral ba ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can 'di//
275b3(rnying rgyud): skyes phyir na bsad mi rigs// sems can 'khor ba phung por 'khor// dmyal bar 'khyam pa rtog pas 'khyams// phung po chos kyi dbyings su bsgral// chos kyi dbyings la ma zhes bya// rtog pa ye shes mchog bya ba sgral// ye shes mchog pa mo zhes bya// ma
275b4(rnying rgyud): mo'i dkyil 'khor gas la bkod nas// bsgral na skyon med bde chen thob// mtha' yas sems can thams cad ni// skyes kyang yum lnga'i mkha' la skyes// gnas kyang 'byung lnga'i mkha' la gnas// 'chi yang 'byung lnga'i mkha' la 'chi// don la bsgral dang ma bsgral med//
275b5(rnying rgyud): bsgral bar bstan pa rol pa yin// rol par bstan pa phrin las yin// phrin las 'byung po tshar bcad nas// skye med chos sku'i dngos grub len// des na bsgral pa gtso zhes bsngags// dang por sems can gang bsgral ba// 'khor bar zhe bcang rgyal gzhab bya// rgyas
275b6(rnying rgyud): gang ba byas nas rnam rtog bral// rnam rtog bral na chos nyid rtogs// des na sras la dkyil 'khor dgor// dkyil 'khor bkod na bde chen thob// de nas ma mo'i thugs dam bslang // thugs dam bskad na dgyes pa bskyed// dgyes pa bskyed na mnyam nyid thob// de nas
275b7(rnying rgyud): yongs la bstab pa bya// bstabs pas bdud dang dgra bgegs bcom// bdud bgegs bcom nas bsam pa 'grub// des na rgyu drug srog rtsa gcod// srog rtsa bcad nas 'khor ba stongs// de nas tsit+ta sems blangs nas// sangs rgyas sras su yaM gis
276a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ 'phang // thugs kyis ngan song sgo bcad nas// byin brla ba dbang bsrur sras su bskyed// 'di ni bskal pa'i lung zhes bshad// tanA bskal ba'i mthu ste bzhi brgya na drug par// gnod 'dras pa 'is yang
276a2(rnying rgyud): gsol pa// ye shes rang bzhin dman mo la// za byed bstab pa ci ltar bgyi// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'chol// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // mngon rdzogs rgyal zas bka' skyes pa/
276a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang bzhin dman mo la// ra byed bstad pangs bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// rnam rtog dgra bgegs bstab pa'i phyir// de yi bsrul tshig 'di skad do// hUM ye shes ma mo zhal phyes shig/ rnal 'byor tshogs kyi rngo mo la// sras
276a4(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal mo mu kha le// 'gro ba yongs kyi skye gnas yin// thams cad yongs kyi tshe srog bdag/ bzhi zur zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams gnon// dbu gcig zhal lnga gdengs pa la// rnal 'byor dgra bgegs zhal du bstab// dug gsum ma lus stongs par
276a5(rnying rgyud): mdzod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ sha rus bdag mo rnam snang gsal// dgra bgegs sha rus 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor sha rus skyed par mdzod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ dbugs kyi bdag mo zhal gyis shig/ dgra bgegs srog dbugs
276a6(rnying rgyud): 'di bzhes la// rnal 'byor srog dbugs brtan par mdzod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ khrag gi bdag mo gnyan gsal ma// ngag bgegs khrag rnams 'di bzhes la// rnal 'gyor khrag rnams 'phel bar mdzod// drod kyi bdag mo 'od gsal 'byar//
276a7(rnying rgyud): dgra bgegs rnams kyi drong ba zhes la// bdag gi drod rnams 'phel bar mdzod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo zhal gyes shig/ bkrags la bdag mo bkrag gsal 'bar// dgra bgegs bkrag mdangs 'di bzhes la// nal 'byor bkrag mdangs 'phel bar mdzod// rang
276b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin ma mo zhal byas shig/ bra men rgya mtsho zhal gyes shig/ dgra bgegs phung po zhal du bstub// bdag gi phung po nad med mdod// rang bzhin ma mo zhal gyes shig/ nyi mthod zeng zhal phyes shig/ dbang phyug ma mo zhal phyes shig/ dgra bgegs
276b2(rnying rgyud): rnam shes zhal du bstab// bdag gi rnam shes gsal bar mdzad// rang bzhin ma mo zhal phyes shig/ phung byed ma bzhi zhal phyes shig/ dbyings phyag ma mo zhal phyes shig/ rgyan gyi rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ bdag nyid ma mo zhal phyes shig/ gcig
276b3(rnying rgyud): bu ma mo zhal phyes shig/ dgra bgegs yan lag zhal du bstab// bdag gi yan lag bde bar mdzod// rang bzhin ma mo zhal phyes shig/ khros pa'i ma mo zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje nyi ma zhal phyes shig/ pad+ma khrag 'thung zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje srid/
276b4(rnying rgyud): gsum zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje khams 'tshogs zhal phyes shig/ khros pa'i rgyal mo bzhi yi zhal du bstab// dgra bgegs gzugs bzhi zhal du bstab// bdag gi gzugs bzhi bde bar mdzod// rang bzhin ma mo zhal phyes shig/ thugs kyu dgyes/
276b5(rnying rgyud): sde zhal phyes shig/ dkar mo mig gcig zhal phyes shig/ nag mor la gcig zhal byes shig/ dmar mo dbang sdud zhal gyes shig/ ser mo las mkhan zhal phyes shig/ dgra bgegs yul gzhi zhal du bstab// bdag gi yul gzhi bde bar mchod// srid
276b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i spyan mo zhal phyes shig/ srid pa chags byed zhal phyes shig/ srid pa cha snyoms zhal phyes shig/ e ka dza ti zhal phyes shig/ ma mo spun gnyis zhal phyes shig/ ma mo bdun rnams zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje kun grags zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje kunags pa
276b7(rnying rgyud): zhal phyes shig/ kun tu bzang mo zhal gyes shig/ rdo rje kun gsal zhal gyes shig/ rdo rje ye shes zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje 'od chags zhal gyes shig/ rdo rje 'od 'gro zhal phyes shig/ rdo rje g.yu sgron zhal phyes shig/ rin chen srid 'degs zhal phyes sheg
277a1(rnying rgyud): smra/ shAn ga nga zlug/ b+h+ya na m+b+ha// m+b+hag man // nga gyu/ / kun sa / sa// da sa ts+tsha
277a2(rnying rgyud): shig/ shan ting dmar mo zhal phyes shig/ grub ting ser mo zhal phyes shig/ gru 'degs rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ dkar mo mche ga tsog zhal phyes shig/ nag mo kha hal zhal phyes shig/ dmar mo chu 'ji ba zhal phyes shig/ ser mo dang ldag zhal gyis shig
277a3(rnying rgyud): dmag gi rgyal mo zhal phyes shig/ lha yi sring mo zhal phyes shig/ gshin rje'i sring mo zhal phyes shig/ glu yi sring mo zhal phyes shig/ gnod sbyin sring mo zhal phyes shig/ sring mo chen mo bzhi rnams zhal phyes shig/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad zhal gyes shig/ 'di dag zhal
277a4(rnying rgyud): phye gzhan dang mthun// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad la// dgra bgegs nar rol skal tshigs rnams// sman mo'i tshogs kyi zhal du bstab// bdag gi phyi nang bde bar mdzod// rol cig sbrul cig ma mo'i tshogs// chings shig sdoms shig ma mo'i tshogs// rA
277a5(rnying rgyud): yis dam du sbas// phaT phaT phaT kyis rol bar mdzod// kha kha khA yis zhal du bzhes// khams gsum dgra bgegs stongs par mdzod// sgrub la bar chad byed pa rnams// thal ba bzhin du med par gyis// sa ma ya mA ra ya khA hi zhes brjod do// za byed bstab
277a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas yab mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos/ blta ba'i man ngag gi le'u 'di bshad do// phung po khams dang skye mched kyang // ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// kun rdzob tsam gyi mtshan ma ru// chos sku
277a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan mar brtags pa ste// ye shes rang gnas rol pa yin/ phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kyang // kun tu bzang mo'i dbyings kyi rgyan// kun tu bzang po'i thugs kyi rgyan// kun bzang yab yu ma rol pa las// phyi nang ma lus thams cad sangs rgyas so// mtha' la
277b1(rnying rgyud): thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med// dbyings la g.yo ba med pas chos su 'gyur ba med// don dam dbyings su bltas pas ltas dgu de dag gsal// thams cad sems su rtogs pas gang bslab sman gyis thub// rnam rtog mang yang med pas gang bskang gcag pa/
277b2(rnying rgyud): has// thabs mkhas rol pa yin pas 'khor ba'i skyon ma gos// thugs rje byang chub yin pas thar pa bde chen thob// kun gyi bdag nyid yin pas ma mo'i rang bzhin 'khor// bde chen rgyal po yin pas 'khor gyi rje bo yin// thams cad bdag la byung bas kun gyi 'gag
277b3(rnying rgyud): po yin// nga rgyal gder du che bas 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul// thugs mchog thugs spras khams gsum yongs su ldir// thugs rje'i byams ldan nyi ma'i 'od bzhin shar// mi rtog gnyen po thabs kyi rgyal po 'byung // 'khor ba'i gtan po rang byung sangs rgyas
277b4(rnying rgyud): te// bdag dang sems can thams cad chos kyis bya ba'i sku ru gcig/ mi tog thabs kyis gnyen po 'di yi don rtogs na// ma mos rga dul bar bya ba gzhan na med// nga khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i don rtogs na// dgra bgegs bsgral zhing tshar bcad bya ma dgos// de 'byams
277b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan med klong gi dbang rdzogs na// rgyal byed rtags kyi phyag tu sgrub mi dgos// phrin las bya btsal klong yangs ye nas 'das// bsgom bsgrub dkyil 'khor bya ba ci yang med// 'di ltar man da gtogs pa gdeng gyur na// bsrub kyang skyon med ma bsrub 'gal ba med//
277b6(rnying rgyud): bsgom kyang skyon med ma bsgoms 'gal ma med// bskal kyang gyon med ma bskal 'gal ba med// bsam d+ha med de chos spri nam mkha' 'dra// sgom du med de rang byung klong nas shar// bde 'byams dbying phyug yum gyi rgyal mo yin// ma bkas ci bder yin bkye yab kyi
277b7(rnying rgyud): mkhang // sems la ga yang me tog rang byu hU~M// thabs las gang yang ma gags ma bcos spro// don la gang yang mi rtog chos kyi sku// chos kyi sprul skye shi g.yos pa med// 'ab gyur med pa'i slong la bcol zhing bsgrub du med// ye shes byang
278a1(rnying rgyud): sems su bdag togs na// 'du 'dzi byis pa'i rjid mos ci zhig bya// mi 'ad sngon si ma tshig spang byed na// nyon mongs pa de sdug mya ngan ce la spyad// thabs mkhas rol pa'i ting 'dzin shar ba pas/ nga po 'ang pol
278a2(rnying rgyud): bslab cil bya// phyi nang snod brgyad thig ler sangs rgyas na// gzhan nas bcol zhing sprin du gcig kyang med// skya ba man ngag gi la'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas yab mngon rdzogs rgyal pos/ 'di chen byang chub sems
278a3(rnying rgyud): le'u 'di bshad do// 'di skad ces gsungs so// snod kyi 'jig rten ma bkag yum gyi dbyings// brgyad kyi 'jig rten ma bkag yab kyi mkha'// yab yum mkha' dbyings ye nas rol pa las// bde chen byang chub sems su ye nas sangs rgyas so/
278a4(rnying rgyud): phung po khams dang skye mched ma lus pa// ma mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ye nas yin// yin pa'i don la rig pa gsal dgod na// bde chen byang chub sems su ye nas sangs rgyas so// sems dang ye shes dus gcig sangs rgyas na// rtag pa'i ye shes
278a5(rnying rgyud): sems kyis sangs rgyas kun rtogs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// 'khor ba'i rgyu nyid thar pa'i lam gyi sgras// sdug bsngal rgya nyid chos nyid byang chub sems// ma spangs lhun gyis grub pa'i don rtogs na// bde chen byang chub sems su
278a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas so// chos nyid kun tu bzang po'i rig pa la// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa mnyam// sangs rgyas sems can sems nyid gcig tu mnyam// rtogs dang ma rtogs sgyu ma'i ngang du mnyam// rig dang ma rig chos kyi sku dang mnyam// mnyam nyid rgyal
278a7(rnying rgyud): po'i don la ma yengs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// nyon mongs dug lnga ye shes lnga ru snang // 'byung ba wa po chos kyi dbyings su mnyam// dbyings dang ye shes 'brel pa'i don rtogs na// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// ye shes
278b1(rnying rgyud): ma mo rang bzhin ma mo dang // sman mo la sogs mang po'i tshogs brjod kyang // bdag gis byin brlabs ma mor snang ba las// gzhan nas ma mor grub pa ci yang med// bdag sdang gzhan 'khol kun tu bdag yin te// bdag nyid g.yos na gyi nang sdod bcud g.yos//
278b2(rnying rgyud): che ba cen 'gran gyis dro med pas// yang la thogs med bde 'byams rgyal po la// bde chen byang chub sems su sangs rgyas so// bde chen dang la 'dzin rtog brjod du med// bde rten byang chub sems su sangs rgyas pa'i le 'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o//
278b3(rnying rgyud): de nas yab mngon rdzogs rgyal pos/ rgyud yongs su bzung ba 'di bshad de/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// gsang thub bka' brtan nges pa dang // bden par smra zhing yid mi 'gyur// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya// brtags shing rgyud 'chad brtsen 'grus che// drad la
278b4(rnying rgyud): sa na
278b5(rnying rgyud): bla mo dang tshig 'jom pa'i don gyis// spyod pa thogs chags med pa dang // dam tshig spangs len med pa yis// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// nyan cing bsgrub la brtson pa dang // 'du 'azhi'i dbang du mi gtong bas// brnag thub bzod che nges pa dang // yongs la yi gnod
278b6(rnying rgyud): tshul sran pas// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// lung med pas kyang mi gtong zhing // slob dpon rig pa stod 'dub// des ni yongs su gzung bar bya// rang shes chu tshong mi byed cing // btags shing las rnams brtson byed pa// des ni rgyud 'di gzung bar bya// nal 'byor sman dang mi
278b7(rnying rgyud): 'bral zhing // rdzas dang pag cha thogs pa// rgyud 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// dad pa stong la med pa dang // gyo me dub pa med pa yis// rgyu 'di yongs su gzung bar bya// dbang bskur gnang ba lung thob cing // rtogs shing shes pa gyogs 'byams pas// rgyud 'di yongs
279a1(rnying rgyud): suH/ sa gzung bar bya// btags na thama'i chung ba byud// bzhon na byas pa mtha 'dungs// rlud dpongs sugabyung blta// rgyu mongs sa ga cang ba'i btug pa dru du / de nas nyaganod 'dras kyis gsol pa/ ngang /
279a2(rnying rgyud): gcig lags// snod de dang mi ldan pas/ bzung du rung lags sam/ zhes gsol bas/ mngon rdzogs rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ snod de dang mi ldan pa/ d+harma snang 'tshong byed pa dang / chos dpe'i tshongs pa byed pa dang / man ga zang thal du sla ba dang / ba
279a3(rnying rgyud): des na ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung 'di// kun gyi thun mong ma yin te// snod med rnams kyis bcangs gyur na// bdag dang 'gro ba gzhan kun brlag/ des na 'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud// ces bstan to// de nas lha gnod 'dul gyis gsol pa/ ma mo'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar brla/
279a4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol pa dang / yab mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ ma mo'i dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni/ dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin// rim bzhin rim pas gtsel bsdu// zhes bka' stsal to// rgyad 'di snod med la bstan pa'i skyon dang / dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i le'u
279a5(rnying rgyud): ste lha bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas mngon rdzogs kyi rgyal pos/ lha gnod 'dral la bka' stsal pa/ bstan pa'i snying po ngam pa 'di// rgyud dang lung dang man dag dang // phyogs dang gal por bstan pa yi// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung chen po 'di// de
279a6(rnying rgyud): gnod 'dul khyod kyis bslus// 'jig rten gsum bu grags par gyis// blta spyod sgrub pa tshang ba yi// ma mo srid pa'i tan 'di// de ba gnod 'dul khyod kyis zung // rtsa ba gsum du sbas par gyis// zhes bka' stsal pas/ gser gyis glegs bam du bris nas/
279b1(rnying rgyud): lhaganod 'dul la gta da// staganod 'dral gyis cu ba chen po gsum du mas so// de skang rgyas rton pas bka' stsal bas/ ya shus kyem ma dang / phra men du mtsho la sogs pa rang bzhin gyi ma mo dang / a gyi chen mo pa sogs pa srid pa'i spyan mo rnams kyis/ sbra
279b2(rnying rgyud): med pa chos kyi ro myong nas/ gsang ba dgyes pa'i mchod pa phul nas/ rang rang gi dam tshig nos nas/ zhabs spyi bo la blangs so// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung chen po las/ lha gnod 'dul la rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o//
279b3(rnying rgyud): ma mo srid pa'i rdzogs srung chen mo 'bras bu nges par bstan pa'i mchog/ kun bzang thugs kyi lung rjen 'di// skyes mchog 'ga' yi lus yin te// kun la srel bar ma gsungs so// ma mo 'o chos 'di sdig bsras kyi zhes dbyung na yang / bong rgyal du bsgyur ba la/
279b4(rnying rgyud): 'di las lhag ma ma lus par yid ches pa'i rgyud khungs dang / dbu spang ba zhes so// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung gi rgyud phyi ma'i dpe rdzogs so// / dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po dang / yu ma rig pa'i rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
279b5(rnying rgyud): gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa las/ sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig 'jig rten du 'byung bas na/ sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rabs bdun dang / brgyad pa shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la/ ba
279b6(rnying rgyud): bskal pa brgyad cu ru 'byung ste/ de yang stong gsum du gnas pa las/ stong chung ngu dang / stong bar ma dang / stong spyi phrad do// de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje'i snang ba las/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab gcig gi don bshad na/ shes rab chen po'i rgyu
279b7(rnying rgyud): las rlung rdzorje rtsi tham g.yas s+ya bsgril cing 'dzubs pa las/ dbus rdo rje gram la/ mtha' mag zhu 'od ma'i dbyibs ltar gnas pa/ steng 'og dang phyogs mtshams su dpag tshang sa ya drug 'bra ma yod pa/ thugs rje'i byin gyis brlabs las/ rin po tsho
280a1(rnying rgyud): mar gyi kun gnywa shing chus nam mkha'as 'dus pas/ chu dkyil 'bar blam pa 'bram phrag gcig tu chagasate/ shes rab kyi drung dang snying rdo'i na gnyis bslabs pa las/ dbang can gsur gyis gzhang pag ma ga stong ba cabs/
280a2(rnying rgyud): te/ de'i steng du ri rab dang gling bzhir gnas pa ni/ ri'i rgyal pori rab ni rgyu rin po che sna snga las grub ste/ rgya mtsho la mar dpag nad brgyad ji nub pa/ yar dpag tshad bcang khri yod pa/ mchur dpag tshad 'brar trag 'i yod pa/ keng du dpag tshad badz+rad rje/
280a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' gor dung bag chang sram 'bum gyi khri yod pa/ de la gache gyi'i bdun gyis bskor rigs te/ gnya' shing 'dzin la dpa gcid pa ni khri yod pa/ gshol mdang 'dzin pa nyi'i/ sor ldeng can 'arje/ kun dgu pa lnga stong / rtang don la ting bkrang
280a4(rnying rgyud): su khrud 'dzin pa brgya tu cam/ name du 'drenas drug drun byed dang gsus yod/ gling rjen po bzhin/ shar gyi lus 'dags po dag cad sum bcus brngub/ bzang tung dri stong phras byed bcad/ ba'i rten ni dang theg drug/ ngangs du tha~Mng gidos gsusu la byor
280a5(rnying rgyud): zag gnyis gnyis gnas pa ste/ de'i bar kyi snying brgyad ni// lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan// sgra mi spyan gyi tha dang ni// rnga lab dang nirnga lab gzhan// g.yo lan dang dri sam 'jog 'go// ting phrag byed dang gnyis gnyis gnas// ri rang byam pa'i rnyed na ni// dru
280a6(rnying rgyud): rlurtsagasum snyan mas kyi// grong khyer stan drug ci bya// mar dpag cang nyis stong sra brgya'o// zhing dudu'i tshad du gcas// mtha' gror dpag cad nyi po yod pa/ gser gyi bas bskor// rab 'i bang dud pagatsang byeng dang gsum yod pa/ grong khyer del ni stong drugs
280a7(rnying rgyud): sa ma thos pa da do// me tag sa dang nga gas ma bsapa/ man desapa brteg na bar ba la 'ongs slo nga// de shing gag cang byed dang zhin/ 'ang payang rnam pang rgyal bzhis kyang yod de/ mnam drang dag ca brgyas rgyam dang/ mtha
280b1(rnying rgyud): dpag tshad stong yod pa/ de'i them skas dang / ka lo dang / ka rgyan dang / gdung dang / dral bu/ thams cad gser dang / dngul dang / baiDUr+ya dang / shal las grub pa'o// de la gser gyi ka ba sum cu rtsa gnyis/ g.yu yi lcog dang
280b2(rnying rgyud): cu rtsa gsum gnas te/ bag ma re re'i rdzing na ka ba sum cu rtsa gnyis/ g.yu'i lcog la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnas so// grong khyer de'i sgo na glang po me rab brtan zhes bya ba yod de/ de la gser gyi mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis/ g.yu'i mgo bo dang sum cu rtsa gsum yo/
280b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bskyod cing bzhon pa'i glang yin te/ mtha' skor la dpag tshad stong yod/ grong khyer de'i shar phyogs na shing ke ke ru tsan+da na zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i rtswan glang po ches srung zhes bya ba/ kha rlangs kyis lha ma yin gyi rgyal po ri nag po thab
280b4(rnying rgyud): ba rdul du rlag pa dang / sna nas 'od ma'i ral gri chu zheng rgyang grags yod pas/ lha ma yin gyi g.yul thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin no// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi shar lho mtshams na/ chos bzang lha'i mdunas zhes bya ba yod de/ mchu zhing du dpag tshad sram brgya la/
280b5(rnying rgyud): mtha' slor du dpag tshad dgu brgya yod do// rgyan ni gong dang 'dra la/ de ni lha'i mdun sa yin no// de na lha grags ldan mchog skyong zhes bya ba gnas te/ mig g.yas g.yon gnyis nyi ma dang zla ba cu gnas te/ de'i 'od zer gyis lha thams cad kyi mdun ma sdud pa/ thugs ka nas
280b6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi'i bum pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa gcig gi nang nas/ g+ha rnams la bdud rtsi'i longs spyod 'gyed pa zhig yod do// lho nub mtshams na shing sna tshogs kyi tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ ma chu zhing dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu la/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod par
280b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi'i khrus kyi rdzing bu yang yod de/ shing rta chen po'i steng na lha'i chub po mdog bzang zhes bya ba gnas te/ lha'i bu mo ut+pa la zhes bya bas/ lha'i rgyal po la khrus byed cing me tog man der ba zhes bya ba/ mchu zheng du rgyang grags re yod pa'i mchod pa 'bul lo//
281a1(rnying rgyud): rngab zung gi mtshams nas gan babang ba zhes bya ba pa dang / mdu gang dradabug tshad nyis bcwa sgru bcu ya pa / mtha' gang du yang pa/ dan tA thal pa brjing gzhan zhes bya ba gnas / 'ar nga por tha
281a2(rnying rgyud): gyis bskor ba/ sa gzhi las yid bzhin gyi bdud rtsi'i longs spyod nang nub du mi 'dra ba bcu brjid sprul pa'o// byung shar mtshams na chub 'gyur sti tsa zhes bya ba yod / ma gu zheng drid dpag tshad bdi ldab yod pa/ da mas sma dpag tshad brgya
281a3(rnying rgyud): de na gnod sbyin lcang lo can kyi bdag po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i bo nas mi chen cha'i 'khor lo'i char lha ma yin la 'bebs pa'o// nub phyogs na 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya ba ya de/ de na du bdag gi rgyal po ma ga ta zhes bya ba gnas pas/ shing a b+ha ka zhes bya ba la b+ha
281a4(rnying rgyud): bu po dang / bu mo thams cad brdzus nas skyes te/ longs spyod mi 'dra ba sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed do// byang phyogs na dga' ba'i tshol zhes bya ba yod de/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ lha'i bu mo mang po la mig bltas pa tsam gyis 'jig
281a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dga' bas tshim pa yod do// byang phyogs na shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes bya ba'i tshal yod de/ rtsa ba dpag tshad lnga nur du zugs pa/ 'bang du dpag tshad brgya yod pa// yal ga la dpag tshad lnga bcu yod pa/ mtha' skong du dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu yod pa/
281a6(rnying rgyud): den b+ha'i bu srid pa bran mkhan zhes bya ba gnas te/ bdud d+hi de la lha thams cad kyis longs spyod byed // shing de'i rtsa ba na a mo li ga'i rdol ba ces bya ba'i tshal gnas te/ mchu zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du nyis brgya yod pa/ de nas lha'i
281a7(rnying rgyud): mgad bab shA kar ma thab yod de/ nyis me shal las ni ma'id 'ang la brdungs te/ l+h+wa ma yin gyi dbang po zags zangs ris kyi rked pa gcod pa/ zlab chu shel zhes byabs lha'i sbas ma thams cad gso bar byed pa'o// shar phyogs gser gyir gtes

281b2(rnying rgyud): nyis brgya lnga bcu yod pa/ mtha' gong dra dpag tsud stong yod pa/ nub phyogs na sman mig babang gi pothang / pad+ma rAg dkang po la thub pa/ maru sheng dra dpag cing nyis pa rgya lnga bcub/ mtha' dor spong yod pa/ byang phyogs na rngan thos sbas kyi

284b1(rnying rgyud): motAM chung ngas bshad pa/ man gnyid na chog gi ngan yod pa// chog gdon gcig rgyal bas bshad dugasas// zhes zhus pa la/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ rgyud kyi don 'di yan ngag nyid du dgrol// man ngag rdo kyang po 'ad lta rtse// pra khrid lag cha ba
284b2(rnying rgyud): pa sde gsum dang // me bzhi gcod pa'i 'khor lo nyid du bshad// mai tri chung ngus gsol pa/ gab pa sde gsum don ni ji lta bu// ma bzhi gcod pa'i 'khor lo ji ltar lags// zhes bsnyad pa la/ phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ gab pa ste gsum don//
284b3(rnying rgyud): ni'adi ste ste/ gting dpag med pa'i 'khor lo la gab pa dang / bzlog pa mo'i 'khor lo lagab pa dang / mkha' klong thun gyi dakhor lo la gab pa dang / gcod pa 'khrul 'khor las la gab pa dang bzhi ru bshad/ gtso 'khor steng du bslang ba'i ma'u sa
284b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa'o// / sprul pa rgyan gyi don ni 'di lta ste// ru tra bsgral ba'i sa gzhi la// khrag gi rgya mtsho gru gsum ste// lha ma yin gyi gzugs snang ste// srog rtsa dmar po sbyi nas drangs// rdo rje sprul pa bya khrung gis// bsgral ba'i tshul du
284b5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa ste// de nas che mchog he ru kas// yum gyi dbu ru sku ston te// dbu yi sprul pa'i pho brang la// lha srin la stsogs sprul byas nas// oM shrI he ru ka kro tI shwa rI hUM/ li khra kha dur dza dung phaT/ yab kyi thugs las 'od 'phros pas// 'og gi yum
284b6(rnying rgyud): la bskul byas pas// yum gyi sprul pas lha srin bskul// khri phrag 'bum gyi 'phro 'du byes// sprul pa'i pho nya las la mngag// thags zang ris kyi 'khor rnams bsdus// srog rtsa dmar po spyi nas drangs// oM shrI he ru ka kro tA rA dza dur dza dza/ drangs
284b7(rnying rgyud): nas zhol du bsgrim par bya// / khong du bsgral ba'i las bya ste// bcu drug dakhor los gtub par bya// tri ti kha ti ru tsa khang bA tu pi ni la nu ma tsakra rbad phaT/ bsgral thabs dgu yi sngags kyis gzhom/ kha thun snying la yam/ dz+wa li raM la thun rbad/ li kra hUM/ kha Ta phaT/

289b1(rnying rgyud): dam sa'i srog rtsa chen po bzhi// 'od zer tsa tsha 'khrug dar sgo// dam sri rnam shas brgyad kyi rten// srin bu ma khyer 'dra ba de// sngags gzer nag pos gcod cing gsad// re re la yang stong rtsa brgyad// 'khor lo gnad la pheb pa dang // 'gong po dbu du dun+do/
289b2(rnying rgyud): byas te// dur solas sbyin 'dres pa yi// bu trazla ba mon pa'i gzugs// gnyis kyi lto bar dril la gzhug/ mchod rten nag po'i mang gi 'og/ gong bzhin mnan la 'khor lo bskor// kha 'bang dag po las rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ gcod pa'i 'khor lo'i
289b3(rnying rgyud): bye brgyud pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dro khrag 'thung gis phyagan rdo rje pa 'di skad ces gsungs s+ho// gnod sbyin ldang lo 'dus pa'i gzang nas// rdegs pa 'joms pa'i kyathas 'bar ba can// bstan pa mi dzu bcos kyi 'khong po btor/

289b6(rnying rgyud): da ces bya bajogs sa// gang dang/ ma matan rgyam ne nas/ bod skad du/ mamo'am byud lung zhes byub/ dum mu la pe la phyug 'du 'o// d+hi da bdag gis bos pa'i dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das dpazhin gshegs pa ma
289b7(rnying rgyud): da kye spyang dag sung dang / thugs do brgya mo'i phyag gas te/ de'i rtsonam mi ba'a' zin pa rtsogs pa dang gzugs rdzogs pa zung ste/ 'jig rkyen gyi sraba'i lathogs pa las la gnas pa'i mabar dgro ma rtogs thams cad ni dag pa ti
290a1(rnying rgyud): sbrukha la la sogs pa'i rtsa la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang / yo gas kyi kyi kha la la sogs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang / 'phags pa spyan nas gzigs la sogs pa byang chub rnams
290a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang / kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos dang rang rgyal pa thams cad dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la sogs te lha thams cad dang / sgra gcan la sogs lha mo yin thams cad dang / nyi ma lnga sos
290a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang / smin drug la sogs pa skar ma thams cad dang / ha ri ka la sogs te gnod sbyin thams cad dang / lang ka mgrin bcu la sogs te srin po thams cad dang / gzhan yang lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / lha 'dre gnyen bcu las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan
290a4(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad spa dang gzugs des bskul nas yum chen mo mu kha le dang / yab mngon rdzogs lha'i thang du 'dus par gyur to// de nas 'jig rten pa kun gyi yab dang yum gyi sku mdog dang rgyan la sogs pa de dag gis 'jigs shing skrag ste 'dur zhing dngangs bzhin du 'khod do//
290a5(rnying rgyud): drang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ yab dang yum la ngo mtshar cad skyes te/ sgra la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga tshogs pas mchod de/ kun gyis bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gnas so// de nas yang nam mkha' las sems can ma mos 'dul ba spyi mthun gyi smon las dang / las dang ta thA ga ta'i
290a6(rnying rgyud): de'i sprul pa'i ngang nyid kyis sgra chen po sna tshogs byung nas/ yab mngon rdzogs lha yi rgyal po bskul lo// de'i tshe 'jig rten 'dir yangs cher g.yos te sems can long bas gzugs mthong ba la sogs bkra shis pad+ma tshogs kyang byung ngo // de nas yab kyis yum la sems can gyi drug gsum rnam
290a7(rnying rgyud): pa byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ ha ha dang te te 'i sogs pa'i rol pa'i gsung dang sram ben po su kha'i la gsol pa/ ma mos 'dul ba'i sems can pa// ma mo'i srid pa bka' stsal du// sa mos 'dul ba'i sems can la// mamo tha grod pa'i lam dang 'a /
