290b3(rnying rgyud): su
290b4(rnying rgyud): na
291a1(rnying rgyud): bzhes bya ba'i dbang bskur nas/ lam rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus lam dbu'i gzug nas/ ma mo'i sgras kyi dbang gi lam rnam par spyod nga zhes bya ba'i skadu dz+ra/
291a2(rnying rgyud): zer dkar po byung ngo // de bzhin du mgrin pa'i gling bu gser gyi bum pa las ngag gi dbang gi lam rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dmar po dmar po 'dra ba spu dang bcas pa byung ngo // thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u las sems kyi dbang gi pham rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'o
291a3(rnying rgyud): zer kha dog nag po nag po 'dra bar sgra dang bcas pa byung ngo // sku'i lte ba las kyang ye shes kyi dbang gi lam rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dmar ser dmar ser 'dra ba byung te ma mo'i lam la sogs pa bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig skal ldan dad pa can// las dang smon la
291a4(rnying rgyud): mthu ba tsan pa'o// brtan pa'i sems ldan brtul zhugs can// pha rol phyin bcu la sogs pa'i// thun mongs bsrung bya'i tshul khrims ldan// khyad par gsang sngags ma mo yi// bsrung ba'i dam tshig ldan pa yis// bgrod pa'i lam ni 'di ltar yin//
291a5(rnying rgyud): yi lam dang 'brel pa yi// ma mo bskyed pa'i rim pa ste// de yang re zhig rnam pa bzhi// gsang ba gzugs brnyan gyi bskyed dang // cher gsang dag pa skyed pa'i bskyed// shin tu gsang ba dang bzhin gyis// dge pa'i ma mo la ma yin te// gsang ba'i yang
291a6(rnying rgyud): dag gsang ba ni// gsang ba bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// de yang 'di ltar shes par bya// gnas bzhings la byas pa yi// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs snying sogs// rang bzhin ma mo tha dad pa// de la bsgom bsrub bzlas pa ni// rang gi
291a7(rnying rgyud): gzugs brnyan yin pas na// gzugs brnyan dam pas bskyed pa ste// 'di yis rnam rtog rags pa 'gegs// sman mo lnga bcu'i rang bzhin te// tshogs kyi lam zhes de pa grags// bskyed pa dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// rang gi lus kyi gnas rnams su//
291b1(rnying rgyud): mam rungs bdums// ma ma dang du zung ba skyed de// lus na 'dam gang klu zhe// g.yas gson sbyong dag rnam sogs// badra kyi sa dang ma na du // yangs bdag nam pa smra// kab brgyad ni dang brgyad do// rnas bsreg gong banan 'ang
291b2(rnying rgyud): lag drung khrod rang bzhin la// yan lag de bzhin tun du shes// yi ge las bskyed paskyed par dgrags// 'di yis gzugs brtan rnam rtog 'joms// ma mo cu bzhi'i rang bzhin te// sbyor ba'i lam gyi cha gnyis te// drod dang rtse mo yin par 'arjod// rang bzhin dag
291b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bskyed pa ni// rang gi lus kyi gnas rnams su// rang gi sdang ba'i dag pa las// rang gi khams dang phung po dang // 'byung ba rnam pa 'gags pa dang // ma mo sku yi snang bar gsal// phung de la sogs dag pa na// ma mo dag pa'i dkyil 'khor yan/
291b4(rnying rgyud): ma mo yi nas rang bzhin gnas// de la rang bzhin bskyed par grags// gong gi bskyed pa'i dag pa la// phung po la sogs rim de la// rang rang ming gi yi ger bsam// de la ma mo mkhas par 'dod// 'di ni dbyings kyi grum drug ste// spong ba'i las
291b5(rnying rgyud): cha gnyis te// bzod pa dang na chos kyi mchog/ de nas gsang ba'i bskyed pa ni// rang gi 'i gzhal las su// ma mo bdun rnam brgyad snang // rang bzhin dag pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dos// mu kha le yi rang bzhin te// mthong ba'i lam gyi bdag nyid sring//
291b6(rnying rgyud): de ltar lam gsum bgrod pa ni// ma mo bskyed pa'i rim pa yin// de ltar gyur pa gang la yang // mkhas pas 'di ltar shes par bya// tshogs kyi lum la lam bzhi ste// ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas ni// rang gsal ye shes la sbyor bas// tshogs
291b7(rnying rgyud): gyi lam gyi skyong la ma yin// rnam tog gang gis ma bskyod pa// tshogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam// rang gsal ye shes zangs kar skyes// tshogs kyi grol lam yin par 'dod// gang las ye shes khyad par 'phags// tshogs kyi khyad dpang lam du dza //
292a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ spyad lam mthong lam de bzhin no// de yang brgyud pa'i de mde yang // 'di ltar mkhas pas shes par bya// sems can dang sems gol b.las// theg pa'i dam padum dang // snang badra ma dngasams dang / da
292a2(rnying rgyud): zhal chad pa dang // rtag pa'i nga bzhin dang sems snang // nyan pas 'di ltar snang ba la// tha ba dral pa rang sems dang // dang rgyas rkyen brel paH// rang sams gong bar snang ba yis// theg rkyen chung po ng+ge bru kyi
292a3(rnying rgyud): smyu bar 'di// ya ngan log gnyis/ rdzing 'dzin tugs dang phyug rnalas// rgya dang gags las pang par 'dod // thabs dang che ba'i rmiganyis te// de sbyar bu stegs can lhanas// gsang sngags papas kyi 'dang dri dang // das par dang sebs dang /
292a4(rnying rgyud): bste// shes rab rdul 'byor ma mo yis// rang sems golas las grol ba// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // rin chen sna lnga las grub pa'i// khad brtsegs pa gnyis 'gyur can// gsal zhing dag la rang bzhin med// rang bzhin spun grub be napa
292a5(rnying rgyud): gsal// gru bzhipa pa sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dur khrong brgyad dang gong brgyad dang // phyogs skyong brgyad dang gru brgyad dang // char pa smin brgyad de bzhin te// drab dra bskyed pa dang // 'khyer dang ni lha mo lnga// gnon yang /
292a6(rnying rgyud): rnam bzud// rdzogs par dang gi sems snang ba// 'di ni shes dang sa so'o// snod kyi dang dag pa ste// dper rgyud kyi sdang bang// zag pa'i sna bang snang ba bzhin// dam thogs g.yangs snang bangs// gnal pas lang nga spa bar 'dod// debazhin
292a7(rnying rgyud): bcud kyi sems can kyang // rgyal rigs kyi kha ler snang // bras rje'i rigs ni ma po d+hu // ji rigs po brgya bzhi pa// dmangs rigs ldan po'i rigs su // rgyal rigs la sogs bu dang tshe// ma kha le ba sogs pa yi// rang rang thugs kyi nyi
292b1(rnying rgyud): po shes sems sata nasems// ma mi gnyis su spang byan// rang sems ma mad sa n+d+ha/ dardza bdud kyi snang bdag/ dultang snang ba mdag dang / rtog+sas gas rjod pa/ 'don dab sa'/
292b2(rnying rgyud): dmyal grogs 'tshod// dper na chu 'i sgra tsam gyis// skom pa'i gdung bsel med// de bzhin skra dang tha snyad kyis// dngos po'i de nyid rtogs ma yin// de ltar sdod pa srid dag pa yang // ngas par kun pa snang ba //
292b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid kyang // ji ltar gnas par shes gyur cing // rgyan la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // ji ltar shes pa de ltar yang // phung po khams la sogs pa yi// dag pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can// snga ri la rang badzin med / ga
292b4(rnying rgyud): rtog pa med pa ru// shes pa dag la ma mod snang // de yang sems gnas rim pa la// ma brten snang bar mi 'gyur te// sgom pa'i thun dang mtshams dang yang // bying ba dang ni rgod pa dang // sems kyi sgo rnams shes bya la// sems
292b5(rnying rgyud): gnas sa btsal// de ltar ma byas rang nyon mongs// 'di dang phyi ma 'bras bu med// man ngag thabs kyi yan lag rdzogs// rang sems nges par ma mor snang // de tshe sangs rgyas sems can med// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa med// mam rnags
292b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin te// rdzogs chen bya bral rdzogs pa las// ma mo bskyed pa ji bzhin du// thabs dang man ngag mkhas pas sbyar// de ltar gzugs brtan la sogs pa// dbang po rab 'bring rim par gsungs// de nas bsgreng ba'i byed pa yang // rtse gnas ston
292b7(rnying rgyud): pa bzhi// yab dang yum gyi mkha' las ni// sbyor ba'i byang sems dkar dmang las// gzugs brtan ma mo'i sku bskyed pa// gzugs brtan gyis ni mngal skyes yin// yi ge las ni ma mor gyur// gzugs brtan gyis ni drod kyis yin// yi
293a1(rnying rgyud): las ni phyag mtshan te// phyag mtshan las ni ma mod sgra// sgod skyes tshul gyis ma ma'i 'o// skad cig las ni ma tho su// badras skyes rnas kyim po yod// rta brdab pa zhi gdong ba 'o// 'khor ba'i drung 'dagacad par phyir/
293a2(rnying rgyud): ma mo skye ba rnam pazhir gsungs// srid pa bar dor las dang po// lha dang dmyal brgyan gcad phyir// ma mo bcus sgras gsungs pa yin// mi dang dred 'gro phal tshor dang // tshangs pa'i skyod lugs bcug pa// gnod srin phral po rgyan gcad phyir/
293a3(rnying rgyud): mo mngal nas bskyed pa bstan// bya dang zer mo la sogs pa// de bzhin tshangs pa'i sgod de dag/ rgyun gcod ma mo'i sgong skyes gsungs// shig dang sro ma srin bu sogs// rgyud gtsang ma mo'i drod skyes bstan// de ltar skye ba rnam bzhi yang // bcus skyes ma
293a4(rnying rgyud): male// ma ni ma ma dzad gshed las// bcu bzhim mo slong skyes las// lngabatu mdal nas skye bar 'dod// 'di yang dbang po rab 'bying la// rab kyis phyi dang nang gnyis po sgom// 'bring gis nang gi ste rnams brjod// tha ma dbus kyi yab phram la// de
293a5(rnying rgyud): sku yi cha nas ni// tha ma spyan la sems gtad de// de la sems gnas rtags byung na// zlab chos nas 'phel ba bzhin// nang nas phyi ru rdzogs par bsgom// brdzus skyes la sogs kun la khyab// de ltar ma mo'i bsgom pa la// sems bzung yan lagabs pa
293a6(rnying rgyud): khyab// de ltar ma po'i lam gsum las// ma mo bzhi po'i lam byung ste// zab pa ma mo'i rtsa yin te// rab tu zab pa rlung yin la// kun tu zab pa thig le yin// zab pa'i zab pa byang chub sems// de dag rdzogs pa'i rim pa yi// mu kha le la
293a7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa yin// bsgom pa'i lam du shes par bya// de dag rim par dbye bar bya// dang po rtsa la rnam pa bzhi// skyigs ma'i rtse ni dngas mdag/ bdun cu rtsa gnyis yin pa ste// brgya dang nyi shu dngas ma'i rtsa// dngas ma lani dngas ma
293b1(rnying rgyud): rtsa// sum cu rtsa gnyis yin par 'dod// snying po'i rtsa ni rnam pa gsum// de yang ma mo rigs bzhi yin// snyigs ma'i rtsal pad mkhris gnas// dngas ma'i rtsa na rkang dang tshil// dngas ma'i dngas ma byang chub sems// snying po'i rtsa na sku gsung thugs//
293b2(rnying rgyud): dper na shing gi myu gu las// sdong po yan lag la sogs skyes// de bzhin snying po'i b+ha las ni// 'khor lo dang ni theg le chags// lte bar ye shes thig le ni// gzhom med aM gi rnam pa las// 'khor lo drug gu rtsa bzhir chags// thabs dang shes rab
293b3(rnying rgyud): dngas ma las// phra mo'i dngas ma drug cu bzhi// sprul pa'i sku yi tshul can gnas// snying gar gzhom med hUM gi tshul// 'byung ba'i dngas ma lnga 'dus tshul// de las 'dang brgyad 'khor lo'i tshul// rnam shes dngas ma brgyad kyi dngos// chos kyi su yi tshul can no//
293b4(rnying rgyud): mgrin par aM gi rang bzhin las// phung po lnga yi dngas ma 'dus// de las 'dab ma bcu drug tshul// ro yi dngas ma bcu drug 'dus// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi tshul// spyi bor oM gyi rnam pa la// byang sems dkar dmar rnam pa las// pad mkhris dngas
293b5(rnying rgyud): ma sum cu gnyis// bde ba chen po'i sku yi tshul// 'khor lo bzhi la sku bzhi gnas// de ltar rtsa rnams 'khor lo rnams// shes na rtsa dang 'khor lo la// rang sems gnas te bskyed drims 'gags// rtsa yi bsgom pa'i lam du 'dod// rlung ni rigs
293b6(rnying rgyud): gcig rigs gnyis gsum// rigs bzhi nas bzung nyi khri'i bar// rtsa yi lam byung sna ru bgrang // dgag pa la yang rtsa ru shes pa ste// rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'di dag la// bla ma'i man ngag ma rnyed na// sems gnas rnyed pard mi 'gyur ro// de ltar rtsa
293b7(rnying rgyud): dang rlung la yang // dbang po rab 'bring phye ba yis// nyin mtshan bsgom pa bsam mi khyab// thig le hUM las tsit+tar gyur// snying ni rtse bzlog mgrin pa nas// srog gi skar khung kha phye nas// der dmigs thig le'i rnal 'byor yin// gsang ba'i rdo rje
294a1(rnying rgyud): 'anam// b+hag 'am ni zla 'bul// byang sems dkar das gos byed pa/ byung chub sems kyi smon lam yin// rtswa nas byang chub snyems ga byung // de dag gan pa can te kyang // yangs ngas shes par bya na/
294a2(rnying rgyud): batshan nyid nges tshig las dang tshul// dbye ba la sogs rnam pa bcu// mtshan nyid rgyas par shes par bya// de dag sgom pa'i lam yin te// D+ha ni sgom pa'i sgor la ma yin// rlung ni ston pa'i bar chad med// thig les rnam par grol ba ste// byung sems khya dang
294a3(rnying rgyud): lam min pas// mkhas pas rdzogs la nan tan bya// rdzogs pa las su rung ba na// de la bskyed pa dag ga srub med// rang sems rdzogs par snang tsa min// bskyed pa'i mamo ming yang med// de phyir bskyed pa golas yin// rdzogs pa'i lam gyi tshul la yang /
294a4(rnying rgyud): ba bzhi yi rim par sbyar// rtsa dang rlung gi thig la las// ye shes rgyan gyi rnam pa ste// rtsa ni rtsi skya lta bu la// yi ge zil pa lta bur gnas// lte bar ka yi sde tshan la// spyi bo dang ni mgrin pa ru// a yaM sde tshan rnam par gnas// snying gar a gcig gzhan ma kA/
294a5(rnying rgyud): lte bar shes rab ngo bo las// snying gar thabs kyi sbyor bas brgyan// mgrin pa yum gyi rang bzhin la// spyi bor yab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan// thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor las// ma mo rang gsal ye shes cha// yab dang yum gyi kha sbar ba// ma mo lhun gru chos
294a6(rnying rgyud): cha// snyigs ma'i rtsa rnams 'gro 'dod kyi// rtsa ba 'jongs mo lta bu la// sbom phra bad mkhris rtsa las shes// brgya dang nyi shu dang dkar gyi// skud pa tsam du nges pa yin// dbyibs ni pad+ma 'khor lo 'dra// sum cu rtsa gnyis dar dkar gyi// rtswa
294a7(rnying rgyud): bkra ste ring thung yang // sor gnyis mkhas pas shes par bya// snying po'i rtse na yungs kar tsan// tshangs pa'i bu gnas sor bcas// skyes nas sna rtsi b.rab+hag nas// dbu ma shing gi rnam pa la// g.yas g.yon sbrul gyi rnam par gnas/ ga can
294b1(rnying rgyud): dbus na gnas// mgrin pang glang du nas de bzhin// skal tshig dbyug pa la brten gnas// 'di dag gnas pa'i tshul rnams kyang // sangs rgyas skom te ma mdzadang // sems can smin te ma bcas pas// rang bzhin gnas te ma mang 'a dang // rang nan/
294b2(rnying rgyud): mamo'i don rtags nas// bskyed pa ma mo gol dang sgrib// rlung la sogs pa kun la sbyar// de dag sgom lam yin par bshad// de nas 'bras bu'i lam bshad de// sgom lam ngag dbang rang bzhin las// 'bras lam sems kyi
294b3(rnying rgyud): phrab dang po'i bde ba ste// kun tu phra ba mchog gi bde// kun nas phra ba bde bral bde// phra ba'i phra ba lhan cig bde// 'di dag 'bras bu'i lam yin te// dang po bde ba mu la le// gnyis pa g.yang sa ma mo drug/ gsum pa ma ma bcu bzhi
294b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa lnga bcu yin par 'dod// 'dod chags chen po gcig nyid la// bde ba'i bye brag bzhir byung // rdo rje'i rtse bar gyon pa la// dang po'i bde bar 'dod pa yin// rdo rje'i ged par phyin pa las// mchog gi bad par 'dod pa yin// b+ha ga na jug
294b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang // gsum pa bskyod pa'i bde ba yin// ma mo'i rang bzhin de shes na// zab mo'i ma mo'i golas rtse// de la gnas pa yod ma yin// ji ltar snang zhing sred pa nas// rdo rje btu smod pa'i bar// thams cad la mo rang gas la te// de zer rtogs
294b6(rnying rgyud): grub te// rang gas lam lo ma rtogs pas// ma mor sla ba'ang de zad// mamor spyod pa snying re rje// de la sems gnas rim pa yang // bde ba dang po nas bzu nas// rim gyis rang sems bdeng ru// gnas kyi bar du ngoms par bslab//
294b7(rnying rgyud): dang sems bde ba ste// bde lam ma mo yin par nges// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog de la med// rnam rtog gsum las grol bas na// de las grol ba'i ma mor 'dod// 'jig rten chags pa la sogs pa// spong ba'i sems bcwa de la yod// de dag
295a1(rnying rgyud): bu lam la yang // slong lam pa chags gong dang 'dra// mAm lam chud lung las/ sngon du 'gro ba'i lam bskrun pa'i leT ste dang pal// de nam drug pa rnam grol lam// slong ba ma mong sa zhes na
295a2(rnying rgyud): dag cing gsal la rtog pa med// ye nas grol ba mnyam pa nyid// brang dang dor ba'i chos rnams med// nges par grol ba so sor rtogs// gol dang dngos kyi chos rnams ni// so sor rtogs pa'i nges pa'o// grol ba'i grol ba dag pan/
295a3(rnying rgyud): nan tan ye shes te// chos dbyings ye shes bya ba yin// de la nan tan ye shes yin// de ltar ye shes lnga yi dang // grol ba'i ma mo yin par gsungs// chu ni ye nas dngas pa las// glo bur rtog mas dngas ma yin// de bzhin rang gi sems nyid
295a4(rnying rgyud): kyang // ye nas grol ba'i rang bzhin pas// grol ba'i ma mo yin par bshad// de ltar grol ba'i ma mo la// blang bar bya ba ye nas med// dor ba'ang yinas yod ma yin// blang dor med pa'i jo ba ste// ma bcos rang bzhin ldan gyis grung
295a5(rnying rgyud): bya ba tsal bral ba'i stong pa nyid// ma mo kun gyi yang rje mo// 'di las sru la sogs par snang // snang tsam nyid na snang ba med// snang ba med las snang ba mtshar// skye ba med pas skyes pa med// de lta'i ma mo grol lam la// mkhas pas dang po bla ma
295a6(rnying rgyud): las// man ga btsal te gtan la dbab// de nas mos pa yid la bya// mos pa'i yid ni rnam rtog ste// 'di nyid 'gags pas 'di nyid thob// 'di nyid rtog bral lhun gyis grub// ma mo lhun gyis grub pa'i sku// 'di thob bya ba'i 'bras bu med/
295a7(rnying rgyud): 'di rtogs rtogs pa'i bya ba med// 'di dag ma mo'i rang gnas yin// de la yid ches nan tan gyis// ma tshol ma rgyad lung las/ grol ba'i lam bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas ma mo'is bstan pa// rnam rtag la
295b1(rnying rgyud): sa ma shags pa'i gyur rnam na'as shes bya// denas yi ma myed do// 'dreg den 'das pa'i yon tan ma/ na min mu na gyur mam// yang na gar ma gangamams// mnan nyi btsun pa byar dang/ samim can na la rnang
295b2(rnying rgyud): rnams ma las sugasas/ sa da// dpa kyi sa / nga mi ma ston// mam ma sam// / ga /
295b3(rnying rgyud): rdoH// ri shegs la nas pa gsum// 'jig rten rig 'donas dang yang // ma ba~M b+ha za la rdzogs pa'os// 'jig rten das pa'i rig 'dzinas// de garas ni rnam pa gsum// bcwa bdunas me rang bzhin 'dzod// 'jig rten rig 'dzinas la gnyis/ gas
295b4(rnying rgyud): gyi rig 'dzinas dang yang // spor bdag 'dzinas dang gnyis// rang gi sems kyi cha gnyis te// sems ni sna tshogs bag chags te// bag chags dag ni sems kyi che// bem po ma yin sems su 'ad// ye shes cha gnyisas gnyis snyen// 'jig rten 'ang
295b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rig 'dzinas// bcu po'i rang bzhin ngas pa ste// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro dang // sbrang dka' drug pa ring du song // bdun pa mi ga yo legs pa'i blo// de bzhin dgu dang bcu pa'i bar// rig 'dzin sa bcu yin par gsungs/
295b6(rnying rgyud): zlas rdugs pa sa lngas// 'gyur chos nyid dbyings kyis// dang pas yi rang bzhin no// mi bang mi shes dag pa'is// byaza la rdegs pa'is gnyis so// brang dang brel ba mnyam pa'is// gsum pa 'in teg pa dang dngos// ma par rtogs pas
295b7(rnying rgyud): ben min// bya ba nan tan sra zhing brtan// rdzibs yi rang bzhin min// de ltar ldi dang margyangad gnyis// sa yi rang bzhin de dag kyang // ba dang yod pa ma yin te// rang sems dag pa tshalas ni// sang rim par byung 'gyur te// rang sems da/
296a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i cha med par// sa yi rang bzhin gang 'dod pa// de ni dmu nor smra ba yin// sa dang sems su dbye ba yang // nam yang yod pa ma yin no// shes shing rig pa'i phyir na sems// sra zhing brtan pa'i phyir nas//
296a2(rnying rgyud): zhing bgrod pa'i phyir na lam// de tsam de yi chal ni// sa dang lam gyi tha snyad btags// don dam gang yang yod ma yin// yod na gong ma 'byung mi 'gyur// 'og ma nyid kyang de bzhin no// de dag sa yi rim pa'o// ma mo la ma rgyud lung las/ ma mo
296a3(rnying rgyud): sa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// ma mo'i 'bras bu'i rim pa yang // rnam pa lnga ru dbye ba las// tshogs lam dbang gi 'bras bu ste// skrod lam tshogs kyi 'bras bu yin// mthong lam sbyor ba'i 'bras
296a4(rnying rgyud): su med// rdo'i ma mthong ba'i 'azlas bral// sgos pa'i 'bras zla 'bras pa'i dam// 'bras bu'i lam gyi 'bras bran// byam 'jogs pa smin par da// 'di ni lamagyi 'dras te/ rdza ma hU~Mn khyim pam// bza tshwa min pa thams cad 'ad// @/
296a5(rnying rgyud): 'bras rgyu 'dus de bzhin du// sa l-i smyung bras de bzhin te// mtshan nyid 'bras bu bzhi bcu gnyis// 'bras bu 'di dag thams cad kyang // rang gi sems kyi tshuyin te// sems las gzhan pa'i gyu byas ni// gang yang yod pa pa med no// de ltar 'bram bu 'dod pas
296a6(rnying rgyud): kyang // sems kyi man ngag btsal bar bya// sems kyi man ngag rnyed gyur na// 'bras bu tha snyad btags pa tsam// sems las gzhan pa gang yang med// de ltar sems rtogs 'bras bu ni// thob bya nam yang yod ma yin// thob bya med pa'i 'bras
296a7(rnying rgyud): bu ni// rang rig dang gsal ye nas grub// 'di ni 'bras rab rang bzhin dag/ dag pa med pas dag pa'i chul// skye ba med las skyes pa'i tshul// snang ba med pas snang ba'i tshul// tshul la btags nas 'bras bung btags// btags pa yod par/
296b1(rnying rgyud): yin te// san gcan gyis gos parabya// ma mo'i 'bras gru brtan pa s+ho// du g+sa/ na pa'i rdza ba dag/ zung byed tshul las thub pa yis// ma mo'i gzugs lam thor 'dod// can la sogs pa bye zhin da// dan mi shes mun pas 'akri
296b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs nim mo ma yin te// thams cad sems su rang bzhin phyir// gzugs kyi ma mo gol ba yin// gzugs ni sems kyi snang ba ste// dper na byad kyi gzugs brnyan bzhin// de ltar rgyu 'bras gang 'dod kyang // sems kyi rtse ba byang chub sems//
296b3(rnying rgyud): med stong pa'i rtsub btsal// rtsa ba rnyed na rtse mo nyams// 'bras thob 'bras bu'i khyad par 'byung // 'byung ba med las 'byung ba mtshar// thob pa med las thob pa mtshang// rig pa med las rang rig mtshor// gsal ba med las rang gsal mtshad// de lta'i 'bras
296b4(rnying rgyud): rab dam pa 'di// 'bras thob 'bras bu'i nang na thob// ma mo lam rgyud lung las/ ma mo'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sa dang lam gyi ngo bo ni// ngan pa nyer gzhag bzhi dang yang /
296b5(rnying rgyud): spong ba bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi// rkang pa bzhi dang tshogs lam gyi// mtshan nyid yin par 'dod pa'o// ngo bo sems kyi rang bzhin yin// de yang 'di ltar shes par bya// lus dran nye bar gzhag pa yang // ma mo lus dran nyer gzhag ste// mi brjed pyir na
296b6(rnying rgyud): pa ste// kun la tshul 'di shes par bya// sbyor ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid bcu// dbang po lnga dang stobs rdza te// ngo bo sems las gzhan ma yin// mthong ba'i lam la bdun yin la// bsgom pa'i lam yang lnga yin te// 'dra rgya ma gyi mtshan nyid ni/
296b7(rnying rgyud): gsum du mkhas pas shes par bya// bye bra rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni// stong pa ma bcos ldan grub yin// ma mo'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa'o// mtshan ma mi 'byung gang yang zed// dper na me las du ba bzhin// drangs mtshon pa'i me dang n-i/
297a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan mas mtshan pa'i mtshan nyid dang // golas gang yang yod pa yin// de bas dang po'i mtshan nyid la// mkhas pas nan tan bya ba yin// mtshan nyid las ni mtshan na 'byung // mtshan pa'i sgo nas mtshan nyid sa/
297a2(rnying rgyud): gnas pa yin par rtogs pa ste// rtogs pas sgo dang skur ba spong // spangs pas ngan 'gro srid lam sgrol// mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid ni// pi prar dang po thar// mu stegs pa yi grub pa yin// mtshan nyid dbye ba de ltar rtse// spyi yi mtshan nyid 'dre
297a3(rnying rgyud): yin// ma nus ra'i don ma rtogs// rang sems gol ba'i snang ba las// sgyu ma rang gsal yul la rol// rang rang sgyu mar snang ba la// gong mgong mas gzhal ba na// 'og ma 'og mas med par snang // med pa snang du mi rung ste// gol bas yong 'du khur snang /
297a4(rnying rgyud): sdig rgyu 'dzin pa'i shes pa bzhin// med pa snang bas ngo mtshar te// grol ba shes pas ngo mtsharar// gol ba'i ngo mtshar dman pa ni// las kyi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar te// gol ba khyad par ngo mtshar che// bla ma'i man ngag ji mtshar che// pa mo bskyed dang rdzogs pa dang /
297a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen yang ni grol ba ste/ ting 'dzin tshe 'phrul ngo mtshar che// ting 'dzin tshe 'phrul ngo mtshar can// dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin du// snang ste med pa kho na'o// de ltar med pa'i ting 'dzin la// bsgom dang bzlas pas ci zhig bya// mang bas yongs grub 'gyur ba na/
297a6(rnying rgyud): bla ma'i man dag ci la dgos// de dag rig pa bden mod kyis// re zhig 'di ltar shes par bya// med pa gsung pa gnyis pa la// re zhig yod pa gnyis pa yin// gal ba dngos po gnyis pa la// dngos po'i gnas pa bzhi pa ste// gol ba'i dngos por mi 'gyur zhing //
297a7(rnying rgyud): med pas yod par ye 'gyur kyang // mdzub mos zla ba ston pa ltar// yod pa'i mtshan nyid tshal bsgyur// med pa thabs kyi yan lag yin// dngos po'i gnas thabs tshol ba las// gol ba thabs kyi bye brag yin// dper na sA lu'i sa bon pas// sA l+la
297b1(rnying rgyud): sras byung ba sa// sa gagadang ni lu du bya// nang pa lngamags sa pa / rdzas nasu su 'an// / wawa rna lasasas so// dbus bu 'byung ba'i thams pa dang // dang na rtag bcus gsum pa dang // rngan na rdzogs na
297b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rtags// yin par 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs// ji ltar snang ba'i rnam rtog 'di// skye ba'i rim pa ma bkag par// rnam rtog myos pa'i sems 'di yis// stong pa lhun grub ji ltar rtogs// de phyir bskyed pa med pa yod// yod pa zang pa
297b3(rnying rgyud): yin te// don byed mi nus med dang 'dra// med pas dman pa ma yin te// don byed phyir na yod kyang 'dra// bskyed pa'i rnam rtog phra ba 'di// rdzogs pa'i rim pas ma bsal bar// skye med rtogs par mi 'gyur te// bskyed pa'i rtog pas nyams phyir ro//
297b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs dang rdzogs chen de bzhin te// rnam rtag rlung 'di ma 'gags par// ye shes med de 'bar mi 'gyur// ye shes me 'di ma 'bar na// ma rig mun sel mi 'gyur te// ma rig mun pa ma bsal bar// rang rig rang gsal rang las 'byung // rang rig
297b5(rnying rgyud): gas ma gsal bar// sru la sogs pa'i tha snyad med// dper na bu ga'i rlung ma bkag/ mar me 'bar bar mi 'gyur la// mar me 'bar bar ma gyur na// mun pa bsal bar mi 'gyur ro// bskyed pa'i rim par mi gnas kyang // sbyin pa'i tshogs
297b6(rnying rgyud): 'bang de bas pa// de mi sa rang sems sbyin par 'gyur// rjen pas rnam rtog nyer zhe nas// bskyed pa'i rim par legs gnas 'gyur// lam gyi po lta na// gang gis mi shes dbu cor du// thabs dang bral ba'i steng pa ni// nam mkha'i gas can 'dod pa
297b7(rnying rgyud): sem tham lam cung grangalas/ la kyin ni ba / de dasal tha sa dngapag// dgram bu dgas ni pashi ba cu// sbyi dang tshul khrims la legs kyis// sam can da de dag pa// 'bar ga
298a1(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa stsogs// sa bcu'i rtags su shes par bya// byams dang nga rje dang pa'i rtags// dga' dang bkang snyoms 'jig rten gyi// rig 'dzi nas ni gnyis pa'i dgas// gser gyis gzhi mnan nem// brtsegs na
298a2(rnying rgyud): 'phar ba la sogs pa// bya bral lhun grub sa yi rtags// de ltar sa yi rtags bstan nas// 'bras bu'i rtags ni 'di lta ste// dang por snang ba 'gags pa las// bskyed pa'i rim pa gang snang ba// ma mo bskyed pa'i rtags yin te// bskyeng pa la sogs sngar
298a3(rnying rgyud): bu 'gags// rdzogs pa'i tshul du gang snang ba// de ni ma mo'i 'bras bu'i rtags// rtogs pa'i snang ba la sogs 'gags// rdzogs pa chen po dag snang ba// rdzogs pa chen po 'bras bu'i rtags// b+hang dor gan yang med pa rtse// babral rdzogs par
298a4(rnying rgyud): bu'i rtags// de ltar 'bras bu'i rtags bshad nas// lam gyi rtags ni 'di ltar te// dang po tshogs kyi lam rtags kyang // thun mod brgyang dang thun mong min// bzhin nges par sleb ste// tshogs kyi lam la ye gnas na// lus la phye nang sran 'bu med//
298a5(rnying rgyud): s+yA dkar med nge mthon 'bring 'dra// gzhar ma med de la brgya thug// khams kyi zas bral gnyid med sogs// thun mong rtags brgyad 'byung ba'o/ lus la drod dang rdul la sogs// thun mong ma yin nugs rnams 'byung // de bzhin sbyor ba las rtags na/
298a6(rnying rgyud): maung bkyang dang thun mang min// ba'i brgyag nyis nges pami chung // mthong lamathun mo dgas rnams dang // thun ma ma yin teg rnams te// 'dong po'i lam gyi man byed bzhin// ji ska 'jig na snang badzin// rang ba snar byinam pa la//
298a7(rnying rgyud): ba ste// gsum pa zlog gi rnab pa la// bzhi pa me mes par snang // de rungs mthong ba la brtags so// thun mong dngas rnanas kun pa blang// de nas gom pa'i lam rnams ni// ba rnam pa la mi tsamatshan rnyed no// desar ba rnam pa gnas pang//
298b1(rnying rgyud): sa su / ma ma// na gas
298b2(rnying rgyud): gsu lal kyim mad pa// mas ni sna par gnam bstan// sa tha pa kyang ban/ ma ma thong // dbang rgya byinam par mdzad// g.ya smra sabs/ gangan bzhin pa su thongs/
298b3(rnying rgyud): sa s+ho// ga ma na// sa// thatha // na kya / sa ma/ sa sa
298b4(rnying rgyud): med mi 'a ba bas // na tu ma da na ni yanam sa ga/ nga da// dathatha sa ban ma ga // dang ba'i nga thug rnas / pa ma mas// byeng na chung ba nga /
298b5(rnying rgyud): na sa sa/ gams// sbyin
298b6(rnying rgyud): nalas
298b7(rnying rgyud): na // / / su //
299a1(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi spa sas spyong pa las// mun gzugs med pamanan// de zhin nga sems rtog pas stong // phrin gyis ni mang ma yin// 'dijimatshan nyid rgyal pa yin// rang sams par me par snang sogs// dngas pa tsun pa na
299a2(rnying rgyud): ba yen// skul sogs pa sna tshogs 'byung // mngon par shes ba drug skyes te// sngon gyi gnas ni shes pa dang // gzhan gyi sems kyang shes pa dang // 'tshe 'bo dang ni skye ba dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi ni mngon shes dang // gzhan yang mngon shes pa yang /
299a3(rnying rgyud): mig gis 'jig rten gzugs rnams ni// gad cig gcig la mthong ba dang // nabs smini tu tshogs thos// snga yis sna tshogs r+b+ba tshong zhing // kye yis sna tshogs dpyang khring // lus kyis dag byertogs par 'gyur// de dag rtags kyi rim pa // ma me'i rgyad krung
299a4(rnying rgyud): las/ ma mo'i nags bstan pa'i phre'u ste drug pa'o// de sa ri ma mor rtags bstan pa// la mi thob pa yi tshad bshad pa// mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob ste// rjes thob 'gro drang za dang nyal// kun tu bzang mo'i gzugs brtad kyis//
299a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mda'i snang ba ste// tshogs kyi lam gyi mthar phyin chad// de bzhin dag pas bskyed pa la// 'gro 'dug la sogs la sems pa// sbyor ba'i lam gyi mthar phyin tshad// de las sems me khyad 'phags te// dag pa rang bzhin bskyed pa pa// nyin
299a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan rtag tu sems gnas pa// sgor sam cha gnyis mthar sbyin chad// yin pa nyid dri the tsom med// bskyed pa ci ti'i dkyil 'khor la// lo dang bskal bar sems gnas pa// mthong ba'i lam gyi mthar phyin chad// rtsa dang rlung sogs po d+hi// rtag tu
299a7(rnying rgyud): mi gyur sems gnas pa// rgas pa'i lam gyi mthar byin tshad// yin pa nyid du rnam par marjod// rang sems rtag tu gang gnas pa// 'bras bu la ma semathar phyin tshod// yin pa nyid du the tshom med// bya zab rdzogs paring po rtsa// ji srid 'khor bsgo/
299b1(rnying rgyud): kye bar// ye shes dang du gnas pa de// bya bral rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin chad// yin pa nyid du shes par bya// de ltar tshad dang mi ldan pas// rang 'dod bsam pa sna tshogs kyis// las la sogs pa khas 'ches shing // sgo dang skur ba'i mtha' la gnas//
299b2(rnying rgyud): 'di ni log lta ma rungs pa// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal sogs 'tshed// de bas lam dang lam gyi tshad// man ngag can las shes par bya// man ngag yod na bsam gtan bya// med na 'bad med bzlas sogs bya// tha mal pa yi smad pa la// skad cig
299b3(rnying rgyud): gnas par ma gsungs so// dper na rgyal po'i rgyal bu yang // rgyal bu'i bya ba kho na las// rigs ngan bya ba spangs nas gnas// 'di bzhin ma mo'i lam 'di ni// 'jig rten lam gzhan bgrod ma yin// lam gzhan bgrod dang phye ba med// de mas dbad pa
299b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis// ma me'i lam la nan tan bya// de bas rang la lam rnams sku// skyes tshul tshad du phyin pa dang // 'bras bu rang byung thob par 'gyur// rang byung sangs rgyas mtshan nyid de// de bsam mo la sogs sangs rgyas dang // tha dad med pas gang yang med//
299b5(rnying rgyud): de ni mthar phyin 'bras bu'i tshad// yin te rtogs la sogs pa kun// brtan dang sra ba'i sa yi yang // mthar phyin pa yi tshad yin no// stong pa nam mkha' lta bur snang // mtshan ma mthar phyin pa yi tshad// yin no de ltar nan tan gyis// de dag mthar phyin pa yi yin//
299b6(rnying rgyud): ma mo lam rgyud lung las/ mthar phyin pa'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// de yis spang ba'i rnam rtog kyang // 'di ltar shes par bya ba ste// mthong ba'i lam las spang ba ni// ji ltar 'jig rten grags pa
299b7(rnying rgyud): dang // mdo sde kyi ya yog dang // gnyi ga chu dang thabs kyi ni// lam rnams 'di ltar rnam rtag ste// de dag spangs nas ma mo yi// mthong ba'i laman gang gnas pa// spong ba dang po yin par nges// ma mi mthong ba'i lam pa yi// mnyam gzhag rjes
300a1(rnying rgyud): bya sa lus pa// byung ba las mnum rtog// nam ga blangs nas sa// gyur ba'i lam dums pa blang// zan nas drug 'ag myu / don sa la smra ra// ba ba ca
300a2(rnying rgyud): gang // mthong ba lam ba na martog pas// mthong ba'i lam pas dri nyid nga // rnam rtag gnyis pas thun mang ste// thun mong yin phyi gnyis te spyad// mthong ba'i bram gyi mtshan nyid gang // sgom brje pa me pa'i rna rtog len//
300a3(rnying rgyud): de nyid spang // rnam rtog gsum ni thun mong la// gsum po de nyid spang bar gsung // sgom pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid gang // 'bras bu'i lam gyi rnam rtog ste// 'bras bu'i lam pas de nyid spang // 'bras bu'i lam sgong zun tshong ba ni// srang ba dun
300a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas gsungs// 'bras bu'i lam gyi mtshan nyid ni// bya bral rdzogs pa'i rnam rtog yin// bya bral rdzogs pas de nyid spang // thun mong lnga yang de bzhin no// spang bar bya ba'i rnam rtog kyang // yod nas spang ngam med nas spang // gong mas rags
300a5(rnying rgyud): delta dza / desder 'dri ga shes paras// rnasra pa dag pa'i ba med// minas ya sa ma smin// / dbe nga na gags pad/ klu cigs par rnag+sas/ ji snyed dag nga // dris brji sa gas
300a6(rnying rgyud): nirdzogs lag pa'i ni rtag nas// dedag ye nas se ma men// dang sems gas ba'i snang bste// sems dang de ga'i nas sems/ galas sadan sems med ste// snang ba yinas yod ma yin// de ltar med pa pa gsun pa/
300a7(rnying rgyud): gas paste// skye bdang sa sum ma ni// mad la rtags nas bla yang na// med pa 'ang dus 'drang ste// gnyis gdangs pa min pa 'byer// mid pa la yang spring du man// med las med pa yar byung // de dag rtogs pa la slang gis
300b1(rnying rgyud): sa pa drad banags sagasas// zang pas bshad pa ma thus/ bam ga na ga du// ga cos zung pa'i mdu rung / drangs sum dang saca/ shes sa pang gdung // kya sa pas sadudun
300b2(rnying rgyud): me sa nga sa ma pa med// da rnags pan shes / dgas pa rnam pa yang na// de shAr byur ba'i ma // mam da'i lam tshanas na// pa / gang
300b3(rnying rgyud): dang de bzhin sbyar// gnas skabs rang sems gol ba ste// de yang re zhig go las btsal// sems bzung yan lag bsam mi khyab// go las bsam gyis mi khyab bo// gong mas 'og ma spong ba yang // 'og ma'i rnam rtog 'gags tsam na// gong ma'i rnam par rtog pa
300b4(rnying rgyud): de mas pa sa sa// gang ma mi migs ma/ la la gags/ pa nasapa// rlu sa / dang semam pa pa'i bye gul// rnam ga gas grugs pa na// ma
300b5(rnying rgyud): na ni// rlub dag nyid rnamamal// ma da ni rnamartag yin// de ny-i rdzogs na grol ba las// gzhan pa'i skabs grol ba zang // bral ba zhes pacwa 'ad de// bkyang mang bar nga gas pa yin// de dag zhes rab mam yis// na chog sa 'a mam
300b6(rnying rgyud): ma ma 'i margyad phrad las/ rnam par rtag pa srung ba'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// de la bar drugazod pa'i bdud// ma bas pas 'di ltar shes par bya// bdud pa rnam pa bzhi yin te/
300b7(rnying rgyud): 'did chags zhe sdang la sogs pa// phal pa nan mongs bdud yin te// 'dod chags chen po la sogs pa// mamo ngadagasal bya bral rdzogs// ji ltar gos ba'i mamo do// blam sgra le bu la bdud// skye med de na la gang grol // skye ba yin phyir 'chi ba dag bdud/
301a1(rnying rgyud): stong pa gcig las gang gol nas// snatshogs rnam gu na pa// den phung po'i bdud dragrags// de dag bdud pazhi 'jam su// tshogs kyi lam la bdung bzhin// chags kyi skapas skye gan 'ongs dug ga ma
301a2(rnying rgyud): mi bdud yin te// nyon mongs bdud kyang mthal na// rang sems bde bar mi 'gyur ro// tshogs kyi nyer len phung po sogs// phung po'i bdud du rig par bya// tshogs kyi gol sgrib gang ston pa// tha ma g+ha yi bu yi bdud// tshe gsel ma dam par ra
301a3(rnying rgyud): skye ba med las gang skyes pa// 'chi bdag bdud du rig par b+ha// de la bu mi bdud bzhi byung ba yang // lha yi bu yi bdud yin pas// dad pa dang ni rtsol ba dang // gser dngul la sogs rin chen dang // ha dang spang po la sogs pas// ma bu yi
301a4(rnying rgyud): spangs te// bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// man ngag gter gyi rtsa ba bcad// bdud kyi 'jigs pa rtags tu spang // 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi ga zhom pa yang // dam pa'i tha ma las shes bya// de nas sbyor ba'i 'dud bzhi yang // sbyor ba'i skabs kyi nyon mongs rgyas
301a5(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs pa yi bdud du grags// sbyor ba'i lam gyi gol ba ni// ston pa bla ma lha yi bdud // nyon mongs skye ba sang de nyid// stor la ma thabs skye ba med// sdeb med las skye bar dgol// 'di dag 'chi bdag bajug yin te// 'di yang 'di las byung
301a6(rnying rgyud): yin// sbyor ba'i lam gyi nyer len sogs// rnam rtog du ma phung po'i bdud// de yang wA ya~M bu las byung // de ltar bdud kyi rtsa ba yang // lha yi lu yi bdud yin pas// mig dang 'dra ba'i tha ma la// mos pa dad pa la sogs bya// bdud kyi 'jigs
301a7(rnying rgyud): bas skrag par bya// skraganas bdud nga / zhes pa dmabs bcal// de nas mtha ba'i bdud bzhi yang // mautha~Mng 'a gam pa gangarnon pa// tha ma 'dra bas / maM bdud// 'phral du dgal// de lta pa wa// bde la bar nad bdung du 'gyur// de las nyon mong
301b1(rnying rgyud): bdud byung de// gol lan grub pa sems nyon mongs// nyon mongs pa yi bdud du 'gyur// sdug bsngal bskyed pa nyon mongs te// dgel bar du gcod pas bad// 'di yang bdud kyi rtsa ba ste// nyon mongs dbang gi gsum pa 'byung // de ltar bur du nga/
301b2(rnying rgyud): normongs 'di// nam yang mi gzhom ma yin no// des bstan lam gol du man// phung po'i bdud du nges pa s+ho// du ma 'dus pas phung ba ste// de yi bar du gcod pas bdud// bdud de ltar dum bcom na// 'khor bar ste ba skad cig med// des bstan na/
301b3(rnying rgyud): bas skye ba ste// 'di ni 'chi bdag bdud yin no// skye med sa rtogs 'che ba ste// tshol bar tshod bdud yin no// skye med chos la gnas byur na// 'chi bdag bdud rdo sde dang 'dra// de ni mthong ba'i bdung bzhi yin// de nas spos la ma bdud bzhi yang // rgom pa'i lam pa gas ba
301b4(rnying rgyud): ston// bzla ba'i bla ma lha yi bdud// de yis bstan pas sems nyon mongs// nyon mongs bdud du shes par bya// nyon mongs dbang gis 'chi ba 'byed// de ni 'chi bdag bdud yin no// sgom pa'i lam gyi nyer len ni// de nyid phung po'i bdud yon te// phung po ma gtogs bdud gzhanani//
301b5(rnying rgyud): nam yang yad pa ma yin no// de skar 'drad min ba ni// phung po bdu du nges pa min// bdud mi bcom padas dang lam// nam yang bgrod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas 'bras bu bdud pa zhi yang // 'bras bu go bar gang ston pa'i// gsog pa'i tham lha 'i bdud// dasar
301b6(rnying rgyud): bras lam bsgrub pa las// sems can nyon mongs nyan mongs bdud// des ni skye ba'i g.yang sar sbyang // 'chi bdag bdud du nges pa'o// de yaM sna tshogs du ma yis// phung po'i bdud du nges pa'o// de ni 'bras bu'i bdud bzhi'o// b+ha bA la rdzogs pa'i
301b7(rnying rgyud): bdudu drun/ bya sa rdzogs paga' 'du// phun pa su ma ze pa bdud/ delas sems pa sams ston mo / byin mas pa mo bajud dro ti// rten mangs du ma srung po'i bdud// blangams 'jigs pa 'chi ba gi 'dud/ 'di rje 'byung ba'i 'dud
302a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin// bdud bzhi bcom par ma byas na// ma mo'i mtshan ma rnyed mi 'gyur// ma mo ma rnyed bde mi rnyed// stong pa marnyed dngos mi rnyed// nye bar 'tsho bas srog yin te// drog la bar du gcod pas bdud// 'jigs
302a2(rnying rgyud): byu / rgyu shig na/ ga shA na hU~M/ ldan du la ma da
302a3(rnying rgyud): bya// bya bral sman rdzogs rang rig las// rang sems gol bas bad+mad ltar ldang // sems las gzhan pa'i bdud dag ni// gang yang yod pa ma yin no// dper na sman dang sngags dag las// skyes pa dang ni bud med snang // de bzhin dang semag gong sa/
302a4(rnying rgyud): 'chi bdag la sogs bdud ltar snang // snang yang sems las gzhan med kyis// rang gi gol ba'i sems bcom na// bdud kyi phung po 'jigs par 'gyur// de phyir bdud 'joms mthu dang rtsal// su la'ang yod pa ma yin gyi// bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// dam pa'i don la
302a5(rnying rgyud): 'i // dzin ni/ tsun pa sa/ gisan pa rdzas pa gas pa gyud/ 'di ma rdzogs mdu/ da' jug sa /
302a6(rnying rgyud): ma shes shing // rtogs par yang ni ma gyur na// mi 'jigs pa yang ma yin pa// mi gnod pa yang ma yin no// des na bya bral lhun grub las// rang sems bdud du ji ltar 'gyur// rang sems ye nas stong pa ste// der rtogs rkyen dang yang mi 'phrad//
302a7(rnying rgyud): gol ba'i rkyen dang der 'phrad pas// de ltar rang sems bdud du snang // rtogs pa'i rkyen ni rnam pa bzhi// dam pa'i rgyud don de dang gcig/ bla ma dam pa de dang gnyis// dam pa'i rdo rje spun dang gsum// man ngag dam pa de dang bzhi// 'di bzhi
302b1(rnying rgyud): na// 'a da sa ya maman/ na shA na man gyu/ da su nam // ba dgas mag nanas // ga spya // yonas pad
302b2(rnying rgyud): padang ma dang shAng / 'dzin phrag pa sa/ bang thas ma nas / na rgyams bsta/ 'didag na / de sbyinas yod kau/
302b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i man ga ste// sanas yod pa nyid shes/ dekar gos pa byin bzhin// dang banyid nas yang m+bu/ da na sgras dang gri ma pazhen/ golnga 'i byin gyis dang sems gos// rang sems go skabs rdzogs de de// 'ad pa
302b4(rnying rgyud): thug da rang ma / des ma shes ma ma bag/ zlab pa/ rnam ma ga pa 'dun/ de dag ba da pa mi// dbas padang brgyan das// dam rgya //
302b5(rnying rgyud): bstas/ das na ga ma than // du grugs kyi gan 'grug/ dzin nga gams rtogs pa'i gyi/ rkyen ldan pa da mas pas // degang seMnas cid dgas pa/ mtho sa la
302b6(rnying rgyud): na 'i na / ma sa / nga pas mas gas / sa
302b7(rnying rgyud): ni sa nga gas/ gapa pags ma da// de byin gago/ nga byung bye / nga 'a sa du du shes pas// tha 'du ci byed na gyu /
303a1(rnying rgyud): dngas tha pa nu gyur// de dag ba du kyi za ste// mA mo lam rgyad spyang las/ ma mo lam gyi bdud bstun pa la pra dAk+Sha 'o// / de nas ma mo 'jug pa yi// gang zag lags par bshad thag/
303a2(rnying rgyud): shes ma mo bsgom bya ba'i// gang zag 'di ltar shes par bya// dad dang brtson 'grus che ba dang // ji tshe shes shing khrel yod dang // mi dge'i bya ba kun sdom zhing // lus dag dge la dam tshig sdom// byang sems snying rje dga' sems ldan// rdu dug
303a3(rnying rgyud): gtan bsrung // dkon mchog spyi chang dang du len// dman pa rnams la snying rje ldan// dregs par rgyal gdul dka' 'dul// pha rol phyin bcu rgyud la skyes// rig pa'i brtul zhugs mngon du bya// gtor ma man+ta la rtag tu byed// tha ma mnyes pa'i thabs
303a4(rnying rgyud): lamakhas// rdo rje spun la dga' sems che// bud med tshogs la smod mi bya// ma mo 'dam tshig dbang rnams thob// rgya chen chos la mos pa bskyed// blo gros zab cing rgya chel// man ngag mtha' ru phyin pa yis// gang zag ye shes la ma la 'jug/ las
303a5(rnying rgyud): kyi ma mo sgrub pa yi// gang zag mtshan nyid 'di ltar brtags// 'jigs med snying stobs che ba yis// lus sems ngag ni rig pa dang // snying rje shas chung gsod la dga'// rnam rtog shas chung gnyid yang chung // ma zhums pa la 'jigs pa med// gsod/
303a6(rnying rgyud): la dga' zhing sha khrag la// rtag tu rol par byed pa dang // dur khrod ngam grog la sogs pa'i// gnas la dga' zhing srug sran che// ma mo'i dam rdzas tshol ba la// nyin mtshan srog kyang 'dor bar byed// las kyi ma mo'i mtshan nyid mkhas// bsnyen dang
303a7(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i// las kyi sgrub pa kun la mkhas// srog dang thun gyi las sogs pa'i// las kyi kha tshar kun la mkhas// ma mo skye dang bye brag gi// dam tshig rtag tu bsrung la brtson// rtag tu gnas su can 'grams shing // mchod dang gtor margyun mi gcing//
303b1(rnying rgyud): maman+t+ra ba'i dus shos shing // rgyu ba'i dus su gtor ma gtong // thun yang dbab pa shes pa dang // zla badrug dang lo gcig gam// lo gsum ston ni drang ma yal// sbrid dang mchog par mi gcod// thun gyi skabs su gnyid de bzhin// brang brdu 'i ngad dag
303b2(rnying rgyud): 'bod// tshe des sems 'khru ga 'chi ma gtong // dur khrod chas la dga' zhing rol// cha lugs bdud dang srin po 'dra// sha rtsa nag la ral pa kham// mngon spyod las kyi man ngag gi// bla ma rtag tu bsnyen cing bsten// dad dang brtson 'grus che ba la// ga
303b3(rnying rgyud): dang blo rgod sems med pa// las kyi ma mo bsgrub pa yi// gang zag 'di ni yin par gsungs// de ltar gyur pa'i gang zag gis// gsad gso las kyi rim pa dang // dbab gcad las kyi mtha' rnams kyis// 'grub par 'di la the tshom med// the tsomo spang ba'i las
303b4(rnying rgyud): rnams ni// 'grub par mkhas pas shes par bya// de dag ma mo sgrub pa yis// gang zag mtshan nyid bstan pa'o// gang zag mtshan nyid ma shes shing // mtshan nyid mi ldan slob ma la// ma mo'i sgrub pa ston byed pa// de yi bla ma dmu cor te// slob dpon phung ste slob
303b5(rnying rgyud): mazung // gnyis ka lung byed dmyal bar skye// dper na seng ge'i 'o ma yang // rin chen snod du bzho bya zhing // rdza dang kham phyi'i snod du min// rdza ma chag la 'o ma 'pho// de bzhin gsang ba'i ma mo yi// man ngag snying khu kun la min// phyal ba'i man ngag wa dang ngang //
303b6(rnying rgyud): ma mo lam rgyud lung las/ gang zag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas ma mo bsgom pa dang // las kyi ma mo sgrub pa yi// thun dang thun mtshams 'di lta ste// bud med ba la ni sbyin pa drug/ yud tsam yin te yud tsam
303b7(rnying rgyud): drug/ skad cig yin te skad cig drug/ thang gajig yin te thang gcig drug/ dang ba thun du mkhas pas bzung // mtshams rdzi thun pas ring du bya// gsal la rnam par ma 'dres pa// dang po'i thun la sems zin na// gnyis pa'i kun la brang gcig ni//
304a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur gyis ni ring bar bya// mtshams kyang thun dang mnyam par bya// de la rtog med sems gnas na// de yi nyis 'gyur thun la bsam// mtshams ni phyed kyis rang bar bsam// de bzhin rang gsal sems gnas
304a2(rnying rgyud): n+na// da yi su nu 'gyur rdzun du bsam// mtshams ni thung gcig brgya d+haH// de la rang rig rang gsal na// thun ni ba'i 'gyur gyur pa ste// de la mtshams kyi ming yang med// Ta rangs sgra rengs shar tsam nas// dgongs gang ma
304a3(rnying rgyud): kyi bar// rang sems yul la gnas par 'byung // nam sros thun ni skad cig ste// nyin mtshan thun ni phyed par 'gyur// de nas zla ba phyed dang gcig/ de nas zla ba'i thun 'phel nas// lo yi thun dang lo 'phel dang // bskal pa'i bar du thud 'phel
304a4(rnying rgyud): te// chos gcig la ni rang sems thob// dang po zang gcig bcu yi thun// de yang nyin thun pa'i mi tsul// TI rangs dang ni nyi shar mtshams// zan zos nas nonyon phyung bar// thun gnyis pa yi mtshams yin te// nyid byed nas nigs nas/
304a5(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'i thun mtshams yin par 'dod// de ltar 'gyur ba'i thun bzhi yang // ma mo bzhi yi rang bzhin de// thun gnyis pa la sogs pa yang // thun bzhi kun la sbyar bar bya// thun der bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yang // man ngag can gyis 'di ltar bya/
304a6(rnying rgyud): man ngag legs par thob pa dang // khyad par can gyi gnas btsal te// bar chad gang yang med pa'i gnas// bde zhing 'jam pa'i stan la yang // legs pa'i gos dang zas bshams la// ngal du bsgo ba'i sems spangs te// gnyid dang myos pa ma yin
304a7(rnying rgyud): pa// lus ngag sems ni bde ba dang // gzhan gyis g.yengs par ma yin par// rang sems dul zhing gnas pa yis// dus gsum stan la legs 'dug ste// dang por lus sems ca la dbab// de nas dmigs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/
304b1(rnying rgyud): rang ga bams nabab zlas gtad// mgal ma yan gabar la ltur// yul la ba rgyug pa'i sams// de ny-id las ni bzlog nas su// dmigs pa'i yul la rang bab gtud// dkar yang yang gsam pa dug// ting la numams stong
304b2(rnying rgyud): byed ba mams sgrub pa 'ad// nod par bam mi dzad pa nga/ byung ba // mangs pas 'di ltar pas la bar bya// ny-i dang drug pa 'gribs pa gsum// don gyi ma thang /
304b3(rnying rgyud): dang chung ngu ste// de dag dgu ru rim pasad dbye// 'di ni bsal ba'ang rnam gsum ste// chen po bskor ba byas pas sel// 'bring po byad la chu gtor te// chung ngu lus bsigs mig phye sel// de nas rgod pa bcum pa yang // tshe 'bring gong bzhin shes
304b4(rnying rgyud): sa na
304b5(rnying rgyud): bad med nan tan bya// dpa' bo dag ga ma rig 'dzin gyis// bsregs bcad brdar pa'i gser bzhin du// yongs su brtag nas ma mo'i lam// blang bar bya yis mos pa'am// dad pa tsam gyis 'jug pa min// lugs na phung ba khon ste// 'jig rten 'di drub kra mi
304b6(rnying rgyud): shis// ma mo 'khor gyis phyag mi zer// ma mo'i chos la skur pa 'debs// zab mo'i don yang 'dor bar byed// las kyi ma mo kha gting 'khrug/ 'jig rten dag tu rims dang nad// thog dang ser bas g.yos sogs// bkra mi shes pa'i rtags
304b7(rnying rgyud): rnams 'byung // de bas 'bad med bla ma bkur// bla ma las ni man ngag 'byung // man ngag las ni lam dang suM// bye ba nyid du the tshom me// ma mo lam rgyud lung las/ ye shes ma mo bsgom pa'i thun bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
305a1(rnying rgyud): dadas pas gyu mag/ rnamams ma nas can/ nazangs pa gangam dang/ nas kyim pa ga // thag 'a sa gas pa dag// namadza du 'a tsho// dpong

305a5(rnying rgyud): du / ma /

305b1(rnying rgyud): na ga thun la sags// 'di na kun gyi rang dbang mad// grub pa'o// bas stan spyod // las myos bas dru d+hA// nags skangs su man man// nam las// d+ma lung las/ las kyim myong thun bstan pa'i 'bru b+ha bcug
305b2(rnying rgyud): pa// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma mo las kyi rdzu 'phrul ni// mkhas pas 'di ltar shes par bya// rdon me mi rdzu 'phrul ni// mr-i Ti sbyor ba mkhas pa yis// rdo rna las kun ma la reg/ nod ma ru'abar nga ngang /
305b3(rnying rgyud): mthong ba yi rdzu 'phrul ni// zag pa mnyams bum par 'jug/ lam gyi sum med dang thus te// maM mas mi mthong nam khyud ste// de nas bral ba dang // mi las ma mthang bar blangs nas// rang gas bsngalag pa yis// rus pa pa
305b4(rnying rgyud): brdar byas nas// rang gi dpral bar bsdus byas na// sras kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas spyi ru 'od dbyung bar// 'dab chags dngul bya'i sbyar ba las// gad du 'gro dang dri tsam 'dod// 'od ni ngas par 'byung ba'o// / khang pa'i nang du 'ong la
305b5(rnying rgyud): gas pa'i da nga na// dpa yod nad ma lung // ma sa rdzu 'dzi lo// sa tham tshig gi // ga gra dag la yin 'am/ da ga cig sa sa la// de nas kyi nga legs sa bya// dmapa
305b6(rnying rgyud): gyi nam dbyung // gang 'du mi ga gzugs rnam pa byung // don la po 'du 'bru'i seMni// shing gi thang pa dag ni/ sa kyid bcu// rtswa bdun ya sa rje// rdo da gas dang shing 'grags// gangal bdapa bathal
305b7(rnying rgyud): hU~M// rkye mdu mtshams su gdon / da ni phreng ba'i rdzu 'gyu hU~M// rang gi 'di thar pas btabang rnaM// ta dra dang rig 'dzin 'jug// gzhan gyis grub pa mamanan// drang pa me mi rje 'phrul na// mu zhing snying ba mnyams pa/
306a1(rnying rgyud): delas thar ba'i gnags byasmra// dang dpa ngas kyis kyil byas// rlung ba gang yang medapal// mun par phung ba bzhagan// ngas par mi drunang byaste// ltung ba dag las ma yin na/ bdag ma
306a2(rnying rgyud): te// thams cad rdzas kyi sbyor ba ste// rdzu 'phrul yin phyir rtog pa med// 'jigs pa 'byung bas mthu du brten// 'jigs las rnam tog zug pa 'byung // nam tog phrag las gdon 'jug ste// gdon las nad zhugs na nas // 'chi
306a3(rnying rgyud): dngas gru ba yin// gzhan yang sngags kyi rnga 'thil da// sngags dang rdzas kyi chu 'phrul dang / zod byas du 'phrul la sogs pa// man dag can las shes par bya// de ltar du 'phrul bstan pas kyang // grwa phyogs rje 'jal dmyal bcag/
306a4(rnying rgyud): lam b+ha lung las/ mamo'i rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de ltar lam gyi rgyud lung las// le'u bcu gsum gsungs pa yi// ma me skye yo don de yang // bdu drug par du gsungs pa'i doH// ye shes man
306a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa yi// spyi dang bye brag gnyis ka yin// las kyi ma mo'i sgrub pa ye// b+hi dang bye brag gnyis ka yid// blan ming bshad par shes bya yi// no ma dang sbub par byed pa la// ma mo s+t+rai dang bye brag la// dbye ba yod pa ma yinaH// sri na mam
306a6(rnying rgyud): grub na// bye brag byi bag sgrub pa yin// bsrub par bya ba ma thi la// sgrub par byed pas sgrub thabs yod// srub zabs mnang ba na las shes/ ldan dag tham yig pa la ga/ zhal ni thugs kyi dkyil nas 'byung // de bsas so
306a7(rnying rgyud): rigs parjid 'dra 'a ga nga lasaca tshu/ 'i rgyal sasu / nga bam seMgs / 'grangs sa spyong du/ nga rgya skyes
306b1(rnying rgyud): kyang // de yis thugs bsrung legs par bya// 'gro dang 'dug pa'i spyod lam la// skyil dang bsu dang gdan bstab dang // zas kyi phud phul bag kyis brta// mdar na de dang ci mthun bya// mkhas pas bye brag shes par bya// gzhan yang bla ma'i gnyan
306b2(rnying rgyud): 'dun dang // rdzas dang phongs spyod thams cad la// mkhas pas 'di ltar shes par bya// gnyen 'dun bu dang chung ma la// nga bo'am yi ma lha li tshul// de la mchod dang bsnyen dang bkur// bla ma'i gnyen gde brten te// dzam de las tang bar 'phags
306b3(rnying rgyud): bla ma rdzas ni drag bzhin du// srud du mi rlung reg mi rung // gyig du mi rnyeng sngor mi rung // de ltar spyod na dmatshig rngan// dam tshig sngags kyi sa gzhi yin// de las bsgoms bsgrubs dngos grub 'byung // gsang sngags spyod pa'i ral 'byor pas
306b4(rnying rgyud): bag mags dpa'i tshul bzhin du// de ltar bla na mchog stan// rnam sgrub dus sun la 'byor bas// burnams mnongs pa'i tshul bzhin du// bla ma brten pa'i rnal 'byur bas// rang gi mig gi 'bras bu bzhin// mig gi 'bras bu gces
306b5(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin// man ngag dam pa de bas 'phangs// mnang gdon la sgrub 'dod ni// rdzas dang yo byad chags mi bya// rdzas dang yo byad btsal dka' zhing // rnyed nas rang la 'das pa ltar// man dag dam pa btsal dka' zhing // rnyed nas spel ba de bas dka'/
306b6(rnying rgyud): bu dang chung ma snying sdug ste// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpas sdub// zasad da rdzas kyis tshim pa las// lus sems bde bar sdang ba ste// gnyis med ye shes ro rtogs na// de yi bde ba de yis 'phel// bde ba bla ma las rtags phyir// dam pa'i bla ma rtag
306b7(rnying rgyud): bsten// ma mo lam chud lung las/ thams cad ma mo sgyid dbye brag tu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / rgya gar gyi mkhas gru gu rgya gsang ba dang 'brog mas bsgyur ba'o// / rdzogs b+h+yo//
307a1(rnying rgyud): ga shU thA/ r+m+ma TI pa sa ma gar rnam brdzun ma/ 'dam dun/ thugs kyi srung ma da la ma byung rgyag/ btsam ldan 'ad da can rnal bul
307a2(rnying rgyud): rud pa'i dus mabyung thun pa na/ da 'i rgyam mug grang drung giginam bcom ldan 'das khrigs tshin pa dang na 'dongs ta ga sa/ ring ngabams cad kyi martsom pa' las gang ba mnyon nis/ man pa da ba sa
307a3(rnying rgyud): chen po'i blo gsang ba'i gnas nas/ thig le chen po'i tshul du bzhengs nas/ rdo rje gsang ba'i thugs ka nas/ skye dkar po bzhi las gsang ba'i dgyes pa'i 'gro 'dra thun me chad par nga bye ba las/ su kha po'i theg dgyes pa chen pos rngam par mdzad do//
307a4(rnying rgyud): chen mo nyi ba ni sung yi dgyes pa chen pas thim par mdzad nas/ brgya'i 'dab ma rgyas par mdzad // pad+ma'i 'dab ma byas par gyur pas sdang sring thams cang rdorjer rtsab btags par gyur te/ chags pa'i sems g.yos nas shin tu ngomatshar nyes rdzas/ rje
307a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul gyi yul bye shugs kyis chags pa'i gzhi ma ga la ba der dang ngo // dong nas b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor chags pa'i gnas su phyin nas/ bsngags nas so so nas gus par phyag 'tshal ni/ gsung bya na'i gco mo gnad 'dul la'i \u0f7fla po la sogs pa
307a6(rnying rgyud): dazung dru di tshogs dang gsung drung lha'i rgyal po srid pa'i phra min rgya mtsho ma la sogs pa/ ma mo bcu bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang / srid pa'i sman mo'i tshogs sam/ lha'i tshogs kyi rdo la sogs pa mamo'i tshogs thams cad dang / gzhan yang pad+ma'i b+ha ga la
307a7(rnying rgyud): pams cad chags pa'i mdings phyung nas/ bsring zhing bya 'tshal bang / btong par shes pa'i sa yu chen mo nyid du la 'i'i rtag las/ rtag pa bya'i man bas pa pa ga te sa kyi mkha' 'jom lnga'i dkyi pa ma 'dzin
307b1(rnying rgyud): danam sam can ma pa / gas na 'das 'as rgya can pa da du/ laganags nas/ ba ma nga nas nas na 'dum pa dang/ nanas mas lan sa sa zlas pa sasu na dus pa
307b2(rnying rgyud): bar ga pamabyung nas/ bcang nang kyil mi nas / 'ju pa ma dus de na cwam dani 'anga'i ma ces pa kyi danang 'du sbyin pa 'an
307b3(rnying rgyud): dag sngags phyags su sa la gnas par gyur te// de nas sam tshan mas zhug dan 'phrul la gzigs nas sngags kyi badz+ran ga mdzad pa las/ de nas sgra gdon 'dral tan las langs nas/ daco sa ldan 'das la lan brgya spong ba mag rgyal zhing
307b4(rnying rgyud): nan ba sanas sna ma / 'byu rdul snga / migs ma lags// sul pags pa'i 'a lags/ dzin pa rnag pa/ da sngas / ga
307b5(rnying rgyud): da nas rab skul bste// sems kyi ga na co// khe zhes mang ba tha las // mi shes sa da gu lus par// sprul pa ma bang las thA/ me pas nga / ma 'azhes
307b6(rnying rgyud): mabus bum 'chastan// nga dngang ba ga sa grug// thod pa dbang minid byed kyi/ rangs nga tub de yang lagrus/ dmachogasang sanas mche ba'i ma// sal sa nang ba sa dulags// 'di byin 'dri 'phreng gyi du
307b7(rnying rgyud): tshen du du / 'ang dag zhi gyi/ dun nas kri dris byeng / yang gangag kyis 'phrul du// nang yul su mag/ yu mi kyil ni phyi
308a1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi gtan tshigs su// srid pa kun gyi bca' bzhi rnams// yang dag nyid du bshad par bya// de la dani ma mo bcu zhi 'jo mo bshad par bya ste/ yu mtshan ma nyid bzhi mkha' zhes bya ba/ sru'i khyon da 'i rang
308a2(rnying rgyud): gling bzhi tsam yod pa/ dbu bzhizhal rnam pa lngar snang ba/ phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha thags pa/ zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa/ tse ta'i rtsa ba gcig la rtse mo rnam pa ldang 'bar ba/ shar gyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar nas gsang ba'i mkha' gangal 'dzu /
308a3(rnying rgyud): shel gyi b+ha ga la rdo rje'i ge sar can no// lho'i zhabs gnyis kyi bar nas gsang ba'i mkha' drol 'jam pa ke ke ru'i b+ha ga la rin po che'i ge sar can no// nub kyi zhabs gnyis kyi bar nas gsang ba'i mkha' gsher la brlan pa pad+ma'i b+ha ga la byi ru'i ge sar can no// byang
308a4(rnying rgyud): zhabs gnyis kyi bar nas gsang ba'i mkha' rtsub la grang ba ste ge sar dpal de ltar gsang ba'i mkha' bzhis skya btun pas/ de bzhi'i klong skra'i gting khung du bsdus pa ni g.yu'i bad klong la chags pa'i ge sar can no// zangs ma'i ral pa 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa zhig yod
308a5(rnying rgyud): dza// de la zhal rnam pa lnga las shar gyi zhal dkar la 'tshe rang mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ shel gyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa 'dzin pas 'byung bas ru b+hin gyis brlabs te rdo rje'i rigs su gyur to// lho phyogs kyi zhal rang bzhin rdzo la dngas pa mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang
308a6(rnying rgyud): nas/ ke ke ru ba rab dgu 'dzin pas/ 'byung ba me chu byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che'i rigs su gyur to// nub phyogs kyi zhal rang bzhin dmar la gdangs pa mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas barma gu brtsegs bzung bas/ 'byung bachur byin gyis brlabs
308a7(rnying rgyud): te/ gas sa // kyang phyogs kyis pa nga bzhin rdzo 'dzi pa mtsho ba gcags pa'i na sa/ rjod byas ma dbu rtsegs bzung bas/ 'byung brgyang tsun gyis 'arlangs nya las kyi rigs su byung // thams cad de ga bu'i dmyal labar gyur ba /
308b1(rnying rgyud): dbus kyi zhal rang bzhin se la ldem pa'am zer yang 'gyur ba mche ba gtsigs pa'i nang nas/ gser gyi 'khor martsabs stang dang ldan pa zhig bzung bas 'byung ba nam mkhar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su gyur to// 'byung ba rnga yang de ltar
308b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed do// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyang der byung ngo // zhal so so'i bar bar nas ral pa so so'i rigs dang mthun par snang ngo // tsit+ta rtsa ba gcig la rtse mo lnga sdang bas rtse mo lnga las rigs lnga'i ye shes lnga yang de las shar ro// rtsa ba gcig las chos
308b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings kyang de las 'dus te/ mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes kyang de la grags so// shar phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' grang la 'gred pas dgun du byin gyis brlabs so// byang phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' chub la grang bas dpying du byin gyis brlabs so//
308b4(rnying rgyud): nung phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' gsher la ba dran pas dbyar du byin gyis brlabs so// lho phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' drol 'jam pas ston du byin gyis brlabs so// dus bzhi yang de ltar chags so// cha yang de ltar mnyam mo// skra stod kyi zhal nas
308b5(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i rigs la he ru ka'i sangs rgyas rnams/ sgra spang gsang ba'i b+ha ga la sbyor ba'i tshul du su byang nub tsam bzhugs pas skye ba rigs so so de ltar thon to// rigs so sor btul ba yang de ltar brtul lo// phyag bzhil g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis kyi
308b6(rnying rgyud): mamo bcu bzhi'i 'atso ba srid pa bde 'gro ma dang / nyi zla'i zong phreng can gnyis kyi snying kyi bzung ba/ g.yas g.yon tha ma gnyis kyis thos pa'i dbang mche gnyis kyi skye tu bzung ba/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i longs spyod mngon du mdzad pa/
308b7(rnying rgyud): zhabs da byed kyis dbyings kyi ma bzhi dang / thugs kyi dgyes ske mo bzha'i snying brdzis pa/ dbus kyi zhal dpral ba'i dbyes nas me ga zung gsum pa gcig gis gzigs pas/ ma mo bya bzhi'i khol mo srid pa chags byad ma dang / shan shon ne'u dang / e
309a1(rnying rgyud): ngal gcig mA la sogs pa 'dang lkug sdug byed pa/ dbyas kyinal nas klan tha ba dbas pas spyan gas nal sags te snying pa'i mamathams cad sa tad mar gyis 'byin pas/ ma mad bang du yang dang // dam
309a2(rnying rgyud): kyis ni mtha' yel ye la rdzogs/ srid pa gsum gyi rtse mo yang der rdzogs so// sku gsang ba'i b+ha ga la yum gyi mkha' bde ba chen po klong zhes kyang de la bya'o// su rtag pa chen po g.yung drung du bzhugs pa la/ skye shi las 'das pa zhes kyang de la bya'o// de
309a3(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas mya ngan las 'das ma zhes kyang de la bya'o// de lta bu la blang dor med pas kun tu bzang mo zhes kyang de la bya'o// rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi bcud len pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes kyang de la bya'o// 'byung ba
309a4(rnying rgyud): la rdzogs pas 'byung ba'i rgyal mo zhes kyang de la bya'o// dus bzhi dbyings la shar bas/ dus bzhi cha snyoms ma zhes kyang de la bya'o// stu stod kyi zhal nas 'byung ba rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams sku smad nas byung ba'i gsang ba'i lha ga la bzhugs pas
309a5(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi yum zhes kyang de la bya'o// sbas pa'i phyag gnyis las bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i longs spyod mngon du mdzad pas bdud rtsi'i rgyal mo zhes kyang de la bya'o// snang srid thams cad gtan la 'bebs pas srid pa'i rgyal mo zhes kyang de la bya'o// sku gcig
309a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan dgu ma zhes kyang de la myang // de la thugs las drang ba'i snying po ni/ zhing bzhi mu kha le kro ShI shwa d+hI thA ga pad ma bya bde klong 'dus 'dus spyod la dzA ga yu ti b+h+ya// yang ma mo zhes bya ba ni/ ma ni rgyal ba kun gyi yum// mo ni srid pa kun gyi ma// ma
309a7(rnying rgyud): skye ba med pa'i dbyings// mo ni 'gag pa med pa'i klong// mni thabs mchod rtag me mapa'// man shes rab chags med klong // de lta bu'i rgyam chen mo la su spyod nas 'byung ba'i rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang / hU~M wad kyi rta gar sbyor ba mdzad pa
309b1(rnying rgyud): sras mo lnga yod de/ gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal zhes bya ste/ sku mdog dkar mo la shal gyi ral ba can gsang ba'i mkha' shel gyi ga'ur 'khyil ba/ ma chags pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar ba zhes bya hA/
309b2(rnying rgyud): sgra mdog sngon mo la rin po che'i lan phran can/ gsang ba'i mkha' rin po che'i ga'ur 'khyil ba/ mi len pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal ma zhes kyang bya ste/ sku mdog dmar mo byu ru'i lan phran can/ gsang ba'i mkha'
309b3(rnying rgyud): b+hu ru'i ga'ur 'khyil pa/ gnyis su med pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos zhes kyang bya ste/ sku mdog ljang gu la rdo rje lan phran can gsang ba'i mkha' rdo rje ga'ur 'khyil ba/ ma chags pa'i thabs la rol pa'o//
309b4(rnying rgyud): gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal ma bkrag gsal ma zhes kyang bya ste/ sku mdog cir yang 'gyur ba la g.yu'i lan phran can/ gsang ba'i mkha' g.yu'i ga'ur 'khyil ba/ gnyis med brten pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// 'di lnga ni mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga zhes kyang bya ste/
309b5(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi yum lnga bya ba yang 'di lnga yin/ sems can dus chen po la babs pa yang 'di lngas dbang byed do// srog las drang ba'i snying po ni/ gri swa mu hUM ta/ dz+wa la pa raM ha/ byi sha san ti ta/ b+hi laM yi he ha/ ma hA li te ha/ de ltar bdag nyid bsgom
309b6(rnying rgyud): pa ni// dang por de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bsgom pa ni/ thugs ka nas yi ge oM dkar po gcig las ye shes lnga'i gzhal yas khang chos kyi dbyings khyab brdal ba'i dbus su/ bdag nyid bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/ snying
309b7(rnying rgyud): gar mu le las ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo bskam/ mig g.yas pa ha las mkha' 'gro ma nam spang gsal bar bsgom mo// mig g.yon pa ha las mkha' 'gro ma 'od gsal bar bsgom mo// rna ba g.yas par ha las mkha' 'gro ma gnyen gsal 'bar
310a1(rnying rgyud): par rnam mo// na ba g.yon pa nya las mkha' 'gram yang gsal g.yos banam/ sbrul/ las ma kha' 'grom pakrug gas mnyam ba thos/ sgra ma dag dang phyug mtshan 'gag tshig bshad dang skur/ ma marnams
310a2(rnying rgyud): gyi jo mo d+ha yang gsang thig le gtan tshigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang // bdag nyid phyag rgyar bskyed bya ba// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid
310a3(rnying rgyud): ji ltar bdag nyid nan tan bgyi// mngon rdzogs dpal la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid las// ji ltar dkyil 'khor bskyod bya ba// ngas bstan
310a4(rnying rgyud): pa la gdon mi za// nyon cig gdon 'dul lha yi gtso// 'jug dang bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid de// sa bon gyis ni brtan par bya// bdag nyid thig le mnyam sbyar nas// rnam gsum rim gyis ting 'dzin bsgom// dmigs med ting 'dzin rnam dag gi
310a5(rnying rgyud): skye med chos nyid dbyings su thim// dmigs med ma chags sa bon gyis// de bzhin nyid du rnam par grags// snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo ltar// blang dor med par snang ba yi// mtshams su sbyor ba'i sa bon gyis// kun tu snang zhes grags pa yi
310a6(rnying rgyud): bdag gi rlung las gyur pa yis// 'og gi phyogs su sa bon brten// bdag gi chu las gyur pa yi// de yi steng du sa bon brten// bdag gi sa las gyur pa yis// sa bon la ni spris ma brtan// bdag gi me las gyur pa yi// sa bon la ni drong
310a7(rnying rgyud): du ldan// bdag gi nam mkha'i ngo bo las// sa bon gsum gyis snang srid bsgom// dbyings las 'byung lnga rgyur bskyed de// mkha' la rlung brtan 'gro lnga'i gnas// b+ha ga nyid du gsal ba las// sa bon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/
310b1(rnying rgyud): sa / na/ na/ // sa ga/
310b2(rnying rgyud): su ma zhig sa zhi
310b3(rnying rgyud): skyed ma lasam khan nyis// rlung sbyin phyogs sa ma bstan pa la/ ni hrI la na me yi byabs// dbyings rgyag/ man na pal thugs// bdag da sa ni rlu thugs// ga su ma dpa la rdzogs/ rim ma byad kya
310b4(rnying rgyud): rnams pakye'o// rtag brgya bzhi'i gdon // bdag nyid kyang chub drug la la swA// stong ba mas na mngan ldani/ seM na kya kya byung // rnam pa shi pa na stong // me shes drug gzug nar bcas// rnam nang
310b5(rnying rgyud): dpe mudu dang yang Thag+sa// rdzu 'phrul ba ni y-i zhabs dang ldan// bdag gi gzugs kya bal ste// rnal 'brur nga ba zhi ba da mchag ma// byab ma rnams kyi dbyings// da rtog pa rdzogs kyid kyi'o// 'di ze la btsu nas 'dra/
310b6(rnying rgyud): l+h+wam pa na / shes rgyan btsug tu bces// byabs mtshams gnan pa gabras brgyad gis// mgashegs par rjod pa dzin// // hUM ni meng pa'i yang dam sa// slong pags
310b7(rnying rgyud): da pa'i gyig sa 'das gsung// ma ba'i nga da su sa/ 'gas zu sa pa pa ma
311a1(rnying rgyud): sangs srubar pa'i las// sangs nas langs tha na napa/ bar la mu' pa'i grang ston // 'dzum pa'i bladangs su 'phrul ladun / dum na
311a2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtse'i char chen yob to// hUM mnyam bzhag ye shes pad+ma'i dbyings// 'phyang gnas skye 'grathar pa'i lam// rin chen dkyil 'ang mthong yangs kyi// kyi dpal rnga rje gsang ba'i gtor// de skang bdud rtsi char chen phab// trAM/ b+ha gra pa 'i
311a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'dab brgyad mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan// phyi lcags nang rten mo 'phang bcas// rin chen dkyil 'jam snyan bting te// bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// lcags khrol gdan phyagadan las rgyag sa// rin chen
311a4(rnying rgyud): brtsegs pa'i ga'u ru// bla med khrag 'thung spu bsil nas// bdud rtsi chen po'i bum pa yis// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bag chags bkrus// hUM/ mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa che// ma chags pa la chags pa che// thar lam bde ba rtaga'i
311a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings// blang dor med pa'i klong yangs su// srid pa'i bag chags bkru ba'i phyir// skyid pa la bla na med pa yi// gsang ba'i don ldan lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgra bya ste// yo shes chu bas khrus chen mdzod// oM/ thabs las
311a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings byung thar pa'i lam// dbyings las thabs bzhengs bla med sgra// bla med dbyings dang ye shes sbyor ba las// bdud rtsi chen po'i char chen srid paras// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchod par spro// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro stong ba'i
311a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs su sgra// 'gro ba rigs drag sgrib pa sbyar ba'i phyag rgya chen por spro// mu stegs bdud 'dul khro rgyal tshogs su spro// sdug bsngal zad byed bdud po'i char chen khro// dbang po gsal byed ye shes sngon ma waM// 'dod chags tshim byed gsang
311b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i sems swA// !/ byang chub sems kyi dgul las// ma 'phyags ldan gyi rdzogs pas na// thams cad kyang chub nyid kyi dang // zhes grangs te gnyis su med par snag/ gnyis med sbyar ba thog lachan pa// gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'ad bar las/
311b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba lnga yi 'phro 'du byung // bdag gi sa yi bo las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro brtan 'bar sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'jigs pa yi dbu gsum gyis// dug gsum dbying pu sgrol byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag
311b3(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong // mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog las// dkar la dag pa'i na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// sa bdag gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi rlung las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni sku rababyed
311b4(rnying rgyud): pa// mkha' 'gro yang gsal sems ma'i mchog/ thogs pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis// khams gsum dbyings su sgrol byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong // sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog las// ldong
311b5(rnying rgyud): sun ba 'a ba DU// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// gnod sbyin gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi chu las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni sku bskyed las// mkha' 'gro gnyen gsal sems ma'i mchog/ rol pa chen po'i dbu
311b6(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis// dug gsum dbyings su sgrol byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtab tu gtong // mtshon du med pa'i sku mchog las// dmar po dbang gi na nga las brgyan// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// chu bdag gang
311b7(rnying rgyud): la brgyab bskum bzhugs// bdag gi maM las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro'ode gsal sems ma'i mchog/ stobs ldan mchog gi dbu gsum gyis// srid gsum thig ler sgrol byed cing // pha rol gyin drug phyag
312a1(rnying rgyud): drA las// sbyin pa chan rtag ca gtong // mtshan du med pa'i sku mchag las// nan can dz+nyAn ma'i nabazas brtan// du myal bka ye zhabs dag gis// b+ha bain de'i gdan la btung brgya ma bzhugs/
312a2(rnying rgyud): bdag gi bkrag las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni sbyar bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro ba thag gsal sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'gyur ba yi dbu gsum gyis// skye 'gro mkha' la sgrol byed ma// pha rol byin drug phyag kyi las// ma~M bzang po mi sbya
312a3(rnying rgyud): N+Do// tsi yang 'gyur ba'i sgra mdog la// btso ma gser rtsen brna' mas la// du 'phrul ba ni yi zhabs dag gis// brgya byin gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi gab pa'i thig le las// ma ngon las ni skur bskyed pa// dan med
312a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i yab rtsam gyis// sbyor ba'i gnas su drug po bting // bdag gi 'od zer sna tshogs las// sa bon las ni slar bskyed pa// dpal 'bar khro mo nyid kyi sku// bdag gi da ma bzhi po las// sa bon las ni skur 'byed pa// gsang ba'i yu
312a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dang ma babyin pa las// sa bon las ni sbar bskyed pa// khams gsum gdang ga cod byed kyi sku// bdag gi bde chen gas pa las// sa bon las ni sur bskyed pa// dug gisu ma dbar spad byed kyi bu// bdag ni
312a6(rnying rgyud): dpag bas ma shing bu las// sa bon las ni sku rabaskyed pa// skye shi cang gcod nyid kyi sku// g.yang gzhi dag gI gdan steng na// bdag gi bde chen gsang ba las// sa bon las ni spar babyed pa// padz+ra shan tid dbang gi hUM// 'dod kham
312a7(rnying rgyud): chen mo gtso mo yum// bdag gi srid pa'i mdo spyod las// sa ba ni las ni slar bskyed pa// yar+tha kho mchog nyid kyi lce// bdag gi dang po'i mdo sprad las// sa bon las ni spar bskyed pa// ya o rkyeg rI dwe// gas g.yon thangs dang na
312b1(rnying rgyud): rlob las// mabon las ni sur babyed pa// bang+gA shA d+his ma ya// bdag gi srid pa 'dug byed las// sa ban las nI byung bskyed pa// klum tho thAT+Ti // smye tag tu bsgom pa 'aM/ nad pa po dang bya mo// bam ma pa'ang mags
312b2(rnying rgyud): sred pa'i sngon du byung ba yin// sangs rgyas pas ni shin tu bkres// lnga las gyur pa'i byang ma lwa// gnyen med srid pa'i gsung drung yin// bskyed pa'i khro mo bcu gsum ni// ci yang mi 'od srun drug ste// nus med sun drug bcu gdum yin/
312b3(rnying rgyud): mtshon du med pa'i nam mkha' las// gza' skar mang po 'bar bltar// byang chub sems kyi thig le las// rig pa'i phyag rgya cir yang snang // skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings su thim// gsang chen bde ba'i rdo rje las// b+ha ga'i dkyil dul
312b4(rnying rgyud): sgo// tso nas bzhim dkyil 'khor bsgyur// ngas gsungs pa la mtsham med// dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i bca' gzhig papa'i thig le'i len zhe gnyis pal/ gdon 'dul tsa yi stA ya gsol pa// 'grobs mas
312b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun// rtag pa'i nad kyis zin pa la// bdud rtsi sman gtang ji ltar lags// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gas na nas kyang // zla med dpal gyis bka' stsal po// rtog pa'i nang gzhi la sman chen po// ngas
312b6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa la the tshom med// ngas bstan pa la gdon mi za// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// chu gcig dang ni rkyen gnyis las// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs pa// stong gsum sbyangs pas dri mchog 'gyur// dug gsum nad kyi ga
312b7(rnying rgyud): po yin// rgyu gnyis dang ni rkyen gnyis las// sa rban gyis ni rnam spangs pa// spro ba spu du ba 'phrul ba dang // 'gro 'dul rnam rtag thams cad 'dul// nyon mongs lnga yi nad rnams ni// sgyu gsum dang ni rkyen lnga las// sa bon gyis ni yang dran
313a1(rnying rgyud): ngas// slob mug yos par gyur pa ni// rnam shes bcad na kun nAH// 'jigs pa'i nad rnams zhi bar byed// bdug gi bral ma lto las// sa pan gyis ni rnam spangs twa// zos na man tan
313a2(rnying rgyud): thub chen po gti mug yin// bdag gis dngos po mAM sa las// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs te// zos na yon tan gnyis dang ldan// dngos grub chen po nga rgyal yin// bdag gis khrag las gyur pa yi// so bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs pa// thos na yon te
313a3(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// dngos grub chen po 'dod chags yin// bdag gis dri chu las gyur pa'i// sa bon gyis ni rnam spangs te// thos na yon tan gnyis dang ldan// dngos grub chen po phrag dog yin// bdag gis gsang ba'i sa bon las// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs te/
313a4(rnying rgyud): zos na yon tan gnyis dang ldan// dngos grub chen po zhe sdang yin// kun 'dus gcig tu gyur pa yin// phra mo stong dang sbom po bkyed// btus nas gong bur dril ba las// bsdus pa'i sa bon gyis sbyangs pa// spro bsku 'od du gyur pas na// thabs dang shes
313a5(rnying rgyud): rab phyag rgya las// zos na dpal chen dngos grub thob// mkha' 'gro ma rnams mgu bar byed// chu gsum rkyen lnga bdud rtsi chen po las// snang ba chen po snang srid 'char ba'i chu// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi 'byung gnas te// mkha' 'gro ma can
313a6(rnying rgyud): srog gi chun// rang bzhin bdud ci chen po'i 'byung gnas yin// rang blung rnam dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// bshad rtsi chen po stong pa nyid bzhugs pas// dug gsum toshi brdad kyi gnyen po yin// theg che nas gaN+DI chen po las// rtse mchog mang po
313a7(rnying rgyud): dun rgyas te// 'gro ba nyi gsas su gyur // bdag nyid su tu men pa'i kyi la 'khor las// srog gis bsgos pang sems can thams cad dkun// nematog na gyigasas su che// rmugs markyen pa'i bdud kyi ste// ma rin dmyal pa'i dong zhes na/
313b1(rnying rgyud): de skad ces ni dka' stsal pas// rdo rje sems dpa' dang lha gdon 'dul la sogs te 'khor der 'dus pa rnams bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor gyis gtan du tshims nas mi 'chi ba'i dngos grub thob bo// bdud rtsi chen po lngas rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma bcoms nas/ chos
313b2(rnying rgyud): nyid du gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i bca' gzhi'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i sems can thams cad/ 'dod chags kyis ni khams gsum 'khor// zhe sdang gis ni ngan song ltung // de la
313b3(rnying rgyud): nan tan bgyi// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// gtso bo yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ji ltar chags sdang rnam pa gnyis// dngos grub chen po rangs bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung dung yang dag pa// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// pa dang
313b4(rnying rgyud): po dang // lha dang bram ze mu stegs dang // bran dang g.yog po la sogs te// zhing bcu dag tu bstan pa la// phung po bsad de snying phyung na// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// ma dang bu mo sring mo rnams
313b5(rnying rgyud): lha mo klu mo rigs ngan rnams// bran mo g.yog mo la sogs te// gdol pa mo dang phyal ba la// tshul dgur sbyar na dngos grub 'thob// ces bka' stsal pa dang / g.yung drung lha sogs ya mtshan du gyur nas/ sngangs te ci yang mi lbu bar/ 'khor de dang
313b6(rnying rgyud): las 'khor gyi gtso bo dpal rdo rje sems dpa' stan las langs te/ ye shes bzhi'i brkyang phyag phyogs bzhir 'tshal te/ bag bzhis la brdabs nas lus brkyangs te/ rgyal po rdzogs pa'i zhabs spyi bos blangs te/ dngos grub myur bar 'dod pa'i phyir phyag rgya ba
313b7(rnying rgyud): nas gsol pa/ pha dang nye bzhi zhing bcu dag/ bsad na dngos grub thob pa yis// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin la// zhing bcu bsad na dngos grub thob// rtog pa sna tshogs las bya'o// ma dang nye baphyal pa dang // sbyor na dngos grub thob pa yi/
314a1(rnying rgyud): 'dumanas pa ma nan// das tha ma na/ shAn pas s+ho// sa gas shA du/
314a2(rnying rgyud): sa ngas gcig tu khams 'thugs nas/ thams dpa banyis pa bdapas nas sa mdzes// da pam chen du lam s+ho// zhes chag rgyas ste/ bsa'a'adas pa na sa gyi ba nga sanas
314a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po la rtog go// de nas de lta bu'i spyod da thugs su chud nas/ 'khor thams cad la dgyes pa ye shes kyi madrangs kyis gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'khor la gdung ba dang // sems can kun la thugs brtse'i phyir// rdod sems dpa
314a4(rnying rgyud): ba legs// srin mang dran pa gnas su smras// med pa thams cad padi la 'bod// ngas kyang bdud rtsi'i ming pa TIg// 'dun sa ma la ldan snyam/ zhes brjod pas 'khor kun sems na la drabab pa dang / srid pa thams cad dus cwog tu na

314a6(rnying rgyud): bas// srid pa'i bag chags ma lus babyung // lnga mo tshogs sus pan gyis// sgo g+ha krug nar ba med// snying brtse bra la shugs dag gis// ba~Msdus nas rgyal ba'i ris bzhin// sgo byed pa mes drod kyis// na kyi dam

314b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i sa bon skal tshigs la// dgye ba'i sa bon g.yas g.yon la// bstim pa'i sa bon gsang ba la// lcags kyu'i sa bon rkang gnyis la// lcags phyogs bon lag gnyis la// bskyod pa'i sa bon mtshams su ste// thos nas banyis su med
314b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyu// mchod pa ci yi sa bon gyis// spyong khams bkang nas mnyes mchod la// rigs drug 'gro ba'i sdig sbyangs nas// 'jug pa'i sa bon chen po yis// bzlas nas kun bzung mkha' la bstim// gting dpag med pa'i rgya mtsho/
