321a1(rnying rgyud): lnga'o// dus bzhi shul mtshan mo ni rgyal bdud kyi chung ma'o// ma mo rang rang gis bkol thabs ni yum chen mo nyid kyis mkha' la rtsu pa'i mamo gsum dang / dbyings las shar ba'i ma mo gsum dang / yi dam
321a2(rnying rgyud): brgom legs ma mo dang bdun 'khol lo// des srid pa bde 'gro ma 'khol lo// des rdo rje te ma khros pa'i dbang mo che dang / pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des sred pa chags byed ma 'khol lo// des e ka dza Ti la sogs pa ma mo
321a3(rnying rgyud): bdun 'khol lo// des 'dod khams lha yi gtso mo dang // rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma gnyis 'khol lo// des nam mkha'i rgyal mo dang gling bzhi spyi phud ma 'khol lo// bu mo spun lnga ni srid pa thams cad la dbang byed do// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkra
321a4(rnying rgyud): gas la mnyam gyis ni nyi ma'i thod phreng can 'khol lo// des srid pa cha snyoms ma 'khol lo// des ni sa bdag pad+ma thod phreng 'khol lo// des e ka tsa ra ma 'khol lo// de rnams ni dbus kyi hu le ste nam gyi gung la rgyu/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang
321a5(rnying rgyud): gsal gyis ni khams gsum chags byed khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des dkar mo mig gcig ma 'khol lo// des rgyan gyi rgyal mo 'khol lo// des gu 'degs ma ha ra ting dkar mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo dkar mo mche ba can
321a6(rnying rgyud): 'khol lo// des sring mo bzhi ste gling bzhi spyi 'gro ma 'khol lo// 'di rnams ni shar gyi nyu le ma ste nam gyi srod la chu'o// rtag pa'i rtsal mo 'od gsal 'bar gyis ni/ srid pa bde sbyor khrol pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des thugs kyi dgyes sde ma
321a7(rnying rgyud): nag mo ral pa can 'khol lo// des dbyings phyug ma 'khol lo// des gru 'degs mdun ting nag mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo kha bla na ma 'khol lo// des sring mo mkha' la khrung lding me 'khol lo// 'di rnams ni lho'i hu le ma sten
321b1(rnying rgyud): kyi 'ding la chu'o// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal mas ni/ rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang moche 'khol lo// des thugs kyi dkyis sna mar ma dbang bsgyur ma 'khol lo// des bdag nyid ma 'phrul la// des bu 'dogs ma ga ting dmar sa ladas la/
321b2(rnying rgyud): dmag gi rgyal mo mchu 'jib ma 'khol lo// des dmar mo g.yag thod can 'khol lo// de rnams ni nub kyi nyu le ma ste nam gyi gung la chu'o// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos kyis ni/ pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des
321b3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dgyes sde ser mo las mkhan ma 'khol lo// des gru 'degs ma grub ting ser mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo ser mo rkang lngag ma 'khol lo// de rnams ni byang gi hu le ma ste nas kyi tho rangs rgya'o// yum chen mo nyid ni nyin mtshan
321b4(rnying rgyud): byed par gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad kun la mnga' mdzad do// spyi dbang ni yum chen mos rtag pa'i rgyal mo lha la sogs pa ma mor grags pa dang / srid pa kun la mnga' mdzad de/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo lngas ma mo chen mo bdun 'khol lo//
321b5(rnying rgyud): des srid pa'i bde 'gro ma dang / nyi ma'i thod phreng can 'khol lo// des khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi 'dul lo// des thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi 'dul lo// des sbas pa'i ma bzhi 'dul lo// des srid pa chags byed cha snyoms ma gnyis 'dul lo//
321b6(rnying rgyud): des e ka dA tI stan drug 'dul lo// des ma bdun 'dul lo// des 'dod khams lha yi gtso mo ni tshan 'dul lo// des rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma spun bdun 'dul lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo ldan bzhi 'dul lo// de ltar nang 'khrugs na'ang tham
321b7(rnying rgyud): nas rim bzhin te/ gtso mo bcos na kun kyang bde// ma mo lnga bcu rtsa lnga'i so so'i dbang tshad do// sems las skyes pa'i ma mo bcu bzhi rnams bskon pa de dag la drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi tshogs zhes bya'o// ma mo so so'i dbang tshad kyi rim pa'i le'u
322a1(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'o// / gdon 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bcu bzhi zhes ni bgyi 'do'o// rabs rlud rdzab ji yang lags// 'phags dang 'dzin pa'i sngags rnams ni// rnal 'thong
322a2(rnying rgyud): la bdag nyan 'tshal// bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig gdon 'dul lha yi ge tso// bcu bzhi man chad rje khol gyi// rabs rgyud 'gugs 'dren sngags rnams kun// gtan tshig rtsa ba sbas pa rnams// da lta nyid du gtan la dbab// de la ri rab shing bzhi gang
322a3(rnying rgyud): pas rang lugs su yod par zad/ nyi ma dgu brgya rtsa gcig dang / zla ba dgu brgya rtsa gcig ste/ nyi zla stong rtsa gnyis kyis ri rab kyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i sdang srid thams cad tshig nas/ ci yang mi gnas pa las ri rab kyi nang ring thung ngu dpag bas ma kyi shing yongs
322a4(rnying rgyud): brtol zhes kyang byas yod pa la/ shing gi rtse mo ri rab kyi bum pa'i nang na yu ma chen mo srid pa'i bde 'gre ma'am/ khams gsum yum mchog ma zhes bya ba sku mdog mthing gar bzhugs pa/ dbu dang phyag dang zhabs cir yang ston la/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ral pa
322a5(rnying rgyud): can/ sbas pa'i spyan gnyis la/ g.yas pa nas khrag gi mchi ma/ g.yon pa nas bdud rtsi'i mchi ma/ sbas pa'i zhal nas 'bras bu rnam pa lnga'i btsod 'dzag pa/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis la/ g.yas pas srid pa thams cad kyi rtse nas bzung ba/ g.yos
322a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gdan la thugs pa yan chad bzung ba'o// sbas pa'i zhabs gnyis kyis/ g.yas pas 'jig rten gyi dbang chen thams cad kyi snying brdzis pa/ g.yon pas 'jig rten gyi dbang chen mo thams cad kyi snying rtsa mnan pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' ge sar gyi dkyil
322a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor nas sdang srid thams cad 'phel 'bri ba mdzad pa/ ye shes kyi gnas rang la shar ba las ma gtogs pa kun mkha'i gting du sdud pa/ spyi gtsug nas khrag gi ral pa gcig gis srid pa'i ma mo thams cad dbang du sdud pa/ ri rab kyi na mo'i bum pa'i dbus na
322b1(rnying rgyud): sa/ ma sa pa sa // du nga/ da med pa ldan pa du / 'dug
322b2(rnying rgyud): ga nas ma snang ba las/ sred pa'i ba 'acoms snying bang du ba sduba'i byeng / 'byung ba lnga da las byung ba byam ma dag dkar ba la ga su ngal ba can/ dajal pa'i dbyas nam ga zung gsum pa gcis 'das
322b3(rnying rgyud): shegs pa ya ga gas/ sa sangs pa/ dang mam// ngan sum da
322b4(rnying rgyud): ni donyid kyi da gsang bar bsdus te rab tu gas zhing skyes pa la/ su stegs kAl chen po zab/ ri rab kyi 'og sum mo'i gting na gnas pa des mthong ngo // skye ba'i lol yid kyi sbyor ba gcig byas pa las/ phreng gam 'bru ma ldang ba gams pa dang /
322b5(rnying rgyud): kyirnapas kyis nye ba 'ding do// ma mapa'i ming ma yis btags so// dbangs rgyag ma dang / rkyen gyi chupa ma dang/ bdaganyid ma dang / gzug sum pazhi bdashesas// de yang thong bas / sa
322b6(rnying rgyud): gcig byasas// de nas ning gis ye shig yid kyi sprul pa bsre nas su/ 'jig zhen dur gyur mni mi myang ba la sags pa dbang du bzlas// drilas sprul pa'i bu mo ba'i// de bzhi pas ni skyed byas te/ drin ni ma srid pa chags khyod mas byas sa/
322b7(rnying rgyud): dang rnams pang brtags te/ rdo rjota ma dzes pa'i dbang ngam dang / thos pa'i dbar mgyi dang / rdo rjebang gyur khros pa'i dbang mo che dang / rdo zlakhams gsum rdzogs byer khros pa'i dbang meche dang / de ltar bzhin meng btags so// mang nge legs
323a1(rnying rgyud): nas/ bu mad bzhis ma pa ni dbang du bsdus sa// des srid pa bad la bkad do// sprul ba'i bu mde bzhi dang // rigs kyi 'byung ba bzhi po d+ha// dpag bsam shing gi yal gal// 'brug gi sol mad 'a byas pas/ mu da
323a2(rnying rgyud): kA las tshor nas su// sdig chen dmod pa'i mtshon cha ni// mdza' na rgyug pa khyed cag rnams// nal bu lho zhugs nas su// ngo tsha'i bu yang sbed par shog/ ces dmod mad mos so// da mod mo des sdig te sbrul gyi long bu ma ldan bzhi dus gcig sdes/ kho
323a3(rnying rgyud): pa chags byed kyis lte ba bcad do// de nas ma bzhi ngo tsha nas ri rab kyi ngos bzhir bsrungs te bzhag pa la/ rta'i lo la blta bas mi phra ba'i bud med du 'phrul che zhing mtshan dang ldan pa bzhi zhig gda'/ de spyi dpal chen po'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/ thugs kyi dgyes kyi sogs
323a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i bye mo bzhir bzung ngo // dkar mo mig gcig rgyas 'debs ma dang / nag mo ral gcig rmongs byed ma dang // dmar mo dbang bsgyur ba byed ma dang / ser mo las mkhan tshe 'phel ma zhes thugs las ming dang mtshan btags so// ma mo bcu bzhi'i rabs rgyad kyi la
323a5(rnying rgyud): bcu ga sum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje rdul 'byor ma de rnams kyi khol mo srid pa chags byed ma dang / khal ba srid pa zhig 'dzin gnyis kyi lo dpyid zlar ba'i ngol khyo zug tu 'dus pa las/ phag gi lo dpyid thar pa'i ka la drA we dru gcig rjes/
323a6(rnying rgyud): nyaMhU~M khrod thang can gyis skos rje drang kar du ming btags te blon por bskos so// de nas thos rje drang kar dang srid pa'i cha snyoms ma gnyis khyo bug tu 'dus te/ srid pa chubaskams so// de gnyis la bu mo spyan drug skyes te bani ni khros pa'i dbang mo che blon po rna la
323a7(rnying rgyud): po bzhi'i chung mar blangs te/ jo mos ri rab kyi zla 'degs su bzug ste/ gru 'degs mtshan mo bzhir mang btags so// bu mo chung ngu lun gnyis la/ gcig ni srid pa byan mkhan gyi chung mar blangs so// jo mo nyi bla'i thod phreng gis he ru ka sdig ya
323b1(rnying rgyud): phrad pa'i than kyang du bcug pa/ rlu nam thA rba sa tu ni byungs rmugs ldan paga' la nga na gnas so// de nas rgyal btsun pa bzhi las/ bum blan s+ho/ sa// dkan samatsho ba can dang / nagam bshadas da dang dang mthal ba na
323b2(rnying rgyud): seng po dang lag mdang bzhi skyes te/ de bzhi ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi'i 'khol lo ste/ dmag gi rgyal mer bskos so// de nas khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'i khol mo/ e ka dza ni shugs kyi blon po la chen po dadun po chung ga dang yin mtshan
323b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig tan dugadzang pa la/ yum rkyen ma'i thugs kyi sprul pa las/ dbyings las shar ba'i sa mo gsum dang / mkha' la ba'i ma mo gsum dang / gsang bas bsdus pa'i ma ma gcig te/ thugs kyi rdul pa'i ma mo brgyad kyis seMn po da la
323b4(rnying rgyud): de nas gtso mo bzhi las rgyan gyi rgyal mo ldan bzhi mngags nas/ bu mos ma'i bkrag dang gzi mdangs 'phrog ste dbang yang med mthu yang chung la/ zheng na sha stag byed ni de nas rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang // khol po rtsa ya bdud gnyis rgyo ba 'il la bye bgyis pa bu/
323b5(rnying rgyud): gaM lo la yar la shod kyi sdes tor dang / 'dod khams lha'i gtso mo meng srid gnyis gyes so// de yang yar la shod kyi skyes to re dang / jo mo na yang jo mo/ su mo na yang su mo/ bdag nyid ma zhes bya ba gnyis/ shong na byis le'i rtse mod ta'i lo tshas bcoM
323b6(rnying rgyud): la mdu na bcugs te nang par ma mor gyes pa las// su mo'i ting pa la za ga cig 'dug pa mthong ste/ mi gtsang ba'i sems skyes te mchil ma gcig bsgyur ba las/ thig dang mchil mi 'dres pa'i bu ming sring gnyis mdze mar dbyes te/ phrag g.yo sa
323b7(rnying rgyud): bcu bzhil gnim sa lha dkar ba skyes so// chos bco lnga lasas bdag pa phreng skyes so// de yang dbyings phyug ma dang / yang lha shod kyi sa tor gnyis sde'u'i lo la bye bgyis pa'i bu/ bya'i mal mang phreng gnyis sdes te meng ba shar gyisang gi
324a1(rnying rgyud): 'thag dang / thengs pa bar gyid bang skrag ma yin no// de nas pang bdud dang ga gnyis sa byam ldan nyes smras / da ducan pa 'dugs mashes kyang byanas mkha 'argyas mang// rnam
324a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi spyi phud ma zhes kyang bya/ 'jig rten dbang phyug ma zhes kyang b+ha/ srid pa che sgrom ma ni he ru ka sIr zhes kyang bya'o// srid pa chags byed mi ni lha mo tshogs kyi bdag mo zhes bya'o// e ka dzA Ti'i ming yongs kyi tshogs kyi bdag mo zhes bya'o// gru 'degs mtsha
324a3(rnying rgyud): har ting dkar mo dang / dun ting nag mo dang / shan ting dmar mo dang / grub ting ser mo dang bzhi'o// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po brgyad la/ yum srid pa bde 'gro ma ni/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i grub ldan ma tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// dkar mo nyi ma
324a4(rnying rgyud): drod phreng can ni thod phreng gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// thos pa'i dbang mo che bzhi ni/ snying rje byams pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkar mo mig gcig ma la sogs pa bzhi ni/ gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbyings phyug ma bzhi ni/ phung byed sbas pa'i dkyil ga
324a5(rnying rgyud): ro// yang rnam pa gcig tu yum chen mo dang / dkar mo nyi ma'i thod phreng can gnyis ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi dkyil 'khor te/ spyi dpal chen po dang gnyis su med do// khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi ni/ 'gro ba yongs su sbyor ba'i dkyil
324a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor te/ bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dra'o// thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi ni// ge sar yongs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes/ gsang ba'i drod chags 'dzin pa'i bdag mo yin no// de rnams kyi khol mo'i tshogs brgyad ni/ srid pa chags byed ma ni chags 'dzin ma'i
324a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs so// srid pa cha sbom ma ni spem byed chen po'i tshogs so// srid pa gru 'degs ma ni gling bzhi phung nyul ma'i tshogs so// e ka dzA Ti pho nya kun gyi tshogs so// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi ni dri za la sogs pa rigs so so 'tshogs so// 'dod khams lha'i
324b1(rnying rgyud): pa ba sa dus ma nagams// jug dang rnag dang / bdag du smrag ma sa na ma thogasas// nan ma 'dags dadang / skyen na su na kun ga / dngag su rung su
324b2(rnying rgyud): dalas nas/ demasun gyinang nas yang bdig gang mdzad par dbang rkyang pas/ kham mtshan pa nang yang bdag byud par dbang rung bas/ nganarlabs nyi masnyas nas/ gcig tumi gyis sa te/ gti na sa me che gro
324b3(rnying rgyud): mAg zhes kyang bya ba gcig pa gnas/ dug shang gdug pa can kyi lagagagag gi yom nyam ba rnyed du brdeg pa'i ma man/ yas thams sa rang bdakar po mag gcig pa zlas/ sred panag so lag 'jig sa d+ha gti
324b4(rnying rgyud): nam ming bas ma'i gci ma dang sa thogs na/ 'jig rten mongs kyi mthunu bar ba dadog bas ma gzas pa las/ su mo e ken rjes tshor // dza ma thos pa'i dbang mo rga rnams la zhus pas/ rde 'bangs lngas bsgral ba las/ lus gcig gan ny-i
324b5(rnying rgyud): babs/ gcig snying gi bdag mi 'jal/ dbul gsum ni cal thelus pa dang / tri ga kar dang / dka thong bar dang gsum ni rnal pa dgas la gnod// gsum la bar the'u sdug pa dang / legs sbre ba dang / sa zeb na pa'i gsu ma
324b6(rnying rgyud): mangs la gdong ngo // gsu ma ni phyogs su thar ti/ thag sad dang / rgya san dang / shing srin dang gsul du bung to// dgra gnang pa ya bzag nas gnam d+h+wi dka po 'khol du btsug go// de nas 'jug gi lo la e ka dza ra mang la ma 'de nas/
324b7(rnying rgyud): nga ba dang / gdangasas pa la mis lang ba/ lus kyang sbyang gi pa khag pa la snying gsum yad pa gcig skyes pa las/ 'di su yang ma med do snyas nas dgra pa'i zhing 'byin/ byams kyil na ljon par 'ang ste/ las su rung ngo sbas nas dga' zhing mthubs/
325a1(rnying rgyud): rgyangam ma thod nas mams na nas/ rgyugashes par drub sa nas/ gcig tug / rgyu chu byag na cegs rgya ma sgrubacu bzhapa sa / gzung bla mams pa
325a2(rnying rgyud): gsong ba// dgug cing 'dren par byed pa ni// ma ma rnams kyigs dasngags // rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// des dgas la ba gsan nas phyid/ sgyogs sungs rgyas kyis bya// 'bul ba/ nyon cidag yung drung yang dag na// dbu kyi

325b6(rnying rgyud): thar du gzigs pa yis// srid pa gsum tshar thal bar rlog/ de las slar yang skyed par byed// g.yas kyi zhal bzhad thugs rdzi che// g.yon gyi zhal bzhad dbang du sdud// rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa yis// me dgasum 'grang rje che mtsham
325b7(rnying rgyud): deng 'byor gsang ba'i rtag pa// srid pa gsum char 'chang bar mdzad// lha chan la sogs mthara' las mchog/ bdud dang gnod sbyin la sogs te// gshin rje srin po kun rnams 'dir// yum d+hi b+hu yi g.yas phyogs su// las kyi mam
325b8(rnying rgyud): 'char// lo ta bka' tan thabs kyis 'byed// g.yon gyi phyogs nas 'char ba ni// rnal 'byor sku yi sum tshal// nges pa'i ma mo dgu rnams ni// thams cad srul mchod par btsan// yum gyi rabs kyi galas phyogs su// 'dod pa'i ma ma
326a1(rnying rgyud): man ce// 'dug rgyan kun la ldan par mdzad// yul gyi zhabs kyig yon phyogs sa// bku' ba/ shun brgyad mnan// rnal 'gyur kun rgya las rnams bsgrub// skrod pa'i ma ma thams ca dbu// rnal 'am
326a2(rnying rgyud): sku yi khyon du rdzogs// ma mo kun gyi thig le las// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga zhu bdungs pas// shes rab ye shes mde'u rtse las// sprul pa'i thig le ma mo dgu 'phen ma// nges pa'i bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// he huM Sh+Ti sras 'khor du bzhag/ mthing dgeng bar
326a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i khrong las// thams cad sgrol zhing dbang du spyad// zhi ba'i sku la thugs rje che// ye shes sprul pa'i phyag drug las// g.yas kyi dang po 'khor lor bskor// gsang sngags bka' rnams sgrog pa'i don// g.yon pa rin chen srid dbang sgyur//
326a4(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i 'jig rten gnas la 'bebs// g.yas kyi bar ma g.yang gzhi brtan// bdud dang mu stegs rdul du rlog/ g.yon pa b+han+ta dmar skyil cing // bud med mang po dbang du sdud// g.yas pa tha ma tshe 'dzin cing // rnal 'byor kun la dngos grub
326a5(rnying rgyud): 'bebs// g.yon pa lcags kyu dgus gtums pas// da ma nyams kun dang dgra bgegs kyi// bka' las 'das pa'i snying rtsa 'dren// spyi gtsug sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis// stong gsum 'jig rten blo bzlog mdzad// bdag cag ye shes rtsal
326a6(rnying rgyud): 'chang zhing // nges pa'i don dang rtogs pa'i mthu// man ngag thugs kyis chud bskul ba ra// skad cig yud tsam dbyings nas bzhengs// sred pa gsum dang gling bzhi yang // thang gcig yud tsam 'jig par mdzad// khyad par ye shes nyi zla'i spyan//
326a7(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi spyan gyis srid pa gsal// g.yon gyi spyan gyis sbyor bar mdzad// rdo rje sprin ma g.yengs pa yis// mu stegs yak+ta'i snying la 'gems// ma mo khyed kyi mtshan nyid ni// byang chub sems ma zhes su grags// yang dag gsang ba'i mtshan nyid
326b1(rnying rgyud): sa sa rgyas thos pa'i rgyal mo lags// bde klong kun gyi gtso mnas pa grags// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang bzhabs kyi 'gro 'dra yis// sum gyi thugs dam 'dis bskangs la// thu ni la bskyod 'dir bzugs te// 'ja
326b2(rnying rgyud): khron mo kun bskyod ma// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// ces tshogs la spyan drang ba ni/ phra man rgya mtsho la'o// gsang ba'i mchong ba dang ldan par byas te bskul ba ni// hUM lha mo chen mo rnal 'byor me// ku na gzhi yongs kyi dbang phyug
326b3(rnying rgyud): sbyang srid dkun la dbang sbyar ma// skye 'gro yongs kyi dbugs 'jog ma// dud chen phyag na bsdams shing 'dad chen po 'debus// gshin rje zan du lakhol zhing 'jig rten mo yis sreg/ 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'khrug cing byang chub sems kyi bdag/ rnam
326b4(rnying rgyud): don du gnyer zhing dbang phyug kun dang spyir// brid gsum sprul pas 'gengs shing bdud dpung rdul du rtog/ g.yang gzhi gos su son zhing kha T+wAM g.yab mos 'debs// spra mdog khro mar bzhugs shing lag dang zhag gis brgyan// sngag phyag na stams shang l+ra
326b5(rnying rgyud): gyi snying 'byin ma// zhing chen gdan la bzhugs shing rnal 'byor grogs mdzad ma// mAM sa zas su za zhing tsi d+ha'i zhags pa 'phen// nyi zla tha~Mng du bcings shing steng gsum bad la 'god// bdud kyi bu spang 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag shul che// dung chen sdod dung
326b6(rnying rgyud): rkyem dug dang snying du bsres pa 'di// khyed d+hi sbal bstim pas bcol pa'i las mdzod ci// cis byabs bskal ba ni nyim mdasanan// mu bskal pa sas sde bdag ma med do// de kun gyi rnyeng pa yang dab dang // byin pa 'phyi thos pa'i dbang mam/
326b7(rnying rgyud): giga'i mdangs can// srong gsu la gtan ma za // srid pa sgram mag shegs srag san/ ga pa phrul sa pa ma// pa zung gis brgya gyi// gis rdzas mem 'thungs// dbang phyug chenam gshegs sun
327a1(rnying rgyud): sbyinal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum rdzogs byed bdud rtsi sbyor// 'jig rten spyan mchog kun gyi gsos// bdud rtsi'i rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// sprin la 'byor khros pa'i dbang ma che// thA ga yongs
327a2(rnying rgyud): mngang mdzad ma// gnas lam thams cad rnyongs par mdzad// thar pa'i lam rton gshegs su gsol// zhes brjod la rnal 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa 'bral ba ni// thos pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'o// TIg 'bum yang mngang mdzad ma// dbyings phyag
327a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten yongs kyi rgyan mdzad ma// gyad gyi rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// bdag nyid ldeg lhag bzhad mdzad ma// bdag nyid chen mo gshegs su gsol// gcig pu stong khams rgya mdzad ma// gcig pu yum mchog
327a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// zhes bskul ba ni sbas pa'i ma bzhi'o// hUM ri rab gling bzhing shar phyogs nas// shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// na bza' bya rgod thul ba la// g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// dung gi len tshar mche ba la// rin chen
327a5(rnying rgyud): shel gyi grod gdengs can// dkar mo sgeg mo 'bum gyis bskor// srid pa shar la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir skyon dam skong phrin las mdzod// hU~M ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs nas// lho yi nag mo mchu ba can// na bza' zhing gi go zu la// g.yu yi dril bu
327a6(rnying rgyud): 'bum gyis brgyad// lcags kyi sen tshar maH ba can// gser ga yu spel ba'i drod gdengs can// nag po rgan po 'brum gyis bskod // srid pa stsol mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir spyod dam skong phrin las mngon// d+ho rab gling bzhi'i nub phyogs nas// dU
327a7(rnying rgyud): kyi dmar mo dbang sgyur ma// na bzang chu srin g.yang gzhi la// sbrul nag stong gi gdengs ka can// g.yu yi lan tshar mche ba can// byi ru dmar po'i thod gdengs can// dmar mo sgeg mo 'bum gyis bskor// srid gsum nub la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir
327b1(rnying rgyud): skyon dam rgong phrin las mdzod// hU~M ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs nas// byang gi ser mo las mkhan ma// na bza' ma bya'i thul ba la// mthing ga gocog ya bas bskor// gser gyi lan char mche ba can// brod sbram 'bar ba'i thod gdengs can// rdzang na// sgeg ma 'bum gyis bskor//
327b2(rnying rgyud): sr-id pa byang la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir skyon dam skong phrin las mdzod// gling bzhi'i rgyal mo gsang ba'i gzungs// thub g.yas pa dmag gis bkang // rnam 'byor kun gyi dgra 'dul ma// zla ba g.yon pa rin po che// sgrub pa po la rtags 'byin ma// g.yas kyi phyag na
327b3(rnying rgyud): g.yang gzhi rdeb// khams gsum rdul du bzags nas su// g.yon pa b+han+da thod pas skong // ma mo thams cad dbang du sdud// ral pa can gyi 'khor stong ma// 'drir skyon dam spong phan las mdzod// ces 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa la spyan drangs la/ bkang
327b4(rnying rgyud): banag pa bcol ba ni// thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi dang // gsang ba'i yang byi mo bzhi'o// 'di bzhi la bcol ba yid bzhin du 'grub bo// lur yang tshe dang sri ru la mkhas shing gsang ba 'bra la yang rdo// de yan chad kyis ma mo bcu bzhi'i bskul tshig gi le'u ste btu drug
327b5(rnying rgyud): da ni srid pa'i sran mo rnams bskul te/ hU~M a b+hi chen mo sham sham mo// srin mo chen mo mi bzad ma// yongs 'dus brtol gnas mchog nas// srid pa chags byed gshegs su gsol// gos su zhing chen lpags rlon la// tha ma b+han stong gis bskong /
327b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas zhing chen sor phreng bgrang // g.yon na mi mgo'i phor ba ru// snying khrag snying tshil gtubs nas su// rang gis rang la brim par stob// g.yang gzhi'i ru mtshon phyar nas su// bdud dang mu stegs thal bar rlog/ 'jig rten thams cad sgrol bar byed
327b7(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum gyi phud nyul ma// de ni jo mo nyid la mchod// las su bcol na kun kyang 'grub// 'dir skyon dam sgong phrin las mdzod// ces bskul ba ni a phyi chen mo ste srid pa chags byed ma'o// hUM khyim bdag chen po rnal 'byor srid pa'i bdag/ srid pa'i
328a1(rnying rgyud): snyoms gshegs sags pa// nal 'gyur can ma khyen bdag na// zhim bdag man ma gu 'dus// lags la rol pa las// n+yan gsum 'ab bam// 'thungs sas kun la dbang su
328a2(rnying rgyud): mthu tshan rnal 'byor kun gyi grogs mdzad ma/ drung chen sku la tham par mdzod// khyed kyi 'khor ni rab tu mi baspangs te/ lga rten ying 'phrog ma mkhye kyi 'khor// 'dod pa lngal 'dod ci ro la zhing bsgral// khrag gis rgyan par 'dan cing de 'a da
328a3(rnying rgyud): shul gtum mo rab tu rmongs byed ma// kun gyi yid la 'dod cing rab tu mthu chen bskul// me yi bskal pa gtong zhing mthu chen gshin rje'i lam las stsol// gsod pa don du gnyer zhing khro bo kun dang sbyor// bdud kyi bu mo 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag shul che/
328a4(rnying rgyud): dad chen pos 'debs shing zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs/ dgra snying tshal par 'ag mas byed ma mo byed kyi mthu// dam tshig dus la bab kyi gshegs su gsol// zhes las gnyen po btsal 'ani/ sbas pa'i ma mo d+ha srid pa cha snyoms ma'o// na la 'ang
328a5(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i bdag/ me kA Tir la gcigam/ khyi mo srid pa chags kyad min// mes pa srid pa zhig 'don yin/ min smos te drang dashi ldan// man srid pa matsam mo// med pa'i chen po dbang yang btsu/ mati tshogs kyi bdag te// rig
328a6(rnying rgyud): gcig ma la dkar ga myi ma d+hi/ rang rgyas smin dkar go n+ya la/ 'bra tshon 'byar ba'i mtha' chags rgyan// lag na rnam tshanathugs shing // rna'og 'bas ma gsu rgyan na// brtan pa nyimachis khams gas ma tshurgyas zangam// bdab pa
328a7(rnying rgyud): tsam gyis the'u dang 'dong po'i brla dang gcog/ 'dir sgron ngam slong phrin las mdzod// ces las bcol ba ni mig 'o// da ni ma bdun bsgral te/ rgya mtsho chen po 'di kyil 'khor nas// dpal rdzam 'gro gcom ste// nag mo
328b1(rnying rgyud): chen ma ngal pa can// ri rab bsnyil pa'i rngam stabs can// kha nas me 'bad rgya mtsho skams// rdo rje kun grags gshegs su gsol// hUM khro mjam pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// mdzes pa'i tshul gyis 'od 'phro zhing // 'jig rten 'chi bdag 'od 'phrom// kun
328b2(rnying rgyud): bzang mo gshegs su gsol// hU~M phyag bya 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// nam mkha' stong la dbang sbrar zhing // bdud dpung drag lham kun 'dul ma// rdo rje rngag snyems gshegs su gsol// hU~M mtshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas/
328b3(rnying rgyud): drug cu'i gtsom ste// sha chen khrag la longs spyod cing // gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul ma// rdo rje 'chang mo ye shes mchog/ dam tshig tshal bzhin gshegs su gsol// hU~M khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor nas// khro mo ga tum chen za byed pa/
328b4(rnying rgyud): dra ba'i phreng thogs ma// byang phyogs rang gi 'khor 'dul ba// rdo rje 'od chags gshegs su gsol// d+hi 'od srung 'khrigs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// zhags pa stong gi gdangs ldan zhing // 'byung po ma lus 'ching mdzad ma// rdo rje gas la
328b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// snyi dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// lcags kyu 'bar ba'i 'gro 'du can// dam tshig nyams pa'i steng rmeg ma// bka' las 'das pa'i snying 'byinam// rdo rjeg su sran gshegs su gsol// zhes bya ba ni ma mtshan
328b6(rnying rgyud): mo bdun na// hU~M lha ma chen mnul 'byor sa// den tshun srid 'degs mdzes pa'i mchog/ mdog bzang sngon mo ral pa can// rang chas mya tig go thal// gser dang ga yA yi 'tha brtse zhing // tha ma ngan chan 'bar bas bskor// g.yas nA
328b7(rnying rgyud): gats+tsha y-i tha matog/ g.yon na drang gi zo ba thogs// khyed ni srid pa'i mamo ste// cho ga yang sbas shig rin chen sring 'dags ma// hUM grub pa'i rnal 'byang chen mon// bdud gyi phreng mo gshin rdzo ma// mdog pazang nag mo ral pa can// ral pa'i
329a1(rnying rgyud): ra sa man nag gangs// lcags rna mas lazangs sa da bum can// 'bral ba nas 'bas dang ldan// lag pa g.yas na gzhan thal kham ba ma thogs// g.yo na bdu tu gang ba kang nag 'ams/
329a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan na nad kyi rgyal ba sbed// khyod ni 'jig rten stob zlog mkhan// kham kha phyis la sha rdel spos// nad la tshangs la dal kha sbyar// hUMn la 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug ma// mdog bzang dkar mo ral pa can// khyeng rje zhing ba'i skye 'gro ste/
329a3(rnying rgyud): rang chas dar kar go bu la// g.yu bran 'bar ba'i mtha' chag can// gser gyi gong lag 'bar ba la// ga yu yi cod pan 'od 'phrom// rdzu 'phrul rkang pas phyogs bcur gyen// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// gser gyi lcag yu 'bar ba
329a4(rnying rgyud): la// g.yu yi lhag 'bras 'gyur ba btags// gnam la bskor bas bdud dpung 'joms// sa la brdabs pasang tha bgegs spel// gzhan gyis rbad kyang mnyan par// bcol ba'i yas rnams grub par mdzod// ces nang gi rdzas lnga dang ldan par
329a5(rnying rgyud): byas la/ las bcol ba na nam mkha'i rgyal mon mtshan no// hU~M rdo rje gar kyi dbang phyug ma/ dbu brgya ma la snyan stong ma// 'jigs tshul rngam nga'i cha byang can// phrin las 'byung po kun 'dul ma// dza sgeg ma gshegs su gsol// hU~M pAdz+ra gar gyi
329a6(rnying rgyud): phyag ma// sa bdag chen mo pad+ma zer// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang // / grong rnams kun la 'thong byed ma// sa bdag chen mo gshegs su gsol// zhes las bcol ba ni/ rdo rje gar byed bang phyaka ma dang / pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o// da ni
329a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po chen pa bzhi'i chung mdang // bu ma na yang bskul bar byaste/ sgo rab blang bzhi'i bu 'dags sa// ha ga nga kar mtshan mahA/ byang shar mtshams kyitha'adags pa// rngam nga nas mo me ma ste// shar gyi mtshams ca kyi 'dags ma// 6
329b1(rnying rgyud): ngam ma rgyan ma'o// zlab mtshams kyasu 'dags ma// thub tang blangs rtson mok+ta// nab byang mtshams ca su 'dogs pa// mtshams sa bu dag sa chan mtha tshun gzungs ma las 'ang drug/ blang bang du rna ma cad da ta dang /
329b2(rnying rgyud): somache ba gtsigs// lho yo na ga mo/ rtson ma// nub kyi dmar mo mchu'ajab ma// byang gi ser mo rkang lpag ma// rigs bzhid mag dpung mang pos bskor// sring mtshan mo 'dir ston cig/ hU~M gleng ba 'il sogs ma d+ha yi spong // rka
329b3(rnying rgyud): su gsol// mkha' la khang lding gshin rje'i sring // lho yi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsal// dmar mo g.yag thod ka yi ming // nub kyi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// nag mo sder chen gnod ldan sring // byang gi mchogs ma gshegs sugs pa//
329b4(rnying rgyud): ces bya ba ni las kyi sring ma bzhi'o// las byung dang bsngal tshig gi le'u sna bcu bdun pa'o// / g.yang drung lha las yang gsol pa// 'jig rten dbang chen ji snyed kun// srid pa me la sman slad du// tshul bzhin pa sgrub na ji ltar zlal
329b5(rnying rgyud): dang sad+h+ya rdzas tsal brtan// rtags dang dus chog ji ltar 'byung // gsal ba la/ bka' stsal pa/ nyan cigag yung rdung yang dgang // dben la ga nyen cing nyams dga' bar// brda' mtshan dang ldan pa yi// rigs su ldan pa'i sum gsum yang //
329b6(rnying rgyud): po'i don ci gzhag par bya// dzas su myur pa'i yo byang kyang // r+g+ha bcu gcig yang dag ldan// d+han+ta lcang lor ldan pa ni// pad+ma'i rigs su gyur pa yaM// mtshan dang ldan pa'i dkas dgang // gser chan dud pa rgyan migacod// thig la ma ma dbang ba /
329b7(rnying rgyud): sang cing shing gi ma tshang bang bam// kyai kyang ma byed gsum bsogs la// bdun ga su ma tshul bzhi bsgral bar bya// Than nga mas sa pa la sogs pa// kun chen ras ga / pa blag sa rkyen// / se ma bar ba thab ba sa
330a1(rnying rgyud): ma ma yang bzhin pathang // na can gsangag ni srog dang // nagasam pa ga ga gas/ sa can dag // nas thas du du dazhugs// ngang kun
330a2(rnying rgyud): lhan rtags su gsol// bdag nyid dman ga he rbe ka/ yum yang med pa bde 'gro ba// gnyis su med par bsgom byas te// dak+ta las na sring pa yi// snying gi dkyil nus drangs nas so// mngon du 'ong bar bsam pa ni// 'dog dkar po'i sa nga chu
330a3(rnying rgyud): thod phreng byas shing dpral ba'i dmyos na mig zur gsum pa gcig yod pa/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis srid pa'i baN+Da thams cad kyig sar bzung ba// lcag dang zangs kyi dril zhugs la mi snying bzlas pa'i 'gas pa 'phen pa/ migs nyis nas rin po chebu tshogs
330a4(rnying rgyud): ma'athor ba// g.yu'i ral ba can la/ mcha pa gsol zhing bstod dathungs spyan thos bsgral ba ni// b+h+yo che zhes car mo gsang ba'i gzungs// thig khe spor ba'i yum gcig ma/ dkar mo nye ba'i thod pang can// phra gsum dang ba'i mag gcags// ga
330a5(rnying rgyud): smra gas su sa / gsu sa
330a6(rnying rgyud): sa / ngas smra/ dzan ga nga/ ga smya/ gshen na gang ba da
330a7(rnying rgyud): dag bdang ngo // thung yang mtshan ma spang // nyi shu gnyis na su mngon du 'byung ngo // der ting nge 'dzin gsal bar byas la/ gas kyir ltung bang du bsdus te/ sbyor ba'i phyag rgyabacings la/ blag ma dbul zhing sbyor ba'i tshul du ston to// bdag rtog pa ma skyes na/ chos na
330b1(rnying rgyud): dgras par nas mangs pa dang chags pas byar sbya ba dpral // dang mngan dum/ gasrung ba'i byung chubasams das/ sbrul bdag tad pa mchud pa / dAn sgrub thogasul ldan/ nganas thamag da dam bsas pa/ dasung ba gas
330b2(rnying rgyud): de nas phrag dog spang ba'i phyir// srub zla gsum char sbyar nas su// sbal zlas ser dam bgre'o// de phan chad ci yang mi dgos so// bsgrub pa'i yon tanani/ ma mo gzhan smos te/ ngos po'i dbang po che bzhi dang / he dra ka na ma mchad 'das
330b3(rnying rgyud): rgyug nas 'ong ngo // 'jig rten 'dir bsam pa gces sbas mi 'grub mi srid do// 'di sgrub pa'i dus su/ dang po gtor ma rnam pa gsum btang ngo // bshags sbyang du/ tshe rabs kyi len chags kyi gtor ma yang btang ngo // dam skongs bgyi dang haM zla rgod tshang can
330b4(rnying rgyud): sgrub thabs so// srid la bde 'gro ma sgrub pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ 'gro ba'i don sbyor thugs rje'i 'od kyis mdzad pas sgrub pa'i ma mo yin no// dben la gtan pa'i gnas su/ rigs bzhi'i yum dang ldan pa ste// yo byad bzhi yang de bzhin bsham//
330b5(rnying rgyud): bzhing gi mchod pa bsham// rigs bzhin+d+han+ta yang dag ldan// zhing gi dung pa rgyan ma gcad// mchog gi phu rab bzhi yang dril// dung chen phreng ba yang dag rngan// shun chen dbu rgyan de bzhin gsol// rtag par g.yang gzhi gos su gon// rgya ma bsgril
330b6(rnying rgyud): zhags bsdog la// chu dang ma 'dres dngas ma'i khring // de mardzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa// ce gsum ga yab mo thogs nas su// grub cing brten pa'i ma mo ni// rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dang// rdo rje rigs kyi ma mo ste// sku mdog dkar mo ga yu~M yi ral pa
330b7(rnying rgyud): spyan gsum rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' shel gyi ga'ur 'khyil pa/ ma chags pa'i sbyor bas srid pa 'khyud pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje rtsa dgub bsdams pa/ g.yon pa zhing gi g.yab mo bsdams shing / bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud ba/
331a1(rnying rgyud): sa rtswa rnas pa'i rdzu na/ byang nga / ba mas pa da chan sa du na ma ba rdzogs
331a2(rnying rgyud): phyogs brgyar 'bros pa'o// gsang ba'i mapa' rin po che'i gzhung 'khyil ba'o// zlum baspel ba'i zhags pa 'dzini pas bdud dang su stegs 'ching ba/ mdabyings phyug ma la khos pa'i tshul ston pa/ slong ba'i ma dngas can no// do rje ma thos pa'i dbang po sa
331a3(rnying rgyud): kyai bdag mo ste/ sku mdog dmar po la bse'i ral pa can/ lhan gsum zhal gsum bu ru'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' bru ru'i ga 'ur 'khyil ba'o// 'od zer dmar pos nubagyogs dbang du sdud pa khag gi dang ma 'dzer zhing bdud dab su stegs kyi gang
331a4(rnying rgyud): ma/ gnyis med slo bas srid pa 'khyung ba/ bdag nyid ma la khros pa'i tshul ston ma/ skor ba'i mdangs can no// rdo rje khams gsum rdzogs byed khros pa'i dbang byed de/ sku mdog ljang gu la rdo rje dril bu'i ngal pa can/ spyan gsum rdo rje cha gram gyi mche ba
331a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ 'od zer ljang gus byung phyogs dbang du sdud pa/ lag pas g.yang gzhi rdib cing bdud dang mu stegs kyi mgo gcog pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' ba se'i gzur 'khyil ba la/ grub pa'i sbyor bas khams gsum 'khrud pa/ ma gcig pu ma la khros pa'i
331a6(rnying rgyud): tshul ston pa/ sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// spyod pa gsal zhing dbyangs snyan pas bskul zhing dbang du bya ba ni/ hU~M che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dkar mo g.yu yi ral pa can// spyan gsum rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs// zhing chen g.yab
331a7(rnying rgyud): mos mu stegs sgrol// shel gyi ga'ur gnas ris 'chang // gnyis med sbyor bas khams gsum 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khros zhing srid pa g.yos// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// hU~M tshe zhes khros pa'i dbang po
331b1(rnying rgyud): NI// mra ma dag sngon mor na can la bA can// sran gsum ran can ma chab gtsigs// zlum bsgril ba'i dri zhags kyis// bdud dang chu stegs thams cad 'phreng // ran chen ga thar gnas ris 'ja'// me len gyur bas 'angag rten 'khrung // sbyar ba ma nga /
331b2(rnying rgyud): kyis kun la khyab// yum la khros shing kun la byams// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// hUM che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dmar mo bas yir la pa can// spyan gsum byu ru'i mche ba gtsigs// khrag gi dang sa mas bdud dpung sgrol//
331b3(rnying rgyud): ga'ur gnas ris bca'// bdag med sbyor bas stong gsum 'khrud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khros shing rnal 'byor skyong // bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// hUM che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// skra mdog ljang gu bsdings
331b4(rnying rgyud): la// rdo rje dril bu'i ral pa can// spyan gsum mche brgya bram gtams// kha T+wAM g.yab mos mu stegs sgrol// rdo rje ga'ur gnas ris 'cha'// grub pa'i sbyor bas 'jig rten 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khros shing sems can song /
331b5(rnying rgyud): bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// zhes bskul ba ni/ khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi ste/ sgrub pa la zhugs pa'i nub mo rgyu gcig bsgral/ zhag gsum na gcig bsgral/ bdun na gcig bsgral/ zhag dgu na gcig bsngal/ brda bzhin gcig bsgral/
331b6(rnying rgyud): gcig gi nub mo gsang ba'i yum du dam bca'/ gsum gyi nub mo sgra chen po 'byung zhing me chen po 'bar ro// bdun gyi nub mo nam mkha' la sna tshogs pa'i rol pas thibs so 'byung ngo // de lta bu dag byung ba dang / bdag dpal chen po dpung gu phyag bco brgyad pa/ zha
331b7(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyis lha chen po brgyad de bzhin brdzes pa/ phyag na mtshon che sna tshogs bsdams pa/ zhing gi na bza' rlon pa dang / sbrul nag gi chun po dang / thod pas brgyan par gsal ba'i ngang las bsnyen pa bya/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dbul/ dgu la mngon
332a1(rnying rgyud): byung ba dang / bdag nyid dpa' bo sgeg po'i ting nge 'dzin du gsal ba dang / 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis bad+ma dbang du bsdus la/ de nas lha mo chags sems kyis// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dbul// gus pa'i cho
332a2(rnying rgyud): tu stan sgrogs pa// dpa' bo chen pa me shes su// rdo rjegasang ba'i dkyil 'kho \u0f7f// brdzogs papa'i mchod 'phrul gyi// dkris pa chen po'i dang nyid kyis// chags pa chen po'i byin stobs shig/ de skad bstod de skor ba 'bral// de nasapa
332a3(rnying rgyud): dang mngon sbyor la// drod kyis byang chub sesas nyid dang // dak+ta'i dngas ma bsres nas su// snga la bdug nyid gcol mchod// de nas sgrub zla ba thil sbyin// kun kyang dam bsres ma nas bsgag go// de nas bslabs pa'i mamo la spyan/ de nas
332a4(rnying rgyud): bsres mnas bsgag nas// rtog pa'i phrag dog spang ba'i phyir// sgrub zla bzhi dang bdag sbyar te dam bsre'o// gtor ma bzhi ni gong ma bzhin/ 'di gub na 'jig rten du bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub la/ grur yang me ring ba dang / sri'u la
332a5(rnying rgyud): mkhas so// ma mo 'og nas 'byung bam+b+ha spos kyang ci dgos/ sgrub zla bzhi dang ma bzhi yang bra na mor 'khol lo// 'di ni khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'i sgrub thabs so// 'dri bzhi'i ma ni bsgrub tu skyon che ste/ rtsi bu mo bzhi grub na/ bu mos ma 'khol bas bsrub
332a6(rnying rgyud): lhag par mi dgos so// da ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi'i sgrub thabs 'byung ste/ rta'i lo chos bdun la sgrub pa ba sham/ brgyad la 'jug ste/ nya'i bar du bsgrub/ grub pa'i yo byad du 'tshams pa/ dkar mo mig gcig ma'i b+han+d+ha ni zlu ma la pad+ma chags pa
332a7(rnying rgyud): 'angs gror mo zung ba ste// gtsug tu bu gu thung ba ni// dkar mo rtse rjes phrag na bsdams// sngon sa srung los rab tu brgyan// rnon shing skabu'i rtso ma med pa ni// nag mo chen mo'i phyag na bskams// bad+ma 'deb brgyad kyar thos la// a dkar gtsug na ma
332b1(rnying rgyud): pa ni// dmar mo dbang phyug phyag na bsnams// dum bu gnyis su 'dug pa la// rdo rje rgya gram thar 'dug pa// ser mo las mkhan phyag na bsdams// gtsug sub nang du rub pa las// tha rnams gtsug tu bcings pa la// hU~M chen dgur ni 'bar ngadu
332b2(rnying rgyud): dpal chen nyid kyi phyag na bsdams// zhes 'byung ste/ b+han+d+ha de lnga yang dag ldan// shel gyi rgyu bzhi yang dag bsogs// spyan po chas su stsal ba dang // gzhan yang dam rdzas sna tshogs pa// spags pa chen po gtso bo la// wA dkar po yang dbu 'tshan
332b3(rnying rgyud): no// 'jig rten gzungs ma'i rigs bstan pa// sha mdog dkar la mdangs bzang ma// sau thags bzang la mig dkyus ring // dkar mo mig gcig tshul du snang // brtson 'grus can la drag shul che// ral pa can la ha ra'i mig/ nag mor la
332b4(rnying rgyud): can tshul du snang // sha mdog dkar la mdangs sdug pa// smras na stan la 'gro na ldem// dmar mo dbang sdud tshul du ljang // zur bzhi de la ma che ba rno// sha mdog sngo la brtul zhug che// ser mo las mkhan tshul du snang // yu ma bzhi'i gzungs su ldan byas te// yum bzhis bsten pa so sor pagrang //
332b5(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid man ngag sems ldan pas// bzhi cha'i bsten pa gcig tu bgrang // bstan dbyangs snyan pos bskyal ba ni// hUM shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// na bza' tshil chen gos zu gsol// b+han+ta rmon pa'i dril bus brgyan// lan phran zhag gis 'khyil
332b6(rnying rgyud): ba la// / dung gi mchi ba gtsigs pa yis// shar gyi srid gsum phur bus 'di bas// rin chen shel gyi thod gdengs can// zhag gi lan phran gsegs pa yis// steng du ya bdud gdul zhing 'ching // bar du brgya byin phung bar byed// 'og tu dmyal kha
332b7(rnying rgyud): stongs par byed// ma g.yel thugs rje gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs na// ma mo chen mo mche ba can// na bza' mi lpags go bral// thAnA mang po'i dril bris brgyan// rdo rje'i lan wan zil chen 'chol// lcags kyi ma
333a1(rnying rgyud): gan / du du du na na rnam na du sa/ /
333a2(rnying rgyud): 'jig legs pa'i gagrangs// dung na cing bzhi'i zugs su// dmar maman ma dbang gyung // da 'a 'i ga tshul// su nag 'dre pa'i rkyen grangs nas// 'dzi shA'i yinam nal// ma ba ba'i
333a3(rnying rgyud): nubathogs srid gsum sur 'debasam// mi khrag rlon pa'i thod gdengs can// rak+ta'i lan ldan gsogs pa yis// snying du tshungs pa chen po 'ching // bar du 'chi bdag spang bar byed// rab tu yi dgas spongs par byed// mag nga
333a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs rjegasang ba'i gzungs// d+hAr rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs na// ser mo chen mo las mkhan ma// mdzes pa'i nubacu'i chen mo ni// gis chen po'i thul par ni// drim po la ma'i skabs bskor// lan pan chu 'bar ba 'gyur// de
333a5(rnying rgyud): mche ba gtsigs pa yis// kyang phyogs sring gsum phur 'dabs ma// mAm spangs pa'i bad gdengs can// dri chu'i 'anam dra gamigs pa yis// gling du tshogs kyi bdag po bcings// rang nga garjod min rung bar byed/
333a6(rnying rgyud): bklags ris sbyangs par byed// mag yal thig la gsang ba'i gzungs// gling po gagasang ba'i gzungs gcigs// bdun carnam sa dngul rdzogs// grilas nag pa ga na // bags ca gnas kyi sbyinapas
333a7(rnying rgyud): thugs can pa'i phying 'byin no// g.yon nam thag 'dzas pas// bud med rnams cad dbang du du/ bkan zun gyi rjer bye sa// 'ji 'breg yangs pa 'bar mang 'drer// bla pa sa 'dan sa ma// ji na
333b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i las dang // ces bsgral ba/ gag pa'a' nub mo dngas ba kyirtags/ dang por gargyal chen dang / mchag tu rtag pa'i byu ga/ dgra rnabs bgyur pa dang blang po kyisas gyur pa'i mang chub kyi mas mags pa dang
333b2(rnying rgyud): rnam pa lnga ba sres pa gang 'ong ste/ dga' ba mi bskyed par sbyor du langs ste dang / nga'i drub mchuba'i yang nga ra bskul lo// bdu kyi nub mapo'i chur bu mngon du 'byung ngo // can dang mkhregs suldan pa shi tu yi su ga pa'i nyam da // da
333b3(rnying rgyud): mnangag gi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bsgom la bde ba'i mdangs phyung la/ gser gyir lha dbang du bsdus la/ pad+ma'i nang du rdo rje 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcingasal/ rim pa bzhin du zags byed cing sbyor ba dbul lo// gong ma'i zab pa'i nya mo bzhin
333b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du bgyi/ de nas de'i phyi de nub mo mchog phran chas su sbal ba bskal ba dang / khams gsum bskal ba'i dngos grub kyang ster ro// 'di bzhi ni 'ogo la phrag dog chung la dbang che ba gsang ba 'dam thub ste// bsam dgu yid bzhin du 'grub de/
333b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dgyes sde mar lung stsal te bzhag go// de slan chad ci bya yang mi dgos te/ sbyor ba yang dus su 'bul te/ las kyang rdal bzhin du byed do// sgrub pa po la 'ang yan chad kyi ma mo grub na/ tshe 'di'i yon tan la ci thos/ phung ba 'dzag pa'i
333b6(rnying rgyud): su yang / glu dbyangs dang rol mo la sogs pas/ 'od dang rtags bzang po dang / nam mAkha' las sgra 'od dang / rol mo sil snyan la sogs pas bsus nas/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams su sgrub me dges par 'og min du skyel lo// 'di yan chad kyis mo grub
333b7(rnying rgyud): e mo 'ag ma thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'du ba dang / sdig par sgrub mi dgos so// 'di ni mamon tsam rnams kyi sbu ba thabs kyi le'u sto bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas ma bdun du 'apar 'dod na/ gnas dur thod du song la/ as de rje'i rigs
334a1(rnying rgyud): kyi mtshan dang ldan pa gsum dbang gi slob dpon gnyis kyis bsgrub ste/ d+hamatshan dang ldan pa bdun gyi gsum du bdud rtsi rnam pa lngam bslabs pa'i dzin pa sngal/ gsum du'ajig rten pa'i sa yul/ gcigs byang chub sems
334a2(rnying rgyud): dngar k+ta stsal/ b+har+d+ha rin po che mtshan ldan gyi nang du bdud ci a mr-i ta srul/ she'i lding nag gsum shel dkar por cig/ tsar nag po gcig sA kurarA tsa dkar po gcig nam mkha' lding gcig dang mchog chen po yod dam/ spad kyim pa gcig pargyas/ chas sos
334a3(rnying rgyud): cad nag por bskur te/ gsur gyi drud pa rgyun mi gcad par btang ngo // 'dzab drang ba dang / zhag mdun na skra nan po gcig 'byung ste/ der chu zung gcig bsgral te mchod pa bya/ ma'i tshul du brten/ zhag dgun mi sdug pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ngo // de
334a4(rnying rgyud): zung gcig bskal la/ khrag bcu gnyis na nyi na mtshan du 'byung ste/ der thung gcig bskal nas sring mo'i tshul du/ nyen/ zhag bco ldan bdun char skye mngon du 'byung ngo // bdag cag dam mnyams na mdzes pa dang chas dang ldan par 'ong ngo // dmanyams na nub mo
334a5(rnying rgyud): ba can bdun mes tshig tshig byed pa la/ mche ba dmar tsi re 'dug par 'ong ngo // man ngag gsal na bdag nyid kyi dbang du bsdu/ migs la na bzod par gsol te bskang ngo // bdag man ngag dang ldan na dang por mi sdug pa las kyang skrag pa ston te/ gdod ma
334a6(rnying rgyud): nas sdugan pa tra dbang du bsdus lang rgyal ba sbed la su mo'i tshwa ladu bste no// de ltar phyag tsal zhing dpo na gang nas mi thug mi zung ngo // de nas pad+ma dag hUM gis bkrus nas rgyan por nas gsum dang badrar gyur te/ mel rje thun del la ni gnyis gnyis 'bral lo//
334a7(rnying rgyud): pA la gi tsam dang sbreng ngo // de nas yo dang sbrer ba'i byang chub kyi sems nyi tsher ma 'dod pa bzhin du dam 'phres te/ nga'i brdeg pa'i las rnams kun yang sbubs shig par lung sul lo// than dang rdzas dang bran mo dang / byi mo yin par man 'bor gas lung bral
334b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa das las cad// danams pa'amam bslab pa gyug// babyad gongs can spyod dung gi rgyagags gcig/ da pasregs pa gang 'ang da ma dngag dug sa na pa dang/ mi phyog
334b2(rnying rgyud): dartags ning ma dang mthun no// sgrub pa'ithabs gong mya dang mthun/ yon tan nim bdun sa na cad 'am 'o// brtsam pa thams pa 'grub/ sring yang dgal bad pa'ithang ngo // da ni me rje bslab sa ga/ thag de ba ga
334b3(rnying rgyud): byang gaN+DIg bting la/ dam cis tshogs pa'i gtor ma cu gcig gi nang du lan gyi wang stsa te/ nar bamar po kha rngo na gang gis khabacad/ kharje ba phyogs su bstan te/ 'ag bdun du bsnyen pa bkres pa/ yum mtshan dang ldad pa la dbab /
334b4(rnying rgyud): ba ni/ tri srid pa'i ma mo ya la gram cane// skye 'gror la gcig 'jig rten sgrol// mi nag khrag 'jog stod khams bsreg// kha nas me 'bar rgyas blo sems// mazung ba y-i du sa mtha' nas// 'jig tan mas kyi dbang brjer ni//
334b5(rnying rgyud): don la rab tu brtson// snying rje byams pa'i dkyil 'khor du// brtse ba'i thugs kyis gshegs su gsol// zhes bskul la yu ma la phabs te dris na sdang srid kyi gtam smra'o// da ni bu mo spyan gnyis bslab par bya ste/ bskal ba ni/
334b6(rnying rgyud): chen mo yal ga ma can// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dpal mo btsan// gnam phyed dgos su gyon pa mo// sa phyed stan du 'ding po'i bdag/ 'khor ni gnam smin 'bumachis bskor// chibs su gser gyi shwa pho bcibs// mgo la ga yu yi rA ba
334b7(rnying rgyud): 'di// phyag na gser kyi dri'i zhags bsdams// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du blud// chege sring teg ma g.yel cig/ da ni bu mo chung ngu bzlab ba byu ste/ ma mo ma g.yel yal gam can// dan ti ga yu lo gcog la// gser dang ga

336a1(rnying rgyud): bdag mo'i thugs dam bskang // dpag bsam shing gi yal ga la// dkar mo g.yag drod ral pa can// tid+d+ha na dzod phred n+dan// dpag tshad brgya bani stong nas// khrag gi rdo dz+nyAm rgya
336a2(rnying rgyud): ral pa'i zud phud g.yon nas gcig tu 'khyil// srid pa'i sa gzhi g.yo zhing khebs mdzad ma// lag pa g.yas nas lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la// snying gi zhags pa sdog cing 'phen// lag pa g.yon pa mgo bcad btu ba // tshangs pa
336a3(rnying rgyud): lha chen brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas// nyi zla stong gis skul brgyan cing 'dubs// snang srid snying gi bdag mo ste// 'di yi snying gis bskang byas pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// nga ya~M las gcol grub par mdzod// che zhe dkar mo nyi ma'i mdangs/
336a4(rnying rgyud): mo ral gcig thugs dam bskang // tshe zhe rdo rje nyi mo khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum thams cad gsal mdzad ma// bkang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dram bskang // che zhe khams gsum rdzogs byed khros pa'i dbang mo che// kha mas gsum thams cad
336a5(rnying rgyud): gsang bar sbyor// mthun pa'i rdzas tshe na ngas 'bul gyi// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // che zhe chen mo dmar mo ral gcig ma// srid pa'i bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che// khams gsum thams cad dbang du gud// mthun pa'i rdzas chen
336a6(rnying rgyud): ngas 'bul gyi// nga yis las bcol grub par mdzod// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // che zhe pad+ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// srid pa thams cad bde la bkod// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// nga yi las brtol grub par mdzod//
336a7(rnying rgyud): bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // snang srid kun gyi rgyan mdzad ma// rgyan gyi rgyal mo'i thugs dam pa skang // 'dag nyid lhag lhag bzhad mdzad ma// bdag nyid chen po'i thugs dam bskang // mtshan ni dbyings phyug chen mo ste// lag na mi
336b1(rnying rgyud): gapad pa thags// bkang nga bskal ba'i drugs das bskrad// mtshan nag cig pu dz+nyAnam la// lag na ma yig yang gagathogs// brdadang bskal pa'i thugs dam bskrad // thugs kyi dkyis rtsas pa// gsang ba'i ldan ga nga byam//
336b2(rnying rgyud): la rtags rdzung zhig/ rtag tu dbang phyug chen mos grogs mdzod cig/ srid pa shar gyi bdag mo ste// dkar mo mig gcig ngal ba can// shar gyi dkar mo 'bum the bcas// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs drim bskur// srid pa lho ya bdu
336b3(rnying rgyud): nag mo chen mo mche ba can// 'khor ni nag mo 'bum sngar bcas// bskang do bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // srid pa nub kyi bdag mo ste// dmar mo chen mo dbang sgyur ma// 'khor ni dmar mo 'bum sder bcas// thugs dam gnyen
336b4(rnying rgyud): bsrang gi// bcol pa'i phrin las grub par mdzod// srid pa byang gi bdag mo ste// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// byang phyogs ser mo 'bum sder bcas// thugs dam gzhan po bdag bskang gi// btsal ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod/
336b5(rnying rgyud): yan chad ni ma mo bcu bzhi'i skong thabs so// dra ni khol mo rnams sha khrag dang a mr-i tas bskang ste// srid pa g+h+nAn gyi khyim bdag mo// he ru ka sI'i thugs dam bzhad// gar ting dkar mo'i thugs dam bskang // dun ting nag mo 'thugs da
336b6(rnying rgyud): shan ting dmar mo'i thugs dam bsang // grub ting ser mo'i thugs dam bskang // srid pa gru 'degs chen mo yis// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dmag gi tshal mo chen mo bzhi// dkar mo mche gtsigs chen mo dang //

337a1(rnying rgyud): dam pa snang // sbed pa'i na thugs dam gnyan pa bdag bskrang ngo // mamang thags pa gan thugs dum gzhan pa bdog bkang // de stor nang gong mangs dang sa nA pa du byas la// shel lkug pongamamatha' lding la sogs pa/

337a3(rnying rgyud): thugs dam bskang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / gdon 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dbang can mo rnams bskad pas zlog pa dang // bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa de lags na// dbang can po rnams ji ltar bskang // de skad gsol
337a4(rnying rgyud): pas bka' stsal pa// de nas pho rigs mchod 'dod na// stags bu go 'phang mthong man dbye// cho gardzas ni 'di dag go// 'bru sna bcu gsum dar phye dang // rin chen sna brgyad brdar nas su// rgyal po chen po'i gzugs suH// de yi lag ya g.yas
337a5(rnying rgyud): g.yon rin po che// gsal byed brgyad kyang de bzhin no// 'bru snga dang sna tshom bu ldan// lus dang yan lag de bzhin brgyan// bdud dang drang dkar chen po dang // de ba nor gyi bdag po dang // gshin rje ru dra'i rdzas yin te// skyes to re yang de bzhin no// 'bru
337a6(rnying rgyud): sngagasang phye bre bzhi la// mkhang thabs mda' yis rnam par brgyan// sle'u bzang dang dkar mda' yis bskyon// de bzhin sha dang rin chen chang // dkar glung rkyen dang bcas pa yin// dkar po che la de bzhin no// bre gsum gsang phyi'i rga ga ma la/

338a2(rnying rgyud): sa 'thor tshugs mgo// btsan 'god rgyal po'i ming nas snang // mdos mkhan ni mdos la gshegs// shar phyogs ni pha gin// dung mkhar ni mgo dbul// bas yi ni sgo stsal can// shar phyogs gnams kyid ci dag/ tshangs phud pras
338a3(rnying rgyud): tho tshugs mgo// shar phyogs rgyal po'i ming nas phyung // mdos mkhan ni mdos la gshegs// bse btsan rong po rgya mangs rol// btsan ni rgyal po'i ming nas byung // madros ma kha na ni mdos la gshegs// btsan la sogs pa de bzhin no// da ni
338a4(rnying rgyud): man+ta shan ting gi cho ga bshad de/ gsang phye gtsang mkhal phyed la// dzika/ 'dod pa'i gzugs byas la// dkor cha spyan gzigs yang dag ldan// de ni phye chud shan ting ngo // de la 'jig rten shes bskor te// dmar gtor dam rdzas ldan pa ni// shan ting dang
338a5(rnying rgyud): gi cho ga'o// gtan sa dang ni sa dpen par// gru ba ni spos chus maN+Dal la// zas kyis stegs bu gang bar bya// las dang phan yon gong ma bzhin// bsngos nas dar spa bshus te bzhag/ phyi chud mthun te dkar po yin// gas pa mthun te gnyis ka 'dra
338a6(rnying rgyud): ni stsal bsam pa ma 'grub na// 'jig rten dbang ngamar la can gyur// las rnams kun gyi brtag pa ste// cho ga lung chen rdzogs pa 'di// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// 'jig rten dbang can mngon par dga'// lha
338a7(rnying rgyud): rnams kun yang mthu skyes nas// sems can kun la phan pa bskabs// dam tshig mtha' ni de bzhin gnas// pho mdos rnams kyi le'u stenyi shu gcig pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'gugs dang 'dzin pa'i las rnams
338b1(rnying rgyud): ny+ya'i pas rnams bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' bral pa// nyon rtag ga zung drung yang dgapa// srid gsum 'dul ba'i thon no// bdag nyid panA ga ldan byas te// sems kyi dkyil nas bskal ba ni// 'ang
338b2(rnying rgyud): rlu gi kha chen ldings pa la// lcags kyi me mo kyang mgro can// mgo gsum mal lag drugam// g.yes na tha baT+wAMg/ bad ma zla gros sri dgasu la skyol// tha ma d+hil nags bya stegs 'ching // g.yon pa d+ha gas dkAng // 'ang sa la
338b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i me// tha ma lpags su 'gro 'dun na// gar+b+has ni drar khrod dkyilan gnas// bslangs ni rtags kyi dkyiladu bskyengs// bton ni sngags kyi rtsel bton// 'gyed ni mnyam sa dgral 'gyed// dbang ni srid pa gsum la byed// di skye 'gro yongs
338b4(rnying rgyud): bul ni gling bzhi khyab par nyul// bang ni nges par klog pas mgyogs// mod ni dngos lo gcig la zod// kyal ka chen pos bdud dpud 'joms// tsha mjams chen pos bgegs rigs sgrol// nga rgyal chen pos mu stegs 'dul// rdzu 'phrul chen pos ri ra
338b5(rnying rgyud): bsnyil// khyed ni sred gsum gro la khyed pas// ched 'ga' drag shul bsgral ba'i tshe// gang la bya ba 'grub par byos// de yi bka' sdod pho nya ma// dkar mo nyi ma'i thod zeng can// phyag drug zur gsum mig gcig ma// dril bu dbu gsul drung
338b6(rnying rgyud): mgo la tshil gyi yi bag+hA can// mtshan ni sbyin dkar go cog can// phyag gnyis pad+ma stang bzung zhing // mtshan ni 'jig rten kun 'dul ma// g.yas na zhing gi rgyu zhags 'phen// bdud dang mya stegs 'ching byed ma// mtshan ni dbyings phyag chen mo ma//
338b7(rnying rgyud): gyi dang por bsdams pa ni// semag ston pa'i phor pa ru// mi khrag tron pa nang stsal zhing // bdud rtsi brgyad dang 'bras nas 'thor// thongs shig dgra bgegs rdul du rdzog/ mtshan ni bdud kyi longs spyod ma// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// me yi dus
339a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phung sna rjel// drug bgegs mnan pa'i las mngadam// bca na rdordzogs pa'i mchog zung na// g.yon sa phyag na bsnams pa ni// zangs dang lpags mi nga la zhugs pa// ma hAng bsdus pa'i zhags pa 'jam
339a2(rnying rgyud): pa gsum char 'ching bar mdzad// mtshan ni gser gyi dril zhags la// sprul pa'i 'jo du mang po can// g.yas g.yon sol ba'i g.yab mo yis// khams gsum rdul du brtags mdzad ma// mtshan ne ga yang gzhi dum man ni// nang bya rgya
339a3(rnying rgyud): ya// stos khams thams cad 'ching mdzad ma// dgra bgegs thams cad rdul du rtog/ mtshan ni zhing gin pa 'chan// Sha nas mi khrag tron pa 'thor// stod khams thams cad sreg mdzang ma// mtshan ni kha nas me ba ma// rgyal ma mag
339a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro thams can skyod mdza dam// mtshan ni ma tog thun 'byangs can// 'ab ga tus chen mo kho ma'i bral// kho n+da lnga chen po gshin rje'i gshed// 'aka'i ma chonya mgyogs pa'i tshogs// dargyal can rnams dbang du byung // gang lab 'jal
339a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis mo ti'i gtso mo ste// bcol pa'i lus rnams 'grub par mdzod// mtshan ni me 'bar men mo la// lag na mo yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dgra bgegs ma lus sreg par mdzad// thar nga'i dus med 'a dod 'bod// ga tshad sdom zhes smrab des// ma btang
339a6(rnying rgyud): dul mor khrug/ yonya chen mo drug cu'i gtso// e kr-i dz+wa Ti ra la gcig ma// ral pa'i zar bus srid gsum spud// na 'og zhabs ma'i dbu rgan can// gnam la bskor bas bdud dpung rnag mdzad ma// sa la ba rdams pas dam sri 'byung po'i padz+ra gcog ma/
339a7(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus thul// mtshan ni khyim bdag chen mo la// rtsibs su rung 'tshub mdur gyis bgyid// drongs shig khru gcig ang+ku sha/ bsgrub pa'i bar chad byed pa dang // dngos grub par chod byed pa dang // sgrub pa po yi mthu 'phrog rnams// dza
339b1(rnying rgyud): shig khwa gcig ang+ku sha/ sgrol bdag chen mod tshur sgron// mthu chen dam can datshur spyon// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// ces las la bskul bar bya'o// bon chen mo'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / gdon 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan
339b2(rnying rgyud): gnyen po 'jig byed dang // lu gu chud la 'gal byed cing // sems can kun la gnod bgyid dang // rtag tu gdug sems gyur pa la// nan tur las rnams ji ltar 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // ngo mtshar d+ha yis bka' stsal pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i
339b3(rnying rgyud): gyung bas// sems can kun la gnod pa la// nan tu ra las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// 'di yi phur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// ji ltar yid 'thad gnas su ni// dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa la// dbang gi dkyil 'khor/ smad la// da bu
339b4(rnying rgyud): su kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'// mdzub gsum pa la drag por bri// ze ba sor bzhi cha snyoms la// dgu ga dang sgor 'phang sngags kyis 'gengs// dbang gi dkyil 'khor khang na la// mnan dang 'phang ba'i sngags kyis bskor// de nas khar na gru bzhi la// sar lnga ma
339b5(rnying rgyud): tshad du bya// rdo rje pad+ma spel mar bris// de nas maN+Dal rgyas pa la// 'od phung thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// sgo bzhi mkha' bzhis brgyan par bsam// de nas rdzas kyi ngo bo yang // chu yi gtso bor dgu bsogs te// grub pa'i rnal 'byor dgu rbad pa// gnyis la chag
339b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzi na sun gnyis dri// bdun la ma bdun sngags bris te// drag po khar na 'khor bar bzhag/ dbang dang drag por ldan pa yi// lcags zangs shing ni gang yang rlung // dbang drag phur pa dgu po la// mgo la mkha' 'gro lnga lnga bsam// ngos la rnal 'byor bcu bzhi
339b7(rnying rgyud): bad+d+hon// rked par chags 'dzin la sogs bsam// rtse mor pa Ta sogs pas ma nas su// dmigs pa'i dngos po gang yang rung // dkar nag dkyil du btub nas su// dge thig las kyi mtshams rgyanas// dngas ma'i dngos po thams cad kun/
340a1(rnying rgyud): nas rnams zos par bsam// de ltar brgyab na yang bache// dngos por bdag nyid bsgom b+hab// tha man mtsho nyid kyi sra// dbang drug sgra mdog chen mol// dgrag ci gzhal lnga 'jigs pa'i sgra// dpral ma nga
340a2(rnying rgyud): bsgoms shing // mche ba can la gtsigs shing bzhad// ma mo thams cad dbyings nas 'gyed// phya gan dang drag phung bu 'dzin// 'dren dang mnan dang sbyar ba yi// sngags rnams rab tu bzlas nas su// rnal 'byor ma rnams nad nas ni// phoHbsngal ba dngas
340a3(rnying rgyud): gang la bya ba'i dngos po de// dbang drag dkyil du bzung nas sra// dkar nag dkyil du brgyab nas su// rnam shes dbyings su bsdus pa dang // dge sdig las rnams sbyangs nas su// lha gzugs bral te zos bsaman// rdo rje'i bag kyang 'jig par 'gyur// ngas sa
340a4(rnying rgyud): pa la the tshom med// ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'khor de na gnas pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' stan las langs te/ gar gyi brda' phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad gsol to// dbang drag dkyil 'khor byin rlabs dang // dbang drag phur pa
340a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul dang // 'dren mnan slar 'phang sngags kyi mthu// mgon po chen pos bstan du gsol// de skad rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa gsan nas/ cang mi gsung bar dbang drag gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa las/ badz+ra han+ta hU~M la mtha
340a6(rnying rgyud): b+ha ga ru tra/ b+ha ga tra tha/ tra rdo sta~M baM kI la ya/ dzaHdz+nyAnan/ s+pha ra Na ya/ tsit+ta swA/ ba hU~M/ zhes gsungs pa dang / khams gsum thams cad mkha' gu gsu ma gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor/ gting dpag med pa'i gzhal yas khang / dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor du
340a7(rnying rgyud): nas/ dbang drag gi phung du sa shes kyis pa' 'gro ma rnams kyis brgyab pas/ sbeng na chang du nga ste/ dbang drag gdengs pa'i gting khung du/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te/ rigs lnga dang sgegadon 'dral ba 'dul la dbang drag ni yul 'khor ga
340b1(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i ma mo dbang can gyi tshogs gan N+Dal du bsgyel te/ snyid dkar nag gi mtshams su phud bu phog ste/ dge sdig gi shan thang gye nas/ byang chub kyi sems su byin gyis brlabs so// de ltar thams cad brgyal sangs pa dang / 'di skad ces glu blangs so// dbang drag dkyil
340b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor yum gyi mkha'// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bde gshegs gnas// gting dpag med pa'i gzhal yas su// dbyings nas dbang drag phur bu yis// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// rang rgyud snying las drangs nas su// dbang drag mkha' la bzhag nas kyang /
340b3(rnying rgyud): sman ra dra gsang ba'i dbyings su sbyor// gu h+ya b+ha ga sa ma ya staM laM laM ma hA tsit+ta ho// zhes gsungs pas/ brgyal ba thams cad slar dran pa rnyed nas/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor na 'dar yid yid 'dug pa tshor ro// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas/ dkyil
340b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po a la la// dbang drag dkyil 'khor bde ba'i mchog/ gsang sngags chen po a la la// 'dren gnon spyang 'phang cho 'phrul che// mtshon cha chen po a la la// dbang drag phur bu dge sdig skyong // khrag 'thung chen po a la la// bla med khrag
340b5(rnying rgyud): 'thung rje btsan mchog/ mkha' 'gro chen po a la la// ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul pa'i mchog/ ces smras so// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyi mchog/ mu stegs thams cad kyi gnyen po bdag nyid lags te/ bdag gi
340b6(rnying rgyud): ming yang rdo rje sems dpar btags pa lags na/ 'dir bla med bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho 'phrul gyis bdag kyang brgyal na/ mi mthun pa gzhan lta spos kyang ci 'tshal/ dbang drag dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// dus gsum
340b7(rnying rgyud): mi 'thur ba'i bdag nyid// gsang ba mchog kyang de bzhin 'dzin// zhes gsol to// de nas dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho 'phrul gyis mu stegs sA la chen po yang gtan du non par gyur to// rnal 'byor gyi dgra bgegs mnan pa'i le'u ste ter gsum pa'o//
341a1(rnying rgyud): den rgya mthordza/ 'artsam rnams san grang babs la dadug pa'i ning smo dang/ dkyil gamod kyis rnams cad dam/ yang dugagacigagan gnyis la bzlagangs ca tu/ srin bathe pa sa sa pa
341a2(rnying rgyud): thab dang rdzas la sogs pa ni/ sbyin bsreg gi cho ga man ga las shes so// las mgru ban lan gsum bar du bskyar la ba'o// nad gcad pa dang // char dbab pa dang / bas ma rdzogs bde'i dang / khrag skem mni ngag la sogs pa'i las ma mo'i
341a3(rnying rgyud): gdags par bya'o// las 'di dag ni gang la mya ngan 'grub pa// I/ gdon 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ma mo spyi brgyal ji ltar 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// ma mo spyi bskul 'di ltar bskul// rtsibs ma 'phel nor ba
341a4(rnying rgyud): ma bzhag da ni 'dod dgur spel// rlung gi rin chen sna sngal// s+ya pi bedu lug rkang 'gros la// mchod rdzas 'phrul me tog rgyas par spel// thang gtsog yud tsam 'dus tshogs gcig/ nyi zer 'od chags 'grel moche// mnyam nyid bskal

341a6(rnying rgyud): 'da'// ma 'phang ma 'phang sgyu ma 'phang // khyung chen sku la gsheg rdzogs ma// gi kho chog chog glog re 'gyur// me sdug 'bar ba'i 'gro 'du can// bos shing de ni snyan ma sra// bsnyen cing de ni gong ma g.yel// 'dri ma shing de ni mthu ma chung // gzungs par ba
341a7(rnying rgyud): brtseme chung // 'grogs shing de ni gzhung mngan// lha ma bdud ltar grags ma dang // rje mor bkye 'o rje mngon// rngo mor bgyi 'od dbang ma rlom// ma du bgyi ngo tsha mthag/ sring mor bkyi na gdung mchung // dgra blang bgyis na mthu ma chung // gzungs mar bgyis na
341b1(rnying rgyud): chung/ mdang ma nga kyis na nga na/ bas nas tu mngan// na mangs cas na sangs ngo// la na byang // bangag sems nams kyis mnang ba lang// nyas dathang gtan nga las bcagasam/

342a2(rnying rgyud): rna kyis sanan nga / rdzun sa pa'i gyig/ rlom chen pa'i da / na gas da thu / mams cad grug se dang den pan dug nga/

343a1(rnying rgyud): smrasmra// na na na/ mam na du na rna//
343a2(rnying rgyud): ba// yad la gadrung ba'i mdzanan paste// wa snru mas skyes pa'i bu mo byini// T+wA~M kun gyigacom pa'i// bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i rtsal mo dran// phrer bu sgrub pa'i blon mo bzhi// ma mo thun gyi bangag rdzo // mas la ga shi pa'i na po de// sa
343a3(rnying rgyud): 'phrog pa'i lham thA ne// ma mo na khro bdag mo ni// dang khro'i snying 'phrog lha mo bzhi// kun gzhi gnas sbrang bu gcig mo// gling bzhi gnas lhur drag margyal// stong gsum dbang bskur dzadza shA re ma// dag po dbang bskur dpal ldan pam ti//
343a4(rnying rgyud): rkyen nga can sngon mo tshugus// gshin rje'i l+h+wam ma ti thug cig/ las mkhan ma ma brgyad rgyug / byang shar mtshams kyi sring gcigs// thugs kyi sprul pa nag mo bdun// tshogs rkyenag ba'i tshigs// sku yi sbal pa dkar mo
343a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs kyi dag ma tshogs// gsung gi stsal pa demar mo bdun// tshogs kyi dmar mi nyakhung tshogs// yon nam ma me nag pa n-i// tshogs sa sung so khri'i tshogs// srin las ma mo ldang drug ga na/ tshigs kyim
343a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs// ma mo dngos 'dzin gyi le'u ste te drug pa'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// stang srid thig la ji ltar bsdu// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// snying srid sdig me 'di ltar ban+d+ha// de yang ga
343a7(rnying rgyud): zhen/ yid dang kun bzhi dang rnam par shes pa las/ ma mo thig le bgyur gsal te/ ma mo sbyin gyi sa rdzogs pa 'i thog med // ma mo gnas kyi thig me dang / mi ma srang gi thig ma dang // ma mo sgrub pa'i thig le dang // ma mo bral pa'i thig sad

343b2(rnying rgyud): zhes kyang b+ha/ ma nor ba zhes kyang bya/ gtan la 'bebs pa zhes kyang bya/ ma bcos pa zhes kyang bya/ gru rkyen med pa zhes kyang bya/ ma 'gags pa zhes kyang bya/ ye gnas chen por gnas so// ma mo snang srid kyi thig le'i leT ste nyer 'du

349a3(rnying rgyud): kyim lu so gsum po'o// nga // / gzhung rdung rna mas yang gsol pa// dam las 'das pa'i sngags par dang // mtshan ma ngan pa'i rna 'phrul dang // bdag dang rnags brog byung ba rnams// brjog pa ga shA lag /
349a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa bdag nyan 'tshal// bka' stsal pa/ bdag la sngags bzlog byung ba rnams// bzlog pa'i cho gangs bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// bzlog pa'i chag 'di ltar bya// 'char ba las byas pa'i bar byar
349a5(rnying rgyud): nangang myig ti shu na brgyad bris pa/ de'i nang dung dgra pa'i mang byangad ga cug/ b+had+hAng+yam bu brgyad pa gcig gi nang dungs pa'i ming dung byuta b+ha zla ba rgyad kris pa/ gang yin pa'i ming nas gtsug/ de nas pa shA dang blan gnyis la sngags rang btang pa/ ming byung pa
349a6(rnying rgyud): gdaba'o// bzlog pa'i ngan sngags ni/ oM bar mir na/ dus rig sa du la hU~M b+h+yob+h+yo// zhes brjod de/ de nas yang bar bu'i nang du dri chen bcu gnas/ dri zhus gtor la sngags te bzlas na ngan sngags klog par 'gyur ro// mtshan mngan pa rdzu 'phrul rdzo dang
349a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur/ ngan sngags par bris bzlog pa'i le'u ste so bzhi ba'o// gnad 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po'i rig pa sa// ngan sngags par bung ltar chel// mdzan rdzogs ya kyis dka' rgya pa pa~M// btsun
349b1(rnying rgyud): pa gnyen po 'jig byed cing // lu gu chud las ngag la byed dang // sems can kun la gnod byed pa// ngan sngags par bu 'di bshad kyi// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gaH// ngan rdzogs par bu 'di ltar bya// mnga' gsol byas pa'i bar badra//
349b2(rnying rgyud): med byang byas te gzhug/ ma bdun sngags ni stong bzlas shing // ming byad de la brdeg par bya// de nas thal chen yungs kar bsres pa yis// lan khri bzlas nas par bur gdab// gang la bya ba de dmigs pa// gsal par 'asgom ga
349b3(rnying rgyud): bsgyur na dgra bo phung bar 'gyur// de yi mod la rtags 'ong ngo // ngan sngags la/ ta ra tu ra/ pu be de te/ ba na mu la ba dz+ra/ ba ya b+h+ye b+h+yo ma ma dzi ta kha rag ma ra Na ma ra Na b+h+yo d+ho/ ngan sngags par bus bsad pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o//
349b4(rnying rgyud): drung lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed cing // lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed dang // sems can kun la gnod byed pa// bdag la sdang sems byed pa la// par bur mnan pa'i las thabs ni// rtag chen yab la bdag
349b5(rnying rgyud): 'tshal// rtag chen yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ de ltar gsol ba gsan nas kyang // bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed dang // lu gu chud las 'gal byed cing // sems can kun la gnod byed pa// bdag la ngan sems byed pa la// ngar bus
349b6(rnying rgyud): mnan pa ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung lha yi ga ci// bar bu mnan las 'di ltar bya// khams la sogs sprin mo la// sbu gu'i tshul du byas pa la// nang du bal chen blugs nas su// de yi nang du dgra gzugs gzhug/ de yi nus pa lo dang
349b7(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i 'bras bu dang // ya cha mcha bar du dang // de rnams bsres la/ til nag po dang / skye tshe dang / bedz+ra rna dang / de rnams rmugs nas/ mi khrag gis smras pa/ gzugs byas la ming rus dang / zas kyi lha dang bcas te/ par bu gang
350a1(rnying rgyud): rung gi nang dubacug la/ bskab la kha rtsi sgras thes n+ta/ lugs shing kha srub ste 'chi'o// rtogs pa'i dbang du mdzod nas phyag rgyas mnan no// mnan pa'i sngags la/ a thab bud yag so/ khrag sod/ dal pre/
350a2(rnying rgyud): mar Na pra be sha phaT nan/ cho ga yang sras/ par bus mnan pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed dang // lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed cing // sems ca
350a3(rnying rgyud): kun la gnod byed pa// bdag la sdang sems byed pa rnams// srog rtsa bskam na ji ltar skam// snying rtswa drangs na ji ltar drangs// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig
350a4(rnying rgyud): byed gang // srog rtsa skam pa ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// srog rtsa bskam na 'di ltar skam// zhing chen ras la gzugs bris la// snying gar mnan pa'i sngags bris la// zangs kyi snga bu
350a5(rnying rgyud): nang du gzhug// de nas ma mo srog la rbad pa ni 'di skad do// hUM khams gsum rgyal mo dbang gi srid kyi gzhi// gsang ba yum la dbang bsgyur rgyas 'debs ma// gsang ba'i thig bzhis gnas bzhi 'joms byed ma// dkar mo dmar mo sngon mo ser
350a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi// tsirta spug tshon gnas 'dren ma// ma mo chen mo 'dren mo bzhi// dkar mo kun mo'i tshogs ni gnas nas rgya// jam bag yud tsam snal rol mdzad ma// khyed kyi phrin las skal ba'i ngo longs shig/ sha rus gtad pa'i gnas skal mA ru long /
350a7(rnying rgyud): hUM grag sha ma / sngon ma mongs mos 'dren byed rtso rmongs// snying dang khrag bsres zhes dgu'i zas la rol// gtang sha dus la gnas bzhi zas la gtar // kha rim drug bram D+h+we/ dmar ma sbas mos tsaHspug chen drongs// bzhi drod pa'i
350b1(rnying rgyud): gnas bzhi dbyings su stor// gtad par gnas pa ni ngos las khrag chen thob// gos mdzad sbyor mdzad thugs rje'i dbyings su sdud// ma baN+Dar ma gaphel myur du shi // titakr-i maN+Dal d+ha/ mahA mar N+Dal bri dzi ni la dz+ra d+ha/ ser ma byang chu cha 'dran mas
350b2(rnying rgyud): mthing ga hU~M gi klong nas thongs// dkar mo dbyings kyi thig lems ni gnas nas spor// rdza bzhi drod kyi gnas nas sbyar// khrag chen 'khyil ba'i gnas nas srol// gsar ba'i ma bzhi'i phrin las ni// bsad pa'i dam bgegs dal ru// kha tsang
350b3(rnying rgyud): rgyob cig 'bar ma bzhi// drongs shig stobs shig mtshon chen stobs// gsang ba'i dbyings nas da ltar dril// ma ha rak+ta lar/ ma N+Da tsit+ta la b+h+yo// ma hA mI sa la ya/ ma hA rak+ta sha ma sha la ya kraM/ de lta ra gsang ba'i mang zhil zil lo// dan
350b4(rnying rgyud): 'ab dam dgu chung de 'du ma // seMnang gi 'bar mkhag 'a nga// bzhind la dbyung sngangs// rgya gsum bar ma na ton// zab bathung kyang nas skams 'dril ma/ yul gshe gas ma byar gyur// dam shes badzin pang ga
350b5(rnying rgyud): b+hing 'dren mi mo de tshur sngon// kun ga ni sdud pa'i tshul mkhan mo// myos byed ma mod rgyar rngon// ma pa'i klong nas khrag chen 'thor// gsapa 'don 'bar ma klong dbu mo// sum chen 'bar yang kyang skyon// klong na gnas pa'i 'bar ma la// gnod par dgra bgegs

350b7(rnying rgyud): sa kyi ma mo gcig ste rdzong // de lnga ni ye shes kyi 'phrang dum lnga'o// de nas phyi ma mo bzhi bsgral ba ni di skad do// sprin+ya rim ma so bar ma bani// rtswa na klang nas rba bram 'phye// dkar ma 'debs mkhan tshe 'jog ma// ser mo 'debs mkhan pani 'jos ma// da
351a1(rnying rgyud): mo 'debs ma khan dbang 'jog ma// sngon mo 'debs mkhan srog 'jog ma// b+hi rim 'dren pa'i 'bar ma bzhe// 'khrug byed ma mo las la bab// g.yul bzhi ma yelas la bab// 'jigs byed ma mo 'bar mngan /
351a2(rnying rgyud): klong nas dril te dang sprod mdzod// gzhan las 'joms byed g.yul ba sham mo// rgod gtong ma mo bar ma dgu// shwa ru gnod byed drongs las shog/ gtad pa'i gnas su 'phrul chen 'gyed// snyid 'dren ma mo'i dus la bab// srog rtsaskam pa'i
351a3(rnying rgyud): la bAbuM// tha mr-i trag sha ma?/ sha ting la la graM/ Na dAg ma b+ho/ mahA rnaM sa la b+h+yo/ ma hA raHpa b+h+yo/ ma hA shAn ti po/ de ma de sa yaM/ mthun hUMtraM/ da rang ni d+l-i/ zhes brjod/ drag tu bzlab so// rtag tu bzlas pa'i stong ba na/ [।ऽ]
351a4(rnying rgyud): sha gr-i tsit+ta krA ma hA la b+h+yo ma hA rak+ta kr-i/ ma hA mAM sa la graM/ d+hi ti pa 'o/ 'di gsang ba'i ming zhi ba rnag pa'i sngags te/ rdzas dang rnam pa med par bzlas na/ dgra po'i snying yang mngon du 'byung ngo // srog rtsa skam pa'i l+r-i'u sde so bdun pa'o// /
351a5(rnying rgyud): 'dul lho yis yid gsol ba// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed la// srog rtsa bskam na ji ltar skam// yang drag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag tshogs kyis bkang rtsal pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'dag byed cing // lug rgyud las 'gal

351b4(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum la phud nyul ma// de ni jo mo nyid la mchod// bcol na kun kyang 'grub par byed// dgra srog dmar po rtsang nas chod// 'dir sprond ma skong phrin las mdzod// nying khrag mchod pa 'di bzhes la// dag po'i sreg \u0f7f drang drag pa/
351b5(rnying rgyud): bo'i srog rtsa skam du gso la// zhes paphrul zhing sngags 'di gdab po// oM badz+ra mu re shang / za 'dra ma mu ra~M shang / hUM khra ga ra mr-i thA ma ri li ri li rbad/ ces pa 'azlas shing 'ag gsum gyi bar du mi tshig gis par mchod par bya'o// de nas gzugs kyi kha thag nas lcags ga
