354b7(rnying rgyud): li li rbad/ mnu rak+Sha sI la sogs pa'i dbang phyag ma'i sngags tshang bar btang / saM t+ta ba snying Sha ga/ dza gar TA thi/ ya ShA mAM sa la ya/ ma n+darak+ta la br-i/ bo t+tarbad/ b+ha ri li la rbad/ jag dgra la sun dpyo lu/ ho mo a lo tsit+tan ma
355a1(rnying rgyud): nyam ma tho lhal ma na gnas stos/ bar gsug na// yang tho // sa m+b+haH/ thAH/ brda nying ma gcad/ snrel 'a lanas nas dam dang / yun dan dadu/ dang za mas
355a2(rnying rgyud): dang / sha khrag thig snga nad/ tshal pad+ma ma bu khrag ti nang / spang na ni rbad/ shag te shag ti zad/ zan rban nad/ dum bu dum bu tshal pa tshal pa rbad/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ru tra rbad/ snying nag snyid nag srog rtswa zad/ tshul ma tshal pa te ne zad/ bang ri la pa
355a3(rnying rgyud): dIp+ta tsa kra rbad/ shi tsa tse ru bru~M ling guM guM bruM ling rbad/ sarba kun tsar ling mug rbad/ tsa ra ling / ma ma ra kA ru tA rgad/ ces drag tu bzlas shing / dug sna tshogs khrag tu sbyar bar btab la/ dgra bo'i khyim la phog par gtor ro// dag po thag ring na yu
355a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs su gtor ro// ma mo thun sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / g.yung dru lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed rnams// dbang du bsrub ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa//
355a5(rnying rgyud): sngang sems byed pa'i dgra bo rnams// dbang du bsru bangs bstan gyi// brog la dgra bro'i ming rus bris la/ ri dgas chur 'dzul gyi mig dang / nya zang la chug pa'i gshog pa/ chu nyi ma med pa dang / de bsres la yungs kar dang thal chen la sngabs
355a6(rnying rgyud): kyis btab la// khyi me ma mi lul phyogs srug tong/ ming kyang la yong gtor bu/ ming byang dag pas bcings la/ nang pa'i bar du bzhag go// ngan sngags pa/ par byed/ mam gtan/ yang mi d+ha/ tshig kyi dbang du sus shig paH/
355a7(rnying rgyud): la ti khang brdzag rag zi rje dbang du smras shig ces drag tu bzlas so// dgra bo dngang du bsgre ba'i me ru ste zhe gcig pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// bstan pa 'jig pa'i das po rnams// phung byas gdab
355b1(rnying rgyud): byar bdag/ spyad papa mchags bka' bcad byung ba ltam tshogags ka'ajam pa// 'dags dang bsrung zad pa'ang ba rnams// dza thas gang dbang bstang sa/ rtanacan tu sems dpa' dab / chog na du
355b2(rnying rgyud): dang 'thung g.yas pa laM/ so gcig pa dang sor gsum pa dang / sor lnga pa dang / go brgyad pa dang / sor bcu gnyis pa byas te/ de rnams kya mig \u0f7f mdzad zung brgyad par byas la/ de'i 'og ma yang thar gsam par bzhag so/
355b3(rnying rgyud): ra gsum par bya/ rtse bur gsum chu srin gyi kha nas dbyung bar bya'o// de nas sor gcig par byas pa'i spyi bor gsang ba'i he ru ka dgang / sbeng ba rgya mdung le gsang ba'i khrom dgod/ snod kyi brtsam gzhogs la gas ba'am bzhi dag
355b4(rnying rgyud): la e ka d+h+r-i Ti dgod/ de nas mdun gyi dkyil 'khor e'i steng du bzhugs su gsol/ de nas byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur bar bya// de nas dril zhing 'di skad brjod de/ gu h+ya shrI he ru ka D+haM/ gu h+ya kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ badz+ra kA li kA la ya/ da' po
355b5(rnying rgyud): ya phaT/ ces bzlas shing / gang la dmigs pa de'i dkar nag mtshams lnga brdeg go// thur thas rags ma pa ma/ bar 'jigs zung kyi he ruka dag / rtse mdud 'og ma la yum tshan / kha la dgad/ spyod kyi brtsam gzhogs la
355b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dpad mo che bzhi dgod/ rtse mo la hUM gsum dgod/ de nas mdun gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bshugs su gsol// byin gyis brlab par bya/ dbang yang bskur/ de nas 'di skad do// oM gu d+h+ya dz+nyA na sha~M hi ru kadz+nyA na kr-i dz+nyA shud+hi s+t+ra/ badz+ra kI la kA la ya/ 8
355b7(rnying rgyud): ra ya hU~M phaT/ de nas phung ba sor lnga pa lali/ spyi bar dpal chen po dgod/ sbrid pa'i rgya 'dung la sum bkrag gsal mnyan dgod/ stod kyi bcum gzhogs la yum chen mo bzhi dgod/ rtse mo mdza mang po dgod/ de mdun gyinam mkha' bzhugs
356a1(rnying rgyud): su gsol// sbyin gyis brna' ba dang / dbang bsgyur ba dang / 'di skad brjod/ oM ts+tshi ten+na ka gri sas Sh+kaM ha/ mahA mi hrIny+dza/ badzal bAr raMk+ta/ b+hI shA sad+hI hA/ byi ya ye te ta/ bAHkI li kI la ya/ dgrang mA run b+ha barbA dzA/
356a2(rnying rgyud): nag gyur pa sor brgyad pa la spyi bor he rug dgod/ skyed pa rgya mdud la yum srid pa'i bde 'gro ma dgod// stod kyi bcu me gzhogs la dbyings phyag ma buzhi dgod// rtse mo'i ngos su khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi dgod/ de nas mdun gyinam mkha' la bzhugs sku gsol/
356a3(rnying rgyud): gIs brlab pa dag dbang bsgyur ba 'di skad do// oM shrI he ru ka pro d+h+r-i shwa rI b+ha ga par+N+Nar+ya/ badz+ra kI li kI lA ya/ dgra bo mA ra nA phaT/ oM mun tri ni/ a shun d+hi ni/ thA ga dun ti/ ga mun+da tI/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ dgra bo mA ra na hUM phaT/ oM swAH pad+ma Sha
356a4(rnying rgyud): ming 'grom/ badz+ra kI l-i kI la ya/ de tha bu m+bA ni sI phaT/ de nas phrar pa si rab cu gnyis pa la gong ma'i sted rje thugs kyi dkyis rje mo bzhi bldan la dgod do// de nas ma mo rnams spyan drang ba dang / bzhugs su gsol ba dang gnyis su med par 'a
356a5(rnying rgyud): dang mchod pa dbul ba dang // dngos grub gsol ba la sogs pa byas la/ de nas 'dzab la zhugs la bar bar du gtod tshogs kyi mchod pa 'gul/ thams cad thugs dam bskul/ phrin las bcol/ gsang ba'i thugs ka nas/ dza 'di 'dra ba
356a6(rnying rgyud): hUM zhing munan sngags dang / dab bo'i srog gi snying po dang bcas bzang zhing dbyug go// rtags dang mtshan ma mdu gi bar du de ltar bya'o// de nas rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba dang / myur du phur pa gdab par bya ste/ phur pa rnams gnas sra ga pa
356a7(rnying rgyud): ra bya ste/ 'debs stang rnam pa bzhis gdab po/ de nas gnan par bya'o// phrar pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// / gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bdag la sdang sems byed pa rnams// dpung bshig pa
356b1(rnying rgyud): rgyagadag/ yang dag chags la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag chags kyis bka' stsal ba// blang bar byed pa'i dag pa rnams// dbyu shog pa la rtag na// ngas nyid du ngas bskrun gyi// rdung ba'i dag pa'i dpung ba shog pa'o// /
356b2(rnying rgyud): thog 'di ltar bya// zhab phrab gronA la/ rgyal mtshan gaN+DIg dang / mdung dang lce can gtsug dang gnyis rtogs la/ sngal mtshan gyi rtse mo/ oM badzadz+ra kr-i tAM shA rI thAg pa d+hIr+ya ts+tshats+yai/ sa ma ye sheg ces ze'o// mthul par sa
356b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra gu ru tIb+h+yoSh+Ta sa ma yu shig nas thom// shar phyogs sa sim+ba hU~M hU~M b+h+yas ma yA shig ces zlo'o// gro phyogs sna oM sa shun can po thos ma la shig shes thor// nib rdzogs su y-i zhag dun kyis ma ya sh+log ces dz+nyA De/ byang phyogs
356b4(rnying rgyud): dad+hi nI b+h+yo b+h+yas ma ya shig ces ze'o// de nas skyed pa'i shar phyogs su/ oM badz+ra s+phar+ya b+h+yo.a to yo b+ho b+h+yos ma ya shog ces bri'o// lho phyogs su oM badz+ra pa d+ha b+h+yo ti ya b+h+yas mA ya shig ces za'o// nab phyogs su a badz+ra kha rag b+h+yo to a te ye ts+tshe
356b5(rnying rgyud): ya sh+log ces zin// byang phyogs su mi badz+ra sring 'gro bya te a te yedz+dzaHsa ma ya shig ciseM ze'o// nas sred srid du shad phyogs su/ dz+rakan+d+had+has ma yi shig cem tha'o// sgro phyogs tha badz+rI ta kau radz+ra tig NA b+has ma ye shig ces thaM/
356b6(rnying rgyud): e bad+hA ni la ta badz+ra ni la ta b+hiHswa ma yA shig ces tho'o// byang du oM badz+ra latsA k+Sho d+ho sa ma yu shig ces thaMn/ de la sgrar byas ta N+Dal ma tshan du byas ni yang bzang / de nas mdung dar gyi rje ma la srid pa'i ma mo rnams kyi steng po zla ste// dar kyi
356b7(rnying rgyud): bcu c-ig babyas la/ dang bol aM badz+ra za'agram mur yab rda za 'gra ma mur shrId ces dri'o// de'i 'og ma la oM 'arda stong Sha rag cis sbron/ de'i 'ogam la snying drag gle ga ra g+sa ces bri'o// de'i 'og ma la kha spyan cag gzhi // dra

357b1(rnying rgyud): na / nga ma 'dur 'atsun na/ dngas dag ga na 'du pardzas gas su 'ang/ sa pan/ mamadu thong ban 'a gamyal/ rnamam pa mas bzung ma/ gas rgya/ cad nga bas/ mangs nga/

357b4(rnying rgyud): gtan tshegs rtsa ba gtan la dpa'// nyon cig gdon 'dul lha yig tse// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// mi mang po phreng ba'i re'u shul gyi sa dang / sgrub ma'i lo ma dang / rdzu tsan phub ma dang / thal chen dang de rnams bkres la/ ngo bo la nyin dang /

357b6(rnying rgyud): 'a nang du bcugal ba ma r+g+ha mam gyi drug rgya bcas la/ sngags 'di lan n+ti shu rtsa gcig bzlas ni kyis shing dbyung bar 'gyur nga // sngags la/ 'dzi tan thon byung / nam la shwa saH/ ya~M ga ye zhes bzlas shing mthun pa'i rnang la bkrur ti bat+ta na/ yul
357b7(rnying rgyud): nas dbyung bar the tshom med do// dgra go yul nas dbyung ba'i le'u ste zhe bzhi ba'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// bdag la sngar sems byed pa rnams// ma mos pab cing ji ltar badzi// dzegs sangs rgyas kyis bde pral pa//
358a1(rnying rgyud): brtan pa gtan po 'deg byed dang // srang sems byed pa ngan po rnams// ma mos pa bcing ba la/ mi 'phan po skrag pang thong pa la smrag ma'i dra chol klung bar 'dris la/ thod pa'i bar brtsag la/ dog pa sngon dam bya
358a2(rnying rgyud): bcings la/ rgya srin gyi phyag rgya bcas la/ phyogs bzhir 'gyur zhing bstan la/ brnag pa'i sngags 'di bzlas so// oM ne+er rnal// srid pa tshugs shul med thal sa~M Ta lcags kyi su thaMd sA hA/ zhes bzlas so// phyag rgya bsgyur ro// bzlog pa'i tshen
358a3(rnying rgyud): mchil ma rang gi khod par mi gtang bar bya'o// las 'dis bdag la dgra mi srid do// des dgra bo stong yang kha bcing bar 'gyur ro// khab cing gi le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'a
358a4(rnying rgyud): byed la// nan tu ra las rnams ji ltar 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur la// nan tu las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drang yang dag pa// ji ltar yid 'thad gnas su ni// 'a
358a5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i mi gzugs ste// mkhar thabs mda' yis btsun pa ni// le thu bzang dang dkar chos kyis brtan// oM byad tshogs pa'i sderu cha dang // ga'og mnga' yis rnam par brtan// skye'u bzang sde'u ris sna mi chen// rin chen lnga brgya
358a6(rnying rgyud): rkyen gyis brgyan// man+ta shAn+ti gzhung bzhin brjod// po rigs rnams la gzhung bzhin posgo// de nas gzhung bzhin bsngos pa dang // sol ba'i dong khu gang pa'i nang du/ klud gye rgan du mnan la/ de'i steng du dgra gang yin par sog la gzugs zis

359a4(rnying rgyud): dus su/ bdag nyid mu kha le'i ting nge 'dzin nam dbang chen gyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/ gzhung bzhin du bskul zhing las bcol lo// pho rigs rdzi ma la gtad pa'i las bcol ba ni yod na/ 'khu sngog che la rgyab 'gyur bas/ 'dir ma gsungs so//

360b3(rnying rgyud): yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyang la bzlog cing gsad pa'i phyir// nges pa'i man ngag 'di bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// rtags dang //
360b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma byung ba'i tshe// bsdams pa'i phyag rgya bkrol nas ni// dgra de'i yul phyogs bstan nas ni// gro ga shing shu na ra sog la// mi de'i ming byung bris nas ni// de yi lag tu bskur nas ni// shugs sgrol ma yi sngags kyis gdang //
360b5(rnying rgyud): khrag dang dug gi gtor ma yang // babs chad thod par bshams nas kyang // yum sa de yi phyogs su gtor// las rnams grub par gdon mi za// snying gi phur bu phyung na sa ni// a mr-i ta yis mchod byas nas// dam rdzas gtsang ma'i gter ma
360b6(rnying rgyud): la// ku sa ra yi rak+ta sa sgreng // gang yin de yi phyogs su kha bltas la// gtso 'khor gzhung bzhin bskul nas ni// lus kyang bsig cing phyag rgya bstan// bdag nyid dbang gi skur bsgoms te// dbang drag phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gzugs
360b7(rnying rgyud): de nyid la tsham rngams bya// drag shul dbang gis bskyod la btang // de ltar drag shul gyis sman mo rnams dbang du bsdus la btang bas las mi 'gu mi srid do// 'di nir mU gu ya tsan+ti'i brags kyi mnings go// bsdams pa'i phyag rgya bkrol nas ni// brik+Sha'i lcags kyis gdab nas ni// beng
361a1(rnying rgyud): gi cugs bcings nas kyang // rdo nga gnod 'bros goms pasres// rdzog sa deng drug tu bdun 'ama'o// yub yum sngags kyis btag nas ni// ba ge drug tu drug dbyur na// dan mod la las rnams 'grub// ngan/
361a2(rnying rgyud): gsum byas nan par 'gyur// lan lnga byas na 'chi bar 'gyur// lan gsum drug tu dril nas ni// snying gi phur bu phyung nas kyang // spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdab par bya// lcags sgra lnga yi phur bu la// dbang drag las rnams gzhung 'azhi du//
361a3(rnying rgyud): ni nges par gdon mi za// mon nam rabs chad thod pa la// nang dum bdun snying po bri// spyi gtsug nyi zla zod phreng bri// chags 'dzin spun gnyis rta ltag bre// tshon lud gnyis kyis mig nas gdags// rak+Sha ru ti'i sngags kyis gdab// ping gi bya
361a4(rnying rgyud): nyis bkrol te// drag tu bskul te 'phang la btang // yas rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// zhing gi sha tshil ras ngos kyis// ma mo rnams la gtang ngag gtang // ngan sngags par bus bsad pa'i le'u stong bdun pa'o// /
361a5(rnying rgyud): drung d+ha yis yang gsol pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur la// nan tu las rnams ji ltar 'tshal// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed dang // lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed dang // rtag tu gdug pa'i sem
361a6(rnying rgyud): gyur la// nan tur las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srog lus ca rnams skam pa'i phyir// ra sog grog shing shun nam// g.yam pa sngon po'i ngos dag la// raM khrag khri khrag sol ba yis// dgra bo'i bzugs
361a7(rnying rgyud): ni dris nas ni// tsher ma can gyi shing rnams la// dzas kyi br-ik+t+wa'i shing bu la// ro lta dmar po'i lugs 'bras gdags// dgra 'o'i gzugs la rdeg par bya// yang na ta ki pa yi shun pa la// nas pu rba ta yes bris// mgo/ ma

361b3(rnying rgyud): ma'i blangs pa la'o// dus drug rgyu ba'i dmangon// thA bstan dang bklung ngo // 'di ni nam gyi gung labru// tA dang phrag dang dang gasnam// drin nyi pa'i glang la rtsub 'o// rma bol drug d+hAH bdun ni// dus drug nu ba dang nano// phyir du bslal
361b4(rnying rgyud): dgazugs rnams// ga gi gas rnams bzlas pa yis// dam pa'i gzugs pa ba ga par n+tu// ga ran gyim kyi ga badzin no// rang gi dbyu ba dkyus su shA// bad kyi mas kyi zhugs nas // ska gag mig b+h+ya/

361b7(rnying rgyud): sogs pas byed do// byeng du ba sems dang gzug par bye/ gas kyi bya/ bla rtsa bras cu cig dang ga cig gis dngas mthang thugs dam pas// rlung phyog ci slar dbyangs byeng tsal phrer 'bras pa dang /

362a3(rnying rgyud): chedabus dang lngal 'gyo/ da ben rgyang ge le \u0f7f rgyang ngo// / d+had+b+ha ba cwo brjid ma bu mi zang ngo // ljags ny-i rtsa brgyad mngan yang / brtse co brgyang med du mi rung du// shA trU~M tshogs stong \u0f7fbad med ni yang/
362a4(rnying rgyud): bcud med du mi rung ngo // stan sde stong thabarjod med na yang / bcurtsa brgyad med du mi rung ngo // gsung chen gyi du bayang mi 'chad par byung ngo // gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa bcang mdan yang / 'dre med du mi rdung ngo // dgongs pa ma ngan ga cig/ skyes
362a5(rnying rgyud): tha sngags mkha nang ngacan gcig dkyil 'khor gyi zla bzhi kham chen ma'i skyeng ba Te/ dkyil 'khor gyi su ran la long brgyang sbom thu'o// yang sbal dang bcas par bya/ lung ba bcu rtsa brgyad kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mthar ma bskor/ mnga'ad yang za
362a6(rnying rgyud): ma gtsug tun+d+ha bzhi dgod/ da'i ba nyams pani drag ser byam long bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor rgyan gyis bstan no// dpal chen rtsa bzhi las bskyed de/ nang rtags phyir shang bas sme ba dkar nag tu byung ste/ sdeb mdang sa kyi ma mi gas bya'o//
362a7(rnying rgyud): dras po phur zil sngags ni/ ma mthag i kaM sa zhes btun po// thacag ter gyi mdu ste dgra pa'o// / de nas sum rgyas la mtshams bcad/ yum rnams bdud rtsi'i rgyas 'azlas la/ mde'u srang ma dang le bzhin gyis mthul
362b1(rnying rgyud): chings byas la/ yum gyi dbyung pa nas bzung la/ the tsom spang ste yang ma bcom ldan 'das dang dgongs spyod gcig tu bzhugs so// ma ltar dbang ma byed/ dbyings las ye shes sbyor/ sring ltar lhas ma ngam/ grogs ltar 'phrag ma dog/ mdza' mo ltar gzung
362b2(rnying rgyud): ma ngan/ zan ltar snying ma ring / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir dbang bskur la bzhag/ dang po'i nub mo bshags pa bya/ de phyi de'i nub mo bar chad kyis mi tshugs par bya ba'i phyir/ phur pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol/ de'i phyi de'i nub
362b3(rnying rgyud): mo nam mkha' lding gcig gis thugs dam bskang / de'i phyi de'i nub mo tse ras bzlog/ de'i phyi de'i nub mo lug lhug pos thugs dam bskang / yum gyi dpung kha nas bzung la the tsom cha'o// khar sang khar nyin spun/ ma rung dem shes srid du ngom shes/ grogs su
362b4(rnying rgyud): ngom shes/ mdza' mor ngo ma shes/ zan mor ngo ma shes/ ma ru ni ngo shes na/ dbyings dang ye shes ldan/ grogs su ngo shes na/ brtse ba'i gzhung dang ldan/ ming por ni ngo shes na/ gzi brjid chos dang ldan/ rnge ru ni ngo shes na/ dbyings su ni 'bangs
362b5(rnying rgyud): su mchi/ de nas yab mngon rtogs kyi rgyal pos srin lag nas bzung ste/ yum gyi b+ha ga dbang du bsdus la/ spyan drang ste dgung bzhi'i nub mo shel dkar po ya sangs kyis dkar mo rnams kyi thugs dam bskang / de nas khyi nag po shel mig gis mtsho sman
362b6(rnying rgyud): dang klu rnams kyi thugs dam bskang / pra dbab pa yang yum bdud rtsi'i chus bkrus/ rak+ta'i thig le gdab/ srin lag la skud pa nag po gcig gis gdags/ gud mo la skud pa dkar pos gdags la bzung / pra dbab pa'i yum mtshams bcang /

363a5(rnying rgyud): dang drab tu'i dang // chos nyid kyis chos ca dbang du bad+ma dang / sems kyis srid par bang du brtsub dang / spyang pas dbang du bsgrub dang / bsgyangs dbang du bslab 'o// dbang dru gang brdzun/ ma mngon gyi sna dgrang bar dra bsrung // ma
363a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor la m-igazan par dbang du bsgrub dang / bdag ma mo'i dbang mi 'gro ba dang / mamo dag gi dbang du 'dra bar bstir// dbang du brdzi ba'i la'u ste gnyis pa'o// / chos dang rnam mkha' gnyis su med/ nam mkhas bzung ba
363a7(rnying rgyud): bzhal shes bstan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bdag dpal chen pos srid pa gsum shis bstan pa dang / de gnyis ni bstabs shes bstan pa'o// spyod pas shes bstan pa ni/ he ru ka nyid kyi sleb dkar nag las bskyed nas/ phyir ba
363b1(rnying rgyud): sden pa 'byor pa rnams brtan pa bslang bar dam bcas pa chungs/ 'digan gyi mchogs bzhan go// than las kyi zhes pastan pa bdag nga na la gnas te/ ab zlo ha du mnam ta nga na/ zas badzad pas rgyas yan ldan/

363b3(rnying rgyud): chen la bskur ba bzhin du ga te/ TI bka' stsal/ 'jig rten nyams ning 'jugs pa thi mchis ni ra// de ltar drug cing spangs pa ni/ 'chis bstan pa'i 'a'u ster gsum pa'o// / dpal chen po'i byang chub sems rin
363b4(rnying rgyud): tshe sbom las/ thugs kyi rtsa bzhi tshogs bzhir gyes pa yang / dar dkar gyi srung ba gser gyi sbu ga nas tsam gcig gnas pa las/ snying khar gzad dza dza zhes brjod pas/ thugs kyi rtsa las lozhe nas phrin las kyi don mdzad pa'i ma mo sku mdog dkar mo ga
363b5(rnying rgyud): del nyi mashar ba 'dra ba phyug g.yas na snying dang khrag bsdams pa/ g.yon mda'ag thogs pa mdun drang por ban byung dkar po brtsibs te nye zer 'bum gyis brtson pa/ zla chos stong gis brgyan bzhig byung bas/ ci bka' stsal/ zhes zer nas mdun na 'jug sa/
363b6(rnying rgyud): sring mo dkar mo dung long can zhes bya'o// lho phyogs kyi tsa bai DUr+ya 'dra ba'i sgo nas/ sku nas tsam las/ ma mo snying du na long srog caste zhes brjod pas/ des g.yon du skya mdog sngon mo chu glang 'bar ma la chibs pa/ spu dang yan lag sbal nag 'bar byas
363b7(rnying rgyud): nad rgyan// zangs kyi drab mig mangs gcig ni chibs kyi phye 'od la btags/ phyag g.yas na lcags kyi gser ma khye bog mthogs pa/ g.yon 'phrul gyi me long gcig bsdams pa/ sru pa rtsa bya'i thul ba gcag gsol ba/ yid kyi drang
364a1(rnying rgyud): gis 'jig rten gyi khams g.yogs pa/ sman g.yas g.yon gnyis te zla khyil btsam/ ci bka' sgal zer nas mdun du 'dug sa// nub phyogs kyi ca dang ba banan gyi lce'u 'drub su nas tsam gcig las/ thang
364a2(rnying rgyud): ran dza dzaM/ zhes brjod pas/ sku mdog dmar mo me lce mched pa 'dra bzangs kyi dre'u rta smug po la rnga rngog lcags kyis byas pa/ che chung gi tshad dpag tshad brgyad khri stong yod pa zhi gzhon nas/ sga la le brgan dmar po gsol ba/ zangs kyi zhags pa 'dom
364a3(rnying rgyud): dgra bcwa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa snga gong la btags pa yid kyi rba ba brgya stong gis 'jig rten gyi khams g.yogs pa/ skra rags rdul gyi zhags pas bcings pa/ phyag na drug gi ga'u gcig ni bsdams/ ci bka' stsal zhes zer zhing / mdun nas ye re
364a4(rnying rgyud): byang phyogs kyi rtsa ljang gu nas tsam las/ ru ta ma mthun dza dza/ zhes brjod pas/ ngos byang mdun du sku mdog ldang ser ral pa spyi bor bcings pa/ spyan 'bar ba/ sku khro mor bzhugs pa/ pU'i cha lugs dbar ba/ skyes bu'i chas su zhugs pa
364a5(rnying rgyud): za skrag dmar bkra la/ lcags kyi stag ral gyis brgyan pa/ lcags kyi dre'u rta nag gu la/ rnga rngog zangs su 'dug pa/ zangs su chag gang khru bzhi yod pa mgyogs pa'i chad glog pas myur ba cig la zhon nas bsre'i sgra bstad pa/ lag pa g.yas na wu gr-i/ la

366b5(rnying rgyud): las// 'thor byed rlung nag tshogs kyi rgya gram gtams// chags byed rak+ta tshogs kyi rnga klong 'khyil// keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab mi bzad brtsegs// sa gzhi rdo rje n+ya gram gcal bkram ste// zhing chen gsar rnying gtams pas mtha' dmas brda
366b6(rnying rgyud): e ye khaM suM b+h+rUM/ me bzad skyug nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// chu srin bye bas ya'i thod pa las// mi bzang dur khrod 'bar ba'i tshigs rmang byas// drags pa'i thod dgu 'bar pa'i rtsigs pas brtsigs// gnam lcags ngur mo 'bar ba'i bze chen
366b7(rnying rgyud): btab// rin chen mchog gis zung bzhi mdzes par brgyan// g.yu'od sngon po 'bar ba'i kha bud da na// mu khyud gnam lcags 'bar ba'i ri yis bskor// bruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+nyA na tsakra hUM/ mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// zla ga ma dbang chen
367a1(rnying rgyud): nga ma / na thus zla/ na nga bsnang ba na// zhwa ma/ mas byu sa// ma gtan ma dag nas gdus

373a3(rnying rgyud): nyams ci gzhag so// blam nA mjug pacu ba DUn g+sa / srid kyi rnams rgyad nyan mangs pa'i dadul brji// de las sa blas ban/ d+d+haH/ thun na mi pa'i // rnam pa gangasu pa/ dwa
373a4(rnying rgyud): dang / debs de zhis ga nyis byed de/ deni ma ma nag lag/ mun pa ni skye poni gyis thams cad dang bzhin tu rgyas sun ci rna mamam sa deng tha'ang te/ yinas bcos pa med pa'i nga rgyan pa dun// min 'dren pa na/ ga ga

373b1(rnying rgyud): shul gyis dbang du bsdu ba'i ma bdun na n+ya ma'i tshul du bkol lo// 'jig rten las 'das pa chen po las ni byung / 'jig rten la ni gnas te/ de gang las byung nam mo'i le'u lho stong phrag drug d+hAr+Na lnga las/ man ngag gi leH/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le 'u tsa ta
373b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis byung ngo // ma mo dbang du bsdu zhing bkrol thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste gya lnga pa'o// / ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum bskyed pa la/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni/ dmigs med yum gyi ngang du gsal/ khyab ga la don ni
373b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par ldan// ma hA shU n+ya tAdz+nyA na maN+Da la hUM/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin ne/ rig pa'i ye shes pade chen mkha'// kun tu snang srid khyab par gsal// gnyis med lhun gyis grub pa'i mchog/ d+ha mad+hA tu maN+Dal hU~M/ de nas kyu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ dbang chen
373b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bskyed// gnyis su med pa'i mkha' dbyings las// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs gtibs// bde mchog yid bzhin char du 'bebs// thams cad ma lus bskyed pa'i bu// rin chen 'bar ba'i 'od zer las// dbang chen dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i rgyu//

373b6(rnying rgyud): thod pa la// mi bzad dur khrod 'bar ba'i rtsigs rmad byas// 'bar ba'i thod dgu rtsig pas mkhar du brtsigs// gnam lcags dur mo 'bar ba'i gzer chen gdab// rin chen mchog gis zur bzhi mdzes par brgyan// g.yu 'od sngon po 'bar ba'i kha bad
373b7(rnying rgyud): can// mu khyud gan ma lcags 'bar ba'i ri yis bskor// sum thun d+ha b+han d+ha ra A raH ti ra baM/ de ni gdan khri bskyed de/ mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal las 'dir// zhing chen zhing chung gcal du bkram// mchog phran mang po gdan du bting // the'u brang dgu brgyar/
374a1(rnying rgyud): ga'atshol// lha srin kun gyi nang tshangs can// N+DI ba/ a gtir ba/ rak+Sha ti ba/ da ni byug bya ste/ mi mngon mkha' dbyings skrag po'i dkyil 'khor na// yul rtag gcig sul pa drug la bka' nyan stong // bka/ las phyag
374a2(rnying rgyud): brtan 'bum// snang sring bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyar bzhin nam mkha'i khams na rgyag/ 'drug dang glog gi bdag mo mdzad// lde dang bu yug 'bebs mdzad ma// glog ma srin la phyag 'tshal lo// dpyid bzhin kun la drod 'bebs ma// mu bo kun bI sna
374a3(rnying rgyud): 'dren ma// chu bo kun gyi gzhung 'byams ma// nag mo'i gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// ston bzhin 'bras bu ljin mdzad ma// sprang po de ni kha ser la// 'bru dang lo yi bcud sten ma// mi rnams kun gyi dpal 'phrog cing // glog 'gru ma la phye// 'tshal lo//

374a5(rnying rgyud): ste srog gi snying // ma hA ku ku ya/ sa ma ya bak+Shas mu la/ ma hA a mr-i ta sa ma ya/ ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum gyi le'u ste gya drug pa'o// / da ni mchod pa 'bul ba ste/ spug nag 'jigs pa'i rgyal mo bzhengs su gsol// nag mo mi bzang rgya
374a6(rnying rgyud): tsho bzhengs su gsol// phyag brgyan rkang drug mdzes ma bzhengs su gsol// mdo gang zang nag mo mthu chen bzhengs su gsol// e h+ye nyi tshur skyon 'khor dang bcas// wa~M u~M ba~M ha~MH/ spyan 'dren ma lus gshegs su gsol// ma gcig chen mo 'dir

378b3(rnying rgyud): thang dbyams zas sbyin gtibs shing // pho blang rin myo gas pa sgrol// rin chen mdzes pa'i rgyan lta ba zhun// shar lho nu ba byang gro bzhin// 'jigs pa bzhi yis blo bkag kyang // mastsogs pa bzhi yis rdo h+ye zhig// de rje pra be na dang // ces brjod
378b4(rnying rgyud): pas rnaMd kyi/ hUM yang dag gsang ba dkyi 'khor du// sangs rgyas yi shes 'di ldan na// hU~M sum sras dang sngor bcam rnams// rigs kyi ltang ni martogs ning // gnyis med don gyis brel pa'i// mi byed dadapar byag ba
378b5(rnying rgyud): hUM yang dag gsang pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// rje'i slob dpon ye shes bya// bgang rjen rjes su dran pa'i phyir// zhus pa'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M ya dag gas pa'i dkyil 'kho di // dmachog gzungs kyis brel ba'i mtshag/ @
378b6(rnying rgyud): b+hU'i 'dushes nyed bzhag nas// gdung ba'i tshul kyis phyag 'ag lnga'o// salal kau// zhes rgya gang tshal ba// d+hi dgongs shig pa shes 'do rdzogs // yab chupa pa khyo dang bzlas pa rnams// bdag cig pa byung thub bra la// dkris
378b7(rnying rgyud): shing btan pas sa dngas byung zhig/ byams pa phyogs med spyan gyis gzigs// 'khor ba'i sems can pa na sa// ma rig la khrul ba'i ring bdag gis// gzung 'dzin gnyis su bzung bas dang sa// rdeg pa'i 'dzam 'i dge bla tshogs
379a1(rnying rgyud): na tu na / / na
379a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa rnab pan// nubacud stong babyur ba'i 'ang bdu pa ba stsa// sa pa byu ca skyes sa phying gzhi te/ spangs pa ma pa'i 'a gyu na pa di/ med na
379a3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa dang // 'phags pa mdzod lam mo mkha' 'gro thugs dum slongs// A pa la to// zhes brjod pardung // 'dza ga da gtong ma da drang ba'i lce'u steg lnga pa'o// / sbyin rnga rdu la thebs lab yum langs pa/
379a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po la rgyun dus gsol pa 'di skad du/ hUM gas du chen pa'i dkyil 'khyo ning // rab zhis tsu po du zhing di nyid du/ dod rgyal po snyed du gsola'o// theg pa kun las dpags pa dang // me sa dbang du bsu ba'i phyir// zhe
379a5(rnying rgyud): chen sa ga 'jig pa pas/ mi srong tsho nyid ca dun na// mi bu mdzi / zhes rgya la gsob 'o// dab rgyan mchog gis mengang gso mo// theg pa yongs las dpags pa dang // srid gsum dang bye du ba'i phyir// rnyed
379b1(rnying rgyud): pA ste thugs dbu lnga 'di gsol bas// srid pa'i dbang byin rnams la dbang phyur nan/ oM grA ya he te/ zhes brjod la dbul gsol lo// de nas zhing gi sor phung dbu la mnga' gsol ba 'di skad do// phreng ba chen pos mngang gdus
379b2(rnying rgyud): l-i// theg pa yongs las 'phags pa dang // ma mo'i srog snying drang ba'i phyir// zhing gi song phreng 'di 'bul bas// ma mo rnams la dbang phyur shog/ oM ku h+ya ma ma ra tas+t+waM/ phyag tu dbul lo// phyag rgya chen pos mang
379b3(rnying rgyud): gsol la// bdud dang ma stegs 'dul ba dang // ma mo gsuMb kyi sa gas pa pa'i phyi// seM m+b+ha 'ab ba'i phyag tu 'di snyoms la// bdud dang sa skyegs dbang du phud/ oM gaN+Da mama?/ zhes brjod dkyil lo// phya ga
379b4(rnying rgyud): gsag yang gzhi sang dgasol mo// bdud pazhi rdul chog pa dang // phrin pas rnam pa ni sgrub pa'i phyir/ b+hag zugs g.yang gizhi 'dogasu la gas/ dpyang brtul bu byed zas dang ldan pa nag//
379b5(rnying rgyud): thAm+b+haH/ skyes sul gsol/ de nas yum la rgyun kyisogs pa pa ya ba da na na/ denas byas kyi gang pas rgyal zhibs la rgyan sa gsum gsol te 'di skad do// bAka' gsang des pa'i gnas mchog
379b6(rnying rgyud): de ji zhal thebs gas cing dgongs su gsol// rdo rje rgyal po bskal cing bsgyel ba ma// thugs dal 'dzinas bzung nas bsgreng ba'i phyir// rgyan zas gsuM'i gyis mnga' gsol lo// zhwa dag
379b7(rnying rgyud): med de pargyan dngas/ mchog gi phyir bu gcig pa du zu ba pa dang byu // rkyen pas nasu ma// bdud dang su sregs dul du rdzogs// dngas mchad byings la mtshan pa
380a1(rnying rgyud): stsa da// na // du dag bla dang // mas pa // g.ya ga du
380a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// bral chen mtshan ma dpral ba gdag// mtshan ma dpral bar mi gdab cu// dpal chen nyid dang rang rtags gcig/ badz+ra k+ta'i mtshan ma 'di// srin mtshams par du thig leng dgod// zhag gi song ris kha 'thas
380a3(rnying rgyud): la// bdud m+b+hi rakAzugs ka la// mr-id// s+yAd ta sa ha zhes// kun gyis der rje zas shing kun la gad / da rje rtul pargyal thibs myed 'a gas pa zhing ma tshang la mtshan ma gdapa pa'i btsu gajug pa ga /
380a4(rnying rgyud): cig kyis 'di ta kyi kyido kyimi khri gro'i mi kyi mig pa de du 'i kyi 'i ma no/ basbyin pa paphyi ba banang gzugs kyi yang stengs yang dul ti me rtse ba'i sem nam gnyis kyim la marub kyi ni gnyisas
380a5(rnying rgyud): gdungs
380a6(rnying rgyud): dwa kyi yang da ga rgod rtsal gyis kyi bad gnyis kyis gzugs sa pa pa bgras pa/ dka' ba'i tshigs parjos na thus pa'i bgal phrin da na meng ma yin drug sang pa'i rgyu kyang gas pa/
380a7(rnying rgyud): rin po che sangs rgyas ye shes nas rim par brgyad do//
